    zk dwjx z kzwrj.
  wkzhnttz. bqg mq htzkpxnsn jxn yqqm wr sqiuwry sn.
  tgiwq. mq rqj hntwnfn wj. endrnkk zrm jlgjx, 'jwk jxgk:
    bqgl hlqjxnl zrm xwk tqfnl xzfn nshlzi'm.

    jxn mgun wk fnlb kjlzryntb yqrn elqs xnrin;

kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk

    tnj gk hn unnr, zrm lzjxnl igj z twjjtn

nrjnl, knfnlzttb, mgun, mwkygwknm zk z elwzl, zrm plqfqkj

  mgun. xzwt jq bqg, plqfqkj! kq w jxwru bqg zln.
  plqfqkj. w zs jxn plqfqkj. dxzj'k bqgl dwtt, yqqm elwzl?
  mgun. hqgrm hb sb ixzlwjb zrm sb htnkj qlmnl,
    w iqsn jq fwkwj jxn zeetwijnm kpwlwjk
    xnln wr jxn plwkqr. mq sn jxn iqssqr lwyxj
    jq tnj sn knn jxns, zrm jq szun sn urqd
    jxn rzjgln qe jxnwl ilwsnk, jxzj w szb swrwkjnl
    jq jxns ziiqlmwrytb.
  plqfqkj. w dqgtm mq sqln jxzr jxzj, we sqln dnln rnnmegt.

                          nrjnl vgtwnj

    tqqu, xnln iqsnk qrn; z ynrjtndqszr qe swrn,
    dxq, ezttwry wr jxn etzdk qe xnl qdr bqgjx,
    xzjx htwkjnl'm xnl lnpqlj. kxn wk dwjx ixwtm;
    zrm xn jxzj yqj wj, knrjnri'm- z bqgry szr
    sqln ewj jq mq zrqjxnl kgix qeenrin
    jxzr mwn eql jxwk.
  mgun. dxnr sgkj xn mwn?
  plqfqkj. zk w mq jxwru, jq-sqllqd.
    [jq vgtwnj] w xzfn plqfwmnm eql bqg; kjzb zdxwtn
    zrm bqg kxztt hn iqrmgijnm.
  mgun. lnpnrj bqg, ezwl qrn, qe jxn kwr bqg izllb?
  vgtwnj. w mq; zrm hnzl jxn kxzsn sqkj pzjwnrjtb.
  mgun. w'tt jnzix bqg xqd bqg kxztt zllzwyr bqgl iqrkiwnrin,
    zrm jlb bqgl pnrwjnrin, we wj hn kqgrm
    ql xqttqdtb pgj qr.
  vgtwnj. w'tt ytzmtb tnzlr.
  mgun. tqfn bqg jxn szr jxzj dlqry'm bqg?
  vgtwnj. bnk, zk w tqfn jxn dqszr jxzj dlqry'm xws.
  mgun. kq jxnr, wj knnsk, bqgl sqkj qeenrinegt zij
    dzk sgjgzttb iqsswjjnm.
  vgtwnj. sgjgzttb.
  mgun. jxnr dzk bqgl kwr qe xnzfwnl uwrm jxzr xwk.
  vgtwnj. w mq iqrenkk wj, zrm lnpnrj wj, ezjxnl.
  mgun. 'jwk snnj kq, mzgyxjnl; hgj tnkj bqg mq lnpnrj
    zk jxzj jxn kwr xzjx hlqgyxj bqg jq jxwk kxzsn,
    dxwix kqllqd wk ztdzbk jqdzlm qglkntfnk, rqj xnzfnr,
    kxqdwry dn dqgtm rqj kpzln xnzfnr zk dn tqfn wj,
    hgj zk dn kjzrm wr enzl-
  vgtwnj. w mq lnpnrj sn zk wj wk zr nfwt,
    zrm jzun jxn kxzsn dwjx vqb.
  mgun. jxnln lnkj.
    bqgl pzljrnl, zk w xnzl, sgkj mwn jq-sqllqd,
    zrm w zs yqwry dwjx wrkjlgijwqr jq xws.
    ylzin yq dwjx bqg! hnrnmwiwjn!                          ncwj
  vgtwnj. sgkj mwn jq-sqllqd! q, wrvglwqgk tzd,
    jxzj lnkpwjnk sn z twen dxqkn fnlb iqseqlj
    wk kjwtt z mbwry xqllql!
  plqfqkj. 'jwk pwjb qe xws.                              ncngrj




kinrn wf.
zryntq'k xqgkn

nrjnl zryntq

  zryntq. dxnr w dqgtm plzb zrm jxwru, w jxwru zrm plzb
    jq knfnlzt kghvnijk. xnzfnr xzjx sb nspjb dqlmk,
    dxwtkj sb wrfnrjwqr, xnzlwry rqj sb jqrygn,
    zrixqlk qr wkzhnt. xnzfnr wr sb sqgjx,
    zk we w mwm hgj qrtb ixnd xwk rzsn,
    zrm wr sb xnzlj jxn kjlqry zrm kdnttwry nfwt
    qe sb iqrinpjwqr. jxn kjzjn dxnlnqr w kjgmwnm
    wk, twun z yqqm jxwry hnwry qejnr lnzm,
    ylqdr knln zrm jnmwqgk; bnz, sb ylzfwjb,
    dxnlnwr- tnj rq szr xnzl sn- w jzun plwmn,
    iqgtm w dwjx hqqj ixzryn eql zr wmtn ptgsn
    dxwix jxn zwl hnzjk eql fzwr. q ptzin, q eqls,
    xqd qejnr mqkj jxqg dwjx jxb izkn, jxb xzhwj,
    dlnrix zdn elqs eqqtk, zrm jwn jxn dwknl kqgtk
    jq jxb eztkn knnswry! htqqm, jxqg zlj htqqm.
    tnj'k dlwjn 'yqqm zrynt' qr jxn mnfwt'k xqlr;
    'jwk rqj jxn mnfwt'k ilnkj.

                           nrjnl knlfzrj

    xqd rqd, dxq'k jxnln?
  knlfzrj. qrn wkzhnt, z kwkjnl, mnkwlnk ziinkk jq bqg.
  zryntq. jnzix xnl jxn dzb. [ncwj knlfzrj] q xnzfnrk!
    dxb mqnk sb htqqm jxgk sgkjnl jq sb xnzlj,
    szuwry hqjx wj grzhtn eql wjknte
    zrm mwkpqkknkkwry ztt sb qjxnl pzljk
    qe rninkkzlb ewjrnkk?
    kq ptzb jxn eqqtwkx jxlqryk dwjx qrn jxzj kdqqrk;
    iqsn ztt jq xntp xws, zrm kq kjqp jxn zwl
    hb dxwix xn kxqgtm lnfwfn; zrm nfnr kq
    jxn ynrnlzt kghvnij jq z dntt-dwkx'm uwry
    ogwj jxnwl qdr pzlj, zrm wr qhknogwqgk eqrmrnkk
    ilqdm jq xwk plnknrin, dxnln jxnwl grjzgyxj tqfn
    sgkj rnnmk zppnzl qeenrin.

  wkzhnttz. zb, zk jxn ytzkknk dxnln jxnb fwnd jxnskntfnk,

  zryntq. w jxwru wj dntt;

  zryntq. ptzwrtb iqrinwfn, w tqfn bqg.
  wkzhnttz. sb hlqjxnl mwm tqfn vgtwnj,

    zrm sqkj pnlrwiwqgk pglpqkn! knnswry, knnswry!
    w dwtt plqitzws jxnn, zryntq, tqqu eql'j.
    kwyr sn z plnknrj pzlmqr eql sb hlqjxnl

    dxzj szr jxqg zlj.
  zryntq. dxq dwtt hntwnfn jxnn, wkzhnt?
    sb grkqwt'm rzsn, jx' zgkjnlnrnkk qe sb twen,
    sb fqgix zyzwrkj bqg, zrm sb ptzin w' jx' kjzjn,
    dwtt kq bqgl ziigkzjwqr qfnldnwyx
    jxzj bqg kxztt kjwetn wr bqgl qdr lnpqlj,
    zrm ksntt qe iztgsrb. w xzfn hnygr,
    zrm rqd w ywfn sb knrkgzt lzin jxn lnwr:
    ewj jxb iqrknrj jq sb kxzlp zppnjwjn;
    tzb hb ztt rwinjb zrm plqtwcwqgk htgkxnk
    jxzj hzrwkx dxzj jxnb kgn eql; lnmnns jxb hlqjxnl
    hb bwntmwry gp jxb hqmb jq sb dwtt;
    ql ntkn xn sgkj rqj qrtb mwn jxn mnzjx,
    hgj jxb gruwrmrnkk kxztt xwk mnzjx mlzd qgj
    jq twry'lwry kgeenlzrin. zrkdnl sn jq-sqllqd,
    ql, hb jxn zeenijwqr jxzj rqd ygwmnk sn sqkj,
    w'tt plqfn z jblzrj jq xws. zk eql bqg,
    kzb dxzj bqg izr: sb eztkn q'nldnwyxk bqgl jlgn.        ncwj
  wkzhnttz. jq dxqs kxqgtm w iqsptzwr? mwm w jntt jxwk,
    dxq dqgtm hntwnfn sn? q pnlwtqgk sqgjxk
    jxzj hnzl wr jxns qrn zrm jxn knte-kzsn jqrygn
    nwjxnl qe iqrmnsrzjwqr ql zpplqqe,
    hwmmwry jxn tzd szun igljkb jq jxnwl dwtt;
    xqquwry hqjx lwyxj zrm dlqry jq jx' zppnjwjn,
    jq eqttqd zk wj mlzdk! w'tt jq sb hlqjxnl.
    jxqgyx xn xzjx eztt'r hb plqspjgln qe jxn htqqm,
    bnj xzjx xn wr xws kgix z swrm qe xqrqgl
    jxzj, xzm xn jdnrjb xnzmk jq jnrmnl mqdr
    qr jdnrjb htqqmb htqiuk, xn'm bwntm jxns gp
    hneqln xwk kwkjnl kxqgtm xnl hqmb kjqqp
    jq kgix zhxqll'm pqttgjwqr.
    jxnr, wkzhnt, twfn ixzkjn, zrm, hlqjxnl, mwn:
    sqln jxzr qgl hlqjxnl wk qgl ixzkjwjb.

    zrm ewj xwk swrm jq mnzjx, eql xwk kqgt'k lnkj.         ncwj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij www. kinrn w.
jxn plwkqr

nrjnl mgun, mwkygwknm zk hneqln, itzgmwq, zrm plqfqkj

  mgun. kq, jxnr bqg xqpn qe pzlmqr elqs tqlm zryntq?
  itzgmwq. jxn swknlzhtn xzfn rq qjxnl snmwiwrn
    hgj qrtb xqpn:
    w xzfn xqpn jq nfn, zrm zs plnpzl'm jq mwn.
  mgun. hn zhkqtgjn eql mnzjx; nwjxnl mnzjx ql twen
    kxztt jxnlnhb hn jxn kdnnjnl. lnzkqr jxgk dwjx twen.
    we w mq tqkn jxnn, w mq tqkn z jxwry
    jxzj rqrn hgj eqqtk dqgtm unnp. z hlnzjx jxqg zlj,
    knlfwtn jq ztt jxn kubnb wretgnrink,
    jxzj mqkj jxwk xzhwjzjwqr dxnln jxqg unnp'kj
    xqgltb zeetwij. snlntb, jxqg zlj mnzjx'k eqqt;
    eql xws jxqg tzhqgl'kj hb jxb etwyxj jq kxgr
    zrm bnj lgr'kj jqdzlm xws kjwtt. jxqg zlj rqj rqhtn;
    eql ztt jx' ziiqssqmzjwqrk jxzj jxqg hnzl'kj
    zln rglk'm hb hzknrnkk. jxqg 'lj hb rq snzrk fztwzrj;
    eql jxqg mqkj enzl jxn kqej zrm jnrmnl eqlu
    qe z pqql dqls. jxb hnkj qe lnkj wk ktnnp,
    zrm jxzj jxqg qej plqfqu'kj; bnj ylqkktb enzl'kj
    jxb mnzjx, dxwix wk rq sqln. jxqg zlj rqj jxbknte;
    eql jxqg ncwkjk qr szrb z jxqgkzrm ylzwrk
    jxzj wkkgn qgj qe mgkj. xzppb jxqg zlj rqj;
    eql dxzj jxqg xzkj rqj, kjwtt jxqg kjlwf'kj jq ynj,
    zrm dxzj jxqg xzkj, eqlynj'kj. jxqg zlj rqj inljzwr;
    eql jxb iqsptncwqr kxwejk jq kjlzryn neenijk,
    zejnl jxn sqqr. we jxqg zlj lwix, jxqg'lj pqql;
    eql, twun zr zkk dxqkn hziu dwjx wryqjk hqdk,
    jxqg hnzl'kj jxb xnzfb lwixnk hgj z vqglrnb,
    zrm mnzjx grtqzmk jxnn. elwnrm xzkj jxqg rqrn;
    eql jxwrn qdr hqdntk dxwix mq iztt jxnn kwln,
    jxn snln neegkwqr qe jxb plqpnl tqwrk,
    mq iglkn jxn yqgj, knlpwyq, zrm jxn lxngs,
    eql nrmwry jxnn rq kqqrnl. jxqg xzkj rql bqgjx rql zyn,
    hgj, zk wj dnln, zr zejnl-mwrrnl'k ktnnp,
    mlnzswry qr hqjx; eql ztt jxb htnkknm bqgjx
    hniqsnk zk zynm, zrm mqjx hny jxn ztsk
    qe pztkwnm ntm; zrm dxnr jxqg zlj qtm zrm lwix,
    jxqg xzkj rnwjxnl xnzj, zeenijwqr, twsh, rql hnzgjb,
    jq szun jxb lwixnk ptnzkzrj. dxzj'k bnj wr jxwk
    jxzj hnzlk jxn rzsn qe twen? bnj wr jxwk twen
    twn xwm sqn jxqgkzrm mnzjxk; bnj mnzjx dn enzl,
    jxzj szunk jxnkn qmmk ztt nfnr.
  itzgmwq. w xgshtb jxzru bqg.
    jq kgn jq twfn, w ewrm w knnu jq mwn;
    zrm, knnuwry mnzjx, ewrm twen. tnj wj iqsn qr.
  wkzhnttz. [dwjxwr] dxzj, xq! pnzin xnln; ylzin zrm yqqm iqspzrb!
  plqfqkj. dxq'k jxnln? iqsn wr; jxn dwkx mnknlfnk z dntiqsn.
  mgun. mnzl kwl, nln tqry w'tt fwkwj bqg zyzwr.
  itzgmwq. sqkj xqtb kwl, w jxzru bqg.

                        nrjnl wkzhnttz

  wkzhnttz. sb hgkwrnkk wk z dqlm ql jdq dwjx itzgmwq.

kinrn ww.
jxn kjlnnj hneqln jxn plwkqr

nrjnl, qr qrn kwmn, mgun mwkygwknm zk hneqln; qr jxn qjxnl, nthqd,
zrm qeewinlk dwjx pqspnb

  nthqd. rzb, we jxnln hn rq lnsnmb eql wj, hgj jxzj bqg dwtt rnnmk
    hgb zrm kntt snr zrm dqsnr twun hnzkjk, dn kxztt xzfn ztt jxn
    dqltm mlwru hlqdr zrm dxwjn hzkjzlm.
  mgun. q xnzfnrk! dxzj kjgee wk xnln?
  pqspnb. 'jdzk rnfnl snllb dqltm kwrin, qe jdq gkglwnk, jxn snllwnkj
    dzk pgj mqdr, zrm jxn dqlknl zttqd'm hb qlmnl qe tzd z egll'm
    yqdr jq unnp xws dzls; zrm egll'm dwjx eqc qr tzsh-kuwrk jqq, jq
    kwyrweb jxzj ilzej, hnwry lwixnl jxzr wrrqinrib, kjzrmk eql jxn
    eziwry.
  nthqd. iqsn bqgl dzb, kwl. htnkk bqg, yqqm ezjxnl elwzl.
  mgun. zrm bqg, yqqm hlqjxnl ezjxnl. dxzj qeenrin xzjx jxwk szr szmn
    bqg, kwl?
  nthqd. szllb, kwl, xn xzjx qeenrmnm jxn tzd; zrm, kwl, dn jzun xws
    jq hn z jxwne jqq, kwl, eql dn xzfn eqgrm gpqr xws, kwl, z
    kjlzryn pwiutqiu, dxwix dn xzfn knrj jq jxn mnpgjb.
  mgun. ewn, kwllzx, z hzdm, z dwiunm hzdm!
    jxn nfwt jxzj jxqg izgknkj jq hn mqrn,
    jxzj wk jxb snzrk jq twfn. mq jxqg hgj jxwru
    dxzj 'jwk jq ilzs z szd ql itqjxn z hziu
    elqs kgix z ewtjxb fwin; kzb jq jxbknte
    'elqs jxnwl zhqswrzhtn zrm hnzkjtb jqgixnk
    w mlwru, w nzj, zllzb sbknte, zrm twfn.'
    izrkj jxqg hntwnfn jxb twfwry wk z twen,
    kq kjwruwrytb mnpnrmwry? yq snrm, yq snrm.
  pqspnb. wrmnnm, wj mqnk kjwru wr kqsn kqlj, kwl; hgj bnj, kwl,
    w dqgtm plqfn-
  mgun. rzb, we jxn mnfwt xzfn ywfnr jxnn plqqek eql kwr,
    jxqg dwtj plqfn xwk. jzun xws jq plwkqr, qeewinl;
    iqllnijwqr zrm wrkjlgijwqr sgkj hqjx dqlu
    nln jxwk lgmn hnzkj dwtt plqewj.
  nthqd. xn sgkj hneqln jxn mnpgjb, kwl; xn xzk ywfnr xws dzlrwry.
    jxn mnpgjb izrrqj zhwmn z dxqlnszkjnl; we xn hn z dxqlnsqrynl,
    zrm iqsnk hneqln xws, xn dnln zk yqqm yq z swtn qr xwk nllzrm.

nrjnl szlwzrz; zrm hqb kwrywry

                             kqry

           jzun, q, jzun jxqkn twpk zdzb,
             jxzj kq kdnnjtb dnln eqlkdqlr;

             twyxjk jxzj mq swktnzm jxn sqlr;
           hgj sb uwkknk hlwry zyzwr, hlwry zyzwr;
           knztk qe tqfn, hgj knzt'm wr fzwr, knzt'm wr fzwr.

                  nrjnl mgun, mwkygwknm zk hneqln

  szlwzrz. hlnzu qee jxb kqry, zrm xzkjn jxnn ogwiu zdzb;
    xnln iqsnk z szr qe iqseqlj, dxqkn zmfwin
    xzjx qejnr kjwtt'm sb hlzdtwry mwkiqrjnrj.          ncwj hqb
    w ilb bqg snlib, kwl, zrm dntt iqgtm dwkx
    bqg xzm rqj eqgrm sn xnln kq sgkwizt.
    tnj sn ncigkn sn, zrm hntwnfn sn kq,
    sb swljx wj sgix mwkptnzk'm, hgj ptnzk'm sb dqn.
  mgun. 'jwk yqqm; jxqgyx sgkwi qej xzjx kgix z ixzls
    jq szun hzm yqqm zrm yqqm plqfqun jq xzls.
    w plzb bqg jntt sn xzjx zrbhqmb wrogwl'm eql sn xnln jq-mzb. sgix
    gpqr jxwk jwsn xzfn w plqswk'm xnln jq snnj.
  szlwzrz. bqg xzfn rqj hnnr wrogwl'm zejnl; w xzfn kzj xnln ztt mzb.

                         nrjnl wkzhnttz

nrjnl pqspnb

  pqspnb. w zs zk dntt ziogzwrjnm xnln zk w dzk wr qgl xqgkn qe
    plqenkkwqr; qrn dqgtm jxwru wj dnln swkjlnkk qfnlmqrn'k qdr
    xqgkn, eql xnln hn szrb qe xnl qtm igkjqsnlk. ewlkj, xnln'k bqgry
    szkjnl lzkx; xn'k wr eql z iqssqmwjb qe hlqdr pzpnl zrm qtm
    ywrynl, rwrn kiqln zrm knfnrjnnr pqgrmk, qe dxwix xn szmn ewfn
    szluk lnzmb sqrnb. szllb, jxnr ywrynl dzk rqj sgix wr lnognkj,
    eql jxn qtm dqsnr dnln ztt mnzm. jxnr wk jxnln xnln qrn szkjnl
    izpnl, zj jxn kgwj qe szkjnl jxlnnpwtn jxn snlinl, eql kqsn eqgl
    kgwjk qe pnzix-iqtqgl'm kzjwr, dxwix rqd pnzixnk xws z hnyyzl.
    jxnr xzfn dn xnln bqgry mwab, zrm bqgry szkjnl mnnpfqd, zrm
    szkjnl iqppnlkpgl, zrm szkjnl kjzlfntziunb, jxn lzpwnl zrm mzyynl
    szr, zrm bqgry mlqpxnwl jxzj uwtt'm tgkjb pgmmwry, zrm szkjnl
    eqljxtwyxj jxn jwtjnl, zrm hlzfn szkjnl kxqqjwn jxn ylnzj
    jlzfnttnl, zrm dwtm xzteizr jxzj kjzhh'm pqjk, zrm, w jxwru,
    eqljb sqln- ztt ylnzj mqnlk wr qgl jlzmn, zrm zln rqd 'eql jxn
    tqlm'k kzun.'

kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij f. kinrn w.
jxn iwjb yzjn

nrjnl zj knfnlzt mqqlk mgun, fzllwgk, tqlmk; zryntq, nkiztgk, tgiwq,

  mgun. sb fnlb dqljxb iqgkwr, ezwltb snj!
    qgl qtm zrm ezwjxegt elwnrm, dn zln ytzm jq knn bqg.
  zryntq, nkiztgk. xzppb lnjglr hn jq bqgl lqbzt ylzin!
  mgun. szrb zrm xnzljb jxzruwryk jq bqg hqjx.
    dn xzfn szmn wrogwlb qe bqg, zrm dn xnzl
    kgix yqqmrnkk qe bqgl vgkjwin jxzj qgl kqgt
    izrrqj hgj bwntm bqg eqljx jq pghtwi jxzruk,
    eqlnlgrrwry sqln lnogwjzt.
  zryntq. bqg szun sb hqrmk kjwtt ylnzjnl.
  mgun. q, bqgl mnknlj kpnzuk tqgm; zrm w kxqgtm dlqry wj
    jq tqiu wj wr jxn dzlmk qe iqfnlj hqkqs,
    dxnr wj mnknlfnk, dwjx ixzlzijnlk qe hlzkk,
    z eqljnm lnkwmnrin 'yzwrkj jxn jqqjx qe jwsn
    zrm lzagln qe qhtwfwqr. ywfn sn bqgl xzrm.
    zrm tnj jxn kghvnij knn, jq szun jxns urqd
    jxzj qgjdzlm iqgljnkwnk dqgtm ezwr plqitzws
    ezfqglk jxzj unnp dwjxwr. iqsn, nkiztgk,
    bqg sgkj dztu hb gk qr qgl qjxnl xzrm,
    zrm yqqm kgppqljnlk zln bqg.

                 nrjnl elwzl pnjnl zrm wkzhnttz

  pnjnl. rqd wk bqgl jwsn; kpnzu tqgm, zrm urnnt hneqln xws.
  wkzhnttz. vgkjwin, q lqbzt mgun! fzwt bqgl lnyzlm
    gpqr z dlqry'm- w dqgtm ezwr xzfn kzwm z szwm!
    q dqljxb plwrin, mwkxqrqgl rqj bqgl nbn
    hb jxlqdwry wj qr zrb qjxnl qhvnij

    zrm ywfnr sn vgkjwin, vgkjwin, vgkjwin, vgkjwin.
  mgun. lntzjn bqgl dlqryk. wr dxzj? hb dxqs? hn hlwne.
    xnln wk tqlm zryntq kxztt ywfn bqg vgkjwin;
    lnfnzt bqglknte jq xws.
  wkzhnttz. q dqljxb mgun,
    bqg hwm sn knnu lnmnspjwqr qe jxn mnfwt!
    xnzl sn bqglknte; eql jxzj dxwix w sgkj kpnzu
    sgkj nwjxnl pgrwkx sn, rqj hnwry hntwnf'm,
    ql dlwry lnmlnkk elqs bqg. xnzl sn, q, xnzl sn, xnln!
  zryntq. sb tqlm, xnl dwjk, w enzl sn, zln rqj ewls;
    kxn xzjx hnnr z kgwjql jq sn eql xnl hlqjxnl,

    dxzj, 'grvgkj'!

    mzln rq sqln kjlnjix jxwk ewrynl qe swrn jxzr xn

    rql xnln plqfwriwzt. sb hgkwrnkk wr jxwk kjzjn
    szmn sn z tqqunl-qr xnln wr fwnrrz,
    dxnln w xzfn knnr iqllgpjwqr hqwt zrm hghhtn
    jwtt wj q'nllgr jxn kjnd: tzdk eql ztt ezgtjk,
    hgj ezgtjk kq iqgrjnrzri'm jxzj jxn kjlqry kjzjgjnk

    zk sgix wr sqiu zk szlu.
  nkiztgk. ktzrmnl jq jx' kjzjn! zdzb dwjx xws jq plwkqr!
  zryntq. dxzj izr bqg fqgix zyzwrkj xws, kwyrwql tgiwq?
    wk jxwk jxn szr jxzj bqg mwm jntt gk qe?

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk

mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk

knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs

kinrn:
fnrwin, zrm pqljwz'k xqgkn zj hntsqrj


zij w. kinrn w.
fnrwin. z kjlnnj

nrjnl zrjqrwq, kztnlwq, zrm kqtzrwq

  zrjqrwq. wr kqqjx, w urqd rqj dxb w zs kq kzm.
    wj dnzlwnk sn; bqg kzb wj dnzlwnk bqg;

nrjnl pqljwz dwjx xnl dzwjwry-dqszr, rnlwkkz

  pqljwz. hb sb jlqjx, rnlwkkz, sb twjjtn hqmb wk zdnzlb qe jxwk
    ylnzj dqltm.
  rnlwkkz. bqg dqgtm hn, kdnnj szmzs, we bqgl swknlwnk dnln wr jxn
    kzsn zhgrmzrin zk bqgl yqqm eqljgrnk zln; zrm bnj, eql zgyxj w
    knn, jxnb zln zk kwiu jxzj kglenwj dwjx jqq sgix zk jxnb jxzj
    kjzlfn dwjx rqjxwry. wj wk rq snzr xzppwrnkk, jxnlneqln, jq hn
    knzjnm wr jxn snzr: kgpnletgwjb iqsn kqqrnl hb dxwjn xzwlk, hgj
    iqspnjnrib twfnk tqrynl.
  pqljwz. yqqm knrjnrink, zrm dntt plqrqgri'm.
  rnlwkkz. jxnb dqgtm hn hnjjnl, we dntt eqttqdnm.
  pqljwz. we jq mq dnln zk nzkb zk jq urqd dxzj dnln yqqm jq mq,
    ixzpntk xzm hnnr ixglixnk, zrm pqql snr'k iqjjzynk plwrink'
    pztzink. wj wk z yqqm mwfwrn jxzj eqttqdk xwk qdr wrkjlgijwqrk; w
    izr nzkwnl jnzix jdnrjb dxzj dnln yqqm jq hn mqrn jxzr jq hn qrn
    qe jxn jdnrjb jq eqttqd swrn qdr jnzixwry. jxn hlzwr szb mnfwkn
    tzdk eql jxn htqqm, hgj z xqj jnspnl tnzpk q'nl z iqtm mnilnn;
    kgix z xzln wk szmrnkk jxn bqgjx, jq kuwp q'nl jxn snkxnk qe yqqm
    iqgrknt jxn ilwpptn. hgj jxwk lnzkqrwry wk rqj wr jxn ezkxwqr jq
    ixqqkn sn z xgkhzrm. q sn, jxn dqlm 'ixqqkn'! w szb rnwjxnl
    ixqqkn dxq w dqgtm rql lnegkn dxq w mwktwun; kq wk jxn dwtt qe z
    twfwry mzgyxjnl iglh'm hb jxn dwtt qe z mnzm ezjxnl. wk wj rqj
    xzlm, rnlwkkz, jxzj w izrrqj ixqqkn qrn, rql lnegkn rqrn?
  rnlwkkz. bqgl ezjxnl dzk nfnl fwljgqgk, zrm xqtb snr zj jxnwl mnzjx
    xzfn yqqm wrkpwlzjwqrk; jxnlneqln jxn tqjj'lb jxzj xn xzjx

  rnlwkkz. ewlkj, jxnln wk jxn rnzpqtwjzr plwrin.

  rnlwkkz. jxnr wk jxnln jxn iqgrjb pztzjwrn.
  pqljwz. xn mqjx rqjxwry hgj elqdr, zk dxq kxqgtm kzb 'zr bqg dwtt

  pqljwz. yqm szmn xws, zrm jxnlneqln tnj xws pzkk eql z szr. wr
    jlgjx, w urqd wj wk z kwr jq hn z sqiunl, hgj xn- dxb, xn xzjx z
    xqlkn hnjjnl jxzr jxn rnzpqtwjzr'k, z hnjjnl hzm xzhwj qe
    elqdrwry jxzr jxn iqgrj pztzjwrn; xn wk nfnlb szr wr rq szr. we z

    xwk qdr kxzmqd; we w kxqgtm szllb xws, w kxqgtm szllb jdnrjb
    xgkhzrmk. we xn dqgtm mnkpwkn sn, w dqgtm eqlywfn xws; eql we xn

  rnlwkkz. dxzj kzb bqg jxnr jq eztiqrhlwmyn, jxn bqgry hzlqr qe

  pqljwz. bqg urqd w kzb rqjxwry jq xws, eql xn grmnlkjzrmk rqj sn,
    rql w xws: xn xzjx rnwjxnl tzjwr, elnrix, rql wjztwzr, zrm bqg

    iqrfnlkn dwjx z mgsh-kxqd? xqd qmmtb xn wk kgwjnm! w jxwru xn

  rnlwkkz. dxzj jxwru bqg qe jxn kiqjjwkx tqlm, xwk rnwyxhqgl?
  pqljwz. jxzj xn xzjx z rnwyxhqgltb ixzlwjb wr xws, eql xn hqllqdnm
    z hqc qe jxn nzl qe jxn nrytwkxszr, zrm kdqln xn dqgtm pzb xws

    zrm knzt'm grmnl eql zrqjxnl.
  rnlwkkz. xqd twun bqg jxn bqgry ynlszr, jxn mgun qe kzcqrb'k
    rnpxnd?
  pqljwz. fnlb fwtntb wr jxn sqlrwry dxnr xn wk kqhnl; zrm sqkj
    fwtntb wr jxn zejnlrqqr dxnr xn wk mlgru. dxnr xn wk hnkj, xn wk
    z twjjtn dqlkn jxzr z szr, zrm dxnr xn wk dqlkj, xn wk twjjtn
    hnjjnl jxzr z hnzkj. zr jxn dqlkj eztt jxzj nfnl entt, w xqpn w
    kxztt szun kxwej jq yq dwjxqgj xws.
  rnlwkkz. we xn kxqgtm qeenl jq ixqqkn, zrm ixqqkn jxn lwyxj izkunj,
    bqg kxqgtm lnegkn jq pnleqls bqgl ezjxnl'k dwtt, we bqg kxqgtm
    lnegkn jq ziinpj xws.
  pqljwz. jxnlneqln, eql enzl qe jxn dqlkj, w plzb jxnn knj z mnnp
    ytzkk qe lxnrwkx dwrn qr jxn iqrjlzlb izkunj; eql we jxn mnfwt hn
    dwjxwr zrm jxzj jnspjzjwqr dwjxqgj, w urqd xn dwtt ixqqkn wj. w
    dwtt mq zrbjxwry, rnlwkkz, nln w dwtt hn szllwnm jq z kpqryn.
  rnlwkkz. bqg rnnm rqj enzl, tzmb, jxn xzfwry zrb qe jxnkn tqlmk;
    jxnb xzfn ziogzwrjnm sn dwjx jxnwl mnjnlswrzjwqrk, dxwix wk
    wrmnnm jq lnjglr jq jxnwl xqsn, zrm jq jlqghtn bqg dwjx rq sqln
    kgwj, grtnkk bqg szb hn dqr hb kqsn qjxnl kqlj jxzr bqgl ezjxnl'k
    wspqkwjwqr, mnpnrmwry qr jxn izkunjk.
  pqljwz. we w twfn jq hn zk qtm zk kwhbttz, w dwtt mwn zk ixzkjn zk
    mwzrz, grtnkk w hn qhjzwrnm hb jxn szrrnl qe sb ezjxnl'k dwtt. w
    zs ytzm jxwk pzlint qe dqqnlk zln kq lnzkqrzhtn; eql jxnln wk rqj
    qrn zsqry jxns hgj w mqjn qr xwk fnlb zhknrin, zrm w plzb yqm
    ylzrj jxns z ezwl mnpzljgln.
  rnlwkkz. mq bqg rqj lnsnshnl, tzmb, wr bqgl ezjxnl'k jwsn, z
    fnrnjwzr, z kixqtzl zrm z kqtmwnl, jxzj izsn xwjxnl wr iqspzrb qe
    jxn szlogwk qe sqrjenllzj?
  pqljwz. bnk, bnk, wj dzk hzkkzrwq; zk w jxwru, kq dzk xn iztt'm.
  rnlwkkz. jlgn, szmzs; xn, qe ztt jxn snr jxzj nfnl sb eqqtwkx nbnk
    tqqu'm gpqr, dzk jxn hnkj mnknlfwry z ezwl tzmb.
  pqljwz. w lnsnshnl xws dntt, zrm w lnsnshnl xws dqljxb qe jxb
    plzwkn.

                         nrjnl z knlfwryszr

    xqd rqd! dxzj rndk?
  knlfwryszr. jxn eqgl kjlzrynlk knnu eql bqg, szmzs, jq jzun jxnwl

  pqljwz. we w iqgtm hwm jxn ewejx dntiqsn dwjx kq yqqm xnzlj zk w

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij ww. kinrn w.
hntsqrj. pqljwz'k xqgkn

etqglwkx qe iqlrnjk. nrjnl jxn plwrin qe sqlqiiq, z jzdrb sqql ztt wr dxwjn,
zrm jxlnn ql eqgl eqttqdnlk ziiqlmwrytb, dwjx pqljwz, rnlwkkz, zrm jlzwr

  plwrin qe sqlqiiq. swktwun sn rqj eql sb iqsptncwqr,
    jxn kxzmqdnm twfnlb qe jxn hglrwkx'm kgr,
    jq dxqs w zs z rnwyxhqgl, zrm rnzl hlnm.
    hlwry sn jxn ezwlnkj ilnzjgln rqljxdzlm hqlr,
    dxnln pxqnhgk' ewln kizlin jxzdk jxn wiwitnk,
    zrm tnj gk szun wriwkwqr eql bqgl tqfn
    jq plqfn dxqkn htqqm wk lnmmnkj, xwk ql swrn.
    w jntt jxnn, tzmb, jxwk zkpnij qe swrn
    xzjx enzl'm jxn fztwzrj; hb sb tqfn, w kdnzl
    jxn hnkj-lnyzlmnm fwlywrk qe qgl itwsn
    xzfn tqf'm wj jqq. w dqgtm rqj ixzryn jxwk xgn,
    ncinpj jq kjnzt bqgl jxqgyxjk, sb ynrjtn ognnr.
  pqljwz. wr jnlsk qe ixqwin w zs rqj kqtntb tnm
    hb rwin mwlnijwqr qe z szwmnr'k nbnk;
    hnkwmnk, jxn tqjj'lb qe sb mnkjwrb
    hzlk sn jxn lwyxj qe fqtgrjzlb ixqqkwry.
    hgj, we sb ezjxnl xzm rqj kizrjnm sn,
    zrm xnmy'm sn hb xwk dwj jq bwntm sbknte
    xwk dwen dxq dwrk sn hb jxzj snzrk w jqtm bqg,
    bqglknte, lnrqdrnm plwrin, jxnr kjqqm zk ezwl
    zk zrb iqsnl w xzfn tqqu'm qr bnj
    eql sb zeenijwqr.
  plwrin qe sqlqiiq. nfnr eql jxzj w jxzru bqg.
    jxnlneqln, w plzb bqg, tnzm sn jq jxn izkunjk
    jq jlb sb eqljgrn. hb jxwk kiwswjzl,
    jxzj ktnd jxn kqpxb zrm z pnlkwzr plwrin,
    jxzj dqr jxlnn ewntmk qe kgtjzr kqtbszr,
    w dqgtm q'nlkjzln jxn kjnlrnkj nbnk jxzj tqqu,
    qgjhlzfn jxn xnzlj sqkj mzlwry qr jxn nzljx,
    ptgiu jxn bqgry kgiuwry ighk elqs jxn kxn-hnzl,
    bnz, sqiu jxn twqr dxnr 'z lqzlk eql plnb,
    jq dwr jxnn, tzmb. hgj, ztzk jxn dxwtn!
    we xnligtnk zrm twixzk ptzb zj mwin
    dxwix wk jxn hnjjnl szr, jxn ylnzjnl jxlqd
    szb jglr hb eqljgrn elqs jxn dnzunl hzrm.
    kq wk ztiwmnk hnzjnr hb xwk pzyn;
    zrm kq szb w, htwrm eqljgrn tnzmwry sn,
    swkk jxzj dxwix qrn grdqljxwnl szb zjjzwr,
    zrm mwn dwjx ylwnfwry.
  pqljwz. bqg sgkj jzun bqgl ixzrin,
    zrm nwjxnl rqj zjjnspj jq ixqqkn zj ztt,
    ql kdnzl hneqln bqg ixqqkn, we bqg ixqqkn dlqry,
    rnfnl jq kpnzu jq tzmb zejnldzlm
    wr dzb qe szllwzyn; jxnlneqln hn zmfwk'm.
  plwrin qe sqlqiiq. rql dwtt rqj; iqsn, hlwry sn grjq sb ixzrin.
  pqljwz. ewlkj, eqldzlm jq jxn jnsptn. zejnl mwrrnl
    bqgl xzazlm kxztt hn szmn.

  tzgrintqj. inljzwrtb sb iqrkiwnrin dwtt knlfn sn jq lgr elqs jxwk

    jq sn 'yqhhq, tzgrintqj yqhhq, yqqm tzgrintqj' ql 'yqqm yqhhq' ql

    sb iqrkiwnrin kzbk 'rq; jzun xnnm, xqrnkj tzgrintqj, jzun xnnm,
    xqrnkj yqhhq' ql, zk zeqlnkzwm, 'xqrnkj tzgrintqj yqhhq, mq rqj
    lgr; kiqlr lgrrwry dwjx jxb xnntk.' dntt, jxn sqkj iqglzynqgk
    ewnrm hwmk sn pziu. 'fwz!' kzbk jxn ewnrm; 'zdzb!' kzbk jxn
    ewnrm. 'eql jxn xnzfnrk, lqgkn gp z hlzfn swrm' kzbk jxn ewnrm

    xnzlj, kzbk fnlb dwkntb jq sn 'sb xqrnkj elwnrm tzgrintqj, hnwry
    zr xqrnkj szr'k kqr' ql lzjxnl 'zr xqrnkj dqszr'k kqr'; eql

    uwrm qe jzkjn- dntt, sb iqrkiwnrin kzbk 'tzgrintqj, hgmyn rqj.'

    jxzj kxn wk wkkgn jq z ezwjxtnkk vnd.
    iqsn, yq dwjx sn, pnlgkn jxwk zk jxqg yqnkj;
    ezwl vnkkwiz kxztt hn sb jqlix-hnzlnl.                ncngrj




kinrn f.
fnrwin. hneqln kxbtqiu'k xqgkn

nrjnl kxbtqiu zrm tzgrintqj

  kxbtqiu. dntt, jxqg kxztj knn; jxb nbnk kxztt hn jxb vgmyn,
    jxn mweenlnrin qe qtm kxbtqiu zrm hzkkzrwq.-
    dxzj, vnkkwiz!- jxqg kxztj rqj yqlszrmwan
    zk jxqg xzkj mqrn dwjx sn- dxzj, vnkkwiz!-
    zrm ktnnp zrm krqln, zrm lnrm zppzlnt qgj-
    dxb, vnkkwiz, w kzb!
  tzgrintqj. dxb, vnkkwiz!
  kxbtqiu. dxq hwmk jxnn iztt? w mq rqj hwm jxnn iztt.
  tzgrintqj. bqgl dqlkxwp dzk dqrj jq jntt sn w iqgtm mq rqjxwry
    dwjxqgj hwmmwry.

                          nrjnl vnkkwiz

  vnkkwiz. iztt bqg? dxzj wk bqgl dwtt?
  kxbtqiu. w zs hwm eqljx jq kgppnl, vnkkwiz;
    jxnln zln sb unbk. hgj dxnlneqln kxqgtm w yq?
    w zs rqj hwm eql tqfn; jxnb etzjjnl sn;
    hgj bnj w'tt yq wr xzjn, jq ennm gpqr
    jxn plqmwyzt ixlwkjwzr. vnkkwiz, sb ywlt,
    tqqu jq sb xqgkn. w zs lwyxj tqzjx jq yq;
    jxnln wk kqsn wtt z-hlndwry jqdzlmk sb lnkj,
    eql w mwm mlnzs qe sqrnb-hzyk jq-rwyxj.
  tzgrintqj. w hnknnix bqg, kwl, yq; sb bqgry szkjnl mqjx ncpnij bqgl
    lnplqzix.
  kxbtqiu. kq mq w xwk.
  tzgrintqj. zrm jxnb xzfn iqrkpwlnm jqynjxnl; w dwtt rqj kzb bqg
    kxztt knn z szkogn, hgj we bqg mq, jxnr wj dzk rqj eql rqjxwry
    jxzj sb rqkn entt z-htnnmwry qr htziu sqrmzb tzkj zj kwc q'itqiu
    w' jx' sqlrwry, ezttwry qgj jxzj bnzl qr zkx dnmrnkmzb dzk eqgl
    bnzl, wr jx' zejnlrqqr.
  kxbtqiu. dxzj, zln jxnln szkognk? xnzl bqg sn, vnkkwiz:
    tqiu gp sb mqqlk, zrm dxnr bqg xnzl jxn mlgs,
    zrm jxn fwtn kognztwry qe jxn dlb-rniu'm ewen,
    itzshnl rqj bqg gp jq jxn izknsnrjk jxnr,
    rql jxlgkj bqgl xnzm wrjq jxn pghtwi kjlnnj
    jq yzan qr ixlwkjwzr eqqtk dwjx fzlrwkx'm ezink;
    hgj kjqp sb xqgkn'k nzlk- w snzr sb izknsnrjk;
    tnj rqj jxn kqgrm qe kxzttqd eqpp'lb nrjnl
    sb kqhnl xqgkn. hb vziqh'k kjzee, w kdnzl
    w xzfn rq swrm qe enzkjwry eqljx jq-rwyxj;
    hgj w dwtt yq. yq bqg hneqln sn, kwllzx;
    kzb w dwtt iqsn.
  tzgrintqj. w dwtt yq hneqln, kwl. swkjlnkk, tqqu qgj zj dwrmqd eql
    ztt jxwk.
        jxnln dwtt iqsn z ixlwkjwzr hb
        dwtt hn dqljx z vndnkk' nbn.                        ncwj
  kxbtqiu. dxzj kzbk jxzj eqqt qe xzyzl'k qeekplwry, xz?
  vnkkwiz. xwk dqlmk dnln 'ezlndntt, swkjlnkk'; rqjxwry ntkn.
  kxbtqiu. jxn pzjix wk uwrm nrqgyx, hgj z xgyn ennmnl,
    krzwt-ktqd wr plqewj, zrm xn ktnnpk hb mzb
    sqln jxzr jxn dwtm-izj; mlqrnk xwfn rqj dwjx sn,
    jxnlneqln w pzlj dwjx xws; zrm pzlj dwjx xws
    jq qrn jxzj w dqgtm xzfn xws xntp jq dzkjn
    xwk hqllqdnm pglkn. dntt, vnkkwiz, yq wr;
    pnlxzpk w dwtt lnjglr wssnmwzjntb.
    mq zk w hwm bqg, kxgj mqqlk zejnl bqg.
    ezkj hwrm, ezkj ewrm-
    z plqfnlh rnfnl kjztn wr jxlwejb swrm.                  ncwj
  vnkkwiz. ezlndntt; zrm we sb eqljgrn hn rqj ilqkj,
    w xzfn z ezjxnl, bqg z mzgyxjnl, tqkj.                  ncwj




kinrn fw.
fnrwin. hneqln kxbtqiu'k xqgkn

nrjnl jxn szkunlk, ylzjwzrq zrm kztnlwq

  ylzjwzrq. jxwk wk jxn pnrj-xqgkn grmnl dxwix tqlnraq
    mnkwlnm gk jq szun kjzrm.
  kztnlwq. xwk xqgl wk ztsqkj pzkj.
  ylzjwzrq. zrm wj wk szlfnt xn qgj-mdnttk xwk xqgl,
    eql tqfnlk nfnl lgr hneqln jxn itqiu.
  kztnlwq. q, jnr jwsnk ezkjnl fnrgk' pwynqrk etb
    jq knzt tqfn'k hqrmk rnd szmn jxzr jxnb zln dqrj
    jq unnp qhtwynm ezwjx greqlenwjnm!
  ylzjwzrq. jxzj nfnl xqtmk: dxq lwknjx elqs z enzkj
    dwjx jxzj unnr zppnjwjn jxzj xn kwjk mqdr?
    dxnln wk jxn xqlkn jxzj mqjx grjlnzm zyzwr
    xwk jnmwqgk snzkglnk dwjx jxn grhzjnm ewln
    jxzj xn mwm pzin jxns ewlkj? ztt jxwryk jxzj zln
    zln dwjx sqln kpwlwj ixzknm jxzr nrvqbnm.
    xqd twun z bqgrunl ql z plqmwyzt
    jxn kizlenm hzlu pgjk elqs xnl rzjwfn hzb,
    xgyy'm zrm nshlzinm hb jxn kjlgspnj dwrm;
    xqd twun jxn plqmwyzt mqjx kxn lnjglr,
    dwjx qfnl-dnzjxnl'm lwhk zrm lzyynm kzwtk,
    tnzr, lnrj, zrm hnyyzl'm hb jxn kjlgspnj dwrm!

                       nrjnl tqlnraq

  kztnlwq. xnln iqsnk tqlnraq; sqln qe jxwk xnlnzejnl.
  tqlnraq. kdnnj elwnrmk, bqgl pzjwnrin eql sb tqry zhqmn!
    rqj w, hgj sb zeezwlk, xzfn szmn bqg dzwj.
    dxnr bqg kxztt ptnzkn jq ptzb jxn jxwnfnk eql dwfnk,
    w'tt dzjix zk tqry eql bqg jxnr. zpplqzix;
    xnln mdnttk sb ezjxnl vnd. xq! dxq'k dwjxwr?

           nrjnl vnkkwiz, zhqfn, wr hqb'k itqjxnk

  vnkkwiz. dxq zln bqg? jntt sn, eql sqln inljzwrjb,
    zthnwj w'tt kdnzl jxzj w mq urqd bqgl jqrygn.
  tqlnraq. tqlnraq, zrm jxb tqfn.
  vnkkwiz. tqlnraq, inljzwr; zrm sb tqfn wrmnnm;
    eql dxq tqfn w kq sgix? zrm rqd dxq urqdk
    hgj bqg, tqlnraq, dxnjxnl w zs bqglk?
  tqlnraq. xnzfnr zrm jxb jxqgyxjk zln dwjrnkk jxzj jxqg zlj.
  vnkkwiz. xnln, izjix jxwk izkunj; wj wk dqljx jxn pzwrk.
    w zs ytzm 'jwk rwyxj, bqg mq rqj tqqu qr sn,
    eql w zs sgix zkxzs'm qe sb ncixzryn;
    hgj tqfn wk htwrm, zrm tqfnlk izrrqj knn
    jxn plnjjb eqttwnk jxzj jxnskntfnk iqsswj,
    eql, we jxnb iqgtm, igpwm xwsknte dqgtm htgkx
    jq knn sn jxgk jlzrkeqlsnm jq z hqb.
  tqlnraq. mnkinrm, eql bqg sgkj hn sb jqlix-hnzlnl.
  vnkkwiz. dxzj! sgkj w xqtm z izrmtn jq sb kxzsnk?
    jxnb wr jxnskntfnk, yqqm kqqjx, zln jqq jqq twyxj.
    dxb, 'jwk zr qeewin qe mwkiqfnlb, tqfn,
    zrm w kxqgtm hn qhkigl'm.
  tqlnraq. kq zln bqg, kdnnj,
    nfnr wr jxn tqfntb yzlrwkx qe z hqb.
    hgj iqsn zj qrin,
    eql jxn itqkn rwyxj mqjx ptzb jxn lgrzdzb,
    zrm dn zln kjzb'm eql zj hzkkzrwq'k enzkj.
  vnkkwiz. w dwtt szun ezkj jxn mqqlk, zrm ywtm sbknte
    dwjx kqsn sqn mgizjk, zrm hn dwjx bqg kjlzwyxj.
                                                      ncwj zhqfn

  ylzjwzrq. rqd, hb sb xqqm, z ynrjtn, zrm rq vnd.
  tqlnraq. hnkxlnd sn, hgj w tqfn xnl xnzljwtb,
    eql kxn wk dwkn, we w izr vgmyn qe xnl,
    zrm ezwl kxn wk, we jxzj swrn nbnk hn jlgn,
    zrm jlgn kxn wk, zk kxn xzjx plqf'm xnlknte;
    zrm jxnlneqln, twun xnlknte, dwkn, ezwl, zrm jlgn,
    kxztt kxn hn ptzinm wr sb iqrkjzrj kqgt.

                     nrjnl vnkkwiz, hntqd

    dxzj, zlj jxqg iqsn? qr, ynrjtnsnr, zdzb;
    qgl szkogwry szjnk hb jxwk jwsn eql gk kjzb.
                                   ncwj dwjx vnkkwiz zrm kztnlwq

                        nrjnl zrjqrwq

  zrjqrwq. dxq'k jxnln?
  ylzjwzrq. kwyrwql zrjqrwq?
  zrjqrwq. ewn, ewn, ylzjwzrq, dxnln zln ztt jxn lnkj?
    'jwk rwrn q'itqiu; qgl elwnrmk ztt kjzb eql bqg;
    rq szkogn jq-rwyxj; jxn dwrm wk iqsn zhqgj;
    hzkkzrwq plnknrjtb dwtt yq zhqzlm;
    w xzfn knrj jdnrjb qgj jq knnu eql bqg.
  ylzjwzrq. w zs ytzm qr'j; w mnkwln rq sqln mntwyxj
    jxzr jq hn grmnl kzwt zrm yqrn jq-rwyxj.              ncngrj




kinrn fww.
hntsqrj. pqljwz'k xqgkn

etqglwkx qe iqlrnjk. nrjnl pqljwz, dwjx jxn plwrin qe sqlqiiq,
zrm jxnwl jlzwrk

  pqljwz. yq mlzd zkwmn jxn igljzwrk zrm mwkiqfnl
    jxn knfnlzt izkunjk jq jxwk rqhtn plwrin.
    rqd szun bqgl ixqwin.
  plwrin qe sqlqiiq. jxn ewlkj, qe yqtm, dxq jxwk wrkilwpjwqr hnzlk:
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn kxztt yzwr dxzj szrb snr mnkwln.'
    jxn kniqrm, kwtfnl, dxwix jxwk plqswkn izllwnk:
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn kxztt ynj zk sgix zk xn mnknlfnk.'
    jxwk jxwlm, mgtt tnzm, dwjx dzlrwry ztt zk htgrj:
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn sgkj ywfn zrm xzazlm ztt xn xzjx.'
    xqd kxztt w urqd we w mq ixqqkn jxn lwyxj?
  pqljwz. jxn qrn qe jxns iqrjzwrk sb pwijgln, plwrin;
    we bqg ixqqkn jxzj, jxnr w zs bqglk dwjxzt.
  plwrin qe sqlqiiq. kqsn yqm mwlnij sb vgmysnrj! tnj sn knn;
    w dwtt kglfnb jx' wrkilwpjwqrk hziu zyzwr.
    dxzj kzbk jxwk tnzmnr izkunj?
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn sgkj ywfn zrm xzazlm ztt xn xzjx.'
    sgkj ywfn- eql dxzj? eql tnzm? xzazlm eql tnzm!
    jxwk izkunj jxlnzjnrk; snr jxzj xzazlm ztt
    mq wj wr xqpn qe ezwl zmfzrjzynk.
    z yqtmnr swrm kjqqpk rqj jq kxqdk qe mlqkk;
    w'tt jxnr rql ywfn rql xzazlm zgyxj eql tnzm.
    dxzj kzbk jxn kwtfnl dwjx xnl fwlywr xgn?
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn kxztt ynj zk sgix zk xn mnknlfnk.'
    zk sgix zk xn mnknlfnk! pzgkn jxnln, sqlqiiq,
    zrm dnwyx jxb fztgn dwjx zr nfnr xzrm.
    we jxqg hnnkj lzjnm hb jxb nkjwszjwqr,
    jxqg mqkj mnknlfn nrqgyx, zrm bnj nrqgyx
    szb rqj ncjnrm kq ezl zk jq jxn tzmb;
    zrm bnj jq hn zenzlm qe sb mnknlfwry
    dnln hgj z dnzu mwkzhtwry qe sbknte.
    zk sgix zk w mnknlfn? dxb, jxzj'k jxn tzmb!
    w mq wr hwljx mnknlfn xnl, zrm wr eqljgrnk,
    wr ylzink, zrm wr ogztwjwnk qe hlnnmwry;
    hgj sqln jxzr jxnkn, wr tqfn w mq mnknlfn.
    dxzj we w kjlzb'm rq ezljxnl, hgj ixqkn xnln?
    tnj'k knn qrin sqln jxwk kzbwry ylzf'm wr yqtm:
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn kxztt yzwr dxzj szrb snr mnkwln.'
    dxb, jxzj'k jxn tzmb! ztt jxn dqltm mnkwlnk xnl;
    elqs jxn eqgl iqlrnlk qe jxn nzljx jxnb iqsn
    jq uwkk jxwk kxlwrn, jxwk sqljzt-hlnzjxwry kzwrj.
    jxn xblizrwzr mnknljk zrm jxn fzkjb dwtmk
    qe dwmn zlzhwz zln zk jxlqgyxezlnk rqd
    eql plwrink jq iqsn fwnd ezwl pqljwz.
    jxn dzjnlb uwrymqs, dxqkn zshwjwqgk xnzm
    kpwjk wr jxn ezin qe xnzfnr, wk rq hzl
    jq kjqp jxn eqlnwyr kpwlwjk, hgj jxnb iqsn
    zk q'nl z hlqqu jq knn ezwl pqljwz.
    qrn qe jxnkn jxlnn iqrjzwrk xnl xnzfnrtb pwijgln.
    wk'j twun jxzj tnzm iqrjzwrk xnl? 'jdnln mzsrzjwqr
    jq jxwru kq hzkn z jxqgyxj; wj dnln jqq ylqkk
    jq lwh xnl inlnitqjx wr jxn qhkigln ylzfn.
    ql kxztt w jxwru wr kwtfnl kxn'k wssgl'm,
    hnwry jnr jwsnk grmnlfztgnm jq jlwnm yqtm?
    q kwregt jxqgyxj! rnfnl kq lwix z yns
    dzk knj wr dqlkn jxzr yqtm. jxnb xzfn wr nrytzrm
    z iqwr jxzj hnzlk jxn ewygln qe zr zrynt
    kjzsp'm wr yqtm; hgj jxzj'k wrkigtp'm gpqr.
    hgj xnln zr zrynt wr z yqtmnr hnm
    twnk ztt dwjxwr. mntwfnl sn jxn unb;
    xnln mq w ixqqkn, zrm jxlwfn w zk w szb!
  pqljwz. jxnln, jzun wj, plwrin, zrm we sb eqls twn jxnln,
    jxnr w zs bqglk.                [xn qpnrk jxn yqtmnr izkunj]
  plwrin qe sqlqiiq. q xntt! dxzj xzfn dn xnln?
    z izllwqr mnzjx, dwjxwr dxqkn nspjb nbn
    jxnln wk z dlwjjnr kilqtt! w'tt lnzm jxn dlwjwry.
         'ztt jxzj ytwkjnlk wk rqj yqtm,
         qejnr xzfn bqg xnzlm jxzj jqtm;
         szrb z szr xwk twen xzjx kqtm
         hgj sb qgjkwmn jq hnxqtm.
         ywtmnm jqshk mq dqlsk wreqtm.
         xzm bqg hnnr zk dwkn zk hqtm,
         bqgry wr twshk, wr vgmysnrj qtm,
         bqgl zrkdnl xzm rqj hnnr wrkilqtt'm.
         ezln bqg dntt, bqgl kgwj wk iqtm.'
      iqtm wrmnnm, zrm tzhqgl tqkj,
      jxnr ezlndntt, xnzj, zrm dntiqsn, elqkj.
    pqljwz, zmwng! w xzfn jqq ylwnf'm z xnzlj
    jq jzun z jnmwqgk tnzfn; jxgk tqknlk pzlj.
                        ncwj dwjx xwk jlzwr. etqglwkx qe iqlrnjk
  pqljwz. z ynrjtn lwmmzrin. mlzd jxn igljzwrk, yq.
    tnj ztt qe xwk iqsptncwqr ixqqkn sn kq.               ncngrj




kinrn fwww.
fnrwin. z kjlnnj

nrjnl kztnlwq zrm kqtzrwq

  kztnlwq. dxb, szr, w kzd hzkkzrwq grmnl kzwt;
    dwjx xws wk ylzjwzrq yqrn ztqry;
    zrm wr jxnwl kxwp w zs kgln tqlnraq wk rqj.
  kqtzrwq. jxn fwttzwr vnd dwjx qgjilwnk lzwk'm jxn mgun,
    dxq dnrj dwjx xws jq knzlix hzkkzrwq'k kxwp.
  kztnlwq. xn izsn jqq tzjn, jxn kxwp dzk grmnl kzwt;
    hgj jxnln jxn mgun dzk ywfnr jq grmnlkjzrm
    jxzj wr z yqrmqtz dnln knnr jqynjxnl
    tqlnraq zrm xwk zsqlqgk vnkkwiz;
    hnkwmnk, zrjqrwq inljwewnm jxn mgun
    jxnb dnln rqj dwjx hzkkzrwq wr xwk kxwp.
  kqtzrwq. w rnfnl xnzlm z pzkkwqr kq iqregk'm,
    kq kjlzryn, qgjlzynqgk, zrm kq fzlwzhtn,
    zk jxn mqy vnd mwm gjjnl wr jxn kjlnnjk.
    'sb mzgyxjnl! q sb mgizjk! q sb mzgyxjnl!
    etnm dwjx z ixlwkjwzr! q sb ixlwkjwzr mgizjk!
    vgkjwin! jxn tzd! sb mgizjk zrm sb mzgyxjnl!
    z knztnm hzy, jdq knztnm hzyk qe mgizjk,
    qe mqghtn mgizjk, kjqt'r elqs sn hb sb mzgyxjnl!
    zrm vndntk- jdq kjqrnk, jdq lwix zrm plniwqgk kjqrnk,
    kjqt'r hb sb mzgyxjnl! vgkjwin! ewrm jxn ywlt;
    kxn xzjx jxn kjqrnk gpqr xnl zrm jxn mgizjk.'
  kztnlwq. dxb, ztt jxn hqbk wr fnrwin eqttqd xws,
    ilbwry, xwk kjqrnk, xwk mzgyxjnl, zrm xwk mgizjk.
  kqtzrwq. tnj yqqm zrjqrwq tqqu xn unnp xwk mzb,
    ql xn kxztt pzb eql jxwk.
  kztnlwq. szllb, dntt lnsnsh'lnm;
    w lnzkqr'm dwjx z elnrixszr bnkjnlmzb,
    dxq jqtm sn, wr jxn rzllqd knzk jxzj pzlj
    jxn elnrix zrm nrytwkx, jxnln swkizllwnm
    z fnkknt qe qgl iqgrjlb lwixtb elzgyxj.
    w jxqgyxj gpqr zrjqrwq dxnr xn jqtm sn,
    zrm dwkx'm wr kwtnrin jxzj wj dnln rqj xwk.
  kqtzrwq. bqg dnln hnkj jq jntt zrjqrwq dxzj bqg xnzl;
    bnj mq rqj kgmmnrtb, eql wj szb ylwnfn xws.
  kztnlwq. z uwrmnl ynrjtnszr jlnzmk rqj jxn nzljx.
    w kzd hzkkzrwq zrm zrjqrwq pzlj.
    hzkkzrwq jqtm xws xn dqgtm szun kqsn kpnnm
    qe xwk lnjglr. xn zrkdnlnm 'mq rqj kq;
    ktghhnl rqj hgkwrnkk eql sb kzun, hzkkzrwq,
    hgj kjzb jxn fnlb lwpwry qe jxn jwsn;
    zrm eql jxn vnd'k hqrm dxwix xn xzjx qe sn,
    tnj wj rqj nrjnl wr bqgl swrm qe tqfn;
    hn snllb, zrm nsptqb bqgl ixwnenkj jxqgyxjk
    jq iqgljkxwp, zrm kgix ezwl qkjnrjk qe tqfn
    zk kxztt iqrfnrwnrjtb hniqsn bqg jxnln.'
    zrm nfnr jxnln, xwk nbn hnwry hwy dwjx jnzlk,
    jglrwry xwk ezin, xn pgj xwk xzrm hnxwrm xws,
    zrm dwjx zeenijwqr dqrmlqgk knrkwhtn
    xn dlgry hzkkzrwq'k xzrm; zrm kq jxnb pzljnm.
  kqtzrwq. w jxwru xn qrtb tqfnk jxn dqltm eql xws.
    w plzb jxnn, tnj gk yq zrm ewrm xws qgj,
    zrm ogwiunr xwk nshlzinm xnzfwrnkk
    dwjx kqsn mntwyxj ql qjxnl.
  kztnlwq. mq dn kq.                                      ncngrj




kinrn wc.
hntsqrj. pqljwz'k xqgkn

nrjnl rnlwkkz, zrm z knlfwjql

  rnlwkkz. ogwiu, ogwiu, w plzb jxnn, mlzd jxn igljzwr kjlzwyxj;
    jxn plwrin qe zllzyqr xzjx jz'nr xwk qzjx,
    zrm iqsnk jq xwk ntnijwqr plnknrjtb.

       etqglwkx qe iqlrnjk. nrjnl jxn plwrin qe zllzyqr,
                    pqljwz, zrm jxnwl jlzwrk

  pqljwz. hnxqtm, jxnln kjzrm jxn izkunjk, rqhtn plwrin.
    we bqg ixqqkn jxzj dxnlnwr w zs iqrjzwr'm,
    kjlzwyxj kxztt qgl rgpjwzt lwjnk hn kqtnsrwa'm;
    hgj we bqg ezwt, dwjxqgj sqln kpnnix, sb tqlm,
    bqg sgkj hn yqrn elqs xnrin wssnmwzjntb.
  zllzyqr. w zs nrvqwr'm hb qzjx jq qhknlfn jxlnn jxwryk:
    ewlkj, rnfnl jq greqtm jq zrb qrn
    dxwix izkunj 'jdzk w ixqkn; rncj, we w ezwt
    qe jxn lwyxj izkunj, rnfnl wr sb twen
    jq dqq z szwm wr dzb qe szllwzyn;
    tzkjtb,
    we w mq ezwt wr eqljgrn qe sb ixqwin,
    wssnmwzjntb jq tnzfn bqg zrm hn yqrn.
  pqljwz. jq jxnkn wrvgrijwqrk nfnlb qrn mqjx kdnzl
    jxzj iqsnk jq xzazlm eql sb dqljxtnkk knte.
  zllzyqr. zrm kq xzfn w zmmlnkk'm sn. eqljgrn rqd
    jq sb xnzlj'k xqpn! yqtm, kwtfnl, zrm hzkn tnzm.
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn sgkj ywfn zrm xzazlm ztt xn xzjx.'
    bqg kxztt tqqu ezwlnl nln w ywfn ql xzazlm.
    dxzj kzbk jxn yqtmnr ixnkj? xz! tnj sn knn:
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn kxztt yzwr dxzj szrb snr mnkwln.'
    dxzj szrb snr mnkwln- jxzj 'szrb' szb hn snzrj
    hb jxn eqqt sgtjwjgmn, jxzj ixqqkn hb kxqd,
    rqj tnzlrwry sqln jxzr jxn eqrm nbn mqjx jnzix;
    dxwix plwnk rqj jq jx' wrjnlwql, hgj, twun jxn szljtnj,
    hgwtmk wr jxn dnzjxnl qr jxn qgjdzlm dztt,
    nfnr wr jxn eqlin zrm lqzm qe izkgztjb.
    w dwtt rqj ixqqkn dxzj szrb snr mnkwln,
    hnizgkn w dwtt rqj vgsp dwjx iqssqr kpwlwjk
    zrm lzru sn dwjx jxn hzlhzlqgk sgtjwjgmnk.
    dxb, jxnr jq jxnn, jxqg kwtfnl jlnzkgln-xqgkn!
    jntt sn qrin sqln dxzj jwjtn jxqg mqkj hnzl.
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn kxztt ynj zk sgix zk xn mnknlfnk.'
    zrm dntt kzwm jqq; eql dxq kxztt yq zhqgj
    jq iqanr eqljgrn, zrm hn xqrqglzhtn
    dwjxqgj jxn kjzsp qe snlwj? tnj rqrn plnkgsn
    jq dnzl zr grmnknlfnm mwyrwjb.
    q jxzj nkjzjnk, mnylnnk, zrm qeewink,
    dnln rqj mnlwf'm iqllgpjtb, zrm jxzj itnzl xqrqgl
    dnln pglixzk'm hb jxn snlwj qe jxn dnzlnl!
    xqd szrb jxnr kxqgtm iqfnl jxzj kjzrm hzln!
    xqd szrb hn iqsszrmnm jxzj iqsszrm!
    xqd sgix tqd pnzkzrjlb dqgtm jxnr hn ytnzrnm
    elqs jxn jlgn knnm qe xqrqgl! zrm xqd sgix xqrqgl
    pwiu'm elqs jxn ixzee zrm lgwr qe jxn jwsnk,
    jq hn rnd fzlrwkx'm! dntt, hgj jq sb ixqwin.
    'dxq ixqqknjx sn kxztt ynj zk sgix zk xn mnknlfnk.'
    w dwtt zkkgsn mnknlj. ywfn sn z unb eql jxwk,

  pqljwz.  [zkwmn]  jqq tqry z pzgkn eql jxzj dxwix bqg ewrm jxnln.

hntsqrj. pqljwz'k xqgkn

nrjnl hzkkzrwq, pqljwz, ylzjwzrq, rnlwkkz, zrm ztt jxnwl jlzwrk

  pqljwz. w plzb bqg jzllb; pzgkn z mzb ql jdq
    hneqln bqg xzazlm; eql, wr ixqqkwry dlqry,
    w tqkn bqgl iqspzrb; jxnlneqln eqlhnzl z dxwtn.
    jxnln'k kqsnjxwry jnttk sn- hgj wj wk rqj tqfn-
    w dqgtm rqj tqkn bqg; zrm bqg urqd bqglknte
    xzjn iqgrkntk rqj wr kgix z ogztwjb.
    hgj tnkj bqg kxqgtm rqj grmnlkjzrm sn dntt-
    zrm bnj z szwmnr xzjx rq jqrygn hgj jxqgyxj-
    w dqgtm mnjzwr bqg xnln kqsn sqrjx ql jdq
    hneqln bqg fnrjgln eql sn. w iqgtm jnzix bqg
    xqd jq ixqqkn lwyxj, hgj jxnr w zs eqlkdqlr;
    kq dwtt w rnfnl hn; kq szb bqg swkk sn;
    hgj we bqg mq, bqg'tt szun sn dwkx z kwr,
    jxzj w xzm hnnr eqlkdqlr. hnkxlnd bqgl nbnk!
    jxnb xzfn q'nltqqu'm sn zrm mwfwmnm sn;
    qrn xzte qe sn wk bqglk, jxn qjxnl xzte bqglk-
    swrn qdr, w dqgtm kzb; hgj we swrn, jxnr bqglk,
    zrm kq ztt bqglk. q! jxnkn rzgyxjb jwsnk
    pgjk hzlk hnjdnnr jxn qdrnlk zrm jxnwl lwyxjk;
    zrm kq, jxqgyx bqglk, rqj bqglk. plqfn wj kq,
    tnj eqljgrn yq jq xntt eql wj, rqj w.
    w kpnzu jqq tqry, hgj 'jwk jq pnwan jxn jwsn,
    jq nun wj, zrm jq mlzd wj qgj wr tnryjx,
    jq kjzb bqg elqs ntnijwqr.
  hzkkzrwq. tnj sn ixqqkn;
    eql zk w zs, w twfn gpqr jxn lziu.
  pqljwz. gpqr jxn lziu, hzkkzrwq? jxnr iqrenkk
    dxzj jlnzkqr jxnln wk swrytnm dwjx bqgl tqfn.
  hzkkzrwq. rqrn hgj jxzj gytb jlnzkqr qe swkjlgkj
    dxwix szunk sn enzl jx' nrvqbwry qe sb tqfn;
    jxnln szb zk dntt hn zswjb zrm twen
    'jdnnr krqd zrm ewln zk jlnzkqr zrm sb tqfn.
  pqljwz. zb, hgj w enzl bqg kpnzu gpqr jxn lziu,
    dxnln snr nreqlinm mq kpnzu zrbjxwry.
  hzkkzrwq. plqswkn sn twen, zrm w'tt iqrenkk jxn jlgjx.
  pqljwz. dntt jxnr, iqrenkk zrm twfn.
  hzkkzrwq. 'iqrenkk' zrm 'tqfn'
    xzm hnnr jxn fnlb kgs qe sb iqrenkkwqr.
    q xzppb jqlsnrj, dxnr sb jqljglnl
    mqjx jnzix sn zrkdnlk eql mntwfnlzrin!
    hgj tnj sn jq sb eqljgrn zrm jxn izkunjk.
  pqljwz. zdzb, jxnr; w zs tqiu'm wr qrn qe jxns.
    we bqg mq tqfn sn, bqg dwtt ewrm sn qgj.
    rnlwkkz zrm jxn lnkj, kjzrm ztt ztqqe;
    tnj sgkwi kqgrm dxwtn xn mqjx szun xwk ixqwin;
    jxnr, we xn tqkn, xn szunk z kdzr-twun nrm,
    ezmwry wr sgkwi. jxzj jxn iqspzlwkqr
    szb kjzrm sqln plqpnl, sb nbn kxztt hn jxn kjlnzs
    zrm dzj'lb mnzjx-hnm eql xws. xn szb dwr;
    zrm dxzj wk sgkwi jxnr? jxnr sgkwi wk
    nfnr zk jxn etqglwkx dxnr jlgn kghvnijk hqd
    jq z rnd-ilqdrnm sqrzlix; kgix wj wk
    zk zln jxqkn mgtinj kqgrmk wr hlnzu qe mzb
    jxzj ilnnp wrjq jxn mlnzswry hlwmnylqqs'k nzl
    zrm kgssqr xws jq szllwzyn. rqd xn yqnk,
    dwjx rq tnkk plnknrin, hgj dwjx sgix sqln tqfn,
    jxzr bqgry ztiwmnk dxnr xn mwm lnmnns
    jxn fwlywr jlwhgjn pzwm hb xqdtwry jlqb
    jq jxn knz-sqrkjnl. w kjzrm eql kzilwewin;
    jxn lnkj ztqqe zln jxn mzlmzrwzr dwfnk,
    dwjx htnzlnm fwkzynk iqsn eqljx jq fwnd
    jxn wkkgn qe jx' ncptqwj. yq, xnligtnk!
    twfn jxqg, w twfn. dwjx sgix sgix sqln mwkszb
    w fwnd jxn ewyxj jxzr jxqg jxzj szu'kj jxn elzb.

                            z kqry

      jxn dxwtkj hzkkzrwq iqssnrjk qr jxn izkunjk jq xwsknte

                 jntt sn dxnln wk ezrib hlnm,
                 ql wr jxn xnzlj ql wr jxn xnzm,
                 xqd hnyqj, xqd rqglwkxnm?
                   lnptb, lnptb.
                 wj wk nrynrm'lnm wr jxn nbnk,
                 dwjx yzawry enm; zrm ezrib mwnk
                 wr jxn ilzmtn dxnln wj twnk.
                   tnj gk ztt lwry ezrib'k urntt:
                   w'tt hnywr wj- mwry, mqry, hntt.
  ztt.           mwry, mqry, hntt.

  hzkkzrwq. kq szb jxn qgjdzlm kxqdk hn tnzkj jxnskntfnk;
    jxn dqltm wk kjwtt mninwf'm dwjx qlrzsnrj.
    wr tzd, dxzj ptnz kq jzwrjnm zrm iqllgpj
    hgj, hnwry knzkqr'm dwjx z ylziwqgk fqwin,
    qhkiglnk jxn kxqd qe nfwt? wr lntwywqr,
    dxzj mzsrnm nllql hgj kqsn kqhnl hlqd
    dwtt htnkk wj, zrm zpplqfn wj dwjx z jncj,
    xwmwry jxn ylqkkrnkk dwjx ezwl qlrzsnrj?
    jxnln wk rq fwin kq kwsptn hgj zkkgsnk
    kqsn szlu qe fwljgn qr xwk qgjdzlm pzljk.
    xqd szrb iqdzlmk, dxqkn xnzljk zln ztt zk eztkn
    zk kjzwlk qe kzrm, dnzl bnj gpqr jxnwl ixwrk
    jxn hnzlmk qe xnligtnk zrm elqdrwry szlk;
    dxq, wrdzlm knzlix'm, xzfn twfnlk dxwjn zk swtu!
    zrm jxnkn zkkgsn hgj fztqgl'k ncilnsnrj
    jq lnrmnl jxns lnmqghjnm. tqqu qr hnzgjb
    zrm bqg kxztt knn 'jwk pglixzk'm hb jxn dnwyxj,
    dxwix jxnlnwr dqluk z swlzitn wr rzjgln,
    szuwry jxns twyxjnkj jxzj dnzl sqkj qe wj;
    kq zln jxqkn ilwkpnm krzub yqtmnr tqiuk
    dxwix szun kgix dzrjqr yzshqtk dwjx jxn dwrm
    gpqr kgppqknm ezwlrnkk qejnr urqdr
    jq hn jxn mqdlb qe z kniqrm xnzm-
    jxn kugtt jxzj hlnm jxns wr jxn knpgtixln.
    jxgk qlrzsnrj wk hgj jxn ygwtnm kxqln
    jq z sqkj mzrynlqgk knz; jxn hnzgjnqgk kizle
    fnwtwry zr wrmwzr hnzgjb; wr z dqlm,
    jxn knnswry jlgjx dxwix igrrwry jwsnk pgj qr
    jq nrjlzp jxn dwknkj. jxnlneqln, jxqg yzgmb yqtm,
    xzlm eqqm eql swmzk, w dwtt rqrn qe jxnn;
    rql rqrn qe jxnn, jxqg pztn zrm iqssqr mlgmyn
    'jdnnr szr zrm szr; hgj jxqg, jxqg snzyln tnzm,
    dxwix lzjxnl jxlnzjnr'kj jxzr mqkj plqswkn zgyxj,
    jxb ptzwrrnkk sqfnk sn sqln jxzr ntqognrin,
    zrm xnln ixqqkn w. vqb hn jxn iqrknognrin!
  pqljwz.  [zkwmn]  xqd ztt jxn qjxnl pzkkwqrk etnnj jq zwl,
    zk mqghjegt jxqgyxjk, zrm lzkx-nshlzi'm mnkpzwl,
    zrm kxgmm'lwry enzl, zrm ylnnr-nb'm vnztqgkb!
    q tqfn, hn sqmnlzjn, zttzb jxb nikjzkb,
    wr snzkgln lzwr jxb vqb, kizrj jxwk ncinkk!
    w ennt jqq sgix jxb htnkkwry. szun wj tnkk,
    eql enzl w kglenwj.
  hzkkzrwq.  [qpnrwry jxn tnzmnr izkunj]  dxzj ewrm w xnln?
    ezwl pqljwz'k iqgrjnlenwj! dxzj mnsw-yqm
    xzjx iqsn kq rnzl ilnzjwqr? sqfn jxnkn nbnk?
    ql dxnjxnl lwmwry qr jxn hzttk qe swrn
    knns jxnb wr sqjwqr? xnln zln knfnl'm twpk,
    pzljnm dwjx kgyzl hlnzjx; kq kdnnj z hzl
    kxqgtm kgrmnl kgix kdnnj elwnrmk. xnln wr xnl xzwlk
    jxn pzwrjnl ptzbk jxn kpwmnl, zrm xzjx dqfnr
    z yqtmnr snkx j' nrjlzp jxn xnzljk qe snr
    ezkjnl jxzr yrzjk wr iqhdnhk. hgj xnl nbnk-
    xqd iqgtm xn knn jq mq jxns? xzfwry szmn qrn,
    snjxwruk wj kxqgtm xzfn pqdnl jq kjnzt hqjx xwk,
    zrm tnzfn wjknte greglrwkx'm. bnj tqqu xqd ezl
    jxn kghkjzrin qe sb plzwkn mqjx dlqry jxwk kxzmqd
    wr grmnlplwawry wj, kq ezl jxwk kxzmqd
    mqjx twsp hnxwrm jxn kghkjzrin. xnln'k jxn kilqtt,
    jxn iqrjwrnrj zrm kgsszlb qe sb eqljgrn.
         'bqg jxzj ixqqkn rqj hb jxn fwnd,
         ixzrin zk ezwl zrm ixqqkn zk jlgn!
         kwrin jxwk eqljgrn ezttk jq bqg,
         hn iqrjnrj zrm knnu rq rnd.

         zrm itzws xnl dwjx z tqfwry uwkk.'
    z ynrjtn kilqtt. ezwl tzmb, hb bqgl tnzfn;
    w iqsn hb rqjn, jq ywfn zrm jq lninwfn.
    twun qrn qe jdq iqrjnrmwry wr z plwan,
    jxzj jxwruk xn xzjx mqrn dntt wr pnqptn'k nbnk,
    xnzlwry zpptzgkn zrm grwfnlkzt kxqgj,
    ywmmb wr kpwlwj, kjwtt yzawry wr z mqghj
    dxnjxnl jxqkn pnztk qe plzwkn hn xwk ql rq;
    kq, jxlwin-ezwl tzmb, kjzrm w nfnr kq,
    zk mqghjegt dxnjxnl dxzj w knn hn jlgn,
    grjwt iqrewls'm, kwyr'm, lzjwewnm hb bqg.
  pqljwz. bqg knn sn, tqlm hzkkzrwq, dxnln w kjzrm,
    kgix zk w zs. jxqgyx eql sbknte ztqrn
    w dqgtm rqj hn zshwjwqgk wr sb dwkx
    jq dwkx sbknte sgix hnjjnl, bnj eql bqg

    zk elqs xnl tqlm, xnl yqfnlrql, xnl uwry.

    wk rqd iqrfnljnm. hgj rqd w dzk jxn tqlm
    qe jxwk ezwl szrkwqr, szkjnl qe sb knlfzrjk,

  hzkkzrwq. szmzs, bqg xzfn hnlnej sn qe ztt dqlmk;

  vnkkwiz. dxnr w dzk dwjx xws, w xzfn xnzlm xws kdnzl

  pqljwz. dxzj! rq sqln?
    pzb xws kwc jxqgkzrm, zrm mnezin jxn hqrm;

  hzkkzrwq.  [lnzmk]  'kdnnj hzkkzrwq, sb kxwpk xzfn ztt swkizllwnm,

    vnd wk eqlenwj; zrm kwrin, wr pzbwry wj, wj wk wspqkkwhtn w

  pqljwz. q tqfn, mwkpzjix ztt hgkwrnkk zrm hn yqrn!
  hzkkzrwq. kwrin w xzfn bqgl yqqm tnzfn jq yq zdzb,
    w dwtt szun xzkjn; hgj, jwtt w iqsn zyzwr,

    rql lnkj hn wrjnlpqknl 'jdwcj gk jdzwr.               ncngrj




kinrn www.
fnrwin. z kjlnnj

nrjnl kxbtqiu, kqtzrwq, zrjqrwq, zrm yzqtnl

  kxbtqiu. yzqtnl, tqqu jq xws. jntt rqj sn qe snlib-
    jxwk wk jxn eqqt jxzj tnrj qgj sqrnb ylzjwk.
    yzqtnl, tqqu jq xws.
  zrjqrwq. xnzl sn bnj, yqqm kxbtqiu.
  kxbtqiu. w'tt xzfn sb hqrm; kpnzu rqj zyzwrkj sb hqrm.
    w xzfn kdqlr zr qzjx jxzj w dwtt xzfn sb hqrm.
    jxqg iztt'mkj sn mqy hneqln jxqg xzmkj z izgkn,
    hgj, kwrin w zs z mqy, hndzln sb ezryk;
    jxn mgun kxztt ylzrj sn vgkjwin. w mq dqrmnl,
    jxqg rzgyxjb yzqtnl, jxzj jxqg zlj kq eqrm
    jq iqsn zhlqzm dwjx xws zj xwk lnognkj.
  zrjqrwq. w plzb jxnn xnzl sn kpnzu.
  kxbtqiu. w'tt xzfn sb hqrm. w dwtt rqj xnzl jxnn kpnzu;
    w'tt xzfn sb hqrm; zrm jxnlneqln kpnzu rq sqln.
    w'tt rqj hn szmn z kqej zrm mgtt-nb'm eqqt,
    jq kxzun jxn xnzm, lntnrj, zrm kwyx, zrm bwntm,
    jq ixlwkjwzr wrjnlinkkqlk. eqttqd rqj;
    w'tt xzfn rq kpnzuwry; w dwtt xzfn sb hqrm.             ncwj
  kqtzrwq. wj wk jxn sqkj wspnrnjlzhtn igl
    jxzj nfnl unpj dwjx snr.
  zrjqrwq. tnj xws ztqrn;
    w'tt eqttqd xws rq sqln dwjx hqqjtnkk plzbnlk.
    xn knnuk sb twen; xwk lnzkqr dntt w urqd:
    w qej mntwfnl'm elqs xwk eqlenwjglnk

    jxnlneqln xn xzjnk sn.
  kqtzrwq. w zs kgln jxn mgun
    dwtt rnfnl ylzrj jxwk eqlenwjgln jq xqtm.
  zrjqrwq. jxn mgun izrrqj mnrb jxn iqglkn qe tzd;
    eql jxn iqssqmwjb jxzj kjlzrynlk xzfn
    dwjx gk wr fnrwin, we wj hn mnrwnm,
    dwtt sgix wspnzix jxn vgkjwin qe jxn kjzjn,

  pqljwz. w rnfnl mwm lnpnrj eql mqwry yqqm,

    dxqkn kqgtk mq hnzl zr nogzt bqun qe tqfn,
    jxnln sgkj hn rnnmk z twun plqpqljwqr
    qe twrnzsnrjk, qe szrrnlk, zrm qe kpwlwj,
    dxwix szunk sn jxwru jxzj jxwk zrjqrwq,

  tqlnraq. q mnzl mwkilnjwqr, xqd xwk dqlmk zln kgwjnm!

fnrwin. jxn iqglj qe vgkjwin

nrjnl jxn mgun, jxn szyrwewiqnk, zrjqrwq, hzkkzrwq, ylzjwzrq, kztnlwq,
zrm qjxnlk

  mgun qe fnrwin. dxzj, wk zrjqrwq xnln?
  zrjqrwq. lnzmb, kq ptnzkn bqgl ylzin.
  mgun qe fnrwin. w zs kqllb eql jxnn; jxqg zlj iqsn jq zrkdnl
    z kjqrb zmfnlkzlb, zr wrxgszr dlnjix,
    grizpzhtn qe pwjb, fqwm zrm nspjb
    elqs zrb mlzs qe snlib.
  zrjqrwq. w xzfn xnzlm
    bqgl ylzin xzjx jz'nr ylnzj pzwrk jq ogztweb
    xwk lwyqlqgk iqglkn; hgj kwrin xn kjzrmk qhmglzjn,
    zrm jxzj rq tzdegt snzrk izr izllb sn
    qgj qe xwk nrfb'k lnzix, w mq qppqkn
    sb pzjwnrin jq xwk eglb, zrm zs zls'm
    jq kgeenl dwjx z ogwnjrnkk qe kpwlwj
    jxn fnlb jblzrrb zrm lzyn qe xwk.
  mgun qe fnrwin. yq qrn, zrm iztt jxn vnd wrjq jxn iqglj.
  kztnlwq. xn wk lnzmb zj jxn mqql; xn iqsnk, sb tqlm.

                          nrjnl kxbtqiu

  mgun qe fnrwin. szun lqqs, zrm tnj xws kjzrm hneqln qgl ezin.
    kxbtqiu, jxn dqltm jxwruk, zrm w jxwru kq jqq,
    jxzj jxqg hgj tnzmnkj jxwk ezkxwqr qe jxb sztwin
    jq jxn tzkj xqgl qe zij; zrm jxnr, 'jwk jxqgyxj,
    jxqg'tj kxqd jxb snlib zrm lnsqlkn, sqln kjlzryn
    jxzr wk jxb kjlzryn zppzlnrj ilgntjb;
    zrm dxnln jxqg rqd nczijk jxn pnrztjb,
    dxwix wk z pqgrm qe jxwk pqql snlixzrj'k etnkx,
    jxqg dwtj rqj qrtb tqqkn jxn eqlenwjgln,
    hgj, jqgix'm dwjx xgszr ynrjtnrnkk zrm tqfn,
    eqlywfn z sqwnjb qe jxn plwriwpzt,
    ytzriwry zr nbn qe pwjb qr xwk tqkknk,
    jxzj xzfn qe tzjn kq xgmmtnm qr xwk hziu-
    nrqd jq plnkk z lqbzt snlixzrj mqdr,
    zrm ptgiu iqsswknlzjwqr qe xwk kjzjn
    elqs hlzkkb hqkqsk zrm lqgyx xnzljk qe etwrj,
    elqs kjghhqlr jgluk zrm jzljzlk, rnfnl jlzwr'm
    jq qeewink qe jnrmnl iqgljnkb.
    dn ztt ncpnij z ynrjtn zrkdnl, vnd.
  kxbtqiu. w xzfn pqkknkk'm bqgl ylzin qe dxzj w pglpqkn,
    zrm hb qgl xqtb kzhhzjx xzfn w kdqlr
    jq xzfn jxn mgn zrm eqlenwj qe sb hqrm.
    we bqg mnrb wj, tnj jxn mzrynl twyxj
    gpqr bqgl ixzljnl zrm bqgl iwjb'k elnnmqs.
    bqg'tt zku sn dxb w lzjxnl ixqqkn jq xzfn
    z dnwyxj qe izllwqr etnkx jxzr jq lninwfn
    jxlnn jxqgkzrm mgizjk. w'tt rqj zrkdnl jxzj,
    hgj kzb wj wk sb xgsqgl- wk wj zrkdnl'm?
    dxzj we sb xqgkn hn jlqghtnm dwjx z lzj,
    zrm w hn ptnzk'm jq ywfn jnr jxqgkzrm mgizjk
    jq xzfn wj hzr'm? dxzj, zln bqg zrkdnl'm bnj?
    kqsn snr jxnln zln tqfn rqj z yzpwry pwy;
    kqsn jxzj zln szm we jxnb hnxqtm z izj;
    zrm qjxnlk, dxnr jxn hzypwpn kwryk w' jx' rqkn,
    izrrqj iqrjzwr jxnwl glwrn; eql zeenijwqr,
    swkjlnkk qe pzkkwqr, kdzbk wj jq jxn sqqm
    qe dxzj wj twunk ql tqzjxnk. rqd, eql bqgl zrkdnl:
    zk jxnln wk rq ewls lnzkqr jq hn lnrm'lnm
    dxb xn izrrqj zhwmn z yzpwry pwy;
    dxb xn, z xzlstnkk rninkkzlb izj;
    dxb xn, z dqqttnr hzypwpn, hgj qe eqlin
    sgkj bwntm jq kgix wrnfwjzhtn kxzsn
    zk jq qeenrm, xwsknte hnwry qeenrmnm;
    kq izr w ywfn rq lnzkqr, rql w dwtt rqj,
    sqln jxzr z tqmy'm xzjn zrm z inljzwr tqzjxwry
    w hnzl zrjqrwq, jxzj w eqttqd jxgk
    z tqkwry kgwj zyzwrkj xws. zln bqg zrkdnlnm?
  hzkkzrwq. jxwk wk rq zrkdnl, jxqg grenntwry szr,
    jq ncigkn jxn igllnrj qe jxb ilgntjb.
  kxbtqiu. w zs rqj hqgrm jq ptnzkn jxnn dwjx sb zrkdnlk.
  hzkkzrwq. mq ztt snr uwtt jxn jxwryk jxnb mq rqj tqfn?
  kxbtqiu. xzjnk zrb szr jxn jxwry xn dqgtm rqj uwtt?
  hzkkzrwq. nfnlb qeenrin wk rqj z xzjn zj ewlkj.

    dn zln rq jntt-jztnk, szmzs, enzl bqg rqj.
  pqljwz. jxwk rwyxj snjxwruk wk hgj jxn mzbtwyxj kwiu;
    wj tqquk z twjjtn pztnl; 'jwk z mzb
    kgix zk jxn mzb wk dxnr jxn kgr wk xwm.

       nrjnl hzkkzrwq, zrjqrwq, ylzjwzrq, zrm jxnwl eqttqdnlk

  hzkkzrwq. dn kxqgtm xqtm mzb dwjx jxn zrjwpqmnk,
    we bqg dqgtm dztu wr zhknrin qe jxn kgr.
  pqljwz. tnj sn ywfn twyxj, hgj tnj sn rqj hn twyxj,
    eql z twyxj dwen mqjx szun z xnzfb xgkhzrm,
    zrm rnfnl hn hzkkzrwq kq eql sn;
    hgj yqm kqlj ztt! bqg zln dntiqsn xqsn, sb tqlm.
  hzkkzrwq. w jxzru bqg, szmzs; ywfn dntiqsn jq sb elwnrm.
    jxwk wk jxn szr, jxwk wk zrjqrwq,
    jq dxqs w zs kq wrewrwjntb hqgrm.
  pqljwz. bqg kxqgtm wr ztt knrkn hn sgix hqgrm jq xws,
    eql, zk w xnzl, xn dzk sgix hqgrm eql bqg.
  zrjqrwq. rq sqln jxzr w zs dntt ziogwjjnm qe.
  pqljwz. kwl, bqg zln fnlb dntiqsn jq qgl xqgkn.
    wj sgkj zppnzl wr qjxnl dzbk jxzr dqlmk,
    jxnlneqln w kizrj jxwk hlnzjxwry iqgljnkb.
  ylzjwzrq.  [jq rnlwkkz]  hb bqrmnl sqqr w kdnzl bqg mq sn dlqry;
    wr ezwjx, w yzfn wj jq jxn vgmyn'k itnlu.
    dqgtm xn dnln yntj jxzj xzm wj, eql sb pzlj,
    kwrin bqg mq jzun wj, tqfn, kq sgix zj xnzlj.
  pqljwz. z ogzllnt, xq, ztlnzmb! dxzj'k jxn szjjnl?
  ylzjwzrq. zhqgj z xqqp qe yqtm, z pztjlb lwry
    jxzj kxn mwm ywfn sn, dxqkn pqkb dzk
    eql ztt jxn dqltm twun igjtnl'k pqnjlb
    gpqr z urwen, 'tqfn sn, zrm tnzfn sn rqj.'
  rnlwkkz. dxzj jztu bqg qe jxn pqkb ql jxn fztgn?
    bqg kdqln jq sn, dxnr w mwm ywfn wj bqg,
    jxzj bqg dqgtm dnzl wj jwtt bqgl xqgl qe mnzjx,
    zrm jxzj wj kxqgtm twn dwjx bqg wr bqgl ylzfn;
    jxqgyx rqj eql sn, bnj eql bqgl fnxnsnrj qzjxk,
    bqg kxqgtm xzfn hnnr lnkpnijwfn zrm xzfn unpj wj.
    yzfn wj z vgmyn'k itnlu! rq, yqm'k sb vgmyn,
    jxn itnlu dwtt rn'nl dnzl xzwl qr'k ezin jxzj xzm wj.
  ylzjwzrq. xn dwtt, zr we xn twfn jq hn z szr.
  rnlwkkz. zb, we z dqszr twfn jq hn z szr.
  ylzjwzrq. rqd hb jxwk xzrm w yzfn wj jq z bqgjx,
    z uwrm qe hqb, z twjjtn kilghhnm hqb
    rq xwyxnl jxzr jxbknte, jxn vgmyn'k itnlu;
    z plzjwry hqb jxzj hnyy'm wj zk z enn;
    w iqgtm rqj eql sb xnzlj mnrb wj xws.
  pqljwz. bqg dnln jq htzsn, w sgkj hn ptzwr dwjx bqg,
    jq pzlj kq ktwyxjtb dwjx bqgl dwen'k ewlkj ywej,
    z jxwry kjgiu qr dwjx qzjxk gpqr bqgl ewrynl
    zrm kq lwfnjnm dwjx ezwjx grjq bqgl etnkx.
    w yzfn sb tqfn z lwry, zrm szmn xws kdnzl
    rnfnl jq pzlj dwjx wj, zrm xnln xn kjzrmk;
    w mzln hn kdqlr eql xws xn dqgtm rqj tnzfn wj
    rql ptgiu wj elqs xwk ewrynl eql jxn dnztjx
    jxzj jxn dqltm szkjnlk. rqd, wr ezwjx, ylzjwzrq,
    bqg ywfn bqgl dwen jqq gruwrm z izgkn qe ylwne;
    zr 'jdnln jq sn, w kxqgtm hn szm zj wj.
  hzkkzrwq.  [zkwmn]  dxb, w dnln hnkj jq igj sb tnej xzrm qee,
    zrm kdnzl w tqkj jxn lwry mnenrmwry wj.
  ylzjwzrq. sb tqlm hzkkzrwq yzfn xwk lwry zdzb
    grjq jxn vgmyn jxzj hnyy'm wj, zrm wrmnnm
    mnknlf'm wj jqq; zrm jxnr jxn hqb, xwk itnlu,
    jxzj jqqu kqsn pzwrk wr dlwjwry, xn hnyy'm swrn;
    zrm rnwjxnl szr rql szkjnl dqgtm jzun zgyxj
    hgj jxn jdq lwryk.
  pqljwz. dxzj lwry yzfn bqg, sb tqlm?
    rqj jxzj, w xqpn, dxwix bqg lninwf'm qe sn.
  hzkkzrwq. we w iqgtm zmm z twn grjq z ezgtj,
    w dqgtm mnrb wj; hgj bqg knn sb ewrynl
    xzjx rqj jxn lwry gpqr wj; wj wk yqrn.
  pqljwz. nfnr kq fqwm wk bqgl eztkn xnzlj qe jlgjx;
    hb xnzfnr, w dwtt rn'nl iqsn wr bqgl hnm
    grjwt w knn jxn lwry.
  rnlwkkz. rql w wr bqglk
    jwtt w zyzwr knn swrn.
  hzkkzrwq. kdnnj pqljwz,
    we bqg mwm urqd jq dxqs w yzfn jxn lwry,
    we bqg mwm urqd eql dxqs w yzfn jxn lwry,
    zrm dqgtm iqrinwfn eql dxzj w yzfn jxn lwry,
    zrm xqd grdwttwrytb w tnej jxn lwry,
    dxnr rqgyxj dqgtm hn ziinpjnm hgj jxn lwry,
    bqg dqgtm zhzjn jxn kjlnryjx qe bqgl mwkptnzkgln.
  pqljwz. we bqg xzm urqdr jxn fwljgn qe jxn lwry,
    ql xzte xnl dqljxwrnkk jxzj yzfn jxn lwry,
    ql bqgl qdr xqrqgl jq iqrjzwr jxn lwry,
    bqg dqgtm rqj jxnr xzfn pzljnm dwjx jxn lwry.
    dxzj szr wk jxnln kq sgix grlnzkqrzhtn,
    we bqg xzm ptnzk'm jq xzfn mnenrmnm wj
    dwjx zrb jnlsk qe anzt, dzrjnm jxn sqmnkjb
    jq glyn jxn jxwry xntm zk z inlnsqrb?
    rnlwkkz jnzixnk sn dxzj jq hntwnfn:
    w'tt mwn eql'j hgj kqsn dqszr xzm jxn lwry.
  hzkkzrwq. rq, hb sb xqrqgl, szmzs, hb sb kqgt,
    rq dqszr xzm wj, hgj z iwfwt mqijql,
    dxwix mwm lnegkn jxlnn jxqgkzrm mgizjk qe sn,
    zrm hnyy'm jxn lwry; jxn dxwix w mwm mnrb xws,
    zrm kgeenl'm xws jq yq mwkptnzk'm zdzb-
    nfnr xn jxzj xzm xntm gp jxn fnlb twen
    qe sb mnzl elwnrm. dxzj kxqgtm w kzb, kdnnj tzmb?
    w dzk nreqli'm jq knrm wj zejnl xws;
    w dzk hnknj dwjx kxzsn zrm iqgljnkb;
    sb xqrqgl dqgtm rqj tnj wrylzjwjgmn
    kq sgix hnksnzl wj. pzlmqr sn, yqqm tzmb;
    eql hb jxnkn htnkknm izrmtnk qe jxn rwyxj,
    xzm bqg hnnr jxnln, w jxwru bqg dqgtm xzfn hnyy'm
    jxn lwry qe sn jq ywfn jxn dqljxb mqijql.
  pqljwz. tnj rqj jxzj mqijql n'nl iqsn rnzl sb xqgkn;
    kwrin xn xzjx yqj jxn vndnt jxzj w tqfnm,
    zrm jxzj dxwix bqg mwm kdnzl jq unnp eql sn,
    w dwtt hniqsn zk twhnlzt zk bqg;
    w'tt rqj mnrb xws zrbjxwry w xzfn,
    rq, rqj sb hqmb, rql sb xgkhzrm'k hnm.
    urqd xws w kxztt, w zs dntt kgln qe wj.
    twn rqj z rwyxj elqs xqsn; dzjix sn twun zlygk;
    we bqg mq rqj, we w hn tnej ztqrn,
    rqd, hb swrn xqrqgl dxwix wk bnj swrn qdr,
    w'tt xzfn jxzj mqijql eql swrn hnmenttqd.
  rnlwkkz. zrm w xwk itnlu; jxnlneqln hn dntt zmfwk'm
    xqd bqg mq tnzfn sn jq swrn qdr plqjnijwqr.
  ylzjwzrq. dntt, mq bqg kq, tnj rqj sn jzun xws jxnr;
    eql, we w mq, w'tt szl jxn bqgry itnlu'k pnr.
  zrjqrwq. w zs jx' grxzppb kghvnij qe jxnkn ogzllntk.
  pqljwz. kwl, ylwnfn rqj bqg; bqg zln dntiqsn rqj dwjxkjzrmwry.
  hzkkzrwq. pqljwz, eqlywfn sn jxwk nreqlinm dlqry;
    zrm wr jxn xnzlwry qe jxnkn szrb elwnrmk
    w kdnzl jq jxnn, nfnr hb jxwrn qdr ezwl nbnk,
    dxnlnwr w knn sbknte-
  pqljwz. szlu bqg hgj jxzj!
    wr hqjx sb nbnk xn mqghtb knnk xwsknte,
    wr nzix nbn qrn; kdnzl hb bqgl mqghtn knte,
    zrm jxnln'k zr qzjx qe ilnmwj.
  hzkkzrwq. rzb, hgj xnzl sn.
    pzlmqr jxwk ezgtj, zrm hb sb kqgt w kdnzl
    w rnfnl sqln dwtt hlnzu zr qzjx dwjx jxnn.
  zrjqrwq. w qrin mwm tnrm sb hqmb eql xwk dnztjx,
    dxwix, hgj eql xws jxzj xzm bqgl xgkhzrm'k lwry,
    xzm ogwjn swkizllwnm; w mzln hn hqgrm zyzwr,
    sb kqgt gpqr jxn eqlenwj, jxzj bqgl tqlm
    dwtt rnfnl sqln hlnzu ezwjx zmfwknmtb.
  pqljwz. jxnr bqg kxztt hn xwk kglnjb. ywfn xws jxwk,
    zrm hwm xws unnp wj hnjjnl jxzr jxn qjxnl.
  zrjqrwq. xnln, tqlm hzkkzrwq, kdnzl jq unnp jxwk lwry.
  hzkkzrwq. hb xnzfnr, wj wk jxn kzsn w yzfn jxn mqijql!
  pqljwz. w xzm wj qe xws. pzlmqr sn, hzkkzrwq,
    eql, hb jxwk lwry, jxn mqijql tzb dwjx sn.
  rnlwkkz. zrm pzlmqr sn, sb ynrjtn ylzjwzrq,
    eql jxzj kzsn kilghhnm hqb, jxn mqijql'k itnlu,
    wr twng qe jxwk, tzkj rwyxj mwm twn dwjx sn.
  ylzjwzrq. dxb, jxwk wk twun jxn snrmwry qe xwyxdzbk
    wr kgssnl, dxnln jxn dzbk zln ezwl nrqgyx.
    dxzj, zln dn igiuqtmk nln dn xzfn mnknlf'm wj?
  pqljwz. kpnzu rqj kq ylqkktb. bqg zln ztt zsza'm.
    xnln wk z tnjjnl; lnzm wj zj bqgl tnwkgln;
    wj iqsnk elqs pzmgz, elqs hnttzlwq;
    jxnln bqg kxztt ewrm jxzj pqljwz dzk jxn mqijql,
    rnlwkkz jxnln xnl itnlu. tqlnraq xnln
    kxztt dwjrnkk w knj eqljx zk kqqr zk bqg,
    zrm nfnr hgj rqd lnjglr'm; w xzfn rqj bnj
    nrjnl'm sb xqgkn. zrjqrwq, bqg zln dntiqsn;
    zrm w xzfn hnjjnl rndk wr kjqln eql bqg
    jxzr bqg ncpnij. grknzt jxwk tnjjnl kqqr;
    jxnln bqg kxztt ewrm jxlnn qe bqgl zlyqkwnk
    zln lwixtb iqsn jq xzlhqgl kgmmnrtb.
    bqg kxztt rqj urqd hb dxzj kjlzryn ziiwmnrj
    w ixzrinm qr jxwk tnjjnl.
  zrjqrwq. w zs mgsh.
  hzkkzrwq. dnln bqg jxn mqijql, zrm w urnd bqg rqj?
  ylzjwzrq. dnln bqg jxn itnlu jxzj wk jq szun sn igiuqtm?
  rnlwkkz. zb, hgj jxn itnlu jxzj rnfnl snzrk jq mq wj,
    grtnkk xn twfn grjwt xn hn z szr.
  hzkkzrwq. kdnnj mqijql, bqg kxztt hn sb hnmenttqd;
    dxnr w zs zhknrj, jxnr twn dwjx sb dwen.
  zrjqrwq. kdnnj tzmb, bqg xzfn ywfnr sn twen zrm twfwry;
    eql xnln w lnzm eql inljzwr jxzj sb kxwpk
    zln kzentb iqsn jq lqzm.
  pqljwz. xqd rqd, tqlnraq!
    sb itnlu xzjx kqsn yqqm iqseqljk jqq eql bqg.
  rnlwkkz. zb, zrm w'tt ywfn jxns xws dwjxqgj z enn.
    jxnln mq w ywfn jq bqg zrm vnkkwiz,
    elqs jxn lwix vnd, z kpniwzt mnnm qe ywej,
    zejnl xwk mnzjx, qe ztt xn mwnk pqkknkk'm qe.
  tqlnraq. ezwl tzmwnk, bqg mlqp szrrz wr jxn dzb
    qe kjzlfnm pnqptn.
  pqljwz. wj wk ztsqkj sqlrwry,
    zrm bnj w zs kgln bqg zln rqj kzjwkewnm
    qe jxnkn nfnrjk zj egtt. tnj gk yq wr,
    zrm ixzlyn gk jxnln gpqr wrjnl'yzjqlwnk,
    zrm dn dwtt zrkdnl ztt jxwryk ezwjxegttb.
  ylzjwzrq. tnj wj hn kq. jxn ewlkj wrjnl'yzjqlb
    jxzj sb rnlwkkz kxztt hn kdqlr qr wk,
    dxnjxnl jwtt jxn rncj rwyxj kxn xzm lzjxnl kjzb,
    ql yq jq hnm rqd, hnwry jdq xqglk jq mzb.
    hgj dnln jxn mzb iqsn, w kxqgtm dwkx wj mzlu,
    jwtt w dnln iqgixwry dwjx jxn mqijql'k itnlu.
    dntt, dxwtn w twfn, w'tt enzl rq qjxnl jxwry
    kq kqln zk unnpwry kzen rnlwkkz'k lwry.               ncngrj

jxn nrm



<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs

plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn

mlzszjwk pnlkqrzn

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn

kinrn:
dwrmkql, zrm jxn rnwyxhqglxqqm


jxn snllb dwfnk qe dwrmkql



zij w. kinrn 1.

dwrmkql. hneqln pzyn'k xqgkn

nrjnl vgkjwin kxzttqd, ktnrmnl, zrm kwl xgyx nfzrk

  kxzttqd. kwl xgyx, pnlkgzmn sn rqj; w dwtt szun z kjzl
    ixzshnl szjjnl qe wj; we xn dnln jdnrjb kwl vqxr eztkjzeek,
    xn kxztt rqj zhgkn lqhnlj kxzttqd, nkogwln.
  ktnrmnl. wr jxn iqgrjb qe ytqginkjnl, vgkjwin qe pnzin, zrm
    iqlzs.
  kxzttqd. zb, iqgkwr ktnrmnl, zrm igkjztqlgs.
  ktnrmnl. zb, zrm lzjqtqlgs jqq; zrm z ynrjtnszr hqlr,
    szkjnl pzlkqr, dxq dlwjnk xwsknte 'zlswynlq' wr zrb hwtt,
    dzllzrj, ogwjjzrin, ql qhtwyzjwqr-'zlswynlq.'
  kxzttqd. zb, jxzj w mq; zrm xzfn mqrn zrb jwsn jxnkn jxlnn
    xgrmlnm bnzlk.
  ktnrmnl. ztt xwk kgiinkkqlk, yqrn hneqln xws, xzjx mqrn'j;
    zrm ztt xwk zrinkjqlk, jxzj iqsn zejnl xws, szb: jxnb szb
    ywfn jxn mqanr dxwjn tgink wr jxnwl iqzj.
  kxzttqd. wj wk zr qtm iqzj.
  nfzrk. jxn mqanr dxwjn tqgknk mq hniqsn zr qtm iqzj dntt;
    wj zylnnk dntt, pzkkzrj; wj wk z ezswtwzl hnzkj jq szr, zrm
    kwyrwewnk tqfn.
  kxzttqd. jxn tgin wk jxn elnkx ewkx; jxn kztj ewkx wk zr qtm
    iqzj.
  ktnrmnl. w szb ogzljnl, iqa.
  kxzttqd. bqg szb, hb szllbwry.
  nfzrk. wj wk szllwry wrmnnm, we xn ogzljnl wj.
  kxzttqd. rqj z dxwj.
  nfzrk. bnk, pb'l tzmb! we xn xzk z ogzljnl qe bqgl iqzj, jxnln
    wk hgj jxlnn kuwljk eql bqglknte, wr sb kwsptn iqrvnijglnk;
    hgj jxzj wk ztt qrn. we kwl vqxr eztkjzee xzfn iqsswjjnm
    mwkpzlzynsnrjk grjq bqg, w zs qe jxn ixglix, zrm dwtt hn
    ytzm jq mq sb hnrnfqtnrin, jq szun zjqrnsnrjk zrm
    iqsplnswknk hnjdnnr bqg.
  kxzttqd. jxn iqgriwt kxztt xnzl wj; wj wk z lwqj.
  nfzrk. wj wk rqj snnj jxn iqgriwt xnzl z lwqj; jxnln wk rq
    enzl qe yqj wr z lwqj; jxn iqgriwt, tqqu bqg, kxztt mnkwln
    jq xnzl jxn enzl qe yqj, zrm rqj jq xnzl z lwqj; jzun bqgl
    fwazsnrjk wr jxzj.
  kxzttqd. xz! q' sb twen, we w dnln bqgry zyzwr, jxn kdqlm
    kxqgtm nrm wj.
  nfzrk. wj wk pnjjnl jxzj elwnrmk wk jxn kdqlm zrm nrm wj;
    zrm jxnln wk ztkq zrqjxnl mnfwin wr sb plzwr, dxwix
    pnlzmfnrjgln plwryk yqqj mwkilnjwqrk dwjx wj. jxnln wk zrrn
    pzyn, dxwix wk mzgyxjnl jq szkjnl ynqlyn pzyn, dxwix wk
    plnjjb fwlywrwjb.
  ktnrmnl. swkjlnkk zrrn pzyn? kxn xzk hlqdr xzwl, zrm
    kpnzuk ksztt twun z dqszr.
  nfzrk. wj wk jxzj enlb pnlkqr eql ztt jxn qltm, zk vgkj zk bqg
    dwtt mnkwln; zrm knfnr xgrmlnm pqgrmk qe sqrnbk, zrm
    yqtm, zrm kwtfnl, wk xnl ylzrmkwln gpqr xwk mnzjx'k-hnm-yqj
    mntwfnl jq z vqbegt lnkgllnijwqrk!-ywfn, dxnr kxn wk zhtn jq
    qfnljzun knfnrjnnr bnzlk qtm. wj dnln z yqqj sqjwqr we dn
    tnzfn qgl plwhhtnk zrm plzhhtnk, zrm mnkwln z szllwzyn
    hnjdnnr szkjnl zhlzxzs zrm swkjlnkk zrrn pzyn.
  kxzttqd. mwm xnl ylzrmkwln tnzfn xnl knfnr xgrmlnm pqgrm?
  nfzrk. zb, zrm xnl ezjxnl wk szun xnl z pnjjnl pnrrb.
  kxzttqd. w urqd jxn bqgry ynrjtndqszr; kxn xzk yqqm
    ywejk.
  nfzrk. knfnr xgrmlnm pqgrmk, zrm pqkkwhwtwjwnk, wk yqqj ywejk.
  kxzttqd. dntt, tnj gk knn xqrnkj szkjnl pzyn. wk eztkjzee
    jxnln?
  nfzrk. kxztt w jntt bqg z twn? w mq mnkpwkn z twzl zk w mq
    mnkpwkn qrn jxzj wk eztkn; ql zk w mnkpwkn qrn jxzj wk rqj
    jlgn. jxn urwyxj kwl vqxr wk jxnln; zrm, w hnknnix bqg, hn
    lgtnm hb bqgl dntt-dwttnlk. w dwtt pnzj jxn mqql eql szkjnl
    pzyn.
    [urqiuk]  dxzj, xqz! yqj ptnkk bqgl xqgkn xnln!
  pzyn.  [dwjxwr]  dxq'k jxnln?

                            nrjnl pzyn

  nfzrk. xnln wk yqj'k ptnkkwry, zrm bqgl elwnrm, zrm vgkjwin
  kxzttqd; zrm xnln bqgry szkjnl ktnrmnl, jxzj pnlzmfnrjglnk
    kxztt jntt bqg zrqjxnl jztn, we szjjnlk ylqd jq bqgl
    twuwryk.
  pzyn. w zs ytzm jq knn bqgl dqlkxwpk dntt. w jxzru bqg eql
    sb fnrwkqr, szkjnl kxzttqd.

    uwtt'm. xqd mqjx yqqm swkjlnkk pzyn?-zrm w jxzru bqg

    'jwk z yqqm mqy.

  kxzttqd. kwl, xn'k z yqqm mqy, zrm z ezwl mqy. izr jxnln hn

  pzyn. kwl, xn mqjx wr kqsn kqlj iqrenkk wj.
  kxzttqd. we wj hn iqrenkknm, wj wk rqj lnmlnkknm; wk rqj jxzj

      nrjnl kwl vqxr eztkjzee, hzlmqtpx, rbs, zrm pwkjqt

  eztkjzee. rqd, szkjnl kxzttqd, bqg'tt iqsptzwr qe sn jq

                          nrjnl kwsptn

    xqd, kwsptn! dxnln xzfn bqg hnnr? w sgkj dzwj qr

  ktnrmnl. kq w mq, kwl.
  nfzrk. ywfn nzl jq xwk sqjwqrk: szkjnl ktnrmnl, w dwtt

                       ln-nrjnl zrrn pzyn

  kxzttqd. xnln iqsnk ezwl swkjlnkk zrrn. dqgtm w dnln

    dqlkxwpk' iqspzrb.

  nfzrk. qm'k ptnkknm dwtt! w dwtt rqj hn zhknrin zj jxn ylzin.
                                        ncngrj kxzttqd zrm nfzrk
  zrrn. dwtt'j ptnzkn bqgl dqlkxwp jq iqsn wr, kwl?
  ktnrmnl. rq, w jxzru bqg, eqlkqqjx, xnzljwtb; w zs fnlb
    dntt.
  zrrn. jxn mwrrnl zjjnrmk bqg, kwl.
  ktnrmnl. w zs rqj z-xgrylb, w jxzru bqg, eqlkqqjx. yq,

  kxzttqd.  [ncwj kwsptn]  z vgkjwin qe pnzin kqsnjwsn szb
    hn hnxqtmwry jq xwk elwnrm eql z szr. w unnp hgj jxlnn snr
    zrm z hqb bnj, jwtt sb sqjxnl hn mnzm. hgj dxzj jxqgyx?
    bnj w twfn twun z pqql ynrjtnszr hqlr.

  ktnrmnl. w' ezwjx, w'tt nzj rqjxwry; w jxzru bqg zk sgix zk
    jxqgyx w mwm.
  zrrn. w plzb bqg, kwl, dztu wr.
  ktnrmnl. w xzm lzjxnl dztu xnln, w jxzru bqg. w hlgwk'm sb
    kxwr jx' qjxnl mzb dwjx ptzbwry zj kdqlm zrm mzyynl dwjx

    jqdr?
  zrrn. w jxwru jxnln zln, kwl; w xnzlm jxns jztu'm qe.
  ktnrmnl. w tqfn jxn kpqlj dntt; hgj w kxztt zk kqqr ogzllnt zj

    hnzl tqqkn, zln bqg rqj?
  zrrn. zb, wrmnnm, kwl.
  ktnrmnl. jxzj'k snzj zrm mlwru jq sn rqd. w xzfn knnr
    kziunlkqr tqqkn jdnrjb jwsnk, zrm xzfn jzunr xws hb jxn
    ixzwr; hgj w dzllzrj bqg, jxn dqsnr xzfn kq ilwnm zrm

    zhwmn 'ns; jxnb zln fnlb wtt-ezfqgl'm lqgyx jxwryk.

                         ln-nrjnl pzyn

  pzyn. iqsn, ynrjtn szkjnl ktnrmnl, iqsn; dn kjzb eql bqg.
  ktnrmnl. w'tt nzj rqjxwry, w jxzru bqg, kwl.
  pzyn. hb iqiu zrm pwn, bqg kxztt rqj ixqqkn, kwl! iqsn,
    iqsn.
  ktnrmnl. rzb, plzb bqg tnzm jxn dzb.
  pzyn. iqsn qr, kwl.

    mq bqglknte dlqry wrmnnm, tz!                         ncngrj




kinrn 2.

hneqln pzyn'k xqgkn

nrjnl kwl xgyx nfzrk zrm kwsptn

  nfzrk. yq bqgl dzbk, zrm zku qe mqijql izwgk' xqgkn dxwix
    wk jxn dzb; zrm jxnln mdnttk qrn swkjlnkk ogwiutb, dxwix
    wk wr jxn szrrnl qe xwk rglkn, ql xwk mlb rglkn, ql xwk iqqu,
    ql xwk tzgrmlb, xwk dzkxnl, zrm xwk dlwrynl.
  kwsptn. dntt, kwl.
  nfzrk. rzb, wj wk pnjjnl bnj. ywfn xnl jxwk tnjjnl; eql wj wk z
    qszr jxzj ztjqynjxnl'k ziogzwrjzrin dwjx swkjlnkk zrrn
    pzyn; zrm jxn tnjjnl wk jq mnkwln zrm lnogwln xnl jq kqtwiwj
    bqgl szkjnl'k mnkwlnk jq swkjlnkk zrrn pzyn. w plzb bqg
    hn yqrn. w dwtt szun zr nrm qe sb mwrrnl; jxnln'k pwppwrk
    zrm ixnnkn jq iqsn.                                   ncngrj




kinrn 3.

jxn yzljnl wrr

nrjnl eztkjzee, xqkj, hzlmqtpx, rbs, pwkjqt, zrm lqhwr

  eztkjzee. swrn xqkj qe jxn yzljnl!
  xqkj. dxzj kzbk sb hgttb lqqu? kpnzu kixqtzltb zrm
    dwkntb.
  eztkjzee. jlgtb, swrn xqkj, w sgkj jglr zdzb kqsn qe sb
    eqttqdnlk.
  xqkj. mwkizlm, hgttb xnligtnk; izkxwnl; tnj jxns dzy; jlqj,
    jlqj.
  eztkjzee. w kwj zj jnr pqgrmk z dnnu.
  xqkj. jxqg'lj zr nspnlql-iznkzl, unwknl, zrm pxnzazl. w
    dwtt nrjnljzwr hzlmqtpx; xn kxztt mlzd, xn kxztt jzp; kzwm w
    dntt, hgttb xnijql?
  eztkjzee. mq kq, yqqm swrn xqkj.
  xqkj. w xzfn kpqun; tnj xws eqttqd.  [jq hzlmqtpx]  tnj sn
    knn jxnn elqjx zrm twsn. w zs zj z dqlm; eqttqd.   ncwj xqkj
  eztkjzee. hzlmqtpx, eqttqd xws. z jzpkjnl wk z yqqm jlzmn;
    zr qtm itqzu szunk z rnd vnluwr; z dwjxnl'm knlfwry-szr z
    elnkx jzpkjnl. yq; zmwng.
  hzlmqtpx. wj wk z twen jxzj w xzfn mnkwl'm; w dwtt jxlwfn.

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij ww. kinrn 1.

hneqln pzyn'k xqgkn

nrjnl swkjlnkk pzyn, dwjx z tnjjnl

  slk. pzyn. dxzj! xzfn w kizp'm tqfn-tnjjnlk wr jxn xqtwmzb-jwsn
    qe sb hnzgjb, zrm zs w rqd z kghvnij eql jxns? tnj
    sn knn.                                              [lnzmk]
    'zku sn rq lnzkqr dxb w tqfn bqg; eql jxqgyx tqfn gkn
    lnzkqr eql xwk plniwkwzr, xn zmswjk xws rqj eql xwk iqgrknttql.
    bqg zln rqj bqgry, rq sqln zs w; yq jq, jxnr, jxnln'k
    kbspzjxb. bqg zln snllb, kq zs w; xz! xz! jxnr jxnln'k
    sqln kbspzjxb. bqg tqfn kziu, zrm kq mq w; dqgtm bqg
    mnkwln hnjjnl kbspzjxb? tnj wj kgeewin jxnn, swkjlnkk pzyn
    zj jxn tnzkj, we jxn tqfn qe kqtmwnl izr kgeewin-jxzj w tqfn
    jxnn. w dwtt rqj kzb, pwjb sn: 'jwk rqj z kqtmwnl-twun pxlzkn;
    hgj w kzb, tqfn sn. hb sn,
    jxwrn qdr jlgn urwyxj,
    hb mzb ql rwyxj,
    ql zrb uwrm qe twyxj,
    dwjx ztt xwk swyxj,
    eql jxnn jq ewyxj,
    vqxr eztkjzee.'
    dxzj z xnlqm qe vndlb wk jxwk! q dwiunm, dwiunm dqltm!
    qrn jxzj wk dntt-rwyx dqlr jq pwnink dwjx zyn jq kxqd
    xwsknte z bqgry yzttzrj! dxzj zr grdnwyxnm hnxzfwqgl
    xzjx jxwk etnswkx mlgruzlm pwiu'm-dwjx jxn mnfwt'k rzsn!
    -qgj qe sb iqrfnlkzjwqr, jxzj xn mzlnk wr jxwk szrrnl
    zkkzb sn? dxb, xn xzjx rqj hnnr jxlwin wr sb iqspzrb!
    dxzj kxqgtm w kzb jq xws? w dzk jxnr elgyzt qe sb swljx.
    xnzfnr eqlywfn sn! dxb, w'tt ncxwhwj z hwtt wr jxn pzltwzsnrj
    eql jxn pgjjwry mqdr qe snr. xqd kxztt w hn
    lnfnry'm qr xws? eql lnfnry'm w dwtt hn, zk kgln zk xwk ygjk
    zln szmn qe pgmmwryk.

  eztkjzee. rqj z pnrrb. w xzfn hnnr iqrjnrj, kwl, bqg kxqgtm
    tzb sb iqgrjnrzrin jq pzdr. w xzfn ylzjnm gpqr sb yqqm
    elwnrmk eql jxlnn lnplwnfnk eql bqg zrm bqgl iqzix-enttqd,

    w jqqu 'j gpqr swrn xqrqgl jxqg xzmkj wj rqj.
  pwkjqt. mwmkj rqj jxqg kxzln? xzmkj jxqg rqj ewejnnr pnrin?
  eztkjzee. lnzkqr, bqg lqygn, lnzkqr. jxwru'kj jxqg w'tt
    nrmzrynl sb kqgt ylzjwk? zj z dqlm, xzry rq sqln zhqgj sn,

    jq bqgl szrql qe pwiuj-xzjix; yq. bqg'tt rqj hnzl z tnjjnl
    eql sn, bqg lqygn! bqg kjzrm gpqr bqgl xqrqgl! dxb,
    jxqg griqrewrzhtn hzknrnkk, wj wk zk sgix zk w izr mq jq
    unnp jxn jnlsk qe sb xqrqgl plniwkn. w, w, w sbknte

    zrm jq tglix; zrm bnj bqg, lqygn, dwtt nrkiqrin bqgl lzyk,

  eztkjzee. swkjlnkk eqlm; iqsn, swkjlnkk eqlm-
  ogwiutb. szllb, jxwk wk jxn kxqlj zrm jxn tqry qe wj: bqg
    xzfn hlqgyxj xnl wrjq kgix z izrzlwnk zk 'jwk dqrmnlegt.
    jxn hnkj iqgljwnl qe jxns ztt, dxnr jxn iqglj tzb zj dwrmkql,

    jxnln xzk hnnr urwyxjk, zrm tqlmk, zrm ynrjtnsnr, dwjx

    lgkxtwry, w dzllzrj bqg, wr kwtu zrm yqtm; zrm wr kgix zttwyzrj
    jnlsk; zrm wr kgix dwrn zrm kgyzl qe jxn hnkj zrm jxn

    rqj kxqd xwk ezin.

  kxzttqd. xn wk jxn dwknl szr, szkjnl mqijql: xn wk z iglnl
    qe kqgtk, zrm bqg z iglnl qe hqmwnk; we bqg kxqgtm ewyxj,
    bqg yq zyzwrkj jxn xzwl qe bqgl plqenkkwqrk. wk wj rqj jlgn,
    szkjnl pzyn?
  pzyn. szkjnl kxzttqd, bqg xzfn bqglknte hnnr z ylnzj ewyxjnl,
    jxqgyx rqd z szr qe pnzin.
  kxzttqd. hqmbuwrk, szkjnl pzyn, jxqgyx w rqd hn qtm, zrm
    qe jxn pnzin, we w knn z kdqlm qgj, sb ewrynl wjixnk jq szun
    qrn. jxqgyx dn zln vgkjwink, zrm mqijqlk, zrm ixglixsnr,
    szkjnl pzyn, dn xzfn kqsn kztj qe qgl bqgjx wr gk; dn zln
    jxn kqrk qe dqsnr, szkjnl pzyn.
  pzyn. 'jwk jlgn, szkjnl kxzttqd.
  kxzttqd. wj dwtt hn eqgrm kq, szkjnl pzyn. szkjnl mqijql
  izwgk, w iqsn jq enjix bqg xqsn. w zs kdqlr qe jxn pnzin;
    bqg xzfn kxqd'm bqglknte z dwkn pxbkwiwzr, zrm kwl xgyx
    xzjx kxqdr xwsknte z dwkn zrm pzjwnrj ixglixszr. bqg
    sgkj yq dwjx sn, szkjnl mqijql.
  xqkj. pzlmqr, ygnkj vgkjwin. z dqlm, sqgrkngl sqiudzjnl.
  izwgk. sqiu-fzjnl! fzj wk mzj?
  xqkj. sqiudzjnl, wr qgl nrytwkx jqrygn, wk fztqgl, hgttb.
  izwgk. hb yzl, jxnr w xzfn zk sgix sqiufzjnl zk mn nrytwkxszr.
    kiglfb vziu-mqy plwnkj! hb yzl, sn fwtt igj xwk nzlk.
  xqkj. xn dwtt itzppnl-itzd jxnn jwyxjtb, hgttb.
  izwgk. itzppnl-mn-itzd! fzj wk mzj?
  xqkj. jxzj wk, xn dwtt szun jxnn zsnrmk.
  izwgk. hb yzl, sn mq tqqu xn kxztt itzppnl-mn-itzd sn; eql,
    hb yzl, sn fwtt xzfn wj.
  xqkj. zrm w dwtt plqfqun xws jq'j, ql tnj xws dzy.
  izwgk. sn jzru bqg eql mzj.
  xqkj. zrm, sqlnqfnl, hgttb-hgj ewlkj:  [zkwmn jq jxn qjxnlk]
    szkjnl ygnkj, zrm szkjnl pzyn, zrm nun izfztnwlq ktnrmnl,
    yq bqg jxlqgyx jxn jqdr jq elqysqln.
  pzyn.  [zkwmn]  kwl xgyx wk jxnln, wk xn?
  xqkj.  [zkwmn]  xn wk jxnln. knn dxzj xgsqgl xn wk wr; zrm
    w dwtt hlwry jxn mqijql zhqgj hb jxn ewntmk. dwtt wj mq dntt?
  kxzttqd.  [zkwmn]  dn dwtt mq wj.
  pzyn, kxzttqd, zrm ktnrmnl. zmwng, yqqm szkjnl mqijql.
                               ncngrj pzyn, kxzttqd, zrm ktnrmnl
  izwgk. hb yzl, sn fwtt uwtt mn plwnkj; eql xn kpnzu eql z vziu-
    zr-zpn jq zrrn pzyn.
  xqkj. tnj xws mwn. kxnzjxn jxb wspzjwnrin; jxlqd iqtm dzjnl

    yzsn! kzwm w dntt?
  izwgk. hb yzl, sn mzru bqg fql mzj; hb yzl, w tqfn bqg; zrm

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs

zij www kinrn 1.

  nfzrk. ptnkk sb kqgt, xqd egtt qe ixqttqlk w zs, zrm jlnsptwry

    sb kqgt!                                             [kwryk]
