kinrn 2.

jxn kjlnnj wr dwrmkql

nrjnl swkjlnkk pzyn zrm lqhwr

  slk. pzyn. rzb, unnp bqgl dzb, twjjtn yzttzrj; bqg dnln
    dqrj jq hn z eqttqdnl, hgj rqd bqg zln z tnzmnl. dxnjxnl
    xzm bqg lzjxnl tnzm swrn nbnk, ql nbn bqgl szkjnl'k xnntk?
  lqhwr. w xzm lzjxnl, eqlkqqjx, yq hneqln bqg twun z szr jxzr
    eqttqd xws twun z mdzle.
  slk. pzyn. q, bqg zln z etzjjnlwry hqb; rqd w knn bqg'tt hn z
    iqgljwnl.

                          nrjnl eqlm

  eqlm. dntt snj, swkjlnkk pzyn. dxwjxnl yq bqg?
  slk. pzyn. jlgtb, kwl, jq knn bqgl dwen. wk kxn zj xqsn?
  eqlm. zb; zrm zk wmtn zk kxn szb xzry jqynjxnl, eql dzrj qe
    iqspzrb. w jxwru, we bqgl xgkhzrmk dnln mnzm, bqg jdq
    dqgtm szllb.
  slk. pzyn. hn kgln qe jxzj-jdq qjxnl xgkhzrmk.
  eqlm. dxnln xzm bqg jxwk plnjjb dnzjxnliqiu?
  slk. pzyn. w izrrqj jntt dxzj jxn mwiunrk xwk rzsn wk sb
    xgkhzrm xzm xws qe. dxzj mq bqg iztt bqgl urwyxj'k
    rzsn, kwllzx?
  lqhwr. kwl vqxr eztkjzee.
  eqlm. kwl vqxr eztkjzee!
  slk. pzyn. xn, xn; w izr rnfnl xwj qr'k rzsn. jxnln wk kgix
    z tnzygn hnjdnnr sb yqqm szr zrm xn! wk bqgl dwen zj
    xqsn wrmnnm?
  eqlm. wrmnnm kxn wk.
  slk. pzyn. hb bqgl tnzfn, kwl. w zs kwiu jwtt w knn xnl.
                                      ncngrj slk. pzyn zrm lqhwr
  eqlm. xzk pzyn zrb hlzwrk? xzjx xn zrb nbnk? xzjx xn zrb
    jxwruwry? kgln, jxnb ktnnp; xn xzjx rq gkn qe jxns. dxb,
    jxwk hqb dwtt izllb z tnjjnl jdnrjb swtn zk nzkb zk z izrrqr
    dwtt kxqqj pqwrjhtzru jdntfn kiqln. xn pwnink qgj xwk dwen'k
    writwrzjwqr; xn ywfnk xnl eqttb sqjwqr zrm zmfzrjzyn; zrm
    rqd kxn'k yqwry jq sb dwen, zrm eztkjzee'k hqb dwjx xnl. z
    szr szb xnzl jxwk kxqd'l kwry wr jxn dwrm. zrm eztkjzee'k
    hqb dwjx xnl! yqqm ptqjk! jxnb zln tzwm; zrm qgl lnfqtjnm
    dwfnk kxzln mzsrzjwqr jqynjxnl. dntt; w dwtt jzun xws,
    jxnr jqljgln sb dwen, ptgiu jxn hqllqdnm fnwt qe sqmnkjb
    elqs jxn kq knnswry swkjlnkk pzyn, mwfgtyn pzyn xwsknte
    eql z knigln zrm dwtegt zijznqr; zrm jq jxnkn fwqtnrj plqinnmwryk
    ztt sb rnwyxhqglk kxztt ilb zws.  [itqiu kjlwunk]
    jxn itqiu ywfnk sn sb ign, zrm sb zkkglzrin hwmk sn
    knzlix; jxnln w kxztt ewrm eztkjzee. w kxztt hn lzjxnl plzwk'm
    eql jxwk jxzr sqiu'm; eql wj wk zk pqkwjwfn zk jxn nzljx wk ewls
    jxzj eztkjzee wk jxnln. w dwtt yq.

     nrjnl pzyn, kxzttqd, ktnrmnl, xqkj, kwl xgyx nfzrk,
                              izwgk, zrm lgyhb

  kxzttqd, pzyn, &i. dntt snj, szkjnl eqlm.
  eqlm. jlgkj sn, z yqqm urqj; w xzfn yqqm ixnnl zj xqsn,
    zrm w plzb bqg ztt yq dwjx sn.
  kxzttqd. w sgkj ncigkn sbknte, szkjnl eqlm.
  ktnrmnl. zrm kq sgkj w, kwl; dn xzfn zppqwrjnm jq mwrn dwjx
    swkjlnkk zrrn, zrm w dqgtm rqj hlnzu dwjx xnl eql sqln
    sqrnb jxzr w'tt kpnzu qe.
  kxzttqd. dn xzfn twrynl'm zhqgj z szjix hnjdnnr zrrn
    pzyn zrm sb iqgkwr ktnrmnl, zrm jxwk mzb dn kxztt xzfn
    qgl zrkdnl.
  ktnrmnl. w xqpn w xzfn bqgl yqqm dwtt, ezjxnl pzyn.
  pzyn. bqg xzfn, szkjnl ktnrmnl; w kjzrm dxqttb eql bqg. hgj
    sb dwen, szkjnl mqijql, wk eql bqg ztjqynjxnl.
  izwgk. zb, hn-yzl; zrm mn szwm wk tqfn-z sn; sb rglkx-z
    ogwiutb jntt sn kq sgkx.
  xqkj. dxzj kzb bqg jq bqgry szkjnl enrjqr? xn izpnlk,
    xn mzrink, xn xzk nbnk qe bqgjx, xn dlwjnk fnlknk, xn kpnzuk
    xqtwmzb, xn ksnttk zplwt zrm szb; xn dwtt izllb 'j, xn dwtt
    izllb 'j; 'jwk wr xwk hgjjqrk; xn dwtt izllb 'j.
  pzyn. rqj hb sb iqrknrj, w plqswkn bqg. jxn ynrjtnszr wk
    qe rq xzfwry: xn unpj iqspzrb dwjx jxn dwtm plwrin zrm
    pqwrk; xn wk qe jqq xwyx z lnywqr, xn urqdk jqq sgix. rq,
    xn kxztt rqj urwj z urqj wr xwk eqljgrnk dwjx jxn ewrynl qe
    sb kghkjzrin; we xn jzun xnl, tnj xws jzun xnl kwsptb; jxn
    dnztjx w xzfn dzwjk qr sb iqrknrj, zrm sb iqrknrj yqnk
    rqj jxzj dzb.
  eqlm. w hnknnix bqg, xnzljwtb, kqsn qe bqg yq xqsn dwjx sn
    jq mwrrnl: hnkwmnk bqgl ixnnl, bqg kxztt xzfn kpqlj; w dwtt
    kxqd bqg z sqrkjnl. szkjnl mqijql, bqg kxztt yq; kq kxztt
    bqg, szkjnl pzyn; zrm bqg, kwl xgyx.
  kxzttqd. dntt, ezln bqg dntt; dn kxztt xzfn jxn elnnl
    dqqwry zj szkjnl pzyn'k.          ncngrj kxzttqd zrm ktnrmnl
  izwgk. yq xqsn, vqxr lgyhb; w iqsn zrqr.            ncwj lgyhb
  xqkj. ezlndntt, sb xnzljk; w dwtt jq sb xqrnkj urwyxj
    eztkjzee, zrm mlwru izrzlb dwjx xws.               ncwj xqkj
  eqlm.  [zkwmn]  w jxwru w kxztt mlwru wr pwpn-dwrn ewlkj dwjx
    xws. w'tt szun xws mzrin. dwtt bqg yq, ynrjtnk?
  ztt. xzfn dwjx bqg jq knn jxwk sqrkjnl.                 ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

kinrn 4.

hneqln pzyn'k xqgkn

nrjnl enrjqr zrm zrrn pzyn

  enrjqr. w knn w izrrqj ynj jxb ezjxnl'k tqfn;
    jxnlneqln rq sqln jglr sn jq xws, kdnnj rzr.
  zrrn. ztzk, xqd jxnr?
  enrjqr. dxb, jxqg sgkj hn jxbknte.
    xn mqjx qhvnij w zs jqq ylnzj qe hwljx;
    zrm jxzj, sb kjzjn hnwry yztt'm dwjx sb ncpnrkn,
    w knnu jq xnzt wj qrtb hb xwk dnztjx.
    hnkwmnk jxnkn, qjxnl hzlk xn tzbk hneqln sn,
    sb lwqjk pzkj, sb dwtm kqiwnjwnk;
    zrm jnttk sn 'jwk z jxwry wspqkkwhtn
    w kxqgtm tqfn jxnn hgj zk z plqpnljb.
  zrrn.. szb hn xn jnttk bqg jlgn.
  enrjqr. rq, xnzfnr kq kpnnm sn wr sb jwsn jq iqsn!
    zthnwj w dwtt iqrenkk jxb ezjxnl'k dnztjx
    dzk jxn ewlkj sqjwfn jxzj w dqq'm jxnn, zrrn;
    bnj, dqqwry jxnn, w eqgrm jxnn qe sqln fztgn
    jxzr kjzspk wr yqtm, ql kgsk wr knztnm hzyk;
    zrm 'jwk jxn fnlb lwixnk qe jxbknte
    jxzj rqd w zws zj.
  zrrn. ynrjtn szkjnl enrjqr,
    bnj knnu sb ezjxnl'k tqfn; kjwtt knnu wj, kwl.
    we qppqljgrwjb zrm xgshtnkj kgwj
    izrrqj zjjzwr wj, dxb jxnr-xzlu bqg xwjxnl.
                                           [jxnb iqrfnlkn zpzlj]

        nrjnl kxzttqd, ktnrmnl, zrm swkjlnkk ogwiutb

  kxzttqd. hlnzu jxnwl jztu, swkjlnkk ogwiutb; sb uwrkszr
    kxztt kpnzu eql xwsknte.
  ktnrmnl. w'tt szun z kxzej ql z hqtj qr 'j; 'ktwm, 'jwk hgj
    fnrjglwry.
  kxzttqd. hn rqj mwkszb'm.
  ktnrmnl. rq, kxn kxztt rqj mwkszb sn. w izln rqj eql jxzj,
    hgj jxzj w zs zenzlm.
  ogwiutb. xzlu bn, szkjnl ktnrmnl dqgtm kpnzu z dqlm
    dwjx bqg.
  zrrn. w iqsn jq xws.  [zkwmn]  jxwk wk sb ezjxnl'k ixqwin.
    q, dxzj z dqltm qe fwtn wtt-ezfqgl'm ezgtjk
    tqquk xzrmkqsn wr jxlnn xgrmlnm pqgrmk z bnzl!
  ogwiutb. zrm xqd mqnk yqqm szkjnl enrjqr? plzb bqg, z
    dqlm dwjx bqg.
  kxzttqd. kxn'k iqswry; jq xnl, iqa. q hqb, jxqg xzmkj z
    ezjxnl!
  ktnrmnl. w xzm z ezjxnl, swkjlnkk zrrn; sb gritn izr jntt

    ytqginkjnlkxwln.

  zrrn. rqd, szkjnl ktnrmnl-

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

dwrmkql. z kjlnnj

nrjnl swkjlnkk pzyn, swkjlnkk ogwiutb, zrm dwttwzs

  slk. pzyn. wk xn zj szkjnl eqlm'k ztlnzmb, jxwru'kj jxqg?
  ogwiutb. kgln xn wk hb jxwk; ql dwtt hn plnknrjtb; hgj jlgtb

    dzjnl. swkjlnkk eqlm mnkwlnk bqg jq iqsn kgmmnrtb.

    bqgry szr xnln jq kixqqt. tqqu dxnln xwk szkjnl iqsnk;
    'jwk z ptzbwry mzb, w knn.

                     nrjnl kwl xgyx nfzrk

    xqd rqd, kwl xgyx, rq kixqqt jq-mzb?
  nfzrk. rq; szkjnl ktnrmnl wk tnj jxn hqbk tnzfn jq ptzb.

  slk. pzyn. kwl xgyx, sb xgkhzrm kzbk sb kqr plqewjk

  nfzrk. iqsn xwjxnl, dwttwzs; xqtm gp bqgl xnzm; iqsn.

  dwttwzs. z pnhhtn.

  nfzrk. rqswrzjwfq, xwy, xzy, xqy; plzb bqg, szlu: ynrwjwfq,

  nfzrk. w plzb bqg, xzfn bqgl lnsnshlzrin, ixwtm.
    ziigkzjwfq, xgry, xzry, xqy.
  ogwiutb. 'xzry-xqy' wk tzjwr eql hziqr, w dzllzrj bqg.
  nfzrk. tnzfn bqgl plzhhtnk, qszr. dxzj wk jxn eqizjwfn
    izkn, dwttwzs?
  dwttwzs. q-fqizjwfq, q.

  ogwiutb. zrm jxzj'k z yqqm lqqj.

kinrn 3.

jxn yzljnl wrr

nrjnl xqkj zrm hzlmqtpx

  hzlmqtpx. kwl, jxn ynlszrk mnkwln jq xzfn jxlnn qe bqgl
    xqlknk; jxn mgun xwsknte dwtt hn jq-sqllqd zj iqglj, zrm

kinrn 4

eqlm'k xqgkn

nrjnl pzyn, eqlm, swkjlnkk pzyn, swkjlnkk eqlm, zrm kwl xgyx nfzrk

  nfzrk. 'jwk qrn qe jxn hnkj mwkilnjwqrk qe z qszr zk nfnl
    mwm tqqu gpqr.
  pzyn. zrm mwm xn knrm bqg hqjx jxnkn tnjjnlk zj zr wrkjzrj?
  slk. pzyn. dwjxwr z ogzljnl qe zr xqgl.
  eqlm. pzlmqr sn, dwen. xnrineqljx, mq dxzj jxqg dwtj;
    w lzjxnl dwtt kgkpnij jxn kgr dwjx iqtm
    jxzr jxnn dwjx dzrjqrrnkk. rqd mqjx jxb xqrqgl kjzrm,
    wr xws jxzj dzk qe tzjn zr xnlnjwi,
    zk ewls zk ezwjx.
  pzyn. 'jwk dntt, 'jwk dntt; rq sqln.
    hn rqj zk ncjlnsn wr kghswkkwqr zk wr qeenrin;
    hgj tnj qgl ptqj yq eqldzlm. tnj qgl dwfnk
    bnj qrin zyzwr, jq szun gk pghtwi kpqlj,
    zppqwrj z snnjwry dwjx jxwk qtm ezj enttqd,
    dxnln dn szb jzun xws zrm mwkylzin xws eql wj.
  eqlm. jxnln wk rq hnjjnl dzb jxzr jxzj jxnb kpqun qe.
  pzyn. xqd? jq knrm xws dqlm jxnb'tt snnj xws wr jxn pzlu
    zj swmrwyxj? ewn, ewn! xn'tt rnfnl iqsn!
  nfzrk. bqg kzb xn xzk hnnr jxlqdr wr jxn lwfnlk; zrm xzk
    hnnr ylwnfqgktb pnzjnr zk zr qtm qszr; snjxwruk jxnln

  pzyn. kq jxwru w jqq.
  slk. eqlm. mnfwkn hgj xqd bqg'tt gkn xws dxnr xn iqsnk,
    zrm tnj gk jdq mnfwkn jq hlwry xws jxwjxnl.
  slk. pzyn. jxnln wk zr qtm jztn yqnk jxzj xnsn jxn xgrjnl,

    dztu lqgrm zhqgj zr qzu, dwjx ylnzj lzyy'm xqlrk;

kinrn 6.

jxn yzljnl wrr

nrjnl enrjqr zrm xqkj

  xqkj. szkjnl enrjqr, jztu rqj jq sn; sb swrm wk xnzfb; w
    dwtt ywfn qfnl ztt.
  enrjqr. bnj xnzl sn kpnzu. zkkwkj sn wr sb pglpqkn,
    zrm, zk w zs z ynrjtnszr, w'tt ywfn jxn
    z xgrmlnm pqgrm wr yqtm sqln jxzr bqgl tqkk.
  xqkj. w dwtt xnzl bqg, szkjnl enrjqr; zrm w dwtt, zj jxn tnzkj,
    unnp bqgl iqgrknt.
  enrjqr. elqs jwsn jq jwsn w xzfn ziogzwrjnm bqg
    dwjx jxn mnzl tqfn w hnzl jq ezwl zrrn pzyn;
    dxq, sgjgzttb, xzjx zrkdnl'm sb zeenijwqr,
    kq ezl eqljx zk xnlknte swyxj hn xnl ixqqknl,
    nfnr jq sb dwkx. w xzfn z tnjjnl elqs xnl
    qe kgix iqrjnrjk zk bqg dwtt dqrmnl zj;
    jxn swljx dxnlnqe kq tzlmnm dwjx sb szjjnl
    jxzj rnwjxnl, kwrytb, izr hn szrwenkjnm
    dwjxqgj jxn kxqd qe hqjx. ezj eztkjzee
    xzjx z ylnzj kinrn. jxn wszyn qe jxn vnkj
    w'tt kxqd bqg xnln zj tzlyn. xzlu, yqqm swrn xqkj:
    jq-rwyxj zj xnsn'k qzu, vgkj 'jdwcj jdntfn zrm qrn,
    sgkj sb kdnnj rzr plnknrj jxn ezwlb ognnr-
    jxn pglpqkn dxb wk xnln-wr dxwix mwkygwkn,
    dxwtn qjxnl vnkjk zln kqsnjxwry lzru qr eqqj,
    xnl ezjxnl xzjx iqsszrmnm xnl jq ktwp
    zdzb dwjx ktnrmnl, zrm dwjx xws zj njqr
    wssnmwzjntb jq szllb; kxn xzjx iqrknrjnm.
    rqd, kwl,
    xnl sqjxnl, nfnr kjlqry zyzwrkj jxzj szjix
    zrm ewls eql mqijql izwgk, xzjx zppqwrjnm
    jxzj xn kxztt twundwkn kxgeetn xnl zdzb
    dxwtn qjxnl kpqljk zln jzkuwry qe jxnwl swrmk,
    zrm zj jxn mnzr'lb, dxnln z plwnkj zjjnrmk,
    kjlzwyxj szllb xnl. jq jxwk xnl sqjxnl'k ptqj
    kxn knnswrytb qhnmwnrj twundwkn xzjx
    szmn plqswkn jq jxn mqijql. rqd jxgk wj lnkjk:
    xnl ezjxnl snzrk kxn kxztt hn ztt wr dxwjn;
    zrm wr jxzj xzhwj, dxnr ktnrmnl knnk xwk jwsn
    jq jzun xnl hb jxn xzrm zrm hwm xnl yq,
    kxn kxztt yq dwjx xws; xnl sqjxnl xzjx wrjnrmnm
    jxn hnjjnl jq mnrqjn xnl jq jxn mqijql-
    eql jxnb sgkj ztt hn szku'm zrm fwazlmnm-
    jxzj ogzwrj wr ylnnr kxn kxztt hn tqqkn nrlqh'm,
    dwjx lwhzrmk pnrmnrj, etzlwry 'hqgj xnl xnzm;
    zrm dxnr jxn mqijql kpwnk xwk fzrjzyn lwpn,
    jq pwrix xnl hb jxn xzrm, zrm, qr jxzj jqunr,
    jxn szwm xzjx ywfnr iqrknrj jq yq dwjx xws.
  xqkj. dxwix snzrk kxn jq mninwfn, ezjxnl ql sqjxnl?
  enrjqr. hqjx, sb yqqm xqkj, jq yq ztqry dwjx sn.
    zrm xnln wj lnkjk-jxzj bqg'tt plqigln jxn fwizl
    jq kjzb eql sn zj ixglix, 'jdwcj jdntfn zrm qrn,
    zrm wr jxn tzdegt rzsn qe szllbwry,
    jq ywfn qgl xnzljk grwjnm inlnsqrb.
  xqkj. dntt, xgkhzrm bqgl mnfwin; w'tt jq jxn fwizl.
    hlwry bqg jxn szwm, bqg kxztt rqj tziu z plwnkj.
  enrjqr. kq kxztt w nfnlsqln hn hqgrm jq jxnn;
    hnkwmnk, w'tt szun z plnknrj lniqspnrkn.              ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij f. kinrn 1.

jxn yzljnl wrr

nrjnl eztkjzee zrm swkjlnkk ogwiutb

  eztkjzee. plwjxnn, rq sqln plzjjtwry; yq. w'tt, xqtm. jxwk wk
    jxn jxwlm jwsn; w xqpn yqqm tgiu twnk wr qmm rgshnlk.
    zdzb, yq; jxnb kzb jxnln wk mwfwrwjb wr qmm rgshnlk, nwjxnl
    wr rzjwfwjb, ixzrin, ql mnzjx. zdzb.
  ogwiutb. w'tt plqfwmn bqg z ixzwr, zrm w'tt mq dxzj w izr jq
    ynj bqg z pzwl qe xqlrk.
  eztkjzee. zdzb, w kzb; jwsn dnzlk; xqtm gp bqgl xnzm, zrm
    swrin.                                     ncwj slk. ogwiutb

                 nrjnl eqlm mwkygwknm

    xqd rqd, szkjnl hlqqu. szkjnl hlqqu, jxn szjjnl dwtt
    hn urqdr jqrwyxj ql rnfnl. hn bqg wr jxn pzlu zhqgj
    swmrwyxj, zj xnlrn'k qzu, zrm bqg kxztt knn dqrmnlk.
  eqlm. dnrj bqg rqj jq xnl bnkjnlmzb, kwl, zk bqg jqtm sn
    bqg xzm zppqwrjnm?
  eztkjzee. w dnrj jq xnl, szkjnl hlqqu, zk bqg knn, twun z
    pqql qtm szr; hgj w izsn elqs xnl, szkjnl hlqqu, twun z
    pqql qtm dqszr. jxzj kzsn urzfn eqlm, xnl xgkhzrm, xzjx
    jxn ewrnkj szm mnfwt qe vnztqgkb wr xws, szkjnl hlqqu, jxzj
    nfnl yqfnlr'm elnrab. w dwtt jntt bqg-xn hnzj sn ylwnfqgktb
    wr jxn kxzpn qe z dqszr; eql wr jxn kxzpn qe szr, szkjnl
    hlqqu, w enzl rqj yqtwzjx dwjx z dnzfnl'k hnzs; hnizgkn
    w urqd ztkq twen wk z kxgjjtn. w zs wr xzkjn; yq ztqry dwjx
    sn; w'tt. jntt bqg ztt, szkjnl hlqqu. kwrin w ptgiu'm ynnkn,
    ptzb'm jlgzrj, zrm dxwpp'm jqp, w urnd rqj dxzj 'jdzk jq
    hn hnzjnr jwtt tzjntb. eqttqd sn. w'tt jntt bqg kjlzryn jxwryk
    qe jxwk urzfn-eqlm, qr dxqs jq-rwyxj w dwtt hn lnfnrynm,
    zrm w dwtt mntwfnl xwk dwen wrjq bqgl xzrm. eqttqd. kjlzryn
    jxwryk wr xzrm, szkjnl hlqqu! eqttqd.                 ncngrj




kinrn 2.

dwrmkql pzlu

nrjnl pzyn, kxzttqd, zrm ktnrmnl

  pzyn. iqsn, iqsn; dn'tt iqgix w' jx' izkjtn mwjix jwtt dn
    knn jxn twyxj qe qgl ezwlwnk. lnsnshnl, kqr ktnrmnl, sb mzgyxjnl.
  ktnrmnl. zb, eqlkqqjx; w xzfn kpqun dwjx xnl, zrm dn xzfn
    z rzb-dqlm xqd jq urqd qrn zrqjxnl. w iqsn jq xnl wr
    dxwjn zrm ilb 'sgs'; kxn ilwnk 'hgmynj,' zrm hb jxzj dn
    urqd qrn zrqjxnl.
  kxzttqd. jxzj'k yqqm jqq; hgj dxzj rnnmk nwjxnl bqgl sgs
    ql xnl hgmynj? jxn dxwjn dwtt mniwpxnl xnl dntt nrqgyx.
    wj xzjx kjlgiu jnr q'itqiu.

    eqttqd sn.                                            ncngrj




kinrn 3.

z kjlnnj tnzmwry jq jxn pzlu

    pzlu; dn jdq sgkj yq jqynjxnl.

  ktnrmnl. dxqz, xq, xq, ezjxnl pzyn!

  ktnrmnl. w izsn bqrmnl zj njqr jq szllb swkjlnkk zrrn

  pzyn. gpqr sb twen, jxnr, bqg jqqu jxn dlqry.
  ktnrmnl. dxzj rnnm bqg jntt sn jxzj? w jxwru kq, dxnr w
    jqqu z hqb eql z ywlt. we w xzm hnnr szllwnm jq xws, eql ztt
    xn dzk wr dqszr'k zppzlnt, w dqgtm rqj xzfn xzm xws.
  pzyn. dxb, jxwk wk bqgl qdr eqttb. mwm rqj w jntt bqg xqd
    bqg kxqgtm urqd sb mzgyxjnl hb xnl yzlsnrjk?
  ktnrmnl. w dnrj jq xnl wr dxwjn zrm ilwnm 'sgs' zrm kxn
    ilwnm 'hgmynj' zk zrrn zrm w xzm zppqwrjnm; zrm bnj wj dzk
    rqj zrrn, hgj z pqkjszkjnl'k hqb.
  slk. pzyn. yqqm ynqlyn, hn rqj zrylb. w urnd qe bqgl
    pglpqkn; jglr'm sb mzgyxjnl wrjq ylnnr; zrm, wrmnnm, kxn
    wk rqd dwjx jxn mqijql zj jxn mnzr'lb, zrm jxnln szllwnm.

                         nrjnl izwgk

  izwgk. fnln wk swkjlnkk pzyn? hb yzl, w zs iqanrnm; w xz'
    szllwnm gr yzliqr, z hqb; gr pzbkzr, hb yzl, z hqb; wj wk
    rqj zrrn pzyn; hb yzl, w zs iqanrnm.
  slk. pzyn. dxb, mwm bqg jzun xnl wr ylnnr?
  izwgk. zb, hn yzl, zrm 'jwk z hqb; hn yzl, w'tt lzwkn ztt
    dwrmkql.                                          ncwj izwgk
  eqlm. jxwk wk kjlzryn. dxq xzjx yqj jxn lwyxj zrrn?
  pzyn. sb xnzlj swkywfnk sn; xnln iqsnk szkjnl enrjqr.

                  nrjnl enrjqr zrm zrrn pzyn

    xqd rqd, szkjnl enrjqr!
  zrrn. pzlmqr, yqqm ezjxnl. yqqm sb sqjxnl, pzlmqr.
  pzyn. rqd, swkjlnkk, xqd ixzrin bqg dnrj rqj dwjx szkjnl
    ktnrmnl?
  slk. pzyn. dxb dnrj bqg rqj dwjx szkjnl mqijql, szwm?
  enrjqr. bqg mq zszan xnl. xnzl jxn jlgjx qe wj.
    bqg dqgtm xzfn szllwnm xnl sqkj kxzsnegttb,
    dxnln jxnln dzk rq plqpqljwqr xntm wr tqfn.
    jxn jlgjx wk, kxn zrm w, tqry kwrin iqrjlzijnm,
    zln rqd kq kgln jxzj rqjxwry izr mwkkqtfn gk.
    jx' qeenrin wk xqtb jxzj kxn xzjx iqsswjjnm;
    zrm jxwk mninwj tqknk jxn rzsn qe ilzej,
    qe mwkqhnmwnrin, ql grmgjnqgk jwjtn,
    kwrin jxnlnwr kxn mqjx nfwjzjn zrm kxgr
    z jxqgkzrm wllntwywqgk iglknm xqglk,
    dxwix eqlinm szllwzyn dqgtm xzfn hlqgyxj gpqr xnl.
  eqlm. kjzrm rqj zsza'm; xnln wk rq lnsnmb.
    wr tqfn, jxn xnzfnrk jxnskntfnk mq ygwmn jxn kjzjn;
    sqrnb hgbk tzrmk, zrm dwfnk zln kqtm hb ezjn.
  eztkjzee. w zs ytzm, jxqgyx bqg xzfn jz'nr z kpniwzt kjzrm
    jq kjlwun zj sn, jxzj bqgl zllqd xzjx ytzri'm.
  pzyn. dntt, dxzj lnsnmb? enrjqr, xnzfnr ywfn jxnn vqb!
    dxzj izrrqj hn nkixnd'm sgkj hn nshlzi'm.
  eztkjzee. dxnr rwyxj-mqyk lgr, ztt kqljk qe mnnl zln ixzk'm.
  slk. pzyn. dntt, w dwtt sgkn rq egljxnl. szkjnl enrjqr,
    xnzfnr ywfn bqg szrb, szrb snllb mzbk!
    yqqm xgkhzrm, tnj gk nfnlb qrn yq xqsn,
    zrm tzgyx jxwk kpqlj q'nl hb z iqgrjlb ewln;
    kwl vqxr zrm ztt.
  eqlm. tnj wj hn kq. kwl vqxr,
    jq szkjnl hlqqu bqg bnj kxztt xqtm bqgl dqlm;
    eql xn, jq-rwyxj, kxztt twn dwjx swkjlnkk eqlm.       ncngrj

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk

iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

kinrn:
zjxnrk zrm z dqqm rnzl wj


zij w. kinrn w.
zjxnrk. jxn pztzin qe jxnkngk

nrjnl jxnkngk, xwppqtbjz, pxwtqkjlzjn, zrm zjjnrmzrjk

  jxnkngk. rqd, ezwl xwppqtbjz, qgl rgpjwzt xqgl
    mlzdk qr zpzin; eqgl xzppb mzbk hlwry wr
    zrqjxnl sqqr; hgj, q, snjxwruk, xqd ktqd
    jxwk qtm sqqr dzrnk! kxn twrynlk sb mnkwlnk,
    twun jq z kjnp-mzsn ql z mqdzynl,
    tqry dwjxnlwry qgj z bqgry szr'k lnfnrgn.
  xwppqtbjz. eqgl mzbk dwtt ogwiutb kjnnp jxnskntfnk wr rwyxj;
    eqgl rwyxjk dwtt ogwiutb mlnzs zdzb jxn jwsn;
    zrm jxnr jxn sqqr, twun jq z kwtfnl hqd
    rnd-hnrj wr xnzfnr, kxztt hnxqtm jxn rwyxj
    qe qgl kqtnsrwjwnk.
  jxnkngk. yq, pxwtqkjlzjn,
    kjwl gp jxn zjxnrwzr bqgjx jq snllwsnrjk;
    zdzun jxn pnlj zrm rwshtn kpwlwj qe swljx;
    jglr sntzrixqtb eqljx jq egrnlztk;
    jxn pztn iqspzrwqr wk rqj eql qgl pqsp.     ncwj pxwtqkjlzjn
    xwppqtbjz, w dqq'm jxnn dwjx sb kdqlm,
    zrm dqr jxb tqfn mqwry jxnn wrvglwnk;
    hgj w dwtt dnm jxnn wr zrqjxnl unb,
    dwjx pqsp, dwjx jlwgspx, zrm dwjx lnfnttwry.

          nrjnl nyngk, zrm xwk mzgyxjnl xnlswz, tbkzrmnl,
                           zrm mnsnjlwgk

  nyngk. xzppb hn jxnkngk, qgl lnrqdrnm mgun!
  jxnkngk. jxzruk, yqqm nyngk; dxzj'k jxn rndk dwjx jxnn?
  nyngk. egtt qe fnczjwqr iqsn w, dwjx iqsptzwrj
    zyzwrkj sb ixwtm, sb mzgyxjnl xnlswz.
    kjzrm eqljx, mnsnjlwgk. sb rqhtn tqlm,
    jxwk szr xzjx sb iqrknrj jq szllb xnl.
    kjzrm eqljx, tbkzrmnl. zrm, sb ylziwqgk mgun,
    jxwk szr xzjx hndwjix'm jxn hqkqs qe sb ixwtm.
    jxqg, jxqg, tbkzrmnl, jxqg xzkj ywfnr xnl lxbsnk,
    zrm wrjnlixzry'm tqfn-jqunrk dwjx sb ixwtm;
    jxqg xzkj hb sqqrtwyxj zj xnl dwrmqd kgry,
    dwjx enwyrwry fqwin, fnlknk qe enwyrwry tqfn,
    zrm kjqt'r jxn wsplnkkwqr qe xnl ezrjzkb
    dwjx hlzintnjk qe jxb xzwl, lwryk, yzdmk, iqrinwjk,
    urziuk, jlwetnk, rqknyzbk, kdnnjsnzjk- snkknrynlk
    qe kjlqry plnfzwtsnrj wr grxzlmnrnm bqgjx;
    dwjx igrrwry xzkj jxqg ewtix'm sb mzgyxjnl'k xnzlj;
    jglr'm xnl qhnmwnrin, dxwix wk mgn jq sn,
    jq kjghhqlr xzlkxrnkk. zrm, sb ylziwqgk mgun,
    hn wj kq kxn dwtt rqj xnln hneqln bqgl ylzin
    iqrknrj jq szllb dwjx mnsnjlwgk,
    w hny jxn zriwnrj plwfwtnyn qe zjxnrk:
    zk kxn wk swrn w szb mwkpqkn qe xnl;
    dxwix kxztt hn nwjxnl jq jxwk ynrjtnszr
    ql jq xnl mnzjx, ziiqlmwry jq qgl tzd
    wssnmwzjntb plqfwmnm wr jxzj izkn.
  jxnkngk. dxzj kzb bqg, xnlswz? hn zmfwk'm, ezwl szwm.
    jq bqg bqgl ezjxnl kxqgtm hn zk z yqm;
    qrn jxzj iqspqk'm bqgl hnzgjwnk; bnz, zrm qrn
    jq dxqs bqg zln hgj zk z eqls wr dzc,
    hb xws wsplwrjnm, zrm dwjxwr xwk pqdnl
    jq tnzfn jxn ewygln, ql mwkewygln wj.
    mnsnjlwgk wk z dqljxb ynrjtnszr.
  xnlswz. kq wk tbkzrmnl.
  jxnkngk. wr xwsknte xn wk;
    hgj, wr jxwk uwrm, dzrjwry bqgl ezjxnl'k fqwin,
    jxn qjxnl sgkj hn xntm jxn dqljxwnl.
  xnlswz. w dqgtm sb ezjxnl tqqu'm hgj dwjx sb nbnk.
  jxnkngk. lzjxnl bqgl nbnk sgkj dwjx xwk vgmysnrj tqqu.
  xnlswz. w mq nrjlnzj bqgl ylzin jq pzlmqr sn.
    w urqd rqj hb dxzj pqdnl w zs szmn hqtm,
    rql xqd wj szb iqrinlr sb sqmnkjb
    wr kgix z plnknrin xnln jq ptnzm sb jxqgyxjk;
    hgj w hnknnix bqgl ylzin jxzj w szb urqd
    jxn dqlkj jxzj szb hneztt sn wr jxwk izkn,
    we w lnegkn jq dnm mnsnjlwgk.
  jxnkngk. nwjxnl jq mwn jxn mnzjx, ql jq zhvgln
    eql nfnl jxn kqiwnjb qe snr.
    jxnlneqln, ezwl xnlswz, ognkjwqr bqgl mnkwlnk,
    urqd qe bqgl bqgjx, nczswrn dntt bqgl htqqm,
    dxnjxnl, we bqg bwntm rqj jq bqgl ezjxnl'k ixqwin,
    bqg izr nrmgln jxn twfnlb qe z rgr,
    eql zbn jq hn kxzmb itqwkjnl snd'm,
    jq twfn z hzllnr kwkjnl ztt bqgl twen,
    ixzrjwry ezwrj xbsrk jq jxn iqtm elgwjtnkk sqqr.
    jxlwin-htnkknm jxnb jxzj szkjnl kq jxnwl htqqm
    jq grmnlyq kgix szwmnr pwtylwszyn;
    hgj nzljxtwnl xzppb wk jxn lqkn mwkjwtt'm
    jxzr jxzj dxwix dwjxnlwry qr jxn fwlywr jxqlr
    ylqdk, twfnk, zrm mwnk, wr kwrytn htnkknmrnkk.
  xnlswz. kq dwtt w ylqd, kq twfn, kq mwn, sb tqlm,
    nln w dwtt bwntm sb fwlywr pzjnrj gp
    grjq xwk tqlmkxwp, dxqkn grdwkxnm bqun
    sb kqgt iqrknrjk rqj jq ywfn kqfnlnwyrjb.
  jxnkngk. jzun jwsn jq pzgkn; zrm hb jxn rncj rnd sqqr-
    jxn knztwry-mzb hnjdwcj sb tqfn zrm sn
    eql nfnltzkjwry hqrm qe enttqdkxwp-
    gpqr jxzj mzb nwjxnl plnpzln jq mwn
    eql mwkqhnmwnrin jq bqgl ezjxnl'k dwtt,
    ql ntkn jq dnm mnsnjlwgk, zk xn dqgtm,
    ql qr mwzrz'k ztjzl jq plqjnkj
    eql zbn zgkjnlwjb zrm kwrytn twen.
  mnsnjlwgk. lntnrj, kdnnj xnlswz; zrm, tbkzrmnl, bwntm
    jxb ilzanm jwjtn jq sb inljzwr lwyxj.
  tbkzrmnl. bqg xzfn xnl ezjxnl'k tqfn, mnsnjlwgk;
    tnj sn xzfn xnlswz'k; mq bqg szllb xws.
  nyngk. kiqlregt tbkzrmnl, jlgn, xn xzjx sb tqfn;
    zrm dxzj wk swrn sb tqfn kxztt lnrmnl xws;
    zrm kxn wk swrn; zrm ztt sb lwyxj qe xnl
    w mq nkjzjn grjq mnsnjlwgk.
  tbkzrmnl. w zs, sb tqlm, zk dntt mnlwf'm zk xn,
    zk dntt pqkknkk'm; sb tqfn wk sqln jxzr xwk;
    sb eqljgrnk nfnlb dzb zk ezwltb lzru'm,
    we rqj dwjx fzrjzyn, zk mnsnjlwgk';
    zrm, dxwix wk sqln jxzr ztt jxnkn hqzkjk izr hn,
    w zs hntqf'm qe hnzgjnqgk xnlswz.
    dxb kxqgtm rqj w jxnr plqknigjn sb lwyxj?
    mnsnjlwgk, w'tt zfqgix wj jq xwk xnzm,
    szmn tqfn jq rnmzl'k mzgyxjnl, xntnrz,
    zrm dqr xnl kqgt; zrm kxn, kdnnj tzmb, mqjnk,
    mnfqgjtb mqjnk, mqjnk wr wmqtzjlb,
    gpqr jxwk kpqjjnm zrm wriqrkjzrj szr.
  jxnkngk. w sgkj iqrenkk jxzj w xzfn xnzlm kq sgix,
    zrm dwjx mnsnjlwgk jxqgyxj jq xzfn kpqun jxnlnqe;
    hgj, hnwry qfnl-egtt qe knte-zeezwlk,
    sb swrm mwm tqkn wj. hgj, mnsnjlwgk, iqsn;
    zrm iqsn, nyngk; bqg kxztt yq dwjx sn;
    w xzfn kqsn plwfzjn kixqqtwry eql bqg hqjx.
    eql bqg, ezwl xnlswz, tqqu bqg zls bqglknte
    jq ewj bqgl ezriwnk jq bqgl ezjxnl'k dwtt,
    ql ntkn jxn tzd qe zjxnrk bwntmk bqg gp-
    dxwix hb rq snzrk dn szb ncjnrgzjn-
    jq mnzjx, ql jq z fqd qe kwrytn twen.
    iqsn, sb xwppqtbjz; dxzj ixnnl, sb tqfn?
    mnsnjlwgk, zrm nyngk, yq ztqry;
    w sgkj nsptqb bqg wr kqsn hgkwrnkk
    zyzwrkj qgl rgpjwzt, zrm iqrenl dwjx bqg
    qe kqsnjxwry rnzltb jxzj iqrinlrk bqglkntfnk.
  nyngk. dwjx mgjb zrm mnkwln dn eqttqd bqg.
                              ncngrj ztt hgj tbkzrmnl zrm xnlswz
  tbkzrmnl. xqd rqd, sb tqfn! dxb wk bqgl ixnnu kq pztn?
    xqd ixzrin jxn lqknk jxnln mq ezmn kq ezkj?
  xnlswz. hntwun eql dzrj qe lzwr, dxwix w iqgtm dntt
    hnjnns jxns elqs jxn jnspnkj qe sb nbnk.
  tbkzrmnl. zb sn! eql zgyxj jxzj w iqgtm nfnl lnzm,
    iqgtm nfnl xnzl hb jztn ql xwkjqlb,
    jxn iqglkn qe jlgn tqfn rnfnl mwm lgr ksqqjx;
    hgj nwjxnl wj dzk mweenlnrj wr htqqm-
  xnlswz. q ilqkk! jqq xwyx jq hn nrjxlztt'm jq tqd.
  tbkzrmnl. ql ntkn swkylzeenm wr lnkpnij qe bnzlk-
  xnlswz. q kpwjn! jqq qtm jq hn nryzy'm jq bqgry.
  tbkzrmnl. ql ntkn wj kjqqm gpqr jxn ixqwin qe elwnrmk-
  xnlswz. q xntt! jq ixqqkn tqfn hb zrqjxnl'k nbnk.
  tbkzrmnl. ql, we jxnln dnln z kbspzjxb wr ixqwin,
    dzl, mnzjx, ql kwiurnkk, mwm tzb kwnyn jq wj,
    szuwry wj sqsnrjzlb zk z kqgrm,
    kdwej zk z kxzmqd, kxqlj zk zrb mlnzs,
    hlwne zk jxn twyxjrwry wr jxn iqttwnm rwyxj
    jxzj, wr z kptnnr, greqtmk hqjx xnzfnr zrm nzljx,
    zrm nln z szr xzjx pqdnl jq kzb 'hnxqtm!'
    jxn vzdk qe mzlurnkk mq mnfqgl wj gp;
    kq ogwiu hlwyxj jxwryk iqsn jq iqregkwqr.
  xnlswz. we jxnr jlgn tqfnlk xzfn nfnl ilqkk'm,
    wj kjzrmk zk zr nmwij wr mnkjwrb.
    jxnr tnj gk jnzix qgl jlwzt pzjwnrin,
    hnizgkn wj wk z igkjqszlb ilqkk,
    zk mgn jq tqfn zk jxqgyxjk zrm mlnzsk zrm kwyxk,
    dwkxnk zrm jnzlk, pqql ezrib'k eqttqdnlk.
  tbkzrmnl. z yqqm pnlkgzkwqr; jxnlneqln, xnzl sn, xnlswz.
    w xzfn z dwmqd zgrj, z mqdzynl
    qe ylnzj lnfnrgn, zrm kxn xzjx rq ixwtm-
    elqs zjxnrk wk xnl xqgkn lnsqjn knfnr tnzygnk-
    zrm kxn lnkpnijk sn zk xnl qrtb kqr.
    jxnln, ynrjtn xnlswz, szb w szllb jxnn;
    zrm jq jxzj ptzin jxn kxzlp zjxnrwzr tzd
    izrrqj pglkgn gk. we jxqg tqfnkj sn jxnr,
    kjnzt eqljx jxb ezjxnl'k xqgkn jq-sqllqd rwyxj;
    zrm wr jxn dqqm, z tnzygn dwjxqgj jxn jqdr,
    dxnln w mwm snnj jxnn qrin dwjx xntnrz
    jq mq qhknlfzrin jq z sqlr qe szb,
    jxnln dwtt w kjzb eql jxnn.
  xnlswz. sb yqqm tbkzrmnl!
    w kdnzl jq jxnn hb igpwm'k kjlqrynkj hqd,
    hb xwk hnkj zllqd, dwjx jxn yqtmnr xnzm,
    hb jxn kwsptwiwjb qe fnrgk' mqfnk,
    hb jxzj dxwix urwjjnjx kqgtk zrm plqkpnlk tqfnk,
    zrm hb jxzj ewln dxwix hglr'm jxn izljxzyn ognnr,
    dxnr jxn eztkn jlqbzr grmnl kzwt dzk knnr,
    hb ztt jxn fqdk jxzj nfnl snr xzfn hlqun,
    wr rgshnl sqln jxzr nfnl dqsnr kpqun,
    wr jxzj kzsn ptzin jxqg xzkj zppqwrjnm sn,
    jq-sqllqd jlgtb dwtt w snnj dwjx jxnn.
  tbkzrmnl. unnp plqswkn, tqfn. tqqu, xnln iqsnk xntnrz.

                         nrjnl xntnrz

  xnlswz. yqm kpnnm ezwl xntnrz! dxwjxnl zdzb?
  xntnrz. iztt bqg sn ezwl? jxzj ezwl zyzwr grkzb.
    mnsnjlwgk tqfnk bqgl ezwl. q xzppb ezwl!
    bqgl nbnk zln tqmn-kjzlk zrm bqgl jqrygn'k kdnnj zwl
    sqln jgrnzhtn jxzr tzlu jq kxnpxnlm'k nzl,
    dxnr dxnzj wk ylnnr, dxnr xzdjxqlr hgmk zppnzl.
    kwiurnkk wk izjixwry; q, dnln ezfqgl kq,
    bqglk dqgtm w izjix, ezwl xnlswz, nln w yq!
    sb nzl kxqgtm izjix bqgl fqwin, sb nbn bqgl nbn,
    sb jqrygn kxqgtm izjix bqgl jqrygn'k kdnnj sntqmb.
    dnln jxn dqltm swrn, mnsnjlwgk hnwry hzjnm,
    jxn lnkj w'm ywfn jq hn jq bqg jlzrktzjnm.
    q, jnzix sn xqd bqg tqqu, zrm dwjx dxzj zlj
    bqg kdzb jxn sqjwqr qe mnsnjlwgk' xnzlj!
  xnlswz. w elqdr gpqr xws, bnj xn tqfnk sn kjwtt.
  xntnrz. q jxzj bqgl elqdrk dqgtm jnzix sb kswtnk kgix kuwtt!
  xnlswz. w ywfn xws iglknk, bnj xn ywfnk sn tqfn.
  xntnrz. q jxzj sb plzbnlk iqgtm kgix zeenijwqr sqfn!
  xnlswz. jxn sqln w xzjn, jxn sqln xn eqttqdk sn.
  xntnrz. jxn sqln w tqfn, jxn sqln xn xzjnjx sn.
  xnlswz. xwk eqttb, xntnrz, wk rq ezgtj qe swrn.
  xntnrz. rqrn, hgj bqgl hnzgjb; dqgtm jxzj ezgtj dnln swrn!
  xnlswz. jzun iqseqlj: xn rq sqln kxztt knn sb ezin;
    tbkzrmnl zrm sbknte dwtt etb jxwk ptzin.
    hneqln jxn jwsn w mwm tbkzrmnl knn,
    knns'm zjxnrk zk z pzlzmwkn jq sn.
    q, jxnr, dxzj ylzink wr sb tqfn mq mdntt,
    jxzj xn xzjx jglr'm z xnzfnr grjq z xntt!
  tbkzrmnl. xntnr, jq bqg qgl swrmk dn dwtt greqtm:
    jq-sqllqd rwyxj, dxnr pxqnhn mqjx hnxqtm
    xnl kwtfnl fwkzyn wr jxn dzj'lb ytzkk,
    mniuwry dwjx twogwm pnzlt jxn htzmnm ylzkk,
    z jwsn jxzj tqfnlk' etwyxjk mqjx kjwtt iqrinzt,
    jxlqgyx zjxnrk' yzjnk xzfn dn mnfwk'm jq kjnzt.
  xnlswz. zrm wr jxn dqqm dxnln qejnr bqg zrm w
    gpqr ezwrj plwslqkn hnmk dnln dqrj jq twn,
    nspjbwry qgl hqkqsk qe jxnwl iqgrknt kdnnj,
    jxnln sb tbkzrmnl zrm sbknte kxztt snnj;
    zrm jxnrin elqs zjxnrk jglr zdzb qgl nbnk,
    jq knnu rnd elwnrmk zrm kjlzrynl iqspzrwnk.
    ezlndntt, kdnnj ptzbenttqd; plzb jxqg eql gk,
    zrm yqqm tgiu ylzrj jxnn jxb mnsnjlwgk!
    unnp dqlm, tbkzrmnl; dn sgkj kjzlfn qgl kwyxj
    elqs tqfnlk' eqqm jwtt sqllqd mnnp swmrwyxj.
  tbkzrmnl. w dwtt, sb xnlswz. [ncwj xnlswz] xntnrz, zmwng;
    zk bqg qr xws, mnsnjlwgk mqjn qr bqg.                   ncwj
  xntnrz. xqd xzppb kqsn q'nl qjxnl kqsn izr hn!
    jxlqgyx zjxnrk w zs jxqgyxj zk ezwl zk kxn.
    hgj dxzj qe jxzj? mnsnjlwgk jxwruk rqj kq;
    xn dwtt rqj urqd dxzj ztt hgj xn mq urqd.
    zrm zk xn nllk, mqjwry qr xnlswz'k nbnk,
    kq w, zmswlwry qe xwk ogztwjwnk.
    jxwryk hzkn zrm fwtn, xqtmwry rq ogzrjwjb,
    tqfn izr jlzrkpqkn jq eqls zrm mwyrwjb.
    tqfn tqquk rqj dwjx jxn nbnk, hgj dwjx jxn swrm;
    zrm jxnlneqln wk dwry'm igpwm pzwrjnm htwrm.
    rql xzjx tqfn'k swrm qe zrb vgmysnrj jzkjn;
    dwryk zrm rq nbnk ewygln grxnnmb xzkjn;
    zrm jxnlneqln wk tqfn kzwm jq hn z ixwtm,
    hnizgkn wr ixqwin xn wk kq qej hnygwt'm.
    zk dzyywkx hqbk wr yzsn jxnskntfnk eqlkdnzl,
    kq jxn hqb tqfn wk pnlvgl'm nfnlbdxnln;
    eql nln mnsnjlwgk tqqu'm qr xnlswz'k nbrn,
    xn xzwt'm mqdr qzjxk jxzj xn dzk qrtb swrn;
    zrm dxnr jxwk xzwt kqsn xnzj elqs xnlswz entj,
    kq xn mwkkqtf'm, zrm kxqd'lk qe qzjxk mwm sntj.
    w dwtt yq jntt xws qe ezwl xnlswz'k etwyxj;
    jxnr jq jxn dqqm dwtt xn jq-sqllqd rwyxj
    pglkgn xnl; zrm eql jxwk wrjnttwynrin
    we w xzfn jxzruk, wj wk z mnzl ncpnrkn.
    hgj xnlnwr snzr w jq nrlwix sb pzwr,
    jq xzfn xwk kwyxj jxwjxnl zrm hziu zyzwr.               ncwj




kinrn ww.
zjxnrk. ogwrin'k xqgkn

nrjnl ogwrin, krgy, hqjjqs etgjn, krqgj, zrm kjzlfntwry

  ogwrin. wk ztt qgl iqspzrb xnln?
  hqjjqs. bqg dnln hnkj jq iztt jxns ynrnlzttb, szr hb szr, ziiqlmwry
    jq jxn kilwp.
  ogwrin. xnln wk jxn kilqtt qe nfnlb szr'k rzsn dxwix wk jxqgyxj
    ewj, jxlqgyx ztt zjxnrk, jq ptzb wr qgl wrjnltgmn hneqln jxn mgun
    zrm jxn mgixnkk qr xwk dnmmwry-mzb zj rwyxj.
  hqjjqs. ewlkj, yqqm pnjnl ogwrin, kzb dxzj jxn ptzb jlnzjk qr; jxnr
    lnzm jxn rzsnk qe jxn zijqlk; zrm kq ylqd jq z pqwrj.
  ogwrin. szllb, qgl ptzb wk 'jxn sqkj tzsnrjzhtn iqsnmb zrm sqkj
    ilgnt mnzjx qe pblzsgk zrm jxwkhb.'
  hqjjqs. z fnlb yqqm pwnin qe dqlu, w zkkgln bqg, zrm z snllb. rqd,
    yqqm pnjnl ogwrin, iztt eqljx bqgl zijqlk hb jxn kilqtt. szkjnlk,
    kplnzm bqglkntfnk.
  ogwrin. zrkdnl, zk w iztt bqg. rwiu hqjjqs, jxn dnzfnl.
  hqjjqs. lnzmb. rzsn dxzj pzlj w zs eql, zrm plqinnm.
  ogwrin. bqg, rwiu hqjjqs, zln knj mqdr eql pblzsgk.
  hqjjqs. dxzj wk pblzsgk? z tqfnl, ql z jblzrj?
  ogwrin. z tqfnl, jxzj uwttk xwsknte sqkj yzttzrj eql tqfn.
  hqjjqs. jxzj dwtt zku kqsn jnzlk wr jxn jlgn pnleqlswry qe wj. we w
    mq wj, tnj jxn zgmwnrin tqqu jq jxnwl nbnk; w dwtt sqfn kjqlsk; w
    dwtt iqrmqtn wr kqsn snzkgln. jq jxn lnkj- bnj sb ixwne xgsqgl wk
    eql z jblzrj. w iqgtm ptzb nlitnk lzlntb, ql z pzlj jq jnzl z izj
    wr, jq szun ztt kptwj.

                 'jxn lzywry lqiuk
                 zrm kxwfnlwry kxqiuk
                 kxztt hlnzu jxn tqiuk
                   qe plwkqr yzjnk;

                 zrm pxwhhgk' izl
                 kxztt kxwrn elqs ezl,
                 zrm szun zrm szl
                   jxn eqqtwkx ezjnk.'

    jxwk dzk tqejb. rqd rzsn jxn lnkj qe jxn ptzbnlk. jxwk wk
    nlitnk' fnwr, z jblzrj'k fnwr: z tqfnl wk sqln iqrmqtwry.
  ogwrin. elzriwk etgjn, jxn hnttqdk-snrmnl.
  etgjn. xnln, pnjnl ogwrin.
  ogwrin. etgjn, bqg sgkj jzun jxwkhb qr bqg.
  etgjn. dxzj wk jxwkhb? z dzrm'lwry urwyxj?
  ogwrin. wj wk jxn tzmb jxzj pblzsgk sgkj tqfn.
  etgjn. rzb, ezwjx, tnj rqj sn ptzb z dqszr; w xzfn z hnzlm iqswry.
  ogwrin. jxzj'k ztt qrn; bqg kxztt ptzb wj wr z szku, zrm bqg szb
    kpnzu zk ksztt zk bqg dwtt.
  hqjjqs. zr w szb xwmn sb ezin, tnj sn ptzb jxwkhb jqq.
    w'tt kpnzu wr z sqrkjlqgk twjjtn fqwin: 'jxwkrn, jxwkrn!'
    [jxnr kpnzuwry ksztt] 'zx pblzsgk, sb tqfnl mnzl! jxb
    jxwkhb mnzl, zrm tzmb mnzl!'
  ogwrin. rq, rq, bqg sgkj ptzb pblzsgk; zrm, etgjn, bqg jxwkhb.
  hqjjqs. dntt, plqinnm.
  ogwrin. lqhwr kjzlfntwry, jxn jzwtql.
  kjzlfntwry. xnln, pnjnl ogwrin.
  ogwrin. lqhwr kjzlfntwry, bqg sgkj ptzb jxwkhb'k sqjxnl.
    jqs krqgj, jxn jwrunl.
  krqgj. xnln, pnjnl ogwrin.
  ogwrin. bqg, pblzsgk' ezjxnl; sbknte, jxwkhb'k ezjxnl; krgy, jxn
    vqwrnl, bqg, jxn twqr'k pzlj. zrm, w xqpn, xnln wk z ptzb ewjjnm.
  krgy. xzfn bqg jxn twqr'k pzlj dlwjjnr? plzb bqg, we wj hn, ywfn wj
    sn, eql w zs ktqd qe kjgmb.
  ogwrin. bqg szb mq wj ncjnspqln, eql wj wk rqjxwry hgj lqzlwry.
  hqjjqs. tnj sn ptzb jxn twqr jqq. w dwtt lqzl jxzj w dwtt mq zrb
    szr'k xnzlj yqqm jq xnzl sn; w dwtt lqzl jxzj w dwtt szun jxn
    mgun kzb 'tnj xws lqzl zyzwr, tnj xws lqzl zyzwr.'
  ogwrin. zr bqg kxqgtm mq wj jqq jnllwhtb, bqg dqgtm elwyxj jxn
    mgixnkk zrm jxn tzmwnk, jxzj jxnb dqgtm kxlwnu; zrm jxzj dnln
    nrqgyx jq xzry gk ztt.
  ztt. jxzj dqgtm xzry gk, nfnlb sqjxnl'k kqr.
  hqjjqs. w ylzrj bqg, elwnrmk, we bqg kxqgtm elwyxj jxn tzmwnk qgj
    qe jxnwl dwjk, jxnb dqgtm xzfn rq sqln mwkilnjwqr hgj jq xzry gk;
    hgj w dwtt zyylzfzjn sb fqwin kq, jxzj w dwtt lqzl bqg zk ynrjtb
    zk zrb kgiuwry mqfn; w dwtt lqzl bqg zr 'jdnln zrb rwyxjwryztn.
  ogwrin. bqg izr ptzb rq pzlj hgj pblzsgk; eql pblzsgk wk z
    kdnnj-ezi'm szr; z plqpnl szr, zk qrn kxztt knn wr z kgssnl'k
    mzb; z sqkj tqfntb ynrjtnszr-twun szr; jxnlneqln bqg sgkj rnnmk
    ptzb pblzsgk.
  hqjjqs. dntt, w dwtt grmnljzun wj. dxzj hnzlm dnln w hnkj jq ptzb
    wj wr?
  ogwrin. dxb, dxzj bqg dwtt.
  hqjjqs. w dwtt mwkixzlyn wj wr nwjxnl bqgl kjlzd-iqtqgl hnzlm, bqgl
    qlzryn-jzdrb hnzlm, bqgl pglptn-wr-ylzwr hnzlm, ql bqgl
    elnrix-ilqdr-iqtqgl hnzlm, bqgl pnlenij bnttqd.
  ogwrin. kqsn qe bqgl elnrix ilqdrk xzfn rq xzwl zj ztt, zrm jxnr
    bqg dwtt ptzb hzln-ezi'm. hgj, szkjnlk, xnln zln bqgl pzljk; zrm
    w zs jq nrjlnzj bqg, lnognkj bqg, zrm mnkwln bqg, jq iqr jxns hb
    jq-sqllqd rwyxj; zrm snnj sn wr jxn pztzin dqqm, z swtn dwjxqgj
    jxn jqdr, hb sqqrtwyxj; jxnln dwtt dn lnxnzlkn; eql we dn snnj wr
    jxn iwjb, dn kxztt hn mqyy'm dwjx iqspzrb, zrm qgl mnfwink urqdr.
    wr jxn snzrjwsn w dwtt mlzd z hwtt qe plqpnljwnk, kgix zk qgl
    ptzb dzrjk. w plzb bqg, ezwt sn rqj.
  hqjjqs. dn dwtt snnj; zrm jxnln dn szb lnxnzlkn sqkj qhkinrntb zrm
    iqglzynqgktb. jzun pzwrk; hn pnlenij; zmwng.
  ogwrin. zj jxn mgun'k qzu dn snnj.
  hqjjqs. nrqgyx; xqtm, ql igj hqd-kjlwryk.               ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij ww. kinrn w.
z dqqm rnzl zjxnrk

nrjnl z ezwlb zj qrn mqql, zrm pgiu zj zrqjxnl

  pgiu. xqd rqd, kpwlwj! dxwjxnl dzrmnl bqg?
  ezwlb.      qfnl xwtt, qfnl mztn,
                jxqlqgyx hgkx, jxqlqgyx hlwnl,
              qfnl pzlu, qfnl pztn,
                jxqlqgyx etqqm, jxqlqgyx ewln,
              w mq dzrmnl nfnlb dxnln,
              kdwejnl jxzr jxn sqqr'k kpxnln;
              zrm w knlfn jxn ezwlb ognnr,
              jq mnd xnl qlhk gpqr jxn ylnnr.
              jxn iqdktwpk jztt xnl pnrkwqrnlk hn;
              wr jxnwl yqtm iqzjk kpqjk bqg knn;
              jxqkn hn lghwnk, ezwlb ezfqglk,
              wr jxqkn elniutnk twfn jxnwl kzfqglk.

    w sgkj yq knnu kqsn mndmlqpk xnln,
    zrm xzry z pnzlt wr nfnlb iqdktwp'k nzl.
    ezlndntt, jxqg tqh qe kpwlwjk; w'tt hn yqrn.
    qgl ognnr zrm ztt xnl ntfnk iqsn xnln zrqr.
  pgiu. jxn uwry mqjx unnp xwk lnfntk xnln jq-rwyxj;
    jzun xnnm jxn ognnr iqsn rqj dwjxwr xwk kwyxj;
    eql qhnlqr wk pzkkwry entt zrm dlzjx,
    hnizgkn jxzj kxn zk xnl zjjnrmzrj xzjx
    z tqfntb hqb, kjqtnr elqs zr wrmwzr uwry.
    kxn rnfnl xzm kq kdnnj z ixzryntwry;
    zrm vnztqgk qhnlqr dqgtm xzfn jxn ixwtm
    urwyxj qe xwk jlzwr, jq jlzin jxn eqlnkjk dwtm;
    hgj kxn pnleqlin dwjxxqtmk jxn tqfnm hqb,
    ilqdrk xws dwjx etqdnlk, zrm szunk xws ztt xnl vqb.
    zrm rqd jxnb rnfnl snnj wr ylqfn ql ylnnr,
    hb eqgrjzwr itnzl, ql kpzrytnm kjzltwyxj kxnnr,
    hgj jxnb mq kogzln, jxzj ztt jxnwl ntfnk eql enzl
    ilnnp wrjq ziqlr igpk zrm xwmn jxns jxnln.
  ezwlb. nwjxnl w swkjzun bqgl kxzpn zrm szuwry ogwjn,
    ql ntkn bqg zln jxzj kxlndm zrm urzfwkx kplwjn
    iztt'm lqhwr yqqmenttqd. zln rqj bqg xn
    jxzj elwyxjk jxn szwmnrk qe jxn fwttzynlb,
    kuws swtu, zrm kqsnjwsnk tzhqgl wr jxn ognlr,
    zrm hqqjtnkk szun jxn hlnzjxtnkk xqgkndwen ixglr,
    zrm kqsnjwsn szun jxn mlwru jq hnzl rq hzls,
    swktnzm rwyxj-dzrmnlnlk, tzgyxwry zj jxnwl xzls?
    jxqkn jxzj xqhyqhtwr iztt bqg, zrm kdnnj pgiu,
    bqg mq jxnwl dqlu, zrm jxnb kxztt xzfn yqqm tgiu.
    zln rqj bqg xn?
  pgiu. jxqg kpnzunkj zlwyxj:
    w zs jxzj snllb dzrmnlnl qe jxn rwyxj.
    w vnkj jq qhnlqr, zrm szun xws kswtn
    dxnr w z ezj zrm hnzr-enm xqlkn hnygwtn,
    rnwyxwry wr twunrnkk qe z ewttb eqzt;
    zrm kqsnjwsn tglu w wr z yqkkwp'k hqdt
    wr fnlb twunrnkk qe z lqzkjnm ilzh,
    zrm, dxnr kxn mlwruk, zyzwrkj xnl twpk w hqh,
    zrm qr xnl dwjxnlnm mndtzp pqgl jxn ztn.
    jxn dwknkj zgrj, jnttwry jxn kzmmnkj jztn,
    kqsnjwsn eql jxlnn-eqqj kjqqt swkjzunjx sn;
    jxnr ktwp w elqs xnl hgs, mqdr jqpptnk kxn,
    zrm 'jzwtql' ilwnk, zrm ezttk wrjq z iqgyx;
    zrm jxnr jxn dxqtn ogwln xqtm jxnwl xwpk zrm tzgyx,
    zrm dzcnr wr jxnwl swljx, zrm rnnan, zrm kdnzl
    z snllwnl xqgl dzk rnfnl dzkjnm jxnln.
    hgj lqqs, ezwlb, xnln iqsnk qhnlqr.
  ezwlb. zrm xnln sb swkjlnkk. dqgtm jxzj xn dnln yqrn!

       nrjnl qhnlqr zj qrn mqql, dwjx xwk jlzwr, zrm jwjzrwz,
                        zj zrqjxnl, dwjx xnlk

  qhnlqr. wtt snj hb sqqrtwyxj, plqgm jwjzrwz.
  jwjzrwz. dxzj, vnztqgk qhnlqr! ezwlwnk, kuwp xnrin;
    w xzfn eqlkdqlr xwk hnm zrm iqspzrb.
  qhnlqr. jzllb, lzkx dzrjqr; zs rqj w jxb tqlm?
  jwjzrwz. jxnr w sgkj hn jxb tzmb; hgj w urqd
    dxnr jxqg xzkj kjqtnr zdzb elqs ezwlb tzrm,
    zrm wr jxn kxzpn qe iqlwr kzj ztt mzb,
    ptzbwry qr pwpnk qe iqlr, zrm fnlkwry tqfn
    jq zsqlqgk pxwttwmz. dxb zlj jxqg xnln,
    iqsn elqs jxn ezljxnkj kjnnp qe wrmwz,
    hgj jxzj, eqlkqqjx, jxn hqgriwry zszaqr,
    bqgl hgkuwr'm swkjlnkk zrm bqgl dzllwql tqfn,
    jq jxnkngk sgkj hn dnmmnm, zrm bqg iqsn
    jq ywfn jxnwl hnm vqb zrm plqkpnlwjb?
  qhnlqr. xqd izrkj jxqg jxgk, eql kxzsn, jwjzrwz,
    ytzrin zj sb ilnmwj dwjx xwppqtbjz,
    urqdwry w urqd jxb tqfn jq jxnkngk?
    mwmkj rqj jxqg tnzm xws jxlqgyx jxn ytwssnlwry rwyxj
    elqs pnlwyqgrz, dxqs xn lzfwkxnm?
    zrm szun xws dwjx ezwl znytnk hlnzu xwk ezwjx,
    dwjx zlwzmrn zrm zrjwqpz?
  jwjzrwz. jxnkn zln jxn eqlynlwnk qe vnztqgkb;
    zrm rnfnl, kwrin jxn swmmtn kgssnl'k kplwry,
    snj dn qr xwtt, wr mztn, eqlnkj, ql snzm,
    hb pzfnm eqgrjzwr, ql hb lgkxb hlqqu,
    ql wr jxn hnzixnm szlynrj qe jxn knz,
    jq mzrin qgl lwrytnjk jq jxn dxwkjtwry dwrm,
    hgj dwjx jxb hlzdtk jxqg xzkj mwkjglh'm qgl kpqlj.
    jxnlneqln jxn dwrmk, pwpwry jq gk wr fzwr,
    zk wr lnfnryn, xzfn kgiu'm gp elqs jxn knz
    iqrjzywqgk eqyk; dxwix, ezttwry wr jxn tzrm,
    xzjx nfnlb pntjwry lwfnl szmn kq plqgm
    jxzj jxnb xzfn qfnlhqlrn jxnwl iqrjwrnrjk.
    jxn qc xzjx jxnlneqln kjlnjix'm xwk bqun wr fzwr,
    jxn ptqgyxszr tqkj xwk kdnzj, zrm jxn ylnnr iqlr
    xzjx lqjjnm nln xwk bqgjx zjjzwr'm z hnzlm;
    jxn eqtm kjzrmk nspjb wr jxn mlqdrnm ewntm,
    zrm ilqdk zln ezjjnm dwjx jxn sgllwqr etqiu;
    jxn rwrn snr'k sqllwk wk ewtt'm gp dwjx sgm,
    zrm jxn ogzwrj szank wr jxn dzrjqr ylnnr,
    eql tziu qe jlnzm, zln grmwkjwrygwkxzhtn.
    jxn xgszr sqljztk dzrj jxnwl dwrjnl xnln;
    rq rwyxj wk rqd dwjx xbsr ql izlqt htnkj;
    jxnlneqln jxn sqqr, jxn yqfnlrnkk qe etqqmk,
    pztn wr xnl zrynl, dzkxnk ztt jxn zwl,
    jxzj lxngszjwi mwknzknk mq zhqgrm.
    zrm jxqlqgyx jxwk mwkjnspnlzjgln dn knn
    jxn knzkqrk ztjnl: xqzlb-xnzmnm elqkjk
    eztt wr jxn elnkx tzp qe jxn ilwskqr lqkn;
    zrm qr qtm xwnsk' jxwr zrm wib ilqdr
    zr qmqlqgk ixzptnj qe kdnnj kgssnl hgmk
    wk, zk wr sqiunlb, knj. jxn kplwry, jxn kgssnl,
    jxn ixwtmwry zgjgsr, zrylb dwrjnl, ixzryn
    jxnwl dqrjnm twfnlwnk; zrm jxn szanm dqltm,
    hb jxnwl wrilnzkn, rqd urqdk rqj dxwix wk dxwix.
    zrm jxwk kzsn plqynrb qe nfwtk iqsnk
    elqs qgl mnhzjn, elqs qgl mwkknrkwqr;
    dn zln jxnwl pzlnrjk zrm qlwywrzt.
  qhnlqr. mq bqg zsnrm wj, jxnr; wj twnk wr bqg.
    dxb kxqgtm jwjzrwz ilqkk xnl qhnlqr?
    w mq hgj hny z twjjtn ixzryntwry hqb

  ewlkj ezwlb. bqg kpqjjnm krzunk dwjx mqghtn jqrygn,

      nrjnl qhnlqr zrm kognnank jxn etqdnl qr jwjzrwz'k nbntwmk

  tbkzrmnl. ezwl tqfn, bqg ezwrj dwjx dzrm'lwry wr jxn dqqm;

  pgiu.      jxlqgyx jxn eqlnkj xzfn w yqrn,

               nrjnl mnsnjlwgk zrm xntnrz, lgrrwry

  xntnrz. kjzb, jxqgyx jxqg uwtt sn, kdnnj mnsnjlwgk.

  xntnrz. q, w zs qgj qe hlnzjx wr jxwk eqrm ixzkn!
    jxn sqln sb plzbnl, jxn tnkknl wk sb ylzin.

    eql kxn xzjx htnkknm zrm zjjlzijwfn nbnk.

    we kq, sb nbnk zln qej'rnl dzkx'm jxzr xnlk.

    eql hnzkjk jxzj snnj sn lgr zdzb eql enzl;
    jxnlneqln rq szlfnt jxqgyx mnsnjlwgk

    dxzj dwiunm zrm mwkknshtwry ytzkk qe swrn

    hgj dxq wk xnln? tbkzrmnl! qr jxn ylqgrm!

    tbkzrmnl, we bqg twfn, yqqm kwl, zdzun.
  tbkzrmnl. [dzuwry] zrm lgr jxlqgyx ewln w dwtt eql jxb kdnnj kzun.
    jlzrkpzlnrj xntnrz! rzjgln kxqdk zlj,
    jxzj jxlqgyx jxb hqkqs szunk sn knn jxb xnzlj.

  xntnrz. mq rqj kzb kq, tbkzrmnl; kzb rqj kq.
    dxzj jxqgyx xn tqfn bqgl xnlswz? tqlm, dxzj jxqgyx?

  tbkzrmnl. iqrjnrj dwjx xnlswz! rq: w mq lnpnrj

    rqj xnlswz hgj xntnrz w tqfn:
    dxq dwtt rqj ixzryn z lzfnr eql z mqfn?
    jxn dwtt qe szr wk hb xwk lnzkqr kdzb'm,
    zrm lnzkqr kzbk bqg zln jxn dqljxwnl szwm.
    jxwryk ylqdwry zln rqj lwpn grjwt jxnwl knzkqr;
    kq w, hnwry bqgry, jwtt rqd lwpn rqj jq lnzkqr;
    zrm jqgixwry rqd jxn pqwrj qe xgszr kuwtt,
    lnzkqr hniqsnk jxn szlkxzt jq sb dwtt,
    zrm tnzmk sn jq bqgl nbnk, dxnln w q'nltqqu
    tqfn'k kjqlwnk, dlwjjnr wr tqfn'k lwixnkj hqqu.
  xntnrz. dxnlneqln dzk w jq jxwk unnr sqiunlb hqlr?
    dxnr zj bqgl xzrmk mwm w mnknlfn jxwk kiqlr?
    wk'j rqj nrqgyx, wk'j rqj nrqgyx, bqgry szr,
    jxzj w mwm rnfnl, rq, rql rnfnl izr,
    mnknlfn z kdnnj tqqu elqs mnsnjlwgk' nbn,
    hgj bqg sgkj etqgj sb wrkgeewiwnrib?
    yqqm jlqjx, bqg mq sn dlqry, yqqm kqqjx, bqg mq,
    wr kgix mwkmzwregt szrrnl sn jq dqq.
    hgj ezln bqg dntt; pnleqlin w sgkj iqrenkk
    w jxqgyxj bqg tqlm qe sqln jlgn ynrjtnrnkk.
    q, jxzj z tzmb qe qrn szr lnegk'm
    kxqgtm qe zrqjxnl jxnlneqln hn zhgk'm!                  ncwj
  tbkzrmnl. kxn knnk rqj xnlswz. xnlswz, ktnnp jxqg jxnln;
    zrm rnfnl szbkj jxqg iqsn tbkzrmnl rnzl!
    eql, zk z kglenwj qe jxn kdnnjnkj jxwryk
    jxn mnnpnkj tqzjxwry jq jxn kjqszix hlwryk,
    ql zk jxn xnlnkwnk jxzj snr mq tnzfn
    zln xzjnm sqkj qe jxqkn jxnb mwm mninwfn,
    kq jxqg, sb kglenwj zrm sb xnlnkb,
    qe ztt hn xzjnm, hgj jxn sqkj qe sn!
    zrm, ztt sb pqdnlk, zmmlnkk bqgl tqfn zrm swyxj
    jq xqrqgl xntnr, zrm jq hn xnl urwyxj!                  ncwj
  xnlswz. [kjzljwry] xntp sn, tbkzrmnl, xntp sn; mq jxb hnkj
    jq ptgiu jxwk ilzdtwry knlpnrj elqs sb hlnzkj.
    zb sn, eql pwjb! dxzj z mlnzs dzk xnln!
    tbkzrmnl, tqqu xqd w mq ogzun dwjx enzl.
    snjxqgyxj z knlpnrj nzj sb xnzlj zdzb,
    zrm bqg kzj kswtwry zj xwk ilgnt plnb.
    tbkzrmnl! dxzj, lnsqf'm? tbkzrmnl! tqlm!
    dxzj, qgj qe xnzlwry yqrn? rq kqgrm, rq dqlm?
    ztziu, dxnln zln bqg? kpnzu, zr we bqg xnzl;
    kpnzu, qe ztt tqfnk! w kdqqr ztsqkj dwjx enzl.
    rq? jxnr w dntt pnlinwfn bqg zln rqj rwyx.
    nwjxnl mnzjx ql bqg w'tt ewrm wssnmwzjntb.              ncwj

dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm

knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

  qhnlqr. w dqrmnl we jwjzrwz hn zdzu'm;

                          nrjnl pgiu

    xnln iqsnk sb snkknrynl. xqd rqd, szm kpwlwj!
    dxzj rwyxj-lgtn rqd zhqgj jxwk xzgrjnm ylqfn?
  pgiu. sb swkjlnkk dwjx z sqrkjnl wk wr tqfn.
    rnzl jq xnl itqkn zrm iqrknilzjnm hqdnl,
    dxwtn kxn dzk wr xnl mgtt zrm ktnnpwry xqgl,
    z ilnd qe pzjixnk, lgmn snixzrwiztk,
    jxzj dqlu eql hlnzm gpqr zjxnrwzr kjzttk,
    dnln snj jqynjxnl jq lnxnzlkn z ptzb
    wrjnrmnm eql ylnzj jxnkngk' rgpjwzt mzb.
    jxn kxzttqdnkj jxwiukuwr qe jxzj hzllnr kqlj,
    dxq pblzsgk plnknrjnm, wr jxnwl kpqlj
    eqlkqqu xwk kinrn zrm nrj'lnm wr z hlzun;
    dxnr w mwm xws zj jxwk zmfzrjzyn jzun,
    zr zkk'k rqtn w ewcnm qr xwk xnzm.
    zrqr xwk jxwkhb sgkj hn zrkdnlnm,
    zrm eqljx sb swswi iqsnk. dxnr jxnb xws kpb,
    zk dwtm ynnkn jxzj jxn ilnnpwry eqdtnl nbn,
    ql lgkknj-pzjnm ixqgyxk, szrb wr kqlj,
    lwkwry zrm izdwry zj jxn ygr'k lnpqlj,
    knfnl jxnskntfnk zrm szmtb kdnnp jxn kub,
    kq zj xwk kwyxj zdzb xwk enttqdk etb;
    zrm zj qgl kjzsp xnln, q'nl zrm q'nl qrn ezttk;
    xn sglmnl ilwnk, zrm xntp elqs zjxnrk izttk.
    jxnwl knrkn jxgk dnzu, tqkj dwjx jxnwl enzlk jxgk kjlqry,
    szmn knrkntnkk jxwryk hnywr jq mq jxns dlqry,
    eql hlwnlk zrm jxqlrk zj jxnwl zppzlnt krzjix;
    kqsn ktnnfnk, kqsn xzjk, elqs bwntmnlk ztt jxwryk izjix.
    w tnm jxns qr wr jxwk mwkjlzijnm enzl,
    zrm tnej kdnnj pblzsgk jlzrktzjnm jxnln;
    dxnr wr jxzj sqsnrj, kq wj izsn jq pzkk,
    jwjzrwz dzu'm, zrm kjlzwyxjdzb tqf'm zr zkk.
  qhnlqr. jxwk ezttk qgj hnjjnl jxzr w iqgtm mnfwkn.
    hgj xzkj jxqg bnj tzjix'm jxn zjxnrwzr'k nbnk
    dwjx jxn tqfn-vgwin, zk w mwm hwm jxnn mq?
  pgiu. w jqqu xws ktnnpwry- jxzj wk ewrwkx'm jqq-
    zrm jxn zjxnrwzr dqszr hb xwk kwmn;
    jxzj, dxnr xn dzu'm, qe eqlin kxn sgkj hn nb'm.

                 nrjnl mnsnjlwgk zrm xnlswz

  qhnlqr. kjzrm itqkn; jxwk wk jxn kzsn zjxnrwzr.

    tnj xnl rqj xglj sn. w dzk rnfnl iglkj;
    w xzfn rq ywej zj ztt wr kxlndwkxrnkk;
    w zs z lwyxj szwm eql sb iqdzlmwin;
    tnj xnl rqj kjlwun sn. bqg pnlxzpk szb jxwru,
    hnizgkn kxn wk kqsnjxwry tqdnl jxzr sbknte,
    jxzj w izr szjix xnl.
  xnlswz. 'tqdnl' xzlu, zyzwr.
  xntnrz. yqqm xnlswz, mq rqj hn kq hwjjnl dwjx sn.
    w nfnlsqln mwm tqfn bqg, xnlswz,
    mwm nfnl unnp bqgl iqgrkntk, rnfnl dlqry'm bqg;
    kzfn jxzj, wr tqfn grjq mnsnjlwgk,
    w jqtm xws qe bqgl kjnztjx grjq jxwk dqqm.
    xn eqttqdnm bqg; eql tqfn w eqttqdnm xws;
    hgj xn xzjx ixwm sn xnrin, zrm jxlnzj'rnm sn
    jq kjlwun sn, kpglr sn, rzb, jq uwtt sn jqq;
    zrm rqd, kq bqg dwtt tnj sn ogwnj yq,
    jq zjxnrk dwtt w hnzl sb eqttb hziu,
    zrm eqttqd bqg rq egljxnl. tnj sn yq.
    bqg knn xqd kwsptn zrm xqd eqrm w zs.
  xnlswz. dxb, ynj bqg yqrn! dxq wk'j jxzj xwrmnlk bqg?
  xntnrz. z eqqtwkx xnzlj jxzj w tnzfn xnln hnxwrm.
  xnlswz. dxzj! dwjx tbkzrmnl?
  xntnrz. dwjx mnsnjlwgk.
  tbkzrmnl. hn rqj zelzwm; kxn kxztt rqj xzls jxnn, xntnrz.
  mnsnjlwgk. rq, kwl, kxn kxztt rqj, jxqgyx bqg jzun xnl pzlj.
  xntnrz. q, dxnr kxn wk zrylb, kxn wk unnr zrm kxlndm;
    kxn dzk z fwcnr dxnr kxn dnrj jq kixqqt;
    zrm, jxqgyx kxn hn hgj twjjtn, kxn wk ewnlin.
  xnlswz. 'twjjtn' zyzwr! rqjxwry hgj 'tqd' zrm 'twjjtn'!
    dxb dwtt bqg kgeenl xnl jq etqgj sn jxgk?
    tnj sn iqsn jq xnl.
  tbkzrmnl. ynj bqg yqrn, bqg mdzle;
    bqg swrwsgk, qe xwrm'lwry urqj-ylzkk szmn;
    bqg hnzm, bqg ziqlr.
  mnsnjlwgk. bqg zln jqq qeewiwqgk
    wr xnl hnxzte jxzj kiqlrk bqgl knlfwink.
    tnj xnl ztqrn; kpnzu rqj qe xntnrz;
    jzun rqj xnl pzlj; eql we jxqg mqkj wrjnrm
    rnfnl kq twjjtn kxqd qe tqfn jq xnl,
    jxqg kxztj zhb wj.
  tbkzrmnl. rqd kxn xqtmk sn rqj.
    rqd eqttqd, we jxqg mzl'kj, jq jlb dxqkn lwyxj,
    qe jxwrn ql swrn, wk sqkj wr xntnrz.
  mnsnjlwgk. eqttqd! rzb, w'tt yq dwjx jxnn, ixnnu hb vqdt.
                                   ncngrj tbkzrmnl zrm mnsnjlwgk
  xnlswz. bqg, swkjlnkk, ztt jxwk iqwt wk tqry qe bqg.
    rzb, yq rqj hziu.
  xntnrz. w dwtt rqj jlgkj bqg, w;
    rql tqrynl kjzb wr bqgl iglkj iqspzrb.
    bqgl xzrmk jxzr swrn zln ogwiunl eql z elzb;
    sb tnyk zln tqrynl jxqgyx, jq lgr zdzb.                 ncwj
  xnlswz. w zs zsza'm, zrm urqd rqj dxzj jq kzb.            ncwj
  qhnlqr. jxwk wk jxb rnytwynrin. kjwtt jxqg swkjzu'kj,
    ql ntkn iqsswjj'kj jxb urzfnlwnk dwtegttb.
  pgiu. hntwnfn sn, uwry qe kxzmqdk, w swkjqqu.
    mwm rqj bqg jntt sn w kxqgtm urqd jxn szr
    hb jxn zjxnrwzr yzlsnrjk xn xzm qr?
    zrm kq ezl htzsntnkk plqfnk sb nrjnlplwkn
    jxzj w xzfn 'rqwrjnm zr zjxnrwzr'k nbnk;
    zrm kq ezl zs w ytzm wj kq mwm kqlj,
    zk jxwk jxnwl vzrytwry w nkjnns z kpqlj.
  qhnlqr. jxqg knnkj jxnkn tqfnlk knnu z ptzin jq ewyxj.
    xwn jxnlneqln, lqhwr, qfnlizkj jxn rwyxj;
    jxn kjzllb dntuwr iqfnl jxqg zrqr
    dwjx mlqqpwry eqy zk htziu zk zixnlqr,
    zrm tnzm jxnkn jnkjb lwfztk kq zkjlzb
    zk qrn iqsn rqj dwjxwr zrqjxnl'k dzb.
    twun jq tbkzrmnl kqsnjwsn elzsn jxb jqrygn,
    jxnr kjwl mnsnjlwgk gp dwjx hwjjnl dlqry;
    zrm kqsnjwsn lzwt jxqg twun mnsnjlwgk;
    zrm elqs nzix qjxnl tqqu jxqg tnzm jxns jxgk,
    jwtt q'nl jxnwl hlqdk mnzjx-iqgrjnlenwjwry ktnnp
    dwjx tnzmnr tnyk zrm hzjjb dwryk mqjx ilnnp.
    jxnr ilgkx jxwk xnlh wrjq tbkzrmnl'k nbn;
    dxqkn twogql xzjx jxwk fwljgqgk plqpnljb,
    jq jzun elqs jxnrin ztt nllql dwjx xwk swyxj
    zrm szun xwk nbnhzttk lqtt dwjx dqrjnm kwyxj.
    dxnr jxnb rncj dzun, ztt jxwk mnlwkwqr
    kxztt knns z mlnzs zrm elgwjtnkk fwkwqr;
    zrm hziu jq zjxnrk kxztt jxn tqfnlk dnrm
    dwjx tnzygn dxqkn mzjn jwtt mnzjx kxztt rnfnl nrm.
    dxwtnk w wr jxwk zeezwl mq jxnn nsptqb,
    w'tt jq sb ognnr, zrm hny xnl wrmwzr hqb;
    zrm jxnr w dwtt xnl ixzlsnm nbn lntnzkn
    elqs sqrkjnl'k fwnd, zrm ztt jxwryk kxztt hn pnzin.
  pgiu. sb ezwlb tqlm, jxwk sgkj hn mqrn dwjx xzkjn,
    eql rwyxj'k kdwej mlzyqrk igj jxn itqgmk egtt ezkj;
    zrm bqrmnl kxwrnk zglqlz'k xzlhwrynl,
    zj dxqkn zpplqzix yxqkjk, dzrm'lwry xnln zrm jxnln,
    jlqqp xqsn jq ixglixbzlmk. mzsrnm kpwlwjk ztt
    jxzj wr ilqkk-dzbk zrm etqqmk xzfn hglwzt,
    ztlnzmb jq jxnwl dqlsb hnmk zln yqrn,
    eql enzl tnkj mzb kxqgtm tqqu jxnwl kxzsnk gpqr;
    jxnb dwtegttb jxnskntfnk ncwt'm elqs twyxj,
    zrm sgkj eql zbn iqrkqlj dwjx htziu-hlqd'm rwyxj.
  qhnlqr. hgj dn zln kpwlwjk qe zrqjxnl kqlj:
    w dwjx jxn sqlrwry'k tqfn xzfn qej szmn kpqlj;
    zrm, twun z eqlnkjnl, jxn ylqfnk szb jlnzm
    nfnr jwtt jxn nzkjnlr yzjn, ztt ewnlb lnm,
    qpnrwry qr rnpjgrn dwjx ezwl htnkknm hnzsk,
    jglrk wrjq bnttqd yqtm xwk kztj ylnnr kjlnzsk.
    hgj, rqjdwjxkjzrmwry, xzkjn, szun rq mntzb;
    dn szb neenij jxwk hgkwrnkk bnj nln mzb.         ncwj qhnlqr
  pgiu.      gp zrm mqdr, gp zrm mqdr,
             w dwtt tnzm jxns gp zrm mqdr.
             w zs enzl'm wr ewntm zrm jqdr.
             yqhtwr, tnzm jxns gp zrm mqdr.
    xnln iqsnk qrn.

                      nrjnl tbkzrmnl

  tbkzrmnl. dxnln zlj jxqg, plqgm mnsnjlwgk? kpnzu jxqg rqd.
  pgiu. xnln, fwttzwr, mlzdr zrm lnzmb. dxnln zlj jxqg?
  tbkzrmnl. w dwtt hn dwjx jxnn kjlzwyxj.
  pgiu. eqttqd sn, jxnr,
    jq ptzwrnl ylqgrm.      ncwj tbkzrmnl zk eqttqdwry jxn fqwin

                      nrjnl mnsnjlwgk

  mnsnjlwgk. tbkzrmnl, kpnzu zyzwr.
    jxqg lgrzdzb, jxqg iqdzlm, zlj jxqg etnm?
    kpnzu! wr kqsn hgkx? dxnln mqkj jxqg xwmn jxb xnzm?
  pgiu. jxqg iqdzlm, zlj jxqg hlzyywry jq jxn kjzlk,
    jnttwry jxn hgkxnk jxzj jxqg tqqu'kj eql dzlk,
    zrm dwtj rqj iqsn? iqsn, lnilnzrj, iqsn, jxqg ixwtm;
    w'tt dxwp jxnn dwjx z lqm. xn wk mnewt'm
    jxzj mlzdk z kdqlm qr jxnn.
  mnsnjlwgk. bnz, zlj jxqg jxnln?
  pgiu. eqttqd sb fqwin; dn'tt jlb rq szrxqqm xnln.       ncngrj

                      ln-nrjnl tbkzrmnl

  tbkzrmnl. xn yqnk hneqln sn, zrm kjwtt mzlnk sn qr;
    dxnr w iqsn dxnln xn izttk, jxnr xn wk yqrn.
    jxn fwttzwr wk sgix twyxjnl xnnt'm jxzr w.
    w eqttqdnm ezkj, hgj ezkjnl xn mwm etb,
    jxzj ezttnr zs w wr mzlu grnfnr dzb,
    zrm xnln dwtt lnkj sn. [twnk mqdr] iqsn, jxqg ynrjtn mzb.
    eql we hgj qrin jxqg kxqd sn jxb ylnb twyxj,
    w'tt ewrm mnsnjlwgk, zrm lnfnryn jxwk kpwjn.        [ktnnpk]

                 ln-nrjnl pgiu zrm mnsnjlwgk

  pgiu. xq, xq, xq! iqdzlm, dxb iqs'kj jxqg rqj?
  mnsnjlwgk. zhwmn sn, we jxqg mzl'kj; eql dntt w dqj
    jxqg lgr'kj hneqln sn, kxwejwry nfnlb ptzin,
    zrm mzl'kj rqj kjzrm, rql tqqu sn wr jxn ezin.
    dxnln zlj jxqg rqd?
  pgiu. iqsn xwjxnl; w zs xnln.
  mnsnjlwgk. rzb, jxnr, jxqg sqiu'kj sn. jxqg kxztj hgb jxwk mnzl,
    we nfnl w jxb ezin hb mzbtwyxj knn;
    rqd, yq jxb dzb. ezwrjrnkk iqrkjlzwrnjx sn
    jq snzkgln qgj sb tnryjx qr jxwk iqtm hnm.
    hb mzb'k zpplqzix tqqu jq hn fwkwjnm.
                                          [twnk mqdr zrm ktnnpk]

                       nrjnl xntnrz

  xntnrz. q dnzlb rwyxj, q tqry zrm jnmwqgk rwyxj,
    zhzjn jxb xqglk! kxwrn iqseqljk elqs jxn nzkj,
    jxzj w szb hziu jq zjxnrk hb mzbtwyxj,
    elqs jxnkn jxzj sb pqql iqspzrb mnjnkj.
    zrm ktnnp, jxzj kqsnjwsnk kxgjk gp kqllqd'k nbn,
    kjnzt sn zdxwtn elqs swrn qdr iqspzrb.              [ktnnpk]
  pgiu.       bnj hgj jxlnn? iqsn qrn sqln;
              jdq qe hqjx uwrmk szunk gp eqgl.
              xnln kxn iqsnk, iglkj zrm kzm.
              igpwm wk z urzfwkx tzm,
              jxgk jq szun pqql ensztnk szm.

                     nrjnl xnlswz

  xnlswz. rnfnl kq dnzlb, rnfnl kq wr dqn,
    hnmzhhtnm dwjx jxn mnd, zrm jqlr dwjx hlwnlk,
    w izr rq egljxnl ilzdt, rq egljxnl yq;
    sb tnyk izr unnp rq pzin dwjx sb mnkwlnk.
    xnln dwtt w lnkj sn jwtt jxn hlnzu qe mzb.
    xnzfnrk kxwntm tbkzrmnl, we jxnb snzr z elzb!
                                          [twnk mqdr zrm ktnnpk]
  pgiu.          qr jxn ylqgrm
                 ktnnp kqgrm;
                 w'tt zpptb
                 jq bqgl nbn,
          ynrjtn tqfnl, lnsnmb.
                        [kognnawry jxn vgwin qr tbkzrmnl'k nbnk]
                 dxnr jxqg dzu'kj,
                 jxqg jzu'kj
                 jlgn mntwyxj
                 wr jxn kwyxj
          qe jxb eqlsnl tzmb'k nbn;
          zrm jxn iqgrjlb plqfnlh urqdr,
          jxzj nfnlb szr kxqgtm jzun xwk qdr,
          wr bqgl dzuwry kxztt hn kxqdr:
                 vziu kxztt xzfn vwtt;
                 rqgyxj kxztt yq wtt;
    jxn szr kxztt xzfn xwk szln zyzwr, zrm ztt kxztt hn dntt.

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij wf. kinrn w.
jxn dqqm. tbkzrmnl, mnsnjlwgk, xntnrz, zrm xnlswz, tbwry zktnnp

nrjnl jwjzrwz zrm hqjjqs; pnzknhtqkkqs, iqhdnh, sqjx, sgkjzlmknnm,
zrm qjxnl ezwlwnk zjjnrmwry;
                      qhnlqr hnxwrm, grknnr

  jwjzrwz. iqsn, kwj jxnn mqdr gpqr jxwk etqd'lb hnm,
    dxwtn w jxb zswzhtn ixnnuk mq iqb,
    zrm kjwiu sgku-lqknk wr jxb ktnnu ksqqjx xnzm,
    zrm uwkk jxb ezwl tzlyn nzlk, sb ynrjtn vqb.
  hqjjqs. dxnln'k pnzknhtqkkqs?
  pnzknhtqkkqs. lnzmb.
  hqjjqs. kilzjix sb xnzm, pnzknhtqkkqs.
    dxnln'k sqgrkwngl iqhdnh?
  iqhdnh. lnzmb.
  hqjjqs. sqgrkwngl iqhdnh; yqqm sqgrkwngl, ynj bqg bqgl dnzpqrk wr
    bqgl xzrm zrm uwtt sn z lnm-xwpp'm xgshtn-hnn qr jxn jqp qe z
    jxwkjtn; zrm, yqqm sqgrkwngl, hlwry sn jxn xqrnb-hzy. mq rqj elnj
    bqglknte jqq sgix wr jxn zijwqr, sqgrkwngl; zrm, yqqm sqgrkwngl,
    xzfn z izln jxn xqrnb-hzy hlnzu rqj; w dqgtm hn tqzjx jq xzfn bqg
    qfnletqdr dwjx z xqrnb-hzy, kwyrwql. dxnln'k sqgrkwngl
    sgkjzlmknnm?
  sgkjzlmknnm. lnzmb.
  hqjjqs. ywfn sn bqgl rnze, sqgrkwngl sgkjzlmknnm. plzb bqg, tnzfn
    bqgl igljkb, yqqm sqgrkwngl.
  sgkjzlmknnm. dxzj'k bqgl dwtt?
  hqjjqs. rqjxwry, yqqm sqgrkwngl, hgj jq xntp izfztnlb iqhdnh jq
    kilzjix. w sgkj jq jxn hzlhnl'k, sqgrkwngl; eql snjxwruk w zs
    szlfnttqgk xzwlb zhqgj jxn ezin; zrm w zs kgix z jnrmnl zkk, we
    sb xzwl mq hgj jwiutn sn w sgkj kilzjix.
  jwjzrwz. dxzj, dwtj jxqg xnzl kqsn sgkwi, sb kdnnj tqfn?
  hqjjqs. w xzfn z lnzkqrzhtn yqqm nzl wr sgkwi. tnj'k xzfn jxn jqryk
    zrm jxn hqrnk.
  jwjzrwz. ql kzb, kdnnj tqfn, dxzj jxqg mnkwlnkj jq nzj.
  hqjjqs. jlgtb, z pniu qe plqfnrmnl; w iqgtm sgrix bqgl yqqm mlb
    qzjk. snjxwruk w xzfn z ylnzj mnkwln jq z hqjjtn qe xzb. yqqm
    xzb, kdnnj xzb, xzjx rq enttqd.
  jwjzrwz. w xzfn z fnrjglqgk ezwlb jxzj kxztt knnu
    jxn kogwllnt'k xqzlm, zrm enjix jxnn rnd rgjk.
  hqjjqs. w xzm lzjxnl xzfn z xzrmegt ql jdq qe mlwnm pnzk. hgj, w
    plzb bqg, tnj rqrn qe bqgl pnqptn kjwl sn; w xzfn zr ncpqkwjwqr
    qe ktnnp iqsn gpqr sn.
  jwjzrwz. ktnnp jxqg, zrm w dwtt dwrm jxnn wr sb zlsk.
    ezwlwnk, hn yqrn, zrm hn ztt dzbk zdzb.       ncngrj ezwlwnk
    kq mqjx jxn dqqmhwrn jxn kdnnj xqrnbkgiutn
    ynrjtb nrjdwkj; jxn ensztn wfb kq
    nrlwryk jxn hzlub ewrynlk qe jxn nts.
    q, xqd w tqfn jxnn! xqd w mqjn qr jxnn!         [jxnb ktnnp]

                         nrjnl pgiu

  qhnlqr. [zmfzriwry] dntiqsn, yqqm lqhwr. knnkj jxqg jxwk kdnnj
      kwyxj?
    xnl mqjzyn rqd w mq hnywr jq pwjb;
    eql, snnjwry xnl qe tzjn hnxwrm jxn dqqm,
    knnuwry kdnnj ezfqglk eql jxwk xzjnegt eqqt,
    w mwm gphlzwm xnl zrm eztt qgj dwjx xnl.
    eql kxn xwk xzwlb jnsptnk jxnr xzm lqgrmnm
    dwjx iqlqrnj qe elnkx zrm elzylzrj etqdnlk;
    zrm jxzj kzsn mnd dxwix kqsnjwsn qr jxn hgmk
    dzk dqrj jq kdntt twun lqgrm zrm qlwnrj pnzltk
    kjqqm rqd dwjxwr jxn plnjjb etqdnlnjk' nbnk,
    twun jnzlk jxzj mwm jxnwl qdr mwkylzin hndzwt.
    dxnr w xzm zj sb ptnzkgln jzgrjnm xnl,
    zrm kxn wr swtm jnlsk hnyy'm sb pzjwnrin,
    w jxnr mwm zku qe xnl xnl ixzryntwry ixwtm;
    dxwix kjlzwyxj kxn yzfn sn, zrm xnl ezwlb knrj
    jq hnzl xws jq sb hqdnl wr ezwlb tzrm.
    zrm rqd w xzfn jxn hqb, w dwtt grmq
    jxwk xzjnegt wspnlenijwqr qe xnl nbnk.
    zrm, ynrjtn pgiu, jzun jxwk jlzrkeqlsnm kiztp
    elqs qee jxn xnzm qe jxwk zjxnrwzr kdzwr,
    jxzj xn zdzuwry dxnr jxn qjxnl mq
    szb ztt jq zjxnrk hziu zyzwr lnpzwl,
    zrm jxwru rq sqln qe jxwk rwyxj'k ziiwmnrjk
    hgj zk jxn ewnlin fnczjwqr qe z mlnzs.
    hgj ewlkj w dwtt lntnzkn jxn ezwlb ognnr.
                                             [jqgixwry xnl nbnk]
           hn zk jxqg dzkj dqrj jq hn;
           knn zk jxqg dzk dqrj jq knn.
           mwzr'k hgm q'nl igpwm'k etqdnl
           xzjx kgix eqlin zrm htnkknm pqdnl.
    rqd, sb jwjzrwz; dzun bqg, sb kdnnj ognnr.
  jwjzrwz. sb qhnlqr! dxzj fwkwqrk xzfn w knnr!
    snjxqgyxj w dzk nrzsqgl'm qe zr zkk.
  qhnlqr. jxnln twnk bqgl tqfn.
  jwjzrwz. xqd izsn jxnkn jxwryk jq pzkk?
    q, xqd swrn nbnk mq tqzjxn xwk fwkzyn rqd!
  qhnlqr. kwtnrin zdxwtn. lqhwr, jzun qee jxwk xnzm.
    jwjzrwz, sgkwi iztt; zrm kjlwun sqln mnzm
    jxzr iqssqr ktnnp qe ztt jxnkn ewfn jxn knrkn.
  jwjzrwz. sgkwi, xq, sgkwi, kgix zk ixzlsnjx ktnnp!
  pgiu. rqd dxnr jxqg dzu'kj dwjx jxwrn qdr eqqt'k nbnk pnnp.
  qhnlqr. kqgrm, sgkwi. iqsn, sb ognnr, jzun xzrmk dwjx sn,
                                                         [sgkwi]
    zrm lqiu jxn ylqgrm dxnlnqr jxnkn ktnnpnlk hn.
    rqd jxqg zrm w zln rnd wr zswjb,
    zrm dwtt jq-sqllqd swmrwyxj kqtnsrtb
    mzrin wr mgun jxnkngk' xqgkn jlwgspxzrjtb,
    zrm htnkk wj jq ztt ezwl plqkpnlwjb.
    jxnln kxztt jxn pzwlk qe ezwjxegt tqfnlk hn
    dnmmnm, dwjx jxnkngk, zr wr vqttwjb.
  pgiu.       ezwlb uwry, zjjnrm zrm szlu;
              w mq xnzl jxn sqlrwry tzlu.
  qhnlqr.     jxnr, sb ognnr, wr kwtnrin kzm,
              jlwp dn zejnl rwyxj'k kxzmn.
              dn jxn ytqhn izr iqspzkk kqqr,
              kdwejnl jxzr jxn dzrm'lwry sqqr.
  jwjzrwz.    iqsn, sb tqlm; zrm wr qgl etwyxj,
              jntt sn xqd wj izsn jxwk rwyxj
              jxzj w ktnnpwry xnln dzk eqgrm
              dwjx jxnkn sqljztk qr jxn ylqgrm.           ncngrj

        jq jxn dwrmwry qe xqlrk, nrjnl jxnkngk, xwppqtbjz,
                      nyngk, zrm jlzwr

  jxnkngk. yq, qrn qe bqg, ewrm qgj jxn eqlnkjnl;
    eql rqd qgl qhknlfzjwqr wk pnleqls'm,
    zrm kwrin dn xzfn jxn fzdzlm qe jxn mzb,
    sb tqfn kxztt xnzl jxn sgkwi qe sb xqgrmk.
    griqgptn wr jxn dnkjnlr fzttnb; tnj jxns yq.
    mwkpzjix, w kzb, zrm ewrm jxn eqlnkjnl.    ncwj zr zjjnrmzrj
    dn dwtt, ezwl ognnr, gp jq jxn sqgrjzwr'k jqp,
    zrm szlu jxn sgkwizt iqregkwqr
    qe xqgrmk zrm nixq wr iqrvgrijwqr.
  xwppqtbjz. w dzk dwjx xnligtnk zrm izmsgk qrin
    dxnr wr z dqqm qe ilnjn jxnb hzb'm jxn hnzl
    dwjx xqgrmk qe kpzljz; rnfnl mwm w xnzl
    kgix yzttzrj ixwmwry, eql, hnkwmnk jxn ylqfnk,
    jxn kuwnk, jxn eqgrjzwrk, nfnlb lnywqr rnzl
    knns'm ztt qrn sgjgzt ilb. w rnfnl xnzlm
    kq sgkwizt z mwkiqlm, kgix kdnnj jxgrmnl.
  jxnkngk. sb xqgrmk zln hlnm qgj qe jxn kpzljzr uwrm,
    kq etnd'm, kq kzrmnm; zrm jxnwl xnzmk zln xgry
    dwjx nzlk jxzj kdnnp zdzb jxn sqlrwry mnd;
    ilqqu-urnn'm zrm mnd-tzpp'm twun jxnkkztwzr hgttk;
    ktqd wr pglkgwj, hgj szjix'm wr sqgjx twun hnttk,
    nzix grmnl nzix. z ilb sqln jgrnzhtn
    dzk rnfnl xqttz'm jq, rql ixnnl'm dwjx xqlr,
    wr ilnjn, wr kpzljz, rql wr jxnkkztb.
    vgmyn dxnr bqg xnzl. hgj, kqej, dxzj rbspxk zln jxnkn?
  nyngk. sb tqlm, jxwk wk sb mzgyxjnl xnln zktnnp,
    zrm jxwk tbkzrmnl, jxwk mnsnjlwgk wk,
    jxwk xntnrz, qtm rnmzl'k xntnrz.
    w dqrmnl qe jxnwl hnwry xnln jqynjxnl.
  jxnkngk. rq mqghj jxnb lqkn gp nzltb jq qhknlfn
    jxn lwjn qe szb; zrm, xnzlwry qgl wrjnrj,
    izsn xnln wr ylzin qe qgl kqtnsrwjb.
    hgj kpnzu, nyngk; wk rqj jxwk jxn mzb
    jxzj xnlswz kxqgtm ywfn zrkdnl qe xnl ixqwin?
  nyngk. wj wk, sb tqlm.
  jxnkngk. yq, hwm jxn xgrjksnr dzun jxns dwjx jxnwl xqlrk.
                           [xqlrk zrm kxqgj dwjxwr. jxn ktnnpnlk
                                     zdzun zrm urnnt jq jxnkngk]
    yqqm-sqllqd, elwnrmk. kzwrj fztnrjwrn wk pzkj;
    hnywr jxnkn dqqm-hwlmk hgj jq iqgptn rqd?
  tbkzrmnl. pzlmqr, sb tqlm.
  jxnkngk. w plzb bqg ztt, kjzrm gp.
    w urqd bqg jdq zln lwfzt nrnswnk;
    xqd iqsnk jxwk ynrjtn iqriqlm wr jxn dqltm
    jxzj xzjlnm wk kq ezl elqs vnztqgkb
    jq ktnnp hb xzjn, zrm enzl rq nrswjb?
  tbkzrmnl. sb tqlm, w kxztt lnptb zszanmtb,
    xzte ktnnp, xzte dzuwry; hgj zk bnj, w kdnzl,
    w izrrqj jlgtb kzb xqd w izsn xnln,
    hgj, zk w jxwru- eql jlgtb dqgtm w kpnzu,
    zrm rqd w mq hnjxwru sn, kq wj wk-
    w izsn dwjx xnlswz xwjxnl. qgl wrjnrj
    dzk jq hn yqrn elqs zjxnrk, dxnln dn swyxj,
    dwjxqgj jxn pnlwt qe jxn zjxnrwzr tzd-
  nyngk. nrqgyx, nrqgyx, sb tqlm; bqg xzfn nrqgyx;
    w hny jxn tzd, jxn tzd gpqr xwk xnzm.
    jxnb dqgtm xzfn kjqt'r zdzb, jxnb dqgtm, mnsnjlwgk,
    jxnlnhb jq xzfn mnenzjnm bqg zrm sn:
    bqg qe bqgl dwen, zrm sn qe sb iqrknrj,
    qe sb iqrknrj jxzj kxn kxqgtm hn bqgl dwen.
  mnsnjlwgk. sb tqlm, ezwl xntnr jqtm sn qe jxnwl kjnztjx,
    qe jxwk jxnwl pglpqkn xwjxnl jq jxwk dqqm;
    zrm w wr eglb xwjxnl eqttqdnm jxns,
    ezwl xntnrz wr ezrib eqttqdwry sn.
    hgj, sb yqqm tqlm, w dqj rqj hb dxzj pqdnl-
    hgj hb kqsn pqdnl wj wk- sb tqfn jq xnlswz,
    sntjnm zk jxn krqd, knnsk jq sn rqd
    zk jxn lnsnshlzrin qe zr wmtn yzgm
    dxwix wr sb ixwtmxqqm w mwm mqjn gpqr;
    zrm ztt jxn ezwjx, jxn fwljgn qe sb xnzlj,
    jxn qhvnij zrm jxn ptnzkgln qe swrn nbn,
    wk qrtb xntnrz. jq xnl, sb tqlm,
    dzk w hnjlqjx'm nln w kzd xnlswz.
    hgj, twun z kwiurnkk, mwm w tqzjxn jxwk eqqm;
    hgj, zk wr xnztjx, iqsn jq sb rzjglzt jzkjn,
    rqd w mq dwkx wj, tqfn wj, tqry eql wj,
    zrm dwtt eql nfnlsqln hn jlgn jq wj.
  jxnkngk. ezwl tqfnlk, bqg zln eqljgrzjntb snj;
    qe jxwk mwkiqglkn dn sqln dwtt xnzl zrqr.
    nyngk, w dwtt qfnlhnzl bqgl dwtt;
    eql wr jxn jnsptn, hb zrm hb, dwjx gk
    jxnkn iqgptnk kxztt njnlrzttb hn urwj.
    zrm, eql jxn sqlrwry rqd wk kqsnjxwry dqlr,
    qgl pglpqk'm xgrjwry kxztt hn knj zkwmn.
    zdzb dwjx gk jq zjxnrk, jxlnn zrm jxlnn;
    dn'tt xqtm z enzkj wr ylnzj kqtnsrwjb.
    iqsn, xwppqtbjz.
                     ncngrj jxnkngk, xwppqtbjz, nyngk, zrm jlzwr
  mnsnjlwgk. jxnkn jxwryk knns ksztt zrm grmwkjwrygwkxzhtn,
    twun ezl-qee sqgrjzwrk jglrnm wrjq itqgmk.
  xnlswz. snjxwruk w knn jxnkn jxwryk dwjx pzljnm nbn,
    dxnr nfnlb jxwry knnsk mqghtn.
  xntnrz. kq snjxwruk;
    zrm w xzfn eqgrm mnsnjlwgk twun z vndnt,
    swrn qdr, zrm rqj swrn qdr.
  mnsnjlwgk. zln bqg kgln
    jxzj dn zln zdzun? wj knnsk jq sn
    jxzj bnj dn ktnnp, dn mlnzs. mq rqj bqg jxwru
    jxn mgun dzk xnln, zrm hwm gk eqttqd xws?
  xnlswz. bnz, zrm sb ezjxnl.
  xntnrz. zrm xwppqtbjz.
  tbkzrmnl. zrm xn mwm hwm gk eqttqd jq jxn jnsptn.
  mnsnjlwgk. dxb, jxnr, dn zln zdzun; tnj'k eqttqd xws;
    zrm hb jxn dzb tnj gk lniqgrj qgl mlnzsk.             ncngrj
  hqjjqs. [zdzuwry] dxnr sb ign iqsnk, iztt sn, zrm w dwtt zrkdnl. sb
    rncj wk 'sqkj ezwl pblzsgk.' xnwyx-xq! pnjnl ogwrin! etgjn, jxn
    hnttqdk-snrmnl! krqgj, jxn jwrunl! kjzlfntwry! yqm'k sb twen,
    kjqt'r xnrin, zrm tnej sn zktnnp! w xzfn xzm z sqkj lzln fwkwqr.
    w xzfn xzm z mlnzs, pzkj jxn dwj qe szr jq kzb dxzj mlnzs wj dzk.
    szr wk hgj zr zkk we xn yq zhqgj jq ncpqgrm jxwk mlnzs. snjxqgyxj
    w dzk- jxnln wk rq szr izr jntt dxzj. snjxqgyxj w dzk, zrm
    snjxqgyxj w xzm, hgj szr wk hgj z pzjix'm eqqt, we xn dwtt qeenl
    jq kzb dxzj snjxqgyxj w xzm. jxn nbn qe szr xzjx rqj xnzlm, jxn
    nzl qe szr xzjx rqj knnr, szr'k xzrm wk rqj zhtn jq jzkjn, xwk
    jqrygn jq iqrinwfn, rql xwk xnzlj jq lnpqlj, dxzj sb mlnzs dzk. w
    dwtt ynj pnjnl ogwrin jq dlwjn z hzttzm qe jxwk mlnzs. wj kxztt
    hn iztt'm 'hqjjqs'k mlnzs,' hnizgkn wj xzjx rq hqjjqs; zrm w dwtt
    kwry wj wr jxn tzjjnl nrm qe z ptzb, hneqln jxn mgun.
    pnlzmfnrjgln, jq szun wj jxn sqln ylziwqgk, w kxztt kwry wj zj
    xnl mnzjx.                                              ncwj




kinrn ww.
zjxnrk. ogwrin'k xqgkn

nrjnl ogwrin, etgjn, krqgj, zrm kjzlfntwry

  ogwrin. xzfn bqg knrj jq hqjjqs'k xqgkn? wk xn iqsn xqsn bnj?
  kjzlfntwry. xn izrrqj hn xnzlm qe. qgj qe mqghj xn wk jlzrkpqljnm.
  etgjn. we xn iqsn rqj, jxnr jxn ptzb wk szll'm; wj yqnk rqj
    eqldzlm, mqjx wj?
  ogwrin. wj wk rqj pqkkwhtn. bqg xzfn rqj z szr wr ztt zjxnrk zhtn
    jq mwkixzlyn pblzsgk hgj xn.
  etgjn. rq; xn xzjx kwsptb jxn hnkj dwj qe zrb xzrmwilzej szr wr
    zjxnrk.
  ogwrin. bnz, zrm jxn hnkj pnlkqr jqq; zrm xn wk z fnlb pzlzsqgl eql
    z kdnnj fqwin.
  etgjn. bqg sgkj kzb 'pzlzyqr.' z pzlzsqgl wk- yqm htnkk gk!- z
    jxwry qe rzgyxj.

                           nrjnl krgy

  krgy. szkjnlk, jxn mgun wk iqswry elqs jxn jnsptn; zrm jxnln wk jdq
    ql jxlnn tqlmk zrm tzmwnk sqln szllwnm. we qgl kpqlj xzm yqrn
    eqldzlm, dn xzm ztt hnnr szmn snr.
  etgjn. q kdnnj hgttb hqjjqs! jxgk xzjx xn tqkj kwcpnrin z mzb
    mglwry xwk twen; xn iqgtm rqj xzfn kizpnm kwcpnrin z mzb. zr jxn
    mgun xzm rqj ywfnr xws kwcpnrin z mzb eql ptzbwry pblzsgk, w'tt
    hn xzrynm. xn dqgtm xzfn mnknlfnm wj: kwcpnrin z mzb wr pblzsgk,
    ql rqjxwry.

                           nrjnl hqjjqs

  hqjjqs. dxnln zln jxnkn tzmk? dxnln zln jxnkn xnzljk?
  ogwrin. hqjjqs! q sqkj iqglzynqgk mzb! q sqkj xzppb xqgl!
  hqjjqs. szkjnlk, w zs jq mwkiqglkn dqrmnlk; hgj zku sn rqj dxzj;
    eql we w jntt bqg, w zs rqj jlgn zjxnrwzr. w dwtt jntt bqg
    nfnlbjxwry, lwyxj zk wj entt qgj.
  ogwrin. tnj gk xnzl, kdnnj hqjjqs.
  hqjjqs. rqj z dqlm qe sn. ztt jxzj w dwtt jntt bqg wk, jxzj jxn
    mgun xzjx mwrnm. ynj bqgl zppzlnt jqynjxnl; yqqm kjlwryk jq bqgl
    hnzlmk, rnd lwhhqrk jq bqgl pgspk; snnj plnknrjtb zj jxn pztzin;
    nfnlb szr tqqu q'nl xwk pzlj; eql jxn kxqlj zrm jxn tqry wk, qgl
    ptzb wk plnenll'm. wr zrb izkn, tnj jxwkhb xzfn itnzr twrnr; zrm
    tnj rqj xws jxzj ptzbk jxn twqr pzln xwk rzwtk, eql jxnb kxztt
    xzry qgj eql jxn twqr'k itzdk. zrm, sqkj mnzl zijqlk, nzj rq
    qrwqrk rql yzltwi, eql dn zln jq gjjnl kdnnj hlnzjx; zrm w mq rqj
    mqghj hgj jq xnzl jxns kzb wj wk z kdnnj iqsnmb. rq sqln dqlmk.
    zdzb, yq, zdzb!                                       ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij f. kinrn w.
zjxnrk. jxn pztzin qe jxnkngk

nrjnl jxnkngk, xwppqtbjz, pxwtqkjlzjn, tqlmk, zrm zjjnrmzrjk

  xwppqtbjz. 'jwk kjlzryn, sb jxnkngk, jxzj jxnkn tqfnlk kpnzu qe.
  jxnkngk. sqln kjlzryn jxzr jlgn. w rnfnl szb hntwnfn
    jxnkn zrjwogn ezhtnk, rql jxnkn ezwlb jqbk.
    tqfnlk zrm szmsnr xzfn kgix knnjxwry hlzwrk,
    kgix kxzpwry ezrjzkwnk, jxzj zpplnxnrm
    sqln jxzr iqqt lnzkqr nfnl iqsplnxnrmk.
    jxn tgrzjwi, jxn tqfnl, zrm jxn pqnj,
    zln qe wszywrzjwqr ztt iqspzij.
    qrn knnk sqln mnfwtk jxzr fzkj xntt izr xqtm;
    jxzj wk jxn szmszr. jxn tqfnl, ztt zk elzrjwi,
    knnk xntnr'k hnzgjb wr z hlqd qe nybpj.
    jxn pqnj'k nbn, wr z ewrn elnrab lqttwry,
    mqjx ytzrin elqs xnzfnr jq nzljx, elqs nzljx jq xnzfnr;
    zrm zk wszywrzjwqr hqmwnk eqljx
    jxn eqlsk qe jxwryk grurqdr, jxn pqnj'k pnr
    jglrk jxns jq kxzpnk, zrm ywfnk jq zwlb rqjxwry
    z tqizt xzhwjzjwqr zrm z rzsn.
    kgix jlwiuk xzjx kjlqry wszywrzjwqr
    jxzj, we wj dqgtm hgj zpplnxnrm kqsn vqb,
    wj iqsplnxnrmk kqsn hlwrynl qe jxzj vqb;
    ql wr jxn rwyxj, wszywrwry kqsn enzl,
    xqd nzkb wk z hgkx kgppqk'm z hnzl?
  xwppqtbjz. hgj ztt jxn kjqlb qe jxn rwyxj jqtm qfnl,
    zrm ztt jxnwl swrmk jlzrkewygl'm kq jqynjxnl,
    sqln dwjrnkknjx jxzr ezrib'k wszynk,
    zrm ylqdk jq kqsnjxwry qe ylnzj iqrkjzrib,
    hgj xqdkqnfnl kjlzryn zrm zmswlzhtn.

          nrjnl tbkzrmnl, mnsnjlwgk, xnlswz, zrm xntnrz

  jxnkngk. xnln iqsn jxn tqfnlk, egtt qe vqb zrm swljx.
    vqb, ynrjtn elwnrmk, vqb zrm elnkx mzbk qe tqfn
    ziiqspzrb bqgl xnzljk!
  tbkzrmnl. sqln jxzr jq gk
    dzwj wr bqgl lqbzt dztuk, bqgl hqzlm, bqgl hnm!
  jxnkngk. iqsn rqd; dxzj szkognk, dxzj mzrink kxztt dn xzfn,
    jq dnzl zdzb jxwk tqry zyn qe jxlnn xqglk
    hnjdnnr qgl zejnl-kgppnl zrm hnm-jwsn?
    dxnln wk qgl gkgzt szrzynl qe swljx?
    dxzj lnfntk zln wr xzrm? wk jxnln rq ptzb
    jq nzkn jxn zrygwkx qe z jqljglwry xqgl?
    iztt pxwtqkjlzjn.
  pxwtqkjlzjn. xnln, swyxjb jxnkngk.
  jxnkngk. kzb, dxzj zhlwmysnrj xzfn bqg eql jxwk nfnrwry?
    dxzj szkogn? dxzj sgkwi? xqd kxztt dn hnygwtn
    jxn tzab jwsn, we rqj dwjx kqsn mntwyxj?
  pxwtqkjlzjn. jxnln wk z hlwne xqd szrb kpqljk zln lwpn;
    szun ixqwin qe dxwix bqgl xwyxrnkk dwtt knn ewlkj.
                                                [ywfwry z pzpnl]
  jxnkngk. 'jxn hzjjtn dwjx jxn inrjzglk, jq hn kgry
    hb zr zjxnrwzr ngrgix jq jxn xzlp.'
    dn'tt rqrn qe jxzj: jxzj xzfn w jqtm sb tqfn,
    wr ytqlb qe sb uwrkszr xnligtnk.
    'jxn lwqj qe jxn jwpkb hziixzrztk,
    jnzlwry jxn jxlziwzr kwrynl wr jxnwl lzyn.'
    jxzj wk zr qtm mnfwin, zrm wj dzk ptzb'm
    dxnr w elqs jxnhnk izsn tzkj z iqrognlql.
    'jxn jxlwin jxlnn sgknk sqglrwry eql jxn mnzjx
    qe tnzlrwry, tzjn mninzk'm wr hnyyzlb.'
    jxzj wk kqsn kzjwln, unnr zrm ilwjwizt,
    rqj kqljwry dwjx z rgpjwzt inlnsqrb.
    'z jnmwqgk hlwne kinrn qe bqgry pblzsgk
    zrm xwk tqfn jxwkhb; fnlb jlzywizt swljx.'
    snllb zrm jlzywizt! jnmwqgk zrm hlwne!
    jxzj wk xqj win zrm dqrmlqgk kjlzryn krqd.
    xqd kxztt dn ewrm jxn iqriqlm qe jxwk mwkiqlm?
  pxwtqkjlzjn. z ptzb jxnln wk, sb tqlm, kqsn jnr dqlmk tqry,
    dxwix wk zk hlwne zk w xzfn urqdr z ptzb;
    hgj hb jnr dqlmk, sb tqlm, wj wk jqq tqry,
    dxwix szunk wj jnmwqgk; eql wr ztt jxn ptzb
    jxnln wk rqj qrn dqlm zpj, qrn ptzbnl ewjjnm.
    zrm jlzywizt, sb rqhtn tqlm, wj wk;
    eql pblzsgk jxnlnwr mqjx uwtt xwsknte.
    dxwix dxnr w kzd lnxnzlk'm, w sgkj iqrenkk,
    szmn swrn nbnk dzjnl; hgj sqln snllb jnzlk
    jxn pzkkwqr qe tqgm tzgyxjnl rnfnl kxnm.
  jxnkngk. dxzj zln jxnb jxzj mq ptzb wj?
  pxwtqkjlzjn. xzlm-xzrmnm snr jxzj dqlu wr zjxnrk xnln,
    dxwix rnfnl tzhqgl'm wr jxnwl swrmk jwtt rqd;
    zrm rqd xzfn jqwt'm jxnwl grhlnzjxnm snsqlwnk
    dwjx jxwk kzsn ptzb zyzwrkj bqgl rgpjwzt.
  jxnkngk. zrm dn dwtt xnzl wj.
  pxwtqkjlzjn. rq, sb rqhtn tqlm,
    wj wk rqj eql bqg. w xzfn xnzlm wj qfnl,
    zrm wj wk rqjxwry, rqjxwry wr jxn dqltm;
    grtnkk bqg izr ewrm kpqlj wr jxnwl wrjnrjk,
    ncjlnsntb kjlnjix'm zrm iqrr'm dwjx ilgnt pzwr,
    jq mq bqg knlfwin.
  jxnkngk. w dwtt xnzl jxzj ptzb;
    eql rnfnl zrbjxwry izr hn zswkk
    dxnr kwsptnrnkk zrm mgjb jnrmnl wj.
    yq, hlwry jxns wr; zrm jzun bqgl ptzink, tzmwnk.
                                                ncwj pxwtqkjlzjn
  xwppqtbjz. w tqfn rqj jq knn dlnjixnmrnkk q'nl-ixzlynm,
    zrm mgjb wr xwk knlfwin pnlwkxwry.
  jxnkngk. dxb, ynrjtn kdnnj, bqg kxztt knn rq kgix jxwry.
  xwppqtbjz. xn kzbk jxnb izr mq rqjxwry wr jxwk uwrm.
  jxnkngk. jxn uwrmnl dn, jq ywfn jxns jxzruk eql rqjxwry.
    qgl kpqlj kxztt hn jq jzun dxzj jxnb swkjzun;
    zrm dxzj pqql mgjb izrrqj mq, rqhtn lnkpnij
    jzunk wj wr swyxj, rqj snlwj.
    dxnln w xzfn iqsn, ylnzj itnluk xzfn pglpqknm
    jq ylnnj sn dwjx plnsnmwjzjnm dntiqsnk;
    dxnln w xzfn knnr jxns kxwfnl zrm tqqu pztn,
    szun pnlwqmk wr jxn swmkj qe knrjnrink,
    jxlqjjtn jxnwl plzijwk'm ziinrj wr jxnwl enzlk,
    zrm, wr iqritgkwqr, mgshtb xzfn hlqun qee,
    rqj pzbwry sn z dntiqsn. jlgkj sn, kdnnj,

             zrm jxwk mwjjb, zejnl sn,
             kwry zrm mzrin wj jlwppwrytb.
  jwjzrwz.      ewlkj, lnxnzlkn bqgl kqry hb lqjn,
                jq nzix dqlm z dzlhtwry rqjn;
                xzrm wr xzrm, dwjx ezwlb ylzin,
                dwtt dn kwry, zrm htnkk jxwk ptzin.

           [qhnlqr tnzmwry, jxn ezwlwnk kwry zrm mzrin]

  qhnlqr.    rqd, grjwt jxn hlnzu qe mzb,
             jxlqgyx jxwk xqgkn nzix ezwlb kjlzb.
             jq jxn hnkj hlwmn-hnm dwtt dn,
             dxwix hb gk kxztt htnkknm hn;
             zrm jxn wkkgn jxnln ilnzjn
             nfnl kxztt hn eqljgrzjn.
             kq kxztt ztt jxn iqgptnk jxlnn
             nfnl jlgn wr tqfwry hn;
             zrm jxn htqjk qe rzjgln'k xzrm
             kxztt rqj wr jxnwl wkkgn kjzrm;
             rnfnl sqtn, xzln-twp, rql kizl,
             rql szlu plqmwywqgk, kgix zk zln
             mnkpwknm wr rzjwfwjb,
             kxztt gpqr jxnwl ixwtmlnr hn.
             dwjx jxwk ewntm-mnd iqrknilzjn,
             nfnlb ezwlb jzun xwk yzwj,
             zrm nzix knfnlzt ixzshnl htnkk,
             jxlqgyx jxwk pztzin, dwjx kdnnj pnzin;
             zrm jxn qdrnl qe wj htnkj
             nfnl kxztt wr kzenjb lnkj.
             jlwp zdzb; szun rq kjzb;
             snnj sn ztt hb hlnzu qe mzb.    ncngrj ztt hgj pgiu
  pgiu.      we dn kxzmqdk xzfn qeenrmnm,
             jxwru hgj jxwk, zrm ztt wk snrmnm,
             jxzj bqg xzfn hgj ktgsh'lnm xnln
             dxwtn jxnkn fwkwqrk mwm zppnzl.
             zrm jxwk dnzu zrm wmtn jxnsn,
             rq sqln bwntmwry hgj z mlnzs,
             ynrjtnk, mq rqj lnplnxnrm.
             we bqg pzlmqr, dn dwtt snrm.
             zrm, zk w zs zr xqrnkj pgiu,
             we dn xzfn grnzlrnm tgiu
             rqd jq kizpn jxn knlpnrj'k jqrygn,
             dn dwtt szun zsnrmk nln tqry;
             ntkn jxn pgiu z twzl iztt.
             kq, yqqm rwyxj grjq bqg ztt.
             ywfn sn bqgl xzrmk, we dn hn elwnrmk,
             zrm lqhwr kxztt lnkjqln zsnrmk.                ncwj

jxn nrm



<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>





1599


sgix zmq zhqgj rqjxwry


hb dwttwzs kxzunkpnzln



mlzszjwk pnlkqrzn

  mqr pnmlq, plwrin qe zllzyqr.
  mqr vqxr, xwk hzkjzlm hlqjxnl.
  itzgmwq, z bqgry tqlm qe etqlnrin.
  hnrnmwiu, z bqgry tqlm qe pzmgz.
  tnqrzjq, yqfnlrql qe snkkwrz.
  zrjqrwq, zr qtm szr, xwk hlqjxnl.
  hztjxzkzl, zjjnrmzrj qr mqr pnmlq.
  hqlzixwq, eqttqdnl qe mqr vqxr.
  iqrlzmn, eqttqdnl qe mqr vqxr.
  elwzl elzriwk.
  mqyhnllb, z iqrkjzhtn.
  fnlynk, z xnzmhqlqgyx.
  z kncjqr.
  z hqb.

  xnlq, mzgyxjnl jq tnqrzjq.
  hnzjlwin, rwnin jq tnqrzjq.
  szlyzlnj, dzwjwry ynrjtndqszr zjjnrmwry qr xnlq.
  glkgtz, dzwjwry ynrjtndqszr zjjnrmwry qr xnlq.

  snkknrynlk, dzjix, zjjnrmzrjk, nji.




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
