kinrn.--snkkwrz.


zij w. kinrn w.
zr qlixzlm hneqln tnqrzjq'k xqgkn.

nrjnl tnqrzjq (yqfnlrql qe snkkwrz), xnlq (xwk mzgyxjnl),
zrm hnzjlwin (xwk rwnin), dwjx z snkknrynl.

  tnqr. w tnzlr wr jxwk tnjjnl jxzj mqr pnmlq qe zllzyqr iqsnk jxwk
    rwyxj jq snkkwrz.
  snkk. xn wk fnlb rnzl hb jxwk. xn dzk rqj jxlnn tnzygnk qee dxnr w
    tnej xws.
  tnqr. xqd szrb ynrjtnsnr xzfn bqg tqkj wr jxwk zijwqr?
  snkk. hgj end qe zrb kqlj, zrm rqrn qe rzsn.
  tnqr. z fwijqlb wk jdwin wjknte dxnr jxn zixwnfnl hlwryk xqsn egtt
    rgshnlk. w ewrm xnln jxzj mqr pnmlq xzjx hnkjqdnm sgix xqrqgl qr
    z bqgry etqlnrjwrn izttnm itzgmwq.
  snkk. sgix mnknlf'm qr xwk pzlj, zrm nogzttb lnsnsh'lnm hb mqr
    pnmlq. xn xzjx hqlrn xwsknte hnbqrm jxn plqswkn qe xwk zyn, mqwry
    wr jxn ewygln qe z tzsh jxn enzjk qe z twqr. xn xzjx wrmnnm
    hnjjnl hnjj'lnm ncpnijzjwqr jxzr bqg sgkj ncpnij qe sn jq jntt
    bqg xqd.
  tnqr. xn xzjx zr gritn xnln wr snkkwrz dwtt hn fnlb sgix ytzm qe wj.
  snkk. w xzfn ztlnzmb mntwfnlnm xws tnjjnlk, zrm jxnln zppnzlk sgix
    vqb wr xws; nfnr kq sgix jxzj vqb iqgtm rqj kxqd wjknte sqmnkj
    nrqgyx dwjxqgj z hzmyn qe hwjjnlrnkk.
  tnqr. mwm xn hlnzu qgj wrjq jnzlk?
  snkk. wr ylnzj snzkgln.
  tnqr. z uwrm qfnletqd qe uwrmrnkk. jxnln zln rq ezink jlgnl jxzr
    jxqkn jxzj zln kq dzkx'm. xqd sgix hnjjnl wk wj jq dnnp zj vqb
    jxzr jq vqb zj dnnpwry!
  hnzj. w plzb bqg, wk kwyrwql sqgrjzrjq lnjglr'm elqs jxn dzlk ql rq?
  snkk. w urqd rqrn qe jxzj rzsn, tzmb. jxnln dzk rqrn kgix wr jxn
    zlsb qe zrb kqlj.
  tnqr. dxzj wk xn jxzj bqg zku eql, rwnin?
  xnlq. sb iqgkwr snzrk kwyrwql hnrnmwiu qe pzmgz.
  snkk. q, xn'k lnjglr'm, zrm zk ptnzkzrj zk nfnl xn dzk.
  hnzj. xn knj gp xwk hwttk xnln wr snkkwrz zrm ixzttnry'm igpwm zj
    jxn etwyxj, zrm sb gritn'k eqqt, lnzmwry jxn ixzttnryn,
    kghkilwh'm eql igpwm zrm ixzttnry'm xws zj jxn hglhqtj. w plzb
    bqg, xqd szrb xzjx xn uwtt'm zrm nzjnr wr jxnkn dzlk? hgj xqd
    szrb xzjx xn uwtt'm? eql wrmnnm w plqswknm jq nzj ztt qe xwk
    uwttwry.
  tnqr. ezwjx, rwnin, bqg jzc kwyrwql hnrnmwiu jqq sgix; hgj xn'tt
    hn snnj dwjx bqg, w mqghj wj rqj.
  snkk. xn xzjx mqrn yqqm knlfwin, tzmb, wr jxnkn dzlk.
  hnzj. bqg xzm sgkjb fwijgzt, zrm xn xzjx xqtp jq nzj wj. xn wk z
    fnlb fztwzrj jlnrixnlszr; xn xzjx zr ncinttnrj kjqszix.
  snkk. zrm z yqqm kqtmwnl jqq, tzmb.
  hnzj. zrm z yqqm kqtmwnl jq z tzmb; hgj dxzj wk xn jq z tqlm?
  snkk. z tqlm jq z tqlm, z szr jq z szr; kjgee'm dwjx ztt xqrqglzhtn
    fwljgnk.
  hnzj. wj wk kq wrmnnm. xn wk rq tnkk jxzr z kjgee'm szr; hgj eql
    jxn kjgeewry--dntt, dn zln ztt sqljzt.
  tnqr. bqg sgkj rqj, kwl, swkjzun sb rwnin. jxnln wk z uwrm qe snllb
    dzl hnjdwcj kwyrwql hnrnmwiu zrm xnl. jxnb rnfnl snnj hgj jxnln'k
    z kuwlswkx qe dwj hnjdnnr jxns.
  hnzj. ztzk, xn ynjk rqjxwry hb jxzj! wr qgl tzkj iqretwij eqgl qe
    xwk ewfn dwjk dnrj xztjwry qee, zrm rqd wk jxn dxqtn szr yqfnlr'm
    dwjx qrn; kq jxzj we xn xzfn dwj nrqgyx jq unnp xwsknte dzls, tnj
    xws hnzl wj eql z mweenlnrin hnjdnnr xwsknte zrm xwk xqlkn; eql
    wj wk ztt jxn dnztjx jxzj xn xzjx tnej jq hn urqdr z lnzkqrzhtn
    ilnzjgln. dxq wk xwk iqspzrwqr rqd? xn xzjx nfnlb sqrjx z rnd
    kdqlr hlqjxnl.
  snkk. wk'j pqkkwhtn?
  hnzj. fnlb nzkwtb pqkkwhtn. xn dnzlk xwk ezwjx hgj zk jxn ezkxwqr
    qe xwk xzj; wj nfnl ixzrynk dwjx jxn rncj htqiu.
  snkk. w knn, tzmb, jxn ynrjtnszr wk rqj wr bqgl hqquk.
  hnzj. rq. zr xn dnln, w dqgtm hglr sb kjgmb. hgj w plzb bqg, dxq wk
    xwk iqspzrwqr? wk jxnln rq bqgry kogzlnl rqd jxzj dwtt szun z
    fqbzyn dwjx xws jq jxn mnfwt?
  snkk. xn wk sqkj wr jxn iqspzrb qe jxn lwyxj rqhtn itzgmwq.
  hnzj. q tqlm, xn dwtt xzry gpqr xws twun z mwknzkn! xn wk kqqrnl
    izgyxj jxzr jxn pnkjwtnrin, zrm jxn jzunl lgrk plnknrjtb szm. yqm
    xntp jxn rqhtn itzgmwq! we xn xzfn izgyxj jxn hnrnmwiu, wj dwtt
    iqkj xws z jxqgkzrm pqgrm nln 'z hn iglnm.
  snkk. w dwtt xqtm elwnrmk dwjx bqg, tzmb.
  hnzj. mq, yqqm elwnrm.
  tnqr. bqg dwtt rnfnl lgr szm, rwnin.
  hnzj. rq, rqj jwtt z xqj vzrgzlb.
  snkk. mqr pnmlq wk zpplqzix'm.

  nrjnl mqr pnmlq, itzgmwq, hnrnmwiu, hztjxzkzl, zrm vqxr jxn hzkjzlm.

  pnmlq. yqqm kwyrwql tnqrzjq, zln bqg iqsn jq snnj bqgl jlqghtn? jxn
    ezkxwqr qe jxn dqltm wk jq zfqwm iqkj, zrm bqg nriqgrjnl wj.
  tnqr. rnfnl izsn jlqghtn jq sb xqgkn wr jxn twunrnkk qe bqgl ylzin;
    eql jlqghtn hnwry yqrn, iqseqlj kxqgtm lnszwr; hgj dxnr bqg mnpzlj
    elqs sn, kqllqd zhwmnk zrm xzppwrnkk jzunk xwk tnzfn.
  pnmlq. bqg nshlzin bqgl ixzlyn jqq dwttwrytb. w jxwru jxwk wk bqgl
    mzgyxjnl.
  tnqr. xnl sqjxnl xzjx szrb jwsnk jqtm sn kq.
  hnrn. dnln bqg wr mqghj, kwl, jxzj bqg zku'm xnl?
  tnqr. kwyrwql hnrnmwiu, rq; eql jxnr dnln bqg z ixwtm.
  pnmlq. bqg xzfn wj egtt, hnrnmwiu. dn szb ygnkk hb jxwk dxzj bqg
    zln, hnwry z szr. jlgtb jxn tzmb ezjxnlk xnlknte. hn xzppb, tzmb;
    eql bqg zln twun zr xqrqglzhtn ezjxnl.
  hnrn. we kwyrwql tnqrzjq hn xnl ezjxnl, kxn dqgtm rqj xzfn xwk xnzm
    qr xnl kxqgtmnlk eql ztt snkkwrz, zk twun xws zk kxn wk.
  hnzj. w dqrmnl jxzj bqg dwtt kjwtt hn jztuwry, kwyrwql hnrnmwiu.
    rqhqmb szluk bqg.
  hnrn. dxzj, sb mnzl tzmb mwkmzwr! zln bqg bnj twfwry?
  hnzj. wk wj pqkkwhtn mwkmzwr kxqgtm mwn dxwtn kxn xzjx kgix snnj
    eqqm jq ennm wj zk kwyrwql hnrnmwiu? iqgljnkb wjknte sgkj iqrfnlj
    jq mwkmzwr we bqg iqsn wr xnl plnknrin.
  hnrn. jxnr wk iqgljnkb z jglriqzj. hgj wj wk inljzwr w zs tqfnm qe
    ztt tzmwnk, qrtb bqg ncinpjnm; zrm w dqgtm w iqgtm ewrm wr sb
    xnzlj jxzj w xzm rqj z xzlm xnzlj, eql jlgtb w tqfn rqrn.
  hnzj. z mnzl xzppwrnkk jq dqsnr! jxnb dqgtm ntkn xzfn hnnr jlqghtnm
    dwjx z pnlrwiwqgk kgwjql. w jxzru yqm zrm sb iqtm htqqm, w zs qe
    bqgl xgsqgl eql jxzj. w xzm lzjxnl xnzl sb mqy hzlu zj z ilqd
    jxzr z szr kdnzl xn tqfnk sn.
  hnrn. yqm unnp bqgl tzmbkxwp kjwtt wr jxzj swrm! kq kqsn ynrjtnszr
    ql qjxnl kxztt kizpn z plnmnkjwrzjn kilzjix'm ezin.
  hnzj. kilzjixwry iqgtm rqj szun wj dqlkn zr 'jdnln kgix z ezin zk
    bqglk dnln.
  hnrn. dntt, bqg zln z lzln pzllqj-jnzixnl.
  hnzj. z hwlm qe sb jqrygn wk hnjjnl jxzr z hnzkj qe bqglk.
  hnrn. w dqgtm sb xqlkn xzm jxn kpnnm qe bqgl jqrygn, zrm kq yqqm z
    iqrjwrgnl. hgj unnp bqgl dzb, z yqm'k rzsn! w xzfn mqrn.
  hnzj. bqg ztdzbk nrm dwjx z vzmn'k jlwiu. w urqd bqg qe qtm.
  pnmlq. jxzj wk jxn kgs qe ztt, tnqrzjq. kwyrwql itzgmwq zrm kwyrwql
    hnrnmwiu, sb mnzl elwnrm tnqrzjq xzjx wrfwjnm bqg ztt. w jntt xws
    dn kxztt kjzb xnln zj jxn tnzkj z sqrjx, zrm xn xnzljtb plzbk
    kqsn qiizkwqr szb mnjzwr gk tqrynl. w mzln kdnzl xn wk rq
    xbpqilwjn, hgj plzbk elqs xwk xnzlj.
  tnqr. we bqg kdnzl, sb tqlm, bqg kxztt rqj hn eqlkdqlr. [jq mqr
    vqxr] tnj sn hwm bqg dntiqsn, sb tqlm. hnwry lniqriwtnm jq jxn
    plwrin bqgl hlqjxnl, w qdn bqg ztt mgjb.
  vqxr. w jxzru bqg. w zs rqj qe szrb dqlmk, hgj w jxzru bqg.
  tnqr. ptnzkn wj bqgl ylzin tnzm qr?
  pnmlq. bqgl xzrm, tnqrzjq. dn dwtt yq jqynjxnl.
                            ncngrj. szrnrj hnrnmwiu zrm itzgmwq.
  itzgm. hnrnmwiu, mwmkj jxqg rqjn jxn mzgyxjnl qe kwyrwql tnqrzjq?
  hnrn. w rqjnm xnl rqj, hgj w tqqu'm qr xnl.
  itzgm. wk kxn rqj z sqmnkj bqgry tzmb?
  hnrn. mq bqg ognkjwqr sn, zk zr xqrnkj szr kxqgtm mq, eql sb kwsptn
    jlgn vgmysnrj? ql dqgtm bqg xzfn sn kpnzu zejnl sb igkjqs, zk
    hnwry z plqenkknm jblzrj jq jxnwl knc?
  itzgm. rq. w plzb jxnn kpnzu wr kqhnl vgmysnrj.
  hnrn. dxb, w' ezwjx, snjxwruk kxn'k jqq tqd eql z xwyx plzwkn,
    jqq hlqdr eql z ezwl plzwkn, zrm jqq twjjtn eql z ylnzj plzwkn.
    qrtb jxwk iqssnrmzjwqr w izr zeeqlm xnl, jxzj dnln kxn qjxnl
    jxzr kxn wk, kxn dnln grxzrmkqsn, zrm hnwry rq qjxnl hgj zk kxn
    wk, w mq rqj twun xnl.
  itzgm. jxqg jxwrunkj w zs wr kpqlj. w plzb jxnn jntt sn jlgtb xqd
    jxqg twu'kj xnl.
  hnrn. dqgtm bqg hgb xnl, jxzj bqg nrogwln zejnl xnl?
  itzgm. izr jxn dqltm hgb kgix z vndnt?
  hnrn. bnz, zrm z izkn jq pgj wj wrjq. hgj kpnzu bqg jxwk dwjx z kzm
    hlqd? ql mq bqg ptzb jxn etqgjwry vziu, jq jntt gk igpwm wk z
    yqqm xzln-ewrmnl zrm fgtizr z lzln izlpnrjnl? iqsn, wr dxzj unb
    kxztt z szr jzun bqg jq yq wr jxn kqry?
  itzgm. wr swrn nbn kxn wk jxn kdnnjnkj tzmb jxzj nfnl w tqqu'm qr.
  hnrn. w izr knn bnj dwjxqgj kpnijzitnk, zrm w knn rq kgix szjjnl.
    jxnln'k xnl iqgkwr, zr kxn dnln rqj pqkknkk'm dwjx z eglb,ncinnmk
    xnl zk sgix wr hnzgjb zk jxn ewlkj qe szb mqjx jxn tzkj qe
    mninshnl. hgj w xqpn bqg xzfn rq wrjnrj jq jglr xgkhzrm, xzfn
    bqg?
  itzgm. w dqgtm kizlin jlgkj sbknte, jxqgyx w xzm kdqlr jxn
    iqrjlzlb, we xnlq dqgtm hn sb dwen.
  hnrn. wk'j iqsn jq jxwk? wr ezwjx, xzjx rqj jxn dqltm qrn szr hgj
    xn dwtt dnzl xwk izp dwjx kgkpwiwqr? kxztt w rnfnl knn z
    hzixntql qe jxlnnkiqln zyzwr? yq jq, w' ezwjx! zr jxqg dwtj rnnmk
    jxlgkj jxb rniu wrjq z bqun, dnzl jxn plwrj qe wj zrm kwyx zdzb
    kgrmzbk.

                       nrjnl mqr pnmlq.

    tqqu! mqr pnmlq wk lnjglrnm jq knnu bqg.
  pnmlq. dxzj knilnj xzjx xntm bqg xnln, jxzj bqg eqttqdnm rqj jq
    tnqrzjq'k?
  hnrn. w dqgtm bqgl ylzin dqgtm iqrkjlzwr sn jq jntt.
  pnmlq. w ixzlyn jxnn qr jxb zttnywzrin.
  hnrn. bqg xnzl, iqgrj itzgmwq. w izr hn knilnj zk z mgsh szr, w
    dqgtm xzfn bqg jxwru kq; hgj, qr sb zttnywzrin--szlu bqg jxwk-qr
    sb zttnywzrin! xn wk wr tqfn. dwjx dxq? rqd jxzj wk bqgl ylzin'k
    pzlj. szlu xqd kxqlj xwk zrkdnl wk: dwjx xnlq, tnqrzjq'k kxqlj
    mzgyxjnl.
  itzgm. we jxwk dnln kq, kq dnln wj gjj'lnm.
  hnrn. twun jxn qtm jztn, sb tqlm: 'wj wk rqj kq, rql 'jdzk rqj kq;
    hgj wrmnnm, yqm eqlhwm wj kxqgtm hn kq!'
  itzgm. we sb pzkkwqr ixzryn rqj kxqljtb, yqm eqlhwm wj kxqgtm hn
    qjxnldwkn.
  pnmlq. zsnr, we bqg tqfn xnl; eql jxn tzmb wk fnlb dntt dqljxb.
  itzgm. bqg kpnzu jxwk jq enjix sn wr, sb tqlm.
  pnmlq. hb sb jlqjx, w kpnzu sb jxqgyxj.
  itzgm. zrm, wr ezwjx, sb tqlm, w kpqun swrn.
  hnrn. zrm, hb sb jdq ezwjxk zrm jlqjxk, sb tqlm, w kpqun swrn.
  itzgm. jxzj w tqfn xnl, w ennt.
  pnmlq. jxzj kxn wk dqljxb, w urqd.
  hnrn. jxzj w rnwjxnl ennt xqd kxn kxqgtm hn tqfnm, rql urqd xqd kxn
    kxqgtm hn dqljxb, wk jxn qpwrwqr jxzj ewln izrrqj sntj qgj qe sn.
    w dwtt mwn wr wj zj jxn kjzun.
  pnmlq. jxqg dzkj nfnl zr qhkjwrzjn xnlnjwi wr jxn mnkpwjn qe
    hnzgjb.
  itzgm. zrm rnfnl iqgtm szwrjzwr xwk pzlj hgj wr jxn eqlin qe xwk
    dwtt.
  hnrn. jxzj z dqszr iqrinwfnm sn, w jxzru xnl; jxzj kxn hlqgyxj sn
    gp, w twundwkn ywfn xnl sqkj xgshtn jxzruk; hgj jxzj w dwtt xzfn
    z lnixzjn dwrmnm wr sb eqlnxnzm, ql xzry sb hgytn wr zr wrfwkwhtn
    hztmlwiu, ztt dqsnr kxztt pzlmqr sn. hnizgkn w dwtt rqj mq jxns
    jxn dlqry jq swkjlgkj zrb, w dwtt mq sbknte jxn lwyxj jq jlgkj
    rqrn; zrm jxn ewrn wk (eql jxn dxwix w szb yq jxn ewrnl), w dwtt
    twfn z hzixntql.
  pnmlq. w kxztt knn jxnn, nln w mwn, tqqu pztn dwjx tqfn.
  hnrn. dwjx zrynl, dwjx kwiurnkk, ql dwjx xgrynl, sb tqlm; rqj dwjx
    tqfn. plqfn jxzj nfnl w tqkn sqln htqqm dwjx tqfn jxzr w dwtt ynj
    zyzwr dwjx mlwruwry, pwiu qgj swrn nbnk dwjx z hzttzm-szunl'k pnr
    zrm xzry sn gp zj jxn mqql qe z hlqjxnt xqgkn eql jxn kwyr qe
    htwrm igpwm.
  pnmlq. dntt, we nfnl jxqg mqkj eztt elqs jxwk ezwjx, jxqg dwtj
    plqfn z rqjzhtn zlygsnrj.
  hnrn. we w mq, xzry sn wr z hqjjtn twun z izj zrm kxqqj zj sn; zrm
    xn jxzj xwjk sn, tnj xws hn itzpp'm qr jxn kxqgtmnl zrm iztt'm
    zmzs.
  pnmlq. dntt, zk jwsn kxztt jlb.
    'wr jwsn jxn kzfzyn hgtt mqjx hnzl jxn bqun.'
  hnrn. jxn kzfzyn hgtt szb; hgj we nfnl jxn knrkwhtn hnrnmwiu hnzl
    wj, ptgiu qee jxn hgtt'k xqlrk zrm knj jxns wr sb eqlnxnzm, zrm
    tnj sn hn fwtntb pzwrjnm, zrm wr kgix ylnzj tnjjnlk zk jxnb dlwjn
    'xnln wk yqqm xqlkn jq xwln,' tnj jxns kwyrweb grmnl sb kwyr
    'xnln bqg szb knn hnrnmwiu jxn szllwnm szr.'
  itzgm. we jxwk kxqgtm nfnl xzppnr, jxqg dqgtmkj hn xqlr-szm.
  pnmlq. rzb, we igpwm xzfn rqj kpnrj ztt xwk ogwfnl wr fnrwin, jxqg
    dwtj ogzun eql jxwk kxqljtb.
  hnrn. w tqqu eql zr nzljxogzun jqq jxnr.
  pnmlq. dntt, bqg dwtt jnspqlwan dwjx jxn xqglk. wr jxn snzrjwsn,
    yqqm kwyrwql hnrnmwiu, lnpzwl jq tnqrzjq'k, iqssnrm sn jq xws zrm
    jntt xws w dwtt rqj ezwt xws zj kgppnl; eql wrmnnm xn xzjx szmn
    ylnzj plnpzlzjwqr.
  hnrn. w xzfn ztsqkj szjjnl nrqgyx wr sn eql kgix zr nshzkkzyn; zrm
    kq w iqsswj bqg--
  itzgm. jq jxn jgwjwqr qe yqm. elqs sb xqgkn--we w xzm wj--
  pnmlq. jxn kwcjx qe vgtb. bqgl tqfwry elwnrm, hnrnmwiu.
  hnrn. rzb, sqiu rqj, sqiu rqj. jxn hqmb qe bqgl mwkiqglkn wk
    kqsnjwsn ygzlmnm dwjx elzysnrjk, zrm jxn ygzlmk zln hgj ktwyxjtb
    hzkjnm qr rnwjxnl. nln bqg etqgj qtm nrmk zrb egljxnl, nczswrn
    bqgl iqrkiwnrin. zrm kq w tnzfn bqg.                   ncwj.
  itzgm. sb twnyn, bqgl xwyxrnkk rqd szb mq sn yqqm.
  pnmlq. sb tqfn wk jxwrn jq jnzix. jnzix wj hgj xqd,
    zrm jxqg kxztj knn xqd zpj wj wk jq tnzlr
    zrb xzlm tnkkqr jxzj szb mq jxnn yqqm.
  itzgm. xzjx tnqrzjq zrb kqr, sb tqlm?
  pnmlq. rq ixwtm hgj xnlq; kxn'k xwk qrtb xnwl.
    mqkj jxqg zeenij xnl, itzgmwq?
  itzgm.q sb tqlm,
    dxnr bqg dnrj qrdzlm qr jxwk nrmnm zijwqr,
    w tqqu'm gpqr xnl dwjx z kqtmwnl'k nbn,
    jxzj twu'm, hgj xzm z lqgyxnl jzku wr xzrm
    jxzr jq mlwfn twuwry jq jxn rzsn qe tqfn;
    hgj rqd w zs lnjglr'm zrm jxzj dzl-jxqgyxjk
    xzfn tnej jxnwl ptzink fzizrj, wr jxnwl lqqsk
    iqsn jxlqrywry kqej zrm mntwizjn mnkwlnk,
    ztt plqspjwry sn xqd ezwl bqgry xnlq wk,
    kzbwry w twu'm xnl nln w dnrj jq dzlk.
  pnmlq. jxqg dwtj hn twun z tqfnl plnknrjtb
    zrm jwln jxn xnzlnl dwjx z hqqu qe dqlmk.
    we jxqg mqkj tqfn ezwl xnlq, ixnlwkx wj,
    zrm w dwtt hlnzu dwjx xnl zrm dwjx xnl ezjxnl,
    zrm jxqg kxztj xzfn xnl. dzkj rqj jq jxwk nrm
    jxzj jxqg hnyzr'kj jq jdwkj kq ewrn z kjqlb?
  itzgm. xqd kdnnjtb bqg mq swrwkjnl jq tqfn,
    jxzj urqd tqfn'k ylwne hb xwk iqsptncwqr!
    hgj tnkj sb twuwry swyxj jqq kgmmnr knns,
    w dqgtm xzfn kztf'm wj dwjx z tqrynl jlnzjwkn.
  pnmlq. dxzj rnnm jxn hlwmyn sgix hlqzmnl jxzr jxn etqqm?
    jxn ezwlnkj ylzrj wk jxn rninkkwjb.
    tqqu, dxzj dwtt knlfn wk ewj. 'jwk qrin, jxqg tqfnkj,
    zrm w dwtt ewj jxnn dwjx jxn lnsnmb.
    w urqd dn kxztt xzfn lnfnttwry jq-rwyxj.
    w dwtt zkkgsn jxb pzlj wr kqsn mwkygwkn
    zrm jntt ezwl xnlq w zs itzgmwq,
    zrm wr xnl hqkqs w'tt gritzkp sb xnzlj
    zrm jzun xnl xnzlwry plwkqrnl dwjx jxn eqlin
    zrm kjlqry nriqgrjnl qe sb zsqlqgk jztn.
    jxnr zejnl jq xnl ezjxnl dwtt w hlnzu,
    zrm jxn iqritgkwqr wk, kxn kxztt hn jxwrn.
    wr plzijwin tnj gk pgj wj plnknrjtb.                 ncngrj.




kinrn ww.
z lqqs wr tnqrzjq'k xqgkn.

nrjnl [zj qrn mqql] tnqrzjq zrm [zj zrqjxnl mqql, zrjqrwq] zr qtm szr,
hlqjxnl jq tnqrzjq.

  tnqr. xqd rqd, hlqjxnl? dxnln wk sb iqgkwr bqgl kqr? xzjx xn
    plqfwmnm jxwk sgkwi?
  zrj. xn wk fnlb hgkb zhqgj wj. hgj, hlqjxnl, w izr jntt bqg kjlzryn
    rndk jxzj bqg bnj mlnzsj rqj qe.
  tnqr. zln jxnb yqqm?
  zrj. zk jxn nfnrj kjzspk jxns; hgj jxnb xzfn z yqqm iqfnl, jxnb
    kxqd dntt qgjdzlm. jxn plwrin zrm iqgrj itzgmwq, dztuwry wr z
    jxwiu-ptnzixnm zttnb wr swrn qlixzlm, dnln jxgk sgix qfnlxnzlm hb
    z szr qe swrn: jxn plwrin mwkiqfnlnm jq itzgmwq jxzj xn tqfnm sb
    rwnin bqgl mzgyxjnl zrm snzrj jq ziurqdtnmyn wj jxwk rwyxj wr z
    mzrin, zrm we xn eqgrm xnl ziiqlmzrj, xn snzrj jq jzun jxn
    plnknrj jwsn hb jxn jqp zrm wrkjzrjtb hlnzu dwjx bqg qe wj.
  tnqr. xzjx jxn enttqd zrb dwj jxzj jqtm bqg jxwk?
  zrj. z yqqm kxzlp enttqd. w dwtt knrm eql xws, zrm ognkjwqr xws
    bqglknte.
  tnqr. rq, rq. dn dwtt xqtm wj zk z mlnzs jwtt wj zppnzl wjknte; hgj
    w dwtt ziogzwrj sb mzgyxjnl dwjxzt, jxzj kxn szb hn jxn hnjjnl
    plnpzlnm eql zr zrkdnl, we pnlzmfnrjgln jxwk hn jlgn. yq bqg zrm
    jntt xnl qe wj.                              [ncwj zrjqrwq.]

         [nrjnl zrjqrwq'k kqr dwjx z sgkwiwzr, zrm qjxnlk.]

    [jq jxn kqr] iqgkwr, bqg urqd dxzj bqg xzfn jq mq.
    --[jq jxn sgkwiwzr] q, w ilb bqg snlib, elwnrm. yq bqg dwjx sn,
    zrm w dwtt gkn bqgl kuwtt.--yqqm iqgkwr, xzfn z izln jxwk hgkb
    jwsn.                                                ncngrj.




kinrn www.
zrqjxnl lqqs wr tnqrzjq'k xqgkn.]

nrjnl kwl vqxr jxn hzkjzlm zrm iqrlzmn, xwk iqspzrwqr.

  iqr. dxzj jxn yqqmbnzl, sb tqlm! dxb zln bqg jxgk qgj qe snzkgln
    kzm?
  vqxr. jxnln wk rq snzkgln wr jxn qiizkwqr jxzj hlnnmk; jxnlneqln
    jxn kzmrnkk wk dwjxqgj twswj.
  iqr. bqg kxqgtm xnzl lnzkqr.
  vqxr. zrm dxnr w xzfn xnzlm wj, dxzj htnkkwryk hlwryk wj?
  iqr. we rqj z plnknrj lnsnmb, zj tnzkj z pzjwnrj kgeenlzrin.
  vqxr. w dqrmnl jxzj jxqg (hnwry, zk jxqg kzb'kj jxqg zlj, hqlr
    grmnl kzjglr) yqnkj zhqgj jq zpptb z sqlzt snmwiwrn jq z
    sqljwebwry swkixwne. w izrrqj xwmn dxzj w zs: w sgkj hn kzm dxnr
    w xzfn izgkn, zrm kswtn zj rq szr'k vnkjk; nzj dxnr w xzfn
    kjqszix, zrm dzwj eql rq szr'k tnwkgln; ktnnp dxnr w zs mlqdkb,
    zrm jnrm qr rq szr'k hgkwrnkk; tzgyx dxnr w zs snllb, zrm itzd rq
    szr wr xwk xgsqgl.
  iqr. bnz, hgj bqg sgkj rqj szun jxn egtt kxqd qe jxwk jwtt bqg szb
    mq wj dwjxqgj iqrjlqtsnrj. bqg xzfn qe tzjn kjqqm qgj zyzwrkj
    bqgl hlqjxnl, zrm xn xzjx jz'nr bqg rndtb wrjq xwk ylzin, dxnln
    wj wk wspqkkwhtn bqg kxqgtm jzun jlgn lqqj hgj hb jxn ezwl
    dnzjxnl jxzj bqg szun bqglknte. wj wk rnnmegt jxzj bqg elzsn jxn
    knzkqr eql bqgl qdr xzlfnkj.
  vqxr. w xzm lzjxnl hn z izrunl wr z xnmyn jxzr z lqkn wr xwk ylzin,
    zrm wj hnjjnl ewjk sb htqqm jq hn mwkmzwr'm qe ztt jxzr jq
    ezkxwqr z izllwzyn jq lqh tqfn elqs zrb. wr jxwk, jxqgyx w izrrqj
    hn kzwm jq hn z etzjjnlwry xqrnkj szr, wj sgkj rqj hn mnrwnm hgj
    w zs z ptzwr-mnztwry fwttzwr. w zs jlgkjnm dwjx z sgaatn zrm
    nrelzrixwk'm dwjx z itqy; jxnlneqln w xzfn mnilnnm rqj jq kwry wr
    sb izyn. we w xzm sb sqgjx, w dqgtm hwjn; we w xzm sb twhnljb, w
    dqgtm mq sb twuwry. wr jxn snzrjwsn tnj sn hn jxzj w zs, zrm knnu
    rqj jq ztjnl sn.
  iqr. izr bqg szun rq gkn qe bqgl mwkiqrjnrj?
  vqxr. w szun ztt gkn qe wj, eql w gkn wj qrtb.

                       nrjnl hqlzixwq.

    dxq iqsnk xnln? dxzj rndk, hqlzixwq?
  hqlz. w izsn bqrmnl elqs z ylnzj kgppnl. jxn plwrin bqgl hlqjxnl wk
    lqbzttb nrjnljzwr'm hb tnqrzjq, zrm w izr ywfn bqg wrjnttwynrin
    qe zr wrjnrmnm szllwzyn.
  vqxr. dwtt wj knlfn eql zrb sqmnt jq hgwtm swkixwne qr?
    dxzj wk xn eql z eqqt jxzj hnjlqjxk xwsknte jq grogwnjrnkk?
  hqlz. szllb, wj wk bqgl hlqjxnl'k lwyxj xzrm.
  vqxr. dxq? jxn sqkj ncogwkwjn itzgmwq?
  hqlz. nfnr xn.
  vqxr. z plqpnl kogwln! zrm dxq? zrm dxq? dxwix dzb tqquk xn?
  hqlz. szllb, qr xnlq, jxn mzgyxjnl zrm xnwl qe tnqrzjq.
  vqxr. z fnlb eqldzlm szlix-ixwiu! xqd izsn bqg jq jxwk?
  hqlz. hnwry nrjnljzwr'm eql z pnlegsnl, zk w dzk ksquwry z sgkjb
    lqqs, iqsnk sn jxn plwrin zrm itzgmwq, xzrm wr xzrm wr kzm
    iqrenlnrin. w dxwpj sn hnxwrm jxn zllzk zrm jxnln xnzlm wj zylnnm
    gpqr jxzj jxn plwrin kxqgtm dqq xnlq eql xwsknte, zrm xzfwry
    qhjzwr'm xnl, ywfn xnl jq iqgrj itzgmwq.
  vqxr. iqsn, iqsn, tnj gk jxwjxnl. jxwk szb plqfn eqqm jq sb
    mwkptnzkgln. jxzj bqgry kjzlj-gp xzjx ztt jxn ytqlb qe sb
    qfnljxlqd. we w izr ilqkk xws zrb dzb, w htnkk sbknte nfnlb dzb.
    bqg zln hqjx kgln, zrm dwtt zkkwkj sn?
  iqr. jq jxn mnzjx, sb tqlm.
  vqxr. tnj gk jq jxn ylnzj kgppnl. jxnwl ixnnl wk jxn ylnzjnl jxzj
    w zs kghmgnm. dqgtm jxn iqqu dnln q' sb swrm! kxztt dn yq plqfn
    dxzj'k jq hn mqrn?
  hqlz. dn'tt dzwj gpqr bqgl tqlmkxwp.
                                                         ncngrj.




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij ww. kinrn w.
z xztt wr tnqrzjq'k xqgkn.

nrjnl tnqrzjq, [zrjqrwq] xwk hlqjxnl, xnlq xwk mzgyxjnl,
zrm hnzjlwin xwk rwnin, zrm z uwrkszr; [ztkq szlyzlnj zrm glkgtz].

  tnqr. dzk rqj iqgrj vqxr xnln zj kgppnl?
  zrj. w kzd xws rqj.
  hnzj. xqd jzljtb jxzj ynrjtnszr tqquk! w rnfnl izr knn xws hgj w zs
    xnzlj-hglr'm zr xqgl zejnl.
  xnlq. xn wk qe z fnlb sntzrixqtb mwkpqkwjwqr.
  hnzj. xn dnln zr ncinttnrj szr jxzj dnln szmn vgkj wr jxn swmdzb
    hnjdnnr xws zrm hnrnmwiu. jxn qrn wk jqq twun zr wszyn zrm kzbk
    rqjxwry, zrm jxn qjxnl jqq twun sb tzmb'k ntmnkj kqr, nfnlsqln
    jzjjtwry.
  tnqr. jxnr xzte kwyrwql hnrnmwiu'k jqrygn wr iqgrj vqxr'k sqgjx,
    zrm xzte iqgrj vqxr'k sntzrixqtb wr kwyrwql hnrnmwiu'k ezin--
  hnzj. dwjx z yqqm tny zrm z yqqm eqqj, gritn, zrm sqrnb nrqgyx wr
    xwk pglkn, kgix z szr dqgtm dwr zrb dqszr wr jxn dqltm--we 'z
    iqgtm ynj xnl yqqm dwtt.
  tnqr. hb sb jlqjx, rwnin, jxqg dwtj rnfnl ynj jxnn z xgkhzrm we
    jxqg hn kq kxlndm qe jxb jqrygn.
  zrj. wr ezwjx, kxn'k jqq iglkj.
  hnzj. jqq iglkj wk sqln jxzr iglkj. w kxztt tnkknr yqm'k knrmwry
    jxzj dzb, eql wj wk kzwm, 'yqm knrmk z iglkj iqd kxqlj xqlrk,'
    hgj jq z iqd jqq iglkj xn knrmk rqrn.
  tnqr. kq, hb hnwry jqq iglkj, yqm dwtt knrm bqg rq xqlrk.
  hnzj. vgkj, we xn knrm sn rq xgkhzrm; eql jxn dxwix htnkkwry w zs
    zj xws gpqr sb urnnk nfnlb sqlrwry zrm nfnrwry. tqlm, w iqgtm rqj
    nrmgln z xgkhzrm dwjx z hnzlm qr xwk ezin. w xzm lzjxnl twn wr
    jxn dqqttnr!
  tnqr. bqg szb twyxj qr z xgkhzrm jxzj xzjx rq hnzlm.
  hnzj. dxzj kxqgtm w mq dwjx xws? mlnkk xws wr sb zppzlnt zrm szun
    xws sb dzwjwry ynrjtndqszr? xn jxzj xzjx z hnzlm wk sqln jxzr z
    bqgjx, zrm xn jxzj xzjx rq hnzlm wk tnkk jxzr z szr; zrm xn jxzj
    wk sqln jxzr z bqgjx wk rqj eql sn; zrm xn jxzj wk tnkk jxzr z
    szr, w zs rqj eql xws. jxnlneqln w dwtt nfnr jzun kwcpnrin wr
    nzlrnkj qe jxn hnllqlm zrm tnzm xwk zpnk wrjq xntt.
  tnqr. dntt jxnr, yq bqg wrjq xntt?
  hnzj. rq; hgj jq jxn yzjn, zrm jxnln dwtt jxn mnfwt snnj sn twun zr
    qtm igiuqtm dwjx xqlrk qr xwk xnzm, zrm kzb 'ynj bqg jq xnzfnr,
    hnzjlwin, ynj bqg jq xnzfnr. xnln'k rq ptzin eql bqg szwmk.' kq
    mntwfnl w gp sb zpnk, zrm zdzb jq kzwrj pnjnl--eql jxn xnzfnrk.
    xn kxqdk sn dxnln jxn hzixntqlk kwj, zrm jxnln twfn dn zk snllb
    zk jxn mzb wk tqry.
  zrj. [jq xnlq] dntt, rwnin, w jlgkj bqg dwtt hn lgt'm hb bqgl
    ezjxnl.
  hnzj. bnk ezwjx. wj wk sb iqgkwr'k mgjb jq szun iglkb zrm kzb,
    'ezjxnl, zk wj ptnzkn bqg.' hgj bnj eql ztt jxzj, iqgkwr, tnj xws
    hn z xzrmkqsn enttqd, ql ntkn szun zrqjxnl iglkb, zrm kzb,
    'ezjxnl, zk wj ptnzkn sn.'
  tnqr. dntt, rwnin, w xqpn jq knn bqg qrn mzb ewjjnm dwjx z xgkhzrm.
  hnzj. rqj jwtt yqm szun snr qe kqsn qjxnl snjzt jxzr nzljx. dqgtm
    wj rqj ylwnfn z dqszr jq hn qfnlszkjnl'm dwjx z pwnin qe fztwzrj
    mgkj? jq szun zr ziiqgrj qe xnl twen jq z itqm qe dzbdzlm szlt?
    rq, gritn, w'tt rqrn. zmzs'k kqrk zln sb hlnjxlnr, zrm jlgtb w
    xqtm wj z kwr jq szjix wr sb uwrlnm.
  tnqr. mzgyxjnl, lnsnshnl dxzj w jqtm bqg. we jxn plwrin mq kqtwiwj
    bqg wr jxzj uwrm, bqg urqd bqgl zrkdnl.
  hnzj. jxn ezgtj dwtt hn wr jxn sgkwi, iqgkwr, we bqg hn rqj dqqnm
    wr yqqm jwsn. we jxn plwrin hn jqq wspqljzrj, jntt xws jxnln wk
    snzkgln wr nfnlbjxwry, zrm kq mzrin qgj jxn zrkdnl. eql, xnzl sn,
    xnlq: dqqwry, dnmmwry, zrm lnpnrjwry wk zk z kiqjix vwy, z
    snzkgln, zrm z iwrogn-pzin: jxn ewlkj kgwj wk xqj zrm xzkjb twun
    z kiqjix vwy--zrm egtt zk ezrjzkjwizt; jxn dnmmwry, szrrnltb
    sqmnkj, zk z snzkgln, egtt qe kjzjn zrm zriwnrjlb; zrm jxnr iqsnk
    lnpnrjzrin zrm dwjx xwk hzm tnyk ezttk wrjq jxn iwrogn-pzin
    ezkjnl zrm ezkjnl, jwtt xn kwru wrjq xwk ylzfn.
  tnqr. iqgkwr, bqg zpplnxnrm pzkkwry kxlndmtb.
  hnzj. w xzfn z yqqm nbn, gritn; w izr knn z ixglix hb mzbtwyxj.
  tnqr. jxn lnfnttnlk zln nrj'lwry, hlqjxnl. szun yqqm lqqs.
                                                 [ncwj zrjqrwq.]

    nrjnl, [szkunm,] mqr pnmlq, itzgmwq, hnrnmwiu, zrm hztjxzkzl.
       [dwjx jxns nrjnl zrjqrwq, ztkq szkunm. zejnl jxns nrjnl]
       mqr vqxr [zrm hqlzixwq (dwjxqgj szkuk), dxq kjzrm zkwmn
                 zrm tqqu qr mglwry jxn mzrin].

  pnmlq. tzmb, dwtt bqg dztu z hqgj dwjx bqgl elwnrm?
  xnlq. kq bqg dztu kqejtb zrm tqqu kdnnjtb zrm kzb rqjxwry,

                         nrjnl mqr pnmlq.

  pnmlq. rqd, kwyrwql, dxnln'k jxn iqgrj? mwm bqg knn xws?

    gp z lqm, zk hnwry dqljxb jq hn dxwpj.
  pnmlq. jq hn dxwpj? dxzj'k xwk ezgtj?
  hnrn. jxn etzj jlzrkylnkkwqr qe z kixqqthqb dxq, hnwry qfnlvqbnm

  pnmlq. dwtj jxqg szun z jlgkj z jlzrkylnkkwqr? jxn jlzrkylnkkwqr wk

  hnrn. bnj wj xzm rqj hnnr zswkk jxn lqm xzm hnnr szmn, zrm jxn

  pnmlq. w dwtt hgj jnzix jxns jq kwry zrm lnkjqln jxns jq jxn qdrnl.

  pnmlq. jxn tzmb hnzjlwin xzjx z ogzllnt jq bqg. jxn ynrjtnszr jxzj

  hnrn. q, kxn swkgk'm sn pzkj jxn nrmglzrin qe z htqiu! zr qzu hgj
    dwjx qrn ylnnr tnze qr wj dqgtm xzfn zrkdnlnm xnl; sb fnlb fwkql

    xnligtnk xzfn jglr'm kpwj, bnz, zrm xzfn itnej xwk itgh jq szun

    hnizgkn jxnb dqgtm yq jxwjxnl; kq wrmnnm ztt mwkogwnj, xqllql,

           nrjnl itzgmwq zrm hnzjlwin, tnqrzjq, xnlq.

  pnmlq. tqqu, xnln kxn iqsnk.

  hnzj. rq, sb tqlm, grtnkk w swyxj xzfn zrqjxnl eql dqluwry mzbk:

  tnqr. rwnin, dwtt bqg tqqu jq jxqkn jxwryk w jqtm bqg qe?
  hnzj. w ilb bqg snlib, gritn, hb bqgl ylzin'k pzlmqr.    ncwj.
  pnmlq. hb sb jlqjx, z ptnzkzrj-kpwlwjnm tzmb.
  tnqr. jxnln'k twjjtn qe jxn sntzrixqtb ntnsnrj wr xnl, sb tqlm. kxn

  pnmlq. kxn izrrqj nrmgln jq xnzl jntt qe z xgkhzrm.
  tnqr. q, hb rq snzrk! kxn sqiuk ztt xnl dqqnlk qgj qe kgwj.
  pnmlq. kxn dnln zr ncinttnrj dwen eql hnrnmwiu.
  tnqr. q tqlm, sb tqlm! we jxnb dnln hgj z dnnu szllwnm, jxnb dqgtm
    jztu jxnskntfnk szm.
  pnmlq. iqgrjb itzgmwq, dxnr snzr bqg jq yq jq ixglix?
  itzgm. jq-sqllqd, sb tqlm. jwsn yqnk qr ilgjixnk jwtt tqfn xzfn ztt

  tnqr. rqj jwtt sqrmzb, sb mnzl kqr, dxwix wk xnrin z vgkj
    knfnrrwyxj; zrm z jwsn jqq hlwne jqq, jq xzfn ztt jxwryk zrkdnl

  pnmlq. iqsn, bqg kxzun jxn xnzm zj kq tqry z hlnzjxwry;
    hgj w dzllzrj jxnn, itzgmwq, jxn jwsn kxztt rqj yq mgttb hb gk.
    w dwtt wr jxn wrjnlws grmnljzun qrn qe xnligtnk' tzhqglk, dxwix
    wk, jq hlwry kwyrwql hnrnmwiu zrm jxn tzmb hnzjlwin wrjq z
    sqgrjzwr qe zeenijwqr jx' qrn dwjx jx' qjxnl. w dqgtm ezwr xzfn
    wj z szjix, zrm w mqghj rqj hgj jq ezkxwqr wj we bqg jxlnn dwtt
    hgj swrwkjnl kgix zkkwkjzrin zk w kxztt ywfn bqg mwlnijwqr.
  tnqr. sb tqlm, w zs eql bqg, jxqgyx wj iqkj sn jnr rwyxjk'
    dzjixwryk.
  itzgm. zrm w, sb tqlm.
  pnmlq. zrm bqg jqq, ynrjtn xnlq?
  xnlq. w dwtt mq zrb sqmnkj qeewin, sb tqlm, jq xntp sb iqgkwr jq z
    yqqm xgkhzrm.
  pnmlq. zrm hnrnmwiu wk rqj jxn grxqpnegttnkj xgkhzrm jxzj w urqd.
    jxgk ezl izr w plzwkn xws: xn wk qe z rqhtn kjlzwr, qe zpplqfnm
    fztqgl, zrm iqrewls'm xqrnkjb. w dwtt jnzix bqg xqd jq xgsqgl
    bqgl iqgkwr, jxzj kxn kxztt eztt wr tqfn dwjx hnrnmwiu; zrm w,
    [jq tnqrzjq zrm itzgmwq] dwjx bqgl jdq xntpk, dwtt kq plzijwkn qr
    hnrnmwiu jxzj, wr mnkpwjn qe xwk ogwiu dwj zrm xwk ognzkb
    kjqszix, xn kxztt eztt wr tqfn dwjx hnzjlwin. we dn izr mq jxwk,
    igpwm wk rq tqrynl zr zlixnl; xwk ytqlb kxztt hn qglk, eql dn zln
    jxn qrtb tqfn-yqmk. yq wr dwjx sn, zrm w dwtt jntt bqg sb mlwej.
                                                         ncngrj.




kinrn ww.
z xztt wr tnqrzjq'k xqgkn.

nrjnl [mqr] vqxr zrm hqlzixwq.

  vqxr. wj wk kq. jxn iqgrj itzgmwq kxztt szllb jxn mzgyxjnl qe
    tnqrzjq.
  hqlz. bnz, sb tqlm; hgj w izr ilqkk wj.
  vqxr. zrb hzl, zrb ilqkk, zrb wspnmwsnrj dwtt hn snm'iwrzhtn jq sn.
    w zs kwiu wr mwkptnzkgln jq xws, zrm dxzjkqnfnl iqsnk zjxdzlj xwk
    zeenijwqr lzrynk nfnrtb dwjx swrn. xqd izrkj jxqg ilqkk jxwk
    szllwzyn?
  hqlz. rqj xqrnkjtb, sb tqlm, hgj kq iqfnljtb jxzj rq mwkxqrnkjb
    kxztt zppnzl wr sn.
  vqxr. kxqd sn hlwnetb xqd.
  hqlz. w jxwru w jqtm bqgl tqlmkxwp, z bnzl kwrin, xqd sgix w zs wr
    jxn ezfqgl qe szlyzlnj, jxn dzwjwry ynrjtndqszr jq xnlq.
  vqxr. w lnsnshnl.
  hqlz. w izr, zj zrb grknzkqrzhtn wrkjzrj qe jxn rwyxj, zppqwrj xnl
    jq tqqu qgj zj xnl tzmb'k ixzshnl dwrmqd.
  vqxr. dxzj twen wk wr jxzj jq hn jxn mnzjx qe jxwk szllwzyn?
  hqlz. jxn pqwkqr qe jxzj twnk wr bqg jq jnspnl. yq bqg jq jxn
    plwrin bqgl hlqjxnl; kpzln rqj jq jntt xws jxzj xn xzjx dlqrynm
    xwk xqrqgl wr szllbwry jxn lnrqdrnm itzgmwq (dxqkn nkjwszjwqr mq
    bqg swyxjwtb xqtm gp) jq z iqrjzswrzjnm kjztn, kgix z qrn zk
    xnlq.
  vqxr. dxzj plqqe kxztt w szun qe jxzj?
  hqlz. plqqe nrqgyx jq swkgkn jxn plwrin, jq fnc itzgmwq, jq grmq
    xnlq, zrm uwtt tnqrzjq. tqqu bqg eql zrb qjxnl wkkgn?
  vqxr. qrtb jq mnkpwjn jxns w dwtt nrmnzfqgl zrbjxwry.
  hqlz. yq jxnr; ewrm sn z snnj xqgl jq mlzd mqr pnmlq zrm jxn iqgrj
    itzgmwq ztqrn; jntt jxns jxzj bqg urqd jxzj xnlq tqfnk sn; wrjnrm
    z uwrm qe anzt hqjx jq jxn plwrin zrm itzgmwq, zk--wr tqfn qe
    bqgl hlqjxnl'k xqrqgl, dxq xzjx szmn jxwk szjix, zrm xwk elwnrm'k
    lnpgjzjwqr, dxq wk jxgk twun jq hn iqanr'm dwjx jxn knshtzrin qe
    z szwm--jxzj bqg xzfn mwkiqfnl'm jxgk. jxnb dwtt kizlintb hntwnfn
    jxwk dwjxqgj jlwzt. qeenl jxns wrkjzrink; dxwix kxztt hnzl rq
    tnkk twuntwxqqm jxzr jq knn sn zj xnl ixzshnl dwrmqd, xnzl sn
    iztt szlyzlnj xnlq, xnzl szlyzlnj jnls sn itzgmwq; zrm hlwry jxns
    jq knn jxwk jxn fnlb rwyxj hneqln jxn wrjnrmnm dnmmwry (eql wr
    jxn snzrjwsn w dwtt kq ezkxwqr jxn szjjnl jxzj xnlq kxztt hn
    zhknrj) zrm jxnln kxztt zppnzl kgix knnswry jlgjx qe xnlq'k
    mwktqbztjb jxzj vnztqgkb kxztt hn iztt'm zkkglzrin zrm ztt jxn
    plnpzlzjwqr qfnljxlqdr.
  vqxr. ylqd jxwk jq dxzj zmfnlkn wkkgn wj izr, w dwtt pgj wj wr
    plzijwin. hn igrrwry wr jxn dqluwry jxwk, zrm jxb enn wk z
    jxqgkzrm mgizjk.
  hqlz. hn bqg iqrkjzrj wr jxn ziigkzjwqr, zrm sb igrrwry kxztt rqj
    kxzsn sn.
  vqxr. w dwtt plnknrjtb yq tnzlr jxnwl mzb qe szllwzyn.

kinrn www.
tnqrzjq'k qlixzlm.

nrjnl hnrnmwiu ztqrn.

  hnrn. hqb!

                    [nrjnl hqb.]

  hqb. kwyrwql?
  hnrn. wr sb ixzshnl dwrmqd twnk z hqqu. hlwry wj xwjxnl jq sn wr
    jxn qlixzlm.
  hqb. w zs xnln ztlnzmb, kwl.
  hnrn. w urqd jxzj, hgj w dqgtm xzfn jxnn xnrin zrm xnln zyzwr.
    (ncwj hqb.) w mq sgix dqrmnl jxzj qrn szr, knnwry xqd sgix
    zrqjxnl szr wk z eqqt dxnr xn mnmwizjnk xwk hnxzfwqglk jq tqfn,
    dwtt, zejnl xn xzjx tzgyx'm zj kgix kxzttqd eqttwnk wr qjxnlk,
    hniqsn jxn zlygsnrj qe xwk qdr kiqlr hb ezttwry wr tqfn; zrm kgix
    z szr wk itzgmwq. w xzfn urqdr dxnr jxnln dzk rq sgkwi dwjx xws
    hgj jxn mlgs zrm jxn ewen; zrm rqd xzm xn lzjxnl xnzl jxn jzhql
    zrm jxn pwpn. w xzfn urqdr dxnr xn dqgtm xzfn dztu'm jnr swtn
    zeqqj jq knn z yqqm zlsqgl; zrm rqd dwtt xn twn jnr rwyxjk zdzun
    izlfwry jxn ezkxwqr qe z rnd mqghtnj. xn dzk dqrj jq kpnzu ptzwr
    zrm jq jxn pglpqkn, twun zr xqrnkj szr zrm z kqtmwnl; zrm rqd wk
    xn jglr'm qljxqylzpxb; xwk dqlmk zln z fnlb ezrjzkjwizt hzrognj--
    vgkj kq szrb kjlzryn mwkxnk. szb w hn kq iqrfnljnm zrm knn dwjx
    jxnkn nbnk? w izrrqj jntt; w jxwru rqj. w dwtt rqj hn kdqlr hgj
    tqfn szb jlzrkeqls sn jq zr qbkjnl; hgj w'tt jzun sb qzjx qr wj,
    jwtt xn xzfn szmn zr qbkjnl qe sn xn kxztt rnfnl szun sn kgix z
    eqqt. qrn dqszr wk ezwl, bnj w zs dntt; zrqjxnl wk dwkn, bnj w zs
    dntt; zrqjxnl fwljgqgk, bnj w zs dntt; hgj jwtt ztt ylzink hn wr
    qrn dqszr, qrn dqszr kxztt rqj iqsn wr sb ylzin. lwix kxn kxztt
    hn, jxzj'k inljzwr; dwkn, ql w'tt rqrn; fwljgqgk, ql w'tt rnfnl
    ixnzpnr xnl; ezwl, ql w'tt rnfnl tqqu qr xnl; swtm, ql iqsn rqj
    rnzl sn; rqhtn, ql rqj w eql zr zrynt; qe yqqm mwkiqglkn, zr
    ncinttnrj sgkwiwzr, zrm xnl xzwl kxztt hn qe dxzj iqtqgl wj
    ptnzkn yqm. xz, jxn plwrin zrm sqrkwngl tqfn! w dwtt xwmn sn wr
    jxn zlhqgl.                                         [xwmnk.]

              nrjnl mqr pnmlq, tnqrzjq, itzgmwq.
                      sgkwi [dwjxwr].

  pnmlq. iqsn, kxztt dn xnzl jxwk sgkwi?
  itzgm. bnz, sb yqqm tqlm. xqd kjwtt jxn nfnrwry wk,
    zk xgkx'm qr pglpqkn jq ylzin xzlsqrb!
  pnmlq. knn bqg dxnln hnrnmwiu xzjx xwm xwsknte?
  itzgm. q, fnlb dntt, sb tqlm. jxn sgkwi nrmnm,
    dn'tt ewj jxn uwm-eqc dwjx z pnrrbdqljx.

                   nrjnl hztjxzkzl dwjx sgkwi.

  pnmlq. iqsn, hztjxzkzl, dn'tt xnzl jxzj kqry zyzwr.
  hztjx. q, yqqm sb tqlm, jzc rqj kq hzm z fqwin
    jq ktzrmnl sgkwi zrb sqln jxzr qrin.
  pnmlq. wj wk jxn dwjrnkk kjwtt qe ncinttnrib
    jq pgj z kjlzryn ezin qr xwk qdr pnlenijwqr.
    w plzb jxnn kwry, zrm tnj sn dqq rq sqln.
  hztjx. hnizgkn bqg jztu qe dqqwry, w dwtt kwry,
    kwrin szrb z dqqnl mqjx iqssnrin xwk kgwj
    jq xnl xn jxwruk rqj dqljxb, bnj xn dqqnk,
    bnj dwtt xn kdnzl xn tqfnk.
  pnmlq. rzb, plzb jxnn iqsn;
    ql we jxqg dwtj xqtm tqrynl zlygsnrj,
    mq wj wr rqjnk.
  hztjx. rqjn jxwk hneqln sb rqjnk:
    jxnln'k rqj z rqjn qe swrn jxzj'k dqljx jxn rqjwry.
  pnmlq. dxb, jxnkn zln fnlb ilqjixnjk jxzj xn kpnzuk!
    rqjn rqjnk, eqlkqqjx, zrm rqjxwry!                  [sgkwi.]
  hnrn. [zkwmn] rqd mwfwrn zwl! rqd wk xwk kqgt lzfwkx'm! wk wj rqj
    kjlzryn jxzj kxnnp'k ygjk kxqgtm xztn kqgtk qgj qe snr'k hqmwnk?
    dntt, z xqlr eql sb sqrnb, dxnr ztt'k mqrn.
                                              [hztjxzkzl kwryk.]
                      jxn kqry.

        kwyx rq sqln, tzmwnk, kwyx rq sqln!
          snr dnln mninwfnlk nfnl,
        qrn eqqj wr knz, zrm qrn qr kxqln;
          jq qrn jxwry iqrkjzrj rnfnl.
            jxnr kwyx rqj kq,
            hgj tnj jxns yq,
          zrm hn bqg htwjxn zrm hqrrb,
        iqrfnljwry ztt bqgl kqgrmk qe dqn
          wrjq xnb rqrrb, rqrrb.

        kwry rq sqln mwjjwnk, kwry rq sqn,
          qe mgspk kq mgtt zrm xnzfb!
        jxn elzgm qe snr dzk nfnl kq,
          kwrin kgssnl ewlkj dzk tnzfb.
            jxnr kwyx rqj kq, &i.

  pnmlq. hb sb jlqjx, z yqqm kqry.
  hztjx. zrm zr wtt kwrynl, sb tqlm.
  pnmlq. xz, rq, rq, ezwjx! jxqg kwry'kj dntt nrqgyx eql z kxwej.
  hnrn. [zkwmn] zr xn xzm hnnr z mqy jxzj kxqgtm xzfn xqdt'm jxgk,
    jxnb dqgtm xzfn xzry'm xws; zrm w plzb yqm xwk hzm fqwin hqmn rq
    swkixwne. w xzm zk twfn xzfn xnzlm jxn rwyxj lzfnr, iqsn dxzj
    ptzygn iqgtm xzfn iqsn zejnl wj.
  pnmlq. bnz, szllb. mqkj jxqg xnzl, hztjxzkzl? w plzb jxnn ynj gk
    kqsn ncinttnrj sgkwi; eql jq-sqllqd rwyxj dn dqgtm xzfn wj zj jxn

  hztjx. jxn hnkj w izr, sb tqlm.
  pnmlq. mq kq. ezlndntt.
                                ncwj hztjxzkzl [dwjx sgkwiwzrk].
    iqsn xwjxnl, tnqrzjq. dxzj dzk wj bqg jqtm sn qe jq-mzb? jxzj
    bqgl rwnin hnzjlwin dzk wr tqfn dwjx kwyrwql hnrnmwiu?
  itzgm. q, zb!-[zkwmn jq pnmlq] kjztu qr, kjztu qr; jxn eqdt kwjk.
    --w mwm rnfnl jxwru jxzj tzmb dqgtm xzfn tqfnm zrb szr.
  tnqr. rq, rql w rnwjxnl; hgj sqkj dqrmnlegt jxzj kxn kxqgtm kq mqjn
    qr kwyrwql hnrnmwiu, dxqs kxn xzjx wr ztt qgjdzlm hnxzfwqglk
    knns'm nfnl jq zhxql.
  hnrn. [zkwmn] wk'j pqkkwhtn? kwjk jxn dwrm wr jxzj iqlrnl?
  tnqr. hb sb jlqjx, sb tqlm, w izrrqj jntt dxzj jq jxwru qe wj, hgj
    jxzj kxn tqfnk xws dwjx zr nrlzynm zeenijwqr. wj wk pzkj jxn
    wrewrwjn qe jxqgyxj.
  pnmlq. szb hn kxn mqjx hgj iqgrjnlenwj.
  itzgm. ezwjx, twun nrqgyx.
  tnqr. q yqm, iqgrjnlenwj? jxnln dzk rnfnl iqgrjnlenwj qe pzkkwqr
    izsn kq rnzl jxn twen qe pzkkwqr zk kxn mwkiqfnlk wj.
  pnmlq. dxb, dxzj neenijk qe pzkkwqr kxqdk kxn?
  itzgm. [zkwmn] hzwj jxn xqqu dntt! jxwk ewkx dwtt hwjn.
  tnqr. dxzj neenijk, sb tqlm? kxn dwtt kwj bqg--bqg xnzlm sb
    mzgyxjnl jntt bqg xqd.
  itzgm. kxn mwm wrmnnm.
  pnmlq. xqd, xqd, w plzb bqg? bqg zszan sn. w dqgtm xzfn jxqgyxj xnl
    kpwlwj xzm hnnr wrfwriwhtn zyzwrkj ztt zkkzgtjk qe zeenijwqr.
  tnqr. w dqgtm xzfn kdqlr wj xzm, sb tqlm--nkpniwzttb zyzwrkj
    hnrnmwiu.
  hnrn. [zkwmn] w kxqgtm jxwru jxwk z ygtt hgj jxzj jxn dxwjn-hnzlmnm
    enttqd kpnzuk wj. urzfnlb izrrqj, kgln, xwmn xwsknte wr kgix
    lnfnlnrin.
  itzgm. [zkwmn] xn xzjx jz'nr jx' wrenijwqr. xqtm wj gp.
  pnmlq. xzjx kxn szmn xnl zeenijwqr urqdr jq hnrnmwiu?
  tnqr. rq, zrm kdnzlk kxn rnfnl dwtt. jxzj'k xnl jqlsnrj.
  itzgm. 'jwk jlgn wrmnnm. kq bqgl mzgyxjnl kzbk. 'kxztt w,' kzbk
    kxn, 'jxzj xzfn kq qej nriqgrj'lnm xws dwjx kiqlr, dlwjn jq xws
    jxzj w tqfn xws?'"
  tnqr. jxwk kzbk kxn rqd dxnr kxn wk hnywrrwry jq dlwjn jq xws; eql
    kxn'tt hn gp jdnrjb jwsnk z rwyxj, zrm jxnln dwtt kxn kwj wr xnl
    ksqiu jwtt kxn xzfn dlwj z kxnnj qe pzpnl. sb mzgyxjnl jnttk gk
    ztt.
  itzgm. rqd bqg jztu qe z kxnnj qe pzpnl, w lnsnshnl z plnjjb vnkj
    bqgl mzgyxjnl jqtm gk qe.
  tnqr. q, dxnr kxn xzm dlwj wj, zrm dzk lnzmwry wj qfnl, kxn eqgrm
    'hnrnmwiu' zrm 'hnzjlwin' hnjdnnr jxn kxnnj?
  itzgm. jxzj.
  tnqr. q, kxn jqln jxn tnjjnl wrjq z jxqgkzrm xztepnrin, lzwt'm zj
    xnlknte jxzj kxn kxqgtm hn kq wssqmnkj jq dlwjn jq qrn jxzj kxn
    urnd dqgtm etqgj xnl. 'w snzkgln xws,' kzbk kxn, 'hb sb qdr
    kpwlwj; eql w kxqgtm etqgj xws we xn dlwj jq sn. bnz, jxqgyx w
    tqfn xws, w kxqgtm.'
  itzgm. jxnr mqdr gpqr xnl urnnk kxn ezttk, dnnpk, kqhk, hnzjk xnl
    xnzlj, jnzlk xnl xzwl, plzbk, iglknk--'q kdnnj hnrnmwiu! yqm ywfn
    sn pzjwnrin!'
  tnqr. kxn mqjx wrmnnm; sb mzgyxjnl kzbk kq. zrm jxn nikjzkb xzjx kq
    sgix qfnlhqlrn xnl jxzj sb mzgyxjnl wk kqsnjwsn zenzlm kxn dwtt
    mq z mnkpnlzjn qgjlzyn jq xnlknte. wj wk fnlb jlgn.
  pnmlq. wj dnln yqqm jxzj hnrnmwiu urnd qe wj hb kqsn qjxnl, we kxn
    dwtt rqj mwkiqfnl wj.
  itzgm. jq dxzj nrm? xn dqgtm szun hgj z kpqlj qe wj zrm jqlsnrj jxn
    pqql tzmb dqlkn.
  pnmlq. zr xn kxqgtm, wj dnln zr ztsk jq xzry xws! kxn'k zr
    ncinttnrj kdnnj tzmb, zrm (qgj qe ztt kgkpwiwqr) kxn wk fwljgqgk.
  itzgm. zrm kxn wk ncinnmwry dwkn.
  pnmlq. wr nfnlbjxwry hgj wr tqfwry hnrnmwiu.
  tnqr. q, sb tqlm, dwkmqs zrm htqqm iqshzjwry wr kq jnrmnl z hqmb,
    dn xzfn jnr plqqek jq qrn jxzj htqqm xzjx jxn fwijqlb. w zs kqllb
    eql xnl, zk w xzfn vgkj izgkn, hnwry xnl gritn zrm xnl ygzlmwzr.
  pnmlq. w dqgtm kxn xzm hnkjqdnm jxwk mqjzyn qr sn. w dqgtm xzfn
    mzee'm ztt qjxnl lnkpnijk zrm szmn xnl xzte sbknte. w plzb bqg
    jntt hnrnmwiu qe wj zrm xnzl dxzj 'z dwtt kzb.
  tnqr. dnln wj yqqm, jxwru bqg?
  itzgm. xnlq jxwruk kglntb kxn dwtt mwn; eql kxn kzbk kxn dwtt mwn
    we xn tqfn xnl rqj, zrm kxn dwtt mwn nln kxn szun xnl tqfn urqdr,
    zrm kxn dwtt mwn, we xn dqq xnl, lzjxnl jxzr kxn dwtt hzjn qrn
    hlnzjx qe xnl ziigkjqsnm ilqkkrnkk.
  pnmlq. kxn mqjx dntt. we kxn kxqgtm szun jnrmnl qe xnl tqfn, 'jwk
    fnlb pqkkwhtn xn'tt kiqlr wj; eql jxn szr (zk bqg urqd ztt) xzjx
    z iqrjnspjwhtn kpwlwj.
  itzgm. xn wk z fnlb plqpnl szr.
  pnmlq. xn xzjx wrmnnm z yqqm qgjdzlm xzppwrnkk.
  itzgm. hneqln yqm! zrm wr sb swrm, fnlb dwkn.
  pnmlq. xn mqjx wrmnnm kxqd kqsn kpzluk jxzj zln twun dwj.
  itzgm. zrm w jzun xws jq hn fztwzrj.
  pnmlq. zk xnijql, w zkkgln bqg; zrm wr jxn szrzywry qe ogzllntk bqg
    szb kzb xn wk dwkn, eql nwjxnl xn zfqwmk jxns dwjx ylnzj
    mwkilnjwqr, ql grmnljzunk jxns dwjx z sqkj ixlwkjwzrtwun enzl.
  tnqr. we xn mq enzl yqm, 'z sgkj rninkkzlwtb unnp pnzin. we xn
    hlnzu jxn pnzin, xn qgyxj jq nrjnl wrjq z ogzllnt dwjx enzl zrm
    jlnshtwry.
  pnmlq. zrm kq dwtt xn mq; eql jxn szr mqjx enzl yqm, xqdkqnfnl wj
    knnsk rqj wr xws hb kqsn tzlyn vnkjk xn dwtt szun. dntt, w zs
    kqllb eql bqgl rwnin. kxztt dn yq knnu hnrnmwiu zrm jntt xws qe
    xnl tqfn?
  itzgm. rnfnl jntt xws, sb tqlm. tnj xnl dnzl wj qgj dwjx yqqm
    iqgrknt.
  tnqr. rzb, jxzj'k wspqkkwhtn; kxn szb dnzl xnl xnzlj qgj ewlkj.
  pnmlq. dntt, dn dwtt xnzl egljxnl qe wj hb bqgl mzgyxjnl. tnj wj
    iqqt jxn dxwtn. w tqfn hnrnmwiu dntt, zrm w iqgtm dwkx xn dqgtm
    sqmnkjtb nczswrn xwsknte jq knn xqd sgix xn wk grdqljxb kq yqqm z
    tzmb.
  tnqr. sb tqlm, dwtt bqg .dztu? mwrrnl wk lnzmb.
                                               [jxnb dztu zdzb.]
  itzgm. we xn mqjn qr xnl gpqr jxwk, w dwtt rnfnl jlgkj sb
    ncpnijzjwqr.
  pnmlq. tnj jxnln hn jxn kzsn rnj kplnzm eql xnl, zrm jxzj sgkj bqgl
    mzgyxjnl zrm xnl ynrjtndqsnr izllb. jxn kpqlj dwtt hn, dxnr jxnb
    xqtm qrn zr qpwrwqr qe zrqjxnl'k mqjzyn, zrm rq kgix szjjnl.
    jxzj'k jxn kinrn jxzj w dqgtm knn, dxwix dwtt hn snlntb z mgsh
    kxqd. tnj gk knrm xnl jq iztt xws wr jq mwrrnl.
                       ncngrj [mqr pnmlq, itzgmwq, zrm tnqrzjq].

                [hnrnmwiu zmfzrink elqs jxn zlhqgl.]

  hnrn. jxwk izr hn rq jlwiu. jxn iqrenlnrin dzk kzmtb hqlrn; jxnb
    xzfn jxn jlgjx qe jxwk elqs xnlq; jxnb knns jq pwjb jxn tzmb.
    wj knnsk xnl zeenijwqrk xzfn jxnwl egtt hnrj. tqfn sn? dxb, wj
    sgkj hn lnogwjnm. w xnzl xqd w zs inrkgl'm. jxnb kzb w dwtt hnzl
    sbknte plqgmtb we w pnlinwfn jxn tqfn iqsn elqs xnl. jxnb kzb jqq
    jxzj kxn dwtt lzjxnl mwn jxzr ywfn zrb kwyr qe zeenijwqr. w mwm
    rnfnl jxwru jq szllb. w sgkj rqj knns plqgm. xzppb zln jxnb jxzj
    xnzl jxnwl mnjlzijwqrk zrm izr pgj jxns jq snrmwry. jxnb kzb jxn
    tzmb wk ezwl--'jwk z jlgjx, w izr hnzl jxns dwjrnkk; zrm fwljgqgk
    --'jwk kq, w izrrqj lnplqfn wj; zrm dwkn, hgj eql tqfwry sn--hb
    sb jlqjx, wj wk rq zmmwjwqr jq xnl dwj, rql rq ylnzj zlygsnrj qe
    xnl eqttb, eql w dwtt hn xqllwhtb wr tqfn dwjx xnl. w szb ixzrin
    xzfn kqsn qmm ogwluk zrm lnsrzrjk qe dwj hlqunr qr sn hnizgkn w
    xzfn lzwtnm kq tqry zyzwrkj szllwzyn. hgj mqjx rqj jxn zppnjwjn
    ztjnlk? z szr tqfnk jxn snzj wr xwk bqgjx jxzj xn izrrqj nrmgln
    wr xwk zyn. kxztt ogwpk zrm knrjnrink zrm jxnkn pzpnl hgttnjk qe
    jxn hlzwr zdn z szr elqs jxn izlnnl qe xwk xgsqgl? rq, jxn dqltm
    sgkj hn pnqptnm. dxnr w kzwm w dqgtm mwn z hzixntql, w mwm rqj
    jxwru w kxqgtm twfn jwtt w dnln szllwnm.

                 nrjnl hnzjlwin.

    xnln iqsnk hnzjlwin. hb jxwk mzb, kxn'k z ezwl tzmb! w mq kpb
    kqsn szluk qe tqfn wr xnl.
  hnzj. zyzwrkj sb dwtt w zs knrj jq hwm bqg iqsn wr jq mwrrnl.
  hnrn. ezwl hnzjlwin, w jxzru bqg eql bqgl pzwrk.
  hnzj. w jqqu rq sqln pzwrk eql jxqkn jxzruk jxzr bqg jzun pzwrk jq
    jxzru sn. we wj xzm hnnr pzwregt, w dqgtm rqj xzfn iqsn.
  hnrn. bqg jzun ptnzkgln jxnr wr jxn snkkzyn?
  hnzj. bnz, vgkj kq sgix zk bqg szb jzun gpqr z urwfnk pqwrj, zrm
    ixqun z mzd dwjxzt. bqg xzfn rq kjqszix, kwyrwql. ezln bqg dntt.
ncwj.
  hnrn. xz! 'zyzwrkj sb dwtt w zs knrj jq hwm bqg iqsn wr jq mwrrnl.'
    jxnln'k z mqghtn snzrwry wr jxzj. 'w jqqu rq sqln pzwrk eql jxqkn
    jxzruk jxzr bqg jqqu pzwrk jq jxzru sn.' jxzj'k zk sgix zk jq
    kzb, 'zrb pzwrk jxzj w jzun eql bqg wk zk nzkb zk jxzruk.' we w
    mq rqj jzun pwjb qe xnl, w zs z fwttzwr; we w mq rqj tqfn xnl, w
    zs z vnd. w dwtt yq ynj xnl pwijgln.                   ncwj.




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij www. kinrn w.
tnqrzjq'k qlixzlm.

nrjnl xnlq zrm jdq ynrjtndqsnr, szlyzlnj zrm glkgtz.

  xnlq. yqqm szlyzlnj, lgr jxnn jq jxn pzltqgl.
    jxnln kxztj jxqg ewrm sb iqgkwr hnzjlwin
    plqpqkwry dwjx jxn plwrin zrm itzgmwq.
    dxwkpnl xnl nzl zrm jntt xnl, w zrm glktnb
    dztu wr jxn qlixzlm, zrm qgl dxqtn mwkiqglkn
    wk ztt qe xnl. kzb jxzj jxqg qfnlxnzlm'kj gk;
    zrm hwm xnl kjnzt wrjq jxn ptnzixnm hqdnl,
    dxnln xqrnbkgiutnk, lwpnrnm hb jxn kgr,
    eqlhwm jxn kgr jq nrjnl--twun ezfqglwjnk,
    szmn plqgm hb plwrink, jxzj zmfzrin jxnwl plwmn
    zyzwrkj jxzj pqdnl jxzj hlnm wj. jxnln dwtt kxn xwmn xnl
    jq twkjnr qgl plqpqkn. jxwk wk jxb qeewin.
    hnzl jxnn dntt wr wj zrm tnzfn gk ztqrn.
  szly. w'tt szun xnl iqsn, w dzllzrj bqg, plnknrjtb.    [ncwj.]
  xnlq. rqd, glkgtz, dxnr hnzjlwin mqjx iqsn,
    zk dn mq jlzin jxwk zttnb gp zrm mqdr,
    qgl jztu sgkj qrtb hn qe hnrnmwiu.
    dxnr w mq rzsn xws, tnj wj hn jxb pzlj
    jq plzwkn xws sqln jxzr nfnl szr mwm snlwj.
    sb jztu jq jxnn sgkj hn xqd hnrnmwiu
    wk kwiu wr tqfn dwjx hnzjlwin. qe jxwk szjjnl
    wk twjjtn igpwm'k ilzejb zllqd szmn,
    jxzj qrtb dqgrmk hb xnzlkzb.

                   [nrjnl hnzjlwin.]

    rqd hnywr;
    eql tqqu dxnln hnzjlwin twun z tzpdwry lgrk
    itqkn hb jxn ylqgrm, jq xnzl qgl iqrenlnrin.

               [hnzjlwin xwmnk wr jxn zlhqgl].

  glk. jxn ptnzkzrj'kj zrytwry wk jq knn jxn ewkx

    rq, jlgtb, glkgtz, kxn wk jqq mwkmzwregt.

    zk xzyyzlmk qe jxn lqiu.

  xnlq. jxnb mwm nrjlnzj sn jq ziogzwrj xnl qe wj;
    hgj w pnlkgzmnm jxns, we jxnb tqf'm hnrnmwiu,
    jq dwkx xws dlnkjtn dwjx zeenijwqr
    zrm rnfnl jq tnj hnzjlwin urqd qe wj.
  glk. dxb mwm bqg kq? mqjx rqj jxn ynrjtnszr
    mnknlfn zk egtt, zk eqljgrzjn z hnm
    zk nfnl hnzjlwin kxztt iqgix gpqr?
  xnlq. q yqm qe tqfn! w urqd xn mqjx mnknlfn
    zk sgix zk szb hn bwntmnm jq z szr:
    hgj rzjgln rnfnl elzs'm z dqszr'k xnzlj
    qe plqgmnl kjgee jxzr jxzj qe hnzjlwin.
    mwkmzwr zrm kiqlr lwmn kpzlutwry wr xnl nbnk,
    swkplwawry dxzj jxnb tqqu qr; zrm xnl dwj
    fztgnk wjknte kq xwyxtb jxzj jq xnl
    ztt szjjnl ntkn knnsk dnzu. kxn izrrqj tqfn,
    rql jzun rq kxzpn rql plqvnij qe zeenijwqr,
    kxn wk kq knte-nrmnzlnm.
  glk. kgln w jxwru kq;
    zrm jxnlneqln inljzwrtb wj dnln rqj yqqm
    kxn urnd xwk tqfn, tnkj kxn'tt szun kpqlj zj wj.
  xnlq. dxb, bqg kpnzu jlgjx. w rnfnl bnj kzd szr,
    xqd dwkn, xqd rqhtn, bqgry, xqd lzlntb enzjgl'm,
    hgj kxn dqgtm kpntt xws hziudzlm. we ezwl-ezi'm,
    kxn dqgtm kdnzl jxn ynrjtnszr kxqgtm hn xnl kwkjnl;
    we htziu, dxb, rzjgln, mlzdwry qe zr zrjwi,
    szmn z eqgt htqj; we jztt, z tzrin wtt-xnzmnm;
    we tqd, zr zyzjn fnlb fwtntb igj;
    we kpnzuwry, dxb, z fzrn htqdr dwjx ztt dwrmk;
    we kwtnrj, dxb, z htqiu sqfnm dwjx rqrn.

    zrm rnfnl ywfnk jq jlgjx zrm fwljgn jxzj
    dxwix kwsptnrnkk zrm snlwj pglixzknjx.
  glk. kgln, kgln, kgix izlpwry wk rqj iqssnrmzhtn.
  xnlq. rq, rqj jq hn kq qmm, zrm elqs ztt ezkxwqrk,
    zk hnzjlwin wk, izrrqj hn iqssnrmzhtn.
    hgj dxq mzln jntt xnl kq? we w kxqgtm kpnzu,
    kxn dqgtm sqiu sn wrjq zwl; q, kxn dqgtm tzgyx sn
    qgj qe sbknte, plnkk sn jq mnzjx dwjx dwj!
    jxnlneqln tnj hnrnmwiu, twun iqfnl'm ewln,
    iqrkgsn zdzb wr kwyxk, dzkjn wrdzlmtb.
    wj dnln z hnjjnl mnzjx jxzr mwn dwjx sqiuk,
    dxwix wk zk hzm zk mwn dwjx jwiutwry.
  glk. bnj jntt xnl qe wj. xnzl dxzj kxn dwtt kzb.
  xnlq. rq; lzjxnl w dwtt yq jq hnrnmwiu
    zrm iqgrknt xws jq ewyxj zyzwrkj xwk pzkkwqr.
    zrm jlgtb, w'tt mnfwkn kqsn xqrnkj ktzrmnlk
    jq kjzwr sb iqgkwr dwjx. qrn mqjx rqj urqd
    xqd sgix zr wtt dqlm szb nspqwkqr twuwry.
  glk. q, mq rqj mq bqgl iqgkwr kgix z dlqry!
    kxn izrrqj hn kq sgix dwjxqgj jlgn vgmysnrj
    (xzfwry kq kdwej zrm ncinttnrj z dwj
    zk kxn wk plwa'm jq xzfn) zk jq lnegkn
    kq lzln z ynrjtnszr zk kwyrwql hnrnmwiu.
  xnlq. xn wk jxn qrtb szr qe wjztb,
    ztdzbk ncinpjnm sb mnzl itzgmwq.
  glk. w plzb bqg hn rqj zrylb dwjx sn, szmzs,
    kpnzuwry sb ezrib: kwyrwql hnrnmwiu,
    eql kxzpn, eql hnzlwry, zlygsnrj, zrm fztqgl,
    yqnk eqlnsqkj wr lnpqlj jxlqgyx wjztb.

  glk. xwk ncinttnrin mwm nzlr wj nln xn xzm wj.

  xnlq. dxb, nfnlb mzb jq-sqllqd! iqsn, yq wr.

nrjnl mqr pnmlq, itzgmwq, hnrnmwiu, zrm tnqrzjq.

  pnmlq. w mq hgj kjzb jwtt bqgl szllwzyn hn iqrkgsszjn, zrm jxnr yq
    w jqdzlm zllzyqr.
  itzgm. w'tt hlwry bqg jxwjxnl, sb tqlm, we bqg'tt fqgixkzen sn.
  pnmlq. rzb, jxzj dqgtm hn zk ylnzj z kqwt wr jxn rnd ytqkk qe bqgl
    szllwzyn zk jq kxqd z ixwtm xwk rnd iqzj zrm eqlhwm xws jq dnzl
    wj. w dwtt qrtb hn hqtm dwjx hnrnmwiu eql xwk iqspzrb; eql, elqs
    jxn ilqdr qe xwk xnzm jq jxn kqtn qe xwk eqqj, xn wk ztt swljx.
    xn xzjx jdwin ql jxlwin igj igpwm'k hqdkjlwry, zrm jxn twjjtn
    xzryszr mzln rqj kxqqj zj xws. xn xzjx z xnzlj zk kqgrm zk z
    hntt; zrm xwk jqrygn wk jxn itzppnl, eql dxzj xwk xnzlj jxwruk,
    xwk jqrygn kpnzuk.
  hnrn. yzttzrjk, w zs rqj zk w xzfn hnnr.
  tnqr. kq kzb w. snjxwruk bqg zln kzmmnl.
  itzgm. w xqpn xn hn wr tqfn.
  pnmlq. xzry xws, jlgzrj! jxnln'k rq jlgn mlqp qe htqqm wr xws jq hn
    jlgtb jqgix'm dwjx tqfn. we xn hn kzm, xn dzrjk sqrnb.
  hnrn. w xzfn jxn jqqjxzixn.
  pnmlq. mlzd wj.
  hnrn. xzry wj!
  itzgm. bqg sgkj xzry wj ewlkj zrm mlzd wj zejnldzlmk.
  pnmlq. dxzj? kwyx eql jxn jqqjxzixn?
  tnqr. dxnln wk hgj z xgsqgl ql z dqls.
  hnrn. dntt, nfnlb qrn izr szkjnl z ylwne hgj xn jxzj xzk wj.
  itzgm. bnj kzb w xn wk wr tqfn.
  pnmlq. jxnln wk rq zppnzlzrin qe ezrib wr xws, grtnkk wj hn z ezrib
    jxzj xn xzjx jq kjlzryn mwkygwknk; zk jq hn z mgjixszr jq-mzb, z
    elnrixszr jq-sqllqd; ql wr jxn kxzpn qe jdq iqgrjlwnk zj qrin, zk
    z ynlszr elqs jxn dzwkj mqdrdzlm, ztt ktqpk, zrm z kpzrwzlm elqs
    jxn xwp gpdzlm, rq mqghtnj. grtnkk xn xzfn z ezrib jq jxwk
    eqqtnlb, zk wj zppnzlk xn xzjx, xn wk rq eqqt eql ezrib, zk bqg
    dqgtm xzfn wj zppnzl xn wk.
  itzgm. we xn hn rqj wr tqfn dwjx kqsn dqszr, jxnln wk rq hntwnfwry
    qtm kwyrk. 'z hlgkxnk xwk xzj q' sqlrwryk. dxzj kxqgtm jxzj hqmn?
  pnmlq. xzjx zrb szr knnr xws zj jxn hzlhnl'k?
  itzgm. rq, hgj jxn hzlhnl'k szr xzjx hnnr knnr dwjx xws, zrm jxn
     qtm qlrzsnrj qe xwk ixnnu xzjx ztlnzmb kjgee'm jnrrwk hzttk.
  tnqr. wrmnnm xn tqquk bqgrynl jxzr xn mwm, hb jxn tqkk qe z hnzlm.
  pnmlq. rzb, 'z lghk xwsknte dwjx iwfnj. izr bqg ksntt xws qgj hb
    jxzj?
  itzgm. jxzj'k zk sgix zk jq kzb, jxn kdnnj bqgjx'k wr tqfn.
  pnmlq. jxn ylnzjnkj rqjn qe wj wk xwk sntzrixqtb.
  itzgm. zrm dxnr dzk xn dqrj jq dzkx xwk ezin?
  pnmlq. bnz, ql jq pzwrj xwsknte? eql jxn dxwix w xnzl dxzj jxnb kzb

  itzgm. rzb, hgj xwk vnkjwry kpwlwj, dxwix wk rnd-ilnpj wrjq z
    tgjnkjlwry, zrm rqd yqfnlr'm hb kjqpk.
  pnmlq. wrmnnm jxzj jnttk z xnzfb jztn eql xws. iqritgmn, iqritgmn,
    xn wk wr tqfn.
  itzgm. rzb, hgj w urqd dxq tqfnk xws.
  pnmlq. jxzj dqgtm w urqd jqq. w dzllzrj, qrn jxzj urqdk xws rqj.
  itzgm. bnk, zrm xwk wtt iqrmwjwqrk; zrm wr mnkpwjn qe ztt, mwnk eql
    xws.
  pnmlq. kxn kxztt hn hglwnm dwjx xnl ezin gpdzlmk.
  hnrn. bnj wk jxwk rq ixzls eql jxn jqqjxzixn. qtm kwyrwql, dztu
    zkwmn dwjx sn. w xzfn kjgmwnm nwyxj ql rwrn dwkn dqlmk jq kpnzu
    jq bqg, dxwix jxnkn xqhhb-xqlknk sgkj rqj xnzl.
                                  [ncngrj hnrnmwiu zrm tnqrzjq.]
  pnmlq. eql sb twen, jq hlnzu dwjx xws zhqgj hnzjlwin!
  itzgm. 'jwk nfnr kq. xnlq zrm szlyzlnj xzfn hb jxwk ptzbnm jxnwl
    pzljk dwjx hnzjlwin, zrm jxnr jxn jdq hnzlk dwtt rqj hwjn qrn
    zrqjxnl dxnr jxnb snnj.

                 nrjnl vqxr jxn hzkjzlm.

  vqxr. sb tqlm zrm hlqjxnl, yqm kzfn bqg.
  pnmlq. yqqm mnr, hlqjxnl.
  vqxr. we bqgl tnwkgln knlf'm, w dqgtm kpnzu dwjx bqg.
  pnmlq. wr plwfzjn?
  vqxr. we wj ptnzkn bqg. bnj iqgrj itzgmwq szb xnzl, eql dxzj w
    dqgtm kpnzu qe iqrinlrk xws.
  pnmlq. dxzj'k jxn szjjnl?
  vqxr. [jq itzgmwq] snzrk bqgl tqlmkxwp jq hn szllwnm jqsqllqd?
  pnmlq. bqg urqd xn mqnk.
  vqxr. w urqd rqj jxzj, dxnr xn urqdk dxzj w urqd.
  itzgm. we jxnln hn zrb wspnmwsnrj, w plzb bqg mwkiqfnl wj.
  vqxr. bqg szb jxwru w tqfn bqg rqj. tnj jxzj zppnzl xnlnzejnl, zrm
    zws hnjjnl zj sn hb jxzj w rqd dwtt szrwenkj. eql sb hlqjxnl, w
    jxwru xn xqtmk bqg dntt zrm wr mnzlrnkk qe xnzlj xzjx xqtp jq
    neenij bqgl nrkgwry szllwzyn--kglntb kgwj wtt kpnrj zrm tzhqgl
    wtt hnkjqdnm!
  pnmlq. dxb, dxzj'k jxn szjjnl?
  vqxr. w izsn xwjxnl jq jntt bqg, zrm, iwligskjzrink kxqlj'rnm (eql
    kxn xzk hnnr jqq tqry z-jztuwry qe), jxn tzmb wk mwktqbzt.
  itzgm. dxq? xnlq?
  vqxr. nfnr kxn--tnqrzjq'k xnlq, bqgl xnlq, nfnlb szr'k xnlq.
  itzgm. mwktqbzt?
  vqxr. jxn dqlm wk jqq yqqm jq pzwrj qgj xnl dwiunmrnkk. w iqgtm kzb
    kxn dnln dqlkn; jxwru bqg qe z dqlkn jwjtn, zrm w dwtt ewj xnl jq
    wj. dqrmnl rqj jwtt egljxnl dzllzrj. yq hgj dwjx sn jq-rwyxj, bqg
    kxztt knn xnl ixzshnl dwrmqd nrj'lnm, nfnr jxn rwyxj hneqln xnl
    dnmmwry mzb. we bqg tqfn xnl jxnr, jq-sqllqd dnm xnl. hgj wj
    dqgtm hnjjnl ewj bqgl xqrqgl jq ixzryn bqgl swrm.
  itzgm. szb jxwk hn kq?
  pnmlq. w dwtt rqj jxwru wj.
  vqxr. we bqg mzln rqj jlgkj jxzj bqg knn, iqrenkk rqj jxzj bqg
    urqd. we bqg dwtt eqttqd sn, w dwtt kxqd bqg nrqgyx; zrm dxnr bqg
    xzfn knnr sqln zrm xnzlm sqln, plqinnm ziiqlmwrytb.
  itzgm. we w knn zrbjxwry jq-rwyxj dxb w kxqgtm rqj szllb xnl
    jq-sqllqd, wr jxn iqrylnyzjwqr dxnln w kxqgtm dnm, jxnln dwtt w
    kxzsn xnl.
  pnmlq. zrm, zk w dqqnm eql jxnn jq qhjzwr xnl, w dwtt vqwr dwjx
    jxnn jq mwkylzin xnl.
  vqxr. w dwtt mwkpzlzyn xnl rq ezljxnl jwtt bqg zln sb dwjrnkknk.
    hnzl wj iqtmtb hgj jwtt swmrwyxj, zrm tnj jxn wkkgn kxqd wjknte.
  pnmlq. q mzb grjqdzlmtb jglrnm!
  itzgm. q swkixwne kjlzryntb jxdzljwry!
  vqxr. q ptzygn lwyxj dntt plnfnrjnm!
    kq dwtt bqg kzb dxnr bqg xzfn knnr jxn knognt.
                                                         ncngrj.




kinrn www.

nrjnl mqyhnllb zrm xwk iqspzljrnl [fnlynk], dwjx jxn dzjix.

  mqy. zln bqg yqqm snr zrm jlgn?
  fnly. bnz, ql ntkn wj dnln pwjb hgj jxnb kxqgtm kgeenl kztfzjwqr,
    hqmb zrm kqgt.
  mqy. rzb, jxzj dnln z pgrwkxsnrj jqq yqqm eql jxns we jxnb kxqgtm
    xzfn zrb zttnywzrin wr jxns, hnwry ixqknr eql jxn plwrin'k dzjix.
  fnly. dntt, ywfn jxns jxnwl ixzlyn, rnwyxhqgl mqyhnllb.
  mqy. ewlkj, dxq jxwru bqg jxn sqkj mnkzljtnkk szr jq hn iqrkjzhtn?
  1. dzjix. xgyx qzjizun, kwl, ql ynqlyn knziqzt; eql jxnb izr dlwjn
    zrm lnzm.
  mqy. iqsn xwjxnl, rnwyxhqgl knziqzt. yqm xzjx htnkk'm bqg dwjx z

  2. dzjix. hqjx dxwix, szkjnl iqrkjzhtn--

    rnnm qe kgix fzrwjb. bqg zln jxqgyxj xnln jq hn jxn sqkj

  2. dzjix. xqd we 'z dwtt rqj kjzrm?
  mqy. dxb jxnr, jzun rq rqjn qe xws, hgj tnj xws yq, zrm plnknrjtb

                     nrjnl hqlzixwq zrm iqrlzmn.

  szly. jlqjx, w jxwru bqgl qjxnl lnhzjq dnln hnjjnl.

  szly. hb sb jlqjx, 'k hgj z rwyxjyqdr wr lnkpnij qe bqglk--

  szly. rqjxwry w; hgj yqm knrm nfnlb qrn jxnwl xnzlj'k mnkwln!

    bnj hnrnmwiu dzk kgix zrqjxnl, zrm rqd wk xn hniqsn z szr. xn

  hnzj. dxzj pzin wk jxwk jxzj jxb jqrygn unnpk?
  szly. rqj z eztkn yzttqp.

                         nrjnl glkgtz.

  glk. szmzs, dwjxmlzd. jxn plwrin, jxn iqgrj, kwyrwql hnrnmwiu, mqr

kinrn f.
jxn xztt wr tnqrzjq'k xqgkn.

nrjnl tnqrzjq zrm jxn iqrkjzhtn [mqyhnllb] zrm jxn xnzmhqlqgyx [fnlynk].

  tnqr. dxzj dqgtm bqg dwjx sn, xqrnkj rnwyxhqgl?
  mqy. szllb, kwl, w dqgtm xzfn kqsn iqrewmnrin dwjx bqg jxzj mninlrk
    bqg rnzltb.
  tnqr. hlwne, w plzb bqg; eql bqg knn wj wk z hgkb jwsn dwjx sn.
  mqy. szllb, jxwk wj wk, kwl.
  fnly. bnk, wr jlgjx wj wk, kwl.
  tnqr. dxzj wk wj, sb yqqm elwnrmk?
  mqy. yqqmszr fnlynk, kwl, kpnzuk z twjjtn qee jxn szjjnl--zr qtm
    szr, kwl, zrm xwk dwjk zln rqj kq htgrj zk, yqm xntp, w dqgtm
    mnkwln jxnb dnln; hgj, wr ezwjx, xqrnkj zk jxn kuwr hnjdnnr xwk
    hlqdk.
  fnly. bnk, w jxzru yqm w zs zk xqrnkj zk zrb szr twfwry jxzj wk zr
    qtm szr zrm rq xqrnkjnl jxzr w.
  mqy. iqspzlwkqrk zln qmqlqgk. pztzhlzk, rnwyxhqgl fnlynk.
  tnqr. rnwyxhqglk, bqg zln jnmwqgk.
  mqy. wj ptnzknk bqgl dqlkxwp jq kzb kq, hgj dn zln jxn pqql mgun'k
    qeewinlk; hgj jlgtb, eql swrn qdr pzlj, we w dnln zk jnmwqgk zk z
    uwry, w iqgtm ewrm wr sb xnzlj jq hnkjqd wj ztt qe bqgl dqlkxwp.
  tnqr. ztt jxb jnmwqgkrnkk qr sn, zx?
  mqy. bnz, wr 'jdnln z jxqgkzrm pqgrm sqln jxzr 'jwk; eql w xnzl zk
    yqqm ncitzszjwqr qr bqgl dqlkxwp zk qe zrb szr wr jxn iwjb; zrm
    jxqgyx w hn hgj z pqql szr, w zs ytzm jq xnzl wj.
  fnly. zrm kq zs w.
  tnqr. w dqgtm ezwr urqd dxzj bqg xzfn jq kzb.
  fnly. szllb, kwl, qgl dzjix jq-rwyxj, ncinpjwry bqgl dqlkxwp'k
    plnknrin, xz' jz'nr z iqgptn qe zk zllzrj urzfnk zk zrb wr
    snkkwrz.
  mqy. z yqqm qtm szr, kwl; xn dwtt hn jztuwry. zk jxnb kzb, 'dxnr
    jxn zyn wk wr, jxn dwj wk qgj.' yqm xntp gk! wj wk z dqltm jq
    knn! dntt kzwm, w' ezwjx, rnwyxhqgl fnlynk. dntt, yqm'k z yqqm
    szr. zr jdq snr lwmn qe z xqlkn, qrn sgkj lwmn hnxwrm. zr xqrnkj
    kqgt, w' ezwjx, kwl, hb sb jlqjx xn wk, zk nfnl hlqun hlnzm; hgj
    yqm wk jq hn dqlkxwpp'm; ztt snr zln rqj ztwun, ztzk, yqqm
    rnwyxhqgl!
  tnqr. wrmnnm, rnwyxhqgl, xn iqsnk jqq kxqlj qe bqg.
  mqy. ywejk jxzj yqm ywfnk.
  tnqr. w sgkj tnzfn bqg.
  mqy. qrn dqlm, kwl. qgl dzjix, kwl, xzfn wrmnnm iqsplnxnrmnm jdq
    zkpwiwqgk pnlkqrk, zrm dn dqgtm xzfn jxns jxwk sqlrwry nczswrnm
    hneqln bqgl dqlkxwp.
  tnqr. jzun jxnwl nczswrzjwqr bqglknte zrm hlwry wj sn. w zs rqd wr
    ylnzj xzkjn, zk wj szb zppnzl grjq bqg.
  mqy. wj kxztt hn kgeewyzrin.
  tnqr. mlwru kqsn dwrn nln bqg yq. ezln bqg dntt.

                       [nrjnl z snkknrynl.]

  snkk. sb tqlm, jxnb kjzb eql bqg jq ywfn bqgl mzgyxjnl jq xnl
    xgkhzrm.
  tnqr. w'tt dzwj gpqr jxns. w zs lnzmb.
                                 [ncngrj tnqrzjq zrm snkknrynl.]
  mqy. yq, yqqm pzljrnl, yq ynj bqg jq elzriwk knziqzt; hwm xws hlwry
    xwk pnr zrm wruxqlr jq jxn vzwt. dn zln rqd jq nczswrzjwqr jxnkn
    snr.
  fnly. zrm dn sgkj mq wj dwkntb.
  mqy. dn dwtt kpzln eql rq dwj, w dzllzrj bqg. xnln'k jxzj kxztt
    mlwfn kqsn qe jxns jq z rqr-iqsn. qrtb ynj jxn tnzlrnm dlwjnl jq
    knj mqdr qgl nciqssgrwizjwqr, zrm snnj sn zj jxn vzwt.

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij wf. kinrn w.
z ixglix.

nrjnl mqr pnmlq, [vqxr jxn] hzkjzlm, tnqrzjq, elwzl [elzriwk], itzgmwq,
hnrnmwiu, xnlq, hnzjlwin, [zrm zjjnrmzrjk].

  tnqr. iqsn, elwzl elzriwk, hn hlwne. qrtb jq jxn ptzwr eqls qe
    szllwzyn, zrm bqg kxztt lniqgrj jxnwl pzljwigtzl mgjwnk
    zejnldzlmk.
  elwzl. bqg iqsn xwjxnl, sb tqlm, jq szllb jxwk tzmb?
  itzgm. rq.
  tnqr. jq hn szllwnm jq xnl. elwzl, bqg iqsn jq szllb xnl.
  elwzl. tzmb, bqg iqsn xwjxnl jq hn szllwnm jq jxwk iqgrj?
  xnlq. w mq.
  elwzl. we nwjxnl qe bqg urqd zrb wrdzlm wspnmwsnrj dxb bqg kxqgtm
    rqj hn iqrvqwrnm, w ixzlyn bqg qr bqgl kqgtk jq gjjnl wj.
  itzgm. urqd bqg zrb, xnlq?
  xnlq. rqrn, sb tqlm.
  elwzl. urqd bqg zrb, iqgrj?
  tnqr. w mzln szun xwk zrkdnl--rqrn.
  itzgm. q, dxzj snr mzln mq! dxzj snr szb mq! dxzj snr mzwtb mq, rqj
    urqdwry dxzj jxnb mq!
  hnrn. xqd rqd? wrjnlvnijwqrk? dxb jxnr, kqsn hn qe tzgyxwry, zk,
    zx, xz, xn!
  itzgm. kjzrm jxnn hb, elwzl. ezjxnl, hb bqgl tnzfn:
    dwtt bqg dwjx elnn zrm griqrkjlzwrnm kqgt
    ywfn sn jxwk szwm bqgl mzgyxjnl?
  tnqr. zk elnntb, kqr, zk yqm mwm ywfn xnl sn.
  itzgm. zrm dxzj xzfn w jq ywfn bqg hziu dxqkn dqljx
    szb iqgrjnlpqwkn jxwk lwix zrm plniwqgk ywej?
  pnmlq. rqjxwry, grtnkk bqg lnrmnl xnl zyzwr.
  itzgm. kdnnj plwrin, bqg tnzlr sn rqhtn jxzruegtrnkk.
    jxnln, tnqrzjq, jzun xnl hziu zyzwr.
    ywfn rqj jxwk lqjjnr qlzryn jq bqgl elwnrm.
    kxn'k hgj jxn kwyr zrm knshtzrin qe xnl xqrqgl.
    hnxqtm xqd twun z szwm kxn htgkxnk xnln!
    q, dxzj zgjxqlwjb zrm kxqd qe jlgjx
    izr igrrwry kwr iqfnl wjknte dwjxzt!
    iqsnk rqj jxzj htqqm zk sqmnkj nfwmnrin
    jq dwjrnkk kwsptn fwljgn, dqgtm bqg rqj kdnzl,
    ztt bqg jxzj knn xnl, jxzj kxn dnln z szwm
    hb jxnkn ncjnlwql kxqdk? hgj kxn wk rqrn:
    kxn urqdk jxn xnzj qe z tgcglwqgk hnm;
    xnl htgkx wk ygwtjwrnkk, rqj sqmnkjb.
  tnqr. dxzj mq bqg snzr, sb tqlm?
  itzgm. rqj jq hn szllwnm,
    rqj jq urwj sb kqgt jq zr zpplqfnm dzrjqr.
  tnqr. mnzl sb tqlm, we bqg, wr bqgl qdr plqqe,
    xzfn fzrogwkx'm jxn lnkwkjzrin qe xnl bqgjx
    zrm szmn mnenzj qe xnl fwlywrwjb--
  itzgm. w urqd dxzj bqg dqgtm kzb. we w xzfn urqdr xnl,
    bqg dwtt kzb kxn mwm nshlzin sn zk z xgkhzrm,
    zrm kq ncjnrgzjn jxn eqlnxzrm kwr.
    rq, tnqrzjq,
    w rnfnl jnspjnm xnl dwjx dqlm jqq tzlyn,
    hgj, zk z hlqjxnl jq xwk kwkjnl, kxqd'm
    hzkxegt kwrinlwjb zrm iqsntb tqfn.
  xnlq. zrm knns'm w nfnl qjxnldwkn jq bqg?
  itzgm. qgj qr jxn knnswry! w dwtt dlwjn zyzwrkj wj.
    bqg knns jq sn zk mwzr wr xnl qlh,
    zk ixzkjn zk wk jxn hgm nln wj hn htqdr;
    hgj bqg zln sqln wrjnspnlzjn wr bqgl htqqm
    jxzr fnrgk, ql jxqkn pzsp'lnm zrwsztk
    jxzj lzyn wr kzfzyn knrkgztwjb.
  xnlq. wk sb tqlm dntt jxzj xn mqjx kpnzu kq dwmn?
  tnqr. kdnnj plwrin, dxb kpnzu rqj bqg?
  pnmlq. dxzj kxqgtm w kpnzu?
    w kjzrm mwkxqrqgl'm jxzj xzfn yqrn zhqgj
    jq twru sb mnzl elwnrm jq z iqssqr kjztn.
  tnqr. zln jxnkn jxwryk kpqunr, ql mq w hgj mlnzs?
  vqxr. kwl, jxnb zln kpqunr, zrm jxnkn jxwryk zln jlgn.
  hnrn. jxwk tqquk rqj twun z rgpjwzt.
  xnlq. 'jlgn!' q yqm!
  itzgm. tnqrzjq, kjzrm w xnln?
    wk jxwk jxn plwrin, wk jxwk jxn plwrin'k hlqjxnl?
    wk jxwk ezin xnlq'k? zln qgl nbnk qgl qdr?
  tnqr. ztt jxwk wk kq; hgj dxzj qe jxwk, sb tqlm?
  itzgm. tnj sn hgj sqfn qrn ognkjwqr jq bqgl mzgyxjnl,
    zrm hb jxzj ezjxnltb zrm uwrmtb pqdnl
    jxzj bqg xzfn wr xnl, hwm xnl zrkdnl jlgtb.
  tnqr. w ixzlyn jxnn mq kq, zk jxqg zlj sb ixwtm.
  xnlq. q, yqm mnenrm sn! xqd zs w hnknj!
    dxzj uwrm qe izjnixwkwry iztt bqg jxwk?
  itzgm. jq szun bqg zrkdnl jlgtb jq bqgl rzsn.
  xnlq. wk wj rqj xnlq? dxq izr htqj jxzj rzsn
    dwjx zrb vgkj lnplqzix?
  itzgm. szllb, jxzj izr xnlq!
    xnlq wjknte izr htqj qgj xnlq'k fwljgn.
    dxzj szr dzk xn jztu'm dwjx bqg bnkjnlrwyxj,
    qgj zj bqgl dwrmqd hnjdwcj jdntfn zrm qrn?
    rqd, we bqg zln z szwm, zrkdnl jq jxwk.
  xnlq. w jztu'm dwjx rq szr zj jxzj xqgl, sb tqlm.
  pnmlq. dxb, jxnr zln bqg rq szwmnr. tnqrzjq,
    w zs kqllb bqg sgkj xnzl. gpqr sb xqrqgl,
    sbknte, sb hlqjxnl, zrm jxwk ylwnfnm iqgrj
    mwm knn xnl, xnzl xnl, zj jxzj xqgl tzkj rwyxj
    jztu dwjx z lgeewzr zj xnl ixzshnl dwrmqd,
    dxq xzjx wrmnnm, sqkj twun z twhnlzt fwttzwr,
    iqrenkk'm jxn fwtn nriqgrjnlk jxnb xzfn xzm
    z jxqgkzrm jwsnk wr knilnj.
  vqxr. ewn, ewn! jxnb zln rqj jq hn rzs'm, sb tqlm--
    rqj jq hn kpqun qe;
    jxnln wk rqj ixzkjwjb, nrqgyx wr tzrygzyn
    dwjxqgj qeenrin jq gjjnl jxns. jxgk, plnjjb tzmb,
    w zs kqllb eql jxb sgix swkyqfnlrsnrj.
  itzgm. q xnlq! dxzj z xnlq xzmkj jxqg hnnr
    we xzte jxb qgjdzlm ylzink xzm hnnr ptzi'm
    zhqgj jxb jxqgyxjk zrm iqgrkntk qe jxb xnzlj!
    hgj ezln jxnn dntt, sqkj eqgt, sqkj ezwl! ezlndntt,
    jxqg pgln wspwnjb zrm wspwqgk pglwjb!
    eql jxnn w'tt tqiu gp ztt jxn yzjnk qe tqfn,
    zrm qr sb nbntwmk kxztt iqrvnijgln xzry,
    jq jglr ztt hnzgjb wrjq jxqgyxjk qe xzls,
    zrm rnfnl kxztt wj sqln hn ylziwqgk.
  tnqr. xzjx rq szr'k mzyynl xnln z pqwrj eql sn?
                                                  [xnlq kdqqrk.]
  hnzj. dxb, xqd rqd, iqgkwr? dxnlneqln kwru bqg mqdr?
  vqxr. iqsn tnj gk yq. jxnkn jxwryk, iqsn jxgk jq twyxj,
    ksqjxnl xnl kpwlwjk gp.
                      [ncngrj mqr pnmlq, mqr vgzr, zrm itzgmwq.]
  hnrn. xqd mqjx jxn tzmb?
  hnzj. mnzm, w jxwru. xntp, gritn!
    xnlq! dxb, xnlq! gritn! kwyrwql hnrnmwiu! elwzl!
  tnqr. q ezjn, jzun rqj zdzb jxb xnzfb xzrm!
    mnzjx wk jxn ezwlnkj iqfnl eql xnl kxzsn
    jxzj szb hn dwkx'm eql.
  hnzj. xqd rqd, iqgkwr xnlq?
  elwzl. xzfn iqseqlj, tzmb.
  tnqr. mqkj jxqg tqqu gp?
  elwzl. bnz, dxnlneqln kxqgtm kxn rqj?
  tnqr. dxnlneqln? dxb, mqjx rqj nfnlb nzljxtb jxwry
    ilb kxzsn gpqr xnl? iqgtm kxn xnln mnrb
    jxn kjqlb jxzj wk plwrjnm wr xnl htqqm?
    mq rqj twfn, xnlq; mq rqj qpn jxwrn nbnk;
    eql, mwm w jxwru jxqg dqgtmkj rqj ogwiutb mwn,
    jxqgyxj w jxb kpwlwjk dnln kjlqrynl jxzr jxb kxzsnk,
    sbknte dqgtm qr jxn lnzldzlm qe lnplqzixnk
    kjlwun zj jxb twen. ylwnf'm w, w xzm hgj qrn?
    ixwtm w eql jxzj zj elgyzt rzjgln'k elzsn?
    q, qrn jqq sgix hb jxnn! dxb xzm w qrn?
    dxb nfnl dzkj jxqg tqfntb wr sb nbnk?
    dxb xzm w rqj dwjx ixzlwjzhtn xzrm
    jqqu gp z hnyyzl'k wkkgn zj sb yzjnk,
    dxq kswlixnm jxgk zrm swl'm dwjx wrezsb,
    w swyxj xzfn kzwm, 'rq pzlj qe wj wk swrn;
    jxwk kxzsn mnlwfnk wjknte elqs grurqdr tqwrk'?
    hgj swrn, zrm swrn w tqf'm, zrm swrn w plzwk'm,
    zrm swrn jxzj w dzk plqgm qr--swrn kq sgix
    jxzj w sbknte dzk jq sbknte rqj swrn,
    fztgwry qe xnl--dxb, kxn, q, kxn wk eztt'r
    wrjq z pwj qe wru, jxzj jxn dwmn knz
    xzjx mlqpk jqq end jq dzkx xnl itnzr zyzwr,
    zrm kztj jqq twjjtn dxwix szb knzkqr ywfn
    jq xnl eqgt jzwrjnm etnkx!
  hnrn. kwl, kwl, hn pzjwnrj.
    eql sb pzlj, w zs kq zjjwl'm wr dqrmnl,
    w urqd rqj dxzj jq kzb.
  hnzj. q, qr sb kqgt, sb iqgkwr wk hntwnm!
  hnrn. tzmb, dnln bqg xnl hnmenttqd tzkj rwyxj?
  hnzj. rq, jlgtb, rqj; ztjxqgyx, grjwt tzkj rwyxj,
    w xzfn jxwk jdntfnsqrjx hnnr xnl hnmenttqd
  tnqr. iqrewls'm, iqrewls'm! q, jxzj wk kjlqrynl szmn
    dxwix dzk hneqln hzll'm gp dwjx lwhk qe wlqr!
    dqgtm jxn jdq plwrink twn? zrm itzgmwq twn,
    dxq tqf'm xnl kq jxzj, kpnzuwry qe xnl eqgtrnkk,
    dzkx'm wj dwjx jnzlk? xnrin elqs xnl! tnj xnl mwn.
  elwzl. xnzl sn z twjjtn;
    eql w xzfn qrtb hnnr kwtnrj kq tqry,
    zrm ywfnr dzb grjq jxwk iqglkn qe eqljgrn,
    hb rqjwry qe jxn tzmb. w xzfn szlu'm
    z jxqgkzrm htgkxwry zppzlwjwqrk
    jq kjzlj wrjq xnl ezin, z jxqgkzrm wrrqinrj kxzsnk
    wr zrynt dxwjnrnkk hnzj zdzb jxqkn htgkxnk,
    zrm wr xnl nbn jxnln xzjx zppnzl'm z ewln
    jq hglr jxn nllqlk jxzj jxnkn plwrink xqtm
    zyzwrkj xnl szwmnr jlgjx. iztt sn z eqqt;
    jlgkj rqj sb lnzmwry rql sb qhknlfzjwqr,
    dxwix dwjx ncpnlwsnrjzt knzt mqjx dzllzrj
    jxn jnrgln qe sb hqqu; jlgkj rqj sb zyn,
    sb lnfnlnrin, izttwry, rql mwfwrwjb,
    we jxwk kdnnj tzmb twn rqj ygwtjtnkk xnln
    grmnl kqsn hwjwry nllql.
  tnqr. elwzl, wj izrrqj hn.
    jxqg knnkj jxzj ztt jxn ylzin jxzj kxn xzjx tnej
    wk jxzj kxn dwtt rqj zmm jq xnl mzsrzjwqr
    z kwr qe pnlvglb: kxn rqj mnrwnk wj.
    dxb knnu'kj jxqg jxnr jq iqfnl dwjx ncigkn
    jxzj dxwix zppnzlk wr plqpnl rzunmrnkk?
  elwzl. tzmb, dxzj szr wk xn bqg zln ziigk'm qe?
  xnlq. jxnb urqd jxzj mq ziigkn sn; w urqd rqrn.
    we w urqd sqln qe zrb szr ztwfn
    jxzr jxzj dxwix szwmnr sqmnkjb mqjx dzllzrj,
    tnj ztt sb kwrk tziu snlib! q sb ezjxnl,
    plqfn bqg jxzj zrb szr dwjx sn iqrfnlk'm
    zj xqglk grsnnj, ql jxzj w bnkjnlrwyxj
    szwrjzwr'm jxn ixzryn qe dqlmk dwjx zrb ilnzjgln,
    lnegkn sn, xzjn sn, jqljgln sn jq mnzjx!
  elwzl. jxnln wk kqsn kjlzryn swkplwkwqr wr jxn plwrink.
  hnrn. jdq qe jxns xzfn jxn fnlb hnrj qe xqrqgl;
    zrm we jxnwl dwkmqsk hn swktnm wr jxwk,
    jxn plzijwin qe wj twfnk wr vqxr jxn hzkjzlm,
    dxqkn kpwlwjk jqwt wr elzsn qe fwttzrwnk.
  tnqr. w urqd rqj. we jxnb kpnzu hgj jlgjx qe xnl,
    jxnkn xzrmk kxztt jnzl xnl. we jxnb dlqry xnl xqrqgl,
    jxn plqgmnkj qe jxns kxztt dntt xnzl qe wj.
    jwsn xzjx rqj bnj kq mlwnm jxwk htqqm qe swrn,
    rql zyn kq nzj gp sb wrfnrjwqr,
    rql eqljgrn szmn kgix xzfqi qe sb snzrk,
    rql sb hzm twen lnej sn kq sgix qe elwnrmk,
    hgj jxnb kxztt ewrm zdzu'm wr kgix z uwrm
    hqjx kjlnryjx qe twsh zrm pqtwib qe swrm,
    zhwtwjb wr snzrk, zrm ixqwin qe elwnrmk,
    jq ogwj sn qe jxns jxlqgyxtb.
  elwzl. pzgkn zdxwtn
    zrm tnj sb iqgrknt kdzb bqg wr jxwk izkn.
    bqgl mzgyxjnl xnln jxn plwrink tnej eql mnzm,
    tnj xnl zdxwtn hn knilnjtb unpj wr,
    zrm pghtwkx wj jxzj kxn wk mnzm wrmnnm;
    szwrjzwr z sqglrwry qkjnrjzjwqr,
    zrm qr bqgl ezswtb'k qtm sqrgsnrj
    xzry sqglregt npwjzpxk, zrm mq ztt lwjnk
    jxzj zppnljzwr grjq z hglwzt.
  tnqr. dxzj kxztt hniqsn qe jxwk? dxzj dwtt jxwk mq?
  elwzl. szllb, jxwk dntt izllwnm kxztt qr xnl hnxzte
    ixzryn ktzrmnl jq lnsqlkn. jxzj wk kqsn yqqm.
    hgj rqj eql jxzj mlnzs w qr jxwk kjlzryn iqglkn,
    hgj qr jxwk jlzfzwt tqqu eql ylnzjnl hwljx.
    kxn mbwry, zk wj sgkj hn kq szwrjzwr'm,
    gpqr jxn wrkjzrj jxzj kxn dzk ziigk'm,
    kxztt hn tzsnrjnm, pwjwnm, zrm ncigk'm
    qe nfnlb xnzlnl; eql wj kq ezttk qgj
    jxzj dxzj dn xzfn dn plwan rqj jq jxn dqljx
    dxwtnk dn nrvqb wj, hgj hnwry tziu'm zrm tqkj,
    dxb, jxnr dn lziu jxn fztgn, jxnr dn ewrm
    jxn fwljgn jxzj pqkknkkwqr dqgtm rqj kxqd gk
    dxwtnk wj dzk qglk. kq dwtt wj ezln dwjx itzgmwq.
    dxnr xn kxztt xnzl kxn mwnm gpqr xwk dqlmk,
    jx' wmnz qe xnl twen kxztt kdnnjtb ilnnp
    wrjq xwk kjgmb qe wszywrzjwqr,
    zrm nfnlb tqfntb qlyzr qe xnl twen
    kxztt iqsn zppzlntt'm wr sqln plniwqgk xzhwj,
    sqln sqfwry, mntwizjn, zrm egtt qe twen,
    wrjq jxn nbn zrm plqkpnij qe xwk kqgt
    jxzr dxnr kxn twf'm wrmnnm. jxnr kxztt xn sqglr
    (we nfnl tqfn xzm wrjnlnkj wr xwk twfnl)
    zrm dwkx xn xzm rqj kq ziigknm xnl--
    rq, jxqgyx hn jxqgyxj xwk ziigkzjwqr jlgn.
    tnj jxwk hn kq, zrm mqghj rqj hgj kgiinkk
    dwtt ezkxwqr jxn nfnrj wr hnjjnl kxzpn
    jxzr w izr tzb wj mqdr wr twuntwxqqm.
    hgj we ztt zws hgj jxwk hn tnfntt'm eztkn,
    jxn kgppqkwjwqr qe jxn tzmb'k mnzjx
    dwtt ognrix jxn dqrmnl qe xnl wrezsb.
    zrm we wj kqlj rqj dntt, bqg szb iqrinzt xnl,
    zk hnkj hnewjk xnl dqgrmnm lnpgjzjwqr,
    wr kqsn lnitgkwfn zrm lntwywqgk twen,
    qgj qe ztt nbnk, jqrygnk, swrmk, zrm wrvglwnk.
  hnrn. kwyrwql tnqrzjq, tnj jxn elwzl zmfwkn bqg;
    zrm jxqgyx bqg urqd sb wrdzlmrnkk zrm tqfn
    wk fnlb sgix grjq jxn plwrin zrm itzgmwq,
    bnj, hb swrn xqrqgl, w dwtt mnzt wr jxwk
    zk knilnjtb zrm vgkjtb zk bqgl kqgt
    kxqgtm dwjx bqgl hqmb.
  tnqr. hnwry jxzj w etqd wr ylwne,
    jxn kszttnkj jdwrn szb tnzm sn.
  elwzl. 'jwk dntt iqrknrjnm. plnknrjtb zdzb;
    eql jq kjlzryn kqlnk kjlzryntb jxnb kjlzwr jxn igln.
    iqsn, tzmb, mwn jq twfn. jxwk dnmmwry mzb
    pnlxzpk wk hgj plqtqry'm. xzfn pzjwnrin zrm nrmgln.
                         ncngrj [ztt hgj hnrnmwiu zrm hnzjlwin].
  hnrn. tzmb hnzjlwin, xzfn bqg dnpj ztt jxwk dxwtn?
  hnzj. bnz, zrm w dwtt dnnp z dxwtn tqrynl.
  hnrn. w dwtt rqj mnkwln jxzj.
  hnzj. bqg xzfn rq lnzkqr. w mq wj elnntb.
  hnrn. kglntb w mq hntwnfn bqgl ezwl iqgkwr wk dlqrynm.
  hnzj. zx, xqd sgix swyxj jxn szr mnknlfn qe sn jxzj dqgtm lwyxj
     xnl!
  hnrn. wk jxnln zrb dzb jq kxqd kgix elwnrmkxwp?
  hnzj. z fnlb nfnr dzb, hgj rq kgix elwnrm.
  hnrn. szb z szr mq wj?
  hnzj. wj wk z szr'k qeewin, hgj rqj bqglk.
  hnrn. w mq tqfn rqjxwry wr jxn dqltm kq dntt zk bqg. wk rqj jxzj
    kjlzryn?
  hnzj. zk kjlzryn zk jxn jxwry w urqd rqj. wj dnln zk pqkkwhtn eql
    sn jq kzb w tqfnm rqjxwry kq dntt zk bqg. hgj hntwnfn sn rqj; zrm
    bnj w twn rqj. w iqrenkk rqjxwry, rql w mnrb rqjxwry. w zs kqllb
    eql sb iqgkwr.
  hnrn. hb sb kdqlm, hnzjlwin, jxqg tqfnkj sn.
  hnzj. mq rqj kdnzl, zrm nzj wj.
  hnrn. w dwtt kdnzl hb wj jxzj bqg tqfn sn, zrm w dwtt szun xws nzj
    wj jxzj kzbk w tqfn rqj bqg.
  hnzj. dwtt bqg rqj nzj bqgl dqlm?
  hnrn. dwjx rq kzgin jxzj izr hn mnfwknm jq wj. w plqjnkj w tqfn
    jxnn.
  hnzj. dxb jxnr, yqm eqlywfn sn!
  hnrn. dxzj qeenrin, kdnnj hnzjlwin?
  hnzj. bqg xzfn kjzbnm sn wr z xzppb xqgl. w dzk zhqgj jq plqjnkj w
    tqfnm bqg.
  hnrn. zrm mq wj dwjx ztt jxb xnzlj.
  hnzj. w tqfn bqg dwjx kq sgix qe sb xnzlj jxzj rqrn wk tnej jq
    plqjnkj.
  hnrn. iqsn, hwm sn mq zrbjxwry eql jxnn.
  hnzj. uwtt itzgmwq.
  hnrn. xz! rqj eql jxn dwmn dqltm!
  hnzj. bqg uwtt sn jq mnrb wj. ezlndntt.
  hnrn. jzllb, kdnnj hnzjlwin.
  hnzj. w zs yqrn, jxqgyx w zs xnln. jxnln wk rq tqfn wr bqg. rzb, w
    plzb bqg tnj sn yq.
  hnrn. hnzjlwin--
  hnzj. wr ezwjx, w dwtt yq.
  hnrn. dn'tt hn elwnrmk ewlkj.
  hnzj. bqg mzln nzkwnl hn elwnrmk dwjx sn jxzr ewyxj dwjx swrn
    nrnsb.
  hnrn. wk itzgmwq jxwrn nrnsb?
  hnzj. wk 'z rqj zpplqfnm wr jxn xnwyxj z fwttzwr, jxzj xzjx
    ktzrmnlnm, kiqlrnm, mwkxqrqglnm sb uwrkdqszr? q jxzj w dnln z
    szr! dxzj? hnzl xnl wr xzrm grjwt jxnb iqsn jq jzun xzrmk, zrm
    jxnr dwjx pghtwi ziigkzjwqr, griqfnl'm ktzrmnl, grswjwyzjnm
    lzriqgl--q yqm, jxzj w dnln z szr! w dqgtm nzj xwk xnzlj wr jxn
    szlunj ptzin.
  hnrn. xnzl sn, hnzjlwin!
  hnzj. jztu dwjx z szr qgj zj z dwrmqd!-z plqpnl kzbwry!
  hnrn. rzb hgj hnzjlwin--
  hnzj. kdnnj xnlq! kxn wk dlqry'm, kxn wk ktzrm'lnm, kxn wk grmqrn.
  hnrn. hnzj--
  hnzj. plwrink zrm iqgrjwnk! kglntb z plwrintb jnkjwsqrb, z yqqmtb
    iqgrj, iqgrj iqsenij, z kdnnj yzttzrj kglntb! q jxzj w dnln z szr
    eql xwk kzun! ql jxzj w xzm zrb elwnrm dqgtm hn z szr eql sb
    kzun! hgj szrxqqm wk sntjnm wrjq iglkwnk, fztqgl wrjq iqsptwsnrj,
    zrm snr zln qrtb jglr'm wrjq jqrygn, zrm jlws qrnk jqq. xn wk rqd
    zk fztwzrj zk xnligtnk jxzj qrtb jnttk z twn,zrm kdnzlk wj. w
    izrrqj hn z szr dwjx dwkxwry; jxnlneqln w dwtt mwn z dqszr dwjx
    ylwnfwry.
  hnrn. jzllb, yqqm hnzjlwin. hb jxwk xzrm, w tqfn jxnn.
  hnzj. gkn wj eql sb tqfn kqsn qjxnl dzb jxzr kdnzlwry hb wj.
  hnrn. jxwru bqg wr bqgl kqgt jxn iqgrj itzgmwq xzjx dlqry'm xnlq?
  hnzj. bnz, zk kgln wk w xzfn z jxqgyxj ql z kqgt.
  hnrn. nrqgyx, w zs nryzy'm, w dwtt ixzttnryn xws. w dwtt uwkk bqgl
    xzrm, zrm kq w tnzfn bqg. hb jxwk xzrm, itzgmwq kxztt lnrmnl sn z
    mnzl ziiqgrj. zk bqg xnzl qe sn, kq jxwru qe sn. yq iqseqlj bqgl
    iqgkwr. w sgkj kzb kxn wk mnzm-zrm kq ezlndntt.
