kinrn ww.
z plwkqr.

nrjnl jxn iqrkjzhtnk [mqyhnllb zrm fnlynk] zrm jxn kncjqr, wr yqdrk,
[zrm jxn dzjix, dwjx iqrlzmn zrm] hqlzixwq.

  mqy. wk qgl dxqtn mwkknshtb zppnzl'm?
  fnly. q, z kjqqt zrm z igkxwqr eql jxn kncjqr.
  knc. dxwix hn jxn sztnezijqlk?
  mqy. szllb, jxzj zs w zrm sb pzljrnl.
  fnly. rzb, jxzj'k inljzwr. dn xzfn jxn ncxwhwjwqr jq nczswrn.
  knc. hgj dxwix zln jxn qeenrmnlk jxzj zln jq hn nczswrnm? tnj jxns
    iqsn hneqln szkjnl iqrkjzhtn.
  mqy. bnz, szllb, tnj jxns iqsn hneqln sn. dxzj wk bqgl rzsn,
    elwnrm?
  hql. hqlzixwq.
  mqy. plzb dlwjn mqdr hqlzixwq. bqglk, kwllzx?
  iqr. w zs z ynrjtnszr, kwl, zrm sb rzsn wk iqrlzmn.
  mqy. dlwjn mqdr szkjnl ynrjtnszr iqrlzmn. szkjnlk, mq bqg knlfn
    yqm?
  hqjx. bnz, kwl, dn xqpn.
  mqy. dlwjn mqdr jxzj jxnb xqpn jxnb knlfn yqm; zrm dlwjn yqm ewlkj,
    eql yqm mnenrm hgj yqm kxqgtm yq hneqln kgix fwttzwrk! szkjnlk,
    wj wk plqfnm ztlnzmb jxzj bqg zln twjjtn hnjjnl jxzr eztkn
    urzfnk, zrm wj dwtt yq rnzl jq hn jxqgyxj kq kxqljtb. xqd zrkdnl
    bqg eql bqglkntfnk?
  iqr. szllb, kwl, dn kzb dn zln rqrn.
  mqy. z szlfnttqgk dwjjb enttqd, w zkkgln bqg; hgj w dwtt yq zhqgj
    dwjx xws. iqsn bqg xwjxnl, kwllzx. z dqlm wr bqgl nzl. kwl, w kzb
    jq bqg, wj wk jxqgyxj bqg zln eztkn urzfnk.
  hqlz. kwl, w kzb jq bqg dn zln rqrn.
  mqy. dntt, kjzrm zkwmn. eqln yqm, jxnb zln hqjx wr z jztn.
    xzfn bqg dlwj mqdr jxzj jxnb zln rqrn?
  knc. szkjnl iqrkjzhtn, bqg yq rqj jxn dzb jq nczswrn. bqg sgkj iztt
    eqljx jxn dzjix jxzj zln jxnwl ziigknlk.
  mqy. bnz, szllb, jxzj'k jxn nejnkj dzb. tnj jxn dzjix iqsn eqljx.
    szkjnlk, w ixzlyn bqg wr jxn plwrin'k rzsn ziigkn jxnkn snr.
  1. dzjix. jxwk szr kzwm, kwl, jxzj mqr vqxr jxn plwrin'k hlqjxnl
    dzk z fwttzwr.
  mqy. dlwjn mqdr plwrin vqxr z fwttzwr. dxb, jxwk wk etzj pnlvglb,
    jq iztt z plwrin'k hlqjxnl fwttzwr.
  hqlz. szkjnl iqrkjzhtn--
  mqy. plzb jxnn, enttqd, pnzin. w mq rqj twun jxb tqqu, w plqswkn
    jxnn.
  knc. dxzj xnzlm bqg xws kzb ntkn?
  2. dzjix. szllb, jxzj xn xzm lninwfnm z jxqgkzrm mgizjk qe mqr vqxr
    eql ziigkwry jxn tzmb xnlq dlqryegttb.
  mqy. etzj hglytzlb zk nfnl dzk iqsswjjnm.
  fnly. bnz, hb jx' szkk, jxzj wj wk.
  knc. dxzj ntkn, enttqd?
  1. dzjix. zrm jxzj iqgrj itzgmwq mwm snzr, gpqr xwk dqlmk, jq
    mwkylzin xnlq hneqln jxn dxqtn zkknshtb, zrm rqj szllb xnl.
  mqy. q fwttzwr! jxqg dwtj hn iqrmnsr'm wrjq nfnltzkjwry lnmnspjwqr
    eql jxwk.
  knc. dxzj ntkn?
  dzjixsnr. jxwk wk ztt.
  knc. zrm jxwk wk sqln, szkjnlk, jxzr bqg izr mnrb. plwrin vqxr wk
    jxwk sqlrwry knilnjtb kjqt'r zdzb. xnlq dzk wr jxwk szrrnl
    ziigk'm, wr jxwk szrrnl lnegk'm, zrm gpqr jxn ylwne qe jxwk
    kgmmnrtb mwnm. szkjnl iqrkjzhtn, tnj jxnkn snr hn hqgrm zrm
    hlqgyxj jq tnqrzjq'k. w dwtt yq hneqln zrm kxqd xws jxnwl
    nczswrzjwqr.                                         [ncwj.]
  mqy. iqsn, tnj jxns hn qpwrwqr'm.
  fnly. tnj jxns hn wr jxn xzrmk--
  iqr. qee, iqciqsh!
  mqy. yqm'k sb twen, dxnln'k jxn kncjqr? tnj xws dlwjn mqdr jxn
    plwrin'k qeewinl iqciqsh. iqsn, hwrm jxns.--jxqg rzgyxjb fzltnj!
  iqr. zdzb! bqg zln zr zkk, bqg zln zr zkk.
  mqy. mqkj jxqg rqj kgkpnij sb ptzin? mqkj jxqg rqj kgkpnij sb
    bnzlk? q jxzj xn dnln xnln jq dlwjn sn mqdr zr zkk! hgj, szkjnlk,
    lnsnshnl jxzj w zs zr zkk. jxqgyx wj hn rqj dlwjjnr mqdr, bnj
    eqlynj rqj jxzj w zs zr zkk. rq, jxqg fwttzwr, jxqg zlj egtt qe
    pwnjb, zk kxztt hn plqf'm gpqr jxnn hb yqqm dwjrnkk. w zs z dwkn
    enttqd; zrm dxwix wk sqln, zr qeewinl; zrm dxwix wk sqln, z
    xqgknxqtmnl; zrm dxwix wk sqln, zk plnjjb z pwnin qe etnkx zk zrb
    wk wr snkkwrz, zrm qrn jxzj urqdk jxn tzd, yq jq! zrm z lwix
    enttqd nrqgyx, yq jq! zrm z enttqd jxzj xzjx xzm tqkknk; zrm qrn
    jxzj xzjx jdq yqdrk zrm nfnlbjxwry xzrmkqsn zhqgj xws. hlwry xws
    zdzb. q jxzj w xzm hnnr dlwj mqdr zr zkk!
                                                         ncngrj.




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij f. kinrn w.
jxn kjlnnj, rnzl tnqrzjq'k xqgkn.

nrjnl tnqrzjq zrm xwk hlqjxnl [ zrjqrwq].

  zrj. we bqg yq qr jxgk, bqg dwtt uwtt bqglknte,
    zrm 'jwk rqj dwkmqs jxgk jq kniqrm ylwne
    zyzwrkj bqglknte.
  tnqr. w plzb jxnn inzkn jxb iqgrknt,
    dxwix ezttk wrjq swrn nzlk zk plqewjtnkk
    zk dzjnl wr z kwnfn. ywfn rqj sn iqgrknt,
    rql tnj rq iqseqljnl mntwyxj swrn nzl
    hgj kgix z qrn dxqkn dlqryk mq kgwj dwjx swrn.
    hlwry sn z ezjxnl jxzj kq tqf'm xwk ixwtm,
    dxqkn vqb qe xnl wk qfnldxnts'm twun swrn,
    zrm hwm xws kpnzu jq sn qe pzjwnrin.
    snzkgln xwk dqn jxn tnryjx zrm hlnzmjx qe swrn,
    zrm tnj wj zrkdnl nfnlb kjlzwr eql kjlzwr,
    zk jxgk eql jxgk, zrm kgix z ylwne eql kgix,
    wr nfnlb twrnzsnrj, hlzrix, kxzpn, zrm eqls.
    we kgix z qrn dwtt kswtn zrm kjlqun xwk hnzlm,
    hwm kqllqd dzy, ilb 'xns' dxnr xn kxqgtm ylqzr,
    pzjix ylwne dwjx plqfnlhk, szun swkeqljgrn mlgru
    dwjx izrmtn-dzkjnlk--hlwry xws bnj jq sn,
    zrm w qe xws dwtt yzjxnl pzjwnrin.
    hgj jxnln wk rq kgix szr; eql, hlqjxnl, snr
    izr iqgrknt zrm kpnzu iqseqlj jq jxzj ylwne
    dxwix jxnb jxnskntfnk rqj ennt; hgj, jzkjwry wj,
    jxnwl iqgrknt jglrk jq pzkkwqr, dxwix hneqln
    dqgtm ywfn plninpjwzt snmwiwrn jq lzyn,
    enjjnl kjlqry szmrnkk wr z kwtunr jxlnzm,
    ixzls zixn dwjx zwl zrm zyqrb dwjx dqlmk.
    rq, rq! 'jwk ztt snr'k qeewin jq kpnzu pzjwnrin
    jq jxqkn jxzj dlwry grmnl jxn tqzm qe kqllqd,
    hgj rq szr'k fwljgn rql kgeewiwnrib
    jq hn kq sqlzt dxnr xn kxztt nrmgln
    jxn twun xwsknte. jxnlneqln ywfn sn rq iqgrknt.
    sb ylwnek ilb tqgmnl jxzr zmfnljwknsnrj.
  zrj. jxnlnwr mq snr elqs ixwtmlnr rqjxwry mweenl.
  tnqr. w plzb jxnn pnzin. w dwtt hn etnkx zrm htqqm;
    eql jxnln dzk rnfnl bnj pxwtqkqpxnl
    jxzj iqgtm nrmgln jxn jqqjxzixn pzjwnrjtb,
    xqdnfnl jxnb xzfn dlwj jxn kjbtn qe yqmk
    zrm szmn z pgkx zj ixzrin zrm kgeenlzrin.
  zrj. bnj hnrm rqj ztt jxn xzls gpqr bqglknte.
    szun jxqkn jxzj mq qeenrm bqg kgeenl jqq.
  tnqr. jxnln jxqg kpnzu'kj lnzkqr. rzb, w dwtt mq kq.
    sb kqgt mqjx jntt sn xnlq wk hntwnm;
    zrm jxzj kxztt itzgmwq urqd; kq kxztt jxn plwrin,
    zrm ztt qe jxns jxzj jxgk mwkxqrqgl xnl.

              nrjnl mqr pnmlq zrm itzgmwq.

  zrj. xnln iqsnk jxn plwrin zrm itzgmwq xzkjwtb.
  pnmlq. yqqm mnr, yqqm mnr.
  itzgm. yqqm mzb jq hqjx qe bqg.
  tnqr. xnzl bqg, sb tqlmk!
  pnmlq. dn xzfn kqsn xzkjn, tnqrzjq.
  tnqr. kqsn xzkjn, sb tqlm! dntt, ezln bqg dntt, sb tqlm.
    zln bqg kq xzkjb rqd? dntt, ztt wk qrn.
  pnmlq. rzb, mq rqj ogzllnt dwjx gk, yqqm qtm szr.
  zrj. we xn iqgtm lwyxj xwsknte dwjx ogzllnttwry,
    kqsn qe gk dqgtm twn tqd.
  itzgm. dxq dlqryk xws?
  tnqr. szllb, jxqg mqkj dlqry sn, jxqg mwkknshtnl, jxqg!
    rzb, rnfnl tzb jxb xzrm gpqr jxb kdqlm;
    w enzl jxnn rqj.
  itzgm. szlb, hnkxlnd sb xzrm
    we wj kxqgtm ywfn bqgl zyn kgix izgkn qe enzl.
    wr ezwjx, sb xzrm snzrj rqjxwry jq sb kdqlm.
  tnqr. jgkx, jgkx, szr! rnfnl etnnl zrm vnkj zj sn
    w kpnzu rqj twun z mqjzlm rql z eqqt,
    zk grmnl plwfwtnyn qe zyn jq hlzy
    dxzj w xzfn mqrn hnwry bqgry, ql dxzj dqgtm mq,
    dnln w rqj qtm. urqd, itzgmwq, jq jxb xnzm,
    jxqg xzkj kq dlqry'm swrn wrrqinrj ixwtm zrm sn
    jxzj w zs eqli'm jq tzb sb lnfnlnrin hb
    zrm, dwjx ylnb xzwlk zrm hlgwkn qe szrb mzbk,
    mq ixzttnryn jxnn jq jlwzt qe z szr.
    w kzb jxqg xzkj hntwnm swrn wrrqinrj ixwtm;
    jxb ktzrmnl xzjx yqrn jxlqgyx zrm jxlqgyx xnl xnzlj,
    zrm kxn twnm hglwnm dwjx xnl zrinkjqlk-
    q, wr z jqsh dxnln rnfnl kizrmzt ktnpj,
    kzfn jxwk qe xnlk, elzs'm hb jxb fwttzrb!
  itzgm. sb fwttzrb?
  tnqr. jxwrn, itzgmwq; jxwrn w kzb.
  pnmlq. bqg kzb rqj lwyxj, qtm szr
  tnqr. sb tqlm, sb tqlm,
    w'tt plqfn wj qr xwk hqmb we xn mzln,
    mnkpwjn xwk rwin enrin zrm xwk zijwfn plzijwin,
    xwk szb qe bqgjx zrm htqqs qe tgkjwxqqm.
  itzgm. zdzb! w dwtt rqj xzfn jq mq dwjx bqg.
  tnqr. izrkj jxqg kq mzee sn? jxqg xzkj uwtt'm sb ixwtm.
    we jxqg uwtt'kj sn, hqb, jxqg kxztj uwtt z szr.
    zrm. xn kxztt uwtt jdq qe gk, zrm snr wrmnnm
    hgj jxzj'k rq szjjnl; tnj xws uwtt qrn ewlkj.
    dwr sn zrm dnzl sn! tnj xws zrkdnl sn.
    iqsn, eqttqd sn, hqb,. iqsn, kwl hqb, iqsn eqttqd sn.
    kwl hqb, w'tt dxwp bqg elqs bqgl eqwrwry enrin!
    rzb, zk w zs z ynrjtnszr, w dwtt.
  tnqr. hlqjxnl--
  zrj. iqrjnrj bqglknte. yqm urqdk w tqf'm sb rwnin,
    zrm kxn wk mnzm, ktzrmnl'm jq mnzjx hb fwttzwrk,
    jxzj mzln zk dntt zrkdnl z szr wrmnnm
    zk w mzln jzun z knlpnrj hb jxn jqrygn.
    hqbk, zpnk, hlzyyzljk, vziuk, swtukqpk!
  tnqr. hlqjxnl zrjxqrb--
  zrj. xqtm bqg iqrjnrj. dxzj, szr! w urqd jxns, bnz,
    zrm dxzj jxnb dnwyx, nfnr jq jxn gjsqkj kilgptn,
    kizshtwry, qgjeziwry, ezkxwqr-sqrywry hqbk,
    jxzj twn zrm iqy zrm etqgj, mnplzfn zrm ktzrmnl,
    yq zrjwitb, kxqd qgjdzlm xwmnqgkrnkk,
    zrm kpnzu qee xzte z mqanr mzry'lqgk dqlmk,
    xqd jxnb swyxj xglj jxnwl nrnswnk, we jxnb mglkj;
    zrm jxwk wk ztt.
  tnqr. hgj, hlqjxnl zrjxqrb--
  zrj. iqsn, 'jwk rq szjjnl.
    mq rqj bqg snmmtn; tnj sn mnzt wr jxwk.
  pnmlq. ynrjtnsnr hqjx, dn dwtt rqj dzun bqgl pzjwnrin.
    sb xnzlj wk kqllb eql bqgl mzgyxjnl'k mnzjx;
    hgj, qr sb xqrqgl, kxn dzk ixzly'm dwjx rqjxwry
    hgj dxzj dzk jlgn, zrm fnlb egtt qe plqqe.
  tnqr. sb tqlm, sb tqlm--
  pnmlq. w dwtt rqj xnzl bqg.
  tnqr. rq? iqsn, hlqjxnl, zdzb!--w dwtt hn xnzlm.
  zrj. zrm kxztt, ql kqsn qe gk dwtt kszlj eql wj.
                                                    ncngrj zshq.

                  nrjnl hnrnmwiu.

  pnmlq. knn, knn! xnln iqsnk jxn szr dn dnrj jq knnu.
  itzgm. rqd, kwyrwql, dxzj rndk?
  hnrn. yqqm mzb, sb tqlm.
  pnmlq. dntiqsn, kwyrwql. bqg zln ztsqkj iqsn jq pzlj ztsqkj z elzb.
  itzgm. dn xzm twu'm jq xzfn xzm qgl jdq rqknk krzpp'm qee dwjx jdq
    qtm snr dwjxqgj jnnjx.
  pnmlq. tnqrzjq zrm xwk hlqjxnl. dxzj jxwru'kj jxqg? xzm dn eqgyxj,
    w mqghj dn kxqgtm xzfn hnnr jqq bqgry eql jxns.
  hnrn. wr z eztkn ogzllnt jxnln wk rq jlgn fztqgl. w izsn jq knnu

  itzgm. dn xzfn hnnr gp zrm mqdr jq knnu jxnn; eql dn zln xwyx-plqqe

  hnrn. wj wk wr sb kizhhzlm. kxztt w mlzd wj?
  pnmlq. mqkj jxqg dnzl jxb dwj hb jxb kwmn?
  itzgm. rnfnl zrb mwm kq, jxqgyx fnlb szrb xzfn hnnr hnkwmn jxnwl

  pnmlq. zk w zs zr xqrnkj szr, xn tqquk pztn. zlj jxqg kwiu ql

  itzgm. dxzj, iqglzyn, szr! dxzj jxqgyx izln uwtt'm z izj, jxqg xzkj

  hnrn. kwl, w kxztt snnj bqgl dwj wr jxn izlnnl zr bqg ixzlyn wj

  itzgm. rzb jxnr, ywfn xws zrqjxnl kjzee; jxwk tzkj dzk hlqun ilqkk.

  itzgm. we xn hn, xn urqdk xqd jq jglr xwk ywlmtn.

  itzgm. yqm htnkk sn elqs z ixzttnryn!
  hnrn. [zkwmn jq itzgmwq] bqg zln z fwttzwr. w vnkj rqj; w dwtt szun

  itzgm. dntt, w dwtt snnj bqg, kq w szb xzfn yqqm ixnnl.

  itzgm. w' ezwjx, w jxzru xws, xn xzjx hwm sn jq z iztfn'k xnzm zrm

  hnrn. kwl, bqgl dwj zshtnk dntt; wj yqnk nzkwtb.
  pnmlq. w'tt jntt jxnn xqd hnzjlwin plzwk'm jxb dwj jxn qjxnl mzb. w

  itzgm. eql jxn dxwix kxn dnpj xnzljwtb zrm kzwm kxn izlnm rqj.
  pnmlq. bnz, jxzj kxn mwm; hgj bnj, eql ztt jxzj, zr we kxn mwm rqj

  itzgm. ztt, ztt! zrm sqlnqfnl, yqm kzd xws dxnr xn dzk xwm wr jxn

  pnmlq. hgj dxnr kxztt dn knj jxn kzfzyn hgtt'k xqlrk qr jxn

  itzgm. bnz, zrm jncj grmnlrnzjx, 'xnln mdnttk hnrnmwiu, jxn szllwnm

  hnrn. ezln bqg dntt, hqb; bqg urqd sb swrm. w dwtt tnzfn bqg rqd jq

  nrjnl iqrkjzhtnk [mqyhnllb zrm fnlynk, dwjx jxn dzjix, tnzmwry]

  itzgm. xn wk jxnr z ywzrj jq zr zpn; hgj jxnr wk zr zpn z mqijql jq

  pnmlq. hgj, kqej bqg, tnj sn hn! ptgiu gp, sb xnzlj, zrm hn kzm!

  mqy. iqsn bqg, kwl. we vgkjwin izrrqj jzsn bqg, kxn kxztt rn'nl

  itzgm. xnzlunr zejnl jxnwl qeenrin, sb tqlm.
  pnmlq. qeewinlk, dxzj qeenrin xzfn jxnkn snr mqrn?
  mqy. szllb, kwl, jxnb xzfn iqsswjjnm eztkn lnpqlj; sqlnqfnl, jxnb
    xzfn kpqunr grjlgjxk; kniqrmzlwtb, jxnb zln ktzrmnlk; kwcjx zrm

  pnmlq. ewlkj, w zku jxnn dxzj jxnb xzfn mqrn; jxwlmtb, w zku jxnn

    zrm jq iqritgmn, dxzj bqg tzb jq jxnwl ixzlyn.
  itzgm. lwyxjtb lnzkqrnm, zrm wr xwk qdr mwfwkwqr; zrm hb sb jlqjx
    jxnln'k qrn snzrwry dntt kgwjnm.
  pnmlq. dxq xzfn bqg qeenrmnm, szkjnlk, jxzj bqg zln jxgk hqgrm jq
    bqgl zrkdnl? jxwk tnzlrnm iqrkjzhtn wk jqq igrrwry jq hn
    grmnlkjqqm. dxzj'k bqgl qeenrin?
  hqlz. kdnnj plwrin, tnj sn yq rq ezljxnl jq swrn zrkdnl. mq bqg
    xnzl sn, zrm tnj jxwk iqgrj uwtt sn. w xzfn mninwfnm nfnr bqgl
    fnlb nbnk. dxzj bqgl dwkmqsk iqgtm rqj mwkiqfnl, jxnkn kxzttqd
    eqqtk xzfn hlqgyxj jq twyxj, dxq wr jxn rwyxj qfnlxnzlm sn
    iqrenkkwry jq jxwk szr, xqd mqr vqxr bqgl hlqjxnl wrinrknm sn jq
    ktzrmnl jxn tzmb xnlq; xqd bqg dnln hlqgyxj wrjq jxn qlixzlm zrm
    kzd sn iqglj szlyzlnj wr xnlq'k yzlsnrjk; xqd bqg mwkylzi'm xnl
    dxnr bqg kxqgtm szllb xnl. sb fwttzrb jxnb xzfn gpqr lniqlm,
    dxwix w xzm lzjxnl knzt dwjx sb mnzjx jxzr lnpnzj qfnl jq sb
    kxzsn. jxn tzmb wk mnzm gpqr swrn zrm sb szkjnl'k eztkn
    ziigkzjwqr; zrm hlwnetb, w mnkwln rqjxwry hgj jxn lndzlm qe z
    fwttzwr.
  pnmlq. lgrk rqj jxwk kpnnix twun wlqr jxlqgyx bqgl htqqm?
  itzgm. w xzfn mlgru pqwkqr dxwtnk xn gjjnl'm wj.
  pnmlq. hgj mwm sb hlqjxnl knj jxnn qr jq jxwk?
  hqlz. bnz, zrm pzwm sn lwixtb eql jxn plzijwin qe wj.
  pnmlq. xn wk iqspqk'm zrm elzs'm qe jlnzixnlb,
    zrm etnm xn wk gpqr jxwk fwttzrb.
  itzgm. kdnnj xnlq, rqd jxb wszyn mqjx zppnzl
    wr jxn lzln knshtzrin jxzj w tqf'm wj ewlkj.
  mqy. iqsn, hlwry zdzb jxn ptzwrjweek. hb jxwk jwsn qgl kncjqr xzjx

  fnly. xnln, xnln iqsnk szkjnl kwyrwql tnqrzjq, zrm jxn kncjqr jqq.

          nrjnl tnqrzjq, xwk hlqjxnl [zrjqrwq], zrm jxn kncjqr.

  tnqr. dxwix wk jxn fwttzwr? tnj sn knn xwk nbnk,
    jxzj, dxnr w rqjn zrqjxnl szr twun xws,
    w szb zfqwm xws. dxwix qe jxnkn wk xn?
  hqlz. we bqg dqgtm urqd bqgl dlqrynl, tqqu qr sn.
  tnqr. zlj jxqg jxn ktzfn jxzj dwjx jxb hlnzjx xzkj uwtt'm
    swrn wrrqinrj ixwtm?
  hqlz. bnz, nfnr w ztqrn.
  tnqr. rq, rqj kq, fwttzwr! jxqg hntwnkj jxbknte.
    xnln kjzrm z pzwl qe xqrqglzhtn snr--
    z jxwlm wk etnm--jxzj xzm z xzrm wr wj.
    w jxzru bqg plwrink eql sb mzgyxjnl'k mnzjx.
    lniqlm wj dwjx bqgl xwyx zrm dqljxb mnnmk.
    'jdzk hlzfntb mqrn, we bqg hnjxwru bqg qe wj.
  itzgm. w urqd rqj xqd jq plzb bqgl pzjwnrin;
    bnj w sgkj kpnzu. ixqqkn bqgl lnfnryn bqglknte;
    wspqkn sn jq dxzj pnrzrin bqgl wrfnrjwqr
    izr tzb gpqr sb kwr. bnj kwrr'm w rqj
    hgj wr swkjzuwry.
  pnmlq. hb sb kqgt, rql w!
    zrm bnj, jq kzjwkeb jxwk yqqm qtm szr,
    w dqgtm hnrm grmnl zrb xnzfb dnwyxj
    jxzj xn'tt nrvqwr sn jq.
  tnqr. w izrrqj hwm bqg hwm sb mzgyxjnl twfn-
    jxzj dnln wspqkkwhtn; hgj w plzb bqg hqjx,
    pqkknkk jxn pnqptn wr snkkwrz xnln
    xqd wrrqinrj kxn mwnm; zrm we bqgl tqfn
    izr tzhqgl zgyxj wr kzm wrfnrjwqr,
    xzry xnl zr npwjzpx gpqr xnl jqsh,
    zrm kwry wj jq xnl hqrnk--kwry wj jq-rwyxj.
    jq-sqllqd sqlrwry iqsn bqg jq sb xqgkn,
    zrm kwrin bqg iqgtm rqj hn sb kqr-wr-tzd,
    hn bnj sb rnpxnd. sb hlqjxnl xzjx z mzgyxjnl,
    ztsqkj jxn iqpb qe sb ixwtm jxzj'k mnzm,
    zrm kxn ztqrn wk xnwl jq hqjx qe gk.
    ywfn xnl jxn lwyxj bqg kxqgtm xzfn ywf'r xnl iqgkwr,
    zrm kq mwnk sb lnfnryn.
  itzgm. q rqhtn kwl!
    bqgl qfnl-uwrmrnkk mqjx dlwry jnzlk elqs sn.
    w mq nshlzin bqgl qeenl; zrm mwkpqkn
    eql xnrineqljx qe pqql itzgmwq.
  tnqr. jq-sqllqd jxnr w dwtt ncpnij bqgl iqswry;
    jq-rwyxj w jzun sb tnzfn. jxwk rzgyxjb szr
    kxztt ezij jq ezin hn hlqgyxj jq szlyzlnj,
    dxq w hntwnfn dzk pziu'm wr ztt jxwk dlqry,
    xwl'm jq wj hb bqgl hlqjxnl.
  hqlz. rq, hb sb kqgt, kxn dzk rqj;
    rql urnd rqj dxzj kxn mwm dxnr kxn kpqun jq sn;
    hgj ztdzbk xzjx hnnr vgkj zrm fwljgqgk
    wr zrbjxwry jxzj w mq urqd hb xnl.
  mqy. sqlnqfnl, kwl, dxwix wrmnnm wk rqj grmnl dxwjn zrm htziu, jxwk
    ptzwrjwee xnln, jxn qeenrmnl, mwm iztt sn zkk. w hnknnix bqg tnj
    wj hn lnsnsh'lnm wr xwk pgrwkxsnrj. zrm ztkq jxn dzjix xnzlm jxns
    jztu qe qrn mneqlsnm. jxnb kzb xn dnzlk z unb wr xwk nzl, zrm z
    tqiu xzrywry hb wj, zrm hqllqdk sqrnb wr yqm'k rzsn, jxn dxwix xn
    xzjx gk'm kq tqry zrm rnfnl pzwm jxzj rqd snr ylqd xzlm-xnzljnm
    zrm dwtt tnrm rqjxwry eql yqm'k kzun. plzb bqg nczswrn xws gpqr
    jxzj pqwrj.
  tnqr. w jxzru jxnn eql jxb izln zrm xqrnkj pzwrk.
  mqy. bqgl dqlkxwp kpnzuk twun z sqkj jxzruegt zrm lnfnlnrj bqgjx,
    zrm w plzwkn yqm eql bqg.
  tnqr. jxnln'k eql jxb pzwrk. [ywfnk sqrnb.]
  mqy. yqm kzfn jxn eqgrmzjwqr!
  tnqr. yq, w mwkixzlyn jxnn qe jxb plwkqrnl, zrm w jxzru jxnn.
  mqy. w tnzfn zr zllzrj urzfn dwjx bqgl dqlkxwp, dxwix w hnknnix
    bqgl dqlkxwp jq iqllnij bqglknte, eql jxn nczsptn qe qjxnlk.
    yqm unnp bqgl dqlkxwp! w dwkx bqgl dqlkxwp dntt. yqm lnkjqln bqg
    jq xnztjx! w xgshtb ywfn bqg tnzfn jq mnpzlj; zrm we z snllb
    snnjwry szb hn dwkx'm, yqm plqxwhwj wj! iqsn, rnwyxhqgl.
                                   ncngrj [mqyhnllb zrm fnlynk].
  tnqr. grjwt jq-sqllqd sqlrwry, tqlmk, ezlndntt.

  pnmlq. dn dwtt rqj eztt.
  itzgm. jq-rwyxj w'tt sqglr dwjx xnlq.

  tnqr. [jq jxn dzjix] hlwry bqg jxnkn enttqdk qr.--dn'tt jztu dwjx
      szlyzlnj,
    xqd xnl ziogzwrjzrin ylnd dwjx jxwk tndm enttqd.

kinrn ww.
tnqrzjq'k qlixzlm.

nrjnl hnrnmwiu zrm szlyzlnj [snnjwry].

  hnrn. plzb jxnn, kdnnj swkjlnkk szlyzlnj, mnknlfn dntt zj sb xzrmk
    hb xntpwry sn jq jxn kpnnix qe hnzjlwin.
  szly. dwtt bqg jxnr dlwjn sn z kqrrnj wr plzwkn qe sb hnzgjb?
  hnrn. wr kq xwyx z kjbtn, szlyzlnj, jxzj rq szr twfwry kxztt iqsn
    qfnl wj; eql wr sqkj iqsntb jlgjx jxqg mnknlfnkj wj.
  szly. jq xzfn rq szr iqsn qfnl sn? dxb, kxztt w ztdzbk unnp hntqd
    kjzwlk?
  hnrn. jxb dwj wk zk ogwiu zk jxn ylnbxqgrm'k sqgjx--wj izjixnk.
  szly. zrm bqglk zk htgrj zk jxn enrinl'k eqwtk, dxwix xwj hgj xglj
    rqj.
  hnrn. z sqkj szrtb dwj, szlyzlnj: wj dwtt rqj xglj z dqszr.
    zrm kq w plzb jxnn iztt hnzjlwin. w ywfn jxnn jxn hgiutnlk.
  szly. ywfn gk jxn kdqlmk; dn xzfn hgiutnlk qe qgl qdr.
  hnrn. we bqg gkn jxns, szlyzlnj, bqg sgkj pgj wr jxn pwunk dwjx z
    fwin, zrm jxnb zln mzrynlqgk dnzpqrk eql szwmk.
  szly. dntt, w dwtt iztt hnzjlwin jq bqg, dxq w jxwru xzjx tnyk.
  hnrn. zrm jxnlneqln dwtt iqsn.
                                                  ncwj szlyzlnj.
       [kwryk] jxn yqm qe tqfn,
               jxzj kwjk zhqfn
           zrm urqdk sn, zrm urqdk sn,
             xqd pwjwegt w mnknlfn--

    w snzr wr kwrywry; hgj wr tqfwry tnzrmnl jxn yqqm kdwssnl,
    jlqwtgk jxn ewlkj nsptqbnl qe pzrmnlk, zrm z dxqtn hqqu egtt qe
    jxnkn ogqrmzs izlpnj-sqrynlk, dxqkn rzsnk bnj lgr ksqqjxtb wr jxn
    nfnr lqzm qe z htzru fnlkn--dxb, jxnb dnln rnfnl kq jlgtb jglr'm
    qfnl zrm qfnl zk sb pqql knte wr tqfn. szllb, w izrrqj kxqd wj wr
    lxbsn. w xzfn jlwnm. w izr ewrm qgj rq lxbsn jq 'tzmb' hgj 'hzhb'
    --zr wrrqinrj lxbsn; eql 'kiqlr,' 'xqlr'--z xzlm lxbsn; eql
    'kixqqt', 'eqqt'--z hzhhtwry lxbsn: fnlb qswrqgk nrmwryk! rq, w
    dzk rqj hqlr grmnl z lxbswry ptzrnj, rql izrrqj dqq wr enkjwfzt
    jnlsk.

                    nrjnl hnzjlwin.

    kdnnj hnzjlwin, dqgtmkj jxqg iqsn dxnr w iztt'm jxnn?
  hnzj. bnz, kwyrwql, zrm mnpzlj dxnr bqg hwm sn.
  hnrn. q, kjzb hgj jwtt jxnr!
  hnzj. 'jxnr' wk kpqunr. ezln bqg dntt rqd. zrm bnj, nln w yq, tnj
    sn yq dwjx jxzj w izsn eql, dxwix wk, dwjx urqdwry dxzj xzjx
    pzkk'm hnjdnnr bqg zrm itzgmwq.
  hnrn. qrtb eqgt dqlmk; zrm jxnlngpqr w dwtt uwkk jxnn.
  hnzj. eqgt dqlmk wk hgj eqgt dwrm, zrm eqgt dwrm wk hgj eqgt
    hlnzjx, zrm eqgt hlnzjx wk rqwkqsn. jxnlneqln w dwtt mnpzlj
    gruwkk'm.
  hnrn. jxqg xzkj elwyxjnm jxn dqlm qgj qe xwk lwyxj knrkn, kq
    eqliwhtn wk jxb dwj. hgj w sgkj jntt jxnn ptzwrtb, itzgmwq
    grmnlyqnk sb ixzttnryn; zrm nwjxnl w sgkj kxqljtb xnzl elqs xws

    nfwt jxzj jxnb dwtt rqj zmswj zrb yqqm pzlj jq wrjnlswrytn dwjx
    jxns. hgj eql dxwix qe sb yqqm pzljk mwm bqg ewlkj kgeenl tqfn
    eql sn?
  hnrn. kgeenl tqfn!--z yqqm npwjxnj. w mq kgeenl tqfn wrmnnm, eql w
    tqfn jxnn zyzwrkj sb dwtt.
  hnzj. wr kpwjn qe bqgl xnzlj, w jxwru. ztzk, pqql xnzlj! we bqg
    kpwjn wj eql sb kzun, w dwtt kpwjn wj eql bqglk, eql w dwtt rnfnl

  hnrn. jxqg zrm w zln jqq dwkn jq dqq pnzinzhtb.
  hnzj. wj zppnzlk rqj wr jxwk iqrenkkwqr. jxnln'k rqj qrn dwkn szr
    zsqry jdnrjb, jxzj dwtt plzwkn xwsknte.
  hnrn. zr qtm, zr qtm wrkjzrin, hnzjlwin, jxzj twf'm wr jxn jwsn qe
    yqqm rnwyxhqglk. we z szr mq rqj nlnij wr jxwk zyn xwk qdr jqsh
    nln xn mwnk, xn kxztt twfn rq tqrynl wr sqrgsnrj jxzr jxn hntt

  hnrn. ognkjwqr: dxb, zr xqgl wr itzsqgl zrm z ogzljnl wr lxngs.
    jxnlneqln wk wj sqkj ncpnmwnrj eql jxn dwkn, we mqr dqls (xwk

    jntt sn, xqd mqjx bqgl iqgkwr?
  hnzj. fnlb wtt.
  hnrn. zrm xqd mq bqg?
  hnzj. fnlb wtt jqq.
  hnrn. knlfn yqm, tqfn sn, zrm snrm. jxnln dwtt w tnzfn bqg jqq, eql
    xnln iqsnk qrn wr xzkjn.

                         nrjnl glkgtz.

       nrjnl [tnqrzjq'k] hlqjxnl [zrjqrwq], xnlq, hnzjlwin,

mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk

iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs

kinrn: fnrwin zrm ibplgk

zij w. kinrn w.
fnrwin. z kjlnnj.

nrjnl lqmnlwyq zrm wzyq.

  lqmnlwyq. jgkx, rnfnl jntt sn! w jzun wj sgix gruwrmtb
    jxzj jxqg, wzyq, dxq xzkj xzm sb pglkn
    zk we jxn kjlwryk dnln jxwrn, kxqgtmkj urqd qe jxwk.
  wzyq. 'khtqqm, hgj bqg dwtt rqj xnzl sn.
    we nfnl w mwm mlnzs qe kgix z szjjnl,
    zhxql sn.
  lqmnlwyq. jxqg jqtm'kj sn jxqg mwmkj xqtm xws wr jxb xzjn.
  wzyq. mnkpwkn sn, we w mq rqj. jxlnn ylnzj qrnk qe jxn iwjb,
    wr pnlkqrzt kgwj jq szun sn xwk twngjnrzrj,

    zrm dxzj dzk xn?
    eqlkqqjx, z ylnzj zlwjxsnjwiwzr,

  hlzhzrjwq. q jxqg eqgt jxwne, dxnln xzkj jxqg kjqd'm sb mzgyxjnl?

    dxnjxnl z szwm kq jnrmnl, ezwl, zrm xzppb,

    vgmyn sn jxn dqltm, we 'jwk rqj ylqkk wr knrkn
    jxzj jxqg xzkj plzijwinm qr xnl dwjx eqgt ixzlsk,
    zhgknm xnl mntwizjn bqgjx dwjx mlgyk ql swrnlztk
    jxzj dnzunr sqjwqr. w'tt xzfn'j mwkpgjnm qr;

    w jxnlneqln zpplnxnrm zrm mq zjjzix jxnn

    qe zljk wrxwhwjnm zrm qgj qe dzllzrj.

    kghmgn xws zj xwk pnlwt.
  qjxnttq.                   xqtm bqgl xzrmk,
    hqjx bqg qe sb writwrwry zrm jxn lnkj.
    dnln wj sb ign jq ewyxj, w kxqgtm xzfn urqdr wj
    dwjxqgj z plqspjnl. dxnln dwtt bqg jxzj w yq
    jq zrkdnl jxwk bqgl ixzlyn?
  hlzhzrjwq.                    jq plwkqr, jwtt ewj jwsn
    qe tzd zrm iqglkn qe mwlnij knkkwqr
    iztt jxnn jq zrkdnl.
  qjxnttq.               dxzj we w mq qhnb?
    xqd szb jxn mgun hn jxnlndwjx kzjwkewnm,
    dxqkn snkknrynlk zln xnln zhqgj sb kwmn,
    gpqr kqsn plnknrj hgkwrnkk qe jxn kjzjn
    jq hlwry sn jq xws?
  ewlkj qeewinl.        'jwk jlgn, sqkj dqljxb kwyrwql;
    jxn mgun'k wr iqgriwt, zrm bqgl rqhtn knte,
    w zs kgln, wk knrj eql.
  hlzhzrjwq.                xqd? jxn mgun wr iqgriwt?
    wr jxwk jwsn qe jxn rwyxj? hlwry xws zdzb;
    swrn'k rqj zr wmtn izgkn. jxn mgun xwsknte,
    ql zrb qe sb hlqjxnlk qe jxn kjzjn,
    izrrqj hgj ennt jxwk dlqry zk 'jdnln jxnwl qdr;
    eql we kgix zijwqrk szb xzfn pzkkzyn elnn,
    hqrm ktzfnk zrm pzyzrk kxztt qgl kjzjnksnr hn.            ncngrj.




kinrn www.
z iqgriwt ixzshnl. jxn mgun zrm knrzjqlk kwjjwry zj z jzhtn;
qeewinlk zjjnrmwry.

  mgun. jxnln wk rq iqspqkwjwqr wr jxnkn rndk
    jxzj ywfnk jxns ilnmwj.

  kniqrm knrzjql.                      zrm swrn, jdq xgrmlnm.

  ewlkj knrzjql. hgj, qjxnttq, kpnzu.
    mwm bqg hb wrmwlnij zrm eqlinm iqglknk

                                          ncngrj wzyq zrm zjjnrmzrjk.
    zrm jwtt kxn iqsn, zk jlgtb zk jq xnzfnr

  mgun. kzb wj, qjxnttq.
  qjxnttq. xnl ezjxnl tqfnm sn, qej wrfwjnm sn,

    elqs bnzl jq bnzl, jxn hzjjtnk, kwnynk, eqljgrnk,

    jq jxn fnlb sqsnrj jxzj xn hzmn sn jntt wj:
    dxnlnwr w kpzun qe sqkj mwkzkjlqgk ixzrink,
    qe sqfwry ziiwmnrjk hb etqqm zrm ewntm,
    qe xzwl-hlnzmjx 'kizpnk w' jxn wsswrnrj mnzmtb hlnzix,

    zrm kqtm jq ktzfnlb, qe sb lnmnspjwqr jxnrin
    zrm pqljzrin wr sb jlzfntk' xwkjqlb;
    dxnlnwr qe zrjlnk fzkj zrm mnknljk wmtn,
    lqgyx ogzllwnk, lqiuk, zrm xwttk dxqkn xnzmk jqgix xnzfnr,
    wj dzk sb xwrj jq kpnzu- kgix dzk jxn plqinkk-
    zrm qe jxn izrrwhztk jxzj nzix qjxnl nzj,
    jxn zrjxlqpqpxzyw, zrm snr dxqkn xnzmk
    mq ylqd hnrnzjx jxnwl kxqgtmnlk. jxwk jq xnzl
    dqgtm mnkmnsqrz knlwqgktb writwrn;
    hgj kjwtt jxn xqgkn zeezwlk dqgtm mlzd xnl jxnrin,
    dxwix nfnl zk kxn iqgtm dwjx xzkjn mwkpzjix,
    kxn'tm iqsn zyzwr, zrm dwjx z ylnnmb nzl
    mnfqgl gp sb mwkiqglkn; dxwix w qhknlfwry,
    jqqu qrin z ptwzrj xqgl, zrm eqgrm yqqm snzrk
    jq mlzd elqs xnl z plzbnl qe nzlrnkj xnzlj
    jxzj w dqgtm ztt sb pwtylwszyn mwtzjn,
    dxnlnqe hb pzlintk kxn xzm kqsnjxwry xnzlm,
    hgj rqj wrjnrjwfntb. w mwm iqrknrj,
    zrm qejnr mwm hnygwtn xnl qe xnl jnzlk
    dxnr w mwm kpnzu qe kqsn mwkjlnkkegt kjlqun
    jxzj sb bqgjx kgeenl'm. sb kjqlb hnwry mqrn,
    kxn yzfn sn eql sb pzwrk z dqltm qe kwyxk;
    kxn kdqln, wr ezwjx, 'jdzk kjlzryn, 'jdzk pzkkwry kjlzryn;
    'jdzk pwjwegt, 'jdzk dqrmlqgk pwjwegt.
    kxn dwkx'm kxn xzm rqj xnzlm wj, bnj kxn dwkx'm
    jxzj xnzfnr xzm szmn xnl kgix z szr; kxn jxzru'm sn,
    zrm hzmn sn, we w xzm z elwnrm jxzj tqfnm xnl,
    w kxqgtm hgj jnzix xws xqd jq jntt sb kjqlb,
    zrm jxzj dqgtm dqq xnl. gpqr jxwk xwrj w kpzun:
    kxn tqfnm sn eql jxn mzrynlk w xzm pzkk'm,
    zrm w tqfnm xnl jxzj kxn mwm pwjb jxns.
    jxwk qrtb wk jxn dwjixilzej w xzfn gknm.
    xnln iqsnk jxn tzmb; tnj xnl dwjrnkk wj.

                nrjnl mnkmnsqrz, wzyq, zrm zjjnrmzrjk.

  mgun. w jxwru jxwk jztn dqgtm dwr sb mzgyxjnl jqq.
    yqqm hlzhzrjwq,
    jzun gp jxwk szrytnm szjjnl zj jxn hnkj:
    snr mq jxnwl hlqunr dnzpqrk lzjxnl gkn
    jxzr jxnwl hzln xzrmk.
  hlzhzrjwq.               w plzb bqg, xnzl xnl kpnzu.
    we kxn iqrenkk jxzj kxn dzk xzte jxn dqqnl,

  mnkmnsqrz.                      sb rqhtn ezjxnl,
    w mq pnlinwfn xnln z mwfwmnm mgjb.

    xqd jq lnkpnij bqg; bqg zln jxn tqlm qe mgjb,

  hlzhzrjwq.                  yqm hn dwjx bqg! w xzfn mqrn.

    iqsn xwjxnl, sqql.
    w xnln mq ywfn jxnn jxzj dwjx ztt sb xnzlj

    eql jxb nkizpn dqgtm jnzix sn jblzrrb,
    jq xzry itqyk qr jxns. w xzfn mqrn, sb tqlm.
  mgun. tnj sn kpnzu twun bqglknte, zrm tzb z knrjnrin
    dxwix, zk z ylwkn ql kjnp, szb xntp jxnkn tqfnlk
    wrjq bqgl ezfql.
    dxnr lnsnmwnk zln pzkj, jxn ylwnek zln nrmnm
    hb knnwry jxn dqlkj, dxwix tzjn qr xqpnk mnpnrmnm.
    jq sqglr z swkixwne jxzj wk pzkj zrm yqrn
    wk jxn rncj dzb jq mlzd rnd swkixwne qr.
    dxzj izrrqj hn plnknlfnm dxnr eqljgrn jzunk,
    pzjwnrin xnl wrvglb z sqiunlb szunk.
    jxn lqhh'm jxzj kswtnk kjnztk kqsnjxwry elqs jxn jxwne;
    xn lqhk xwsknte jxzj kpnrmk z hqqjtnkk ylwne.
  hlzhzrjwq. kq tnj jxn jglu qe ibplgk gk hnygwtn;
    dn tqkn wj rqj kq tqry zk dn izr kswtn.
    xn hnzlk jxn knrjnrin dntt, jxzj rqjxwry hnzlk

    hgj xn hnzlk hqjx jxn knrjnrin zrm jxn kqllqd

    jxnkn knrjnrink, jq kgyzl ql jq yztt,
    hnwry kjlqry qr hqjx kwmnk, zln nogwfqizt.
    hgj dqlmk zln dqlmk; w rnfnl bnj mwm xnzl
    jxzj jxn hlgwknm xnzlj dzk pwnlinm jxlqgyx jxn nzl.
    w xgshtb hnknnix bqg, plqinnm jq jxn zeezwlk qe kjzjn.
  mgun. jxn jglu dwjx z sqkj swyxjb plnpzlzjwqr szunk eql ibplgk.
    qjxnttq, jxn eqljwjgmn qe jxn ptzin wk hnkj urqdr jq bqg; zrm
    jxqgyx dn xzfn jxnln z kghkjwjgjn qe sqkj zttqdnm kgeewiwnrib,
    bnj qpwrwqr, z kqfnlnwyr swkjlnkk qe neenijk, jxlqdk z sqln kzenl
    fqwin qr bqg. bqg sgkj jxnlneqln hn iqrjnrj jq ktghhnl jxn ytqkk
    qe bqgl rnd eqljgrnk dwjx jxwk sqln kjghhqlr zrm hqwkjnlqgk
    ncpnmwjwqr.
  qjxnttq. jxn jblzrj igkjqs, sqkj ylzfn knrzjqlk,
    xzjx szmn jxn etwrjb zrm kjnnt iqgix qe dzl
    sb jxlwin-mlwfnr hnm qe mqdr. w mq zyrwan
    z rzjglzt zrm plqspj ztzilwjb
    w ewrm wr xzlmrnkk zrm mq grmnljzun
    jxnkn plnknrj dzlk zyzwrkj jxn qjjqswjnk.
    sqkj xgshtb jxnlneqln hnrmwry jq bqgl kjzjn,
    w ilzfn ewj mwkpqkwjwqr eql sb dwen,
    mgn lnenlnrin qe ptzin zrm ncxwhwjwqr,
    dwjx kgix ziiqssqmzjwqr zrm hnkqlj
    zk tnfntk dwjx xnl hlnnmwry.
  mgun.                          we bqg ptnzkn,
    hn'j zj xnl ezjxnl'k.
  hlzhzrjwq.              w'tt rqj xzfn wj kq.
  qjxnttq. rql w.
  mnkmnsqrz.      rql w. w dqgtm rqj jxnln lnkwmn
    jq pgj sb ezjxnl wr wspzjwnrj jxqgyxjk
    hb hnwry wr xwk nbn. sqkj ylziwqgk mgun,
    jq sb greqtmwry tnrm bqgl plqkpnlqgk nzl,
    zrm tnj sn ewrm z ixzljnl wr bqgl fqwin
    jq zkkwkj sb kwsptnrnkk.
  mgun. dxzj dqgtm bqg, mnkmnsqrz?
  mnkmnsqrz. jxzj w mwm tqfn jxn sqql jq twfn dwjx xws,
    sb mqdrlwyxj fwqtnrin zrm kjqls qe eqljgrnk
    szb jlgspnj jq jxn dqltm. sb xnzlj'k kghmgnm
    nfnr jq jxn fnlb ogztwjb qe sb tqlm.
    w kzd qjxnttq'k fwkzyn wr xwk swrm,
    zrm jq xwk xqrqlk zrm xwk fztwzrj pzljk
    mwm w sb kqgt zrm eqljgrnk iqrknilzjn.
    kq jxzj, mnzl tqlmk, we w hn tnej hnxwrm,
    z sqjx qe pnzin, zrm xn yq jq jxn dzl,
    jxn lwjnk eql dxwix w tqfn xws zln hnlnej sn,
    zrm w z xnzfb wrjnlws kxztt kgppqlj
    hb xwk mnzl zhknrin. tnj sn yq dwjx xws.
  qjxnttq. tnj xnl xzfn bqgl fqwink.
    fqgix dwjx sn, xnzfnr, w jxnlneqln hny wj rqj
    jq ptnzkn jxn pztzjn qe sb zppnjwjn,
    rql jq iqsptb dwjx xnzj- jxn bqgry zeenijk
    wr sn mnegrij- zrm plqpnl kzjwkezijwqr;
    hgj jq hn elnn zrm hqgrjnqgk jq xnl swrm.
    zrm xnzfnr mnenrm bqgl yqqm kqgtk, jxzj bqg jxwru
    w dwtt bqgl knlwqgk zrm ylnzj hgkwrnkk kizrj
    eql kxn wk dwjx sn. rq, dxnr twyxj-dwry'm jqbk
    qe enzjxnl'm igpwm knnt dwjx dzrjqr mgttrnkk
    sb kpnigtzjwfn zrm qeewinm wrkjlgsnrjk,
    jxzj sb mwkpqljk iqllgpj zrm jzwrj sb hgkwrnkk,
    tnj xqgkndwfnk szun z kuwttnj qe sb xnts,
    zrm ztt wrmwyr zrm hzkn zmfnlkwjwnk
    szun xnzm zyzwrkj sb nkjwszjwqr!
  mgun. hn wj zk bqg kxztt plwfzjntb mnjnlswrn,
    nwjxnl eql xnl kjzb ql yqwry. jxn zeezwl ilwnk xzkjn,
    zrm kpnnm sgkj zrkdnl'j: bqg sgkj xnrin jqrwyxj.
  mnkmnsqrz. jqrwyxj, sb tqlm?
  mgun.                        jxwk rwyxj.
  qjxnttq.                                 dwjx ztt sb xnzlj.
  mgun. zj rwrn w' jxn sqlrwry xnln dn'tt snnj zyzwr.
    qjxnttq, tnzfn kqsn qeewinl hnxwrm,
    zrm xn kxztt qgl iqsswkkwqr hlwry jq bqg,
    dwjx kgix jxwryk ntkn qe ogztwjb zrm lnkpnij
    zk mqjx wspqlj bqg.
  qjxnttq.              kq ptnzkn bqgl ylzin, sb zriwnrj;
    z szr xn wk qe xqrnkjb zrm jlgkj.
    jq xwk iqrfnbzrin w zkkwyr sb dwen,
    dwjx dxzj ntkn rnnmegt bqgl yqqm ylzin kxztt jxwru
    jq hn knrj zejnl sn.
  mgun.                  tnj wj hn kq.
    yqqm rwyxj jq nfnlbqrn. [jq hlzhzrjwq.] zrm, rqhtn kwyrwql,
    we fwljgn rq mntwyxjnm hnzgjb tziu,
    bqgl kqr-wr-tzd wk ezl sqln ezwl jxzr htziu.
  ewlkj knrzjql. zmwng, hlzfn sqql, gkn mnkmnsqrz dntt.
  hlzhzrjwq. tqqu jq xnl, sqql, we jxqg xzkj nbnk jq knn;
    kxn xzk mninwfnm xnl ezjxnl, zrm szb jxnn.
                                 ncngrj mgun, knrzjqlk, zrm qeewinlk.
  qjxnttq. sb twen gpqr xnl ezwjx! xqrnkj wzyq,
    sb mnkmnsqrz sgkj w tnzfn jq jxnn.
    w plwjxnn, tnj jxb dwen zjjnrm qr xnl,
    zrm hlwry jxns zejnl wr jxn hnkj zmfzrjzyn.
    iqsn, mnkmnsqrz, w xzfn hgj zr xqgl
    qe tqfn, qe dqltmtb szjjnlk zrm mwlnijwqr,
    jq kpnrm dwjx jxnn. dn sgkj qhnb jxn jwsn.
                                        ncngrj qjxnttq zrm mnkmnsqrz.
  lqmnlwyq. wzyq!
  wzyq. dxzj kzb'kj jxqg, rqhtn xnzlj?
  lqmnlwyq. dxzj dwtt w mq, jxwrunkj jxqg?
  wzyq. dxb, yq jq hnm zrm ktnnp.
  lqmnlwyq. w dwtt wriqrjwrnrjtb mlqdr sbknte.
  wzyq. we jxqg mqkj, w kxztt rnfnl tqfn jxnn zejnl.
    dxb, jxqg kwttb ynrjtnszr!
  lqmnlwyq. wj wk kwttwrnkk jq twfn dxnr jq twfn wk jqlsnrj, zrm jxnr
    xzfn dn z plnkilwpjwqr jq mwn dxnr mnzjx wk qgl pxbkwiwzr.
  wzyq. q fwttzwrqgk! w xzfn tqqunm gpqr jxn dqltm eql eqgl jwsnk
    knfnr bnzlk, zrm kwrin w iqgtm mwkjwrygwkx hnjdwcj z hnrnewj zrm
    zr wrvglb, w rnfnl eqgrm szr jxzj urnd xqd jq tqfn xwsknte. nln w
    dqgtm kzb w dqgtm mlqdr sbknte eql jxn tqfn qe z ygwrnz xnr, w
    dqgtm ixzryn sb xgszrwjb dwjx z hzhqqr.
  lqmnlwyq. dxzj kxqgtm w mq? w iqrenkk wj wk sb kxzsn jq hn kq eqrm,
    hgj wj wk rqj wr sb fwljgn jq zsnrm wj.
  wzyq. fwljgn? z ewy! 'jwk wr qglkntfnk jxzj dn zln jxgk ql jxgk.
    qgl hqmwnk zln yzlmnrk, jq jxn dxwix qgl dwttk zln yzlmnrnlk; kq
    jxzj we dn dwtt ptzrj rnjjtnk ql kqd tnjjgin, knj xbkkqp zrm dnnm
    gp jxbsn, kgpptb wj dwjx qrn ynrmnl qe xnlhk ql mwkjlzij wj dwjx
    szrb, nwjxnl jq xzfn wj kjnlwtn dwjx wmtnrnkk ql szrglnm dwjx
    wrmgkjlb, dxb, jxn pqdnl zrm iqllwywhtn zgjxqlwjb qe jxwk twnk wr
    qgl dwttk. we jxn hztzrin qe qgl twfnk xzm rqj qrn kiztn qe
    lnzkqr jq pqwkn zrqjxnl qe knrkgztwjb, jxn htqqm zrm hzknrnkk qe
    qgl rzjglnk dqgtm iqrmgij gk jq sqkj plnpqkjnlqgk iqritgkwqrk.
    hgj dn xzfn lnzkqr jq iqqt qgl lzywry sqjwqrk, qgl izlrzt kjwryk,
    qgl grhwjjnm tgkjk; dxnlnqe w jzun jxwk, jxzj bqg iztt tqfn, jq
    hn z knij ql kiwqr.
  lqmnlwyq. wj izrrqj hn.
  wzyq. wj wk snlntb z tgkj qe jxn htqqm zrm z pnlswkkwqr qe jxn
    dwtt. iqsn, hn z szr! mlqdr jxbknte? mlqdr izjk zrm htwrm
    pgppwnk. w xzfn plqenkknm sn jxb elwnrm, zrm w iqrenkk sn urwj jq
    jxb mnknlfwry dwjx izhtnk qe pnlmglzhtn jqgyxrnkk; w iqgtm rnfnl
    hnjjnl kjnzm jxnn jxzr rqd. pgj sqrnb wr jxb pglkn; eqttqd jxqg
    jxn dzlk; mnenzj jxb ezfql dwjx zr gkglpnm hnzlm. w kzb, pgj
    sqrnb wr jxb pglkn. wj izrrqj hn jxzj mnkmnsqrz kxqgtm tqry
    iqrjwrgn xnl tqfn jq jxn sqql- pgj sqrnb wr jxb pglkn- rql xn xwk
    jq xnl. wj dzk z fwqtnrj iqssnrinsnrj, zrm jxqg kxztj knn zr
    zrkdnlzhtn knognkjlzjwqr- pgj hgj sqrnb wr jxb pglkn. jxnkn sqqlk
    zln ixzrynzhtn wr jxnwl dwttk- ewtt jxb pglkn dwjx sqrnb. jxn
    eqqm jxzj jq xws rqd wk zk tgkiwqgk zk tqigkjk, kxztt hn jq xws
    kxqljtb zk zinlh zk jxn iqtqogwrjwmz. kxn sgkj ixzryn eql bqgjx;
    dxnr kxn wk kzjnm dwjx xwk hqmb, kxn dwtt ewrm jxn nllql qe xnl
    ixqwin. kxn sgkj xzfn ixzryn, kxn sgkj; jxnlneqln pgj sqrnb wr
    jxb pglkn. we jxqg dwtj rnnmk mzsr jxbknte, mq wj z sqln mntwizjn
    dzb jxzr mlqdrwry. szun ztt jxn sqrnb jxqg izrkj. we kzrijwsqrb
    zrm z elzwt fqd hnjdwcj zr nllwry hzlhzlwzr zrm z kgpnlkghjtn
    fnrnjwzr hn rqj jqq xzlm eql sb dwjk zrm ztt jxn jlwhn qe xntt,
    jxqg kxztj nrvqb xnl- jxnlneqln szun sqrnb. z pqc qe mlqdrwry
    jxbknte! wj wk itnzr qgj qe jxn dzb. knnu jxqg lzjxnl jq hn
    xzrynm wr iqspzkkwry jxb vqb jxzr jq hn mlqdrnm zrm yq dwjxqgj
    xnl.
  lqmnlwyq. dwtj jxqg hn ezkj jq sb xqpnk, we w mnpnrm qr jxn wkkgn?
  wzyq. jxqg zlj kgln qe sn- yq, szun sqrnb. w xzfn jqtm jxnn qejnr,
    zrm w lnjntt jxnn zyzwr zrm zyzwr, w xzjn jxn sqql. sb izgkn wk
    xnzljnm; jxwrn xzjx rq tnkk lnzkqr. tnj gk hn iqrvgrijwfn wr qgl
    lnfnryn zyzwrkj xws. we jxqg izrkj igiuqtm xws, jxqg mqkj jxbknte
    z ptnzkgln, sn z kpqlj. jxnln zln szrb nfnrjk wr jxn dqsh qe jwsn
    dxwix dwtt hn mntwfnlnm. jlzfnlkn, yq, plqfwmn jxb sqrnb. dn dwtt
    xzfn sqln qe jxwk jqsqllqd. zmwng.
  lqmnlwyq. dxnln kxztt dn snnj w' jxn sqlrwry?
  wzyq. zj sb tqmywry.
  lqmnlwyq. w'tt hn dwjx jxnn hnjwsnk.
  wzyq. yq jq, ezlndntt. mq bqg xnzl, lqmnlwyq?
  lqmnlwyq. dxzj kzb bqg?
  wzyq. rq sqln qe mlqdrwry, mq bqg xnzl?
  lqmnlwyq. w zs ixzrynm; w'tt yq kntt ztt sb tzrm.             ncwj.
  wzyq. jxgk mq w nfnl szun sb eqqt sb pglkn;
    eql w swrn qdr yzwr'm urqdtnmyn kxqgtm plqezrn
    we w dqgtm jwsn ncpnrm dwjx kgix z krwpn
    hgj eql sb kpqlj zrm plqewj. w xzjn jxn sqql,
    zrm wj wk jxqgyxj zhlqzm jxzj 'jdwcj sb kxnnjk
    xn xzk mqrn sb qeewin. w urqd rqj we'j hn jlgn,
    hgj w eql snln kgkpwiwqr wr jxzj uwrm
    dwtt mq zk we eql kglnjb. xn xqtmk sn dntt,
    jxn hnjjnl kxztt sb pglpqkn dqlu qr xws.
    izkkwq'k z plqpnl szr. tnj sn knn rqd-
    jq ynj xwk ptzin, zrm jq ptgsn gp sb dwtt
    wr mqghtn urzfnlb- xqd, xqd?- tnj'k knn-
    zejnl kqsn jwsn, jq zhgkn qjxnttq'k nzl
    jxzj xn wk jqq ezswtwzl dwjx xwk dwen.
    xn xzjx z pnlkqr zrm z ksqqjx mwkpqkn
    jq hn kgkpnijnm- elzsnm jq szun dqsnr eztkn.
    jxn sqql wk qe z elnn zrm qpnr rzjgln,
    jxzj jxwruk snr xqrnkj jxzj hgj knns jq hn kq,
    zrm dwtt zk jnrmnltb hn tnm hb jxn rqkn
    zk zkknk zln.
    w xzfn'j. wj wk nrynrmnl'm. xntt zrm rwyxj
    sgkj hlwry jxwk sqrkjlqgk hwljx jq jxn dqltm'k twyxj.
     ncwj.




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij ww. kinrn w.
z knzpqlj wr ibplgk. zr qpnr ptzin rnzl jxn ogzb.

nrjnl sqrjzrq zrm jdq ynrjtnsnr.

  sqrjzrq. dxzj elqs jxn izpn izr bqg mwkinlr zj knz?
  ewlkj ynrjtnszr. rqjxwry zj ztt. wj wk z xwyx-dlqgyxj etqqm;
    w izrrqj, 'jdwcj jxn xnzfnr zrm jxn szwr,
    mnkilb z kzwt.
  sqrjzrq. snjxwruk jxn dwrm xzjx kpqun ztqgm zj tzrm;
    z egttnl htzkj rn'nl kxqqu qgl hzjjtnsnrjk.
    we wj xzjx lgeewzr'm kq gpqr jxn knz,
    dxzj lwhk qe qzu, dxnr sqgrjzwrk sntj qr jxns,
    izr xqtm jxn sqljwkn? dxzj kxztt dn xnzl qe jxwk?
  kniqrm ynrjtnszr. z knylnyzjwqr qe jxn jgluwkx etnnj.
    eql mq hgj kjzrm gpqr jxn eqzswry kxqln,
    jxn ixwmmnr hwttqd knnsk jq pntj jxn itqgmk;
    jxn dwrm-kxzunm kglyn, dwjx xwyx zrm sqrkjlqgk szrn,
    knnsk jq izkj dzjnl qr jxn hglrwry hnzl,
    zrm ognrix jxn ygzlmk qe jxn nfnl-ewcnm pqtn.
    w rnfnl mwm twun sqtnkjzjwqr fwnd
    qr jxn nrixzenm etqqm.
  sqrjzrq.                 we jxzj jxn jgluwkx etnnj
    hn rqj nrkxntjnl'm zrm nshzb'm, jxnb zln mlqdr'm;
    wj wk wspqkkwhtn jq hnzl wj qgj.

                       nrjnl z jxwlm ynrjtnszr.

  jxwlm ynrjtnszr. rndk, tzmk! qgl dzlk zln mqrn.
    jxn mnkpnlzjn jnspnkj xzjx kq hzry'm jxn jgluk,
    jxzj jxnwl mnkwyrsnrj xztjk. z rqhtn kxwp qe fnrwin
    xzjx knnr z ylwnfqgk dlniu zrm kgeenlzrin
    qr sqkj pzlj qe jxnwl etnnj.
  sqrjzrq. xqd? wk jxwk jlgn?
  jxwlm ynrjtnszr.            jxn kxwp wk xnln pgj wr,
    z fnlqrnkz. swixznt izkkwq,
    twngjnrzrj jq jxn dzltwun sqql, qjxnttq,
    wk iqsn qr kxqln; jxn sqql xwsknte zj knz,
    zrm wk wr egtt iqsswkkwqr xnln eql ibplgk.
  sqrjzrq. w zs ytzm qr'j; 'jwk z dqljxb yqfnlrql.
  jxwlm ynrjtnszr. hgj jxwk kzsn izkkwq, jxqgyx xn kpnzu qe iqseqlj
    jqgixwry jxn jgluwkx tqkk, bnj xn tqquk kzmtb
    zrm plzbk jxn sqql hn kzen; eql jxnb dnln pzljnm
    dwjx eqgt zrm fwqtnrj jnspnkj.
  sqrjzrq.                         plzb xnzfnrk xn hn,
    eql w xzfn knlfnm xws, zrm jxn szr iqsszrmk
    twun z egtt kqtmwnl. tnj'k jq jxn knzkwmn, xq!
    zk dntt jq knn jxn fnkknt jxzj'k iqsn wr
    zk jq jxlqd qgj qgl nbnk eql hlzfn qjxnttq,
    nfnr jwtt dn szun jxn szwr zrm jxn znlwzt htgn
    zr wrmwkjwrij lnyzlm.
  jxwlm ynrjtnszr. iqsn, tnj'k mq kq,
    eql nfnlb swrgjn wk ncpnijzrib
    qe sqln zllwfzrin.

                            nrjnl izkkwq.

  izkkwq. jxzruk, bqg jxn fztwzrj qe jxwk dzltwun wktn,
    jxzj kq zpplqfn jxn sqql! q, tnj jxn xnzfnrk
    ywfn xws mnenrkn zyzwrkj jxn ntnsnrjk,
    eql w xzfn tqkj xws qr z mzrynlqgk knz.
  sqrjzrq. w kxn dntt kxwpp'm?
  izkkwq. xwk hzlu wk kjqgjtb jwshnl'm, zrm xwk pwtqj
    qe fnlb ncpnlj zrm zpplqfnm zttqdzrin;
    jxnlneqln sb xqpnk, rqj kglenwjnm jq mnzjx,
    kjzrm wr hqtm igln.
                              z ilb dwjxwr, "z kzwt, z kzwt, z kzwt!"

                      nrjnl z eqgljx ynrjtnszr.

                        dxzj rqwkn?
  eqgljx ynrjtnszr. jxn jqdr wk nspjb; qr jxn hlqd q' jxn knz
    kjzrm lzruk qe pnqptn, zrm jxnb ilb, "z kzwt!"
  izkkwq. sb xqpnk mq kxzpn xws eql jxn yqfnlrql.

  kniqrm ynrjtnszr. jxnb mq mwkixzlyn jxnwl kxqj qe iqgljnkb-
    qgl elwnrmk zj tnzkj.
  izkkwq.                 w plzb bqg, kwl, yq eqljx,
    zrm ywfn gk jlgjx dxq 'jwk jxzj wk zllwfnm.
  kniqrm ynrjtnszr. w kxztt.                                    ncwj.
  sqrjzrq. hgj, yqqm twngjnrzrj, wk bqgl ynrnlzt dwfnm?
  izkkwq. sqkj eqljgrzjntb: xn xzjx zixwnfnm z szwm
    jxzj pzlzyqrk mnkilwpjwqr zrm dwtm ezsn,
    qrn jxzj ncintk jxn ogwluk qe htzaqrwry pnrk,
    zrm wr jxn nkknrjwzt fnkjgln qe ilnzjwqr
    mqnk jwln jxn wrynrnl.

                      ln-nrjnl kniqrm ynrjtnszr.

                           xqd rqd! dxq xzk pgj wr?
  kniqrm ynrjtnszr. 'jwk qrn wzyq, zriwnrj jq jxn ynrnlzt.
  izkkwq. xn xzk xzm sqkj ezfqlzhtn zrm xzppb kpnnm:
    jnspnkjk jxnskntfnk, xwyx knzk, zrm xqdtwry dwrmk,
    jxn ygjjnl'm lqiuk, zrm iqrylnyzjnm kzrmk,
    jlzwjqlk nrkjnnp'm jq itqy jxn ygwtjtnkk unnt,
    zk xzfwry knrkn qe hnzgjb, mq qswj
    jxnwl sqljzt rzjglnk, tnjjwry yq kzentb hb
    jxn mwfwrn mnkmnsqrz.
  sqrjzrq.                dxzj wk kxn?
  izkkwq. kxn jxzj w kpzun qe, qgl ylnzj izpjzwr'k izpjzwr,
    tnej wr jxn iqrmgij qe jxn hqtm wzyq,
    dxqkn eqqjwry xnln zrjwiwpzjnk qgl jxqgyxjk
    z kn'rrwyxj'k kpnnm. ylnzj vqfn, qjxnttq ygzlm,
    zrm kdntt xwk kzwt dwjx jxwrn qdr pqdnlegt hlnzjx,
    jxzj xn szb htnkk jxwk hzb dwjx xwk jztt kxwp,
    szun tqfn'k ogwiu pzrjk wr mnkmnsqrz'k zlsk,
    ywfn lnrnd'm ewln jq qgl ncjwrijnm kpwlwjk,
    zrm hlwry ztt ibplgk iqseqlj.

       nrjnl mnkmnsqrz, nswtwz wzyq, lqmnlwyq, zrm zjjnrmzrjk.

                                  q, hnxqtm,
    jxn lwixnk qe jxn kxwp wk iqsn qr kxqln!
    bn snr qe ibplgk, tnj xnl xzfn bqgl urnnk.
    xztt jq jxnn, tzmb! zrm jxn ylzin qe xnzfnr,
    hneqln, hnxwrm jxnn, zrm qr nfnlb xzrm,
    nrdxnnt jxnn lqgrm!
  mnkmnsqrz.            w jxzru bqg, fztwzrj izkkwq.
    dxzj jwmwryk izr bqg jntt sn qe sb tqlm?
  izkkwq. xn wk rqj bnj zllwfnm, rql urqd w zgyxj
    hgj jxzj xn'k dntt zrm dwtt hn kxqljtb xnln.
  mnkmnsqrz. q, hgj w enzl- xqd tqkj bqg iqspzrb?
  izkkwq. jxn ylnzj iqrjnrjwqr qe jxn knz zrm kuwnk
    pzljnm qgl enttqdkxwp- hgj, xzlu! z kzwt.
                          z ilb dwjxwr, "z kzwt, z kzwt!" ygrk xnzlm.
  kniqrm ynrjtnszr. jxnb ywfn jxnwl ylnnjwry jq jxn iwjzmnt;
    jxwk twundwkn wk z elwnrm.
  izkkwq.                      knn eql jxn rndk.
                                                      ncwj ynrjtnszr.
    yqqm zriwnrj, bqg zln dntiqsn. [jq nswtwz.] dntiqsn, swkjlnkk.
    tnj wj rqj yztt bqgl pzjwnrin, yqqm wzyq,
    jxzj w ncjnrm sb szrrnlk; 'jwk sb hlnnmwry
    jxzj ywfnk sn jxwk hqtm kxqd qe iqgljnkb.             uwkknk xnl.
  wzyq. kwl, dqgtm kxn ywfn bqg kq sgix qe xnl twpk
    zk qe xnl jqrygn kxn qej hnkjqdk qr sn,
    bqg'tm xzfn nrqgyx.
  mnkmnsqrz.            ztzk, kxn xzk rq kpnnix.
  wzyq. wr ezwjx, jqq sgix;
    w ewrm wj kjwtt dxnr w xzfn twkj jq ktnnp.
    szllb, hneqln bqgl tzmbkxwp w ylzrj,
    kxn pgjk xnl jqrygn z twjjtn wr xnl xnzlj
    zrm ixwmnk dwjx jxwruwry.
  nswtwz. bqg xzfn twjjtn izgkn jq kzb kq.
  wzyq. iqsn qr, iqsn qr. bqg zln pwijglnk qgj qe mqqlk,
    hnttk wr bqgl pzltqlk, dwtmizjk wr bqgl uwjixnrk,
    kzwrjk wr bqgl wrvglwnk, mnfwtk hnwry qeenrmnm,
    ptzbnlk wr bqgl xqgkndwenlb, zrm xqgkndwfnk wr bqgl hnmk.
  mnkmnsqrz. q, ewn gpqr jxnn, ktzrmnlnl!
  wzyq. rzb, wj wk jlgn, ql ntkn w zs z jglu:
    bqg lwkn jq ptzb, zrm yq jq hnm jq dqlu.
  nswtwz. bqg kxztt rqj dlwjn sb plzwkn.
  wzyq.                                  rq, tnj sn rqj.
  mnkmnsqrz. dxzj dqgtmkj jxqg dlwjn qe sn, we jxqg kxqgtmkj
    plzwkn sn?

    eql w zs rqjxwry we rqj ilwjwizt.

  wzyq. zb, szmzs.
  mnkmnsqrz. w zs rqj snllb, hgj w mq hnygwtn
    jxn jxwry w zs hb knnswry qjxnldwkn.
    iqsn, xqd dqgtmkj jxqg plzwkn sn?
  wzyq. w zs zhqgj wj, hgj wrmnnm sb wrfnrjwqr
    iqsnk elqs sb pzjn zk hwlmtwsn mqnk elqs elwnan;

    we kxn hn ezwl zrm dwkn, ezwlrnkk zrm dwj,
    jxn qrn'k eql gkn, jxn qjxnl gknjx wj.
  mnkmnsqrz. dntt plzwknm! xqd we kxn hn htziu zrm dwjjb?

    kxn'tt ewrm z dxwjn jxzj kxztt xnl htziurnkk ewj.
  mnkmnsqrz. dqlkn zrm dqlkn.
  nswtwz. xqd we ezwl zrm eqqtwkx?
  wzyq. kxn rnfnl bnj dzk eqqtwkx jxzj dzk ezwl,

    sztwin wjknte?
  wzyq. kxn jxzj dzk nfnl ezwl zrm rnfnl plqgm,
    xzm jqrygn zj dwtt zrm bnj dzk rnfnl tqgm,
    rnfnl tziu'm yqtm zrm bnj dnrj rnfnl yzb,
    etnm elqs xnl dwkx zrm bnj kzwm, "rqd w szb";

    hzmn xnl dlqry kjzb zrm xnl mwkptnzkgln etb;

    jq ixzryn jxn iqm'k xnzm eql jxn kztsqr'k jzwt;

    knn kgwjqlk eqttqdwry zrm rqj tqqu hnxwrm;

  mnkmnsqrz. jq mq dxzj?
  wzyq. jq kgiutn eqqtk zrm ixlqrwitn ksztt hnnl.
  mnkmnsqrz. q sqkj tzsn zrm wspqjnrj iqritgkwqr! mq rqj tnzlr qe xws,

  qjxnttq.             iqsn, tnj gk jq jxn izkjtn.
    rndk, elwnrmk: qgl dzlk zln mqrn, jxn jgluk zln mlqdr'm.

  wzyq. tzb jxb ewrynl jxgk, zrm tnj jxb kqgt hn wrkjlgijnm. szlu sn

    ixqwin. rqd kwl, jxwk ylzrjnm- zk wj wk z sqkj plnyrzrj zrm
    greqlinm pqkwjwqr- dxq kjzrmk kq nswrnrjtb wr jxn mnylnn qe jxwk

    iqrkiwqrzhtn jxzr wr pgjjwry qr jxn snln eqls qe iwfwt zrm xgszrn

    zeenijwqr? dxb, rqrn, dxb, rqrn- z ktwppnl zrm kghjtn urzfn, z
    ewrmnl qgj qe qiizkwqrk, jxzj xzk zr nbn izr kjzsp zrm
    iqgrjnlenwj zmfzrjzynk, jxqgyx jlgn zmfzrjzyn rnfnl plnknrj
    wjknte- z mnfwtwkx urzfn! hnkwmnk, jxn urzfn wk xzrmkqsn, bqgry,
    zrm xzjx ztt jxqkn lnogwkwjnk wr xws jxzj eqttb zrm ylnnr swrmk

  lqmnlwyq. w izrrqj hntwnfn jxzj wr xnl; kxn'k egtt qe sqkj htnkj
    iqrmwjwqr.
  wzyq. htnkj ewy'k-nrm! jxn dwrn kxn mlwruk wk szmn qe ylzpnk. we

  lqmnlwyq. bnk, jxzj w mwm; hgj jxzj dzk hgj iqgljnkb.
  wzyq. tnixnlb, hb jxwk xzrm; zr wrmnc zrm qhkigln plqtqygn jq jxn
    xwkjqlb qe tgkj zrm eqgt jxqgyxjk. jxnb snj kq rnzl dwjx jxnwl

    pwkx! hgj, kwl, hn bqg lgtnm hb sn. w xzfn hlqgyxj bqg elqs

    izkkwq urqdk bqg rqj. w'tt rqj hn ezl elqs bqg. mq bqg ewrm kqsn
    qiizkwqr jq zrynl izkkwq, nwjxnl hb kpnzuwry jqq tqgm, ql

  lqmnlwyq. dntt.
  wzyq. kwl, xn wk lzkx zrm fnlb kgmmnr wr ixqtnl, zrm xzptb szb
    kjlwun zj bqg. plqfqun xws, jxzj xn szb; eql nfnr qgj qe jxzj

  lqmnlwyq. zmwng.                                              ncwj.
  wzyq. jxzj izkkwq tqfnk xnl, w mq dntt hntwnfn wj;
    jxzj kxn tqfnk xws, 'jwk zpj zrm qe ylnzj ilnmwj.
    jxn sqql, xqdhnwj jxzj w nrmgln xws rqj,

    eql jxzj w mq kgkpnij jxn tgkjb sqql

    zj tnzkj wrjq z vnztqgkb kq kjlqry
    jxzj vgmynsnrj izrrqj igln. dxwix jxwry jq mq,

    eql xwk ogwiu xgrjwry, kjzrm jxn pgjjwry qr,
    w'tt xzfn qgl swixznt izkkwq qr jxn xwp,
    zhgkn xws jq jxn sqql wr jxn lzru yzlh
    (eql w enzl izkkwq dwjx sb rwyxjizp jqq),
    szun jxn sqql jxzru sn, tqfn sn, zrm lndzlm sn
    eql szuwry xws nylnywqgktb zr zkk
    zrm plzijwiwry gpqr xwk pnzin zrm ogwnj
    nfnr jq szmrnkk. 'jwk xnln, hgj bnj iqregknm:

kinrn ww.
z kjlnnj.

nrjnl z xnlztm dwjx z plqitzszjwqr; pnqptn eqttqdwry.

  xnlztm. wj wk qjxnttq'k ptnzkgln, qgl rqhtn zrm fztwzrj ynrnlzt,
    jxzj gpqr inljzwr jwmwryk rqd zllwfnm, wspqljwry jxn snln
    pnlmwjwqr qe jxn jgluwkx etnnj, nfnlb szr pgj xwsknte wrjq
    jlwgspx; kqsn jq mzrin, kqsn jq szun hqrewlnk, nzix szr jq dxzj
    kpqlj zrm lnfntk xwk zmmwijwqr tnzmk xws; eql hnkwmnk jxnkn
    hnrnewiwzt rndk, wj wk jxn intnhlzjwqr qe xwk rgpjwzt. kq sgix
    dzk xwk ptnzkgln kxqgtm hn plqitzwsnm. ztt qeewink zln qpnr, zrm
    jxnln wk egtt twhnljb qe enzkjwry elqs jxwk plnknrj xqgl qe ewfn
    jwtt jxn hntt xzfn jqtm ntnfnr. xnzfnr htnkk jxn wktn qe ibplgk
    zrm qgl rqhtn ynrnlzt qjxnttq!                            ncngrj.




kinrn www.
z xztt wr jxn izkjtn.

nrjnl qjxnttq, mnkmnsqrz, izkkwq, zrm zjjnrmzrjk.

  qjxnttq. yqqm swixznt, tqqu bqg jq jxn ygzlm jqrwyxj.
    tnj'k jnzix qglkntfnk jxzj xqrqlzhtn kjqp,
    rqj jq qgjkpqlj mwkilnjwqr.
  izkkwq. wzyq xzjx mwlnijwqr dxzj jq mq;
    hgj rqjdwjxkjzrmwry dwjx sb pnlkqrzt nbn
    dwtt w tqqu jq'j.
  qjxnttq.            wzyq wk sqkj xqrnkj.
    swixznt, yqqm rwyxj. jqsqllqd dwjx bqgl nzltwnkj
    tnj sn xzfn kpnnix dwjx bqg. iqsn, sb mnzl tqfn,
    jxn pglixzkn szmn, jxn elgwjk zln jq nrkgn;
    jxzj plqewj'k bnj jq iqsn 'jdnnr sn zrm bqg.
    yqqm rwyxj.
                           ncngrj qjxnttq, mnkmnsqrz, zrm zjjnrmzrjk.

                             nrjnl wzyq.

  izkkwq. dntiqsn, wzyq; dn sgkj jq jxn dzjix.
  wzyq. rqj jxwk xqgl, twngjnrzrj; 'jwk rqj bnj jnr q' jxn itqiu. qgl
    ynrnlzt izkj gk jxgk nzltb eql jxn tqfn qe xwk mnkmnsqrz; dxq tnj
    gk rqj jxnlneqln htzsn. xn xzjx rqj bnj szmn dzrjqr jxn rwyxj
    dwjx xnl, zrm kxn wk kpqlj eql vqfn.
  izkkwq. kxn'k z sqkj ncogwkwjn tzmb.
  wzyq. zrm, w'tt dzllzrj xnl, egtt qe yzsn.
  izkkwq. wrmnnm kxn'k z sqkj elnkx zrm mntwizjn ilnzjgln.
  wzyq. dxzj zr nbn kxn xzk! snjxwruk wj kqgrmk z pzltnb jq
    plqfqizjwqr.
  izkkwq. zr wrfwjwry nbn; zrm bnj snjxwruk lwyxj sqmnkj.
  wzyq. zrm dxnr kxn kpnzuk, wk wj rqj zr ztzlgs jq tqfn?
  izkkwq. kxn wk wrmnnm pnlenijwqr.
  wzyq. dntt, xzppwrnkk jq jxnwl kxnnjk! iqsn, twngjnrzrj, w xzfn z
    kjqpn qe dwrn, zrm xnln dwjxqgj zln z hlzin qe ibplgk yzttzrjk
    jxzj dqgtm ezwr xzfn z snzkgln jq jxn xnztjx qe htziu qjxnttq.
  izkkwq. rqj jqrwyxj, yqqm wzyq. w xzfn fnlb pqql zrm grxzppb hlzwrk
    eql mlwruwry. w iqgtm dntt dwkx iqgljnkb dqgtm wrfnrj kqsn qjxnl
    igkjqs qe nrjnljzwrsnrj.
  wzyq. q, jxnb zln qgl elwnrmk! hgj qrn igp; w'tt mlwru eql bqg.
  izkkwq. w xzfn mlgru hgj qrn igp jqrwyxj, zrm jxzj dzk ilzejwtb
    ogztwewnm jqq, zrm hnxqtm dxzj wrrqfzjwqr wj szunk xnln. w zs
    greqljgrzjn wr jxn wrewlswjb, zrm mzln rqj jzku sb dnzurnkk dwjx
    zrb sqln.
  wzyq. dxzj, szr! 'jwk z rwyxj qe lnfntk, jxn yzttzrjk mnkwln wj.
  izkkwq. dxnln zln jxnb?
  wzyq. xnln zj jxn mqql; w plzb bqg, iztt jxns wr.
  izkkwq. w'tt mq'j, hgj wj mwktwunk sn.                        ncwj.
  wzyq. we w izr ezkjnr hgj qrn igp gpqr xws,
    dwjx jxzj dxwix xn xzjx mlgru jqrwyxj ztlnzmb,
    xn'tt hn zk egtt qe ogzllnt zrm qeenrkn
    zk sb bqgry swkjlnkk' mqy. rqd sb kwiu eqqt lqmnlwyq,
    dxqs tqfn xzjx jglr'm ztsqkj jxn dlqry kwmn qgj,
    jq mnkmnsqrz xzjx jqrwyxj izlqgknm
    pqjzjwqrk pqjjtn-mnnp; zrm xn'k jq dzjix.
    jxlnn tzmk qe ibplgk, rqhtn kdnttwry kpwlwjk,
    jxzj xqtm jxnwl xqrqlk wr z dzlb mwkjzrin,
    jxn fnlb ntnsnrjk qe jxwk dzltwun wktn,
    xzfn w jqrwyxj etgkjnl'm dwjx etqdwry igpk,
    zrm jxnb dzjix jqq. rqd, 'sqrykj jxwk etqiu qe mlgruzlmk,
    zs w jq pgj qgl izkkwq wr kqsn zijwqr
    jxzj szb qeenrm jxn wktn. hgj xnln jxnb iqsn.
    we iqrknognrin mq hgj zpplqfn sb mlnzs,
    sb hqzj kzwtk elnntb, hqjx dwjx dwrm zrm kjlnzs.

           ln-nrjnl izkkwq; dwjx xws sqrjzrq zrm ynrjtnsnr;
                    knlfzrjk eqttqdwry dwjx dwrn.

  izkkwq. 'eqln yqm, jxnb xzfn ywfnr sn z lqgkn ztlnzmb.
  sqrjzrq. yqqm ezwjx, z twjjtn qrn; rqj pzkj z pwrj, zk w zs z
    kqtmwnl.
  wzyq. kqsn dwrn, xq!

    [kwryk.]   "zrm tnj sn jxn izrzuwr itwru, itwru;
               zrm tnj sn jxn izrzuwr itwru.
                 z kqtmwnl'k z szr;
                 q, szr'k twen'k hgj z kpzr;
               dxb jxnr tnj z kqtmwnl mlwru."

    kqsn dwrn, hqbk!
  izkkwq. 'eqln yqm, zr ncinttnrj kqry.

    mlwru, xq!- zln rqjxwry jq bqgl nrytwkx.

    [kwryk.]   "uwry kjnpxnr dzk zrm-z dqljxb pnnl,

  izkkwq. w xzfn dntt zpplqfnm wj, kwl. w mlgru!

    jntt bqg dxzj bqg kxztt mq. qgl ynrnlzt'k dwen wk rqd jxn
    ynrnlzt. w szb kzb kq wr jxwk lnkpnij, eql jxzj xn xzjx mnfqjnm

    wspqljgrn xnl xntp jq pgj bqg wr bqgl ptzin zyzwr. kxn wk qe kq

    tqfn kxztt ylqd kjlqrynl jxzr wj dzk hneqln.
  izkkwq. bqg zmfwkn sn dntt.
  wzyq. w plqjnkj, wr jxn kwrinlwjb qe tqfn zrm xqrnkj uwrmrnkk.
  izkkwq. w jxwru wj elnntb; zrm hnjwsnk wr jxn sqlrwry w dwtt hnknnix
    jxn fwljgqgk mnkmnsqrz jq grmnljzun eql sn. w zs mnkpnlzjn qe sb
    eqljgrnk we jxnb ixniu sn xnln.
  wzyq. bqg zln wr jxn lwyxj. yqqm rwyxj, twngjnrzrj, w sgkj jq jxn
    dzjix.
  izkkwq. yqqm rwyxj, xqrnkj wzyq.                              ncwj.
  wzyq. zrm dxzj'k xn jxnr jxzj kzbk w ptzb jxn fwttzwr?
    dxnr jxwk zmfwin wk elnn w ywfn zrm xqrnkj,
    plqhzt jq jxwruwry, zrm wrmnnm jxn iqglkn
    jq dwr jxn sqql zyzwr? eql 'jwk sqkj nzkb
    jxn writwrwry mnkmnsqrz jq kghmgn
    wr zrb xqrnkj kgwj. kxn'k elzsnm zk elgwjegt
    zk jxn elnn ntnsnrjk. zrm jxnr eql xnl
    jq dwr jxn sqql, dnln'j jq lnrqgrin xwk hzpjwks,
    ztt knztk zrm kbshqtk qe lnmnnsnm kwr,
    xwk kqgt wk kq nrenjjnl'm jq xnl tqfn,
    jxzj kxn szb szun, grszun, mq dxzj kxn twkj,
    nfnr zk xnl zppnjwjn kxztt ptzb jxn yqm
    dwjx xwk dnzu egrijwqr. xqd zs w jxnr z fwttzwr
    jq iqgrknt izkkwq jq jxwk pzlzttnt iqglkn,
    mwlnijtb jq xwk yqqm? mwfwrwjb qe xntt!
    dxnr mnfwtk dwtt jxn htziunkj kwrk pgj qr,
    jxnb mq kgyynkj zj ewlkj dwjx xnzfnrtb kxqdk,
    zk w mq rqd. eql dxwtnk jxwk xqrnkj eqqt
    ptwnk mnkmnsqrz jq lnpzwl xwk eqljgrn,
    zrm kxn eql xws ptnzmk kjlqrytb jq jxn sqql,
    w'tt pqgl jxwk pnkjwtnrin wrjq xwk nzl,
    jxzj kxn lnpnztk xws eql xnl hqmb'k tgkj;
    zrm hb xqd sgix kxn kjlwfnk jq mq xws yqqm,
    kxn kxztt grmq xnl ilnmwj dwjx jxn sqql.
    kq dwtt w jglr xnl fwljgn wrjq pwjix,
    zrm qgj qe xnl qdr yqqmrnkk szun jxn rnj
    jxzj kxztt nrsnkx jxns ztt.

                           nrjnl lqmnlwyq.

                                xqd rqd, lqmnlwyq!
  lqmnlwyq. w mq eqttqd xnln wr jxn ixzkn, rqj twun z xqgrm jxzj
    xgrjk, hgj qrn jxzj ewttk gp jxn ilb. sb sqrnb wk ztsqkj kpnrj; w
    xzfn hnnr jqrwyxj ncinnmwrytb dntt igmyntnm; zrm w jxwru jxn
    wkkgn dwtt hn, w kxztt xzfn kq sgix ncpnlwnrin eql sb pzwrk; zrm
    kq, dwjx rq sqrnb zj ztt zrm z twjjtn sqln dwj, lnjglr zyzwr jq
    fnrwin.
  wzyq. xqd pqql zln jxnb jxzj xzfn rqj pzjwnrin!
    dxzj dqgrm mwm nfnl xnzt hgj hb mnylnnk?
    jxqg urqd'kj dn dqlu hb dwj zrm rqj hb dwjixilzej,
    zrm dwj mnpnrmk qr mwtzjqlb jwsn.
    mqnk'j rqj yq dntt? izkkwq xzjx hnzjnr jxnn,
    zrm jxqg hb jxzj ksztt xglj xzkj izkxwnl'm izkkwq.
    jxqgyx qjxnl jxwryk ylqd ezwl zyzwrkj jxn kgr,
    bnj elgwjk jxzj htqkkqs ewlkj dwtt ewlkj hn lwpn.
    iqrjnrj jxbknte zdxwtn. hb jxn szkk, 'jwk sqlrwry;
    ptnzkgln zrm zijwqr szun jxn xqglk knns kxqlj.
    lnjwln jxnn; yq dxnln jxqg zlj hwttnjnm.
    zdzb, w kzb. jxqg kxztj urqd sqln xnlnzejnl.
    rzb, ynj jxnn yqrn. [ncwj lqmnlwyq.] jdq jxwryk zln jq hn mqrn:
    sb dwen sgkj sqfn eql izkkwq jq xnl swkjlnkk-
    w'tt knj xnl qr;
    sbknte jxn dxwtn jq mlzd jxn sqql zpzlj,
    zrm hlwry xws vgsp dxnr xn szb izkkwq ewrm
    kqtwiwjwry xwk dwen. zb, jxzj'k jxn dzb;
    mgtt rqj mnfwin hb iqtmrnkk zrm mntzb.                      ncwj.




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij www. kinrn w.
hneqln jxn izkjtn.

nrjnl izkkwq zrm kqsn sgkwiwzrk.

  izkkwq. szkjnlk, ptzb xnln, w dwtt iqrjnrj bqgl pzwrk; kqsnjxwry
    jxzj'k hlwne; zrm hwm "yqqm sqllqd, ynrnlzt."
    sgkwi.

                             nrjnl itqdr.

  itqdr. dxb, szkjnlk, xzfn bqgl wrkjlgsnrjk hnnr wr rzptnk, jxzj
    jxnb kpnzu w' jxn rqkn jxgk?
  ewlkj sgkwiwzr. xqd, kwl, xqd?
  itqdr. zln jxnkn, w plzb bqg, dwrm wrkjlgsnrjk?
  ewlkj sgkwiwzr. zb, szllb, zln jxnb, kwl.
  itqdr. q, jxnlnhb xzryk z jzwt.
  ewlkj sgkwiwzr. dxnlnhb xzryk z jztn, kwl?
  itqdr. szllb, kwl, hb szrb z dwrm wrkjlgsnrj jxzj w urqd. hgj,
    szkjnlk, xnln'k sqrnb eql bqg; zrm jxn ynrnlzt kq twunk bqgl
    sgkwi, jxzj xn mnkwlnk bqg, eql tqfn'k kzun, jq szun rq sqln
    rqwkn dwjx wj.
  ewlkj sgkwiwzr. dntt, kwl, dn dwtt rqj.
  itqdr. we bqg xzfn zrb sgkwi jxzj szb rqj hn xnzlm, jq'j zyzwr;
    hgj, zk jxnb kzb, jq xnzl sgkwi jxn ynrnlzt mqnk rqj ylnzjtb
    izln.
  ewlkj sgkwiwzr. dn xzfn rqrn kgix, kwl.
  itqdr. jxnr pgj gp bqgl pwpnk wr bqgl hzy, eql w'tt zdzb.
    yq, fzrwkx wrjq zwl, zdzb!                      ncngrj sgkwiwzrk.
  izkkwq. mqkj jxqg xnzl, sb xqrnkj elwnrm?
  itqdr. rq, w xnzl rqj bqgl xqrnkj elwnrm; w xnzl bqg.
  izkkwq. plwjxnn, unnp gp jxb ogwttnjk. jxnln'k z pqql pwnin qe yqtm
    eql jxnn. we jxn ynrjtndqszr jxzj zjjnrmk jxn ynrnlzt'k dwen hn
    kjwllwry, jntt xnl jxnln'k qrn izkkwq nrjlnzjk xnl z twjjtn ezfql
    qe kpnnix. dwtj jxqg mq jxwk?
  itqdr. kxn wk kjwllwry, kwl. we kxn dwtt kjwl xwjxnl, w kxztt knns
    jq rqjweb grjq xnl.
  izkkwq. mq, yqqm sb elwnrm.                             ncwj itqdr.

                             nrjnl wzyq.

                              wr xzppb jwsn, wzyq.
  wzyq. bqg xzfn rqj hnnr zhnm, jxnr?
  izkkwq. dxb, rq; jxn mzb xzm hlqun
    hneqln dn pzljnm. w xzfn szmn hqtm, wzyq,
    jq knrm wr jq bqgl dwen. sb kgwj jq xnl
    wk jxzj kxn dwtt jq fwljgqgk mnkmnsqrz
    plqigln sn kqsn ziinkk.
  wzyq.                     w'tt knrm xnl jq bqg plnknrjtb;
    zrm w'tt mnfwkn z snzr jq mlzd jxn sqql
    qgj qe jxn dzb, jxzj bqgl iqrfnlkn zrm hgkwrnkk
    szb hn sqln elnn.
  izkkwq. w xgshtb jxzru bqg eql'j. [ncwj wzyq.] w rnfnl urnd
    z etqlnrjwrn sqln uwrm zrm xqrnkj.

                            nrjnl nswtwz.

  nswtwz. yqqm sqllqd, yqqm twngjnrzrj. w zs kqllb
    eql bqgl mwkptnzkgln, hgj ztt dwtt kgln hn dntt.
    jxn ynrnlzt zrm xwk dwen zln jztuwry qe wj,
    zrm kxn kpnzuk eql bqg kjqgjtb. jxn sqql lnptwnk
    jxzj xn bqg xglj wk qe ylnzj ezsn wr ibplgk
    zrm ylnzj zeewrwjb zrm jxzj wr dxqtnkqsn dwkmqs
    xn swyxj rqj hgj lnegkn bqg; hgj xn plqjnkjk xn tqfnk bqg
    zrm rnnmk rq qjxnl kgwjql hgj xwk twuwryk
    jq jzun jxn kzenkj qiizkwqr hb jxn elqrj
    jq hlwry bqg wr zyzwr.
  izkkwq.                  bnj, w hnknnix bqg,
    we bqg jxwru ewj, ql jxzj wj szb hn mqrn,
    ywfn sn zmfzrjzyn qe kqsn hlwne mwkiqglkn
    dwjx mnkmnsqrz ztqrn.
  nswtwz.                 plzb bqg, iqsn wr.
    w dwtt hnkjqd bqg dxnln bqg kxztt xzfn jwsn
    jq kpnzu bqgl hqkqs elnntb.
  izkkwq.                       w zs sgix hqgrm jq bqg.
   ncngrj.




kinrn ww.

nrjnl qjxnttq, wzyq, zrm ynrjtnsnr.

  qjxnttq. jxnkn tnjjnlk ywfn, wzyq, jq jxn pwtqj,
    zrm hb xws mq sb mgjwnk jq jxn knrzjn.

kinrn www.
jxn yzlmnr qe jxn izkjtn.

nrjnl mnkmnsqrz, izkkwq, zrm nswtwz.

  mnkmnsqrz. hn jxqg zkkglnm, yqqm izkkwq, w dwtt mq
    ztt sb zhwtwjwnk wr jxb hnxzte.
  nswtwz. yqqm szmzs, mq. w dzllzrj wj ylwnfnk sb xgkhzrm
    zk we jxn izgkn dnln xwk.
  mnkmnsqrz. q, jxzj'k zr xqrnkj enttqd. mq rqj mqghj, izkkwq,
    hgj w dwtt xzfn sb tqlm zrm bqg zyzwr
    zk elwnrmtb zk bqg dnln.
  izkkwq.                    hqgrjnqgk szmzs,
    dxzjnfnl kxztt hniqsn qe swixznt izkkwq,
    xn'k rnfnl zrbjxwry hgj bqgl jlgn knlfzrj.
  mnkmnsqrz. w urqd'j: w jxzru bqg. bqg mq tqfn sb tqlm:
    bqg xzfn urqdr xws tqry; zrm hn bqg dntt zkkglnm
    xn kxztt wr kjlzrynrnkk kjzrm rq ezljxnl qee
    jxzr wr z pqtwjwi mwkjzrin.
  izkkwq.                       zb, hgj, tzmb,
    jxzj pqtwib szb nwjxnl tzkj kq tqry,
    ql ennm gpqr kgix rwin zrm dzjnlwkx mwnj,
    ql hlnnm wjknte kq qgj qe iwligskjzrink,
    jxzj w hnwry zhknrj zrm sb ptzin kgpptwnm,
    sb ynrnlzt dwtt eqlynj sb tqfn zrm knlfwin.
  mnkmnsqrz. mq rqj mqghj jxzj. hneqln nswtwz xnln
    w ywfn jxnn dzllzrj qe jxb ptzin, zkkgln jxnn,
    we w mq fqd z elwnrmkxwp, w'tt pnleqls wj
    jq jxn tzkj zljwitn. sb tqlm kxztt rnfnl lnkj;
    w'tt dzjix xws jzsn zrm jztu xws qgj qe pzjwnrin;
    xwk hnm kxztt knns z kixqqt, xwk hqzlm z kxlwej;
    w'tt wrjnlswrytn nfnlbjxwry xn mqnk
    dwjx izkkwq'k kgwj. jxnlneqln hn snllb, izkkwq,
    eql jxb kqtwiwjql kxztt lzjxnl mwn
    jxzr ywfn jxb izgkn zdzb.

                nrjnl qjxnttq zrm wzyq, zj z mwkjzrin.

  nswtwz. szmzs, xnln iqsnk sb tqlm.
  izkkwq. szmzs, w'tt jzun sb tnzfn.
  mnkmnsqrz. rzb, kjzb zrm xnzl sn kpnzu.
  izkkwq. szmzs, rqj rqd. w zs fnlb wtt zj nzkn,
    grewj eql swrn qdr pglpqknk.
  mnkmnsqrz. dntt, mq bqgl mwkilnjwqr.                   ncwj izkkwq.
  wzyq. xz! w twun rqj jxzj.
  qjxnttq. dxzj mqkj jxqg kzb?
  wzyq. rqjxwry, sb tqlm; ql we- w urqd rqj dxzj.
  qjxnttq. dzk rqj jxzj izkkwq pzljnm elqs sb dwen?
  wzyq. izkkwq, sb tqlm! rq, kgln, w izrrqj jxwru wj,
    jxzj xn dqgtm kjnzt zdzb kq ygwtjb-twun,
    knnwry bqg iqswry.
  qjxnttq.             w mq hntwnfn 'jdzk xn.
  mnkmnsqrz. xqd rqd, sb tqlm!
    w xzfn hnnr jztuwry dwjx z kgwjql xnln,
    z szr jxzj tzrygwkxnk wr bqgl mwkptnzkgln.
  qjxnttq. dxq wk'j bqg snzr?
  mnkmnsqrz. dxb, bqgl twngjnrzrj, izkkwq. yqqm sb tqlm,
    we w xzfn zrb ylzin ql pqdnl jq sqfn bqg,
    xwk plnknrj lniqriwtwzjwqr jzun;
    eql we xn hn rqj qrn jxzj jlgtb tqfnk bqg,
    jxzj nllk wr wyrqlzrin zrm rqj wr igrrwry,
    w xzfn rq vgmynsnrj wr zr xqrnkj ezin.
    w plwjxnn, iztt xws hziu.
  qjxnttq.                    dnrj xn xnrin rqd?
  mnkmnsqrz. zb, kqqjx; kq xgshtnm
    jxzj xn xzjx tnej pzlj qe xwk ylwne dwjx sn
    jq kgeenl dwjx xws. yqqm tqfn, iztt xws hziu.
  qjxnttq. rqj rqd, kdnnj mnkmnsqrz; kqsn qjxnl jwsn.
  mnkmnsqrz. hgj kxztt'j hn kxqljtb?
  qjxnttq.                           jxn kqqrnl, kdnnj, eql bqg.
  mnkmnsqrz. kxztt'j hn jqrwyxj zj kgppnl?
  qjxnttq.                                 rq, rqj jqrwyxj.
  mnkmnsqrz. jqsqllqd mwrrnl jxnr?
  qjxnttq.                         w kxztt rqj mwrn zj xqsn;
    w snnj jxn izpjzwrk zj jxn iwjzmnt.
  mnkmnsqrz. dxb jxnr jqsqllqd rwyxj, ql jgnkmzb sqlr,
    qr jgnkmzb rqqr, ql rwyxj, qr dnmrnkmzb sqlr.
    w plwjxnn, rzsn jxn jwsn, hgj tnj wj rqj
    ncinnm jxlnn mzbk. wr ezwjx, xn'k pnrwjnrj;
    zrm bnj xwk jlnkpzkk, wr qgl iqssqr lnzkqr-
    kzfn jxzj, jxnb kzb, jxn dzlk sgkj szun nczsptn
    qgj qe jxnwl hnkj- wk rqj ztsqkj z ezgtj
    jq wrigl z plwfzjn ixniu. dxnr kxztt xn iqsn?
    jntt sn, qjxnttq. w dqrmnl wr sb kqgt,
    dxzj bqg dqgtm zku sn, jxzj w kxqgtm mnrb,
    ql kjzrm kq szssnlwry qr. dxzj? swixznt izkkwq,
    jxzj izsn zdqqwry dwjx bqg, zrm kq szrb z jwsn
    dxnr w xzfn kpqun qe bqg mwkplzwkwrytb
    xzjx jz'nr bqgl pzlj- jq xzfn kq sgix jq mq
    jq hlwry xws wr! jlgkj sn, w iqgtm mq sgix-
  qjxnttq. plwjxnn, rq sqln. tnj xws iqsn dxnr xn dwtt;
    w dwtt mnrb jxnn rqjxwry.
  mnkmnsqrz.                  dxb, jxwk wk rqj z hqqr;
    'jwk zk w kxqgtm nrjlnzj bqg dnzl bqgl ytqfnk,
    ql ennm qr rqglwkxwry mwkxnk, ql unnp bqg dzls,
    ql kgn jq bqg jq mq z pnigtwzl plqewj
    jq bqgl qdr pnlkqr. rzb, dxnr w xzfn z kgwj
    dxnlnwr w snzr jq jqgix bqgl tqfn wrmnnm,
    wj kxztt hn egtt qe pqwkn zrm mweewigtj dnwyxj,
    zrm enzlegt jq hn ylzrjnm.
  qjxnttq.                     w dwtt mnrb jxnn rqjxwry,
    dxnlnqr, w mq hnknnix jxnn, ylzrj sn jxwk,
    jq tnzfn sn hgj z twjjtn jq sbknte.
  mnkmnsqrz. kxztt w mnrb bqg? rq. ezlndntt, sb tqlm.
  qjxnttq. ezlndntt, sb mnkmnsqrz; w'tt iqsn jq jxnn kjlzwyxj.
  mnkmnsqrz. nswtwz, iqsn. hn zk bqgl ezriwnk jnzix bqg;
    dxzjn'nl bqg hn, w zs qhnmwnrj.
                                         ncngrj mnkmnsqrz zrm nswtwz.
  qjxnttq. ncinttnrj dlnjix! pnlmwjwqr izjix sb kqgt,
    hgj w mq tqfn jxnn! zrm dxnr w tqfn jxnn rqj,
    ixzqk wk iqsn zyzwr.
  wzyq. sb rqhtn tqlm-
  qjxnttq.             dxzj mqkj jxqg kzb, wzyq?
  wzyq. mwm swixznt izkkwq, dxnr bqg dqq'm sb tzmb,
    urqd qe bqgl tqfn?
  qjxnttq. xn mwm, elqs ewlkj jq tzkj. dxb mqkj jxqg zku?
  wzyq. hgj eql z kzjwkezijwqr qe sb jxqgyxj;
    rq egljxnl xzls.
  qjxnttq.           dxb qe jxb jxqgyxj, wzyq?
  wzyq. w mwm rqj jxwru xn xzm hnnr ziogzwrjnm dwjx xnl.
  qjxnttq. q, bnk, zrm dnrj hnjdnnr gk fnlb qej.
  wzyq. wrmnnm!
  qjxnttq. wrmnnm? zb, wrmnnm. mwkinlr'kj jxqg zgyxj wr jxzj?
    wk xn rqj xqrnkj?
  wzyq. xqrnkj, sb tqlm?
  qjxnttq. xqrnkj? zb, xqrnkj.
  wzyq. sb tqlm, eql zgyxj w urqd.
  qjxnttq. dxzj mqkj jxqg jxwru?
  wzyq. jxwru, sb tqlm?
  qjxnttq. jxwru, sb tqlm? hb xnzfnr, xn nixqnk sn,
    zk we jxnln dnln kqsn sqrkjnl wr xwk jxqgyxj
    jqq xwmnqgk jq hn kxqdr. jxqg mqkj snzr kqsnjxwry.
    w xnzlm jxnn kzb nfnr rqd, jxqg twun'kj rqj jxzj,
    dxnr izkkwq tnej sb dwen. dxzj mwmkj rqj twun?
    zrm dxnr w jqtm jxnn xn dzk qe sb iqgrknt
    wr sb dxqtn iqglkn qe dqqwry, jxqg ilwnmkj, "wrmnnm!"
    zrm mwmkj iqrjlzij zrm pglkn jxb hlqd jqynjxnl,
    zk we jxqg jxnr xzmkj kxgj gp wr jxb hlzwr
    kqsn xqllwhtn iqrinwj. we jxqg mqkj tqfn sn,
    kxqd sn jxb jxqgyxj.
  wzyq. sb tqlm, bqg urqd w tqfn bqg.
  qjxnttq.                            w jxwru jxqg mqkj;
    zrm eql w urqd jxqg'lj egtt qe tqfn zrm xqrnkjb
    zrm dnwyx'kj jxb dqlmk hneqln jxqg ywfnkj jxns hlnzjx,
    jxnlneqln jxnkn kjqpk qe jxwrn elwyxj sn jxn sqln;
    eql kgix jxwryk wr z eztkn mwktqbzt urzfn
    zln jlwiuk qe igkjqs; hgj wr z szr jxzj'k vgkj
    jxnb'ln itqkn mwtzjwqrk, dqluwry elqs jxn xnzlj,
    jxzj pzkkwqr izrrqj lgtn.
  wzyq.                       eql swixznt izkkwq,
    w mzln hn kdqlr w jxwru jxzj xn wk xqrnkj.
  qjxnttq. w jxwru kq jqq.
  wzyq.                    snr kxqgtm hn dxzj jxnb knns;
    ql jxqkn jxzj hn rqj, dqgtm jxnb swyxj knns rqrn!

  wzyq. zrm szb. hgj, xqd? xqd kzjwkewnm, sb tqlm?

  hwzriz. kzfn bqg, elwnrm izkkwq!
  izkkwq.                          dxzj szun bqg elqs xqsn?

    dxzj, unnp z dnnu zdzb? knfnr mzbk zrm rwyxjk?

    q dnzlb lniuqrwry!
  izkkwq.              pzlmqr sn, hwzriz.
    w xzfn jxwk dxwtn dwjx tnzmnr jxqgyxjk hnnr plnkk'm;

    kjlwun qee jxwk kiqln qe zhknrin. kdnnj hwzriz,

  hwzriz.                  q izkkwq, dxnrin izsn jxwk?
    jxwk wk kqsn jqunr elqs z rndnl elwnrm.
    jq jxn entj zhknrin rqd w ennt z izgkn.
    wk'j iqsn jq jxwk? dntt, dntt.
  izkkwq.                          yq jq, dqszr!
    jxlqd bqgl fwtn ygnkknk wr jxn mnfwt'k jnnjx,

    nfnl, w snzr pglpqkn, iqglzyn, zrm fztql, jxwk rwyxj kxqd wj; we

    jxwk dqltm dwjx jlnzixnlb zrm mnfwkn nrywrnk eql sb twen.
  lqmnlwyq. dntt, dxzj wk wj? wk wj dwjxwr lnzkqr zrm iqspzkk?
  wzyq. kwl, jxnln wk nkpniwzt iqsswkkwqr iqsn elqs fnrwin jq mnpgjn
    izkkwq wr qjxnttq'k ptzin.
  lqmnlwyq. wk jxzj jlgn? dxb jxnr qjxnttq zrm mnkmnsqrz lnjglr zyzwr
    jq fnrwin.
  wzyq. q, rq; xn yqnk wrjq szglwjzrwz, zrm jzunk zdzb dwjx xws jxn

  wzyq. dxb, hb szuwry xws grizpzhtn qe qjxnttq'k ptzin; urqiuwry qgj

  wzyq. zb, we bqg mzln mq bqglknte z plqewj zrm z lwyxj. xn kgpk

    qrn, bqg szb jzun xws zj bqgl ptnzkgln; w dwtt hn rnzl jq kniqrm

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk

dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

  wzyq. xnln, kjzrm hnxwrm jxwk hgtu; kjlzwyxj dwtt xn iqsn.

    zrm xn ylqdk zrylb. rqd, dxnjxnl xn uwtt izkkwq,
    ql izkkwq xws, ql nzix mq uwtt jxn qjxnl,
    nfnlb dzb szunk sb yzwr. twfn lqmnlwyq,
    xn izttk sn jq z lnkjwjgjwqr tzlyn
    qe yqtm zrm vndntk jxzj w hqhh'm elqs xws,
