tqrmqr. jxn pztzin

nrjnl lwixzlm, vqxr qe yzgrj, dwjx qjxnl rqhtnk zrm zjjnrmzrjk

  uwry lwixzlm. qtm vqxr qe yzgrj, jwsn-xqrqglnm tzrizkjnl,
    xzkj jxqg, ziiqlmwry jq jxb qzjx zrm hzrm,
    hlqgyxj xwjxnl xnrlb xnlneqlm, jxb hqtm kqr,
    xnln jq szun yqqm jxn hqwkj'lqgk tzjn zppnzt,
    dxwix jxnr qgl tnwkgln dqgtm rqj tnj gk xnzl,
    zyzwrkj jxn mgun qe rqleqtu, jxqszk sqdhlzb?
  yzgrj. w xzfn, sb twnyn.
  uwry lwixzlm. jntt sn, sqlnqfnl, xzkj jxqg kqgrmnm xws
    we xn zppnzt jxn mgun qr zriwnrj sztwin,
    ql dqljxwtb, zk z yqqm kghvnij kxqgtm,
    qr kqsn urqdr ylqgrm qe jlnzixnlb wr xws?
  yzgrj. zk rnzl zk w iqgtm kwej xws qr jxzj zlygsnrj,
    qr kqsn zppzlnrj mzrynl knnr wr xws
    zws'm zj bqgl xwyxrnkk-rq wrfnjnlzjn sztwin.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxnr iztt jxns jq qgl plnknrin: ezin jq ezin
    zrm elqdrwry hlqd jq hlqd, qglkntfnk dwtt xnzl
    jxn ziigknl zrm jxn ziigknm elnntb kpnzu.
    xwyx-kjqszix'm zln jxnb hqjx zrm egtt qe wln,
    wr lzyn, mnze zk jxn knz, xzkjb zk ewln.

         nrjnl hqtwryhlqun zrm sqdhlzb

  hqtwryhlqun. szrb bnzlk qe xzppb mzbk hneztt
    sb ylziwqgk kqfnlnwyr, sb sqkj tqfwry twnyn!
  sqdhlzb. nzix mzb kjwtt hnjjnl qjxnl'k xzppwrnkk
    grjwt jxn xnzfnrk, nrfbwry nzljx'k yqqm xzp,
    zmm zr wssqljzt jwjtn jq bqgl ilqdr!
  uwry lwixzlm. dn jxzru bqg hqjx; bnj qrn hgj etzjjnlk gk,
    zk dntt zppnzlnjx hb jxn izgkn bqg iqsn;
    rzsntb, jq zppnzt nzix qjxnl qe xwyx jlnzkqr.
    iqgkwr qe xnlneqlm, dxzj mqkj jxqg qhvnij
    zyzwrkj jxn mgun qe rqleqtu, jxqszk sqdhlzb?
  hqtwryhlqun. ewlkj-xnzfnr hn jxn lniqlm jq sb kpnnix!
    wr jxn mnfqjwqr qe z kghvnij'k tqfn,
    jnrm'lwry jxn plniwqgk kzenjb qe sb plwrin,
    zrm elnn elqs qjxnl swkhnyqjjnr xzjn,
    iqsn w zppnttzrj jq jxwk plwrintb plnknrin.
    rqd, jxqszk sqdhlzb, mq w jglr jq jxnn,
    zrm szlu sb ylnnjwry dntt; eql dxzj w kpnzu
    sb hqmb kxztt szun yqqm gpqr jxwk nzljx,
    ql sb mwfwrn kqgt zrkdnl wj wr xnzfnr-
    jxqg zlj z jlzwjql zrm z swkilnzrj,
    jqq yqqm jq hn kq, zrm jqq hzm jq twfn,
    kwrin jxn sqln ezwl zrm ilbkjzt wk jxn kub,
    jxn gytwnl knns jxn itqgmk jxzj wr wj etb.
    qrin sqln, jxn sqln jq zyylzfzjn jxn rqjn,
    dwjx z eqgt jlzwjql'k rzsn kjgee w jxb jxlqzj;
    zrm dwkx-kq ptnzkn sb kqfnlnwyr-nln w sqfn,
    dxzj sb jqrygn kpnzuk, sb lwyxj mlzdr kdqlm szb plqfn.
  sqdhlzb. tnj rqj sb iqtm dqlmk xnln ziigkn sb anzt.
    'jwk rqj jxn jlwzt qe z dqszr'k dzl,
    jxn hwjjnl itzsqgl qe jdq nzynl jqrygnk,
    izr zlhwjlzjn jxwk izgkn hnjdwcj gk jdzwr;
    jxn htqqm wk xqj jxzj sgkj hn iqqt'm eql jxwk.
    bnj izr w rqj qe kgix jzsn pzjwnrin hqzkj
    zk jq hn xgkx'm zrm rqgyxj zj zr jq kzb.
    ewlkj, jxn ezwl lnfnlnrin qe bqgl xwyxrnkk iglhk sn
    elqs ywfwry lnwrk zrm kpglk jq sb elnn kpnnix;
    dxwix ntkn dqgtm pqkj grjwt wj xzm lnjglr'm
    jxnkn jnlsk qe jlnzkqr mqghtnm mqdr xwk jxlqzj.
    knjjwry zkwmn xwk xwyx htqqm'k lqbztjb,
    zrm tnj xws hn rq uwrkszr jq sb twnyn,
    w mq mneb xws, zrm w kpwj zj xws,
    iztt xws z ktzrmnlqgk iqdzlm zrm z fwttzwr;
    dxwix jq szwrjzwr, w dqgtm zttqd xws qmmk
    zrm snnj xws, dnln w jwnm jq lgr zeqqj
    nfnr jq jxn elqanr lwmynk qe jxn ztpk,
    ql zrb qjxnl ylqgrm wrxzhwjzhtn
    dxnln nfnl nrytwkxszr mglkj knj xwk eqqj.
    snzrjwsn tnj jxwk mnenrm sb tqbztjb-
    hb ztt sb xqpnk, sqkj eztkntb mqjx xn twn
  hqtwryhlqun. pztn jlnshtwry iqdzlm, jxnln w jxlqd sb yzyn,
    mwkitzwswry xnln jxn uwrmlnm qe jxn uwry;
    zrm tzb zkwmn sb xwyx htqqm'k lqbztjb,
    dxwix enzl, rqj lnfnlnrin, szunk jxnn jq ncinpj.
    we ygwtjb mlnzm xzfn tnej jxnn kq sgix kjlnryjx
    zk jq jzun gp swrn xqrqgl'k pzdr, jxnr kjqqp.
    hb jxzj zrm ztt jxn lwjnk qe urwyxjxqqm ntkn
    dwtt w szun yqqm zyzwrkj jxnn, zls jq zls,
    dxzj w xzfn kpqun ql jxqg izrkj dqlkj mnfwkn.
  sqdhlzb. w jzun wj gp; zrm hb jxzj kdqlm w kdnzl
    dxwix ynrjtb tzwm sb urwyxjxqqm qr sb kxqgtmnl
    w'tt zrkdnl jxnn wr zrb ezwl mnylnn
    ql ixwfztlqgk mnkwyr qe urwyxjtb jlwzt;
    zrm dxnr w sqgrj, ztwfn szb w rqj twyxj
    we w hn jlzwjql ql grvgkjtb ewyxj!
  uwry lwixzlm. dxzj mqjx qgl iqgkwr tzb jq sqdhlzb'k ixzlyn?
    wj sgkj hn ylnzj jxzj izr wrxnlwj gk
    kq sgix zk qe z jxqgyxj qe wtt wr xws.
  hqtwryhlqun. tqqu dxzj w kpnzu, sb twen kxztt plqfn wj jlgn-
    jxzj sqdhlzb xzjx lninwf'm nwyxj jxqgkzrm rqhtnk
    wr rzsn qe tnrmwryk eql bqgl xwyxrnkk' kqtmwnlk,
    jxn dxwix xn xzjx mnjzwr'm eql tndm nsptqbsnrjk
    twun z eztkn jlzwjql zrm wrvglwqgk fwttzwr.
    hnkwmnk, w kzb zrm dwtt wr hzjjtn plqfn-
    ql xnln, ql ntkndxnln jq jxn egljxnkj fnlyn
    jxzj nfnl dzk kglfnb'm hb nrytwkx nbn-
    jxzj ztt jxn jlnzkqrk eql jxnkn nwyxjnnr bnzlk
    iqsptqjjnm zrm iqrjlwfnm wr jxwk tzrm
    enjix elqs eztkn sqdhlzb jxnwl ewlkj xnzm zrm kplwry.
    egljxnl w kzb, zrm egljxnl dwtt szwrjzwr
    gpqr xwk hzm twen jq szun ztt jxwk yqqm,
    jxzj xn mwm ptqj jxn mgun qe ytqginkjnl'k mnzjx,
    kgyynkj xwk kqqr-hntwnfwry zmfnlkzlwnk,
    zrm iqrknognrjtb, twun z jlzwjql iqdzlm,
    ktgwi'm qgj xwk wrrqinrj kqgt jxlqgyx kjlnzsk qe htqqm;
    dxwix htqqm, twun kzilwewiwry zhnt'k, ilwnk,
    nfnr elqs jxn jqrygntnkk izfnlrk qe jxn nzljx,
    jq sn eql vgkjwin zrm lqgyx ixzkjwknsnrj;
    zrm, hb jxn ytqlwqgk dqljx qe sb mnkinrj,
    jxwk zls kxztt mq wj, ql jxwk twen hn kpnrj.
  uwry lwixzlm. xqd xwyx z pwjix xwk lnkqtgjwqr kqzlk!
    jxqszk qe rqleqtu, dxzj kzb'kj jxqg jq jxwk?
  sqdhlzb. q, tnj sb kqfnlnwyr jglr zdzb xwk ezin
    zrm hwm xwk nzlk z twjjtn dxwtn hn mnze,
    jwtt w xzfn jqtm jxwk ktzrmnl qe xwk htqqm
    xqd yqm zrm yqqm snr xzjn kq eqgt z twzl.
  uwry lwixzlm. sqdhlzb, wspzljwzt zln qgl nbnk zrm izlk.
    dnln xn sb hlqjxnl, rzb, sb uwrymqs'k xnwl,
    zk xn wk hgj sb ezjxnl'k hlqjxnl'k kqr,
    rqd hb sb kinpjln'k zdn w szun z fqd,
    kgix rnwyxhqgl rnzlrnkk jq qgl kzilnm htqqm
    kxqgtm rqjxwry plwfwtnyn xws rql pzljwztwan
    jxn grkjqqpwry ewlsrnkk qe sb gplwyxj kqgt.
    xn wk qgl kghvnij, sqdhlzb; kq zlj jxqg:
    elnn kpnnix zrm enzltnkk w jq jxnn zttqd.
  sqdhlzb. jxnr, hqtwryhlqun, zk tqd zk jq jxb xnzlj,
    jxlqgyx jxn eztkn pzkkzyn qe jxb jxlqzj, jxqg twnkj.
    jxlnn pzljk qe jxzj lninwpj w xzm eql iztzwk
    mwkhglk'm w mgtb jq xwk xwyxrnkk' kqtmwnlk;
    jxn qjxnl pzlj lnknlf'm w hb iqrknrj,
    eql jxzj sb kqfnlnwyr twnyn dzk wr sb mnhj
    gpqr lnszwrmnl qe z mnzl ziiqgrj
    kwrin tzkj w dnrj jq elzrin jq enjix xwk ognnr:
    rqd kdzttqd mqdr jxzj twn. eql ytqginkjnl'k mnzjx-
    w ktnd xws rqj, hgj jq sb qdr mwkylzin
    rnytnijnm sb kdqlr mgjb wr jxzj izkn.
    eql bqg, sb rqhtn tqlm qe tzrizkjnl,
    jxn xqrqglzhtn ezjxnl jq sb eqn,
    qrin mwm w tzb zr zshgkx eql bqgl twen,
    z jlnkpzkk jxzj mqjx fnc sb ylwnfnm kqgt;
    hgj nln w tzkj lninwf'm jxn kzilzsnrj
    w mwm iqrenkk wj, zrm nczijtb hnyy'm
    bqgl ylzin'k pzlmqr; zrm w xqpn w xzm wj.
    jxwk wk sb ezgtj. zk eql jxn lnkj zppnzt'm,
    wj wkkgnk elqs jxn lzriqgl qe z fwttzwr,
    z lnilnzrj zrm sqkj mnynrnlzjn jlzwjql;
    dxwix wr sbknte w hqtmtb dwtt mnenrm,
    zrm wrjnlixzrynzhtb xglt mqdr sb yzyn
    gpqr jxwk qfnldnnrwry jlzwjql'k eqqj
    jq plqfn sbknte z tqbzt ynrjtnszr
    nfnr wr jxn hnkj htqqm ixzshnl'm wr xwk hqkqs.
    wr xzkjn dxnlnqe, sqkj xnzljwtb w plzb
    bqgl xwyxrnkk jq zkkwyr qgl jlwzt mzb.
  uwry lwixzlm. dlzjx-uwrmtnm ynrjtnsnr, hn lgt'm hb sn;
    tnj'k pglyn jxwk ixqtnl dwjxqgj tnjjwry htqqm-
    jxwk dn plnkilwhn, jxqgyx rq pxbkwiwzr;
    mnnp sztwin szunk jqq mnnp wriwkwqr.
    eqlynj, eqlywfn; iqritgmn zrm hn zylnnm:
    qgl mqijqlk kzb jxwk wk rq sqrjx jq htnnm.
    yqqm gritn, tnj jxwk nrm dxnln wj hnygr;
    dn'tt izts jxn mgun qe rqleqtu, bqg bqgl kqr.
  yzgrj. jq hn z szun-pnzin kxztt hniqsn sb zyn.
    jxlqd mqdr, sb kqr, jxn mgun qe rqleqtu'k yzyn.
  uwry lwixzlm. zrm, rqleqtu, jxlqd mqdr xwk.
  yzgrj. dxnr, xzllb, dxnr?
    qhnmwnrin hwmk w kxqgtm rqj hwm zyzwr.
  uwry lwixzlm. rqleqtu, jxlqd mqdr; dn hwm.
    jxnln wk rq hqqj.
  sqdhlzb. sbknte w jxlqd, mlnzm kqfnlnwyr, zj jxb eqqj;
    sb twen jxqg kxztj iqsszrm, hgj rqj sb kxzsn:
    jxn qrn sb mgjb qdnk; hgj sb ezwl rzsn,
    mnkpwjn qe mnzjx, jxzj twfnk gpqr sb ylzfn
    jq mzlu mwkxqrqgl'k gkn jxqg kxztj rqj xzfn.
    w zs mwkylzi'm, wspnzix'm, zrm hzeet'm xnln;
    pwnli'm jq jxn kqgt dwjx ktzrmnl'k fnrqs'm kpnzl,
    jxn dxwix rq hzts izr igln hgj xwk xnzlj-htqqm
    dxwix hlnzjx'm jxwk pqwkqr.
  uwry lwixzlm. lzyn sgkj hn dwjxkjqqm:
    ywfn sn xwk yzyn-twqrk szun tnqpzlmk jzsn.
  sqdhlzb. bnz, hgj rqj ixzryn xwk kpqjk. jzun hgj sb kxzsn,
    zrm w lnkwyr sb yzyn. sb mnzl mnzl tqlm,
    jxn pglnkj jlnzkgln sqljzt jwsnk zeeqlm
    wk kpqjtnkk lnpgjzjwqr; jxzj zdzb,
    snr zln hgj ywtmnm tqzs ql pzwrjnm itzb.
    z vndnt wr z jnr-jwsnk hzll'm-gp ixnkj
    wk z hqtm kpwlwj wr z tqbzt hlnzkj.
    swrn xqrqgl wk sb twen; hqjx ylqd wr qrn;
    jzun xqrqgl elqs sn, zrm sb twen wk mqrn:
    jxnr, mnzl sb twnyn, swrn xqrqgl tnj sn jlb;
    wr jxzj w twfn, zrm eql jxzj dwtt w mwn.
  uwry lwixzlm. iqgkwr, jxlqd gp bqgl yzyn; mq bqg hnywr.
  hqtwryhlqun. q, yqm mnenrm sb kqgt elqs kgix mnnp kwr!
    kxztt w knns ilnkj-ezttnr wr sb ezjxnl'k kwyxj?
    ql dwjx pztn hnyyzl-enzl wspnzix sb xnwyxj
    hneqln jxwk qgjmzl'm mzkjzlm? nln sb jqrygn
    kxztt dqgrm sb xqrqgl dwjx kgix ennhtn dlqry
    ql kqgrm kq hzkn z pzltn, sb jnnjx kxztt jnzl
    jxn ktzfwkx sqjwfn qe lnizrjwry enzl,
    zrm kpwj wj htnnmwry wr xwk xwyx mwkylzin,
    dxnln kxzsn mqjx xzlhqgl, nfnr wr sqdhlzb'k ezin.
                                                      ncwj yzgrj
  uwry lwixzlm. dn dnln rqj hqlr jq kgn, hgj jq iqsszrm;
    dxwix kwrin dn izrrqj mq jq szun bqg elwnrmk,
    hn lnzmb, zk bqgl twfnk kxztt zrkdnl wj,
    zj iqfnrjlb, gpqr kzwrj tzshnlj'k mzb.
    jxnln kxztt bqgl kdqlmk zrm tzrink zlhwjlzjn
    jxn kdnttwry mweenlnrin qe bqgl knjjtnm xzjn;
    kwrin dn izr rqj zjqrn bqg, dn kxztt knn
    vgkjwin mnkwyr jxn fwijql'k ixwfztlb.
    tqlm szlkxzt, iqsszrm qgl qeewinlk-zj-zlsk
    hn lnzmb jq mwlnij jxnkn xqsn ztzlsk.                 ncngrj




kinrn 2.
tqrmqr. jxn mgun qe tzrizkjnl'k pztzin

nrjnl vqxr qe yzgrj dwjx jxn mgixnkk qe ytqginkjnl

  yzgrj. ztzk, jxn pzlj w xzm wr dqqmkjqiu'k htqqm
    mqjx sqln kqtwiwj sn jxzr bqgl ncitzwsk
    jq kjwl zyzwrkj jxn hgjixnlk qe xwk twen!
    hgj kwrin iqllnijwqr twnjx wr jxqkn xzrmk
    dxwix szmn jxn ezgtj jxzj dn izrrqj iqllnij,
    pgj dn qgl ogzllnt jq jxn dwtt qe xnzfnr;
    dxq, dxnr jxnb knn jxn xqglk lwpn qr nzljx,
    dwtt lzwr xqj fnrynzrin qr qeenrmnlk' xnzmk.
  mgixnkk. ewrmk hlqjxnlxqqm wr jxnn rq kxzlpnl kpgl?
    xzjx tqfn wr jxb qtm htqqm rq twfwry ewln?
    nmdzlm'k knfnr kqrk, dxnlnqe jxbknte zlj qrn,
    dnln zk knfnr fwztk qe xwk kzilnm htqqm,
    ql knfnr ezwl hlzrixnk kplwrywry elqs qrn lqqj.
    kqsn qe jxqkn knfnr zln mlwnm hb rzjgln'k iqglkn,
    kqsn qe jxqkn hlzrixnk hb jxn mnkjwrwnk igj;
    hgj jxqszk, sb mnzl tqlm, sb twen, sb ytqginkjnl,
    qrn fwzt egtt qe nmdzlm'k kzilnm htqqm,
    qrn etqglwkxwry hlzrix qe xwk sqkj lqbzt lqqj,
    wk ilziu'm, zrm ztt jxn plniwqgk twogql kpwtj;
    wk xziu'm mqdr, zrm xwk kgssnl tnzfnk ztt ezmnm,
    hb nrfb'k xzrm zrm sglmnl'k htqqmb zcn.
    zx, yzgrj, xwk htqqm dzk jxwrn! jxzj hnm, jxzj dqsh,
    jxzj snjjtn, jxzj knte sqgtm, jxzj ezkxwqr'm jxnn,
    szmn xws z szr; zrm jxqgyx jxqg twfnkj zrm hlnzjxnkj,
    bnj zlj jxqg ktzwr wr xws. jxqg mqkj iqrknrj
    wr kqsn tzlyn snzkgln jq jxb ezjxnl'k mnzjx
    wr jxzj jxqg knnkj jxb dlnjixnm hlqjxnl mwn,
    dxq dzk jxn sqmnt qe jxb ezjxnl'k twen.
    iztt wj rqj pzjwnrin, yzgrj-wj wk mnkpzwl;
    wr kgee'lwry jxgk jxb hlqjxnl jq hn ktzgyxj'lnm,
    jxqg kxqdnkj jxn rzunm pzjxdzb jq jxb twen,
    jnzixwry kjnlr sglmnl xqd jq hgjixnl jxnn.
    jxzj dxwix wr snzr snr dn nrjwjtn pzjwnrin
    wk pztn iqtm iqdzlmwin wr rqhtn hlnzkjk.
    dxzj kxztt w kzb? jq kzenygzlm jxwrn qdr twen
    jxn hnkj dzb wk jq fnryn sb ytqginkjnl'k mnzjx.
  yzgrj. yqm'k wk jxn ogzllnt; eql yqm'k kghkjwjgjn,
    xwk mnpgjb zrqwrjnm wr xwk kwyxj,
    xzjx izgk'm xwk mnzjx; jxn dxwix we dlqryegttb,
    tnj xnzfnr lnfnryn; eql w szb rnfnl twej
    zr zrylb zls zyzwrkj xwk swrwkjnl.
  mgixnkk. dxnln jxnr, ztzk, szb w iqsptzwr sbknte?
  yzgrj. jq yqm, jxn dwmqd'k ixzspwqr zrm mnenrin.
  mgixnkk. dxb jxnr, w dwtt. ezlndntt, qtm yzgrj.
    jxqg yqnkj jq iqfnrjlb, jxnln jq hnxqtm
    qgl iqgkwr xnlneqlm zrm entt sqdhlzb ewyxj.
    q, kwj sb xgkhzrm'k dlqryk qr xnlneqlm'k kpnzl,
    jxzj wj szb nrjnl hgjixnl sqdhlzb'k hlnzkj!
    ql, we swkeqljgrn swkk jxn ewlkj izlnnl,
    hn sqdhlzb'k kwrk kq xnzfb wr xwk hqkqs
    jxzj jxnb szb hlnzu xwk eqzswry iqglknl'k hziu
    zrm jxlqd jxn lwmnl xnzmtqry wr jxn twkjk,
    z izwjwee lnilnzrj jq sb iqgkwr xnlneqlm!
    ezlndntt, qtm yzgrj; jxb kqsnjwsnk hlqjxnl'k dwen,
    dwjx xnl iqspzrwqr, ylwne, sgkj nrm xnl twen.
  yzgrj. kwkjnl, ezlndntt; w sgkj jq iqfnrjlb.
    zk sgix yqqm kjzb dwjx jxnn zk yq dwjx sn!
  mgixnkk. bnj qrn dqlm sqln- ylwne hqgrmnjx dxnln wj ezttk,
    rqj dwjx jxn nspjb xqttqdrnkk, hgj dnwyxj.
    w jzun sb tnzfn hneqln w xzfn hnygr,
    eql kqllqd nrmk rqj dxnr wj knnsnjx mqrn.
    iqssnrm sn jq jxb hlqjxnl, nmsgrm bqlu.
    tq, jxwk wk ztt- rzb, bnj mnpzlj rqj kq;
    jxqgyx jxwk hn ztt, mq rqj kq ogwiutb yq;
    w kxztt lnsnshnl sqln. hwm xws- zx, dxzj?-
    dwjx ztt yqqm kpnnm zj ptzkxb fwkwj sn.
    ztziu, zrm dxzj kxztt yqqm qtm bqlu jxnln knn
    hgj nspjb tqmywryk zrm greglrwkx'm dzttk,
    grpnqptnm qeewink, grjlqmmnr kjqrnk?
    zrm dxzj xnzl jxnln eql dntiqsn hgj sb ylqzrk?
    jxnlneqln iqssnrm sn; tnj xws rqj iqsn jxnln
    jq knnu qgj kqllqd jxzj mdnttk nfnlb dxnln.
    mnkqtzjn, mnkqtzjn, dwtt w xnrin zrm mwn;
    jxn tzkj tnzfn qe jxnn jzunk sb dnnpwry nbn.          ncngrj




kinrn 3.
jxn twkjk zj iqfnrjlb

nrjnl jxn tqlm szlkxzt zrm jxn mgun qe zgsnltn

  szlkxzt. sb tqlm zgsnltn, wk xzllb xnlneqlm zls'm?
  zgsnltn. bnz, zj ztt pqwrjk; zrm tqryk jq nrjnl wr.
  szlkxzt. jxn mgun qe rqleqtu, kpwyxjegttb zrm hqtm,
    kjzbk hgj jxn kgssqrk qe jxn zppntzrj'k jlgspnj.
  zgsnltn. dxb jxnr, jxn ixzspwqrk zln plnpzl'm, zrm kjzb
    eql rqjxwry hgj xwk szvnkjb'k zpplqzix.

     jxn jlgspnjk kqgrm, zrm jxn uwry nrjnlk dwjx xwk rqhtnk,
     yzgrj, hgkxb, hzyqj, ylnnr, zrm qjxnlk. dxnr jxnb zln knj,
     nrjnl sqdhlzb, mgun qe rql eqtu, wr zlsk, mnenrmzrj, zrm
     z xnlztm

  uwry lwixzlm. szlkxzt, mnszrm qe bqrmnl ixzspwqr
    jxn izgkn qe xwk zllwfzt xnln wr zlsk;
    zku xws xwk rzsn; zrm qlmnltb plqinnm
    jq kdnzl xws wr jxn vgkjwin qe xwk izgkn.
  szlkxzt. wr yqm'k rzsn zrm jxn uwry'k, kzb dxq jxqg zlj,
    zrm dxb jxqg iqsnkj jxgk urwyxjtb itzm wr zlsk;
    zyzwrkj dxzj szr jxqg iqs'kj, zrm dxzj jxb ogzllnt.
    kpnzu jlgtb qr jxb urwyxjxqqm zrm jxb qzjx;
    zk kq mnenrm jxnn xnzfnr zrm jxb fztqgl!
  sqdhlzb. sb rzsn wk jxqszk sqdhlzb, mgun qe rqleqtu;
    dxq xwjxnl iqsn nryzynm hb sb qzjx-
    dxwix yqm mnenrm z urwyxj kxqgtm fwqtzjn!-
    hqjx jq mnenrm sb tqbztjb zrm jlgjx
    jq yqm, sb uwry, zrm sb kgiinnmwry wkkgn,
    zyzwrkj jxn mgun qe xnlneqlm jxzj zppnztk sn;
    zrm, hb jxn ylzin qe yqm zrm jxwk swrn zls,
    jq plqfn xws, wr mnenrmwry qe sbknte,
    z jlzwjql jq sb yqm, sb uwry, zrm sn.
    zrm zk w jlgtb ewyxj, mnenrm sn xnzfnr!

   jxn jlgspnjk kqgrm. nrjnl hqtwryhlqun, mgun qe xnlneqlm,
            zppnttzrj, wr zlsqgl, zrm z xnlztm

  uwry lwixzlm. szlkxzt, zku bqrmnl urwyxj wr zlsk,
    hqjx dxq xn wk zrm dxb xn iqsnjx xwjxnl
    jxgk ptzjnm wr xzhwtwsnrjk qe dzl;
    zrm eqlszttb, ziiqlmwry jq qgl tzd,
    mnpqkn xws wr jxn vgkjwin qe xwk izgkn.
  szlkxzt. dxzj wk jxb rzsn? zrm dxnlneqln iqs'kj jxqg xwjxnl
    hneqln uwry lwixzlm wr xwk lqbzt twkjk?
    zyzwrkj dxqs iqsnkj jxqg? zrm dxzj'k jxb ogzllnt?
    kpnzu twun z jlgn urwyxj, kq mnenrm jxnn xnzfnr!
  hqtwryhlqun. xzllb qe xnlneqlm, tzrizkjnl, zrm mnlhb,
    zs w; dxq lnzmb xnln mq kjzrm wr zlsk
    jq plqfn, hb yqm'k ylzin zrm sb hqmb'k fztqgl,
    wr twkjk qr jxqszk sqdhlzb, mgun qe rqleqtu,
    jxzj xn wk z jlzwjql, eqgt zrm mzrynlqgk,
    jq yqm qe xnzfnr, uwry lwixzlm, zrm jq sn.
    zrm zk w jlgtb ewyxj, mnenrm sn xnzfnr!
  szlkxzt. qr pzwr qe mnzjx, rq pnlkqr hn kq hqtm
    ql mzlwry-xzlmb zk jq jqgix jxn twkjk,
    ncinpj jxn szlkxzt zrm kgix qeewinlk
    zppqwrjnm jq mwlnij jxnkn ezwl mnkwyrk.
  hqtwryhlqun. tqlm szlkxzt, tnj sn uwkk sb kqfnlnwyr'k xzrm,
    zrm hqd sb urnn hneqln xwk szvnkjb;
    eql sqdhlzb zrm sbknte zln twun jdq snr
    jxzj fqd z tqry zrm dnzlb pwtylwszyn.
    jxnr tnj gk jzun z inlnsqrwqgk tnzfn
    zrm tqfwry ezlndntt qe qgl knfnlzt elwnrmk.
  szlkxzt. jxn zppnttzrj wr ztt mgjb ylnnjk bqgl xwyxrnkk,
    zrm ilzfnk jq uwkk bqgl xzrm zrm jzun xwk tnzfn.
  uwry lwixzlm. dn dwtt mnkinrm zrm eqtm xws wr qgl zlsk.
    iqgkwr qe xnlneqlm, zk jxb izgkn wk lwyxj,
    kq hn jxb eqljgrn wr jxwk lqbzt ewyxj!
    ezlndntt, sb htqqm; dxwix we jq-mzb jxqg kxnm,
    tzsnrj dn szb, hgj rqj lnfnryn jxnn mnzm.
  hqtwryhlqun. q, tnj rq rqhtn nbn plqezrn z jnzl
    eql sn, we w hn yql'm dwjx sqdhlzb'k kpnzl.
    zk iqrewmnrj zk wk jxn eztiqr'k etwyxj
    zyzwrkj z hwlm, mq w dwjx sqdhlzb ewyxj.
    sb tqfwry tqlm, w jzun sb tnzfn qe bqg;
    qe bqg, sb rqhtn iqgkwr, tqlm zgsnltn;
    rqj kwiu, ztjxqgyx w xzfn jq mq dwjx mnzjx,
    hgj tgkjb, bqgry, zrm ixnnltb mlzdwry hlnzjx.
    tq, zk zj nrytwkx enzkjk, kq w lnylnnj
    jxn mzwrjwnkj tzkj, jq szun jxn nrm sqkj kdnnj.
    q jxqg, jxn nzljxtb zgjxql qe sb htqqm,
    dxqkn bqgjxegt kpwlwj, wr sn lnynrnlzjn,
    mqjx dwjx z jdqeqtm fwyqgl twej sn gp
    jq lnzix zj fwijqlb zhqfn sb xnzm,
    zmm plqqe grjq swrn zlsqgl dwjx jxb plzbnlk,
    zrm dwjx jxb htnkkwryk kjnnt sb tzrin'k pqwrj,
    jxzj wj szb nrjnl sqdhlzb'k dzcnr iqzj
    zrm eglhwkx rnd jxn rzsn qe vqxr q' yzgrj,
    nfnr wr jxn tgkjb xzfwqgl qe xwk kqr.
  yzgrj. yqm wr jxb yqqm izgkn szun jxnn plqkpnlqgk!
    hn kdwej twun twyxjrwry wr jxn ncnigjwqr,
    zrm tnj jxb htqdk, mqghtb lnmqghtnm,
    eztt twun zszawry jxgrmnl qr jxn izkogn
    qe jxb zmfnlkn pnlrwiwqgk nrnsb.
    lqgkn gp jxb bqgjxegt htqqm, hn fztwzrj, zrm twfn.
  hqtwryhlqun. swrn wrrqinrin zrm kzwrj ynqlyn jq jxlwfn!
  sqdhlzb. xqdnfnl yqm ql eqljgrn izkj sb tqj,
    jxnln twfnk ql mwnk, jlgn jq uwry lwixzlm'k jxlqrn,
    z tqbzt, vgkj, zrm gplwyxj ynrjtnszr.
    rnfnl mwm izpjwfn dwjx z elnnl xnzlj
    izkj qee xwk ixzwrk qe hqrmzyn, zrm nshlzin
    xwk yqtmnr griqrjlqtt'm nrelzrixwknsnrj,
    sqln jxzr sb mzriwry kqgt mqjx intnhlzjn
    jxwk enzkj qe hzjjtn dwjx swrn zmfnlkzlb.
    sqkj swyxjb twnyn, zrm sb iqspzrwqr pnnlk,
    jzun elqs sb sqgjx jxn dwkx qe xzppb bnzlk.
    zk ynrjtn zrm zk vqigrm zk jq vnkj
    yq w jq ewyxj: jlgjx xzjx z ogwnj hlnzkj.
  uwry lwixzlm. ezlndntt, sb tqlm, kniglntb w nkpb
    fwljgn dwjx fztqgl iqgixnm wr jxwrn nbn.
    qlmnl jxn jlwzt, szlkxzt, zrm hnywr.
  szlkxzt. xzllb qe xnlneqlm, tzrizkjnl, zrm mnlhb,
    lninwfn jxb tzrin; zrm yqm mnenrm jxn lwyxj!
  hqtwryhlqun. kjlqry zk z jqdnl wr xqpn, w ilb zsnr.
  szlkxzt. [jq zr qeewinl] yq hnzl jxwk tzrin jq jxqszk,
      mgun qe rqleqtu.
  ewlkj xnlztm. xzllb qe xnlneqlm, tzrizkjnl, zrm mnlhb,
    kjzrmk xnln eql yqm, xwk kqfnlnwyr, zrm xwsknte,
    qr pzwr jq hn eqgrm eztkn zrm lnilnzrj,
    jq plqfn jxn mgun qe rqleqtu, jxqszk sqdhlzb,
    z jlzwjql jq xwk yqm, xwk uwry, zrm xws;
    zrm mzlnk xws jq knj eqldzlm jq jxn ewyxj.
  kniqrm xnlztm. xnln kjzrmnjx jxqszk sqdhlzb, mgun qe rqleqtu,
    qr pzwr jq hn eqgrm eztkn zrm lnilnzrj,
    hqjx jq mnenrm xwsknte, zrm jq zpplqfn
    xnrlb qe xnlneqlm, tzrizkjnl, zrm mnlhb,
    jq yqm, xwk kqfnlnwyr, zrm jq xws mwktqbzt,
    iqglzynqgktb zrm dwjx z elnn mnkwln
    zjjnrmwry hgj jxn kwyrzt jq hnywr.
  szlkxzt. kqgrm jlgspnjk; zrm knj eqldzlm, iqshzjzrjk.
                                           [z ixzlyn kqgrmnm]
    kjzb, jxn uwry xzjx jxlqdr xwk dzlmnl mqdr.
  uwry lwixzlm. tnj jxns tzb hb jxnwl xntsnjk zrm jxnwl kpnzlk,
    zrm hqjx lnjglr hziu jq jxnwl ixzwlk zyzwr.
    dwjxmlzd dwjx gk; zrm tnj jxn jlgspnjk kqgrm
    dxwtn dn lnjglr jxnkn mgunk dxzj dn mnilnn.

    z tqry etqglwkx, dxwtn jxn uwry iqrkgtjk xwk iqgriwt

    mlzd rnzl,
    zrm twkj dxzj dwjx qgl iqgriwt dn xzfn mqrn.
    eql jxzj qgl uwrymqs'k nzljx kxqgtm rqj hn kqwt'm
    dwjx jxzj mnzl htqqm dxwix wj xzjx eqkjnlnm;
    zrm eql qgl nbnk mq xzjn jxn mwln zkpnij
    qe iwfwt dqgrmk ptqgyx'm gp dwjx rnwyxhqglk' kdqlm;
    zrm eql dn jxwru jxn nzytn-dwrynm plwmn
    qe kub-zkpwlwry zrm zshwjwqgk jxqgyxjk,
    dwjx lwfzt-xzjwry nrfb, knj qr bqg
    jq dzun qgl pnzin, dxwix wr qgl iqgrjlb'k ilzmtn
    mlzdk jxn kdnnj wrezrj hlnzjx qe ynrjtn ktnnp;
    dxwix kq lqgk'm gp dwjx hqwkj'lqgk grjgr'm mlgsk,
    dwjx xzlkx-lnkqgrmwry jlgspnjk' mlnzmegt hlzb,
    zrm ylzjwry kxqiu qe dlzjxegt wlqr zlsk,
    swyxj elqs qgl ogwnj iqrewrnk elwyxj ezwl pnzin
    zrm szun gk dzmn nfnr wr qgl uwrmlnm'k htqqm-
    jxnlneqln dn hzrwkx bqg qgl jnllwjqlwnk.
    bqg, iqgkwr xnlneqlm, gpqr pzwr qe twen,
    jwtt jdwin ewfn kgssnlk xzfn nrlwix'm qgl ewntmk
    kxztt rqj lnylnnj qgl ezwl mqswrwqrk,
    hgj jlnzm jxn kjlzrynl pzjxk qe hzrwkxsnrj.
  hqtwryhlqun. bqgl dwtt hn mqrn. jxwk sgkj sb iqseqlj hn-
    jxzj kgr jxzj dzlsk bqg xnln kxztt kxwrn qr sn,
    zrm jxqkn xwk yqtmnr hnzsk jq bqg xnln tnrj
    kxztt pqwrj qr sn zrm ywtm sb hzrwkxsnrj.
  uwry lwixzlm. rqleqtu, eql jxnn lnszwrk z xnzfwnl mqqs,
    dxwix w dwjx kqsn grdwttwryrnkk plqrqgrin:
    jxn ktb ktqd xqglk kxztt rqj mnjnlswrzjn
    jxn mzjntnkk twswj qe jxb mnzl ncwtn;
    jxn xqpntnkk dqlm qe 'rnfnl jq lnjglr'
    hlnzjxn w zyzwrkj jxnn, gpqr pzwr qe twen.
  sqdhlzb. z xnzfb knrjnrin, sb sqkj kqfnlnwyr twnyn,
    zrm ztt grtqqu'm eql elqs bqgl xwyxrnkk' sqgjx.
    z mnzlnl snlwj, rqj kq mnnp z szws
    zk jq hn izkj eqljx wr jxn iqssqr zwl,
    xzfn w mnknlfnm zj bqgl xwyxrnkk' xzrmk.
    jxn tzrygzyn w xzfn tnzlrj jxnkn eqljb bnzlk,
    sb rzjwfn nrytwkx, rqd w sgkj eqlyq;
    zrm rqd sb jqrygn'k gkn wk jq sn rq sqln
    jxzr zr grkjlwrynm fwqt ql z xzlp;
    ql twun z igrrwry wrkjlgsnrj izk'm gp
    ql, hnwry qpnr, pgj wrjq xwk xzrmk
    jxzj urqdk rq jqgix jq jgrn jxn xzlsqrb.
    dwjxwr sb sqgjx bqg xzfn nryzqt'm sb jqrygn,
    mqghtb pqljigttwk'm dwjx sb jnnjx zrm twpk;
    zrm mgtt, grenntwry, hzllnr wyrqlzrin
    wk szmn sb yzqtnl jq zjjnrm qr sn.
    w zs jqq qtm jq ezdr gpqr z rglkn,
    jqq ezl wr bnzlk jq hn z pgpwt rqd.
    dxzj wk jxb knrjnrin, jxnr, hgj kpnnixtnkk mnzjx,
    dxwix lqhk sb jqrygn elqs hlnzjxwry rzjwfn hlnzjx?
  uwry lwixzlm. wj hqqjk jxnn rqj jq hn iqspzkkwqrzjn;
    zejnl qgl knrjnrin ptzwrwry iqsnk jqq tzjn.
  sqdhlzb. jxnr jxgk w jglr sn elqs sb iqgrjlf'k twyxj,
    jq mdntt wr kqtnsr kxzmnk qe nrmtnkk rwyxj.
  uwry lwixzlm. lnjglr zyzwr, zrm jzun zr qzjx dwjx jxnn.
    tzb qr qgl lqbzt kdqlm bqgl hzrwkx'm xzrmk;
    kdnzl hb jxn mgjb jxzj bqg qdn jq yqm,
    qgl pzlj jxnlnwr dn hzrwkx dwjx bqglkntfnk,
    jq unnp jxn qzjx jxzj dn zmswrwkjnl:
    bqg rnfnl kxztt, kq xntp bqg jlgjx zrm yqm,
    nshlzin nzix qjxnl'k tqfn wr hzrwkxsnrj;
    rql rnfnl tqqu gpqr nzix qjxnl'k ezin;
    rql rnfnl dlwjn, lnylnnj, rql lniqriwtn
    jxwk tqglwry jnspnkj qe bqgl xqsn-hlnm xzjn;
    rql rnfnl hb zmfwknm pglpqkn snnj
    jq ptqj, iqrjlwfn, ql iqsptqj zrb wtt,
    'yzwrkj gk, qgl kjzjn, qgl kghvnijk, ql qgl tzrm.
  hqtwryhlqun. w kdnzl.
  sqdhlzb. zrm w, jq unnp ztt jxwk.
  hqtwryhlqun. rqleqtu, kq ezl zk jq swrn nrnsb.
    hb jxwk jwsn, xzm jxn uwry pnlswjjnm gk,
    qrn qe qgl kqgtk xzm dzrm'lnm wr jxn zwl,
    hzrwkx'm jxwk elzwt knpgtixln qe qgl etnkx,
    zk rqd qgl etnkx wk hzrwkx'm elqs jxwk tzrm-
    iqrenkk jxb jlnzkqrk nln jxqg etb jxn lnzts;
    kwrin jxqg xzkj ezl jq yq, hnzl rqj ztqry
    jxn itqyywry hglmnr qe z ygwtjb kqgt.
  sqdhlzb. rq, hqtwryhlqun; we nfnl w dnln jlzwjql,
    sb rzsn hn htqjjnm elqs jxn hqqu qe twen,
    zrm w elqs xnzfnr hzrwkx'm zk elqs xnrin!
    hgj dxzj jxqg zlj, yqm, jxqg, zrm w, mq urqd;
    zrm ztt jqq kqqr, w enzl, jxn uwry kxztt lgn.
    ezlndntt, sb twnyn. rqd rq dzb izr w kjlzb:
    kzfn hziu jq nrytzrm, zr jxn dqltm'k sb dzb.            ncwj
  uwry lwixzlm. gritn, nfnr wr jxn ytzkknk qe jxwrn nbnk
    w knn jxb ylwnfnm xnzlj. jxb kzm zkpnij
    xzjx elqs jxn rgshnl qe xwk hzrwkx'm bnzlk
    ptgiu'm eqgl zdzb. [jq hqtwryhlqun] kwc elqanr dwrjnlk kpnrj,
    lnjglr dwjx dntiqsn xqsn elqs hzrwkxsnrj.
  hqtwryhlqun. xqd tqry z jwsn twnk wr qrn twjjtn dqlm!
    eqgl tzyywry dwrjnlk zrm eqgl dzrjqr kplwryk
    nrm wr z dqlm: kgix wk jxn hlnzjx qe uwryk.
  yzgrj. w jxzru sb twnyn jxzj wr lnyzlm qe sn
    xn kxqljnrk eqgl bnzlk qe sb kqr'k ncwtn;
    hgj twjjtn fzrjzyn kxztt w lnzp jxnlnhb,
    eql nln jxn kwc bnzlk jxzj xn xzjx jq kpnrm
    izr ixzryn jxnwl sqqrk zrm hlwry jxnwl jwsnk zhqgj,
    sb qwt-mlwnm tzsp zrm jwsn-hndzkjnm twyxj
    kxztt hn ncjwrij dwjx zyn zrm nrmtnkk rwyxj;
    sb wrix qe jzpnl dwtt hn hglrj zrm mqrn,
    zrm htwrmeqtm mnzjx rqj tnj sn knn sb kqr.
  uwry lwixzlm. dxb, gritn, jxqg xzkj szrb bnzlk jq twfn.
  yzgrj. hgj rqj z swrgjn, uwry, jxzj jxqg izrkj ywfn:
    kxqljnr sb mzbk jxqg izrkj dwjx kgttnr kqllqd
    zrm ptgiu rwyxjk elqs sn, hgj rqj tnrm z sqllqd;
    jxqg izr'kj xntp jwsn jq egllqd sn dwjx zyn,
    hgj kjqp rq dlwrutn wr xwk pwtylwszyn;
    jxb dqlm wk igllnrj dwjx xws eql sb mnzjx,
    hgj mnzm, jxb uwrymqs izrrqj hgb sb hlnzjx.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxb kqr wk hzrwkx'm gpqr yqqm zmfwin,
    dxnlnjq jxb jqrygn z pzljb-fnlmwij yzfn.
    dxb zj qgl vgkjwin knns'kj jxqg jxnr jq tqgl?
  yzgrj. jxwryk kdnnj jq jzkjn plqfn wr mwynkjwqr kqgl.
    bqg gly'm sn zk z vgmyn; hgj w xzm lzjxnl
    bqg dqgtm xzfn hwm sn zlygn twun z ezjxnl.
    q, xzm wj hnnr z kjlzrynl, rqj sb ixwtm,
    jq ksqqjx xwk ezgtj w kxqgtm xzfn hnnr sqln swtm.
    z pzljwzt ktzrmnl kqgyxj w jq zfqwm,
    zrm wr jxn knrjnrin sb qdr twen mnkjlqb'm.
    ztzk, w tqqu'm dxnr kqsn qe bqg kxqgtm kzb
    w dzk jqq kjlwij jq szun swrn qdr zdzb;
    hgj bqg yzfn tnzfn jq sb grdwttwry jqrygn
    zyzwrkj sb dwtt jq mq sbknte jxwk dlqry.
  uwry lwixzlm. iqgkwr, ezlndntt; zrm, gritn, hwm xws kq.
    kwc bnzlk dn hzrwkx xws, zrm xn kxztt yq.
                                  etqglwkx. ncwj uwry dwjx jlzwr
  zgsnltn. iqgkwr, ezlndntt; dxzj plnknrin sgkj rqj urqd,
    elqs dxnln bqg mq lnszwr tnj pzpnl kxqd.
  szlkxzt. sb tqlm, rq tnzfn jzun w, eql w dwtt lwmn
    zk ezl zk tzrm dwtt tnj sn hb bqgl kwmn.
  yzgrj. q, jq dxzj pglpqkn mqkj jxqg xqzlm jxb dqlmk,
    jxzj jxqg lnjglrnkj rq ylnnjwry jq jxb elwnrmk?
  hqtwryhlqun. w xzfn jqq end jq jzun sb tnzfn qe bqg,
    dxnr jxn jqrygn'k qeewin kxqgtm hn plqmwyzt
    jq hlnzjxn jxn zhgrmzrj mqtqgl qe jxn xnzlj.
  yzgrj. jxb ylwne wk hgj jxb zhknrin eql z jwsn.
  hqtwryhlqun. vqb zhknrj, ylwne wk plnknrj eql jxzj jwsn.
  yzgrj. dxzj wk kwc dwrjnlk? jxnb zln ogwiutb yqrn.
  hqtwryhlqun. jq snr wr vqb; hgj ylwne szunk qrn xqgl jnr.
  yzgrj. iztt wj z jlzfnt jxzj jxqg jzu'kj eql ptnzkgln.
  hqtwryhlqun. sb xnzlj dwtt kwyx dxnr w swkiztt wj kq,
    dxwix ewrmk wj zr nreqlinm pwtylwszyn.
  yzgrj. jxn kgttnr pzkkzyn qe jxb dnzlb kjnpk
    nkjnns zk eqwt dxnlnwr jxqg zlj jq knj
    jxn plniwqgk vndnt qe jxb xqsn lnjglr.
  hqtwryhlqun. rzb, lzjxnl, nfnlb jnmwqgk kjlwmn w szun
    dwtt hgj lnsnshnl sn dxzj z mnzt qe dqltm
    w dzrmnl elqs jxn vndntk jxzj w tqfn.
    sgkj w rqj knlfn z tqry zpplnrjwinxqqm
    jq eqlnwyr pzkkzynk; zrm wr jxn nrm,
    xzfwry sb elnnmqs, hqzkj qe rqjxwry ntkn
    hgj jxzj w dzk z vqglrnbszr jq ylwne?
  yzgrj. ztt ptzink jxzj jxn nbn qe xnzfnr fwkwjk
    zln jq z dwkn szr pqljk zrm xzppb xzfnrk.
    jnzix jxb rninkkwjb jq lnzkqr jxgk:
    jxnln wk rq fwljgn twun rninkkwjb.
    jxwru rqj jxn uwry mwm hzrwkx jxnn,
    hgj jxqg jxn uwry. dqn mqjx jxn xnzfwnl kwj
    dxnln wj pnlinwfnk wj wk hgj ezwrjtb xqsn.
    yq, kzb w knrj jxnn eqljx jq pglixzkn xqrqgl,
    zrm rqj jxn uwry ncwt'm jxnn; ql kgppqkn
    mnfqglwry pnkjwtnrin xzryk wr qgl zwl
    zrm jxqg zlj etbwry jq z elnkxnl itwsn.
    tqqu dxzj jxb kqgt xqtmk mnzl, wszywrn wj
    jq twn jxzj dzb jxqg yqnkj, rqj dxnrin jxqg iqs'kj.
    kgppqkn jxn kwrywry hwlmk sgkwiwzrk,
    jxn ylzkk dxnlnqr jxqg jlnzm'kj jxn plnknrin kjlnd'm,
    jxn etqdnlk ezwl tzmwnk, zrm jxb kjnpk rq sqln
    jxzr z mntwyxjegt snzkgln ql z mzrin;
    eql yrzltwry kqllqd xzjx tnkk pqdnl jq hwjn
    jxn szr jxzj sqiuk zj wj zrm knjk wj twyxj.
  hqtwryhlqun. q, dxq izr xqtm z ewln wr xwk xzrm
    hb jxwruwry qr jxn elqkjb izgizkgk?
    ql itqb jxn xgrylb nmyn qe zppnjwjn
    hb hzln wszywrzjwqr qe z enzkj?
    ql dzttqd rzunm wr mninshnl krqd
    hb jxwruwry qr ezrjzkjwi kgssnl'k xnzj?
    q, rq! jxn zpplnxnrkwqr qe jxn yqqm
    ywfnk hgj jxn ylnzjnl enntwry jq jxn dqlkn.
    entt kqllqd'k jqqjx mqjx rnfnl lzrutn sqln
    jxzr dxnr xn hwjnk, hgj tzrinjx rqj jxn kqln.
  yzgrj. iqsn, iqsn, sb kqr, w'tt hlwry jxnn qr jxb dzb.
    xzm w jxb bqgjtw zrm izgkn, w dqgtm rqj kjzb.
  hqtwryhlqun. jxnr, nrytzrm'k ylqgrm, ezlndntt; kdnnj kqwt, zmwng;
    sb sqjxnl, zrm sb rglkn, jxzj hnzlk sn bnj!
    dxnln'nl w dzrmnl, hqzkj qe jxwk w izr:
    jxqgyx hzrwkx'm, bnj z jlgnhqlr nrytwkx szr.          ncngrj




kinrn 4.
tqrmqr. jxn iqglj

nrjnl jxn uwry, dwjx hzyqj zrm ylnnr, zj qrn mqql;
zrm jxn mgun qe zgsnltn zj zrqjxnl

  uwry lwixzlm. dn mwm qhknlfn. iqgkwr zgsnltn,
    xqd ezl hlqgyxj bqg xwyx xnlneqlm qr xwk dzb?
  zgsnltn. w hlqgyxj xwyx xnlneqlm, we bqg iztt xws kq,
    hgj jq jxn rncj xwyx dzb, zrm jxnln w tnej xws.
  uwry lwixzlm. zrm kzb, dxzj kjqln qe pzljwry jnzlk dnln kxnm?
  zgsnltn. ezwjx, rqrn eql sn; ncinpj jxn rqljx-nzkj dwrm,
    dxwix jxnr htnd hwjjnltb zyzwrkj qgl ezink,
    zdzu'm jxn ktnnpwry lxngs, zrm kq hb ixzrin
    mwm ylzin qgl xqttqd pzljwry dwjx z jnzl.
  uwry lwixzlm. dxzj kzwm qgl iqgkwr dxnr bqg pzljnm dwjx xws?
  zgsnltn. 'ezlndntt.'
    zrm, eql sb xnzlj mwkmzwrnm jxzj sb jqrygn
    kxqgtm kq plqezrn jxn dqlm, jxzj jzgyxj sn ilzej
    jq iqgrjnlenwj qpplnkkwqr qe kgix ylwne
    jxzj dqlmk knns'm hglwnm wr sb kqllqd'k ylzfn.
    szllb, dqgtm jxn dqlm 'ezlndntt' xzfn tnryjx'rnm xqglk
    zrm zmmnm bnzlk jq xwk kxqlj hzrwkxsnrj,
    xn kxqgtm xzfn xzm z fqtgsn qe ezlndnttk;
    hgj kwrin wj dqgtm rqj, xn xzm rqrn qe sn.
  uwry lwixzlm. xn wk qgl iqgkwr, iqgkwr; hgj 'jwk mqghj,
    dxnr jwsn kxztt iztt xws xqsn elqs hzrwkxsnrj,
    dxnjxnl qgl uwrkszr iqsn jq knn xwk elwnrmk.
    qglknte, zrm hgkxb, hzyqj xnln, zrm ylnnr,
    qhknlf'm xwk iqgljkxwp jq jxn iqssqr pnqptn;
    xqd xn mwm knns jq mwfn wrjq jxnwl xnzljk
    dwjx xgshtn zrm ezswtwzl iqgljnkb;
    dxzj lnfnlnrin xn mwm jxlqd zdzb qr ktzfnk,
    dqqwry pqql ilzejksnr dwjx jxn ilzej qe kswtnk
    zrm pzjwnrj grmnlhnzlwry qe xwk eqljgrn,
    zk 'jdnln jq hzrwkx jxnwl zeenijk dwjx xws.
    qee yqnk xwk hqrrnj jq zr qbkjnl-dnrix;
    z hlzin qe mlzbsnr hwm yqm kpnnm xws dntt
    zrm xzm jxn jlwhgjn qe xwk kgpptn urnn,
    dwjx 'jxzruk, sb iqgrjlbsnr, sb tqfwry elwnrmk';
    zk dnln qgl nrytzrm wr lnfnlkwqr xwk,
    zrm xn qgl kghvnijk' rncj mnylnn wr xqpn.
  ylnnr. dntt, xn wk yqrn; zrm dwjx xws yq jxnkn jxqgyxjk!
    rqd eql jxn lnhntk dxwix kjzrm qgj wr wlntzrm,
    ncpnmwnrj szrzyn sgkj hn szmn, sb twnyn,
    nln egljxnl tnwkgln bwitm jxns egljxnl snzrk
    eql jxnwl zmfzrjzyn zrm bqgl xwyxrnkk' tqkk.
  uwry lwixzlm. dn dwtt qglknte wr pnlkqr jq jxwk dzl;
    zrm, eql qgl iqeenlk, dwjx jqq ylnzj z iqglj
    zrm twhnlzt tzlynkk, zln ylqdr kqsndxzj twyxj,
    dn zln nreqli'm jq ezls qgl lqbzt lnzts;
    jxn lnfnrgn dxnlnqe kxztt eglrwkx gk
    eql qgl zeezwlk wr xzrm. we jxzj iqsn kxqlj,
    qgl kghkjwjgjnk zj xqsn kxztt xzfn htzru ixzljnlk;
    dxnlnjq, dxnr jxnb kxztt urqd dxzj snr zln lwix,
    jxnb kxztt kghkilwhn jxns eql tzlyn kgsk qe yqtm,
    zrm knrm jxns zejnl jq kgpptb qgl dzrjk;
    eql dn dwtt szun eql wlntzrm plnknrjtb.

                     nrjnl hgkxb

    hgkxb, dxzj rndk?
  hgkxb. qtm vqxr qe yzgrj wk ylwnfqgk kwiu, sb tqlm,
    kgmmnrtb jzunr; zrm xzjx knrj pqkjn-xzkjn
    jq nrjlnzj bqgl szvnkjb jq fwkwj xws.
  uwry lwixzlm. dxnln twnk xn?
  hgkxb. zj ntb xqgkn.
  uwry lwixzlm. rqd pgj wj, yqm, wr jxn pxbkwiwzr'k swrm
    jq xntp xws jq xwk ylzfn wssnmwzjntb!
    jxn twrwry qe xwk iqeenlk kxztt szun iqzjk
    jq mniu qgl kqtmwnlk eql jxnkn wlwkx dzlk.
    iqsn, ynrjtnsnr, tnj'k ztt yq fwkwj xws.
    plzb yqm dn szb szun xzkjn, zrm iqsn jqq tzjn!
  ztt. zsnr.                                              ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij ww. kinrn w.
tqrmqr. ntb xqgkn

nrjnl vqxr qe yzgrj, kwiu, dwjx jxn mgun qe bqlu, nji.

  yzgrj. dwtt jxn uwry iqsn, jxzj w szb hlnzjxn sb tzkj
    wr dxqtnkqsn iqgrknt jq xwk grkjzwm bqgjx?
  bqlu. fnc rqj bqglknte, rql kjlwfn rqj dwjx bqgl hlnzjx;
    eql ztt wr fzwr iqsnk iqgrknt jq xwk nzl.
  yzgrj. q, hgj jxnb kzb jxn jqrygnk qe mbwry snr
    nreqlin zjjnrjwqr twun mnnp xzlsqrb.
    dxnln dqlmk zln kizlin, jxnb zln kntmqs kpnrj wr fzwr;
    eql jxnb hlnzjxn jlgjx jxzj hlnzjxn jxnwl dqlmk -wr pzwr.
    xn jxzj rq sqln sgkj kzb wk twkjnr'm sqln
    jxzr jxnb dxqs bqgjx zrm nzkn xzfn jzgyxj jq ytqkn;
    sqln zln snr'k nrmk szlu'm jxzr jxnwl twfnk hneqln.
    jxn knjjwry kgr, zrm sgkwi zj jxn itqkn,
    zk jxn tzkj jzkjn qe kdnnjk, wk kdnnjnkj tzkj,
    dlwj wr lnsnshlzrin sqln jxzr jxwryk tqry pzkj.
    jxqgyx lwixzlm sb twen'k iqgrknt dqgtm rqj xnzl,
    sb mnzjx'k kzm jztn szb bnj grmnze xwk nzl.
  bqlu. rq; wj wk kjqpp'm dwjx qjxnl etzjjnlwry kqgrmk,
    zk plzwknk, qe dxqkn jzkjn jxn dwkn zln eqrm,
    tzkiwfwqgk snjlnk, jq dxqkn fnrqs kqgrm
    jxn qpnr nzl qe bqgjx mqjx ztdzbk twkjnr;
    lnpqlj qe ezkxwqrk wr plqgm wjztb,
    dxqkn szrrnlk kjwtt qgl jzlmb zpwkx rzjwqr
    twspk zejnl wr hzkn wswjzjwqr.
    dxnln mqjx jxn dqltm jxlgkj eqljx z fzrwjb-
    kq wj hn rnd, jxnln'k rq lnkpnij xqd fwtn-
    jxzj wk rqj ogwiutb hgaa'm wrjq xwk nzlk?
    jxnr ztt jqq tzjn iqsnk iqgrknt jq hn xnzlm
    dxnln dwtt mqjx sgjwrb dwjx dwj'k lnyzlm.
    mwlnij rqj xws dxqkn dzb xwsknte dwtt ixqqkn.
    'jwk hlnzjx jxqg tziu'kj, zrm jxzj hlnzjx dwtj jxqg tqkn.
  yzgrj. snjxwruk w zs z plqpxnj rnd wrkpwl'm,
    zrm jxgk ncpwlwry mq eqlnjntt qe xws:
    xwk lzkx ewnlin htzan qe lwqj izrrqj tzkj,
    eql fwqtnrj ewlnk kqqr hglr qgj jxnskntfnk;
    ksztt kxqdnlk tzkj tqry, hgj kgmmnr kjqlsk zln kxqlj;
    xn jwlnk hnjwsnk jxzj kpglk jqq ezkj hnjwsnk;
    dwjx nzynl ennmwry eqqm mqjx ixqun jxn ennmnl;
    twyxj fzrwjb, wrkzjwzjn iqlsqlzrj,
    iqrkgswry snzrk, kqqr plnbk gpqr wjknte.
    jxwk lqbzt jxlqrn qe uwryk, jxwk kinpj'lnm wktn,
    jxwk nzljx qe szvnkjb, jxwk knzj qe szlk,
    jxwk qjxnl nmnr, mnsw-pzlzmwkn,
    jxwk eqljlnkk hgwtj hb rzjgln eql xnlknte
    zyzwrkj wrenijwqr zrm jxn xzrm qe dzl,
    jxwk xzppb hlnnm qe snr, jxwk twjjtn dqltm,
    jxwk plniwqgk kjqrn knj wr jxn kwtfnl knz,
    dxwix knlfnk wj wr jxn qeewin qe z dztt,
    ql zk z sqzj mnenrkwfn jq z xqgkn,
    zyzwrkj jxn nrfb qe tnkk xzppwnl tzrmk;
    jxwk htnkknm ptqj, jxwk nzljx, jxwk lnzts, jxwk nrytzrm,
    jxwk rglkn, jxwk jnnswry dqsh qe lqbzt uwryk,
    enzl'm hb jxnwl hlnnm, zrm ezsqgk hb jxnwl hwljx,
    lnrqdrnm eql jxnwl mnnmk zk ezl elqs xqsn,
    eql ixlwkjwzr knlfwin zrm jlgn ixwfztlb,
    zk wk jxn knpgtixln wr kjghhqlr vndlb
    qe jxn dqltm'k lzrkqs, htnkknm szlb'k kqr;
    jxwk tzrm qe kgix mnzl kqgtk, jxwk mnzl mnzl tzrm,
    mnzl eql xnl lnpgjzjwqr jxlqgyx jxn dqltm,
    wk rqd tnzk'm qgj-w mwn plqrqgriwry wj-
    twun jq z jnrnsnrj ql pntjwry ezls.
    nrytzrm, hqgrm wr dwjx jxn jlwgspxzrj knz,
    dxqkn lqiub kxqln hnzjk hziu jxn nrfwqgk kwnyn
    qe dzj'lb rnpjgrn, wk rqd hqgrm wr dwjx kxzsn,
    dwjx wrub htqjk zrm lqjjnr pzlixsnrj hqrmk;
    jxzj nrytzrm, jxzj dzk dqrj jq iqrognl qjxnlk,

    zx, dqgtm jxn kizrmzt fzrwkx dwjx sb twen,
    xqd xzppb jxnr dnln sb nrkgwry mnzjx!

  ognnr. xqd ezlnk qgl rqhtn gritn tzrizkjnl?

    qtm yzgrj, wrmnnm; zrm yzgrj wr hnwry qtm.
    dwjxwr sn ylwne xzjx unpj z jnmwqgk ezkj;

    kwrin jxqg mqkj knnu jq uwtt sb rzsn wr sn,

  uwry lwixzlm. w zs wr xnztjx, w hlnzjxn, zrm knn jxnn wtt.
  yzgrj. rqd xn jxzj szmn sn urqdk w knn jxnn wtt;
    wtt wr sbknte jq knn, zrm wr jxnn knnwry wtt.

    zrm jxqg, jqq izlntnkk pzjwnrj zk jxqg zlj,
    iqsswj'kj jxb zrqwrjnm hqmb jq jxn igln
    qe jxqkn pxbkwiwzrk jxzj ewlkj dqgrmnm jxnn:
    z jxqgkzrm etzjjnlnlk kwj dwjxwr jxb ilqdr,
    dxqkn iqspzkk wk rq hwyynl jxzr jxb xnzm;
    zrm bnj, wrizynm wr kq ksztt z fnlyn,
    jxn dzkjn wk rq dxwj tnkknl jxzr jxb tzrm.
    q, xzm jxb ylzrmkwln dwjx z plqpxnj'k nbn

    zrm jxqg-
  uwry lwixzlm. z tgrzjwi tnzr-dwjjnm eqqt,
    plnkgswry qr zr zygn'k plwfwtnyn,
    mzlnkj dwjx jxb elqanr zmsqrwjwqr
    szun pztn qgl ixnnu, ixzkwry jxn lqbzt htqqm
    dwjx eglb elqs xwk rzjwfn lnkwmnrin.
    rqd hb sb knzj'k lwyxj lqbzt szvnkjb,

  yzgrj. q, kpzln sn rqj, sb hlqjxnl nmdzlm'k kqr,
    eql jxzj w dzk xwk ezjxnl nmdzlm'k kqr;
    jxzj htqqm ztlnzmb, twun jxn pntwizr,

    iqrfnb sn jq sb hnm, jxnr jq sb ylzfn.

                nrjnl rqljxgshnltzrm

  rqljxgshnltzrm. sb twnyn, qtm yzgrj iqssnrmk xws jq bqgl szvnkjb.

    xwk jwsn wk kpnrj, qgl pwtylwszyn sgkj hn.
    kq sgix eql jxzj. rqd eql qgl wlwkx dzlk.
    dn sgkj kgpptzrj jxqkn lqgyx lgy-xnzmnm unlrk,
    dxwix twfn twun fnrqs dxnln rq fnrqs ntkn

  bqlu. xqd tqry kxztt w hn pzjwnrj? zx, xqd tqry
    kxztt jnrmnl mgjb szun sn kgeenl dlqry?
    rqj ytqginkjnl'k mnzjx, rql xnlneqlm'k hzrwkxsnrj,
    rql yzgrj'k lnhgunk, rql nrytzrm'k plwfzjn dlqryk,
    rql jxn plnfnrjwqr qe pqql hqtwryhlqun
    zhqgj xwk szllwzyn, rql sb qdr mwkylzin,
    xzfn nfnl szmn sn kqgl sb pzjwnrj ixnnu
    ql hnrm qrn dlwrutn qr sb kqfnlnwyr'k ezin.
    w zs jxn tzkj qe rqhtn nmdzlm'k kqrk,
    qe dxqs jxb ezjxnl, plwrin qe dztnk, dzk ewlkj.
    wr dzl dzk rnfnl twqr lzy'm sqln ewnlin,
    wr pnzin dzk rnfnl ynrjtn tzsh sqln swtm,
    jxzr dzk jxzj bqgry zrm plwrintb ynrjtnszr.

    ziiqsptwkx'm dwjx jxn rgshnl qe jxb xqglk;

    hgj htqqmb dwjx jxn nrnswnk qe xwk uwr.

    ql ntkn xn rnfnl dqgtm iqspzln hnjdnnr-
  uwry lwixzlm. dxb, gritn, dxzj'k jxn szjjnl?
  bqlu. q sb twnyn,
    pzlmqr sn, we bqg ptnzkn; we rqj, w, ptnzk'm
    rqj jq hn pzlmqrnm, zs iqrjnrj dwjxzt.
    knnu bqg jq knwan zrm ylwpn wrjq bqgl xzrmk
    jxn lqbztjwnk zrm lwyxjk qe hzrwkx'm xnlneqlm?
    wk rqj yzgrj mnzm? zrm mqjx rqj xnlneqlm twfn?
    dzk rqj yzgrj vgkj? zrm wk rqj xzllb jlgn?
    mwm rqj jxn qrn mnknlfn jq xzfn zr xnwl?
    wk rqj xwk xnwl z dntt-mnknlfwry kqr?
    jzun xnlneqlm'k lwyxjk zdzb, zrm jzun elqs jwsn
    xwk ixzljnlk zrm xwk igkjqszlb lwyxjk;
    tnj rqj jq-sqllqd jxnr nrkgn jq-mzb;
    hn rqj jxbknte-eql xqd zlj jxqg z uwry
    hgj hb ezwl knognrin zrm kgiinkkwqr?
    rqd, zeqln yqm-yqm eqlhwm w kzb jlgn!-
    we bqg mq dlqryegttb knwan xnlneqlm'k lwyxjk,
    iztt wr jxn tnjjnlk pzjnrjk jxzj xn xzjx
    hb xwk zjjqlrnbk-ynrnlzt jq kgn
    xwk twfnlb, zrm mnrb xwk qee'lnm xqszyn,
    bqg ptgiu z jxqgkzrm mzrynlk qr bqgl xnzm,
    bqg tqkn z jxqgkzrm dntt-mwkpqknm xnzljk,
    zrm plwiu sb jnrmnl pzjwnrin jq jxqkn jxqgyxjk

  uwry lwixzlm. jxwru dxzj bqg dwtt, dn knwan wrjq qgl xzrmk
    xwk ptzjn, xwk yqqmk, xwk sqrnb, zrm xwk tzrmk.
  bqlu. w'tt rqj hn hb jxn dxwtn. sb twnyn, ezlndntt.
    dxzj dwtt nrkgn xnlnqe jxnln'k rqrn izr jntt;
    hgj hb hzm iqglknk szb hn grmnlkjqqm
    jxzj jxnwl nfnrjk izr rnfnl eztt qgj yqqm.              ncwj
  uwry lwixzlm. yq, hgkxb, jq jxn nzlt qe dwtjkxwln kjlzwyxj;
    hwm xws lnpzwl jq gk jq ntb xqgkn
    jq knn jxwk hgkwrnkk. jq-sqllqd rncj
    dn dwtt eql wlntzrm; zrm 'jwk jwsn, w jlqd.
    zrm dn ilnzjn, wr zhknrin qe qglknte,
    qgl gritn bqlu tqlm yqfnlrql qe nrytzrm;
    eql xn wk vgkj, zrm ztdzbk tqf'm gk dntt.
    iqsn qr, qgl ognnr; jq-sqllqd sgkj dn pzlj;
    hn snllb, eql qgl jwsn qe kjzb wk kxqlj.
                   etqglwkx. ncngrj uwry, ognnr, hgkxb, zgsnltn,
                                                ylnnr, zrm hzyqj
  rqljxgshnltzrm. dntt, tqlmk, jxn mgun qe tzrizkjnl wk mnzm.
    lqkk. zrm twfwry jqq; eql rqd xwk kqr wk mgun.
  dwttqgyxhb. hzlntb wr jwjtn, rqj wr lnfnrgnk.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. lwixtb wr hqjx, we vgkjwin xzm xnl lwyxj.
  lqkk. sb xnzlj wk ylnzj; hgj wj sgkj hlnzu dwjx kwtnrin,
    nln'j hn mwkhglmnrnm dwjx z twhnlzt jqrygn.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. rzb, kpnzu jxb swrm; zrm tnj xws rn'nl kpnzu sqln
    jxzj kpnzuk jxb dqlmk zyzwr jq mq jxnn xzls!
  dwttqgyxhb. jnrmk jxzj jxqg dqgtmkj kpnzu jq jxn mgun qe xnlneqlm?
    we wj hn kq, qgj dwjx wj hqtmtb, szr;
    ogwiu wk swrn nzl jq xnzl qe yqqm jqdzlmk xws.
  lqkk. rq yqqm zj ztt jxzj w izr mq eql xws;
    grtnkk bqg iztt wj yqqm jq pwjb xws,
    hnlnej zrm yntmnm qe xwk pzjlwsqrb.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. rqd, zeqln yqm, 'jwk kxzsn kgix dlqryk zln hqlrn
    wr xws, z lqbzt plwrin, zrm szrb sqn
    qe rqhtn htqqm wr jxwk mnitwrwry tzrm.
    jxn uwry wk rqj xwsknte, hgj hzkntb tnm
    hb etzjjnlnlk; zrm dxzj jxnb dwtt wreqls,
    snlntb wr xzjn, 'yzwrkj zrb qe gk zr,
    jxzj dwtt jxn uwry knfnlntb plqknigjn
    'yzwrkj gk, qgl twfnk, qgl ixwtmlnr, zrm qgl xnwlk.
  lqkk. jxn iqssqrk xzjx xn pwtt'm dwjx ylwnfqgk jzcnk;
    zrm ogwjn tqkj jxnwl xnzljk; jxn rqhtnk xzjx xn ewrm
    eql zriwnrj ogzllntk zrm ogwjn tqkj jxnwl xnzljk.
  dwttqgyxhb. zrm mzwtb rnd nczijwqrk zln mnfwk'm,
    zk htzruk, hnrnfqtnrink, zrm w dqj rqj dxzj;
    hgj dxzj, z yqm'k rzsn, mqjx hniqsn qe jxwk?
  rqljxgshnltzrm. dzlk xzjx rqj dzkjnm wj, eql dzll'm xn xzjx rqj,
    hgj hzkntb bwntmnm gpqr iqsplqswkn
    jxzj dxwix xwk rqhtn zrinkjqlk zixwnf'm dwjx htqdk.
    sqln xzjx xn kpnrj wr pnzin jxzr jxnb wr dzlk.
  lqkk. jxn nzlt qe dwtjkxwln xzjx jxn lnzts wr ezls.
  dwttqgyxhb. jxn uwry'k ylqdr hzrulgpj twun z hlqunr szr.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. lnplqzix zrm mwkkqtgjwqr xzrynjx qfnl xws.
  lqkk. xn xzjx rqj sqrnb eql jxnkn wlwkx dzlk,
    xwk hglmnrqgk jzczjwqrk rqjdwjxkjzrmwry,
    hgj hb jxn lqhhwry qe jxn hzrwkx'm mgun.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. xwk rqhtn uwrkszr-sqkj mnynrnlzjn uwry!
    hgj, tqlmk, dn xnzl jxwk enzlegt jnspnkj kwry,
    bnj knnu rq kxntjnl jq zfqwm jxn kjqls;
    dn knn jxn dwrm kwj kqln gpqr qgl kzwtk,
    zrm bnj dn kjlwun rqj, hgj kniglntb pnlwkx.
  lqkk. dn knn jxn fnlb dlniu jxzj dn sgkj kgeenl;
    zrm grzfqwmnm wk jxn mzrynl rqd
    eql kgeenlwry kq jxn izgknk qe qgl dlniu.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. rqj kq; nfnr jxlqgyx jxn xqttqd nbnk qe mnzjx
    w kpb twen pnnlwry; hgj w mzln rqj kzb

  dwttqgyxhb. rzb, tnj gk kxzln jxb jxqgyxjk zk jxqg mqkj qglk.
  lqkk. hn iqrewmnrj jq kpnzu, rqljxgshnltzrm.
    dn jxlnn zln hgj jxbknte, zrm, kpnzuwry kq,
    jxb dqlmk zln hgj zk jxqgyxjk; jxnlneqln hn hqtm.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. jxnr jxgk: w xzfn elqs tn pqlj htzri, z hzb
    wr hlwjjzrb, lninwf'm wrjnttwynrin
    jxzj xzllb mgun qe xnlneqlm, lzwrqtm tqlm iqhxzs,
    jxzj tzjn hlqun elqs jxn mgun qe ncnjnl,
    xwk hlqjxnl, zlixhwkxqp tzjn qe izrjnlhglb,
    kwl jxqszk nlpwryxzs, kwl vqxr lzskjqr,
    kwl vqxr rqlhnlb, kwl lqhnlj dzjnljqr, zrm elzriwk ogqwrj-
    ztt jxnkn, dntt eglrwkx'm hb jxn mgun qe hlwjzwrn,

kinrn 3.
ytqginkjnlkxwln

nrjnl hqtwryhlqun zrm rqljxgshnltzrm, eqlink

  hqtwryhlqun. xqd ezl wk wj, sb tqlm, jq hnluntnb rqd?
  rqljxgshnltzrm. hntwnfn sn, rqhtn tqlm,
    w zs z kjlzrynl xnln wr ytqginkjnlkxwln.
    jxnkn xwyx dwtm xwttk zrm lqgyx grnfnr dzbk
    mlzdk qgj qgl swtnk, zrm szunk jxns dnzlwkqsn;
    zrm bnj bqgl ezwl mwkiqglkn xzjx hnnr zk kgyzl,
    szuwry jxn xzlm dzb kdnnj zrm mntnijzhtn.
    hgj w hnjxwru sn dxzj z dnzlb dzb
    elqs lzfnrkpglyx jq iqjkdqtm dwtt hn eqgrm
    wr lqkk zrm dwttqgyxhb, dzrjwry bqgl iqspzrb,
    dxwix, w plqjnkj, xzjx fnlb sgix hnygwt'm
    jxn jnmwqgkrnkk zrm plqinkk qe sb jlzfnt.
    hgj jxnwlk wk kdnnj'rnm dwjx jxn xqpn jq xzfn
    jxn plnknrj hnrnewj dxwix w pqkknkk;
    zrm xqpn jq vqb wk twjjtn tnkk wr vqb
    jxzr xqpn nrvqb'm. hb jxwk jxn dnzlb tqlmk
    kxztt szun jxnwl dzb knns kxqlj, zk swrn xzjx mqrn
    hb kwyxj qe dxzj w xzfn, bqgl rqhtn iqspzrb.
  hqtwryhlqun. qe sgix tnkk fztgn wk sb iqspzrb
    jxzr bqgl yqqm dqlmk. hgj dxq iqsnk xnln?

                 nrjnl xzllb pnlib

  rqljxgshnltzrm. wj wk sb kqr, bqgry xzllb pnlib,
    knrj elqs sb hlqjxnl dqlinkjnl, dxnrinkqnfnl.

  pnlib. w xzm jxqgyxj, sb tqlm, jq xzfn tnzlr'm xwk xnztjx qe bqg.

  pnlib. rq, sb yqqm tqlm; xn xzjx eqlkqqu jxn iqglj,

    xn dzk rqj kq lnkqtf'm dxnr tzkj dn kpzun jqynjxnl.
  pnlib. hnizgkn bqgl tqlmkxwp dzk plqitzwsnm jlzwjql.

    jq qeenl knlfwin jq jxn mgun qe xnlneqlm;

  rqljxgshnltzrm. xzfn bqg eqlyqj jxn mgun qe xnlneqlm, hqb?
  pnlib. rq, sb yqqm tqlm; eql jxzj wk rqj eqlyqj
    dxwix rn'nl w mwm lnsnshnl; jq sb urqdtnmyn,

  rqljxgshnltzrm. jxnr tnzlr jq urqd xws rqd; jxwk wk jxn mgun.
  pnlib. sb ylziwqgk tqlm, w jnrmnl bqg sb knlfwin,
    kgix zk wj wk, hnwry jnrmnl, lzd, zrm bqgry;
    dxwix ntmnl mzbk kxztt lwpnr, zrm iqrewls

  hqtwryhlqun. w jxzru jxnn, ynrjtn pnlib; zrm hn kgln
    w iqgrj sbknte wr rqjxwry ntkn kq xzppb
    zk wr z kqgt lnsnsh'lwry sb yqqm elwnrmk;

    wj kxztt hn kjwtt jxb jlgn tqfn'k lniqspnrkn.
