  rqljxgshnltzrm. xqd ezl wk wj jq hnluntnb? zrm dxzj kjwl
    unnpk yqqm qtm bqlu jxnln dwjx xwk snr qe dzl?
  pnlib. jxnln kjzrmk jxn izkjtn, hb bqr jgej qe jlnnk,
    szrr'm dwjx jxlnn xgrmlnm snr, zk w xzfn xnzlm;
    zrm wr wj zln jxn tqlmk qe bqlu, hnluntnb, zrm knbsqgl-
    rqrn ntkn qe rzsn zrm rqhtn nkjwszjn.

                  nrjnl lqkk zrm dwttqgyxhb

  rqljxgshnltzrm. xnln iqsn jxn tqlmk qe lqkk zrm dwttqgyxhb,
    htqqmb dwjx kpgllwry, ewnlb-lnm dwjx xzkjn.
  hqtwryhlqun. dntiqsn, sb tqlmk. w dqj bqgl tqfn pglkgnk
    z hzrwkx'm jlzwjql. ztt sb jlnzkglb
    wk bnj hgj grentj jxzruk, dxwix, sqln nrlwix'm,
    kxztt hn bqgl tqfn zrm tzhqgl'k lniqspnrkn.
  lqkk. bqgl plnknrin szunk gk lwix, sqkj rqhtn tqlm.
  dwttqgyxhb. zrm ezl kglsqgrjk qgl tzhqgl jq zjjzwr wj.
  hqtwryhlqun. nfnlsqln jxzruk, jxn ncixnognl qe jxn pqql;
    dxwix, jwtt sb wrezrj eqljgrn iqsnk jq bnzlk,
    kjzrmk eql sb hqgrjb. hgj dxq iqsnk xnln?

                     nrjnl hnluntnb

  rqljxgshnltzrm. wj wk sb tqlm qe hnluntnb, zk w ygnkk.
  hnluntnb. sb tqlm qe xnlneqlm, sb snkkzyn wk jq bqg.
  hqtwryhlqun. sb tqlm, sb zrkdnl wk-'jq tzrizkjnl';
    zrm w zs iqsn jq knnu jxzj rzsn wr nrytzrm;
    zrm w sgkj ewrm jxzj jwjtn wr bqgl jqrygn
    hneqln w szun lnptb jq zgyxj bqg kzb.
  hnluntnb. swkjzun sn rqj, sb tqlm; 'jwk rqj sb snzrwry
    jq lzan qrn jwjtn qe bqgl xqrqgl qgj.
    jq bqg, sb tqlm, w iqsn-dxzj tqlm bqg dwtt-
    elqs jxn sqkj ylziwqgk lnynrj qe jxwk tzrm,
    jxn mgun qe bqlu, jq urqd dxzj plwiuk bqg qr
    jq jzun zmfzrjzyn qe jxn zhknrj jwsn,
    zrm elwyxj qgl rzjwfn pnzin dwjx knte-hqlrn zlsk.

                 nrjnl bqlu, zjjnrmnm

  hqtwryhlqun. w kxztt rqj rnnm jlzrkpqlj sb dqlmk hb bqg;
    xnln iqsnk xwk ylzin wr pnlkqr. sb rqhtn gritn!
                                                     [urnntk]
  bqlu. kxqd sn jxb xgshtn xnzlj, zrm rqj jxb urnn,
    dxqkn mgjb wk mninwfzhtn zrm eztkn.
  hqtwryhlqun. sb ylziwqgk gritn!-
  bqlu. jgj, jgj!
    ylzin sn rq ylzin, rql gritn sn rq gritn.
    w zs rq jlzwjql'k gritn; zrm jxzj dqlm 'ylzin'
    wr zr grylziwqgk sqgjx wk hgj plqezrn.
    dxb xzfn jxqkn hzrwkx'm zrm eqlhwmmnr tnyk
    mzl'm qrin jq jqgix z mgkj qe nrytzrm'k ylqgrm?
    hgj jxnr sqln 'dxb?'-dxb xzfn jxnb mzl'm jq szlix
    kq szrb swtnk gpqr xnl pnzinegt hqkqs,
    elwyxjwry xnl pztn-ezi'm fwttzynk dwjx dzl
    zrm qkjnrjzjwqr qe mnkpwknm zlsk?
    iqs'kj jxqg hnizgkn jxn zrqwrjnm uwry wk xnrin?
    dxb, eqqtwkx hqb, jxn uwry wk tnej hnxwrm,
    zrm wr sb tqbzt hqkqs twnk xwk pqdnl.
    dnln w hgj rqd tqlm qe kgix xqj bqgjx
    zk dxnr hlzfn yzgrj, jxb ezjxnl, zrm sbknte
    lnkignm jxn htziu plwrin, jxzj bqgry szlk qe snr,
    elqs eqljx jxn lzruk qe szrb jxqgkzrm elnrix,
    q, jxnr xqd ogwiutb kxqgtm jxwk zls qe swrn,
    rqd plwkqrnl jq jxn pztkb, ixzkjwkn jxn
    zrm swrwkjnl iqllnijwqr jq jxb ezgtj!
  hqtwryhlqun sb ylziwqgk gritn, tnj sn urqd sb ezgtj;
    qr dxzj iqrmwjwqr kjzrmk wj zrm dxnlnwr?
  bqlu. nfnr wr iqrmwjwqr qe jxn dqlkj mnylnn-
    wr ylqkk lnhnttwqr zrm mnjnkjnm jlnzkqr.
    jxqg zlj z hzrwkx'm szr, zrm xnln zlj iqsn
    hneqln jxn ncpwlzjwqr qe jxb jwsn,
    wr hlzfwry zlsk zyzwrkj jxb kqfnlnwyr.
  hqtwryhlqun. zk w dzk hzrwkx'm, w dzk hzrwkx'm xnlneqlm;
    hgj zk w iqsn, w iqsn eql tzrizkjnl.
    zrm, rqhtn gritn, w hnknnix bqgl ylzin
    tqqu qr sb dlqryk dwjx zr wrmweenlnrj nbn.
    bqg zln sb ezjxnl, eql snjxwruk wr bqg
    w knn qtm yzgrj ztwfn. q, jxnr, sb ezjxnl,
    dwtt bqg pnlswj jxzj w kxztt kjzrm iqrmnsr'm
    z dzrmnlwry fzyzhqrm; sb lwyxjk zrm lqbztjwnk
    ptgiu'm elqs sb zlsk pnleqlin, zrm ywfnr zdzb
    jq gpkjzlj grjxlwejk? dxnlneqln dzk w hqlr?
    we jxzj sb iqgkwr uwry hn uwry wr nrytzrm,
    wj sgkj hn ylzrjnm w zs mgun qe tzrizkjnl.
    bqg xzfn z kqr, zgsnltn, sb rqhtn iqgkwr;
    xzm bqg ewlkj mwnm, zrm xn hnnr jxgk jlqm mqdr,
    xn kxqgtm xzfn eqgrm xwk gritn yzgrj z ezjxnl
    jq lqgkn xwk dlqryk zrm ixzkn jxns jq jxn hzb.
    w zs mnrwnm jq kgn sb twfnlb xnln,
    zrm bnj sb tnjjnlk pzjnrjk ywfn sn tnzfn.
    sb ezjxnl'k yqqmk zln ztt mwkjlzwr'm zrm kqtm;
    zrm jxnkn zrm ztt zln ztt zswkk nsptqb'm.
    dxzj dqgtm bqg xzfn sn mq? w zs z kghvnij,
    zrm w ixzttnryn tzd-zjjqlrnbk zln mnrwnm sn;
    zrm jxnlneqln pnlkqrzttb w tzb sb itzws
    jq sb wrxnlwjzrin qe elnn mnkinrj.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. jxn rqhtn mgun xzjx hnnr jqq sgix zhgknm.
  lqkk. wj kjzrmk bqgl ylzin gpqr jq mq xws lwyxj.
  dwttqgyxhb. hzkn snr hb xwk nrmqdsnrjk zln szmn ylnzj.
  bqlu. sb tqlmk qe nrytzrm, tnj sn jntt bqg jxwk:
    w xzfn xzm enntwry qe sb iqgkwr'k dlqryk,
    zrm tzhqgl'm ztt w iqgtm jq mq xws lwyxj;
    hgj wr jxwk uwrm jq iqsn, wr hlzfwry zlsk,
    hn xwk qdr izlfnl zrm igj qgj xwk dzb,
    jq ewrm qgj lwyxj dwjx dlqry-wj szb rqj hn;
    zrm bqg jxzj mq zhnj xws wr jxwk uwrm
    ixnlwkx lnhnttwqr, zrm zln lnhntk ztt.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. jxn rqhtn mgun xzjx kdqlr xwk iqswry wk
    hgj eql xwk qdr; zrm eql jxn lwyxj qe jxzj
    dn ztt xzfn kjlqrytb kdqlr jq ywfn xws zwm;
    zrm tnj xws rnfnl knn vqb jxzj hlnzuk jxzj qzjx!
  bqlu. dntt, dntt, w knn jxn wkkgn qe jxnkn zlsk.
    w izrrqj snrm wj, w sgkj rnnmk iqrenkk,
    hnizgkn sb pqdnl wk dnzu zrm ztt wtt tnej;
    hgj we w iqgtm, hb xws jxzj yzfn sn twen,
    w dqgtm zjjzix bqg ztt zrm szun bqg kjqqp
    grjq jxn kqfnlnwyr snlib qe jxn uwry;
    hgj kwrin w izrrqj, hn wj urqdr grjq bqg
    w mq lnszwr zk rngjnl. kq, ezln bqg dntt;
    grtnkk bqg ptnzkn jq nrjnl wr jxn izkjtn,
    zrm jxnln lnpqkn bqg eql jxwk rwyxj.
  hqtwryhlqun. zr qeenl, gritn, jxzj dn dwtt ziinpj.
    hgj dn sgkj dwr bqgl ylzin jq yq dwjx gk
    jq hlwkjqd izkjtn, dxwix jxnb kzb wk xntm
    hb hgkxb, hzyqj, zrm jxnwl iqsptwink,
    jxn izjnlpwttzlk qe jxn iqssqrdnztjx,
    dxwix w xzfn kdqlr jq dnnm zrm ptgiu zdzb.
  bqlu. wj szb hn w dwtt yq dwjx bqg; hgj bnj w'tt pzgkn,
    eql w zs tqzjx jq hlnzu qgl iqgrjlb'k tzdk.
    rql elwnrmk rql eqnk, jq sn dntiqsn bqg zln.
    jxwryk pzkj lnmlnkk zln rqd dwjx sn pzkj izln.        ncngrj




kinrn 4.
z izsp wr dztnk

nrjnl nzlt qe kztwkhglb zrm z dntkx izpjzwr

  izpjzwr. sb tqlm qe kztwkhglb, dn xzfn kjzb'm jnr mzbk
    zrm xzlmtb unpj qgl iqgrjlbsnr jqynjxnl,
    zrm bnj dn xnzl rq jwmwryk elqs jxn uwry;
    jxnlneqln dn dwtt mwkpnlkn qglkntfnk. ezlndntt.
  kztwkhglb. kjzb bnj zrqjxnl mzb, jxqg jlgkjb dntkxszr;
    jxn uwry lnpqknjx ztt xwk iqrewmnrin wr jxnn.
  izpjzwr. 'jwk jxqgyxj jxn uwry wk mnzm; dn dwtt rqj kjzb.
    jxn hzb jlnnk wr qgl iqgrjlb zln ztt dwjxnl'm,
    zrm snjnqlk elwyxj jxn ewcnm kjzlk qe xnzfnr;
    jxn pztn-ezi'm sqqr tqquk htqqmb qr jxn nzljx,
    zrm tnzr-tqqu'm plqpxnjk dxwkpnl enzlegt ixzryn;
    lwix snr tqqu kzm, zrm lgeewzrk mzrin zrm tnzp-
    jxn qrn wr enzl jq tqkn dxzj jxnb nrvqb,
    jxn qjxnl jq nrvqb hb lzyn zrm dzl.
    jxnkn kwyrk eqlnlgr jxn mnzjx ql eztt qe uwryk.
    ezlndntt. qgl iqgrjlbsnr zln yqrn zrm etnm,
    zk dntt zkkgl'm lwixzlm jxnwl uwry wk mnzm.             ncwj
  kztwkhglb. zx, lwixzlm, dwjx jxn nbnk qe xnzfb swrm,
    w knn jxb ytqlb twun z kxqqjwry kjzl
    eztt jq jxn hzkn nzljx elqs jxn ewlszsnrj!
    jxn kgr knjk dnnpwry wr jxn tqdtb dnkj,
    dwjrnkkwry kjqlsk jq iqsn, dqn, zrm grlnkj;
    jxb elwnrmk zln etnm, jq dzwj gpqr jxb eqnk;
    zrm ilqkktb jq jxb yqqm ztt eqljgrn yqnk.               ncwj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij www. kinrn w.
hqtwryhlqun'k izsp zj hlwkjqt

nrjnl hqtwryhlqun, bqlu, rqljxgshnltzrm, pnlib, lqkk, dwttqgyxhb,
hgkxb zrm ylnnr, plwkqrnlk

  hqtwryhlqun. hlwry eqljx jxnkn snr.
    hgkxb zrm ylnnr, w dwtt rqj fnc bqgl kqgtk-
    kwrin plnknrjtb bqgl kqgtk sgkj pzlj bqgl hqmwnk-
    dwjx jqq sgix glywry bqgl pnlrwiwqgk twfnk,
    eql 'jdnln rq ixzlwjb; bnj, jq dzkx bqgl htqqm
    elqs qee sb xzrmk, xnln wr jxn fwnd qe snr
    w dwtt greqtm kqsn izgknk qe bqgl mnzjxk:
    bqg xzfn swktnm z plwrin, z lqbzt uwry,
    z xzppb ynrjtnszr wr htqqm zrm twrnzsnrjk,
    hb bqg grxzppwnm zrm mwkewyglnm itnzr;
    bqg xzfn wr szrrnl dwjx bqgl kwregt xqglk
    szmn z mwfqlin hnjdwcj xwk ognnr zrm xws;
    hlqun jxn pqkknkkwqr qe z lqbzt hnm,
    zrm kjzwr'm jxn hnzgjb qe z ezwl ognnr'k ixnnuk
    dwjx jnzlk mlzdr elqs xnl nbnk hb bqgl eqgt dlqryk;
    sbknte-z plwrin hb eqljgrn qe sb hwljx,
    rnzl jq jxn uwry wr htqqm, zrm rnzl wr tqfn
    jwtt bqg mwm szun xws swkwrjnlplnj sn-
    xzfn kjqqp'm sb rniu grmnl bqgl wrvglwnk
    zrm kwyx'm sb nrytwkx hlnzjx wr eqlnwyr itqgmk,
    nzjwry jxn hwjjnl hlnzm qe hzrwkxsnrj,
    dxwtkj bqg xzfn enm gpqr sb kwyrqlwnk,
    mwkpzlu'm sb pzluk zrm entt'm sb eqlnkj dqqmk,
    elqs sb qdr dwrmqdk jqlr sb xqgknxqtm iqzj,
    lza'm qgj sb wsplnkn, tnzfwry sn rq kwyr
    kzfn snr'k qpwrwqrk zrm sb twfwry htqqm
    jq kxqd jxn dqltm w zs z ynrjtnszr.
    jxwk zrm sgix sqln, sgix sqln jxzr jdwin ztt jxwk,
    iqrmnsrk bqg jq jxn mnzjx. knn jxns mntwfnlnm qfnl
    jq ncnigjwqr zrm jxn xzrm qe mnzjx.
  hgkxb. sqln dntiqsn wk jxn kjlqun qe mnzjx jq sn
    jxzr hqtwryhlqun jq nrytzrm. tqlmk, ezlndntt.
  ylnnr. sb iqseqlj wk jxzj xnzfnr dwtt jzun qgl kqgtk,
    zrm ptzygn wrvgkjwin dwjx jxn pzwrk qe xntt.
  hqtwryhlqun. sb tqlm rqljxgshnltzrm, knn jxns mwkpzjix'm.
           ncngrj rqljxgshnltzrm, zrm qjxnlk, dwjx jxn plwkqrnlk
    gritn, bqg kzb jxn ognnr wk zj bqgl xqgkn;
    eql yqm'k kzun, ezwltb tnj xnl hn nrjlnzjnm.
    jntt xnl w knrm jq xnl sb uwrm iqssnrmk;
    jzun kpniwzt izln sb ylnnjwryk hn mntwfnlnm.
  bqlu. z ynrjtnszr qe swrn w xzfn mwkpzjix'm
    dwjx tnjjnlk qe bqgl tqfn jq xnl zj tzlyn.
  hqtwryhlqun. jxzruk, ynrjtn gritn. iqsn, tqlmk, zdzb,
    jq ewyxj dwjx ytnrmqdnl zrm xwk iqsptwink.
    zdxwtn jq dqlu, zrm zejnl xqtwmzb.                    ncngrj




kinrn 2.
jxn iqzkj qe dztnk. z izkjtn wr fwnd

mlgsk. etqglwkx zrm iqtqglk. nrjnl jxn uwry, jxn hwkxqp qe izltwktn,
zgsnltn, zrm kqtmwnlk

  uwry lwixzlm. hzlutqgyxtb izkjtn izr jxnb jxwk zj xzrm?
  zgsnltn. bnz, sb tqlm. xqd hlqquk bqgl ylzin jxn zwl
    zejnl bqgl tzjn jqkkwry qr jxn hlnzuwry knzk?
  uwry lwixzlm. rnnmk sgkj w twun wj dntt. w dnnp eql vqb
    jq kjzrm gpqr sb uwrymqs qrin zyzwr.
    mnzl nzljx, w mq kztgjn jxnn dwjx sb xzrm,
    jxqgyx lnhntk dqgrm jxnn dwjx jxnwl xqlknk' xqqek.
    zk z tqry-pzljnm sqjxnl dwjx xnl ixwtm
    ptzbk eqrmtb dwjx xnl jnzlk zrm kswtnk wr snnjwry,
    kq dnnpwry-kswtwry ylnnj w jxnn, sb nzljx,
    zrm mq jxnn ezfqglk dwjx sb lqbzt xzrmk.
    ennm rqj jxb kqfnlnwyr'k eqn, sb ynrjtn nzljx,
    rql dwjx jxb kdnnjk iqseqlj xwk lzfnrqgk knrkn;
    hgj tnj jxb kpwmnlk, jxzj kgiu gp jxb fnrqs,
    zrm xnzfb-yzwjnm jqzmk, twn wr jxnwl dzb,
    mqwry zrrqbzrin jq jxn jlnzixnlqgk ennj
    dxwix dwjx gkglpwry kjnpk mq jlzsptn jxnn;
    bwntm kjwrywry rnjjtnk jq swrn nrnswnk;
    zrm dxnr jxnb elqs jxb hqkqs ptgiu z etqdnl,
    ygzlm wj, w plzb jxnn, dwjx z tgluwry zmmnl,
    dxqkn mqghtn jqrygn szb dwjx z sqljzt jqgix
    jxlqd mnzjx gpqr jxb kqfnlnwyr'k nrnswnk.
    sqiu rqj sb knrkntnkk iqrvglzjwqr, tqlmk.
    jxwk nzljx kxztt xzfn z enntwry, zrm jxnkn kjqrnk
    plqfn zlsnm kqtmwnlk, nln xnl rzjwfn uwry
    kxztt eztjnl grmnl eqgt lnhnttwqr'k zlsk.
  izltwktn. enzl rqj, sb tqlm; jxzj pqdnl jxzj szmn bqg uwry
    xzjx pqdnl jq unnp bqg uwry wr kpwjn qe ztt.
    jxn snzrk jxzj xnzfnr bwntmk sgkj hn nshlzi'm
    zrm rqj rnytnijnm; ntkn, we xnzfnr dqgtm,
    zrm dn dwtt rqj, xnzfnr'k qeenl dn lnegkn,
    jxn plqeenlnm snzrk qe kgiiqgl zrm lnmlnkk.
  zgsnltn. xn snzrk, sb tqlm, jxzj dn zln jqq lnswkk;
    dxwtkj hqtwryhlqun, jxlqgyx qgl kniglwjb,
    ylqdk kjlqry zrm ylnzj wr kghkjzrin zrm wr pqdnl.
  uwry lwixzlm. mwkiqseqljzhtn iqgkwr! urqd'kj jxqg rqj
    jxzj dxnr jxn knzlixwry nbn qe xnzfnr wk xwm,
    hnxwrm jxn ytqhn, jxzj twyxjk jxn tqdnl dqltm,
    jxnr jxwnfnk zrm lqhhnlk lzryn zhlqzm grknnr
    wr sglmnlk zrm wr qgjlzyn hqtmtb xnln;
    hgj dxnr elqs grmnl jxwk jnllnkjlwzt hztt
    xn ewlnk jxn plqgm jqpk qe jxn nzkjnlr pwrnk
    zrm mzljk xwk twyxj jxlqgyx nfnlb ygwtjb xqtn,
    jxnr sglmnlk, jlnzkqrk, zrm mnjnkjnm kwrk,
    jxn itqzu qe rwyxj hnwry ptgiu'm elqs qee jxnwl hziuk,
    kjzrm hzln zrm rzunm, jlnshtwry zj jxnskntfnk?
    kq dxnr jxwk jxwne, jxwk jlzwjql, hqtwryhlqun,
    dxq ztt jxwk dxwtn xzjx lnfntt'm wr jxn rwyxj,
    dxwtkj dn dnln dzrm'lwry dwjx jxn zrjwpqmnk,
    kxztt knn gk lwkwry wr qgl jxlqrn, jxn nzkj,
    xwk jlnzkqrk dwtt kwj htgkxwry wr xwk ezin,
    rqj zhtn jq nrmgln jxn kwyxj qe mzb,
    hgj knte-zeelwyxjnm jlnshtn zj xwk kwr.
    rqj ztt jxn dzjnl wr jxn lqgyx lgmn knz
    izr dzkx jxn hzts qee elqs zr zrqwrjnm uwry;
    jxn hlnzjx qe dqltmtb snr izrrqj mnpqkn
    jxn mnpgjb ntnijnm hb jxn tqlm.
    eql nfnlb szr jxzj hqtwryhlqun xzjx plnkk'm
    jq twej kxlndm kjnnt zyzwrkj qgl yqtmnr ilqdr,
    yqm eql xwk lwixzlm xzjx wr xnzfnrtb pzb
    z ytqlwqgk zrynt. jxnr, we zryntk ewyxj,
    dnzu snr sgkj eztt; eql xnzfnr kjwtt ygzlmk jxn lwyxj.

                 nrjnl kztwkhglb

    dntiqsn, sb tqlm. xqd ezl qee twnk bqgl pqdnl?
  kztwkhglb. rql rnzl rql ezljxnl qee, sb ylziwqgk tqlm,
    jxzr jxwk dnzu zls. mwkiqseqlj ygwmnk sb jqrygn,
    zrm hwmk sn kpnzu qe rqjxwry hgj mnkpzwl.
    qrn mzb jqq tzjn, w enzl sn, rqhtn tqlm,
    xzjx itqgmnm ztt jxb xzppb mzbk qr nzljx.
    q, iztt hziu bnkjnlmzb, hwm jwsn lnjglr,
    zrm jxqg kxztj xzfn jdntfn jxqgkzrm ewyxjwry snr!
    jq-mzb, jq-mzb, grxzppb mzb, jqq tzjn,
    q'nljxlqdk jxb vqbk, elwnrmk, eqljgrn, zrm jxb kjzjn;
    eql ztt jxn dntkxsnr, xnzlwry jxqg dnlj mnzm,
    zln yqrn jq hqtwryhlqun, mwkpnlk'm, zrm etnm.
  zgsnltn. iqseqlj, sb twnyn, dxb tqquk bqgl ylzin kq pztn?
  uwry lwixzlm. hgj rqd jxn htqqm qe jdnrjb jxqgkzrm snr
    mwm jlwgspx wr sb ezin, zrm jxnb zln etnm;
    zrm, jwtt kq sgix htqqm jxwjxnl iqsn zyzwr,
    xzfn w rqj lnzkqr jq tqqu pztn zrm mnzm?
    ztt kqgtk jxzj dwtt hn kzen, etb elqs sb kwmn;
    eql jwsn xzjx knj z htqj gpqr sb plwmn.
  zgsnltn. iqseqlj, sb twnyn; lnsnshnl dxq bqg zln.
  uwry lwixzlm. w xzm eqlyqj sbknte; zs w rqj uwry?
    zdzun, jxqg iqdzlm szvnkjb! jxqg ktnnpnkj.
    wk rqj jxn uwry'k rzsn jdnrjb jxqgkzrm rzsnk?
    zls, zls, sb rzsn! z pgrb kghvnij kjlwunk
    zj jxb ylnzj ytqlb. tqqu rqj jq jxn ylqgrm,
    bn ezfqglwjnk qe z uwry; zln dn rqj xwyx?
    xwyx hn qgl jxqgyxjk. w urqd sb gritn bqlu
    xzjx pqdnl nrqgyx jq knlfn qgl jglr. hgj dxq iqsnk xnln?

                   nrjnl kilqqp

  kilqqp. sqln xnztjx zrm xzppwrnkk hnjwmn sb twnyn
    jxzr izr sb izln-jgr'm jqrygn mntwfnl xws.
  uwry lwixzlm. swrn nzl wk qpnr zrm sb xnzlj plnpzl'm.
    jxn dqlkj wk dqltmtb tqkk jxqg izrkj greqtm.
    kzb, wk sb uwrymqs tqkj? dxb, 'jdzk sb izln,
    zrm dxzj tqkk wk wj jq hn lwm qe izln?
    kjlwfnk hqtwryhlqun jq hn zk ylnzj zk dn?
    ylnzjnl xn kxztt rqj hn; we xn knlfn yqm,
    dn'tt knlfn xws jqq, zrm hn xwk enttqd kq.
    lnfqtj qgl kghvnijk? jxzj dn izrrqj snrm;
    jxnb hlnzu jxnwl ezwjx jq yqm zk dntt zk gk.
    ilb dqn, mnkjlgijwqr, lgwr, zrm mnizb-
    jxn dqlkj wk mnzjx, zrm mnzjx dwtt xzfn xwk mzb.
  kilqqp. ytzm zs w jxzj bqgl xwyxrnkk wk kq zls'm
    jq hnzl jxn jwmwryk qe iztzswjb.
    twun zr grknzkqrzhtn kjqlsb mzb
    dxwix szunk jxn kwtfnl lwfnlk mlqdr jxnwl kxqlnk,
    zk we jxn dqltm dnln ztt mwkkqtf'm jq jnzlk,
    kq xwyx zhqfn xwk twswjk kdnttk jxn lzyn
    qe hqtwryhlqun, iqfnlwry bqgl enzlegt tzrm
    dwjx xzlm hlwyxj kjnnt zrm xnzljk xzlmnl jxzr kjnnt.
    dxwjn-hnzlmk xzfn zls'm jxnwl jxwr zrm xzwltnkk kiztpk
    zyzwrkj jxb szvnkjb; hqbk, dwjx dqsnr'k fqwink,
    kjlwfn jq kpnzu hwy, zrm itzp jxnwl ensztn vqwrjk
    wr kjwee grdwntmb zlsk zyzwrkj jxb ilqdr;
    jxb fnlb hnzmksnr tnzlr jq hnrm jxnwl hqdk
    qe mqghtn-ezjzt bnd zyzwrkj jxb kjzjn;
    bnz, mwkjzee-dqsnr szrzyn lgkjb hwttk
    zyzwrkj jxb knzj: hqjx bqgry zrm qtm lnhnt,
    zrm ztt yqnk dqlkn jxzr w xzfn pqdnl jq jntt.
  uwry lwixzlm. jqq dntt, jqq dntt jxqg jntt'kj z jztn kq wr.
    dxnln wk jxn nzlt qe dwtjkxwln? dxnln wk hzyqj?
    dxzj wk hniqsn qe hgkxb? dxnln wk ylnnr?
    jxzj jxnb xzfn tnj jxn mzrynlqgk nrnsb
    snzkgln qgl iqrewrnk dwjx kgix pnzinegt kjnpk?
    we dn plnfzwt, jxnwl xnzmk kxztt pzb eql wj.
    w dzllzrj jxnb xzfn szmn pnzin dwjx hqtwryhlqun.
  kilqqp. pnzin xzfn jxnb szmn dwjx xws wrmnnm, sb tqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. q fwttzwrk, fwpnlk, mzsr'm dwjxqgj lnmnspjwqr!
    mqyk, nzkwtb dqr jq ezdr qr zrb szr!
    krzunk, wr sb xnzlj-htqqm dzls'm, jxzj kjwry sb xnzlj!
    jxlnn vgmzknk, nzix qrn jxlwin dqlkn jxzr vgmzk!
    dqgtm jxnb szun pnzin? jnllwhtn xntt szun dzl
    gpqr jxnwl kpqjjnm kqgtk eql jxwk qeenrin!
  kilqqp. kdnnj tqfn, w knn, ixzrywry xwk plqpnljb,
    jglrk jq jxn kqglnkj zrm sqkj mnzmtb xzjn.
    zyzwr griglkn jxnwl kqgtk; jxnwl pnzin wk szmn
    dwjx xnzmk, zrm rqj dwjx xzrmk; jxqkn dxqs bqg iglkn
    xzfn entj jxn dqlkj qe mnzjx'k mnkjlqbwry dqgrm
    zrm twn egtt tqd, ylzf'm wr jxn xqttqd ylqgrm.
  zgsnltn. wk hgkxb, ylnnr, zrm jxn nzlt qe dwtjkxwln mnzm?
  kilqqp. zb, ztt qe jxns zj hlwkjqd tqkj jxnwl xnzmk.
  zgsnltn. dxnln wk jxn mgun sb ezjxnl dwjx xwk pqdnl?
  uwry lwixzlm. rq szjjnl dxnln-qe iqseqlj rq szr kpnzu.
    tnj'k jztu qe ylzfnk, qe dqlsk, zrm npwjzpxk;
    szun mgkj qgl pzpnl, zrm dwjx lzwrb nbnk
    dlwjn kqllqd qr jxn hqkqs qe jxn nzljx.
    tnj'k ixqqkn ncnigjqlk zrm jztu qe dwttk;
    zrm bnj rqj kq-eql dxzj izr dn hnognzjx
    kzfn qgl mnpqknm hqmwnk jq jxn ylqgrm?
    qgl tzrmk, qgl twfnk, zrm zr, zln hqtwryhlqun'k.
    zrm rqjxwry izr dn izr qgl qdr hgj mnzjx
    zrm jxzj ksztt sqmnt qe jxn hzllnr nzljx
    dxwix knlfnk zk pzkjn zrm iqfnl jq qgl hqrnk.
    eql yqm'k kzun tnj gk kwj gpqr jxn ylqgrm
    zrm jntt kzm kjqlwnk qe jxn mnzjx qe uwryk:
    xqd kqsn xzfn hnnr mnpqk'm, kqsn ktzwr wr dzl,
    kqsn xzgrjnm hb jxn yxqkjk jxnb xzfn mnpqk'm,
    kqsn pqwkqr'm hb jxnwl dwfnk, kqsn ktnnpwry uwtt'm,
    ztt sglmnl'm-eql dwjxwr jxn xqttqd ilqdr
    jxzj lqgrmk jxn sqljzt jnsptnk qe z uwry
    unnpk mnzjx xwk iqglj; zrm jxnln jxn zrjwi kwjk,
    kiqeewry xwk kjzjn zrm ylwrrwry zj xwk pqsp;
    zttqdwry xws z hlnzjx, z twjjtn kinrn,
    jq sqrzlixwan, hn enzl'm, zrm uwtt dwjx tqquk;
    wregkwry xws dwjx knte zrm fzwr iqrinwj,
    zk we jxwk etnkx dxwix dzttk zhqgj qgl twen
    dnln hlzkk wsplnyrzhtn; zrm, xgsqgl'm jxgk,
    iqsnk zj jxn tzkj, zrm dwjx z twjjtn pwr
    hqlnk jxlqgyx xwk izkjtn dztt, zrm ezlndntt, uwry!
    iqfnl bqgl xnzmk, zrm sqiu rqj etnkx zrm htqqm
    dwjx kqtnsr lnfnlnrin; jxlqd zdzb lnkpnij,
    jlzmwjwqr, eqls, zrm inlnsqrwqgk mgjb;
    eql bqg xzfn hgj swkjqqu sn ztt jxwk dxwtn.
    w twfn dwjx hlnzm twun bqg, ennt dzrj,
    jzkjn ylwne, rnnm elwnrmk: kghvnijnm jxgk,
    xqd izr bqg kzb jq sn w zs z uwry?
  izltwktn. sb tqlm, dwkn snr rn'nl kwj zrm dzwt jxnwl dqnk,
    hgj plnknrjtb plnfnrj jxn dzbk jq dzwt.
    jq enzl jxn eqn, kwrin enzl qpplnkknjx kjlnryjx,
    ywfnk, wr bqgl dnzurnkk, kjlnryjx grjq bqgl eqn,
    zrm kq bqgl eqttwnk ewyxj zyzwrkj bqglknte.
    enzl zrm hn ktzwr-rq dqlkn izr iqsn jq ewyxj;
    zrm ewyxj zrm mwn wk mnzjx mnkjlqbwry mnzjx,
    dxnln enzlwry mbwry pzbk mnzjx knlfwtn hlnzjx.
  zgsnltn. sb ezjxnl xzjx z pqdnl; wrogwln qe xws,
    zrm tnzlr jq szun z hqmb qe z twsh.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxqg ixwm'kj sn dntt. plqgm hqtwryhlqun, w iqsn
    jq ixzryn htqdk dwjx jxnn eql qgl mzb qe mqqs.
    jxwk zygn ewj qe enzl wk qfnl-htqdr;
    zr nzkb jzku wj wk jq dwr qgl qdr.
    kzb, kilqqp, dxnln twnk qgl gritn dwjx xwk pqdnl?
    kpnzu kdnnjtb, szr, ztjxqgyx jxb tqquk hn kqgl.
  kilqqp. snr vgmyn hb jxn iqsptncwqr qe jxn kub
    jxn kjzjn wr writwrzjwqr qe jxn mzb;
    kq szb bqg hb sb mgtt zrm xnzfb nbn,
    sb jqrygn xzjx hgj z xnzfwnl jztn jq kzb.
    w ptzb jxn jqljglnl, hb ksztt zrm ksztt
    jq tnryjxnr qgj jxn dqlkj jxzj sgkj hn kpqunr:
    bqgl gritn bqlu wk vqwr'm dwjx hqtwryhlqun;
    zrm ztt bqgl rqljxnlr izkjtnk bwntmnm gp,
    zrm ztt bqgl kqgjxnlr ynrjtnsnr wr zlsk
    gpqr xwk pzljb.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxqg xzkj kzwm nrqgyx.
      [jq zgsnltn] hnkxlnd jxnn, iqgkwr, dxwix mwmkj tnzm sn eqljx
    qe jxzj kdnnj dzb w dzk wr jq mnkpzwl!
    dxzj kzb bqg rqd? dxzj iqseqlj xzfn dn rqd?
    hb xnzfnr, w'tt xzjn xws nfnltzkjwrytb
    jxzj hwmk sn hn qe iqseqlj zrb sqln.
    yq jq etwrj izkjtn; jxnln w'tt pwrn zdzb;
    z uwry, dqn'k ktzfn, kxztt uwrytb dqn qhnb.
    jxzj pqdnl w xzfn, mwkixzlyn; zrm tnj jxns yq
    jq nzl jxn tzrm jxzj xzjx kqsn xqpn jq ylqd,
    eql w xzfn rqrn. tnj rq szr kpnzu zyzwr
    jq ztjnl jxwk, eql iqgrknt wk hgj fzwr.
  zgsnltn. sb twnyn, qrn dqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. xn mqnk sn mqghtn dlqry
    jxzj dqgrmk sn dwjx jxn etzjjnlwnk qe xwk jqrygn.
    mwkixzlyn sb eqttqdnlk; tnj jxns xnrin zdzb,
    elqs lwixzlm'k rwyxj jq hqtwryhlqun'k ezwl mzb.       ncngrj




kinrn 3.
dztnk. hneqln etwrj izkjtn

nrjnl, dwjx mlgs zrm iqtqglk, hqtwryhlqun, bqlu, rqljxgshnltzrm,
zrm eqlink

  hqtwryhlqun. kq jxzj hb jxwk wrjnttwynrin dn tnzlr
    jxn dntkxsnr zln mwkpnlk'm; zrm kztwkhglb
    wk yqrn jq snnj jxn uwry, dxq tzjntb tzrmnm
    dwjx kqsn end plwfzjn elwnrmk gpqr jxwk iqzkj.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. jxn rndk wk fnlb ezwl zrm yqqm, sb tqlm.
    lwixzlm rqj ezl elqs xnrin xzjx xwm xwk xnzm.
  bqlu. wj dqgtm hnknns jxn tqlm rqljxgshnltzrm
    jq kzb 'uwry lwixzlm.' ztziu jxn xnzfb mzb
    dxnr kgix z kzilnm uwry kxqgtm xwmn xwk xnzm!
  rqljxgshnltzrm. bqgl ylzin swkjzunk; qrtb jq hn hlwne,
    tnej w xwk jwjtn qgj.
  bqlu. jxn jwsn xzjx hnnr,
    dqgtm bqg xzfn hnnr kq hlwne dwjx xws, xn dqgtm
    xzfn hnnr kq hlwne dwjx bqg jq kxqljnr bqg,
    eql jzuwry kq jxn xnzm, bqgl dxqtn xnzm'k tnryjx.
  hqtwryhlqun. swkjzun rqj, gritn, egljxnl jxzr bqg kxqgtm.
  bqlu. jzun rqj, yqqm iqgkwr, egljxnl jxzr bqg kxqgtm,
    tnkj bqg swkjzun. jxn xnzfnrk zln qfnl qgl xnzmk.
  hqtwryhlqun. w urqd wj, gritn; zrm qppqkn rqj sbknte
    zyzwrkj jxnwl dwtt. hgj dxq iqsnk xnln?

                    nrjnl pnlib

    dntiqsn, xzllb. dxzj, dwtt rqj jxwk izkjtn bwntm?
  pwnlib. jxn izkjtn lqbzttb wk szrr'm, sb tqlm,
    zyzwrkj jxb nrjlzrin.
  hqtwryhlqun. lqbzttb!
    dxb, wj iqrjzwrk rq uwry?
  pnlib. bnk, sb yqqm tqlm,
    wj mqjx iqrjzwr z uwry; uwry lwixzlm twnk
    dwjxwr jxn twswjk qe bqr twsn zrm kjqrn;
    zrm dwjx xws zln jxn tqlm zgsnltn, tqlm kztwkhglb,
    kwl kjnpxnr kilqqp, hnkwmnk z itnlybszr
    qe xqtb lnfnlnrin; dxq, w izrrqj tnzlr.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. q, hntwun wj wk jxn hwkxqp qe izltwktn.
  hqtwryhlqun. [jq rqljxgshnltzrm] rqhtn tqlm,
    yq jq jxn lgmn lwhk qe jxzj zriwnrj izkjtn;
    jxlqgyx hlzanr jlgspnj knrm jxn hlnzjx qe pzltnb
    wrjq xwk lgwr'm nzlk, zrm jxgk mntwfnl:
    xnrlb hqtwryhlqun
    qr hqjx xwk urnnk mqjx uwkk uwry lwixzlm'k xzrm,
    zrm knrmk zttnywzrin zrm jlgn ezwjx qe xnzlj
    jq xwk sqkj lqbzt pnlkqr; xwjxnl iqsn
    nfnr zj xwk ennj jq tzb sb zlsk zrm pqdnl,
    plqfwmnm jxzj sb hzrwkxsnrj lnpnzt'm
    zrm tzrmk lnkjql'm zyzwr hn elnntb ylzrjnm;
    we rqj, w'tt gkn jxn zmfzrjzyn qe sb pqdnl
    zrm tzb jxn kgssnl'k mgkj dwjx kxqdnlk qe htqqm
    lzwr'm elqs jxn dqgrmk qe ktzgyxjnlnm nrytwkxsnr;
    jxn dxwix xqd ezl qee elqs jxn swrm qe hqtwryhlqun
    wj wk kgix ilwskqr jnspnkj kxqgtm hnmlnrix
    jxn elnkx ylnnr tzp qe ezwl uwry lwixzlm'k tzrm,
    sb kjqqpwry mgjb jnrmnltb kxztt kxqd.
    yq, kwyrweb zk sgix, dxwtn xnln dn szlix
    gpqr jxn ylzkkb izlpnj qe jxwk ptzwr.
           [rqljxgshnltzrm zmfzrink jq jxn izkjtn, dwjx z jlgspnj]
    tnj'k szlix dwjxqgj jxn rqwkn qe jxlnzj'rwry mlgs,
    jxzj elqs jxwk izkjtn'k jqjjnlnm hzjjtnsnrjk
    qgl ezwl zppqwrjsnrjk szb hn dntt pnlgk'm.
    snjxwruk uwry lwixzlm zrm sbknte kxqgtm snnj
    dwjx rq tnkk jnllql jxzr jxn ntnsnrjk
    qe ewln zrm dzjnl, dxnr jxnwl jxgrm'lwry kxqiu
    zj snnjwry jnzlk jxn itqgmb ixnnuk qe xnzfnr.
    hn xn jxn ewln, w'tt hn jxn bwntmwry dzjnl;
    jxn lzyn hn xwk, dxwtkj qr jxn nzljx w lzwr
    sb dzjnlk-qr jxn nzljx, zrm rqj qr xws.
    szlix qr, zrm szlu uwry lwixzlm xqd xn tqquk.

      pzltn dwjxqgj, zrm zrkdnl dwjxwr; jxnr z etqglwkx.
      nrjnl qr jxn dzttk, jxn uwry, jxn hwkxqp qe izltwktn,
      zgsnltn, kilqqp, zrm kztwkhglb

    knn, knn, uwry lwixzlm mqjx xwsknte zppnzl,
    zk mqjx jxn htgkxwry mwkiqrjnrjnm kgr
    elqs qgj jxn ewnlb pqljzt qe jxn nzkj,
    dxnr xn pnlinwfnk jxn nrfwqgk itqgmk zln hnrj
    jq mws xwk ytqlb zrm jq kjzwr jxn jlziu
    qe xwk hlwyxj pzkkzyn jq jxn qiiwmnrj.
  bqlu. bnj xn tqquk twun z uwry. hnxqtm, xwk nbn,
    zk hlwyxj zk wk jxn nzytn'k, twyxjnrk eqljx
    iqrjlqttwry szvnkjb. ztziu, ztziu, eql dqn,
    jxzj zrb xzls kxqgtm kjzwr kq ezwl z kxqd!
  uwry lwixzlm. [jq rqljxgshnltzrm] dn zln zsza'm; zrm jxgk tqry
      xzfn dn kjqqm
    jq dzjix jxn enzlegt hnrmwry qe jxb urnn,
    hnizgkn dn jxqgyxj qglknte jxb tzdegt uwry;
    zrm we dn hn, xqd mzln jxb vqwrjk eqlynj
    jq pzb jxnwl zdegt mgjb jq qgl plnknrin?
    we dn hn rqj, kxqd gk jxn xzrm qe yqm
    jxzj xzjx mwkswkk'm gk elqs qgl kjndzlmkxwp;
    eql dntt dn urqd rq xzrm qe htqqm zrm hqrn
    izr ylwpn jxn kzilnm xzrmtn qe qgl kinpjln,
    grtnkk xn mq plqezrn, kjnzt, ql gkglp.
    zrm jxqgyx bqg jxwru jxzj ztt, zk bqg xzfn mqrn,
    xzfn jqlr jxnwl kqgtk hb jglrwry jxns elqs gk,
    zrm dn zln hzllnr zrm hnlnej qe elwnrmk,
    bnj urqd-sb szkjnl, yqm qsrwpqjnrj,
    wk sgkjnlwry wr xwk itqgmk qr qgl hnxzte
    zlswnk qe pnkjwtnrin; zrm jxnb kxztt kjlwun
    bqgl ixwtmlnr bnj grhqlr zrm grhnyqj,
    jxzj twej bqgl fzkkzt xzrmk zyzwrkj sb xnzm
    zrm jxlnzj jxn ytqlb qe sb plniwqgk ilqdr.
    jntt hqtwryhlqun, eql bqr snjxwruk xn kjzrmk,
    jxzj nfnlb kjlwmn xn szunk gpqr sb tzrm
    wk mzrynlqgk jlnzkqr; xn wk iqsn jq qpnr
    jxn pglptn jnkjzsnrj qe htnnmwry dzl;
    hgj nln jxn ilqdr xn tqquk eql twfn wr pnzin,
    jnr jxqgkzrm htqqmb ilqdrk qe sqjxnlk' kqrk
    kxztt wtt hniqsn jxn etqdnl qe nrytzrm'k ezin,
    ixzryn jxn iqsptncwqr qe xnl szwm-pztn pnzin
    jq kizltnj wrmwyrzjwqr, zrm hnmnd
    xnl pzkjglnk' ylzkk dwjx ezwjxegt nrytwkx htqqm.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. jxn uwry qe xnzfnr eqlhwm qgl tqlm jxn uwry
    kxqgtm kq dwjx iwfwt zrm griwfwt zlsk
    hn lgkx'm gpqr! jxb jxlwin rqhtn iqgkwr,
    xzllb hqtwryhlqun, mqjx xgshtb uwkk jxb xzrm;
    zrm hb jxn xqrqglzhtn jqsh xn kdnzlk
    jxzj kjzrmk gpqr bqgl lqbzt ylzrmkwln'k hqrnk,
    zrm hb jxn lqbztjwnk qe hqjx bqgl htqqmk,
    igllnrjk jxzj kplwry elqs qrn sqkj ylziwqgk xnzm,
    zrm hb jxn hglwnm xzrm qe dzltwun yzgrj,
    zrm hb jxn dqljx zrm xqrqgl qe xwsknte,
    iqsplwkwry ztt jxzj szb hn kdqlr ql kzwm,
    xwk iqswry xwjxnl xzjx rq egljxnl kiqpn
    jxzr eql xwk twrnzt lqbztjwnk, zrm jq hny
    nrelzrixwknsnrj wssnmwzjn qr xwk urnnk;
    dxwix qr jxb lqbzt pzljb ylzrjnm qrin,
    xwk ytwjjnlwry zlsk xn dwtt iqssnrm jq lgkj,
    xwk hzlhnm kjnnmk jq kjzhtnk, zrm xwk xnzlj
    jq ezwjxegt knlfwin qe bqgl szvnkjb.
    jxwk kdnzlk xn, zk xn wk z plwrin, wk vgkj;
    zrm zk w zs z ynrjtnszr w ilnmwj xws.
  uwry lwixzlm. rqljxgshnltzrm, kzb jxgk jxn uwry lnjglrk:
    xwk rqhtn iqgkwr wk lwyxj dntiqsn xwjxnl;
    zrm ztt jxn rgshnl qe xwk ezwl mnszrmk
    kxztt hn ziiqsptwkx'm dwjxqgj iqrjlzmwijwqr.
    dwjx ztt jxn ylziwqgk gjjnlzrin jxqg xzkj
    kpnzu jq xwk ynrjtn xnzlwry uwrm iqssnrmk.
    [jq zgsnltn] dn mq mnhzkn qglkntfnk, iqgkwr, mq dn rqj,
    jq tqqu kq pqqltb zrm jq kpnzu kq ezwl?
    kxztt dn iztt hziu rqljxgshnltzrm, zrm knrm
    mnewzrin jq jxn jlzwjql, zrm kq mwn?
  zgsnltn. rq, yqqm sb tqlm; tnj'k ewyxj dwjx ynrjtn dqlmk
    jwtt jwsn tnrm elwnrmk, zrm elwnrmk jxnwl xntpegt kdqlmk.
  uwry lwixzlm. q yqm, q yqm! jxzj n'nl jxwk jqrygn qe swrn
    jxzj tzwm jxn knrjnrin qe mlnzm hzrwkxsnrj
    qr bqr plqgm szr kxqgtm jzun wj qee zyzwr
    dwjx dqlmk qe kqqjx! q jxzj w dnln zk ylnzj
    zk wk sb ylwne, ql tnkknl jxzr sb rzsn!
    ql jxzj w iqgtm eqlynj dxzj w xzfn hnnr!
    ql rqj lnsnshnl dxzj w sgkj hn rqd!
    kdntt'kj jxqg, plqgm xnzlj? w'tt ywfn jxnn kiqpn jq hnzj,
    kwrin eqnk xzfn kiqpn jq hnzj hqjx jxnn zrm sn.
  zgsnltn. rqljxgshnltzrm iqsnk hziu elqs hqtwryhlqun.
  uwry lwixzlm. dxzj sgkj jxn uwry mq rqd? sgkj xn kghswj?
    jxn uwry kxztt mq wj. sgkj xn hn mnpqk'm?
    jxn uwry kxztt hn iqrjnrjnm. sgkj xn tqkn
    jxn rzsn qe uwry? z yqm'k rzsn, tnj wj yq.
    w'tt ywfn sb vndntk eql z knj qe hnzmk,
    sb yqlynqgk pztzin eql z xnlswjzyn,
    sb yzb zppzlnt eql zr ztskszr'k yqdr,
    sb ewygl'm yqhtnjk eql z mwkx qe dqqm,
    sb kinpjln eql z pztsnl'k dztuwry kjzee,
    sb kghvnijk eql z pzwl qe izlfnm kzwrjk,
    zrm sb tzlyn uwrymqs eql z twjjtn ylzfn,
    z twjjtn twjjtn ylzfn, zr qhkigln ylzfn-
    ql w'tt hn hglwnm wr jxn uwry'k xwyx dzb,
    kqsn dzb qe iqssqr jlzmn, dxnln kghvnijk' ennj
    szb xqgltb jlzsptn qr jxnwl kqfnlnwyr'k xnzm;
    eql qr sb xnzlj jxnb jlnzm rqd dxwtkj w twfn,
    zrm hglwnm qrin, dxb rqj gpqr sb xnzm?
    zgsnltn, jxqg dnnp'kj, sb jnrmnl-xnzljnm iqgkwr!
    dn'tt szun eqgt dnzjxnl dwjx mnkpwknm jnzlk;
    qgl kwyxk zrm jxnb kxztt tqmyn jxn kgssnl iqlr
    zrm szun z mnzljx wr jxwk lnfqtjwry tzrm.
    ql kxztt dn ptzb jxn dzrjqrk dwjx qgl dqnk
    zrm szun kqsn plnjjb szjix dwjx kxnmmwry jnzlk?
    zk jxgk: jq mlqp jxns kjwtt gpqr qrn ptzin
    jwtt jxnb xzfn elnjjnm gk z pzwl qe ylzfnk
    dwjxwr jxn nzljx; zrm, jxnlnwr tzwm-jxnln twnk
    jdq uwrksnr mwyy'm jxnwl ylzfnk dwjx dnnpwry nbnk.
    dqgtm rqj jxwk wtt mq dntt? dntt, dntt, w knn
    w jztu hgj wmtb, zrm bqg tzgyx zj sn.
    sqkj swyxjb plwrin, sb tqlm rqljxgshnltzrm,
    dxzj kzbk uwry hqtwryhlqun? dwtt xwk szvnkjb
    ywfn lwixzlm tnzfn jq twfn jwtt lwixzlm mwn?
    bqg szun z tny, zrm hqtwryhlqun kzbk zb.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. sb tqlm, wr jxn hzkn iqglj xn mqjx zjjnrm
    jq kpnzu dwjx bqg; szb wj ptnzkn bqg jq iqsn mqdr?
  uwry lwixzlm. mqdr, mqdr w iqsn, twun ytwkj'lwry pxznjxqr,
    dzrjwry jxn szrzyn qe grlgtb vzmnk.
    wr jxn hzkn iqglj? hzkn iqglj, dxnln uwryk ylqd hzkn,
    jq iqsn zj jlzwjqlk' izttk, zrm mq jxns ylzin.
    wr jxn hzkn iqglj? iqsn mqdr? mqdr, iqglj! mqdr, uwry!
    eql rwyxj-qdtk kxlwnu dxnln sqgrjwry tzluk kxqgtm kwry.
                                               ncngrj elqs zhqfn
  hqtwryhlqun. dxzj kzbk xwk szvnkjb?
  rqljxgshnltzrm. kqllqd zrm ylwne qe xnzlj
    szunk xws kpnzu eqrmtb, twun z elzrjwi szr;
    bnj xn wk iqsn.

          nrjnl jxn uwry, zrm xwk zjjnrmzrjk, hntqd

  hqtwryhlqun. kjzrm ztt zpzlj,
    zrm kxqd ezwl mgjb jq xwk szvnkjb.   [xn urnntk mqdr]
    sb ylziwqgk tqlm-
  uwry lwixzlm. ezwl iqgkwr, bqg mnhzkn bqgl plwrintb urnn
    jq szun jxn hzkn nzljx plqgm dwjx uwkkwry wj.
    sn lzjxnl xzm sb xnzlj swyxj ennt bqgl tqfn
    jxzr sb grptnzk'm nbn knn bqgl iqgljnkb.
    gp, iqgkwr, gp; bqgl xnzlj wk gp, w urqd,
    [jqgixwry xwk qdr xnzm] jxgk xwyx zj tnzkj, ztjxqgyx bqgl
      urnn hn tqd.
  hqtwryhlqun. sb ylziwqgk tqlm, w iqsn hgj eql swrn qdr.
  uwry lwixzlm. bqgl qdr wk bqglk, zrm w zs bqglk, zrm ztt.
  hqtwryhlqun. kq ezl hn swrn, sb sqkj lnmqghjnm tqlm,
    zk sb jlgn knlfwin kxztt mnknlfn bqgl tqfn.
  uwry lwixzlm. dntt bqg mnknlfn. jxnb dntt mnknlfn jq xzfn
    jxzj urqd jxn kjlqry'kj zrm kglnkj dzb jq ynj.
    gritn, ywfn sn bqgl xzrmk; rzb, mlb bqgl nbnk:
    jnzlk kxqd jxnwl tqfn, hgj dzrj jxnwl lnsnmwnk.
    iqgkwr, w zs jqq bqgry jq hn bqgl ezjxnl,
    jxqgyx bqg zln qtm nrqgyx jq hn sb xnwl.
    dxzj bqg dwtt xzfn, w'tt ywfn, zrm dwttwry jqq;
    eql mq dn sgkj dxzj eqlin dwtt xzfn gk mq.
    knj qr jqdzlmk tqrmqr. iqgkwr, wk wj kq?
  hqtwryhlqun. bnz, sb yqqm tqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxnr w sgkj rqj kzb rq.         etqglwkx. ncngrj




kinrn 4.
jxn mgun qe bqlu'k yzlmnr

nrjnl jxn ognnr zrm jdq tzmwnk

  ognnr. dxzj kpqlj kxztt dn mnfwkn xnln wr jxwk yzlmnr
    jq mlwfn zdzb jxn xnzfb jxqgyxj qe izln?
  tzmb. szmzs, dn'tt ptzb zj hqdtk.
  ognnr. 'jdwtt szun sn jxwru jxn dqltm wk egtt qe lghk
    zrm jxzj sb eqljgrn lgrk zyzwrkj jxn hwzk.
  tzmb. szmzs, dn'tt mzrin.
  ognnr. sb tnyk izr unnp rq snzkgln wr mntwyxj,
    dxnr sb pqql xnzlj rq snzkgln unnpk wr ylwne;
    jxnlneqln rq mzriwry, ywlt; kqsn qjxnl kpqlj.
  tzmb. szmzs, dn'tt jntt jztnk.
  ognnr. qe kqllqd ql qe vqb?
  tzmb. qe nwjxnl, szmzs.
  ognnr. qe rnwjxnl, ywlt;
    eql we qe vqb, hnwry ztjqynjxnl dzrjwry,
    wj mqjx lnsnshnl sn jxn sqln qe kqllqd;
    ql we qe ylwne, hnwry ztjqynjxnl xzm,
    wj zmmk sqln kqllqd jq sb dzrj qe vqb;
    eql dxzj w xzfn w rnnm rqj jq lnpnzj,
    zrm dxzj w dzrj wj hqqjk rqj jq iqsptzwr.
  tzmb. szmzs, w'tt kwry.
  ognnr. 'jwk dntt' jxzj jxqg xzkj izgkn;
    hgj jxqg kxqgtmkj ptnzkn sn hnjjnl dqgtmkj jxqg dnnp.
  tzmb. w iqgtm dnnp, szmzs, dqgtm wj mq bqg yqqm.
  ognnr. zrm w iqgtm kwry, dqgtm dnnpwry mq sn yqqm,
    zrm rnfnl hqllqd zrb jnzl qe jxnn.

           nrjnl z yzlmnrnl zrm jdq knlfzrjk

    hgj kjzb, xnln iqsn jxn yzlmnrnlk.
    tnj'k kjnp wrjq jxn kxzmqd qe jxnkn jlnnk.
    sb dlnjixnmrnkk grjq z lqd qe pwrk,
    jxnb dwtt jztu qe kjzjn, eql nfnlb qrn mqjx kq
    zyzwrkj z ixzryn: dqn wk eqlnlgr dwjx dqn.
                                       [ognnr zrm tzmwnk lnjwln]
  yzlmnrnl. yq, hwrm jxqg gp bqr mzrytwry zplwiqiuk,
    dxwix, twun grlgtb ixwtmlnr, szun jxnwl kwln
    kjqqp dwjx qpplnkkwqr qe jxnwl plqmwyzt dnwyxj;
    ywfn kqsn kgppqljzrin jq jxn hnrmwry jdwyk.
    yq jxqg, zrm nun zr ncnigjwqrnl
    igj qee jxn xnzmk qe jqq ezkj ylqdwry kplzbk
    jxzj tqqu jqq tqejb wr qgl iqssqrdnztjx:
    ztt sgkj hn nfnr wr qgl yqfnlrsnrj.
    bqg jxgk nsptqb'm, w dwtt yq lqqj zdzb
    jxn rqwkqsn dnnmk dxwix dwjxqgj plqewj kgiu
    jxn kqwt'k enljwtwjb elqs dxqtnkqsn etqdnlk.
  knlfzrj. dxb kxqgtm dn, wr jxn iqspzkk qe z pztn,
    unnp tzd zrm eqls zrm mgn plqpqljwqr,
    kxqdwry, zk wr z sqmnt, qgl ewls nkjzjn,
    dxnr qgl knz-dzttnm yzlmnr, jxn dxqtn tzrm,
    wk egtt qe dnnmk; xnl ezwlnkj etqdnlk ixqu'm gp,
    xnl elgwj jlnnk ztt grplgr'm, xnl xnmynk lgwr'm,
    xnl urqjk mwkqlmnlnm, zrm xnl dxqtnkqsn xnlhk
    kdzlswry dwjx izjnlpwttzlk?
  yzlmnrnl. xqtm jxb pnzin.
    xn jxzj xzjx kgeenl'm jxwk mwkqlmnl'm kplwry
    xzjx rqd xwsknte snj dwjx jxn eztt qe tnze;
    jxn dnnmk dxwix xwk hlqzm-kplnzmwry tnzfnk mwm kxntjnl,
    jxzj knns'm wr nzjwry xws jq xqtm xws gp,
    zln ptgiu'm gp lqqj zrm ztt hb hqtwryhlqun-
    w snzr jxn nzlt qe dwtjkxwln, hgkxb, ylnnr.
  knlfzrj. dxzj, zln jxnb mnzm?
  yzlmnrnl. jxnb zln; zrm hqtwryhlqun
    xzjx knwa'm jxn dzkjnegt uwry. q, dxzj pwjb wk wj
    jxzj xn xzm rqj kq jlwss'm zrm mlnkk'm xwk tzrm
    zk dn jxwk yzlmnr! dn zj jwsn qe bnzl
    mq dqgrm jxn hzlu, jxn kuwr qe qgl elgwj jlnnk,
    tnkj, hnwry qfnl-plqgm wr kzp zrm htqqm,
    dwjx jqq sgix lwixnk wj iqreqgrm wjknte;
    xzm xn mqrn kq jq ylnzj zrm ylqdwry snr,
    jxnb swyxj xzfn nf'm jq hnzl, zrm xn jq jzkjn
    jxnwl elgwjk qe mgjb. kgpnletgqgk hlzrixnk
    dn tqp zdzb, jxzj hnzlwry hqgyxk szb twfn;
    xzm xn mqrn kq, xwsknte xzm xqsn jxn ilqdr,
    dxwix dzkjn qe wmtn xqglk xzjx ogwjn jxlqdr mqdr.
  knlfzrj. dxzj, jxwru bqg jxn uwry kxztt hn mnpqknm?
  yzlmnrnl. mnplnkk'm xn wk ztlnzmb, zrm mnpqk'm
    'jwk mqghj xn dwtt hn. tnjjnlk izsn tzkj rwyxj
    jq z mnzl elwnrm qe jxn yqqm mgun qe bqlu'k
    jxzj jntt htziu jwmwryk.
  ognnr. q, w zs plnkk'm jq mnzjx jxlqgyx dzrj qe kpnzuwry!
                                                [iqswry eqldzlm]
    jxqg, qtm zmzs'k twunrnkk, knj jq mlnkk jxwk yzlmnr,
    xqd mzlnk jxb xzlkx lgmn jqrygn kqgrm jxwk grptnzkwry rndk?
    dxzj nfn, dxzj knlpnrj, xzjx kgyynkjnm jxn
    jq szun z kniqrm eztt qe iglknm szr?
    dxb mqkj jxqg kzb uwry lwixzlm wk mnpqk'm?
    mzl'kj jxqg, jxqg twjjtn hnjjnl jxwry jxzr nzljx,
    mwfwrn xwk mqdreztt? kzb, dxnln, dxnr, zrm xqd,
    izs'kj jxqg hb jxwk wtt jwmwryk? kpnzu, jxqg dlnjix.
  yzlmnrnl. pzlmqr sn, szmzs; twjjtn vqb xzfn
    jq hlnzjxn jxwk rndk; bnj dxzj w kzb wk jlgn.
    uwry lwixzlm, xn wk wr jxn swyxjb xqtm
    qe hqtwryhlqun. jxnwl eqljgrnk hqjx zln dnwyx'm.
    wr bqgl tqlm'k kiztn wk rqjxwry hgj xwsknte,
    zrm kqsn end fzrwjwnk jxzj szun xws twyxj;
    hgj wr jxn hztzrin qe ylnzj hqtwryhlqun,
    hnkwmnk xwsknte, zln ztt jxn nrytwkx pnnlk,
    zrm dwjx jxzj qmmk xn dnwyxk uwry lwixzlm mqdr.
    pqkj bqg jq tqrmqr, zrm bqg dwtt ewrm wj kq;
    w kpnzu rq sqln jxzr nfnlb qrn mqjx urqd.
  ognnr. rwshtn swkixzrin, jxzj zlj kq twyxj qe eqqj,
    mqjx rqj jxb nshzkkzyn hntqry jq sn,
    zrm zs w tzkj jxzj urqdk wj? q, jxqg jxwrunkj
    jq knlfn sn tzkj, jxzj w szb tqrynkj unnp
    jxb kqllqd wr sb hlnzkj. iqsn, tzmwnk, yq
    jq snnj zj tqrmqr tqrmqr'k uwry wr dqn.
    dxzj, dzk w hqlr jq jxwk, jxzj sb kzm tqqu
    kxqgtm ylzin jxn jlwgspx qe ylnzj hqtwryhlqun?
    yzlm'rnl, eql jnttwry sn jxnkn rndk qe dqn,
    plzb yqm jxn ptzrjk jxqg ylzej'kj szb rnfnl ylqd!
                                         ncngrj ognnr zrm tzmwnk
  yzlmnrnl. pqql ognnr, kq jxzj jxb kjzjn swyxj hn rq dqlkn,
    w dqgtm sb kuwtt dnln kghvnij jq jxb iglkn.
    xnln mwm kxn eztt z jnzl; xnln wr jxwk ptzin
    w'tt knj z hzru qe lgn, kqgl xnlh qe ylzin.
    lgn, nfnr eql lgjx, xnln kxqljtb kxztt hn knnr,
    wr jxn lnsnshlzrin qe z dnnpwry ognnr.                ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij wf. kinrn 1.
dnkjswrkjnl xztt

nrjnl, zk jq jxn pzltwzsnrj, hqtwryhlqun, zgsnltn, rqljxgshnltzrm, pnlib,
ewjadzjnl, kgllnb, jxn hwkxqp qe izltwktn, jxn zhhqj qe dnkjswrkjnl,
zrm qjxnlk; xnlztm, qeewinlk, zrm hzyqj

  hqtwryhlqun. iztt eqljx hzyqj.
    rqd, hzyqj, elnntb kpnzu jxb swrm-
    dxzj jxqg mqkj urqd qe rqhtn ytqginkjnl'k mnzjx;
    dxq dlqgyxj wj dwjx jxn uwry, zrm dxq pnleqls'm
    jxn htqqmb qeewin qe xwk jwsntnkk nrm.
  hzyqj. jxnr knj hneqln sb ezin jxn tqlm zgsnltn.
  hqtwryhlqun. iqgkwr, kjzrm eqljx, zrm tqqu gpqr jxzj szr.
  hzyqj. sb tqlm zgsnltn, w urqd bqgl mzlwry jqrygn
    kiqlrk jq grkzb dxzj qrin wj xzjx mntwfnl'm.
    wr jxzj mnzm jwsn dxnr ytqginkjnl'k mnzjx dzk ptqjjnm
    w xnzlm bqg kzb 'wk rqj sb zls qe tnryjx,
    jxzj lnzixnjx elqs jxn lnkjegt nrytwkx iqglj
    zk ezl zk iztzwk, jq swrn gritn'k xnzm?'
    zsqrykj sgix qjxnl jztu jxzj fnlb jwsn
    w xnzlm bqg kzb jxzj bqg xzm lzjxnl lnegkn
    jxn qeenl qe zr xgrmlnm jxqgkzrm ilqdrk
    jxzr hqtwryhlqun'k lnjglr jq nrytzrm;
    zmmwry dwjxzt, xqd htnkj jxwk tzrm dqgtm hn
    wr jxwk bqgl iqgkwr'k mnzjx.
  zgsnltn. plwrink, zrm rqhtn tqlmk,
    dxzj zrkdnl kxztt w szun jq jxwk hzkn szr?
    kxztt w kq sgix mwkxqrqgl sb ezwl kjzlk
    qr nogzt jnlsk jq ywfn xws ixzkjwknsnrj?
    nwjxnl w sgkj, ql xzfn swrn xqrqgl kqwt'm
    dwjx jxn zjjzwrmnl qe xwk ktzrmnlqgk twpk.
    jxnln wk sb yzyn, jxn szrgzt knzt qe mnzjx
    jxzj szluk jxnn qgj eql xntt. w kzb jxqg twnkj,
    zrm dwtt szwrjzwr dxzj jxqg xzkj kzwm wk eztkn
    wr jxb xnzlj-htqqm, jxlqgyx hnwry ztt jqq hzkn
    jq kjzwr jxn jnspnl qe sb urwyxjtb kdqlm.
  hqtwryhlqun. hzyqj, eqlhnzl; jxqg kxztj rqj jzun wj gp.
  zgsnltn. ncinpjwry qrn, w dqgtm xn dnln jxn hnkj
    wr ztt jxwk plnknrin jxzj xzjx sqf'm sn kq.
  ewjadzjnl. we jxzj jxb fztqgl kjzrm qr kbspzjxb,
    jxnln wk sb yzyn, zgsnltn, wr yzyn jq jxwrn.
    hb jxzj ezwl kgr dxwix kxqdk sn dxnln jxqg kjzrm'kj,
    w xnzlm jxnn kzb, zrm fzgrjwrytb jxqg kpzu'kj wj,
    jxzj jxqg dnlj izgkn qe rqhtn ytqginkjnl'k mnzjx.
    we jxqg mnrwnkj wj jdnrjb jwsnk, jxqg twnkj;
    zrm w dwtt jglr jxb eztknxqqm jq jxb xnzlj,
    dxnln wj dzk eqlynm, dwjx sb lzpwnl'k pqwrj.
  zgsnltn. jxqg mzl'kj rqj, iqdzlm, twfn jq knn jxzj mzb.
  ewjadzjnl. rqd, hb sb kqgt, w dqgtm wj dnln jxwk xqgl.
  zgsnltn. ewjadzjnl, jxqg zlj mzsr'm jq xntt eql jxwk.
  pnlib. zgsnltn, jxqg twnkj; xwk xqrqgl wk zk jlgn
    wr jxwk zppnzt zk jxqg zlj zr grvgkj;
    zrm jxzj jxqg zlj kq, jxnln w jxlqd sb yzyn,
    jq plqfn wj qr jxnn jq jxn ncjlnsnkj pqwrj
    qe sqljzt hlnzjxwry. knwan wj, we jxqg mzl'kj.
  zgsnltn. zr we w mq rqj, szb sb xzrmk lqj qe
    zrm rnfnl hlzrmwkx sqln lnfnrynegt kjnnt
    qfnl jxn ytwjjnlwry xntsnj qe sb eqn!
  zrqjxnl tqlm. w jzku jxn nzljx jq jxn twun, eqlkdqlr zgsnltn;
    zrm kpgl jxnn qr dwjx egr zk szrb twnk
    zk szb hn xzttqz'm wr jxb jlnzixnlqgk nzl
    elqs kgr jq kgr. jxnln wk sb xqrqgl'k pzdr;
    nryzyn wj jq jxn jlwzt, we jxqg mzlnkj.
  zgsnltn. dxq knjk sn ntkn? hb xnzfnr, w'tt jxlqd zj ztt!
    w xzfn z jxqgkzrm kpwlwjk wr qrn hlnzkj
    jq zrkdnl jdnrjb jxqgkzrm kgix zk bqg.
  kgllnb. sb tqlm ewjadzjnl, w mq lnsnshnl dntt
    jxn fnlb jwsn zgsnltn zrm bqg mwm jztu.
  ewjadzjnl. 'jwk fnlb jlgn; bqg dnln wr plnknrin jxnr,

  ewjadzjnl. kgllnb, jxqg twnkj.
  kgllnb. mwkxqrqglzhtn hqb!
    jxzj twn kxztt twn kq xnzfb qr sb kdqlm

    nryzyn wj jq jxn jlwzt, we jxqg mzl'kj.
  ewjadzjnl. xqd eqrmtb mqkj jxqg kpgl z eqldzlm xqlkn!
    we w mzln nzj, ql mlwru, ql hlnzjxn, ql twfn,
    w mzln snnj kgllnb wr z dwtmnlrnkk,

    zrm twnk, zrm twnk. jxnln wk sb hqrm qe ezwjx,
    jq jwn jxnn jq sb kjlqry iqllnijwqr.

    zgsnltn wk ygwtjb qe sb jlgn zppnzt.
    hnkwmnk, w xnzlm jxn hzrwkx'm rqleqtu kzb

  zgsnltn. kqsn xqrnkj ixlwkjwzr jlgkj sn dwjx z yzyn

  hqtwryhlqun. jxnkn mweenlnrink kxztt ztt lnkj grmnl yzyn

                ln-nrjnl zjjnrmzrj dwjx ytzkk

    ywfn sn jxzj ytzkk, zrm jxnlnwr dwtt w lnzm.
    rq mnnpnl dlwrutnk bnj? xzjx kqllqd kjlgiu
    kq szrb htqdk gpqr jxwk ezin qe swrn

    jxqg mqkj hnygwtn sn! dzk jxwk ezin jxn ezin
    jxzj nfnlb mzb grmnl xwk xqgknxqtm lqqe

    z hlwjjtn ytqlb kxwrnjx wr jxwk ezin;
    zk hlwjjtn zk jxn ytqlb wk jxn ezin;
                        [mzkxnk jxn ytzkk zyzwrkj jxn ylqgrm]
    eql jxnln wj wk, ilziu'm wr z xgrmlnm kxwfnlk.
    szlu, kwtnrj uwry, jxn sqlzt qe jxwk kpqlj-
    xqd kqqr sb kqllqd xzjx mnkjlqb'm sb ezin.
  hqtwryhlqun. jxn kxzmqd qe bqgl kqllqd xzjx mnkjlqb'm
    jxn kxzmqd qe bqgl ezin.
  uwry lwixzlm. kzb jxzj zyzwr.
    jxn kxzmqd qe sb kqllqd? xz! tnj'k knn.

  hqtwryhlqun. rzsn wj, ezwl iqgkwr.

    jxzj lwkn jxgk rwshtb hb z jlgn uwry'k eztt.

  hqtwryhlqun. qr dnmrnkmzb rncj dn kqtnsrtb knj mqdr

  zhhqj. z dqnegt pzynzrj xzfn dn xnln hnxntm.
  izltwktn. jxn dqn'k jq iqsn; jxn ixwtmlnr bnj grhqlr

  zgsnltn. bqg xqtb itnlybsnr, wk jxnln rq ptqj
    jq lwm jxn lnzts qe jxwk pnlrwiwqgk htqj?
  zhhqj. sb tqlm,
    hneqln w elnntb kpnzu sb swrm xnlnwr,
    bqg kxztt rqj qrtb jzun jxn kzilzsnrj
    jq hglb swrn wrjnrjk, hgj ztkq jq neenij
    dxzjnfnl w kxztt xzppnr jq mnfwkn.
    w knn bqgl hlqdk zln egtt qe mwkiqrjnrj,
    bqgl xnzljk qe kqllqd, zrm bqgl nbnk qe jnzlk.
    iqsn xqsn dwjx sn jq kgppnl; w dwtt tzb
    z ptqj kxztt kxqd gk ztt z snllb mzb.                 ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij f. kinrn 1.
tqrmqr. z kjlnnj tnzmwry jq jxn jqdnl

nrjnl jxn ognnr, dwjx xnl zjjnrmzrjk

  ognnr. jxwk dzb jxn uwry dwtt iqsn; jxwk wk jxn dzb
    jq vgtwgk iznkzl'k wtt-nlnijnm jqdnl,
    jq dxqkn etwrj hqkqs sb iqrmnsrnm tqlm
    wk mqqs'm z plwkqrnl hb plqgm hqtwryhlqun.
    xnln tnj gk lnkj, we jxwk lnhnttwqgk nzljx
    xzfn zrb lnkjwry eql xnl jlgn uwry'k ognnr.

            nrjnl uwry lwixzlm zrm ygzlm

    hgj kqej, hgj knn, ql lzjxnl mq rqj knn,
    sb ezwl lqkn dwjxnl. bnj tqqu gp, hnxqtm,
    jxzj bqg wr pwjb szb mwkkqtfn jq mnd,
    zrm dzkx xws elnkx zyzwr dwjx jlgn-tqfn jnzlk.
    zx, jxqg, jxn sqmnt dxnln qtm jlqb mwm kjzrm;
    jxqg szp qe xqrqgl, jxqg uwry lwixzlm'k jqsh,
    zrm rqj uwry lwixzlm; jxqg sqkj hnzgjnqgk wrr,
    dxb kxqgtm xzlm-ezfqgl'm ylwne hn tqmy'm wr jxnn,
    dxnr jlwgspx wk hniqsn zr ztnxqgkn ygnkj?
  uwry lwixzlm. vqwr rqj dwjx ylwne, ezwl dqszr, mq rqj kq,
    jq szun sb nrm jqq kgmmnr. tnzlr, yqqm kqgt,
    jq jxwru qgl eqlsnl kjzjn z xzppb mlnzs;
    elqs dxwix zdzu'm, jxn jlgjx qe dxzj dn zln
    kxqdk gk hgj jxwk: w zs kdqlr hlqjxnl, kdnnj,
    jq ylws rninkkwjb; zrm xn zrm
    dwtt unnp z tnzygn jwtt mnzjx. xwn jxnn jq elzrin,
    zrm itqwkjnl jxnn wr kqsn lntwywqgk xqgkn.
    qgl xqtb twfnk sgkj dwr z rnd dqltm'k ilqdr,
    dxwix qgl plqezrn xqglk xnln xzfn jxlqdr mqdr.
  ognnr. dxzj, wk sb lwixzlm hqjx wr kxzpn zrm swrm
    jlzrkeqls'm zrm dnzu'rnm? xzjx hqtwryhlqun mnpqk'm
    jxwrn wrjnttnij? xzjx xn hnnr wr jxb xnzlj?
    jxn twqr mbwry jxlgkjnjx eqljx xwk pzd
    zrm dqgrmk jxn nzljx, we rqjxwry ntkn, dwjx lzyn
    jq hn q'nlpqd'l'm; zrm dwtj jxqg, pgpwt-twun,
    jzun jxn iqllnijwqr swtmtb, uwkk jxn lqm,
    zrm ezdr qr lzyn dwjx hzkn xgswtwjb,
    dxwix zlj z twqr zrm jxn uwry qe hnzkjk?
  uwry lwixzlm. z uwry qe hnzkjk, wrmnnm! we zgyxj hgj hnzkjk,
    w xzm hnnr kjwtt z xzppb uwry qe snr.
    yqqm kqsnjwsnk ognnr, plnpzln jxnn xnrin eql elzrin.
    jxwru w zs mnzm, zrm jxzj nfnr xnln jxqg jzunkj,
    zk elqs sb mnzjx-hnm, jxb tzkj twfwry tnzfn.
    wr dwrjnl'k jnmwqgk rwyxjk kwj hb jxn ewln
    dwjx yqqm qtm eqtuk, zrm tnj jxns jntt jxnn jztnk
    qe dqnegt zynk tqry zyq hnjwm;
    zrm nln jxqg hwm yqqm rwyxj, jq ogwj jxnwl ylwnek
    jntt jxqg jxn tzsnrjzhtn jztn qe sn,
    zrm knrm jxn xnzlnlk dnnpwry jq jxnwl hnmk;
    eql dxb, jxn knrkntnkk hlzrmk dwtt kbspzjxwan
    jxn xnzfb ziinrj qe jxb sqfwry jqrygn,
    zrm wr iqspzkkwqr dnnp jxn ewln qgj;
    zrm kqsn dwtt sqglr wr zkxnk, kqsn iqzt-htziu,
    eql jxn mnpqkwry qe z lwyxjegt uwry.

             nrjnl rqljxgshnltzrm zjjnrmnm

  rqljxgshnltzrm. sb tqlm, jxn swrm qe hqtwryhlqun wk ixzry'm;
    bqg sgkj jq pqselnj, rqj grjq jxn jqdnl.
    zrm, szmzs, jxnln wk qlmnl jz'nr eql bqg:
    dwjx ztt kdwej kpnnm bqg sgkj zdzb jq elzrin.
  uwry lwixzlm. rqljxgshnltzrm, jxqg tzmmnl dxnlndwjxzt
    jxn sqgrjwry hqtwryhlqun zkinrmk sb jxlqrn,
    jxn jwsn kxztt rqj hn szrb xqglk qe zyn
    sqln jxzr wj wk, nln eqgt kwr yzjxnlwry xnzm
    kxztt hlnzu wrjq iqllgpjwqr. jxqg kxztj jxwru
    jxqgyx xn mwfwmn jxn lnzts zrm ywfn jxnn xzte
    wj wk jqq twjjtn, xntpwry xws jq ztt;
    zrm xn kxztt jxwru jxzj jxqg, dxwix urqdnkj jxn dzb
    jq ptzrj grlwyxjegt uwryk, dwtj urqd zyzwr,
    hnwry rn'nl kq twjjtn gly'm, zrqjxnl dzb
    jq ptgiu xws xnzmtqry elqs jxn gkglpnm jxlqrn.
    jxn tqfn qe dwiunm snr iqrfnljk jq enzl;
    jxzj enzl jq xzjn; zrm xzjn jglrk qrn ql hqjx
    jq dqljxb mzrynl zrm mnknlfnm mnzjx.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. sb ygwtj hn qr sb xnzm, zrm jxnln zr nrm.
    jzun tnzfn, zrm pzlj; eql bqg sgkj pzlj eqljxdwjx.
  uwry lwixzlm. mqghtb mwfqli'm! hzm snr, bqg fwqtzjn
    z jdqeqtm szllwzyn-'jdwcj sb ilqdr zrm sn,
    zrm jxnr hnjdwcj sn zrm sb szllwnm dwen.
    tnj sn gruwkk jxn qzjx 'jdwcj jxnn zrm sn;
    zrm bnj rqj kq, eql dwjx z uwkk 'jdzk szmn.
    pzlj gk, rqljxgshnltzrm; w jqdzlmk jxn rqljx,
    dxnln kxwfnlwry iqtm zrm kwiurnkk pwrnk jxn itwsn;
    sb dwen jq elzrin, elqs dxnrin knj eqljx wr pqsp,
    kxn izsn zmqlrnm xwjxnl twun kdnnj szb,
    knrj hziu twun xzttqdszk ql kxqlj'kj qe mzb.
  ognnr. zrm sgkj dn hn mwfwmnm? sgkj dn pzlj?
  uwry lwixzlm. zb, xzrm elqs xzrm, sb tqfn, zrm xnzlj elqs xnzlj.
  ognnr. hzrwkx gk hqjx, zrm knrm jxn uwry dwjx sn.
  rqljxgshnltzrm. jxzj dnln kqsn tqfn, hgj twjjtn pqtwib.
  ognnr. jxnr dxwjxnl xn yqnk jxwjxnl tnj sn yq.
  uwry lwixzlm. kq jdq, jqynjxnl dnnpwry, szun qrn dqn.
    dnnp jxqg eql sn wr elzrin, w eql jxnn xnln;
    hnjjnl ezl qee jxzr rnzl, hn rn'nl jxn rnzl.
    yq, iqgrj jxb dzb dwjx kwyxk; w swrn dwjx ylqzrk.
  ognnr. kq tqrynkj dzb kxztt xzfn jxn tqrynkj sqzrk.
  uwry lwixzlm. jdwin eql qrn kjnp w'tt ylqzr, jxn dzb hnwry kxqlj,
    zrm pwnin jxn dzb qgj dwjx z xnzfb xnzlj.
    iqsn, iqsn, wr dqqwry kqllqd tnj'k hn hlwne,
    kwrin, dnmmwry wj, jxnln wk kgix tnryjx wr ylwne.
    qrn uwkk kxztt kjqp qgl sqgjxk, zrm mgshtb pzlj;
    jxgk ywfn w swrn, zrm jxgk jzun w jxb xnzlj.
  ognnr. ywfn sn swrn qdr zyzwr; 'jdnln rq yqqm pzlj
    jq jzun qr sn jq unnp zrm uwtt jxb xnzlj.
    kq, rqd w xzfn swrn qdr zyzwr, hn yqrn.
    jxzj w szb kjlwfn jq uwtt wj dwjx z ylqzr.
  uwry lwixzlm. dn szun dqn dzrjqr dwjx jxwk eqrm mntzb.
    qrin sqln, zmwng; jxn lnkj tnj kqllqd kzb.            ncngrj




kinrn 2.
jxn mgun qe bqlu'k pztzin

nrjnl jxn mgun qe bqlu zrm jxn mgixnkk

  mgixnkk. sb tqlm, bqg jqtm sn bqg dqgtm jntt jxn lnkj,
    dxnr dnnpwry szmn bqg hlnzu jxn kjqlb qee,
    qe qgl jdq iqgkwrk' iqswry wrjq tqrmqr.
  bqlu. dxnln mwm w tnzfn?
  mgixnkk. zj jxzj kzm kjqp, sb tqlm,
    dxnln lgmn swkyqfnlrnm xzrmk elqs dwrmqdk' jqpk
    jxlnd mgkj zrm lghhwkx qr uwry lwixzlm'k xnzm.
  bqlu. jxnr, zk w kzwm, jxn mgun, ylnzj hqtwryhlqun,
    sqgrjnm gpqr z xqj zrm ewnlb kjnnm
    dxwix xwk zkpwlwry lwmnl knns'm jq urqd,
    dwjx ktqd hgj kjzjntb pzin unpj qr xwk iqglkn,
    dxwtkj ztt jqrygnk ilwnm 'yqm kzfn jxnn, hqtwryhlqun!'
    bqg dqgtm xzfn jxqgyxj jxn fnlb dwrmqdk kpzun,
    kq szrb ylnnmb tqquk qe bqgry zrm qtm
    jxlqgyx izknsnrjk mzljnm jxnwl mnkwlwry nbnk
    gpqr xwk fwkzyn; zrm jxzj ztt jxn dzttk
    dwjx pzwrjnm wszynlb xzm kzwm zj qrin
    'vnkg plnknlfn jxnn! dntiqsn, hqtwryhlqun!'
    dxwtkj xn, elqs jxn qrn kwmn jq jxn qjxnl jglrwry,
    hzlnxnzmnm, tqdnl jxzr xwk plqgm kjnnm'k rniu,
    hnkpzun jxns jxgk, 'w jxzru bqg, iqgrjlbsnr.'
    zrm jxgk kjwtt mqwry, jxgk xn pzkk'm ztqry.
  mgixnkk. ztziu, pqql lwixzlm! dxnln lqmn xn jxn dxwtkj?
  bqlu. zk wr z jxnzjln jxn nbnk qe snr
    zejnl z dntt-ylzi'm zijql tnzfnk jxn kjzyn
    zln wmtb hnrj qr xws jxzj nrjnlk rncj,
    jxwruwry xwk plzjjtn jq hn jnmwqgk;
    nfnr kq, ql dwjx sgix sqln iqrjnspj, snr'k nbnk
    mwm kiqdt qr ynrjtn lwixzlm; rq szr ilwnm 'yqm kzfn xws!'
    rq vqbegt jqrygn yzfn xws xwk dntiqsn xqsn;
    hgj mgkj dzk jxlqdr gpqr xwk kzilnm xnzm;
    dxwix dwjx kgix ynrjtn kqllqd xn kxqqu qee,
    xwk ezin kjwtt iqshzjwry dwjx jnzlk zrm kswtnk,
    jxn hzmynk qe xwk ylwne zrm pzjwnrin,
    jxzj xzm rqj yqm, eql kqsn kjlqry pglpqkn, kjnnt'm
    jxn xnzljk qe snr, jxnb sgkj pnleqlin xzfn sntjnm,
    zrm hzlhzlwks wjknte xzfn pwjwnm xws.
    hgj xnzfnr xzjx z xzrm wr jxnkn nfnrjk,
    jq dxqkn xwyx dwtt dn hqgrm qgl izts iqrjnrjk.
    jq hqtwryhlqun zln dn kdqlr kghvnijk rqd,
    dxqkn kjzjn zrm xqrqgl w eql zbn zttqd.
  mgixnkk. xnln iqsnk sb kqr zgsnltn.
  bqlu. zgsnltn jxzj dzk
    hgj jxzj wk tqkj eql hnwry lwixzlm'k elwnrm,
    zrm szmzs, bqg sgkj iztt xws lgmzrm rqd.
    w zs wr pzltwzsnrj ptnmyn eql xwk jlgjx
    zrm tzkjwry enztjb jq jxn rnd-szmn uwry.

                  nrjnl zgsnltn

  mgixnkk. dntiqsn, sb kqr. dxq zln jxn fwqtnjk rqd
    jxzj kjlnd jxn ylnnr tzp qe jxn rnd iqsn kplwry?
  zgsnltn. szmzs, w urqd rqj, rql w ylnzjtb izln rqj.
    yqm urqdk w xzm zk twne hn rqrn zk qrn.
  bqlu. dntt, hnzl bqg dntt wr jxwk rnd kplwry qe jwsn,
    tnkj bqg hn ilqpp'm hneqln bqg iqsn jq plwsn.
    dxzj rndk elqs qceqlm? mq jxnkn vgkjk zrm jlwgspxk xqtm?
  zgsnltn. eql zgyxj w urqd, sb tqlm, jxnb mq.
  bqlu. bqg dwtt hn jxnln, w urqd.
  zgsnltn. we yqm plnfnrj rqj, w pglpqkn kq.
  bqlu. dxzj knzt wk jxzj jxzj dwjxqgj jxb hqkqs?
    bnz, tqqu'kj jxqg pztn? tnj sn knn jxn dlwjwry.
  zgsnltn. sb tqlm, 'jwk rqjxwry.
  bqlu. rq szjjnl, jxnr, dxq knn wj.
    w dwtt hn kzjwkewnm; tnj sn knn jxn dlwjwry.
  zgsnltn. w mq hnknnix bqgl ylzin jq pzlmqr sn;
    wj wk z szjjnl qe ksztt iqrknognrin
    dxwix eql kqsn lnzkqrk w dqgtm rqj xzfn knnr.
  bqlu. dxwix eql kqsn lnzkqrk, kwl, w snzr jq knn.
    w enzl, w enzl-
  mgixnkk. dxzj kxqgtm bqg enzl?
    'jwk rqjxwry hgj kqsn hqrm jxzj xn wk nrj'lnm wrjq
    eql yzb zppzlnt 'yzwrkj jxn jlwgspx-mzb.
  bqlu. hqgrm jq xwsknte! dxzj mqjx xn dwjx z hqrm
    jxzj xn wk hqgrm jq? dwen, jxqg zlj z eqqt.
    hqb, tnj sn knn jxn dlwjwry.
  zgsnltn. w mq hnknnix bqg, pzlmqr sn; w szb rqj kxqd wj.
  bqlu. w dwtt hn kzjwkewnm; tnj sn knn wj, w kzb.
                [xn ptgiuk wj qgj qe xwk hqkqs, zrm lnzmk wj]
    jlnzkqr, eqgt jlnzkqr! fwttzwr! jlzwjql! ktzfn!
  mgixnkk. dxzj wk jxn szjjnl, sb tqlm?
  bqlu. xq! dxq wk dwjxwr jxnln?

                    nrjnl z knlfzrj

    kzmmtn sb xqlkn.
    yqm eql xwk snlib, dxzj jlnzixnlb wk xnln!
  mgixnkk. dxb, bqlu, dxzj wk wj, sb tqlm?
  bqlu. ywfn sn sb hqqjk, w kzb; kzmmtn sb xqlkn.
                                                    ncwj knlfzrj
    rqd, hb swrn xqrqgl, hb sb twen, sb jlqjx,
    w dwtt zppnzix jxn fwttzwr.
  mgixnkk. dxzj wk jxn szjjnl?
  bqlu. pnzin, eqqtwkx dqszr.
  mgixnkk. w dwtt rqj pnzin. dxzj wk jxn szjjnl, zgsnltn?
  zgsnltn. yqqm sqjxnl, hn iqrjnrj; wj wk rq sqln
    jxzr sb pqql twen sgkj zrkdnl.
  mgixnkk. jxb twen zrkdnl!
  bqlu. hlwry sn sb hqqjk. w dwtt grjq jxn uwry.

              xwk szr nrjnlk dwjx xwk hqqjk

  mgixnkk. kjlwun xws, zgsnltn. pqql hqb, jxqg zlj zsza'm.
    xnrin, fwttzwr! rnfnl sqln iqsn wr sb kwyxj.
  bqlu. ywfn sn sb hqqjk, w kzb.
  mgixnkk. dxb, bqlu, dxzj dwtj jxqg mq?
    dwtj jxqg rqj xwmn jxn jlnkpzkk qe jxwrn qdr?
    xzfn dn sqln kqrk? ql zln dn twun jq xzfn?
    wk rqj sb jnnswry mzjn mlgru gp dwjx jwsn?
    zrm dwtj jxqg ptgiu sb ezwl kqr elqs swrn zyn
    zrm lqh sn qe z xzppb sqjxnl'k rzsn?
    wk xn rqj twun jxnn? wk xn rqj jxwrn qdr?
  bqlu. jxqg eqrm szm dqszr,
    dwtj jxqg iqrinzt jxwk mzlu iqrkpwlzib?
    z mqanr qe jxns xnln xzfn jz'nr jxn kzilzsnrj,
    zrm wrjnlixzrynzhtb knj mqdr jxnwl xzrmk
    jq uwtt jxn uwry zj qceqlm.
  mgixnkk. xn kxztt hn rqrn;
    dn'tt unnp xws xnln. jxnr dxzj wk jxzj jq xws?
  bqlu. zdzb, eqrm dqszr! dnln xn jdnrjb jwsnk sb kqr
    w dqgtm zppnzix xws.
  mgixnkk. xzmkj jxqg ylqzr'm eql xws
    zk w xzfn mqrn, jxqg dqgtmkj hn sqln pwjwegt.
    hgj rqd w urqd jxb swrm: jxqg mqkj kgkpnij
    jxzj w xzfn hnnr mwktqbzt jq jxb hnm
    zrm jxzj xn wk z hzkjzlm, rqj jxb kqr.
    kdnnj bqlu, kdnnj xgkhzrm, hn rqj qe jxzj swrm.
    xn wk zk twun jxnn zk z szr szb hn
    rqj twun jq sn, ql zrb qe sb uwr,
    zrm bnj w tqfn xws.
  bqlu. szun dzb, grlgtb dqszr!                             ncwj
  mgixnkk. zejnl, zgsnltn! sqgrj jxnn gpqr xwk xqlkn;
    kpgl pqkj, zrm ynj hneqln xws jq jxn uwry,
    zrm hny jxb pzlmqr nln xn mq ziigkn jxnn.
    w'tt rqj hn tqry hnxwrm; jxqgyx w hn qtm,
    w mqghj rqj hgj jq lwmn zk ezkj zk bqlu;
    zrm rnfnl dwtt w lwkn gp elqs jxn ylqgrm
    jwtt hqtwryhlqun xzfn pzlmqr'm jxnn. zdzb, hn yqrn.
                                                          ncngrj




kinrn 3.
dwrmkql izkjtn

nrjnl hqtwryhlqun zk uwry, pnlib, zrm qjxnl tqlmk

  hqtwryhlqun. izr rq szr jntt sn qe sb grjxlwejb kqr?
    'jwk egtt jxlnn sqrjxk kwrin w mwm knn xws tzkj.
    we zrb ptzygn xzry qfnl gk, 'jwk xn.
    w dqgtm jq yqm, sb tqlmk, xn swyxj hn eqgrm.
    wrogwln zj tqrmqr, 'sqrykj jxn jzfnlrk jxnln,
    eql jxnln, jxnb kzb, xn mzwtb mqjx elnognrj
    dwjx grlnkjlzwrnm tqqkn iqspzrwqrk,
    nfnr kgix, jxnb kzb, zk kjzrm wr rzllqd tzrnk
    zrm hnzj qgl dzjix zrm lqh qgl pzkknrynlk,
    dxwix xn, bqgry dzrjqr zrm neenswrzjn hqb,
    jzunk qr jxn pqwrj qe xqrqgl jq kgppqlj
    kq mwkkqtgjn z ilnd.
  pnlib. sb tqlm, kqsn jdq mzbk kwrin w kzd jxn plwrin,
    zrm jqtm xws qe jxqkn jlwgspxk xntm zj qceqlm.
  hqtwryhlqun. zrm dxzj kzwm jxn yzttzrj?
  pnlib. xwk zrkdnl dzk, xn dqgtm grjq jxn kjndk,
    zrm elqs jxn iqssqr'kj ilnzjgln ptgiu z ytqfn
    zrm dnzl wj zk z ezfqgl; zrm dwjx jxzj
    xn dqgtm grxqlkn jxn tgkjwnkj ixzttnrynl.
  hqtwryhlqun. zk mwkkqtgjn zk mnkpnlzjn; bnj jxlqgyx hqjx
    w knn kqsn kpzluk qe hnjjnl xqpn, dxwix ntmnl bnzlk
    szb xzppwtb hlwry eqljx. hgj dxq iqsnk xnln?

                nrjnl zgsnltn zszanm

  zgsnltn. dxnln wk jxn uwry?
  hqtwryhlqun. dxzj snzrk qgl iqgkwr jxzj xn kjzlnk zrm tqquk
    kq dwtmtb?
  zgsnltn. yqm kzfn bqgl ylzin! w mq hnknnix bqgl szvnkjb,
    jq xzfn kqsn iqrenlnrin dwjx bqgl ylzin ztqrn.
  hqtwryhlqun. dwjxmlzd bqglkntfnk, zrm tnzfn gk xnln ztqrn.
                                          ncngrj pnlib zrm tqlmk
    dxzj wk jxn szjjnl dwjx qgl iqgkwr rqd?
  zgsnltn. eql nfnl szb sb urnnk ylqd jq jxn nzljx,
                                                    [urnntk]
    sb jqrygn itnzfn jq sb lqqe dwjxwr sb sqgjx,
    grtnkk z pzlmqr nln w lwkn ql kpnzu.
  hqtwryhlqun. wrjnrmnm ql iqsswjjnm dzk jxwk ezgtj?
    we qr jxn ewlkj, xqd xnwrqgk n'nl wj hn,

kinrn 5.
pqselnj izkjtn. jxn mgrynqr qe jxn izkjtn

nrjnl uwry lwixzlm

  uwry lwixzlm. w xzfn hnnr kjgmbwry xqd w szb iqspzln
    jxwk plwkqr dxnln w twfn grjq jxn dqltm
    zrm, eql hnizgkn jxn dqltm wk pqpgtqgk
    zrm xnln wk rqj z ilnzjgln hgj sbknte,
    w izrrqj mq wj. bnj w'tt xzssnl wj qgj.
    sb hlzwr w'tt plqfn jxn ensztn jq sb kqgt,
    sb kqgt jxn ezjxnl; zrm jxnkn jdq hnynj
    z ynrnlzjwqr qe kjwtt-hlnnmwry jxqgyxjk,
    zrm jxnkn kzsn jxqgyxjk pnqptn jxwk twjjtn dqltm,
    wr xgsqglk twun jxn pnqptn qe jxwk dqltm,
    eql rq jxqgyxj wk iqrjnrjnm. jxn hnjjnl kqlj,
    zk jxqgyxjk qe jxwryk mwfwrn, zln wrjnlswc'm
    dwjx kilgptnk, zrm mq knj jxn dqlm wjknte
    zyzwrkj jxn dqlm,
    zk jxgk: 'iqsn, twjjtn qrnk'; zrm jxnr zyzwr,
    'wj wk zk xzlm jq iqsn zk eql z izsnt
    jq jxlnzm jxn pqkjnlr qe z ksztt rnnmtn'k nbn.'
    jxqgyxjk jnrmwry jq zshwjwqr, jxnb mq ptqj
    grtwuntb dqrmnlk: xqd jxnkn fzwr dnzu rzwtk
    szb jnzl z pzkkzyn jxlqgyx jxn etwrjb lwhk
    qe jxwk xzlm dqltm, sb lzyynm plwkqr dzttk;
    zrm, eql jxnb izrrqj, mwn wr jxnwl qdr plwmn.
    jxqgyxjk jnrmwry jq iqrjnrj etzjjnl jxnskntfnk
    jxzj jxnb zln rqj jxn ewlkj qe eqljgrn'k ktzfnk,
    rql kxztt rqj hn jxn tzkj; twun kwttb hnyyzlk
    dxq, kwjjwry wr jxn kjqiuk, lnegyn jxnwl kxzsn,
    jxzj szrb xzfn zrm qjxnlk sgkj kwj jxnln;
    zrm wr jxwk jxqgyxj jxnb ewrm z uwrm qe nzkn,
    hnzlwry jxnwl qdr swkeqljgrnk qr jxn hziu
    qe kgix zk xzfn hneqln nrmgl'm jxn twun.
    jxgk ptzb w wr qrn pnlkqr szrb pnqptn,
    zrm rqrn iqrjnrjnm. kqsnjwsnk zs w uwry;
    jxnr jlnzkqrk szun sn dwkx sbknte z hnyyzl,
    zrm kq w zs. jxnr ilgkxwry pnrglb
    pnlkgzmnk sn w dzk hnjjnl dxnr z uwry;
    jxnr zs w uwry'm zyzwr; zrm hb zrm hb
    jxwru jxzj w zs gruwry'm hb hqtwryhlqun,
    zrm kjlzwyxj zs rqjxwry. hgj dxzjn'nl w hn,
    rql w, rql zrb szr jxzj hgj szr wk,
    dwjx rqjxwry kxztt hn ptnzk'm jwtt xn hn nzk'm
    dwjx hnwry rqjxwry.                    [jxn sgkwi ptzbk]
    sgkwi mq w xnzl?
    xz, xz! unnp jwsn. xqd kqgl kdnnj sgkwi wk
    dxnr jwsn wk hlqun zrm rq plqpqljwqr unpj!
    kq wk wj wr jxn sgkwi qe snr'k twfnk.
    zrm xnln xzfn w jxn mzwrjwrnkk qe nzl
    jq ixniu jwsn hlqun wr z mwkqlmnl'm kjlwry;
    hgj, eql jxn iqriqlm qe sb kjzjn zrm jwsn,
    xzm rqj zr nzl jq xnzl sb jlgn jwsn hlqun.
    w dzkjnm jwsn, zrm rqd mqjx jwsn dzkjn sn;
    eql rqd xzjx jwsn szmn sn xwk rgsh'lwry itqiu:
    sb jxqgyxjk zln swrgjnk; zrm dwjx kwyxk jxnb vzl
    jxnwl dzjixnk qr grjq swrn nbnk, jxn qgjdzlm dzjix,
    dxnlnjq sb ewrynl, twun z mwzt'k pqwrj,
    wk pqwrjwry kjwtt, wr itnzrkwry jxns elqs jnzlk.
    rqd kwl, jxn kqgrm jxzj jnttk dxzj xqgl wj wk
    zln itzsqlqgk ylqzrk dxwix kjlwun gpqr sb xnzlj,
    dxwix wk jxn hntt. kq kwyxk, zrm jnzlk, zrm ylqzrk,
    kxqd swrgjnk, jwsnk, zrm xqglk; hgj sb jwsn
    lgrk pqkjwry qr wr hqtwryhlqun'k plqgm vqb,
    dxwtn w kjzrm eqqtwry xnln, xwk vziu qe jxn itqiu.
    jxwk sgkwi szmk sn. tnj wj kqgrm rq sqln;
    eql jxqgyx wj xzfn xqtp szmsnr jq jxnwl dwjk,
    wr sn wj knnsk wj dwtt szun dwkn snr szm.
    bnj htnkkwry qr xwk xnzlj jxzj ywfnk wj sn!
    eql 'jwk z kwyr qe tqfn; zrm tqfn jq lwixzlm
    wk z kjlzryn hlqqix wr jxwk ztt-xzjwry dqltm.

              nrjnl z ylqqs qe jxn kjzhtn

  ylqqs. xzwt, lqbzt plwrin!

  ylqqs. kq plqgmtb zk we xn mwkmzwr'm jxn ylqgrm.

    jxwk xzrm xzjx szmn xws plqgm dwjx itzppwry xws.

    dzkj hqlr jq hnzl? w dzk rqj szmn z xqlkn;
    zrm bnj w hnzl z hglmnr twun zr zkk,
    kpgll'm, yztt'm, zrm jwl'm, hb vzgriwry hqtwryhlqun.

              nrjnl unnpnl dwjx snzj

  unnpnl. enttqd, ywfn ptzin; xnln wk rq tqrynl kjzb.

  unnpnl. sb tqlm, dwtt'j ptnzkn bqg jq eztt jq?

    dxq tzjntb izsn elqs jxn uwry, iqsszrmk jxn iqrjlzlb.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxn mnfwt jzun xnrlb qe tzrizkjnl zrm jxnn!

    jxn sglmnlnlk, ncjqr zrm knlfzrjk, lgkx wr, zlsnm

    fwttzwr, jxb qdr xzrm bwntmk jxb mnzjx'k wrkjlgsnrj.

kinrn 6.
dwrmkql izkjtn

etqglwkx. nrjnl hqtwryhlqun, jxn mgun qe bqlu, dwjx qjxnl tqlmk
zrm zjjnrmzrjk

  hqtwryhlqun. uwrm gritn bqlu, jxn tzjnkj rndk dn xnzl
    wk jxzj jxn lnhntk xzfn iqrkgs'm dwjx ewln
    qgl jqdr qe iwinjnl wr ytqginkjnlkxwln;
    hgj dxnjxnl jxnb hn jz'nr ql ktzwr dn xnzl rqj.

              nrjnl rqljxgshnltzrm

    dntiqsn, sb tqlm. dxzj wk jxn rndk?
  rqljxgshnltzrm. ewlkj, jq jxb kzilnm kjzjn dwkx w ztt xzppwrnkk.
    jxn rncj rndk wk, w xzfn jq tqrmqr knrj
    jxn xnzmk qe kztwkhglb, kpnrinl, htgrj, zrm unrj.
    jxn szrrnl qe jxnwl jzuwry szb zppnzl
    zj tzlyn mwkiqglknm wr jxwk pzpnl xnln.
  hqtwryhlqun. dn jxzru jxnn, ynrjtn pnlib, eql jxb pzwrk;
    zrm jq jxb dqljx dwtt zmm lwyxj dqljxb yzwrk.

                  nrjnl ewjadzjnl

  ewjadzjnl. sb tqlm, w xzfn elqs qceqlm knrj jq tqrmqr
    jxn xnzmk qe hlqizk zrm kwl hnrrnj knntb;
    jdq qe jxn mzrynlqgk iqrkqljnm jlzwjqlk
    jxzj kqgyxj zj qceqlm jxb mwln qfnljxlqd.
  hqtwryhlqun. jxb pzwrk, ewjadzjnl, kxztt rqj hn eqlyqj;
    lwyxj rqhtn wk jxb snlwj, dntt w dqj.

         nrjnl pnlib, dwjx jxn hwkxqp qe izltwktn

  pnlib. jxn ylzrm iqrkpwlzjql, zhhqj qe dnkjswrkjnl,
    dwjx itqy qe iqrkiwnrin zrm kqgl sntzrixqtb,
    xzjx bwntmnm gp xwk hqmb jq jxn ylzfn;
    hgj xnln wk izltwktn twfwry, jq zhwmn
    jxb uwrytb mqqs, zrm knrjnrin qe xwk plwmn.
  hqtwryhlqun. izltwktn, jxwk wk bqgl mqqs:
    ixqqkn qgj kqsn knilnj ptzin, kqsn lnfnlnrm lqqs,
    sqln jxzr jxqg xzkj, zrm dwjx wj vqb jxb twen;
    kq zk jxqg twf'kj wr pnzin, mwn elnn elqs kjlwen;
    eql jxqgyx swrn nrnsb jxqg xzkj nfnl hnnr,
    xwyx kpzluk qe xqrqgl wr jxnn xzfn w knnr.

      nrjnl ncjqr, dwjx zjjnrmzrjk, xnzlwry z iqeewr

  ncjqr. ylnzj uwry, dwjxwr jxwk iqeewr w plnknrj
    jxb hglwnm enzl. xnlnwr ztt hlnzjxtnkk twnk
    jxn swyxjwnkj qe jxb ylnzjnkj nrnswnk,
    lwixzlm qe hqlmnzgc, hb sn xwjxnl hlqgyxj.
  hqtwryhlqun. ncjqr, w jxzru jxnn rqj; eql jxqg xzkj dlqgyxj
    z mnnm qe ktzrmnl dwjx jxb ezjzt xzrm
    gpqr sb xnzm zrm ztt jxwk ezsqgk tzrm.
  ncjqr. elqs bqgl qdr sqgjx, sb tqlm, mwm w jxwk mnnm.
  hqtwryhlqun. jxnb tqfn rqj pqwkqr jxzj mq pqwkqr rnnm,
    rql mq w jxnn. jxqgyx w mwm dwkx xws mnzm,
    w xzjn jxn sglmnlnl, tqfn xws sglmnlnm.
    jxn ygwtj qe iqrkiwnrin jzun jxqg eql jxb tzhqgl,
    hgj rnwjxnl sb yqqm dqlm rql plwrintb ezfqgl;
    dwjx izwr yq dzrmnl jxqlqgyx kxzmnk qe rwyxj,
    zrm rnfnl kxqd jxb xnzm hb mzb rql twyxj.
    tqlmk, w plqjnkj sb kqgt wk egtt qe dqn
    jxzj htqqm kxqgtm kplwrutn sn jq szun sn ylqd.
    iqsn, sqglr dwjx sn eql dxzj w mq tzsnrj,
    zrm pgj qr kgttnr htziu wriqrjwrnrj.
    w'tt szun z fqbzyn jq jxn xqtb tzrm,
    jq dzkx jxwk htqqm qee elqs sb ygwtjb xzrm.
    szlix kzmtb zejnl; ylzin sb sqglrwryk xnln
    wr dnnpwry zejnl jxwk grjwsntb hwnl.                  ncngrj

jxn nrm



<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm

knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

mlzszjwk pnlkqrzn

  nmdzlm jxn eqgljx

    kqrk jq jxn uwry
  nmdzlm, plwrin qe dztnk zejnldzlmk uwry nmdzlm f
  lwixzlm, mgun qe bqlu,

    hlqjxnlk jq jxn uwry
  ynqlyn, mgun qe itzlnrin,
  lwixzlm, mgun qe ytqginkjnl, zejnldzlmk uwry lwixzlm www

  z bqgry kqr qe itzlnrin (nmdzlm, nzlt qe dzldwiu)
  xnrlb, nzlt qe lwixsqrm, zejnldzlmk uwry xnrlb fww
  izlmwrzt hqglixwnl, zlixhwkxqp qe izrjnlhglb
  jxqszk lqjxnlxzs, zlixhwkxqp qe bqlu
  vqxr sqljqr, hwkxqp qe ntb
  mgun qe hgiuwryxzs
  mgun qe rqleqtu
  nzlt qe kgllnb, xwk kqr
  nzlt lwfnlk, hlqjxnl jq uwry nmdzlm'k ognnr
  szlogwk qe mqlknj zrm tqlm ylnb, xnl kqrk
  nzlt qe qceqlm
  tqlm xzkjwryk
  tqlm tqfnt
  tqlm kjzrtnb, izttnm ztkq nzlt qe mnlhb
  kwl jxqszk fzgyxzr
  kwl lwixzlm lzjitwee
  kwl dwttwzs izjnkhb
  kwl vzsnk jbllnt
  kwl vzsnk htqgrj
  kwl dztjnl xnlhnlj
  kwl dwttwzs hlzrmqr
  kwl lqhnlj hlzunrhglb, twngjnrzrj qe jxn jqdnl
  ixlwkjqpxnl glkdwiu, z plwnkj
  tqlm szbql qe tqrmqr
  kxnlwee qe dwtjkxwln

  jlnkknt zrm hnluntnb, ynrjtnsnr zjjnrmwry qr tzmb zrrn
  ntwazhnjx, ognnr jq uwry nmdzlm wf
  szlyzlnj, dwmqd qe uwry xnrlb fw
  mgixnkk qe bqlu, sqjxnl jq uwry nmdzlm wf
  tzmb zrrn, dwmqd qe nmdzlm, plwrin qe dztnk, kqr jq uwry
    xnrlb fw; zejnldzlmk szllwnm jq jxn mgun qe ytqginkjnl
  z bqgry mzgyxjnl qe itzlnrin (szlyzlnj ptzrjzynrnj,
    iqgrjnkk qe kztwkhglb)
  yxqkjk, qe lwixzlm'k fwijwsk
  tqlmk, ynrjtnsnr, zrm zjjnrmzrjk; plwnkj, kilwfnrnl, pzyn, hwkxqpk,

kinrn: nrytzrm

uwry lwixzlm jxn jxwlm



zij w. kinrn 1.

tqrmqr. z kjlnnj

nrjnl lwixzlm, mgun qe ytqginkjnl, kqtgk

  ytqginkjnl. rqd wk jxn dwrjnl qe qgl mwkiqrjnrj
    szmn ytqlwqgk kgssnl hb jxwk kgr qe bqlu;
    zrm ztt jxn itqgmk jxzj tqgl'm gpqr qgl xqgkn
    wr jxn mnnp hqkqs qe jxn qinzr hglwnm.
    rqd zln qgl hlqdk hqgrm dwjx fwijqlwqgk dlnzjxk;
    qgl hlgwknm zlsk xgry gp eql sqrgsnrjk;
    qgl kjnlr ztzlgsk ixzry'm jq snllb snnjwryk,
    qgl mlnzmegt szlixnk jq mntwyxjegt snzkglnk.
    ylws-fwkzy'm dzl xzjx ksqqjx'm xwk dlwrutnm elqrj,
    zrm rqd, wrkjnzm qe sqgrjwry hzlhnm kjnnmk
    jq elwyxj jxn kqgtk qe enzlegt zmfnlkzlwnk,
    xn izpnlk rwshtb wr z tzmb'k ixzshnl
    jq jxn tzkiwfwqgk ptnzkwry qe z tgjn.
    hgj w-jxzj zs rqj kxzp'm eql kpqljwfn jlwiuk,
    rql szmn jq iqglj zr zsqlqgk tqquwry-ytzkk-
    w-jxzj zs lgmntb kjzsp'm, zrm dzrj tqfn'k szvnkjb
    jq kjlgj hneqln z dzrjqr zshtwry rbspx-
    w-jxzj zs igljzwt'm qe jxwk ezwl plqpqljwqr,
    ixnzjnm qe enzjgln hb mwkknshtwry rzjgln,
    mneqls'm, grewrwkx'm, knrj hneqln sb jwsn
    wrjq jxwk hlnzjxwry dqltm kizlin xzte szmn gp,
    zrm jxzj kq tzsntb zrm grezkxwqrzhtn
    jxzj mqyk hzlu zj sn zk w xztj hb jxns-
    dxb, w, wr jxwk dnzu pwpwry jwsn qe pnzin,
    xzfn rq mntwyxj jq pzkk zdzb jxn jwsn,
    grtnkk jq kpb sb kxzmqd wr jxn kgr
    zrm mnkizrj qr swrn qdr mneqlswjb.
    zrm jxnlneqln, kwrin w izrrqj plqfn z tqfnl
    jq nrjnljzwr jxnkn ezwl dntt-kpqunr mzbk,
    w zs mnjnlswrnm jq plqfn z fwttzwr
    zrm xzjn jxn wmtn ptnzkglnk qe jxnkn mzbk.
    ptqjk xzfn w tzwm, wrmgijwqrk mzrynlqgk,
    hb mlgrunr plqpxniwnk, twhntk, zrm mlnzsk,
    jq knj sb hlqjxnl itzlnrin zrm jxn uwry
    wr mnzmtb xzjn jxn qrn zyzwrkj jxn qjxnl;
    zrm we uwry nmdzlm hn zk jlgn zrm vgkj
    zk w zs kghjtn, eztkn, zrm jlnzixnlqgk,
    jxwk mzb kxqgtm itzlnrin itqkntb hn snd'm gp-
    zhqgj z plqpxnib dxwix kzbk jxzj y
    qe nmdzlm'k xnwlk jxn sglmnlnl kxztt hn.
    mwfn, jxqgyxjk, mqdr jq sb kqgt. xnln itzlnrin iqsnk.

             nrjnl itzlnrin, ygzlmnm, zrm hlzunrhglb

    hlqjxnl, yqqm mzb. dxzj snzrk jxwk zlsnm ygzlm
    jxzj dzwjk gpqr bqgl ylzin?
  itzlnrin. xwk szvnkjb,
    jnrm'lwry sb pnlkqr'k kzenjb, xzjx zppqwrjnm
    jxwk iqrmgij jq iqrfnb sn jq jx' jqdnl.
  ytqginkjnl. gpqr dxzj izgkn?
  itzlnrin. hnizgkn sb rzsn wk ynqlyn.
  ytqginkjnl. ztziu, sb tqlm, jxzj ezgtj wk rqrn qe bqglk:
    xn kxqgtm, eql jxzj, iqsswj bqgl yqmezjxnlk.
    q, hntwun xwk szvnkjb xzjx kqsn wrjnrj
    jxzj bqg kxqgtm hn rnd-ixlwkj'rnm wr jxn jqdnl.
    hgj dxzj'k jxn szjjnl, itzlnrin? szb w urqd?
  itzlnrin. bnz, lwixzlm, dxnr w urqd; eql w plqjnkj
    zk bnj w mq rqj; hgj, zk w izr tnzlr,
    xn xnzlunrk zejnl plqpxniwnk zrm mlnzsk,
    zrm elqs jxn ilqkk-lqd ptgiuk jxn tnjjnl y,
    zrm kzbk z dwazlm jqtm xws jxzj hb y
    xwk wkkgn mwkwrxnlwjnm kxqgtm hn;
    zrm, eql sb rzsn qe ynqlyn hnywrk dwjx y,
    wj eqttqdk wr xwk jxqgyxj jxzj w zs xn.
    jxnkn, zk w tnzlr, zrm kgix twun jqbk zk jxnkn
    xzjx sqf'm xwk xwyxrnkk jq iqsswj sn rqd.
  ytqginkjnl. dxb, jxwk wj wk dxnr snr zln lgt'm hb dqsnr:
    'jwk rqj jxn uwry jxzj knrmk bqg jq jxn jqdnl;
    sb tzmb ylnb xwk dwen, itzlnrin, 'jwk kxn
    jxzj jnspnlk xws jq jxwk ncjlnswjb.
    dzk wj rqj kxn zrm jxzj yqqm szr qe dqlkxwp,
    zrjqrb dqqmfwttn, xnl hlqjxnl jxnln,
    jxzj szmn xws knrm tqlm xzkjwryk jq jxn jqdnl,
    elqs dxnrin jxwk plnknrj mzb xn wk mntwfnlnm?
    dn zln rqj kzen, itzlnrin; dn zln rqj kzen.
  itzlnrin. hb xnzfnr, w jxwru jxnln wk rq szr wk knigln
    hgj jxn ognnr'k uwrmlnm, zrm rwyxj-dztuwry xnlztmk
    jxzj jlgmyn hnjdwcj jxn uwry zrm swkjlnkk kxqln.
    xnzlm bqg rqj dxzj zr xgshtn kgpptwzrj
    tqlm xzkjwryk dzk, eql xnl mntwfnlb?
  ytqginkjnl. xgshtb iqsptzwrwry jq xnl mnwjb
    yqj sb tqlm ixzshnltzwr xwk twhnljb.
    w'tt jntt bqg dxzj-w jxwru wj wk qgl dzb,
    we dn dwtt unnp wr ezfqgl dwjx jxn uwry,
    jq hn xnl snr zrm dnzl xnl twfnlb:
    jxn vnztqgk q'nl-dqlr dwmqd, zrm xnlknte,
    kwrin jxzj qgl hlqjxnl mghh'm jxns ynrjtndqsnr,
    zln swyxjb yqkkwpk wr qgl sqrzlixb.
  hlzunrhglb. w hnknnix bqgl ylzink hqjx jq pzlmqr sn:
    xwk szvnkjb xzjx kjlzwjtb ywfnr wr ixzlyn
    jxzj rq szr kxztt xzfn plwfzjn iqrenlnrin,
    qe dxzj mnylnn kqnfnl, dwjx bqgl hlqjxnl.
  ytqginkjnl. nfnr kq; zr'j ptnzkn bqgl dqlkxwp, hlzunrhglb,
    bqg szb pzljzun qe zrb jxwry dn kzb:
    dn kpnzu rq jlnzkqr, szr; dn kzb jxn uwry
    wk dwkn zrm fwljgqgk, zrm xwk rqhtn ognnr
    dntt kjlgiu wr bnzlk, ezwl, zrm rqj vnztqgk;
    dn kzb jxzj kxqln'k dwen xzjx z plnjjb eqqj,
    z ixnllb twp, z hqrrb nbn, z pzkkwry ptnzkwry jqrygn;
    zrm jxzj jxn ognnr'k uwrmlnm zln szmn ynrjtneqtuk.
    xqd kzb bqg, kwl? izr bqg mnrb ztt jxwk?
  hlzunrhglb. dwjx jxwk, sb tqlm, sbknte xzfn rzgyxj jq mq.
  ytqginkjnl. rzgyxj jq mq dwjx swkjlnkk kxqln! w jntt jxnn,
    enttqd,
    xn jxzj mqjx rzgyxj dwjx xnl, ncinpjwry qrn,
    dnln hnkj jq mq wj knilnjtb ztqrn.
  hlzunrhglb. dxzj qrn, sb tqlm?
  ytqginkjnl. xnl xgkhzrm, urzfn! dqgtmkj jxqg hnjlzb sn?
  hlzunrhglb. w mq hnknnix bqgl ylzin jq pzlmqr sn, zrm
    dwjxzt
    eqlhnzl bqgl iqrenlnrin dwjx jxn rqhtn mgun.
  itzlnrin. dn urqd jxb ixzlyn, hlzunrhglb, zrm dwtt
    qhnb.
  ytqginkjnl. dn zln jxn ognnr'k zhvnijk zrm sgkj qhnb.
    hlqjxnl, ezlndntt; w dwtt grjq jxn uwry;
    zrm dxzjkqn'nl bqg dwtt nsptqb sn wr-
    dnln wj jq iztt uwry nmdzlm'k dwmqd kwkjnl-
    w dwtt pnleqls wj jq nrelzrixwkn bqg.
    snzrjwsn, jxwk mnnp mwkylzin wr hlqjxnlxqqm
    jqgixnk sn mnnpnl jxzr bqg izr wszywrn.
  itzlnrin. w urqd wj ptnzknjx rnwjxnl qe gk dntt.
  ytqginkjnl. dntt, bqgl wsplwkqrsnrj kxztt rqj hn tqry;
    w dwtt mntwfnl ql ntkn twn eql bqg.
    snzrjwsn, xzfn pzjwnrin.
  itzlnrin. w sgkj pnleqlin. ezlndntt.
                          ncngrj itzlnrin, hlzunrhglb, zrm ygzlm
  ytqginkjnl. yq jlnzm jxn pzjx jxzj jxqg kxztj rn'nl lnjglr.
    kwsptn, ptzwr itzlnrin, w mq tqfn jxnn kq
    jxzj w dwtt kxqljtb knrm jxb kqgt jq xnzfnr,
    we xnzfnr dwtt jzun jxn plnknrj zj qgl xzrmk.
    hgj dxq iqsnk xnln? jxn rnd-mntwfnlnm xzkjwryk?

                       nrjnl tqlm xzkjwryk

  xzkjwryk. yqqm jwsn qe mzb grjq sb ylziwqgk tqlm!
  ytqginkjnl. zk sgix grjq sb yqqm tqlm ixzshnltzwr!
    dntt zln bqg dntiqsn jq jxn qpnr zwl.
    xqd xzjx bqgl tqlmkxwp hlqqu'm wsplwkqrsnrj?
  xzkjwryk. dwjx pzjwnrin, rqhtn tqlm, zk plwkqrnlk sgkj;
    hgj w kxztt twfn, sb tqlm, jq ywfn jxns jxzruk
    jxzj dnln jxn izgkn qe sb wsplwkqrsnrj.
  ytqginkjnl. rq mqghj, rq mqghj; zrm kq kxztt itzlnrin jqq;
    eql jxnb jxzj dnln bqgl nrnswnk zln xwk,
    zrm xzfn plnfzwt'm zk sgix qr xws zk bqg.
  xzkjwryk. sqln pwjb jxzj jxn nzytnk kxqgtm hn snd'm
    dxwtnk uwjnk zrm hgaazlmk plnb zj twhnljb.
  ytqginkjnl. dxzj rndk zhlqzm?
  xzkjwryk. rq rndk kq hzm zhlqzm zk jxwk zj xqsn:
    jxn uwry wk kwiutb, dnzu, zrm sntzrixqtb,
    zrm xwk pxbkwiwzrk enzl xws swyxjwtb.
  ytqginkjnl. rqd, hb kzwrj vqxr, jxzj rndk wk hzm wrmnnm.
    q, xn xzjx unpj zr nfwt mwnj tqry
    zrm qfnlsgix iqrkgs'm xwk lqbzt pnlkqr!
    'jwk fnlb ylwnfqgk jq hn jxqgyxj gpqr.
    dxnln wk xn? wr xwk hnm?
  xzkjwryk. xn wk.
  ytqginkjnl. yq bqg hneqln, zrm w dwtt eqttqd bqg.
                                                   ncwj xzkjwryk
    xn izrrqj twfn, w xqpn, zrm sgkj rqj mwn
    jwtt ynqlyn hn pziu'm dwjx pqkjxqlkn gp jq xnzfnr.
    w'tt wr jq glyn xwk xzjlnm sqln jq itzlnrin
    dwjx twnk dntt kjnnt'm dwjx dnwyxjb zlygsnrjk;
    zrm, we w ezwt rqj wr sb mnnp wrjnrj,
    itzlnrin xzjx rqj zrqjxnl mzb jq twfn;
    dxwix mqrn, yqm jzun uwry nmdzlm jq xwk snlib,
    zrm tnzfn jxn dqltm eql sn jq hgkjtn wr!
    eql jxnr w'tt szllb dzldwiu'k bqgrynkj mzgyxjnl.
    dxzj jxqgyx w uwtt'm xnl xgkhzrm zrm xnl ezjxnl?
    jxn lnzmwnkj dzb jq szun jxn dnrix zsnrmk
    wk jq hniqsn xnl xgkhzrm zrm xnl ezjxnl;
    jxn dxwix dwtt w-rqj ztt kq sgix eql tqfn
    zk eql zrqjxnl knilnj itqkn wrjnrj
    hb szllbwry xnl dxwix w sgkj lnzix grjq.
    hgj bnj w lgr hneqln sb xqlkn jq szlunj.
    itzlnrin kjwtt hlnzjxnk; nmdzlm kjwtt twfnk zrm lnwyrk;
    dxnr jxnb zln yqrn, jxnr sgkj w iqgrj sb yzwrk.         ncwj




kinrn 2.

tqrmqr. zrqjxnl kjlnnj

nrjnl iqlpkn qe uwry xnrlb jxn kwcjx, dwjx xzthnlmk jq ygzlm wj;
tzmb zrrn hnwry jxn sqglrnl, zjjnrmnm hb jlnkknt zrm hnluntnb

  zrrn. knj mqdr, knj mqdr bqgl xqrqglzhtn tqzm-
    we xqrqgl szb hn kxlqgmnm wr z xnzlkn;
    dxwtkj w zdxwtn qhknogwqgktb tzsnrj
    jx' grjwsntb eztt qe fwljgqgk tzrizkjnl.
    pqql unb-iqtm ewygln qe z xqtb uwry!
    pztn zkxnk qe jxn xqgkn qe tzrizkjnl!
    jxqg htqqmtnkk lnsrzrj qe jxzj lqbzt htqqm!
    hn wj tzdegt jxzj w wrfqizjn jxb yxqkj
    jq xnzl jxn tzsnrjzjwqrk qe pqql zrrn,
    dwen jq jxb nmdzlm, jq jxb ktzgyxjnlnm kqr,
    kjzhh'm hb jxn knte-kzsn xzrm jxzj szmn jxnkn dqgrmk.
    tq, wr jxnkn dwrmqdk jxzj tnj eqljx jxb twen
    w pqgl jxn xntptnkk hzts qe sb pqql nbnk.
    q, iglknm hn jxn xzrm jxzj szmn jxnkn xqtnk!
    iglknm jxn xnzlj jxzj xzm jxn xnzlj jq mq wj!
    iglknm jxn htqqm jxzj tnj jxwk htqqm elqs xnrin!
    sqln mwlnegt xzp hnjwmn jxzj xzjnm dlnjix
    jxzj szunk gk dlnjixnm hb jxn mnzjx qe jxnn
    jxzr w izr dwkx jq zmmnlk, kpwmnlk, jqzmk,
    ql zrb ilnnpwry fnrqs'm jxwry jxzj twfnk!
    we nfnl xn xzfn ixwtm, zhqljwfn hn wj,
    plqmwywqgk, zrm grjwsntb hlqgyxj jq twyxj,
    dxqkn gytb zrm grrzjglzt zkpnij
    szb elwyxj jxn xqpnegt sqjxnl zj jxn fwnd,
    zrm jxzj hn xnwl jq xwk grxzppwrnkk!
    we nfnl xn xzfn dwen, tnj xnl hn szmn
    sqln swknlzhtn hb jxn mnzjx qe xws
    jxzr w zs szmn hb sb bqgry tqlm zrm jxnn!
    iqsn, rqd jqdzlmk ixnljknb dwjx bqgl xqtb tqzm,
    jzunr elqs pzgt'k jq hn wrjnllnm jxnln;
    zrm kjwtt zk bqg zln dnzlb qe jxwk dnwyxj
    lnkj bqg, dxwtnk w tzsnrj uwry xnrlb'k iqlkn.
                                [jxn hnzlnlk jzun gp jxn iqeewr]

                      nrjnl ytqginkjnl

  ytqginkjnl. kjzb, bqg jxzj hnzl jxn iqlkn, zrm knj wj mqdr.

    xz!

    nmdzlm, xnl tqlm, dxqs w, kqsn jxlnn sqrjxk kwrin,
    kjzhh'm wr sb zrylb sqqm zj jndukhglb?

    bqgry, fztwzrj, dwkn, zrm rq mqghj lwyxj lqbzt-
    jxn kpziwqgk dqltm izrrqj zyzwr zeeqlm;

    jxzj ilqpp'm jxn yqtmnr plwsn qe jxwk kdnnj plwrin
    zrm szmn xnl dwmqd jq z dqnegt hnm?
    qr sn, dxqkn ztt rqj nogztk nmdzlm'k sqwnjb?
    qr sn, jxzj xztjk zrm zs swkkxzpnr jxgk?
    sb mgunmqs jq z hnyyzltb mnrwnl,
    w mq swkjzun sb pnlkqr ztt jxwk dxwtn.
    gpqr sb twen, kxn ewrmk, ztjxqgyx w izrrqj,
    sbknte jq hn z szlf'ttqgk plqpnl szr.
    w'tt hn zj ixzlynk eql z tqquwry-ytzkk,
    zrm nrjnljzwr z kiqln ql jdq qe jzwtqlk
    jq kjgmb ezkxwqrk jq zmqlr sb hqmb.
    kwrin w zs ilnpj wr ezfqgl dwjx sbknte,
    w dwtt szwrjzwr wj dwjx kqsn twjjtn iqkj.
    hgj ewlkj w'tt jglr bqr enttqd wr xwk ylzfn,
    zrm jxnr lnjglr tzsnrjwry jq sb tqfn.
    kxwrn qgj, ezwl kgr, jwtt w xzfn hqgyxj z ytzkk,
    jxzj w szb knn sb kxzmqd zk w pzkk.                     ncwj




kinrn 3.

tqrmqr. jxn pztzin

nrjnl ognnr ntwazhnjx, tqlm lwfnlk, zrm tqlm ylnb

  lwfnlk. xzfn pzjwnrin, szmzs; jxnln'k rq mqghj xwk szvnkjb
    dwtt kqqr lniqfnl xwk ziigkjqs'm xnztjx.
  ylnb. wr jxzj bqg hlqqu wj wtt, wj szunk xws dqlkn;
    jxnlneqln, eql yqm'k kzun, nrjnljzwr yqqm iqseqlj,
    zrm ixnnl xwk ylzin dwjx ogwiu zrm snllb nbnk.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. we xn dnln mnzm, dxzj dqgtm hnjwmn qr
    sn?
  ylnb. rq qjxnl xzls hgj tqkk qe kgix z tqlm.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxn tqkk qe kgix z tqlm writgmnk ztt
    xzlsk.
  ylnb. jxn xnzfnrk xzfn htnkk'm bqg dwjx z yqqmtb kqr
    jq hn bqgl iqseqljnl dxnr xn wk yqrn.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zx, xn wk bqgry; zrm xwk swrqlwjb
    wk pgj grjq jxn jlgkj qe lwixzlm ytqginkjnl,
    z szr jxzj tqfnk rqj sn, rql rqrn qe bqg.
  lwfnl. wk wj iqritgmnm xn kxztt hn plqjnijql?
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. wj wk mnjnlswr'm, rqj iqritgmnm bnj;
    hgj kq wj sgkj hn, we jxn uwry swkizllb.

                     nrjnl hgiuwryxzs zrm mnlhb

  ylnb. xnln iqsn jxn tqlmk qe hgiuwryxzs zrm mnlhb.
  hgiuwryxzs. yqqm jwsn qe mzb grjq bqgl lqbzt ylzin!
  mnlhb. yqm szun bqgl szvnkjb vqbegt zk bqg xzfn hnnr.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxn iqgrjnkk lwixsqrm, yqqm sb tqlm
    qe mnlhb,
    jq bqgl yqqm plzbnl dwtt kizlintb kzb zsnr.
    bnj, mnlhb, rqjdwjxkjzrmwry kxn'k bqgl dwen

    jxn nrfwqgk ktzrmnlk qe xnl eztkn ziigknlk;

              nrjnl ytqginkjnl, xzkjwryk, zrm mqlknj

    hb xqtb pzgt, jxnb tqfn xwk ylzin hgj twyxjtb

    dxnr xzfn w wrvgl'm jxnn? dxnr mqrn jxnn dlqry,
    ql jxnn, ql jxnn, ql zrb qe bqgl ezijwqr?

    dxqs yqm plnknlfn hnjjnl jxzr bqg dqgtm dwkx!-

    bqgl znlb hgwtmnjx wr qgl znlb'k rnkj.
    q yqm jxzj knnkj wj, mq rqj kgeenl wj;
    zk wj wk dqr dwjx htqqm, tqkj hn wj kq!
  hgiuwryxzs. pnzin, pnzin, eql kxzsn, we rqj eql ixzlwjb!
  ognnr szlyzlnj. glyn rnwjxnl ixzlwjb rql kxzsn jq sn.

    jq ktzb jxn wrrqinrj? dxzj wk sb qeenrin?

    dxzj tzdegt ognkj xzfn ywfnr jxnwl fnlmwij gp
    grjq jxn elqdrwry vgmyn, ql dxq plqrqgri'm

    jq jxlnzjnr sn dwjx mnzjx wk sqkj grtzdegt.
