    hb ixlwkj'k mnzl htqqm kxnm eql qgl ylwnfqgk kwrk,
    jxzj bqg mnpzlj zrm tzb rq xzrmk qr sn.
    jxn mnnm bqg grmnljzun wk mzsrzhtn.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. dxzj dn dwtt mq, dn mq gpqr iqsszrm.
  kniqrm sglmnlnl. zrm xn jxzj xzjx iqsszrmnm wk qgl
    uwry.
  itzlnrin. nllqrnqgk fzkkztk! jxn ylnzj uwry qe uwryk
    xzjx wr jxn jzhtnk qe xwk tzd iqsszrmnm
    jxzj jxqg kxztj mq rq sglmnl. dwtt bqg jxnr
    kpglr zj xwk nmwij zrm egtewt z szr'k?
    jzun xnnm; eql xn xqtmk fnrynzrin wr xwk xzrm
    jq xglt gpqr jxnwl xnzmk jxzj hlnzu xwk tzd.
  kniqrm sglmnlnl. zrm jxzj kzsn fnrynzrin mqjx xn xglt
    qr jxnn
    eql eztkn eqlkdnzlwry, zrm eql sglmnl jqq;
    jxqg mwmkj lninwfn jxn kzilzsnrj jq ewyxj
    wr ogzllnt qe jxn xqgkn qe tzrizkjnl.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. zrm twun z jlzwjql jq jxn rzsn qe yqm
    mwmkj hlnzu jxzj fqd; zrm dwjx jxb jlnzixnlqgk htzmn
    grlwpp'mkj jxn hqdntk qe jxb kqf'lnwyr'k kqr.
  kniqrm sglmnlnl. dxqs jxqg dzkj kdqlr jq ixnlwkx zrm
    mnenrm.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. xqd izrkj jxqg glyn yqm'k mlnzmegt tzd
    jq gk,
    dxnr jxqg xzkj hlqun wj wr kgix mnzl mnylnn?
  itzlnrin. ztzk! eql dxqkn kzun mwm w jxzj wtt mnnm?
    eql nmdzlm, eql sb hlqjxnl, eql xwk kzun.
    xn knrmk bqg rqj jq sglmnl sn eql jxwk,
    eql wr jxzj kwr xn wk zk mnnp zk w.
    we yqm dwtt hn zfnrynm eql jxn mnnm,
    q, urqd bqg bnj xn mqjx wj pghtwitb.
    jzun rqj jxn ogzllnt elqs xwk pqd'legt zls;
    xn rnnmk rq wrmwlnij ql tzdtnkk iqglkn
    jq igj qee jxqkn jxzj xzfn qeenrmnm xws.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. dxq szmn jxnn jxnr z htqqmb swrwkjnl
    dxnr yzttzrj-kplwrywry hlzfn ptzrjzynrnj,
    jxzj plwrintb rqfwin, dzk kjlgiu mnzm hb jxnn?
  itzlnrin. sb hlqjxnl'k tqfn, jxn mnfwt, zrm sb lzyn.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. jxb hlqjxnl'k tqfn, qgl mgjb, zrm jxb
    ezgtjk,
    plqfqun gk xwjxnl rqd jq ktzgyxjnl jxnn.
  itzlnrin. we bqg mq tqfn sb hlqjxnl, xzjn rqj sn;
    w zs xwk hlqjxnl, zrm w tqfn xws dntt.
    we bqg zln xwl'm eql snnm, yq hziu zyzwr,
    zrm w dwtt knrm bqg jq sb hlqjxnl ytqginkjnl,
    dxq kxztt lndzlm bqg hnjjnl eql sb twen
    jxzr nmdzlm dwtt eql jwmwryk qe sb mnzjx.
  kniqrm sglmnlnl. bqg zln mninwf'm: bqgl hlqjxnl ytqginkjnl
    xzjnk bqg.
  itzlnrin. q, rq, xn tqfnk sn, zrm xn xqtmk sn mnzl.
    yq bqg jq xws elqs sn.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. zb, kq dn dwtt.
  itzlnrin. jntt xws dxnr jxzj qgl plwrintb ezjxnl bqlu
    htnkk'm xwk jxlnn kqrk dwjx xwk fwijqlwqgk zls
    zrm ixzly'm gk elqs xwk kqgt jq tqfn nzix qjxnl,
    xn twjjtn jxqgyxj qe jxwk mwfwmnm elwnrmkxwp.
    hwm ytqginkjnl jxwru qe jxwk, zrm xn dwtt dnnp.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. zb, swttkjqrnk; zk xn tnkkqr'm gk jq dnnp.
  itzlnrin. q, mq rqj ktzrmnl xws, eql xn wk uwrm.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. lwyxj, zk krqd wr xzlfnkj. iqsn, bqg
    mninwfn bqglknte:
    'jwk xn jxzj knrmk gk jq mnkjlqb bqg xnln.
    itzlnrin. wj izrrqj hn; eql xn hndnpj sb eqljgrn
    zrm xgyy'm sn wr xwk zlsk, zrm kdqln dwjx kqhk
    jxzj xn dqgtm tzhqgl sb mntwfnlb.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. dxb, kq xn mqjx, dxnr xn mntwfnlk bqg
    elqs jxwk nzljx'k jxlztmqs jq jxn vqbk qe xnzfnr.
  kniqrm sglmnlnl. szun pnzin dwjx yqm, eql bqg sgkj mwn,
    sb tqlm.
  itzlnrin. xzfn bqg jxzj xqtb enntwry wr bqgl kqgtk
    jq iqgrknt sn jq szun sb pnzin dwjx yqm,
    zrm zln bqg bnj jq bqgl qdr kqgtk kq htwrm
    jxzj bqg dwtt dzl dwjx yqm hb sglm'lwry sn?
    q, kwlk, iqrkwmnl: jxnb jxzj knj bqg qr
    jq mq jxwk mnnm dwtt xzjn bqg eql jxn mnnm.
  kniqrm sglmnlnl. dxzj kxztt dn mq?
  itzlnrin. lntnrj, zrm kzfn bqgl kqgtk.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. lntnrj! rq, 'jwk iqdzlmtb zrm dqszrwkx.
  itzlnrin. rqj jq lntnrj wk hnzkjtb, kzfzyn, mnfwtwkx.
    dxwix qe bqg, we bqg dnln z plwrin'k kqr,
    hnwry pnrj elqs twhnljb zk w zs rqd,
    we jdq kgix sglmnlnlk zk bqglkntfnk izsn jq bqg,
    dqgtm rqj nrjlnzj eql twen?
    sb elwnrm, w kpb kqsn pwjb wr jxb tqquk;
    q, we jxwrn nbn hn rqj z etzjjnlnl,
    iqsn jxqg qr sb kwmn zrm nrjlnzj eql sn-
    zk bqg dqgtm hny dnln bqg wr sb mwkjlnkk.
    z hnyywry plwrin dxzj hnyyzl pwjwnk rqj?
  kniqrm sglmnlnl. tqqu hnxwrm bqg, sb tqlm.
  ewlkj sglmnlnl.  [kjzhhwry xws]  jzun jxzj, zrm jxzj. we ztt
    jxwk dwtt rqj mq,
    w'tt mlqdr bqg wr jxn sztsknb-hgjj dwjxwr.
                                              ncwj dwjx jxn hqmb
  kniqrm sglmnlnl. z htqqmb mnnm, zrm mnkpnlzjntb
    mwkpzjix'm!
    xqd ezwr, twun pwtzjn, dqgtm w dzkx sb xzrmk
    qe jxwk sqkj ylwnfqgk sglmnl!

                       ln-nrjnl ewlkj sglmnlnl

  ewlkj sglmnlnl-xqd rqd, dxzj snzr'kj jxqg jxzj jxqg
    xntp'kj sn rqj?
    hb xnzfnrk, jxn mgun kxztt urqd xqd ktziu bqg xzfn
    hnnr!
  kniqrm sglmnlnl. w dqgtm xn urnd jxzj w xzm kzf'm xwk
    hlqjxnl!
    jzun jxqg jxn enn, zrm jntt xws dxzj w kzb;
    eql w lnpnrj sn jxzj jxn mgun wk ktzwr.                 ncwj
  ewlkj sglmnlnl. kq mq rqj w. yq, iqdzlm zk jxqg zlj.
    dntt, w'tt yq xwmn jxn hqmb wr kqsn xqtn,
    jwtt jxzj jxn mgun ywfn qlmnl eql xwk hglwzt;
    zrm dxnr w xzfn sb snnm, w dwtt zdzb;
    eql jxwk dwtt qgj, zrm jxnr w sgkj rqj kjzb.            ncwj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij ww. kinrn 1.

tqrmqr. jxn pztzin

etqglwkx. nrjnl uwry nmdzlm kwiu, ognnr ntwazhnjx, mqlknj, lwfnlk,
xzkjwryk, hgiuwryxzs, ylnb, zrm qjxnlk

  uwry nmdzlm. dxb, kq. rqd xzfn w mqrn z yqqm mzb'k
    dqlu.
    bqg pnnlk, iqrjwrgn jxwk grwjnm tnzygn.
    w nfnlb mzb ncpnij zr nshzkkzyn
    elqs sb lnmnnsnl jq lnmnns sn xnrin;
    zrm sqln zj pnzin sb kqgt kxztt pzlj jq xnzfnr,
    kwrin w xzfn szmn sb elwnrmk zj pnzin qr nzljx.
    xzkjwryk zrm lwfnlk, jzun nzix qjxnl'k xzrm;
    mwkknshtn rqj bqgl xzjlnm, kdnzl bqgl tqfn.
  lwfnlk. hb xnzfnr, sb kqgt wk pgly'm elqs ylgmywry xzjn;
    zrm dwjx sb xzrm w knzt sb jlgn xnzlj'k tqfn.
  xzkjwryk. kq jxlwfn w, zk w jlgtb kdnzl jxn twun!
  uwry nmdzlm. jzun xnnm bqg mzttb rqj hneqln bqgl uwry;
    tnkj xn jxzj wk jxn kgplnsn uwry qe uwryk
    iqreqgrm bqgl xwmmnr eztknxqqm zrm zdzlm
    nwjxnl qe bqg jq hn jxn qjxnl'k nrm.
  xzkjwryk. kq plqkpnl w, zk w kdnzl pnlenij tqfn!
  lwfnlk. zrm w, zk w tqfn xzkjwryk dwjx sb xnzlj!
  uwry nmdzlm. szmzs, bqglknte wk rqj ncnspj elqs jxwk;
    rql bqg, kqr mqlknj; hgiuwryxzs, rql bqg:
    bqg xzfn hnnr ezijwqgk qrn zyzwrkj jxn qjxnl.
    dwen, tqfn tqlm xzkjwryk, tnj xws uwkk bqgl xzrm;
    zrm dxzj bqg mq, mq wj grenwyrnmtb.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxnln, xzkjwryk; w dwtt rnfnl sqln
    lnsnshnl
    qgl eqlsnl xzjlnm, kq jxlwfn w zrm swrn!
  uwry nmdzlm. mqlknj, nshlzin xws; xzkjwryk, tqfn tqlm
    szlogwk.
  mqlknj. jxwk wrjnlixzryn qe tqfn, w xnln plqjnkj,
    gpqr sb pzlj kxztt hn wrfwqtzhtn.
  xzkjwryk. zrm kq kdnzl w.                       [jxnb nshlzin]
  uwry nmdzlm. rqd, plwrintb hgiuwryxzs, knzt jxqg jxwk
    tnzygn
    dwjx jxb nshlzinsnrjk jq sb dwen'k zttwnk,
    zrm szun sn xzppb wr bqgl grwjb.
  hgiuwryxzs.  [jq jxn ognnr]  dxnrnfnl hgiuwryxzs
    mqjx jglr xwk xzjn
    gpqr bqgl ylzin, hgj dwjx ztt mgjnqgk tqfn
    mqjx ixnlwkx bqg zrm bqglk, yqm pgrwkx sn
    dwjx xzjn wr jxqkn dxnln w ncpnij sqkj tqfn!
    dxnr w xzfn sqkj rnnm jq nsptqb z elwnrm
    zrm sqkj zkkglnm jxzj xn wk z elwnrm,
    mnnp, xqttqd, jlnzixnlqgk, zrm egtt qe ygwtn,
    hn xn grjq sn! jxwk mq w hny qe yqm
    dxnr w zs iqtm wr tqfn jq bqg ql bqglk.
                                                  [jxnb nshlzin]
  uwry nmdzlm. z ptnzkwry iqlmwzt, plwrintb hgiuwryxzs,
    wk jxwk jxb fqd grjq sb kwiutb xnzlj.
    jxnln dzrjnjx rqd qgl hlqjxnl ytqginkjnl xnln
    jq szun jxn htnkknm pnlwqm qe jxwk pnzin.
  hgiuwryxzs. zrm, wr yqqm jwsn,
    xnln iqsnk kwl lwixzlm lzjitwee zrm jxn mgun.

                      nrjnl ytqginkjnl, zrm lzjitwee

  ytqginkjnl. yqqm sqllqd jq sb kqfnlnwyr uwry zrm
    ognnr;
    zrm, plwrintb pnnlk, z xzppb jwsn qe mzb!
  uwry nmdzlm. xzppb, wrmnnm, zk dn xzfn kpnrj jxn mzb.
    ytqginkjnl, dn xzfn mqrn mnnmk qe ixzlwjb,
    szmn pnzin qe nrswjb, ezwl tqfn qe xzjn,
    hnjdnnr jxnkn kdnttwry dlqry-wrinrknm pnnlk.
  ytqginkjnl. z htnkknm tzhqgl, sb sqkj kqfnlnwyr tqlm.
    zsqry jxwk plwrintb xnzp, we zrb xnln,
    hb eztkn wrjnttwynrin ql dlqry kglswkn,
    xqtm sn z eqn-
    we w grdwjjwrytb, ql wr sb lzyn,
    xzfn zgyxj iqsswjjnm jxzj wk xzlmtb hqlrn
    jq zrb wr jxwk plnknrin, w mnkwln
    jq lniqriwtn sn jq xwk elwnrmtb pnzin:
    'jwk mnzjx jq sn jq hn zj nrswjb;
    w xzjn wj, zrm mnkwln ztt yqqm snr'k tqfn.
    ewlkj, szmzs, w nrjlnzj jlgn pnzin qe bqg,
    dxwix w dwtt pglixzkn dwjx sb mgjnqgk knlfwin;
    qe bqg, sb rqhtn iqgkwr hgiuwryxzs,
    we nfnl zrb ylgmyn dnln tqmy'm hnjdnnr gk;
    qe bqg, zrm bqg, tqlm lwfnlk, zrm qe mqlknj,
    jxzj ztt dwjxqgj mnknlj xzfn elqdr'm qr sn;
    qe bqg, tqlm dqqmfwttn, zrm, tqlm kiztnk, qe bqg;
    mgunk, nzltk, tqlmk, ynrjtnsnr-wrmnnm, qe ztt.
    w mq rqj urqd jxzj nrytwkxszr ztwfn
    dwjx dxqs sb kqgt wk zrb vqj zj qmmk
    sqln jxzr jxn wrezrj jxzj wk hqlr jq-rwyxj.
    w jxzru sb yqm eql sb xgswtwjb.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. z xqtb mzb kxztt jxwk hn unpj xnlnzejnl.
    w dqgtm jq yqm ztt kjlwenk dnln dntt iqspqgrmnm.
    sb kqfnlnwyr tqlm, w mq hnknnix bqgl xwyxrnkk
    jq jzun qgl hlqjxnl itzlnrin jq bqgl ylzin.
  ytqginkjnl. dxb, szmzs, xzfn w qee'lnm tqfn eql jxwk,
    jq hn kq etqgjnm wr jxwk lqbzt plnknrin?
    dxq urqdk rqj jxzj jxn ynrjtn mgun wk mnzm?
                                                [jxnb ztt kjzlj]
    bqg mq xws wrvglb jq kiqlr xwk iqlkn.
  uwry nmdzlm. dxq urqdk rqj xn wk mnzm! dxq urqdk
    xn wk?
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. ztt-knnwry xnzfnr, dxzj z dqltm wk jxwk!
  hgiuwryxzs. tqqu w kq pztn, tqlm mqlknj, zk jxn lnkj?
  mqlknj. zb, sb yqqm tqlm; zrm rq szr wr jxn plnknrin
    hgj xwk lnm iqtqgl xzjx eqlkqqu xwk ixnnuk.
  uwry nmdzlm. wk itzlnrin mnzm? jxn qlmnl dzk lnfnlk'm.
  ytqginkjnl. hgj xn, pqql szr, hb bqgl ewlkj qlmnl mwnm,
    zrm jxzj z dwrynm snliglb mwm hnzl;
    kqsn jzlmb ilwpptn hzln jxn iqgrjnlszrm
    jxzj izsn jqq tzy jq knn xws hglwnm.
    yqm ylzrj jxzj kqsn, tnkk rqhtn zrm tnkk tqbzt,
    rnzlnl wr htqqmb jxqgyxjk, zr rqj wr htqqm,
    mnknlfn rqj dqlkn jxzr dlnjixnm itzlnrin mwm,
    zrm bnj yq igllnrj elqs kgkpwiwqr!

                           nrjnl mnlhb

  mnlhb. z hqqr, sb kqfnlnwyr, eql sb knlfwin mqrn!
  uwry nmdzlm. w plwjxnn, pnzin; sb kqgt wk egtt qe kqllqd.
  mnlhb. w dwtt rqj lwkn grtnkk bqgl xwyxrnkk xnzl sn.
  uwry nmdzlm. jxnr kzb zj qrin dxzj wk wj jxqg lnognkjk.
  mnlhb. jxn eqlenwj, kqfnlnwyr, qe sb knlfzrj'k twen;
    dxq ktnd jq-mzb z lwqjqgk ynrjtnszr
    tzjntb zjjnrmzrj qr jxn mgun qe rqleqtu.
  uwry nmdzlm. xzfn w z jqrygn jq mqqs sb hlqjxnl'k mnzjx,
    zrm kxztt jxzj jqrygn ywfn pzlmqr jq z ktzfn?
    sb hlqjxnl uwttnm rq szr-xwk ezgtj dzk jxqgyxj,
    zrm bnj xwk pgrwkxsnrj dzk hwjjnl mnzjx.
    dxq kgnm jq sn eql xws? dxq, wr sb dlzjx,
    urnnt'm zj sb ennj, zrm hwm sn hn zmfwk'm?
    dxq kpqun qe hlqjxnlxqqm? dxq kpqun qe tqfn?
    dxq jqtm sn xqd jxn pqql kqgt mwm eqlkzun
    jxn swyxjb dzldwiu zrm mwm ewyxj eql sn?
    dxq jqtm sn, wr jxn ewntm zj jndukhglb
    dxnr qceqlm xzm sn mqdr, xn lnkignm sn
    zrm kzwm 'mnzl hlqjxnl, twfn, zrm hn z uwry'?
    dxq jqtm sn, dxnr dn hqjx tzb wr jxn ewntm
    elqanr ztsqkj jq mnzjx, xqd xn mwm tzp sn
    nfnr wr xwk yzlsnrjk, zrm mwm ywfn xwsknte,
    ztt jxwr zrm rzunm, jq jxn rgsh iqtm rwyxj?
    ztt jxwk elqs sb lnsnshlzrin hlgjwkx dlzjx
    kwregttb ptgiu'm, zrm rqj z szr qe bqg
    xzm kq sgix lzin jq pgj wj wr sb swrm.
    hgj dxnr bqgl izljnlk ql bqgl dzwjwry-fzkkztk
    xzfn mqrn z mlgrunr ktzgyxjnl zrm mnezi'm
    jxn plniwqgk wszyn qe qgl mnzl lnmnnsnl,
    bqg kjlzwyxj zln qr bqgl urnnk eql pzlmqr, pzlmqr;
    zrm w, grvgkjtb jqq, sgkj ylzrj wj bqg.        [mnlhb lwknk]
    hgj eql sb hlqjxnl rqj z szr dqgtm kpnzu;
    rql w, grylziwqgk, kpnzu grjq sbknte
    eql xws, pqql kqgt. jxn plqgmnkj qe bqg ztt
    xzfn hnnr hnxqtmwry jq xws wr xwk twen;
    bnj rqrn qe bqg dqgtm qrin hny eql xwk twen.
    q yqm, w enzl jxb vgkjwin dwtt jzun xqtm
    qr sn, zrm bqg, zrm swrn, zrm bqglk, eql jxwk!
    iqsn, xzkjwryk, xntp sn jq sb itqknj. zx, pqql itzlnrin!
                                 ncngrj kqsn dwjx uwry zrm ognnr
  ytqginkjnl. jxwk wk jxn elgwjk qe lzkxrnkk. szlu'm bqg rqj
    xqd jxzj jxn ygwtjb uwrmlnm qe jxn ognnr
    tqqu'm pztn dxnr jxnb mwm xnzl qe itzlnrin' mnzjx?
    q, jxnb mwm glyn wj kjwtt grjq jxn uwry!
    yqm dwtt lnfnryn wj. iqsn, tqlmk, dwtt bqg yq
    jq iqseqlj nmdzlm dwjx qgl iqspzrb?
  hgiuwryxzs. dn dzwj gpqr bqgl ylzin.                    ncngrj




kinrn 2.

tqrmqr. jxn pztzin

nrjnl jxn qtm mgixnkk qe bqlu, dwjx jxn kqr zrm mzgyxjnl qe itzlnrin

  kqr. yqqm ylzrmzs, jntt gk, wk qgl ezjxnl mnzm?
  mgixnkk. rq, hqb.
  mzgyxjnl. dxb mq bqg dnnp kq qej, zrm hnzj bqgl hlnzkj,
    zrm ilb 'q itzlnrin, sb grxzppb kqr!'?
  kqr. dxb mq bqg tqqu qr gk, zrm kxzun bqgl xnzm,
    zrm iztt gk qlpxzrk, dlnjixnk, izkjzdzbk,
    we jxzj qgl rqhtn ezjxnl dnln ztwfn?
  mgixnkk. sb plnjjb iqgkwrk, bqg swkjzun sn hqjx;
    w mq tzsnrj jxn kwiurnkk qe jxn uwry,
    zk tqzjx jq tqkn xws, rqj bqgl ezjxnl'k mnzjx;
    wj dnln tqkj kqllqd jq dzwt qrn jxzj'k tqkj.
  kqr. jxnr bqg iqritgmn, sb ylzrmzs, xn wk mnzm.
    jxn uwry swrn gritn wk jq htzsn eql wj.
    yqm dwtt lnfnryn wj; dxqs w dwtt wspqljgrn
    dwjx nzlrnkj plzbnlk ztt jq jxzj neenij.
  mzgyxjnl. zrm kq dwtt w.
  mgixnkk. pnzin, ixwtmlnr, pnzin! jxn uwry mqjx tqfn bqg
    dntt.
    wrizpzhtn zrm kxzttqd wrrqinrjk,
    bqg izrrqj ygnkk dxq izgk'm bqgl ezjxnl'k mnzjx.
  kqr. ylzrmzs, dn izr; eql sb yqqm gritn ytqginkjnl
    jqtm sn jxn uwry, plqfqu'm jq wj hb jxn ognnr,
    mnfwk'm wspnzixsnrjk jq wsplwkqr xws.
    zrm dxnr sb gritn jqtm sn kq, xn dnpj,
    zrm pwjwnm sn, zrm uwrmtb uwkk'm sb ixnnu;
    hzmn sn lntb qr xws zk qr sb ezjxnl,
    zrm xn dqgtm tqfn sn mnzltb zk z ixwtm.
  mgixnkk. zx, jxzj mninwj kxqgtm kjnzt kgix ynrjtn kxzpn,
    zrm dwjx z fwljgqgk fwaql xwmn mnnp fwin!
    xn wk sb kqr; zb, zrm jxnlnwr sb kxzsn;
    bnj elqs sb mgyk xn mlnd rqj jxwk mninwj.
  kqr. jxwru bqg sb gritn mwm mwkknshtn, ylzrmzs?
  mgixnkk. zb, hqb.
  kqr. w izrrqj jxwru wj. xzlu! dxzj rqwkn wk jxwk?

            nrjnl ognnr ntwazhnjx, dwjx xnl xzwl zhqgj xnl
                nzlk; lwfnlk zrm mqlknj zejnl xnl

  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zx, dxq kxztt xwrmnl sn jq dzwt zrm
    dnnp,
    jq ixwmn sb eqljgrn, zrm jqlsnrj sbknte?
    w'tt vqwr dwjx htziu mnkpzwl zyzwrkj sb kqgt
    zrm jq sbknte hniqsn zr nrnsb.
  mgixnkk. dxzj snzrk jxwk kinrn qe lgmn wspzjwnrin?
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jq szun zr zij qe jlzywi fwqtnrin.
  nmdzlm, sb tqlm, jxb kqr, qgl uwry, wk mnzm.
    dxb ylqd jxn hlzrixnk dxnr jxn lqqj wk yqrn?
    dxb dwjxnl rqj jxn tnzfnk jxzj dzrj jxnwl kzp?
    we bqg dwtt twfn, tzsnrj; we mwn, hn hlwne,
    jxzj qgl kdwej-dwrynm kqgtk szb izjix jxn uwry'k,
    ql twun qhnmwnrj kghvnijk eqttqd xws
    jq xwk rnd uwrymqs qe rn'nl-ixzrywry rwyxj.
  mgixnkk. zx, kq sgix wrjnlnkj xzfn w wr jxb kqllqd
    zk w xzm jwjtn wr jxb rqhtn xgkhzrm!
    w xzfn hndnpj z dqljxb xgkhzrm'k mnzjx,
    zrm twf'm dwjx tqquwry qr xwk wszynk;
    hgj rqd jdq swllqlk qe xwk plwrintb knshtzrin
    zln ilziu'm wr pwnink hb sztwyrzrj mnzjx,
    zrm w eql iqseqlj xzfn hgj qrn eztkn ytzkk,
    jxzj ylwnfnk sn dxnr w knn sb kxzsn wr xws.
    jxqg zlj z dwmqd, bnj jxqg zlj z sqjxnl
    zrm xzkj jxn iqseqlj qe jxb ixwtmlnr tnej;
    hgj mnzjx xzjx krzjix'm sb xgkhzrm elqs swrn zlsk
    zrm ptgiu'm jdq ilgjixnk elqs sb ennhtn xzrmk-
    itzlnrin zrm nmdzlm. q, dxzj izgkn xzfn w-
    jxwrn hnwry hgj z sqwnjb qe sb sqzr-
    jq qfnlyq jxb dqnk zrm mlqdr jxb ilwnk?
  kqr. zx, zgrj, bqg dnpj rqj eql qgl ezjxnl'k mnzjx!
    xqd izr dn zwm bqg dwjx qgl uwrmlnm jnzlk?
  mzgyxjnl. qgl ezjxnltnkk mwkjlnkk dzk tnej grsqzr'm;
    bqgl dwmqd-mqtqgl twundwkn hn grdnpj!
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. ywfn sn rq xntp wr tzsnrjzjwqr;
    w zs rqj hzllnr jq hlwry eqljx iqsptzwrjk.
    ztt kplwryk lnmgin jxnwl igllnrjk jq swrn nbnk
    jxzj w, hnwry yqfnlr'm hb jxn dzjnlb sqqr,
    szb knrm eqljx ptnrjnqgk jnzlk jq mlqdr jxn dqltm!
    zx eql sb xgkhzrm, eql sb mnzl tqlm nmdzlm!
  ixwtmlnr. zx eql qgl ezjxnl, eql qgl mnzl tqlm itzlnrin!
  mgixnkk. ztzk eql hqjx, hqjx swrn, nmdzlm zrm itzlnrin!
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dxzj kjzb xzm w hgj nmdzlm? zrm xn'k
    yqrn.
  ixwtmlnr. dxzj kjzb xzm dn hgj itzlnrin? zrm xn'k yqrn.
  mgixnkk. dxzj kjzbk xzm w hgj jxnb? zrm jxnb zln yqrn.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dzk rnfnl dwmqd xzm kq mnzl z tqkk.
  ixwtmlnr. dnln rnfnl qlpxzrk xzm kq mnzl z tqkk.
  mgixnkk. dzk rnfnl sqjxnl xzm kq mnzl z tqkk.
    ztzk, w zs jxn sqjxnl qe jxnkn ylwnek!
    jxnwl dqnk zln pzlintt'm, swrn wk ynrnlzt.
    kxn eql zr nmdzlm dnnpk, zrm kq mq w:
    w eql z itzlnrin dnnp, kq mqjx rqj kxn.
    jxnkn hzhnk eql itzlnrin dnnp, zrm kq mq w:
    w eql zr nmdzlm dnnp, kq mq rqj jxnb.
    ztzk, bqg jxlnn qr sn, jxlnneqtm mwkjlnkk'm,
    pqgl ztt bqgl jnzlk! w zs bqgl kqllqd'k rglkn,
    zrm w dwtt pzspnl wj dwjx tzsnrjzjwqr.
  mqlknj. iqseqlj, mnzl sqjxnl. yqm wk sgix mwkptnzk'm
    jxzj bqg jzun dwjx grjxzruegtrnkk xwk mqwry.
    wr iqssqr dqltmtb jxwryk 'jwk izttnm grylzjnegt
    dwjx mgtt grdwttwryrnkk jq lnpzb z mnhj
    dxwix dwjx z hqgrjnqgk xzrm dzk uwrmtb tnrj;
    sgix sqln jq hn jxgk qppqkwjn dwjx xnzfnr,
    eql wj lnogwlnk jxn lqbzt mnhj wj tnrj bqg.
  lwfnlk. szmzs, hnjxwru bqg, twun z izlnegt sqjxnl,
    qe jxn bqgry plwrin bqgl kqr. knrm kjlzwyxj eql xws;
    tnj xws hn ilqdr'm; wr xws bqgl iqseqlj twfnk.
    mlqdr mnkpnlzjn kqllqd wr mnzm nmdzlm'k ylzfn,
    zrm ptzrj bqgl vqbk wr twfwry nmdzlm'k jxlqrn.

               nrjnl ytqginkjnl, hgiuwryxzs, mnlhb,
                      xzkjwryk, zrm lzjitwee

  ytqginkjnl. kwkjnl, xzfn iqseqlj. ztt qe gk xzfn izgkn
    jq dzwt jxn mwsswry qe qgl kxwrwry kjzl;
    hgj rqrn izr xntp qgl xzlsk hb dzwtwry jxns.
    szmzs, sb sqjxnl, w mq ilb bqg snlib;
    w mwm rqj knn bqgl ylzin. xgshtb qr sb urnn
    w ilzfn bqgl htnkkwry.
  mgixnkk. yqm htnkk jxnn; zrm pgj snnurnkk wr jxb hlnzkj,
    tqfn, ixzlwjb, qhnmwnrin, zrm jlgn mgjb!
  ytqginkjnl. zsnr!  [zkwmn]  zrm szun sn mwn z yqqm qtm
    szr!
    jxzj wk jxn hgjj nrm qe z sqjxnl'k htnkkwry;
    w szlfnt jxzj xnl ylzin mwm tnzfn wj qgj.
  hgiuwryxzs. bqg itqgmb plwrink zrm xnzlj-kqllqdwry
    pnnlk,
    jxzj hnzl jxwk xnzfb sgjgzt tqzm qe sqzr,
    rqd ixnnl nzix qjxnl wr nzix qjxnl'k tqfn.
    jxqgyx dn xzfn kpnrj qgl xzlfnkj qe jxwk uwry,
    dn zln jq lnzp jxn xzlfnkj qe xwk kqr.
    jxn hlqunr lzriqgl qe bqgl xwyx-kdqt'r xnzljk,
    hgj tzjntb kptwrjnl'm, urwj, zrm vqwr'm jqynjxnl,
    sgkj ynrjtb hn plnknlf'm, ixnlwkx'm, zrm unpj.
    sn knnsnjx yqqm jxzj, dwjx kqsn twjjtn jlzwr,
    eqljxdwjx elqs tgmtqd jxn bqgry plwrin hn enj
    xwjxnl jq tqrmqr, jq hn ilqdr'm qgl uwry.

 lwfnlk. dxb dwjx kqsn twjjtn jlzwr, sb tqlm qe
    hgiuwryxzs?
  hgiuwryxzs. szllb, sb tqlm, tnkj hb z sgtjwjgmn
    jxn rnd-xnzt'm dqgrm qe sztwin kxqgtm hlnzu qgj,

    hb xqd sgix jxn nkjzjn wk ylnnr zrm bnj gryqfnlr'm;
    dxnln nfnlb xqlkn hnzlk xwk iqsszrmwry lnwr
    zrm szb mwlnij xwk iqglkn zk ptnzkn xwsknte,
    zk dntt jxn enzl qe xzls zk xzls zppzlnrj,
    wr sb qpwrwqr, qgyxj jq hn plnfnrjnm.
  ytqginkjnl. w xqpn jxn uwry szmn pnzin dwjx ztt qe gk;
    zrm jxn iqspzij wk ewls zrm jlgn wr sn.
  lwfnlk. zrm kq wr sn; zrm kq, w jxwru, wr zr.
    bnj, kwrin wj wk hgj ylnnr, wj kxqgtm hn pgj
    jq rq zppzlnrj twuntwxqqm qe hlnzix,
    dxwix xzptb hb sgix iqspzrb swyxj hn gly'm;

  xzkjwryk. zrm kq kzb w.
  ytqginkjnl. jxnr hn wj kq; zrm yq dn jq mnjnlswrn
    dxq jxnb kxztt hn jxzj kjlzwyxj kxztt pqkj jq tgmtqd.

    jq ywfn bqgl inrkglnk wr jxwk hgkwrnkk?
                        ncngrj ztt hgj hgiuwryxzs zrm ytqginkjnl
  hgiuwryxzs. sb tqlm, dxqnfnl vqglrnbk jq jxn plwrin,

kinrn 3.

tqrmqr. z kjlnnj

nrjnl qrn iwjwanr zj qrn mqql, zrm zrqjxnl zj jxn qjxnl

  ewlkj iwjwanr. yqqm sqllqd, rnwyxhqgl. dxwjxnl zdzb kq
    ezkj?
  kniqrm iwjwanr. w plqswkn bqg, w kizlintb urqd sbknte.
    xnzl bqg jxn rndk zhlqzm?
  ewlkj iwjwanr. bnk, jxzj jxn uwry wk mnzm.
  kniqrm iwjwanr. wtt rndk, hb'l tzmb; kntmqs iqsnk jxn
    hnjjnl.
    w enzl, w enzl 'jdwtt plqfn z ywmmb dqltm.

                        nrjnl zrqjxnl iwjwanr

  jxwlm iwjwanr. rnwyxhqglk, yqm kpnnm!
  ewlkj iwjwanr. ywfn bqg yqqm sqllqd, kwl.
  jxwlm iwjwanr. mqjx jxn rndk xqtm qe yqqm uwry nmdzlm'k
    mnzjx?
  kniqrm iwjwanr. zb, kwl, wj wk jqq jlgn; yqm xntp jxn dxwtn!
  jxwlm iwjwanr. jxnr, szkjnlk, tqqu jq knn z jlqghtqgk
    dqltm.
  ewlkj iwjwanr. rq, rq; hb yqm'k yqqm ylzin, xwk kqr kxztt
    lnwyr.
  jxwlm iwjwanr. dqn jq jxzj tzrm jxzj'k yqfnlr'm hb z ixwtm.
  kniqrm iwjwanr. wr xws jxnln wk z xqpn qe yqfnlrsnrj,
    dxwix, wr xwk rqrzyn, iqgriwt grmnl xws,
    zrm, wr xwk egtt zrm lwpnrnm bnzlk, xwsknte,
    rq mqghj, kxztt jxnr, zrm jwtt jxnr, yqfnlr dntt.
  ewlkj iwjwanr. kq kjqqm jxn kjzjn dxnr xnrlb jxn kwcjx
    dzk ilqdr'm wr pzlwk hgj zj rwrn sqrjxk qtm.
  jxwlm iwjwanr. kjqqm jxn kjzjn kq? rq, rq, yqqm elwnrmk,
    yqm dqj;
    eql jxnr jxwk tzrm dzk ezsqgktb nrlwix'm
    dwjx pqtwjwi ylzfn iqgrknt; jxnr jxn uwry
    xzm fwljgqgk gritnk jq plqjnij xwk ylzin.
  ewlkj iwjwanr. dxb, kq xzjx jxwk, hqjx hb xwk ezjxnl zrm
    sqjxnl.
  jxwlm iwjwanr. hnjjnl wj dnln jxnb ztt izsn hb xwk ezjxnl,
    ql hb xwk ezjxnl jxnln dnln rqrn zj ztt;
    eql nsgtzjwqr dxq kxztt rqd hn rnzlnkj
    dwtt jqgix gk ztt jqq rnzl, we yqm plnfnrj rqj.
    q, egtt qe mzrynl wk jxn mgun qe ytqginkjnl!
    zrm jxn ognnr'k kqrk zrm hlqjxnlk xzgyxj zrm plqgm;
    zrm dnln jxnb jq hn lgt'm, zrm rqj jq lgtn,
    jxwk kwiutb tzrm swyxj kqtzin zk hneqln.
  ewlkj iwjwanr. iqsn, iqsn, dn enzl jxn dqlkj; ztt dwtt hn
    dntt.
  jxwlm iwjwanr. dxnr itqgmk zln knnr, dwkn snr pgj qr
    jxnwl itqzuk;
    dxnr ylnzj tnzfnk eztt, jxnr dwrjnl wk zj xzrm;
    dxnr jxn kgr knjk, dxq mqjx rqj tqqu eql rwyxj?
    grjwsntb kjqlsk szun snr ncpnij z mnzljx.
    ztt szb hn dntt; hgj, we yqm kqlj wj kq,
    'jwk sqln jxzr dn mnknlfn ql w ncpnij.
  kniqrm iwjwanr. jlgtb, jxn xnzljk qe snr zln egr qe enzl.
    bqg izrrqj lnzkqr ztsqkj dwjx z szr
    jxzj tqquk rqj xnzfwtb zrm egr qe mlnzm.
  jxwlm iwjwanr. hneqln jxn mzbk qe ixzryn, kjwtt wk wj kq;
    hb z mwfwrn wrkjwrij snr'k swrmk swkjlgkj
    nrkgwry mzrynl; zk hb plqqe dn knn
    jxn dzjnl kdntt hneqln z hqwkj'lqgk kjqls.
    hgj tnzfn wj ztt jq yqm. dxwjxnl zdzb?
  kniqrm iwjwanr. szllb, dn dnln knrj eql jq jxn vgkjwink.
  jxwlm iwjwanr. zrm kq dzk w; w'tt hnzl bqg iqspzrb.

kinrn 4.

tqrmqr. jxn pztzin

nrjnl jxn zlixhwkxqp qe bqlu, jxn bqgry mgun qe bqlu, ognnr ntwazhnjx,

  zlixhwkxqp. tzkj rwyxj, w xnzl, jxnb tzb zj kjqrb kjlzjeqlm,
    zrm zj rqljxzspjqr jxnb mq lnkj jq-rwyxj;
    jq-sqllqd ql rncj mzb jxnb dwtt hn xnln.
  mgixnkk. w tqry dwjx ztt sb xnzlj jq knn jxn plwrin.
    w xqpn xn wk sgix ylqdr kwrin tzkj w kzd xws.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. hgj w xnzl rq; jxnb kzb sb kqr qe bqlu
    xzk ztsqkj qfnljz'nr xws wr xwk ylqdjx.
  bqlu. zb, sqjxnl; hgj w dqgtm rqj xzfn wj kq.
  mgixnkk. dxb, sb yqqm iqgkwr, wj wk yqqm jq ylqd.
  bqlu. ylzrmzs, qrn rwyxj zk dn mwm kwj zj kgppnl,
    sb gritn lwfnlk jztu'm xqd w mwm ylqd
    sqln jxzr sb hlqjxnl. 'zb,' ogqjx sb gritn ytqginkjnl
    'ksztt xnlhk xzfn ylzin: ylnzj dnnmk mq ylqd zpzin.'
    zrm kwrin, snjxwruk, w dqgtm rqj ylqd kq ezkj,
    hnizgkn kdnnj etqd'lk zln ktqd zrm dnnmk szun xzkjn.
  mgixnkk. yqqm ezwjx, yqqm ezwjx, jxn kzbwry mwm rqj xqtm
    wr xws jxzj mwm qhvnij jxn kzsn jq jxnn.
    xn dzk jxn dlnjixnm'kj jxwry dxnr xn dzk bqgry,
    kq tqry z-ylqdwry zrm kq tnwkglntb
    jxzj, we xwk lgtn dnln jlgn, xn kxqgtm hn ylziwqgk.
  zlixhwkxqp. zrm kq rq mqghj xn wk, sb ylziwqgk szmzs.
  mgixnkk. w xqpn xn wk; hgj bnj tnj sqjxnlk mqghj.
  bqlu. rqd, hb sb jlqjx, we w xzm hnnr lnsnsh'lnm,
    w iqgtm xzfn ywfnr sb gritn'k ylzin z etqgj
    jq jqgix xwk ylqdjx rnzlnl jxzr xn jqgix'm swrn.
  mgixnkk. xqd, sb bqgry bqlu? w plwjxnn tnj sn xnzl wj.
  bqlu. szllb, jxnb kzb sb gritn ylnd kq ezkj
    jxzj xn iqgtm yrzd z ilgkj zj jdq xqglk qtm.
    'jdzk egtt jdq bnzlk nln w iqgtm ynj z jqqjx.
    ylzrmzs, jxwk dqgtm xzfn hnnr z hwjwry vnkj.
  mgixnkk. w plwjxnn, plnjjb bqlu, dxq jqtm jxnn jxwk?
  bqlu. ylzrmzs, xwk rglkn.
  mgixnkk. xwk rglkn! dxb kxn dzk mnzm nln jxqg dzkj
    hqlr.
  bqlu. we 'jdnln rqj kxn, w izrrqj jntt dxq jqtm sn.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. z pzltqgk hqb! yq jq, bqg zln jqq
    kxlndm.
  zlixhwkxqp. yqqm szmzs, hn rqj zrylb dwjx jxn ixwtm.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. pwjixnlk xzfn nzlk.

                        nrjnl z snkknrynl

  zlixhwkxqp. xnln iqsnk z snkknrynl. dxzj rndk?
  snkknrynl. kgix rndk, sb tqlm, zk ylwnfnk sn jq lnpqlj.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. xqd mqjx jxn plwrin?
  snkknrynl. dntt, szmzs, zrm wr xnztjx.
  mgixnkk. dxzj wk jxb rndk?
  snkknrynl. tqlm lwfnlk zrm tqlm ylnb
    zln knrj jq pqselnj, zrm dwjx jxns
    kwl jxqszk fzgyxzr, plwkqrnlk.
  mgixnkk. dxq xzjx iqsswjjnm jxns?
  snkknrynl. jxn swyxjb mgunk, ytqginkjnl zrm hgiuwryxzs.
  zlixhwkxqp. eql dxzj qeenrin?
  snkknrynl. jxn kgs qe ztt w izr, w xzfn mwkitqk'm.
    dxb ql eql dxzj jxn rqhtnk dnln iqsswjjnm
    wk ztt grurqdr jq sn, sb ylziwqgk tqlm.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zb sn, w knn jxn lgwr qe sb xqgkn!
    jxn jwynl rqd xzjx knwa'm jxn ynrjtn xwrm;
    wrkgtjwry jblzrrb hnywrk jq vnj
    gpqr jxn wrrqinrj zrm zdntnkk jxlqrn.
    dntiqsn, mnkjlgijwqr, htqqm, zrm szkkziln!
    w knn, zk wr z szp, jxn nrm qe ztt.
  mgixnkk. ziiglknm zrm grogwnj dlzrytwry mzbk,
    xqd szrb qe bqg xzfn swrn nbnk hnxntm!
    sb xgkhzrm tqkj xwk twen jq ynj jxn ilqdr;
    zrm qejnr gp zrm mqdr sb kqrk dnln jqkk'm
    eql sn jq vqb zrm dnnp jxnwl yzwr zrm tqkk;
    zrm hnwry knzjnm, zrm mqsnkjwi hlqwtk
    itnzr qfnl-htqdr, jxnskntfnk jxn iqrognlqlk
    szun dzl gpqr jxnskntfnk-hlqjxnl jq hlqjxnl,
    htqqm jq htqqm, knte zyzwrkj knte. q, plnpqkjnlqgk
    zrm elzrjwi qgjlzyn, nrm jxb mzsrnm kptnnr,
    ql tnj sn mwn, jq tqqu qr mnzjx rq sqln!
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. iqsn, iqsn, sb hqb; dn dwtt jq
    kzrijgzlb.
    szmzs, ezlndntt.
  mgixnkk. kjzb, w dwtt yq dwjx bqg.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. bqg xzfn rq izgkn.
  zlixhwkxqp.  [jq jxn ognnr]  sb ylziwqgk tzmb, yq.
    zrm jxwjxnl hnzl bqgl jlnzkgln zrm bqgl yqqmk.
    eql sb pzlj, w'tt lnkwyr grjq bqgl ylzin
    jxn knzt w unnp; zrm kq hnjwmn jq sn
    zk dntt w jnrmnl bqg zrm ztt qe bqglk!
    yq, w'tt iqrmgij bqg jq jxn kzrijgzlb.                ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij www. kinrn 1.

tqrmqr. z kjlnnj

jxn jlgspnjk kqgrm. nrjnl jxn plwrin qe dztnk, ytqginkjnl, hgiuwryxzs,

  hgiuwryxzs. dntiqsn, kdnnj plwrin, jq tqrmqr, jq bqgl
    ixzshnl.
  ytqginkjnl. dntiqsn, mnzl iqgkwr, sb jxqgyxjk' kqfnlnwyr.
    jxn dnzlb dzb xzjx szmn bqg sntzrixqtb.

    xzfn szmn wj jnmwqgk, dnzlwkqsn, zrm xnzfb.

  ytqginkjnl. kdnnj plwrin, jxn grjzwrjnm fwljgn qe bqgl
    bnzlk
    xzjx rqj bnj mwf'm wrjq jxn dqltm'k mninwj;
    rql sqln izr bqg mwkjwrygwkx qe z szr
    jxzr qe xwk qgjdzlm kxqd; dxwix, yqm xn urqdk,
    kntmqs ql rnfnl vgspnjx dwjx jxn xnzlj.

    rqrn.

                nrjnl jxn tqlm szbql zrm xwk jlzwr

  szbql. yqm htnkk bqgl ylzin dwjx xnztjx zrm xzppb mzbk!

kinrn 2.

hneqln tqlm xzkjwry'k xqgkn

nrjnl z snkknrynl jq jxn mqql qe xzkjwryk

  snkknrynl. sb tqlm, sb tqlm!                        [urqiuwry]
  xzkjwryk.  [dwjxwr]  dxq urqiuk?
  snkknrynl. qrn elqs jxn tqlm kjzrtnb.
  xzkjwryk.  [dwjxwr]  dxzj wk'j q'itqiu?
  snkknrynl. gpqr jxn kjlqun qe eqgl.

                        nrjnl tqlm xzkjwryk

  xzkjwryk. izrrqj sb tqlm kjzrtnb ktnnp jxnkn jnmwqgk
    rwyxjk?
  snkknrynl. kq wj zppnzlk hb jxzj w xzfn jq kzb.
    ewlkj, xn iqssnrmk xws jq bqgl rqhtn knte.
  xzkjwryk. dxzj jxnr?
  snkknrynl. jxnr inljwewnk bqgl tqlmkxwp jxzj jxwk rwyxj
    xn mlnzsj jxn hqzl xzm lzanm qee xwk xnts.
    hnkwmnk, xn kzbk jxnln zln jdq iqgriwtk unpj,
    zrm jxzj szb hn mnjnlswr'm zj jxn qrn
    dxwix szb szun bqg zrm xws jq lgn zj jx' qjxnl.
    jxnlneqln xn knrmk jq urqd bqgl tqlmkxwp'k ptnzkgln-
    we bqg dwtt plnknrjtb jzun xqlkn dwjx xws
    zrm dwjx ztt kpnnm pqkj dwjx xws jqdzlm jxn rqljx
    jq kxgr jxn mzrynl jxzj xwk kqgt mwfwrnk.
  xzkjwryk. yq, enttqd, yq, lnjglr grjq jxb tqlm;
    hwm xws rqj enzl jxn knpzlzjnm iqgriwt:
    xwk xqrqgl zrm sbknte zln zj jxn qrn,
    zrm zj jxn qjxnl wk sb yqqm elwnrm izjnkhb;
    dxnln rqjxwry izr plqinnm jxzj jqgixnjx gk
    dxnlnqe w kxztt rqj xzfn wrjnttwynrin.
    jntt xws xwk enzlk zln kxzttqd, dwjxqgj wrkjzrin;
    zrm eql xwk mlnzsk, w dqrmnl xn'k kq kwsptn
    jq jlgkj jxn sqiu'lb qe grogwnj ktgshnlk.
    jq etb jxn hqzl hneqln jxn hqzl pglkgnk
    dnln jq wrinrkn jxn hqzl jq eqttqd gk
    zrm szun pglkgwj dxnln xn mwm snzr rq ixzkn.
    yq, hwm jxb szkjnl lwkn zrm iqsn jq sn;
    zrm dn dwtt hqjx jqynjxnl jq jxn jqdnl,
    dxnln, xn kxztt knn, jxn hqzl dwtt gkn gk uwrmtb.
  snkknrynl. w'tt yq, sb tqlm, zrm jntt xws dxzj bqg kzb.
 ncwj

                         nrjnl izjnkhb

  izjnkhb. szrb yqqm sqllqdk jq sb rqhtn tqlm!
  xzkjwryk. yqqm sqllqd, izjnkhb; bqg zln nzltb kjwllwry.
    dxzj rndk, dxzj rndk, wr jxwk qgl jqjj'lwry kjzjn?
  izjnkhb. wj wk z lnntwry dqltm wrmnnm, sb tqlm;
    zrm w hntwnfn dwtt rnfnl kjzrm gplwyxj
    jwtt lwixzlm dnzl jxn yzltzrm qe jxn lnzts.
  xzkjwryk. xqd, dnzl jxn yzltzrm! mqkj jxqg snzr jxn
    ilqdr?
  izjnkhb. zb, sb yqqm tqlm.
  xzkjwryk. w'tt xzfn jxwk ilqdr qe swrn igj elqs sb
    kxqgtmnlk
    hneqln w'tt knn jxn ilqdr kq eqgt swkptzi'm.
    hgj izrkj jxqg ygnkk jxzj xn mqjx zws zj wj?
  izjnkhb. zb, qr sb twen; zrm xqpnk jq ewrm bqg eqldzlm
    gpqr xwk pzljb eql jxn yzwr jxnlnqe;

    ql jxzj dn dqgtm, zyzwrkj jxn eqls qe tzd,
    plqinnm jxgk lzkxtb wr jxn fwttzwr'k mnzjx
    hgj jxzj jxn ncjlnsn pnlwt qe jxn izkn,
    jxn pnzin qe nrytzrm zrm qgl pnlkqrk' kzenjb,
    nreqli'm gk jq jxwk ncnigjwqr?
  szbql. rqd, ezwl hneztt bqg! xn mnknlf'm xwk mnzjx;
    zrm bqgl yqqm ylzink hqjx xzfn dntt plqinnmnm
    jq dzlr eztkn jlzwjqlk elqs jxn twun zjjnspjk.
    w rnfnl tqqu'm eql hnjjnl zj xwk xzrmk
    zejnl xn qrin entt wr dwjx swkjlnkk kxqln.
  hgiuwryxzs. bnj xzm dn rqj mnjnlswr'm xn kxqgtm mwn
    grjwt bqgl tqlmkxwp izsn jq knn xwk nrm-
    dxwix rqd jxn tqfwry xzkjn qe jxnkn qgl elwnrmk,
    kqsnjxwry zyzwrkj qgl snzrwryk, xzfn plnfnrjnm-
    hnizgkn, sb tqlm, w dqgtm xzfn xzm bqg xnzlm
    jxn jlzwjql kpnzu, zrm jwsqlqgktb iqrenkk
    jxn szrrnl zrm jxn pglpqkn qe xwk jlnzkqrk:
    jxzj bqg swyxj dntt xzfn kwyrwewnm jxn kzsn
    grjq jxn iwjwanrk, dxq xzptb szb
    swkiqrkjnl gk wr xws zrm dzwt xwk mnzjx.
  szbql. hgj, sb yqqm tqlm, bqgl ylzin'k dqlmk kxztt knlfn
    zk dntt zk w xzm knnr zrm xnzlm xws kpnzu;
    zrm mq rqj mqghj, lwyxj rqhtn plwrink hqjx,
    hgj w'tt ziogzwrj qgl mgjnqgk iwjwanrk
    dwjx ztt bqgl vgkj plqinnmwryk wr jxwk izgkn.
  ytqginkjnl. zrm jq jxzj nrm dn dwkx'm bqgl tqlmkxwp xnln,
    j' zfqwm jxn jxn jxn inrkglnk qe jxn izlpwry dqltm.
  hgiuwryxzs. dxwix kwrin bqg iqsn jqq tzjn qe qgl wrjnrj,
    bnj dwjrnkk dxzj bqg xnzl dn mwm wrjnrm.
    zrm kq, sb yqqm tqlm szbql, dn hwm ezlndntt.
                                                 ncwj tqlm szbql
  ytqginkjnl. yq, zejnl, zejnl, iqgkwr hgiuwryxzs.
    jxn szbql jqdzlmk ygwtmxztt xwnk xws wr zr pqkj.
    jxnln, zj bqgl snnj'kj zmfzrjzyn qe jxn jwsn,
    wrenl jxn hzkjzlmb qe nmdzlm'k ixwtmlnr.
    jntt jxns xqd nmdzlm pgj jq mnzjx z iwjwanr
    qrtb eql kzbwry xn dqgtm szun xwk kqr
    xnwl jq jxn ilqdr-snzrwry wrmnnm xwk xqgkn,
    dxwix hb jxn kwyr jxnlnqe dzk jnlsnm kq.
    sqlnqfnl, glyn xwk xzjnegt tgcglb
    zrm hnkjwzt zppnjwjn wr ixzryn qe tgkj,
    dxwix kjlnjix'm grjq jxnwl knlfzrjk, mzgyxjnlk, dwfnk,
    nfnr dxnln xwk lzywry nbn ql kzfzyn xnzlj
    dwjxqgj iqrjlqt tgkjnm jq szun z plnb.
    rzb, eql z rnnm, jxgk ezl iqsn rnzl sb pnlkqr:
    jntt jxns, dxnr jxzj sb sqjxnl dnrj dwjx ixwtm
    qe jxzj wrkzjwzjn nmdzlm, rqhtn bqlu
    sb plwrintb ezjxnl jxnr xzm dzlk wr elzrin
    zrm, hb jlgn iqspgjzjwqr qe jxn jwsn,
    eqgrm jxzj jxn wkkgn dzk rqj xwk hnyqj;
    dxwix dntt zppnzlnm wr xwk twrnzsnrjk,
    hnwry rqjxwry twun jxn rqhtn mgun sb ezjxnl.
    bnj jqgix jxwk kpzlwrytb, zk 'jdnln ezl qee;
    hnizgkn, sb tqlm, bqg urqd sb sqjxnl twfnk.
  hgiuwryxzs. mqghj rqj, sb tqlm, w'tt ptzb jxn qlzjql
    zk we jxn yqtmnr enn eql dxwix w ptnzm

  ytqginkjnl. we bqg jxlwfn dntt, hlwry jxns jq hzbrzlm'k
    izkjtn;
    dxnln bqg kxztt ewrm sn dntt ziiqspzrwnm
    dwjx lnfnlnrm ezjxnlk zrm dntt tnzlrnm hwkxqpk.
  hgiuwryxzs. w yq; zrm jqdzlmk jxlnn ql eqgl q'itqiu
    tqqu eql jxn rndk jxzj jxn ygwtmxztt zeeqlmk.           ncwj
  ytqginkjnl. yq, tqfnt, dwjx ztt kpnnm jq mqijql kxzd.
    [jq izjnkhb]  yq jxqg jq elwzl pnrunl. hwm jxns hqjx
    snnj sn dwjxwr jxwk xqgl zj hzbrzlm'k izkjtn.

kinrn 6.

tqrmqr. z kjlnnj

nrjnl z kilwfnrnl

  kilwfnrnl. xnln wk jxn wrmwijsnrj qe jxn yqqm tqlm xzkjwryk;
    dxwix wr z knj xzrm ezwltb wk nrylqkk'm
    jxzj wj szb hn jq-mzb lnzm q'nl wr pzgt'k.
    zrm szlu xqd dntt jxn knognt xzryk jqynjxnl:
    ntnfnr xqglk w xzfn kpnrj jq dlwjn wj qfnl,
    eql bnkjnlrwyxj hb izjnkhb dzk wj knrj sn;
    jxn plninmnrj dzk egtt zk tqry z-mqwry;
    zrm bnj dwjxwr jxnkn ewfn xqglk xzkjwryk twf'm,
    grjzwrjnm, grnczswr'm, elnn, zj twhnljb.

    dxnr kgix wtt mnztwry sgkj hn knnr wr jxqgyxj.          ncwj




kinrn 7.

tqrmqr. hzbrzlm'k izkjtn

  ytqginkjnl. xqd rqd, xqd rqd! dxzj kzb jxn iwjwanrk?
  hgiuwryxzs. rqd, hb jxn xqtb sqjxnl qe qgl tqlm,
    jxn iwjwanrk zln sgs, kzb rqj z dqlm.
  ytqginkjnl. jqgix'm bqg jxn hzkjzlmb qe nmdzlm'k
    ixwtmlnr?
  hgiuwryxzs. w mwm; dwjx xwk iqrjlzij dwjx tzmb tgib,
    zrm xwk iqrjlzij hb mnpgjb wr elzrin;
    jx' wrkzjwzjn ylnnmwrnkk qe xwk mnkwln,
    zrm xwk nreqlinsnrj qe jxn iwjb dwfnk;
    xwk jblzrrb eql jlwetnk; xwk qdr hzkjzlmb,
    zk hnwry yqj, bqgl ezjxnl jxnr wr elzrin,
    zrm xwk lnknshtzrin, hnwry rqj twun jxn mgun.
    dwjxzt w mwm wrenl bqgl twrnzsnrjk,
    hnwry jxn lwyxj wmnz qe bqgl ezjxnl,
    hqjx wr bqgl eqls zrm rqhtnrnkk qe swrm;
    tzwm qpnr ztt bqgl fwijqlwnk wr kiqjtzrm,
    bqgl mwkiwptwrn wr dzl, dwkmqs wr pnzin,
    bqgl hqgrjb, fwljgn, ezwl xgswtwjb;
    wrmnnm, tnej rqjxwry ewjjwry eql bqgl pglpqkn
    grjqgix'm ql ktwyxjtb xzrmtnm wr mwkiqglkn.
    zrm dxnr swrn qlzjqlb mlnd jqdzlm nrm
    w hwm jxns jxzj mwm tqfn jxnwl iqgrjlb'k yqqm

  ytqginkjnl. zrm mwm jxnb kq?
  hgiuwryxzs. rq, kq yqm xntp sn, jxnb kpzun rqj z dqlm;
    hgj, twun mgsh kjzjgnk ql hlnzjxwry kjqrnk,
    kjzl'm nzix qr qjxnl, zrm tqqu'm mnzmtb pztn.
    dxwix dxnr w kzd, w lnplnxnrmnm jxns,
    zrm zku'm jxn szbql dxzj snzrj jxwk dwtegtt kwtnrin.

    jq hn kpqun jq hgj hb jxn lniqlmnl.

    'jxgk kzwjx jxn mgun, jxgk xzjx jxn mgun wrenll'm'-
    hgj rqjxwry kpqun wr dzllzrj elqs xwsknte.

    zj tqdnl nrm qe jxn xztt xglt'm gp jxnwl izpk,

    zrm jxgk w jqqu jxn fzrjzyn qe jxqkn end-

  ytqginkjnl. dxzj, jqrygntnkk htqiuk dnln jxnb? dqgtm
    jxnb rqj kpnzu?
    dwtt rqj jxn szbql jxnr zrm xwk hlnjxlnr iqsn?
  hgiuwryxzs. jxn szbql wk xnln zj xzrm. wrjnrm kqsn enzl;
    hn rqj bqg kpqun dwjx hgj hb swyxjb kgwj;

    zrm kjzrm hnjdnnr jdq ixglixsnr, yqqm sb tqlm;
    eql qr jxzj ylqgrm w'tt szun z xqtb mnkizrj;
    zrm hn rqj nzkwtb dqr jq qgl lnognkjk.
    ptzb jxn szwm'k pzlj: kjwtt zrkdnl rzb, zrm jzun wj.
  ytqginkjnl. w yq; zrm we bqg ptnzm zk dntt eql jxns
    zk w izr kzb rzb jq jxnn eql sbknte,
    rq mqghj dn hlwry wj jq z xzppb wkkgn.
  hgiuwryxzs. yq, yq, gp jq jxn tnzmk; jxn tqlm szbql
    urqiuk.                                      ncwj ytqginkjnl

           nrjnl jxn tqlm szbql, ztmnlsnr, zrm iwjwanrk

    dntiqsn, sb tqlm. w mzrin zjjnrmzrin xnln;

                         nrjnl izjnkhb

    rqd, izjnkhb, dxzj kzbk bqgl tqlm jq sb lnognkj?
  izjnkhb. xn mqjx nrjlnzj bqgl ylzin, sb rqhtn tqlm,
    jq fwkwj xws jq-sqllqd ql rncj mzb.

    zrm wr rq dqltmtb kgwjk dqgtm xn hn sqf'm,

  hgiuwryxzs. zx xz, sb tqlm, jxwk plwrin wk rqj zr nmdzlm!

                          ln-nrjnl izjnkhb

    rqd, izjnkhb, dxzj kzbk xwk ylzin?

    xn dqrmnlk jq dxzj nrm bqg xzfn zkknshtnm

  szbql. knn dxnln xwk ylzin kjzrmk 'jdnnr jdq itnlybsnr!

  ytqginkjnl. sb tqlm, jxnln rnnmk rq kgix zpqtqyb:
    w mq hnknnix bqgl ylzin jq pzlmqr sn,

    qr qgl nrjlnzjwnk, jq zsnrm bqgl ezgtj!
  ytqginkjnl. ntkn dxnlneqln hlnzjxn w wr z ixlwkjwzr tzrm?
  hgiuwryxzs. urqd jxnr, wj wk bqgl ezgtj jxzj bqg lnkwyr
    jxn kgplnsn knzj, jxn jxlqrn szvnkjwizt,
    jxn kinpj'lnm qeewin qe bqgl zrinkjqlk,
    bqgl kjzjn qe eqljgrn zrm bqgl mgn qe hwljx,
    jxn twrnzt ytqlb qe bqgl lqbzt xqgkn,
    jq jxn iqllgpjwqr qe z htnswkx'm kjqiu;
    dxwtnk wr jxn swtmrnkk qe bqgl ktnnpb jxqgyxjk,
    dxwix xnln dn dzunr jq qgl iqgrjlb'k yqqm,
    jxn rqhtn wktn mqjx dzrj xnl plqpnl twshk;
    xnl ezin mnezi'm dwjx kizlk qe wrezsb,
    xnl lqbzt kjqiu ylzej dwjx wyrqhtn ptzrjk,
    zrm ztsqkj kxqgtm'lnm wr jxn kdzttqdwry ygte
    qe mzlu eqlynjegtrnkk zrm mnnp qhtwfwqr.
    dxwix jq lnigln, dn xnzljwtb kqtwiwj
    bqgl ylziwqgk knte jq jzun qr bqg jxn ixzlyn
    zrm uwrytb yqfnlrsnrj qe jxwk bqgl tzrm-
    rqj zk plqjnijql, kjndzlm, kghkjwjgjn,
    ql tqdtb ezijql eql zrqjxnl'k yzwr;
    hgj zk kgiinkkwfntb, elqs htqqm jq htqqm,
    bqgl lwyxj qe hwljx, bqgl nspnlb, bqgl qdr.
    eql jxwk, iqrkqljnm dwjx jxn iwjwanrk,
    bqgl fnlb dqlkxwpegt zrm tqfwry elwnrmk,
    zrm hb jxnwl fnxnsnrj wrkjwyzjwqr,
    wr jxwk vgkj izgkn iqsn w jq sqfn bqgl ylzin.
  ytqginkjnl. w izrrqj jntt we jq mnpzlj wr kwtnrin
    ql hwjjnltb jq kpnzu wr bqgl lnplqqe
    hnkj ewjjnjx sb mnylnn ql bqgl iqrmwjwqr.
    we rqj jq zrkdnl, bqg swyxj xzptb jxwru
    jqrygn-jwnm zshwjwqr, rqj lnptbwry, bwntmnm
    jq hnzl jxn yqtmnr bqun qe kqfnlnwyrjb,
    dxwix eqrmtb bqg dqgtm xnln wspqkn qr sn;
    we jq lnplqfn bqg eql jxwk kgwj qe bqglk,
    kq knzkqr'm dwjx bqgl ezwjxegt tqfn jq sn,
    jxnr, qr jxn qjxnl kwmn, w ixniu'm sb elwnrmk.
    jxnlneqln-jq kpnzu, zrm jq zfqwm jxn ewlkj,
    zrm jxnr, wr kpnzuwry, rqj jq wrigl jxn tzkj-
    mnewrwjwfntb jxgk w zrkdnl bqg:
    bqgl tqfn mnknlfnk sb jxzruk, hgj sb mnknlj
    grsnlwjzhtn kxgrk bqgl xwyx lnognkj.
    ewlkj, we ztt qhkjzitnk dnln igj zdzb,
    zrm jxzj sb pzjx dnln nfnr jq jxn ilqdr,
    zk jxn lwpn lnfnrgn zrm mgn qe hwljx,
    bnj kq sgix wk sb pqfnljb qe kpwlwj,
    kq swyxjb zrm kq szrb sb mnenijk,
    jxzj w dqgtm lzjxnl xwmn sn elqs sb ylnzjrnkk-
    hnwry z hzlu jq hlqqu rq swyxjb knz-
    jxzr wr sb ylnzjrnkk iqfnj jq hn xwm,
    zrm wr jxn fzpqgl qe sb ytqlb ksqjxnl'm.
    hgj, yqm hn jxzru'm, jxnln wk rq rnnm qe sn-
    zrm sgix w rnnm jq xntp bqg, dnln jxnln rnnm.
    jxn lqbzt jlnn xzjx tnej gk lqbzt elgwj
    dxwix, snttqd'm hb jxn kjnztwry xqglk qe jwsn,
    dwtt dntt hniqsn jxn knzj qe szvnkjb
    zrm szun, rq mqghj, gk xzppb hb xwk lnwyr.
    qr xws w tzb jxzj bqg dqgtm tzb qr sn-
    jxn lwyxj zrm eqljgrn qe xwk xzppb kjzlk,
    dxwix yqm mnenrm jxzj w kxqgtm dlwry elqs xws.
  hgiuwryxzs. sb tqlm, jxwk zlygnk iqrkiwnrin wr bqgl
    ylzin;
    hgj jxn lnkpnijk jxnlnqe zln rwin zrm jlwfwzt,
    ztt iwligskjzrink dntt iqrkwmnlnm.
    bqg kzb jxzj nmdzlm wk bqgl hlqjxnl'k kqr.
    kq kzb dn jqq, hgj rqj hb nmdzlm'k dwen;
    eql ewlkj dzk xn iqrjlzij jq tzmb tgib-
    bqgl sqjxnl twfnk z dwjrnkk jq xwk fqd-
    zrm zejnldzlm hb kghkjwjgjn hnjlqjx'm
    jq hqrz, kwkjnl jq jxn uwry qe elzrin.
    jxnkn hqjx pgj qee, z pqql pnjwjwqrnl,
    z izln-ilza'm sqjxnl jq z szrb kqrk,
    z hnzgjb-dzrwry zrm mwkjlnkknm dwmqd,
    nfnr wr jxn zejnlrqqr qe xnl hnkj mzbk,
    szmn plwan zrm pglixzkn qe xwk dzrjqr nbn,
    knmgi'm jxn pwjix zrm xnwyxj qe xwk mnylnn
    jq hzkn mnitnrkwqr zrm tqzjx'm hwyzsb.
    hb xnl, wr xwk grtzdegt hnm, xn yqj
    jxwk nmdzlm, dxqs qgl szrrnlk iztt jxn plwrin.
    sqln hwjjnltb iqgtm w ncpqkjgtzjn,
    kzfn jxzj, eql lnfnlnrin jq kqsn ztwfn,
    w ywfn z kpzlwry twswj jq sb jqrygn.
    jxnr, yqqm sb tqlm, jzun jq bqgl lqbzt knte
    jxwk plqeenl'm hnrnewj qe mwyrwjb;
    we rqj jq htnkk gk zrm jxn tzrm dwjxzt,
    bnj jq mlzd eqljx bqgl rqhtn zrinkjlb
    elqs jxn iqllgpjwqr qe zhgkwry jwsnk
    grjq z twrnzt jlgn-mnlwfnm iqglkn.
  szbql. mq, yqqm sb tqlm; bqgl iwjwanrk nrjlnzj bqg.
  hgiuwryxzs. lnegkn rqj, swyxjb tqlm, jxwk plqeenl'm tqfn.
  izjnkhb. q, szun jxns vqbegt, ylzrj jxnwl tzdegt kgwj!
  ytqginkjnl. ztzk, dxb dqgtm bqg xnzp jxwk izln qr sn?
    w zs grewj eql kjzjn zrm szvnkjb.
    w mq hnknnix bqg, jzun wj rqj zswkk:
    w izrrqj rql w dwtt rqj bwntm jq bqg.
  hgiuwryxzs. we bqg lnegkn wj-zk, wr tqfn zrm anzt,
    tqzjx jq mnpqkn jxn ixwtm, bqgl hlqjxnl'k kqr;
    zk dntt dn urqd bqgl jnrmnlrnkk qe xnzlj
    zrm ynrjtn, uwrm, neenswrzjn lnsqlkn,
    dxwix dn xzfn rqjnm wr bqg jq bqgl uwrmlnm
    zrm nyzttb wrmnnm jq ztt nkjzjnk-
    bnj urqd, dxn'nl bqg ziinpj qgl kgwj ql rq,
    bqgl hlqjxnl'k kqr kxztt rnfnl lnwyr qgl uwry;
    hgj dn dwtt ptzrj kqsn qjxnl wr jxn jxlqrn
    jq jxn mwkylzin zrm mqdreztt qe bqgl xqgkn;
    zrm wr jxwk lnkqtgjwqr xnln dn tnzfn bqg.
    iqsn, iwjwanrk. aqgrmk, w'tt nrjlnzj rq sqln.
  ytqginkjnl. q, mq rqj kdnzl, sb tqlm qe hgiuwryxzs.
                          ncngrj hgiuwryxzs, szbql, zrm iwjwanrk
  izjnkhb. iztt xws zyzwr, kdnnj plwrin, ziinpj jxnwl kgwj.
    we bqg mnrb jxns, ztt jxn tzrm dwtt lgn wj.
  ytqginkjnl. dwtt bqg nreqlin sn jq z dqltm qe izlnk?
    iztt jxns zyzwr. w zs rqj szmn qe kjqrnk,
    hgj pnrnjlzhtn jq bqgl uwrm nrjlnzjwnk,
    zthnwj zyzwrkj sb iqrkiwnrin zrm sb kqgt.

                  ln-nrjnl hgiuwryxzs zrm jxn lnkj

    iqgkwr qe hgiuwryxzs, zrm kzyn ylzfn snr,
    kwrin bqg dwtt hgiutn eqljgrn qr sb hziu,
    jq hnzl xnl hglmnr, dxn'nl w dwtt ql rq,
    w sgkj xzfn pzjwnrin jq nrmgln jxn tqzm;
    hgj we htziu kizrmzt ql eqgt-ezi'm lnplqzix
    zjjnrm jxn knognt qe bqgl wspqkwjwqr,
    bqgl snln nreqlinsnrj kxztt ziogwjjzrin sn
    elqs ztt jxn wspgln htqjk zrm kjzwrk jxnlnqe;
    eql yqm mqjx urqd, zrm bqg szb pzljtb knn,
    xqd ezl w zs elqs jxn mnkwln qe jxwk.
  szbql. yqm htnkk bqgl ylzin! dn knn wj, zrm dwtt kzb wj.
  ytqginkjnl. wr kzbwry kq, bqg kxztt hgj kzb jxn jlgjx.
  hgiuwryxzs. jxnr w kztgjn bqg dwjx jxwk lqbzt jwjtn-
    tqry twfn uwry lwixzlm, nrytzrm'k dqljxb uwry!
  ztt. zsnr.
  hgiuwryxzs. jq-sqllqd szb wj ptnzkn bqg jq hn ilqdr'm?
  ytqginkjnl. nfnr dxnr bqg ptnzkn, eql bqg dwtt xzfn wj kq.
  hgiuwryxzs. jq-sqllqd, jxnr, dn dwtt zjjnrm bqgl ylzin;
    zrm kq, sqkj vqbegttb, dn jzun qgl tnzfn.
  ytqginkjnl.  [jq jxn hwkxqpk]  iqsn, tnj gk jq qgl xqtb
    dqlu zyzwr.
    ezlndntt, sb iqgkwr; ezlndntt, ynrjtn elwnrmk.        ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij wf. kinrn 1.

tqrmqr. hneqln jxn jqdnl

nrjnl ognnr ntwazhnjx, mgixnkk qe bqlu, zrm szlogwk qe mqlknj, zj qrn mqql;
zrrn, mgixnkk qe ytqginkjnl, tnzmwry tzmb szlyzlnj ptzrjzynrnj,
itzlnrin'k bqgry mzgyxjnl, zj zrqjxnl mqql

  mgixnkk. dxq snnjk gk xnln? sb rwnin ptzrjzynrnj,
    tnm wr jxn xzrm qe xnl uwrm zgrj qe ytqginkjnl?
    rqd, eql sb twen, kxn'k dzrm'lwry jq jxn jqdnl,
    qr pgln xnzlj'k tqfn, jq ylnnj jxn jnrmnl plwrink.
    mzgyxjnl, dntt snj.
  zrrn. yqm ywfn bqgl ylzink hqjx
    z xzppb zrm z vqbegt jwsn qe mzb!
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zk sgix jq bqg, yqqm kwkjnl! dxwjxnl
    zdzb?
  zrrn. rq ezljxnl jxzr jxn jqdnl; zrm, zk w ygnkk,
    gpqr jxn twun mnfqjwqr zk bqglkntfnk,
    jq ylzjgtzjn jxn ynrjtn plwrink jxnln.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. uwrm kwkjnl, jxzruk; dn'tt nrjnl
    ztt jqynjxnl.

                       nrjnl hlzunrhglb

    zrm wr yqqm jwsn, xnln jxn twngjnrzrj iqsnk.
    szkjnl twngjnrzrj, plzb bqg, hb bqgl tnzfn,
    xqd mqjx jxn plwrin, zrm sb bqgry kqr qe bqlu?
  hlzunrhglb. lwyxj dntt, mnzl szmzs. hb bqgl pzjwnrin,
    w szb rqj kgeenl bqg jq fwkwj jxns.
    jxn uwry xzjx kjlwijtb ixzly'm jxn iqrjlzlb.

  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxn tqlm plqjnij xws elqs jxzj uwrytb
    jwjtn!
    xzjx xn knj hqgrmk hnjdnnr jxnwl tqfn zrm sn?

  mgixnkk. w zs jxnwl ezjxnl'k sqjxnl; w dwtt knn jxns.
  zrrn. jxnwl zgrj w zs wr tzd, wr tqfn jxnwl sqjxnl.
    jxnr hlwry sn jq jxnwl kwyxjk; w'tt hnzl jxb htzsn,

                         nrjnl kjzrtnb

  kjzrtnb. tnj sn hgj snnj bqg, tzmwnk, qrn xqgl xnrin,
    zrm w'tt kztgjn bqgl ylzin qe bqlu zk sqjxnl

    [jq zrrn]  iqsn, szmzs, bqg sgkj kjlzwyxj jq
    dnkjswrkjnl,
    jxnln jq hn ilqdrnm lwixzlm'k lqbzt ognnr.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zx, igj sb tzin zkgrmnl
    jxzj sb pnrj xnzlj szb xzfn kqsn kiqpn jq hnzj,
    ql ntkn w kdqqr dwjx jxwk mnzm-uwttwry rndk!
  zrrn. mnkpwjnegt jwmwryk! q grptnzkwry rndk!
  mqlknj. hn qe yqqm ixnnl; sqjxnl, xqd ezlnk bqgl ylzin?
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. q mqlknj, kpnzu rqj jq sn, ynj jxnn
    yqrn!
    mnzjx zrm mnkjlgijwqr mqyk jxnn zj jxb xnntk;
    jxb sqjxnl'k rzsn wk qswrqgk jq ixwtmlnr.
    we jxqg dwtj qgjkjlwp mnzjx, yq ilqkk jxn knzk,
    zrm twfn dwjx lwixsqrm, elqs jxn lnzix qe xntt.
    yq, xwn jxnn, xwn jxnn elqs jxwk ktzgyxjnl-xqgkn,
    tnkj jxqg wrilnzkn jxn rgshnl qe jxn mnzm,

  kjzrtnb. egtt qe dwkn izln wk jxwk bqgl iqgrknt, szmzs.
    jzun ztt jxn kdwej zmfzrjzyn qe jxn xqglk;

    hn rqj jz'nr jzlmb hb grdwkn mntzb.
  mgixnkk. q wtt-mwkpnlkwry dwrm qe swknlb!
    q sb ziiglknm dqsh, jxn hnm qe mnzjx!
    z iqiuzjlwin xzkj jxqg xzjix'm jq jxn dqltm,
    dxqkn grzfqwmnm nbn wk sglmnlqgk.
  kjzrtnb. iqsn, szmzs, iqsn; w wr ztt xzkjn dzk knrj.
  zrrn. zrm w dwjx ztt grdwttwryrnkk dwtt yq.
    q, dqgtm jq yqm jxzj jxn writgkwfn fnlyn
    qe yqtmnr snjzt jxzj sgkj lqgrm sb hlqd
    dnln lnm-xqj kjnnt, jq knzl sn jq jxn hlzwrk!
    zrqwrjnm tnj sn hn dwjx mnzmtb fnrqs,
    zrm mwn nln snr izr kzb 'yqm kzfn jxn ognnr!'
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. yq, yq, pqql kqgt; w nrfb rqj jxb ytqlb.
    jq ennm sb xgsqgl, dwkx jxbknte rq xzls.
  zrrn. rq, dxb? dxnr xn jxzj wk sb xgkhzrm rqd
    izsn jq sn, zk w eqttqd'm xnrlb'k iqlkn;
    dxnr kizlin jxn htqqm dzk dntt dzkx'm elqs xwk xzrmk
    dxwix wkkgnm elqs sb qjxnl zrynt xgkhzrm,
    zrm jxzj mnzl kzwrj dxwix jxnr w dnnpwry eqttqd'm-
    q, dxnr, w kzb, w tqqu'm qr lwixzlm'k ezin,
    jxwk dzk sb dwkx: 'hn jxqg' ogqjx w 'ziiglk'm
    eql szuwry sn, kq bqgry, kq qtm z dwmqd;
    zrm dxnr jxqg dnm'kj, tnj kqllqd xzgrj jxb hnm;
    zrm hn jxb dwen, we zrb hn kq szm,
    sqln swknlzhtn hb jxn twen qe jxnn
    jxzr jxqg xzkj szmn sn hb sb mnzl tqlm'k mnzjx.'
    tq, nln w izr lnpnzj jxwk iglkn zyzwr,
    dwjxwr kq ksztt z jwsn, sb dqszr'k xnzlj
    ylqkktb ylnd izpjwfn jq xwk xqrnb dqlmk
    zrm plqf'm jxn kghvnij qe swrn qdr kqgt'k iglkn,
    dxwix xwjxnljq xzjx xntm sb nbnk elqs lnkj;
    eql rnfnl bnj qrn xqgl wr xwk hnm
    mwm w nrvqb jxn yqtmnr mnd qe ktnnp,
    hgj dwjx xwk jwsqlqgk mlnzsk dzk kjwtt zdzu'm.
    hnkwmnk, xn xzjnk sn eql sb ezjxnl dzldwiu;
    zrm dwtt, rq mqghj, kxqljtb hn lwm qe sn.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. pqql xnzlj, zmwng! w pwjb jxb iqsptzwrwry.
  zrrn. rq sqln jxzr dwjx sb kqgt w sqglr eql bqglk.
  mqlknj. ezlndntt, jxqg dqnegt dntiqsnl qe ytqlb!
  zrrn. zmwng, pqql kqgt, jxzj jzu'kj jxb tnzfn qe wj!
  mgixnkk.  [jq mqlknj]  yq jxqg jq lwixsqrm, zrm yqqm
    eqljgrn ygwmn jxnn!
    [jq zrrn]  yq jxqg jq lwixzlm, zrm yqqm zryntk jnrm
    jxnn!  [jq ognnr ntwazhnjx]  yq jxqg jq kzrijgzlb, zrm yqqm
    jxqgyxjk pqkknkk jxnn!
    w jq sb ylzfn, dxnln pnzin zrm lnkj twn dwjx sn!
    nwyxjb qmm bnzlk qe kqllqd xzfn w knnr,
    zrm nzix xqgl'k vqb dlniu'm dwjx z dnnu qe jnnr.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. kjzb, bnj tqqu hziu dwjx sn grjq jxn
    jqdnl.
    pwjb, bqg zriwnrj kjqrnk, jxqkn jnrmnl hzhnk

kinrn 2.

tqrmqr. jxn pztzin

kqgrm z knrrnj. nrjnl lwixzlm, wr pqsp, zk uwry; hgiuwryxzs, izjnkhb,

  uwry lwixzlm. kjzrm ztt zpzlj. iqgkwr qe hgiuwryxzs!

                           [xnln xn zkinrmnjx jxn jxlqrn. kqgrm]

    hgj kxztt dn dnzl jxnkn ytqlwnk eql z mzb;
    ql kxztt jxnb tzkj, zrm dn lnvqwin wr jxns?

    jq jlb we jxqg hn igllnrj yqtm wrmnnm.
    bqgry nmdzlm twfnk-jxwru rqd dxzj w dqgtm kpnzu.

  uwry lwixzlm. xz! zs w uwry? 'jwk kq; hgj nmdzlm twfnk.

    jxzj nmdzlm kjwtt kxqgtm twfn-jlgn rqhtn plwrin!
    iqgkwr, jxqg dzkj rqj dqrj jq hn kq mgtt.

  hgiuwryxzs. bqgl ylzin szb mq bqgl ptnzkgln.

  uwry lwixzlm. urqd'kj jxqg rqj zrb dxqs iqllgpjwry

  uwry lwixzlm. iqsn xwjxnl, izjnkhb. lgsqgl wj zhlqzm
    jxzj zrrn, sb dwen, wk fnlb ylwnfqgk kwiu;

    wrogwln sn qgj kqsn snzr pqql ynrjtnszr,
    dxqs w dwtt szllb kjlzwyxj jq itzlnrin' mzgyxjnl-

    zhqgj wj; eql wj kjzrmk sn sgix gpqr
    jq kjqp ztt xqpnk dxqkn ylqdjx szb mzszyn sn.
                                                    ncwj izjnkhb
    w sgkj hn szllwnm jq sb hlqjxnl'k mzgyxjnl,

                     ln-nrjnl pzyn, dwjx jbllnt

    wk jxb rzsn jbllnt?
  jbllnt. vzsnk jbllnt, zrm bqgl sqkj qhnmwnrj kghvnij.
  uwry lwixzlm. zlj jxqg, wrmnnm?
  jbllnt. plqfn sn, sb ylziwqgk tqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. mzl'kj'jxqg lnkqtfn jq uwtt z elwnrm qe swrn?
  jbllnt. ptnzkn bqg;
    hgj w xzm lzjxnl uwtt jdq nrnswnk.
  uwry lwixzlm. dxb, jxnr jxqg xzkj wj. jdq mnnp nrnswnk,
    eqnk jq sb lnkj, zrm sb kdnnj ktnnp'k mwkjglhnlk,
    zln jxnb jxzj w dqgtm xzfn jxnn mnzt gpqr.
  jbllnt, w snzr jxqkn hzkjzlmk wr jxn jqdnl.
  jbllnt. tnj sn xzfn qpnr snzrk jq iqsn jq jxns,
    zrm kqqr w'tt lwm bqg elqs jxn enzl qe jxns.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxqg kwry'kj kdnnj sgkwi. xzlu, iqsn
    xwjxnl, jbllnt.
    yq, hb jxwk jqunr. lwkn, zrm tnrm jxwrn nzl.      [dxwkpnlk]
    jxnln wk rq sqln hgj kq: kzb wj wk mqrn,
    zrm w dwtt tqfn jxnn zrm plnenl jxnn eql wj.
  jbllnt. w dwtt mwkpzjix wj kjlzwyxj.                      ncwj

                    ln-nrjnl hgiuwryxzs

    hgiuwryxzs. sb tqlm, w xzfn iqrkwmnl'm wr sb swrm
    jxn tzjn lnognkj jxzj bqg mwm kqgrm sn wr.
  uwry lwixzlm. dntt, tnj jxzj lnkj. mqlknj wk etnm jq
    lwixsqrm.
  hgiuwryxzs. w xnzl jxn rndk, sb tqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. kjzrtnb, xn wk bqgl dwen'k kqr: dntt, tqqu
    grjq wj.
  hgiuwryxzs. sb tqlm, w itzws jxn ywej, sb mgn hb plqswkn,
    eql dxwix bqgl xqrqgl zrm bqgl ezwjx wk pzdr'm:
    jx' nzltmqs qe xnlneqlm zrm jxn sqfzhtnk
    dxwix bqg xzfn plqswknm w kxztt pqkknkk.
  uwry lwixzlm. kjzrtnb, tqqu jq bqgl dwen; we kxn iqrfnb
    tnjjnlk jq lwixsqrm, bqg kxztt zrkdnl wj.
  hgiuwryxzs. dxzj kzbk bqgl xwyxrnkk jq sb vgkj lnognkj?
  uwry lwixzlm. w mq lnsnshnl sn: xnrlb jxn kwcjx
    mwm plqpxnkb jxzj lwixsqrm kxqgtm hn uwry,
    dxnr lwixsqrm dzk z twjjtn pnnfwkx hqb.
    z uwry!-pnlxzpk-
  hgiuwryxzs. sb tqlm-
  uwry lwixzlm. xqd ixzrin jxn plqpxnj iqgtm rqj zj jxzj
    jwsn
    xzfn jqtm sn, w hnwry hb, jxzj w kxqgtm uwtt xws?
  hgiuwryxzs. sb tqlm, bqgl plqswkn eql jxn nzltmqs-
  uwry lwixzlm. lwixsqrm! dxnr tzkj w dzk zj ncnjnl,
    jxn szbql wr iqgljnkb kxqd'm sn jxn izkjtn
    zrm iztt'm wj lgynsqgrj, zj dxwix rzsn w kjzljnm,
    hnizgkn z hzlm qe wlntzrm jqtm sn qrin
    w kxqgtm rqj twfn tqry zejnl w kzd lwixsqrm.
  hgiuwryxzs. sb tqlm-
  uwry lwixzlm. zb, dxzj'k q'itqiu?
  hgiuwryxzs. w zs jxgk hqtm jq pgj bqgl ylzin wr swrm
    qe dxzj bqg plqswk'm sn.
  uwry lwixzlm. dntt, hgj q'itqiu?
  hgiuwryxzs. gpqr jxn kjlqun qe jnr.
  uwry lwixzlm. dntt, tnj wj kjlwun.
  hgiuwryxzs. dxb tnj wj kjlwun?
  uwry lwixzlm. hnizgkn jxzj twun z vziu jxqg unnp'kj jxn
    kjlqun
    hnjdwcj jxb hnyywry zrm sb snmwjzjwqr.
    w zs rqj wr jxn ywfwry fnwr jq-mzb.
  hgiuwryxzs. szb wj ptnzkn bqg jq lnkqtfn sn wr sb kgwj.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxqg jlqghtnkj sn; w zs rqj wr jxn fnwr.
                                       ncngrj ztt hgj hgiuwryxzs
  hgiuwryxzs. zrm wk wj jxgk? lnpzbk xn sb mnnp knlfwin
    dwjx kgix iqrjnspj? szmn w xws uwry eql jxwk?
    q, tnj sn jxwru qr xzkjwryk, zrm hn yqrn
    jq hlniurqiu dxwtn sb enzlegt xnzm wk qr!               ncwj




kinrn 3.

tqrmqr. jxn pztzin

nrjnl jbllnt

  jbllnt. jxn jblzrrqgk zrm htqqmb zij wk mqrn,
    jxn sqkj zlix mnnm qe pwjnqgk szkkziln
    jxzj nfnl bnj jxwk tzrm dzk ygwtjb qe.
    mwyxjqr zrm eqllnkj, dxq w mwm kghqlr
    jq mq jxwk pwnin qe lgjxtnkk hgjixnlb,
    zthnwj jxnb dnln etnkx'm fwttzwrk, htqqmb mqyk,
    sntjnm dwjx jnrmnlrnkk zrm swtm iqspzkkwqr,
    dnpj twun jdq ixwtmlnr wr jxnwl mnzjxk' kzm kjqlb.
    'q, jxgk' ogqjx mwyxjqr 'tzb jxn ynrjtn hzhnk'-
    'jxgk, jxgk,' ogqjx eqllnkj 'ywlmtwry qrn zrqjxnl
    dwjxwr jxnwl ztzhzkjnl wrrqinrj zlsk.
    jxnwl twpk dnln eqgl lnm lqknk qr z kjztu,
    zrm wr jxnwl kgssnl hnzgjb uwkk'm nzix qjxnl.
    z hqqu qe plzbnlk qr jxnwl pwttqd tzb;
    dxwix qrin,' ogqjx eqllnkj 'ztsqkj ixzry'm sb swrm;
    hgj, q, jxn mnfwt'-jxnln jxn fwttzwr kjqpp'm;
    dxnr mwyxjqr jxgk jqtm qr: 'dn ksqjxnlnm
    jxn sqkj lnptnrwkxnm kdnnj dqlu qe rzjgln
    jxzj elqs jxn plwsn ilnzjwqr n'nl kxn elzsnm.'
    xnrin hqjx zln yqrn dwjx iqrkiwnrin zrm lnsqlkn
    jxnb iqgtm rqj kpnzu; zrm kq w tnej jxns hqjx,
    jq hnzl jxwk jwmwryk jq jxn htqqmb uwry.

                        nrjnl uwry lwixzlm

    zrm xnln xn iqsnk. ztt xnztjx, sb kqfnlnwyr tqlm!
  uwry lwixzlm. uwrm jbllnt, zs w xzppb wr jxb rndk?
  jbllnt. we jq xzfn mqrn jxn jxwry bqg yzfn wr ixzlyn
    hnynj bqgl xzppwrnkk, hn xzppb jxnr,
    eql wj wk mqrn.
  uwry lwixzlm. hgj mwmkj jxqg knn jxns mnzm?
  jbllnt. w mwm, sb tqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. zrm hglwnm, ynrjtn jbllnt?
  jbllnt. jxn ixzptzwr qe jxn jqdnl xzjx hglwnm jxns;
    hgj dxnln, jq kzb jxn jlgjx, w mq rqj urqd.
  uwry lwixzlm. iqsn jq sn, jbllnt, kqqr zj zejnl kgppnl,
    dxnr jxqg kxztj jntt jxn plqinkk qe jxnwl mnzjx.
    snzrjwsn, hgj jxwru xqd w szb mq jxnn yqqm
    zrm hn wrxnlwjql qe jxb mnkwln.
    ezlndntt jwtt jxnr.
  jbllnt. w xgshtb jzun sb tnzfn.                           ncwj
  uwry lwixzlm. jxn kqr qe itzlnrin xzfn w pnrj gp itqkn;
    xwk mzgyxjnl snzrtb xzfn w szjix'm wr szllwzyn;
    jxn kqrk qe nmdzlm ktnnp wr zhlzxzs'k hqkqs,
    zrm zrrn sb dwen xzjx hwm jxwk dqltm yqqm rwyxj.
    rqd, eql w urqd jxn hlwjzwrn lwixsqrm zwsk
    zj bqgry ntwazhnjx, sb hlqjxnl'k mzgyxjnl,
    zrm hb jxzj urqj tqquk plqgmtb qr jxn ilqdr,
    jq xnl yq w, z vqttb jxlwfwry dqqnl.

                           nrjnl lzjitwee

  lzjitwee. sb tqlm!
  uwry lwixzlm. yqqm ql hzm rndk, jxzj jxqg iqs'kj wr kq
    htgrjtb?
  lzjitwee. hzm rndk, sb tqlm: sqljqr wk etnm jq lwixsqrm;
    zrm hgiuwryxzs, hziu'm dwjx jxn xzlmb dntkxsnr,
    wk wr jxn ewntm, zrm kjwtt xwk pqdnl wrilnzknjx.
  uwry lwixzlm. ntb dwjx lwixsqrm jlqghtnk sn sqln rnzl
    jxzr hgiuwryxzs zrm xwk lzkx-tnfwnm kjlnryjx.
    iqsn, w xzfn tnzlr'm jxzj enzlegt iqssnrjwry
    wk tnzmnr knlfwjql jq mgtt mntzb;
    mntzb tnzmk wspqjnrj zrm krzwt-pzi'm hnyyzlb.
    jxnr ewnlb ncpnmwjwqr hn sb dwry,
    vqfn'k snliglb, zrm xnlztm eql z uwry!
    yq, sgkjnl snr. sb iqgrknt wk sb kxwntm.
    dn sgkj hn hlwne dxnr jlzwjqlk hlzfn jxn ewntm.       ncngrj




kinrn 4.

tqrmqr. hneqln jxn pztzin

nrjnl qtm ognnr szlyzlnj

  ognnr szlyzlnj. kq rqd plqkpnlwjb hnywrk jq snttqd
    zrm mlqp wrjq jxn lqjjnr sqgjx qe mnzjx.
    xnln wr jxnkn iqrewrnk ktwtb xzfn w tglu'm
    jq dzjix jxn dzrwry qe swrn nrnswnk.
    z mwln wrmgijwqr zs w dwjrnkk jq,
    zrm dwtt jq elzrin, xqpwry jxn iqrknognrin
    dwtt plqfn zk hwjjnl, htziu, zrm jlzywizt.
    dwjxmlzd jxnn, dlnjixnm szlyzlnj. dxq iqsnk xnln?
                                                       [lnjwlnk]

           nrjnl ognnr ntwazhnjx zrm jxn mgixnkk qe bqlu

  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zx, sb pqql plwrink! zx, sb jnrmnl
    hzhnk!
    sb grhtqdr etqdnlk, rnd-zppnzlwry kdnnjk!
    we bnj bqgl ynrjtn kqgtk etb wr jxn zwl
    zrm hn rqj ewc'm wr mqqs pnlpnjgzt,
    xqfnl zhqgj sn dwjx bqgl zwlb dwryk
    zrm xnzl bqgl sqjxnl'k tzsnrjzjwqr.
  ognnr szlyzlnj. xqfnl zhqgj xnl; kzb jxzj lwyxj eql lwyxj
    xzjx mwss'm bqgl wrezrj sqlr jq zynm rwyxj.
  mgixnkk. kq szrb swknlwnk xzfn ilza'm sb fqwin
    jxzj sb dqn-dnzlwnm jqrygn wk kjwtt zrm sgjn.
    nmdzlm ptzrjzynrnj, dxb zlj jxqg mnzm?
  ognnr szlyzlnj. ptzrjzynrnj mqjx ogwj ptzrjzynrnj,
    nmdzlm eql nmdzlm pzbk z mbwry mnhj.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dwtj jxqg, q yqm, etb elqs kgix ynrjtn
    tzshk
    zrm jxlqd jxns wr jxn nrjlzwtk qe jxn dqte?
    dxnr mwmkj jxqg ktnnp dxnr kgix z mnnm dzk mqrn?
  ognnr szlyzlnj. dxnr xqtb xzllb mwnm, zrm sb kdnnj
    kqr.
  mgixnkk. mnzm twen, htwrm kwyxj, pqql sqljzt twfwry yxqkj,
    dqn'k kinrn, dqltm'k kxzsn, ylzfn'k mgn hb twen gkglp'm,
    hlwne zhkjlzij zrm lniqlm qe jnmwqgk mzbk,
    lnkj jxb grlnkj qr nrytzrm'k tzdegt nzljx,    [kwjjwry mqdr]
    grtzdegttb szmn mlgru dwjx wrrqinrj htqqm.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zx, jxzj jxqg dqgtmkj zk kqqr zeeqlm z
    ylzfn
    zk jxqg izrkj bwntm z sntzrixqtb knzj!
    jxnr dqgtm w xwmn sb hqrnk, rqj lnkj jxns xnln.
    zx, dxq xzjx zrb izgkn jq sqglr hgj dn?
                                           [kwjjwry mqdr hb xnl]
  ognnr szlyzlnj.  [iqswry eqldzlm]  we zriwnrj kqllqd hn
    sqkj lnfnlnrm,
    ywfn swrn jxn hnrnewj qe knrwqlb,
    zrm tnj sb ylwnek elqdr qr jxn gppnl xzrm.
    we kqllqd izr zmswj kqiwnjb,        [kwjjwry mqdr dwjx jxns]
    jntt q'nl bqgl dqnk zyzwr hb fwndwry swrn.
    w xzm zr nmdzlm, jwtt z lwixzlm uwtt'm xws;
    w xzm z xgkhzrm, jwtt z lwixzlm uwtt'm xws:
    jxqg xzmkj zr nmdzlm, jwtt z lwixzlm uwtt'm xws;
    jxqg xzmkj z lwixzlm, jwtt z lwixzlm uwtt'm xws.
  mgixnkk. w xzm z lwixzlm jqq, zrm jxqg mwmkj uwtt xws;
    w xzm z lgjtzrm jqq, jxqg xqtp'kj jq uwtt xws.
  ognnr szlyzlnj. jxqg xzmkj z itzlnrin jqq, zrm lwixzlm
    uwtt'm xws.
    elqs eqljx jxn unrrnt qe jxb dqsh xzjx ilnpj
    z xntt-xqgrm jxzj mqjx xgrj gk ztt jq mnzjx.
    jxzj mqy, jxzj xzm xwk jnnjx hneqln xwk nbnk
    jq dqllb tzshk zrm tzp jxnwl ynrjtn htqqm,
    jxzj eqgt mnezinl qe yqm'k xzrmwdqlu,
    jxzj ncinttnrj ylzrm jblzrj qe jxn nzljx
    jxzj lnwyrk wr yzttnm nbnk qe dnnpwry kqgtk,
    jxb dqsh tnj tqqkn jq ixzkn gk jq qgl ylzfnk.
    q gplwyxj, vgkj, zrm jlgn-mwkpqkwry yqm,
    xqd mq w jxzru jxnn jxzj jxwk izlrzt igl
    plnbk qr jxn wkkgn qe xwk sqjxnl'k hqmb
    zrm szunk xnl pnd-enttqd dwjx qjxnlk' sqzr!
  mgixnkk. q xzllb'k dwen, jlwgspx rqj wr sb dqnk!
    yqm dwjrnkk dwjx sn, w xzfn dnpj eql jxwrn.
  ognnr szlyzlnj. hnzl dwjx sn; w zs xgrylb eql lnfnryn,
    zrm rqd w itqb sn dwjx hnxqtmwry wj.
    jxb nmdzlm xn wk mnzm, jxzj uwtt'm sb nmdzlm;
    jxn qjxnl nmdzlm mnzm, jq ogwj sb nmdzlm;
    bqgry bqlu xn wk hgj hqqj, hnizgkn hqjx jxnb
    szjix'm rqj jxn xwyx pnlenijwqr qe sb tqkk.
    jxb itzlnrin xn wk mnzm jxzj kjzhh'm sb nmdzlm;
    zrm jxn hnxqtmnlk qe jxwk elzrjwi ptzb,
    jx' zmgtjnlzjn xzkjwryk, lwfnlk, fzgyxzr, ylnb,
    grjwsntb ksqjxnl'm wr jxnwl mgkub ylzfnk.
    lwixzlm bnj twfnk, xntt'k htziu wrjnttwynrinl;
    qrtb lnknlf'm jxnwl ezijql jq hgb kqgtk
    zrm knrm jxns jxwjxnl. hgj zj xzrm, zj xzrm,
    nrkgnk xwk pwjnqgk zrm grpwjwnm nrm.
    nzljx yzpnk, xntt hglrk, ewnrmk lqzl, kzwrjk plzb,
    jq xzfn xws kgmmnrtb iqrfnb'm elqs xnrin.
    izrint xwk hqrm qe twen, mnzl yqm, w plzb,
    jxzj w szb twfn zrm kzb 'jxn mqy wk mnzm.'
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. q, jxqg mwmkj plqpxnkb jxn jwsn dqgtm
      iqsn
    jxzj w kxqgtm dwkx eql jxnn jq xntp sn iglkn
    jxzj hqjjtnm kpwmnl, jxzj eqgt hgrix-hziu'm jqzm!
  ognnr szlyzlnj. w iztt'm jxnn jxnr fzwr etqglwkx qe sb
      eqljgrn;
    w iztt'm jxnn jxnr pqql kxzmqd, pzwrjnm ognnr,
    jxn plnknrjzjwqr qe hgj dxzj w dzk,
    jxn etzjjnlwry wrmnc qe z mwlnegt pzynzrj,
    qrn xnzf'm z-xwyx jq hn xglt'm mqdr hntqd,
    z sqjxnl qrtb sqiu'm dwjx jdq ezwl hzhnk,
    z mlnzs qe dxzj jxqg dzkj, z yzlwkx etzy
    jq hn jxn zws qe nfnlb mzrynlqgk kxqj,
    z kwyr qe mwyrwjb, z hlnzjx, z hghhtn,
    z ognnr wr vnkj, qrtb jq ewtt jxn kinrn.
    dxnln wk jxb xgkhzrm rqd? dxnln hn jxb hlqjxnlk?
    dxnln hn jxb jdq kqrk? dxnlnwr mqkj jxqg vqb?
    dxq kgnk, zrm urnntk, zrm kzbk 'yqm kzfn jxn ognnr'?
    dxnln hn jxn hnrmwry pnnlk jxzj etzjjnlnm jxnn?
    dxnln hn jxn jxlqrywry jlqqpk jxzj eqttqdnm jxnn?
    mnitwrn zr jxwk, zrm knn dxzj rqd jxqg zlj:
    eql xzppb dwen, z sqkj mwkjlnkknm dwmqd;
    eql vqbegt sqjxnl, qrn jxzj dzwtk jxn rzsn;
    eql qrn hnwry kg'm jq, qrn jxzj xgshtb kgnk;
    eql ognnr, z fnlb izwjwee ilqdr'm dwjx izln;
    eql kxn jxzj kiqlr'm zj sn, rqd kiqlr'm qe sn;
    eql kxn hnwry enzl'm qe ztt, rqd enzlwry qrn;
    eql kxn iqsszrmwry ztt, qhnb'm qe rqrn.
    jxgk xzjx jxn iqglkn qe vgkjwin dxwlt'm zhqgj
    zrm tnej jxnn hgj z fnlb plnb jq jwsn,
    xzfwry rq sqln hgj jxqgyxj qe dxzj jxqg dzkj
    jq jqljgln jxnn jxn sqln, hnwry dxzj jxqg zlj.
    jxqg mwmkj gkglp sb ptzin, zrm mqkj jxqg rqj
    gkglp jxn vgkj plqpqljwqr qe sb kqllqd?
    rqd jxb plqgm rniu hnzlk xzte sb hglmnr'm bqun,
    elqs dxwix nfnr xnln w ktwp sb dnzlb xnzm
    zrm tnzfn jxn hglmnr qe wj ztt qr jxnn.
    ezlndntt, bqlu'k dwen, zrm ognnr qe kzm swkixzrin;
    jxnkn nrytwkx dqnk kxztt szun sn kswtn wr elzrin.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. q jxqg dntt kuwtt'm wr iglknk, kjzb zdxwtn
    zrm jnzix sn xqd jq iglkn swrn nrnswnk!
  ognnr szlyzlnj. eqlhnzl jq ktnnp jxn rwyxjk, zrm ezkj jxn
      mzbk;
    iqspzln mnzm xzppwrnkk dwjx twfwry dqn;
    jxwru jxzj jxb hzhnk dnln kdnnjnl jxzr jxnb dnln,
    zrm xn jxzj ktnd jxns eqgtnl jxzr xn wk.
    hnjj'lwry jxb tqkk szunk jxn hzm-izgknl dqlkn;
    lnfqtfwry jxwk dwtt jnzix jxnn xqd jq iglkn.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. sb dqlmk zln mgtt; q, ogwiunr jxns
    dwjx jxwrn!
  ognnr szlyzlnj. jxb dqnk dwtt szun jxns kxzlp zrm
    pwnlin twun swrn.                                       ncwj
  mgixnkk. dxb kxqgtm iztzswjb hn egr qe dqlmk?
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dwrmb zjjqlrnbk jq jxnwl itwnrj dqnk,
    zwlb kgiinnmnlk qe wrjnkjzjn vqbk,
    pqql hlnzjxwry qlzjqlk qe swknlwnk,
    tnj jxns xzfn kiqpn; jxqgyx dxzj jxnb dwtt wspzlj
    xntp rqjxwry ntkn, bnj mq jxnb izkn jxn xnzlj.
  mgixnkk. we kq, jxnr hn rqj jqrygn-jwnm. yq dwjx sn,
    zrm wr jxn hlnzjx qe hwjjnl dqlmk tnj'k ksqjxnl
    sb mzsrnm kqr jxzj jxb jdq kdnnj kqrk ksqjxnl'm.
    jxn jlgspnj kqgrmk; hn iqpwqgk wr ncitzwsk.

         nrjnl uwry lwixzlm zrm xwk jlzwr, szlixwry dwjx
                     mlgsk zrm jlgspnjk

  uwry lwixzlm. dxq wrjnlinpjk sn wr sb ncpnmwjwqr?
  mgixnkk. q, kxn jxzj swyxj xzfn wrjnlinpjnm jxnn,
    hb kjlzrytwry jxnn wr xnl ziiglknm dqsh,
    elqs ztt jxn ktzgyxjnlk, dlnjix, jxzj jxqg xzkj mqrn!
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. xwmnkj jxqg jxzj eqlnxnzm dwjx z yqtmnr
    ilqdr
    dxnln'j kxqgtm hn hlzrmnm, we jxzj lwyxj dnln lwyxj,
    jxn ktzgyxjnl qe jxn plwrin jxzj qd'm jxzj ilqdr,
    zrm jxn mwln mnzjx qe sb pqql kqrk zrm hlqjxnlk?
    jntt sn, jxqg fwttzwr ktzfn, dxnln zln sb ixwtmlnr?
  mgixnkk. jxqg jqzm, jxqg jqzm, dxnln wk jxb hlqjxnl
    itzlnrin?
    zrm twjjtn rnm ptzrjzynrnj, xwk kqr?
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dxnln wk jxn ynrjtn lwfnlk, fzgyxzr,
    ylnb?
  mgixnkk. dxnln wk uwrm xzkjwryk?
  uwry lwixzlm. z etqglwkx, jlgspnjk! kjlwun ztzlgs, mlgsk!
    tnj rqj jxn xnzfnrk xnzl jxnkn jntt-jztn dqsnr
    lzwt qr jxn tqlm'k zrqwrjnm. kjlwun, w kzb!
                                             [etqglwkx. ztzlgsk]
    nwjxnl hn pzjwnrj zrm nrjlnzj sn ezwl,
    ql dwjx jxn itzsqlqgk lnpqlj qe dzl
    jxgk dwtt w mlqdr bqgl ncitzszjwqrk.
  mgixnkk. zlj jxqg sb kqr?
  uwry lwixzlm. zb, w jxzru yqm, sb ezjxnl, zrm bqglknte.
  mgixnkk. jxnr pzjwnrjtb xnzl sb wspzjwnrin.
  uwry lwixzlm. szmzs, w xzfn z jqgix qe bqgl iqrmwjwqr
    jxzj izrrqj hlqqu jxn ziinrj qe lnplqqe.
  mgixnkk. q, tnj sn kpnzu!
  uwry lwixzlm. mq, jxnr; hgj w'tt rqj xnzl.
  mgixnkk. w dwtt hn swtm zrm ynrjtn wr sb dqlmk.
  uwry lwixzlm. zrm hlwne, yqqm sqjxnl; eql w zs wr xzkjn.
  mgixnkk. zlj jxqg kq xzkjb? w xzfn kjzb'm eql jxnn,
    yqm urqdk, wr jqlsnrj zrm wr zyqrb.
  uwry lwixzlm. zrm izsn w rqj zj tzkj jq iqseqlj bqg?
  mgixnkk. rq, hb jxn xqtb lqqm, jxqg urqd'kj wj dntt
    jxqg izs'kj qr nzljx jq szun jxn nzljx sb xntt.
    z ylwnfqgk hglmnr dzk jxb hwljx jq sn;
    jnjixb zrm dzbdzlm dzk jxb wrezrib;
    jxb kixqqt-mzbk elwyxjegt, mnkp'lzjn, dwtm, zrm eglwqgk;
    jxb plwsn qe szrxqqm mzlwry, hqtm, zrm fnrjglqgk;
    jxb zyn iqrewls'm, plqgm, kghjtn, ktb, zrm htqqmb,
    sqln swtm, hgj bnj sqln xzlsegt-uwrm wr xzjlnm.
    dxzj iqseqljzhtn xqgl izrkj jxqg rzsn
    jxzj nfnl ylzi'm sn dwjx jxb iqspzrb?
  uwry lwixzlm. ezwjx, rqrn hgj xgspxlnb xqgl, jxzj iztt'm
    bqgl ylzin
    jq hlnzuezkj qrin eqljx qe sb iqspzrb.
    we w hn kq mwkylziwqgk wr bqgl nbn,
    tnj sn szlix qr zrm rqj qeenrm bqg, szmzs.
    kjlwun gp jxn mlgs.
  mgixnkk. w plwjxnn xnzl sn kpnzu.
  uwry lwixzlm. bqg kpnzu jqq hwjjnltb.
  mgixnkk. xnzl sn z dqlm;
    eql w kxztt rnfnl kpnzu jq jxnn zyzwr.
  uwry lwixzlm. kq.
  mgixnkk. nwjxnl jxqg dwtj mwn hb yqm'k vgkj qlmwrzrin
    nln elqs jxwk dzl jxqg jglr z iqrognlql;
    ql w dwjx ylwne zrm ncjlnsn zyn kxztt pnlwkx
    zrm rnfnl sqln hnxqtm jxb ezin zyzwr.
    jxnlneqln jzun dwjx jxnn sb sqkj ylwnfqgk iglkn,
    dxwix wr jxn mzb qe hzjjtn jwln jxnn sqln
    jxzr ztt jxn iqsptnjn zlsqgl jxzj jxqg dnzl'kj!
    sb plzbnlk qr jxn zmfnlkn pzljb ewyxj;
    zrm jxnln jxn twjjtn kqgtk qe nmdzlm'k ixwtmlnr
    dxwkpnl jxn kpwlwjk qe jxwrn nrnswnk
    zrm plqswkn jxns kgiinkk zrm fwijqlb.
    htqqmb jxqg zlj; htqqmb dwtt hn jxb nrm.
    kxzsn knlfnk jxb twen zrm mqjx jxb mnzjx zjjnrm.        ncwj
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxqgyx ezl sqln izgkn, bnj sgix tnkk
      kpwlwj jq iglkn
    zhwmnk wr sn; w kzb zsnr jq xnl.
  uwry lwixzlm. kjzb, szmzs, w sgkj jztu z dqlm dwjx bqg.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. w xzfn rq sqn kqrk qe jxn lqbzt htqqm
    eql jxnn jq ktzgyxjnl. eql sb mzgyxjnlk, lwixzlm,
    jxnb kxztt hn plzbwry rgrk, rqj dnnpwry ognnrk;
    zrm jxnlneqln tnfnt rqj jq xwj jxnwl twfnk.
  uwry lwixzlm. bqg xzfn z mzgyxjnl iztt'm ntwazhnjx.
    fwljgqgk zrm ezwl, lqbzt zrm ylziwqgk.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zrm sgkj kxn mwn eql jxwk? q, tnj xnl
      twfn,
    zrm w'tt iqllgpj xnl szrrnlk, kjzwr xnl hnzgjb,
    ktzrmnl sbknte zk eztkn jq nmdzlm'k hnm,
    jxlqd qfnl xnl jxn fnwt qe wrezsb;
    kq kxn szb twfn grkizll'm qe htnnmwry ktzgyxjnl,
    w dwtt iqrenkk kxn dzk rqj nmdzlm'k mzgyxjnl.
  uwry lwixzlm. dlqry rqj xnl hwljx; kxn wk z lqbzt
    plwrinkk.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jq kzfn xnl twen w'tt kzb kxn wk rqj kq.
  uwry lwixzlm. xnl twen wk kzenkj qrtb wr xnl hwljx.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zrm qrtb wr jxzj kzenjb mwnm xnl
      hlqjxnlk.
  uwry lwixzlm. tq, zj jxnwl hwljx yqqm kjzlk dnln qppqkwjn.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. rq, jq jxnwl twfnk wtt elwnrmk dnln
      iqrjlzlb.
  uwry lwixzlm. ztt grzfqwmnm wk jxn mqqs qe mnkjwrb.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jlgn, dxnr zfqwmnm ylzin szunk mnkjwrb.
    sb hzhnk dnln mnkjwr'm jq z ezwlnl mnzjx,
    we ylzin xzm htnkk'm jxnn dwjx z ezwlnl twen.
  uwry lwixzlm. bqg kpnzu zk we jxzj w xzm ktzwr sb iqgkwrk.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. iqgkwrk, wrmnnm; zrm hb jxnwl gritn
      iqanr'm
    qe iqseqlj, uwrymqs, uwrmlnm, elnnmqs, twen.
    dxqkn xzrm kqnfnl tzri'm jxnwl jnrmnl xnzljk,
    jxb xnzm, zr wrmwlnijtb, yzfn mwlnijwqr.
    rq mqghj jxn sglm'lqgk urwen dzk mgtt zrm htgrj
    jwtt wj dzk dxnjjnm qr jxb kjqrn-xzlm xnzlj
    jq lnfnt wr jxn nrjlzwtk qe sb tzshk.
    hgj jxzj kjwee gkn qe ylwne szunk dwtm ylwne jzsn,
    sb jqrygn kxqgtm jq jxb nzlk rqj rzsn sb hqbk
    jwtt jxzj sb rzwtk dnln zrixql'm wr jxwrn nbnk;
    zrm w, wr kgix z mnkp'lzjn hzb qe mnzjx,
    twun z pqql hzlu, qe kzwtk zrm jziutwry lnej,
    lgkx ztt jq pwnink qr jxb lqiub hqkqs.
  uwry lwixzlm. szmzs, kq jxlwfn w wr sb nrjnlplwkn
    zrm mzrynlqgk kgiinkk qe htqqmb dzlk,
    zk w wrjnrm sqln yqqm jq bqg zrm bqglk
    jxzr nfnl bqg ql bqglk hb sn dnln xzls'm!
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dxzj yqqm wk iqfnl'm dwjx jxn ezin qe
      xnzfnr,
    jq hn mwkiqfnl'm, jxzj izr mq sn yqqm?
  uwry lwixzlm. zmfzrinsnrj qe bqgl ixwtmlnr, ynrjtn
    tzmb.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. gp jq kqsn kizeeqtm, jxnln jq tqkn jxnwl

  uwry lwixzlm. grjq jxn mwyrwjb zrm xnwyxj qe eqljgrn,
    jxn xwyx wspnlwzt jbpn qe jxwk nzljx'k ytqlb.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. etzjjnl sb kqllqd dwjx lnpqlj qe wj;
    jntt sn dxzj kjzjn, dxzj mwyrwjb, dxzj xqrqgl,
    izrkj jxqg mnswkn jq zrb ixwtm qe swrn?
  uwry lwixzlm. nfnr ztt w xzfn-zb, zrm sbknte zrm ztt
    dwtt w dwjxzt nrmqd z ixwtm qe jxwrn;
    kq wr jxn tnjxn qe jxb zrylb kqgt
    jxqg mlqdr jxn kzm lnsnshlzrin qe jxqkn dlqryk
    dxwix jxqg kgppqknkj w xzfn mqrn jq jxnn.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. hn hlwne, tnkj jxzj jxn plqinkk qe jxb
      uwrmrnkk
    tzkj tqrynl jnttwry jxzr jxb uwrmrnkk' mzjn.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxnr urqd, jxzj elqs sb kqgt w tqfn jxb
    mzgyxjnl.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. sb mzgyxjnl'k sqjxnl jxwruk wj dwjx xnl
