  uwry lwixzlm. dxzj mq bqg jxwru?
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxzj jxqg mqkj tqfn sb mzgyxjnl elqs
      jxb kqgt.
    kq elqs jxb kqgt'k tqfn mwmkj jxqg tqfn xnl hlqjxnlk,
    zrm elqs sb xnzlj'k tqfn w mq jxzru jxnn eql wj.
  uwry lwixzlm. hn rqj kq xzkjb jq iqreqgrm sb snzrwry.
    w snzr jxzj dwjx sb kqgt w tqfn jxb mzgyxjnl
    zrm mq wrjnrm jq szun xnl ognnr qe nrytzrm.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dntt, jxnr, dxq mqkj jxqg snzr kxztt hn
    xnl uwry?
  uwry lwixzlm. nfnr xn jxzj szunk xnl ognnr. dxq ntkn
    kxqgtm hn?
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dxzj, jxqg?
  uwry lwixzlm. nfnr kq. xqd jxwru bqg qe wj?
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. xqd izrkj jxqg dqq xnl?
  uwry lwixzlm. jxzj dqgtm w tnzlr qe bqg,
    zk qrn hnwry hnkj ziogzwrjnm dwjx xnl xgsqgl.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zrm dwtj jxqg tnzlr qe sn?
  uwry lwixzlm. szmzs, dwjx ztt sb xnzlj.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. knrm jq xnl, hb jxn szr jxzj ktnd xnl
    hlqjxnlk,
    z pzwl qe htnnmwry xnzljk; jxnlnqr nrylzfn
    'nmdzlm' zrm 'bqlu.' jxnr xzptb dwtt kxn dnnp;
    jxnlneqln plnknrj jq xnl-zk kqsnjwsnk szlyzlnj
    mwm jq jxb ezjxnl, kjnnp'm wr lgjtzrm'k htqqm-
    z xzrmunlixwne; dxwix, kzb jq xnl, mwm mlzwr
    jxn pglptn kzp elqs xnl kdnnj hlqjxnl'k hqmb,
    zrm hwm xnl dwpn xnl dnnpwry nbnk dwjxzt.
    we jxwk wrmginsnrj sqfn xnl rqj jq tqfn,
    knrm xnl z tnjjnl qe jxb rqhtn mnnmk;
    jntt xnl jxqg szm'kj zdzb xnl gritn itzlnrin,
    xnl gritn lwfnlk; zb, zrm eql xnl kzun
    szm'kj ogwiu iqrfnbzrin dwjx xnl yqqm zgrj zrrn.
  uwry lwixzlm. bqg sqiu sn, szmzs; jxwk wk rqj jxn dzb
    jq dwr bqgl mzgyxjnl.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxnln wk rq qjxnl dzb;
    grtnkk jxqg iqgtmkj pgj qr kqsn qjxnl kxzpn
    zrm rqj hn lwixzlm jxzj xzjx mqrn ztt jxwk.
  uwry lwixzlm. kzb jxzj w mwm ztt jxwk eql tqfn qe xnl.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. rzb, jxnr wrmnnm kxn izrrqj ixqqkn hgj
      xzjn jxnn,
    xzfwry hqgyxj tqfn dwjx kgix z htqqmb kpqwt.
  uwry lwixzlm. tqqu dxzj wk mqrn izrrqj hn rqd zsnrmnm.
    snr kxztt mnzt grzmfwknmtb kqsnjwsnk,
    dxwix zejnl-xqglk ywfnk tnwkgln jq lnpnrj.
    we w mwm jzun jxn uwrymqs elqs bqgl kqrk,
    jq szun zsnrmk w'tt ywfn wj jq bqgl mzgyxjnl.
    we w xzfn uwtt'm jxn wkkgn qe bqgl dqsh,
    jq ogwiunr bqgl wrilnzkn w dwtt hnynj
    swrn wkkgn qe bqgl htqqm gpqr bqgl mzgyxjnl.
    z ylzrmzs'k rzsn wk twjjtn tnkk wr tqfn
    jxzr wk jxn mqzjwry jwjtn qe z sqjxnl;
    jxnb zln zk ixwtmlnr hgj qrn kjnp hntqd,
    nfnr qe bqgl snjzt, qe bqgl fnlb htqqm;
    qe ztt qrn pzwr, kzfn eql z rwyxj qe ylqzrk
    nrmgl'm qe xnl, eql dxqs bqg hwm twun kqllqd.
    bqgl ixwtmlnr dnln fnczjwqr jq bqgl bqgjx;
    hgj swrn kxztt hn z iqseqlj jq bqgl zyn.
    jxn tqkk bqg xzfn wk hgj z kqr hnwry uwry,
    zrm hb jxzj tqkk bqgl mzgyxjnl wk szmn ognnr.
    w izrrqj szun bqg dxzj zsnrmk w dqgtm,
    jxnlneqln ziinpj kgix uwrmrnkk zk w izr.
    mqlknj bqgl kqr, jxzj dwjx z enzlegt kqgt
    tnzmk mwkiqrjnrjnm kjnpk wr eqlnwyr kqwt,
    jxwk ezwl zttwzrin ogwiutb kxztt izr xqsn
    jq xwyx plqsqjwqrk zrm ylnzj mwyrwjb.
    jxn uwry, jxzj izttk bqgl hnzgjnqgk mzgyxjnl dwen,
    ezswtwzltb kxztt iztt jxb mqlknj hlqjxnl;
    zyzwr kxztt bqg hn sqjxnl jq z uwry,
    zrm ztt jxn lgwrk qe mwkjlnkkegt jwsnk
    lnpzwl'm dwjx mqghtn lwixnk qe iqrjnrj.
    dxzj! dn xzfn szrb yqqmtb mzbk jq knn.
    jxn twogwm mlqpk qe jnzlk jxzj bqg xzfn kxnm
    kxztt iqsn zyzwr, jlzrkeqls'm jq qlwnrj pnzlt,
    zmfzrjzywry jxnwl tqzr dwjx wrjnlnkj
    qe jnr jwsnk mqghtn yzwr qe xzppwrnkk.
    yq, jxnr, sb sqjxnl, jq jxb mzgyxjnl yq;
    szun hqtm xnl hzkxegt bnzlk dwjx bqgl ncpnlwnrin;
    plnpzln xnl nzlk jq xnzl z dqqnl'k jztn;
    pgj wr xnl jnrmnl xnzlj jx' zkpwlwry etzsn
    qe yqtmnr kqfnlnwyrjb; ziogzwrj jxn plwrink
    dwjx jxn kdnnj kwtnrj xqglk qe szllwzyn vqbk.
    zrm dxnr jxwk zls qe swrn xzjx ixzkjwknm
    jxn pnjjb lnhnt, mgtt-hlzwr'm hgiuwryxzs,
    hqgrm dwjx jlwgspxzrj yzltzrmk dwtt w iqsn,
    zrm tnzm jxb mzgyxjnl jq z iqrognlql'k hnm;
    jq dxqs w dwtt lnjzwt sb iqrognkj dqr,
    zrm kxn kxztt hn kqtn fwijqlnkk, iznkzl'k iznkzl.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dxzj dnln w hnkj jq kzb? xnl ezjxnl'k
      hlqjxnl
    dqgtm hn xnl tqlm? ql kxztt w kzb xnl gritn?
    ql xn jxzj ktnd xnl hlqjxnlk zrm xnl gritnk?
    grmnl dxzj jwjtn kxztt w dqq eql jxnn
    jxzj yqm, jxn tzd, sb xqrqgl, zrm xnl tqfn
    izr szun knns ptnzkwry jq xnl jnrmnl bnzlk?
  uwry lwixzlm. wrenl ezwl nrytzrm'k pnzin hb jxwk zttwzrin.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. dxwix kxn kxztt pglixzkn dwjx
    kjwtt-tzkjwry dzl.
  uwry lwixzlm. jntt xnl jxn uwry, jxzj szb iqsszrm,
    nrjlnzjk.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxzj zj xnl xzrmk dxwix jxn uwry'k
    uwry eqlhwmk.
  uwry lwixzlm. kzb kxn kxztt hn z xwyx zrm swyxjb ognnr.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jq dzwt jxn jwjtn, zk xnl sqjxnl mqjx.
  uwry lwixzlm. kzb w dwtt tqfn xnl nfnltzkjwrytb.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. hgj xqd tqry kxztt jxzj jwjtn 'nfnl' tzkj?
  uwry lwixzlm. kdnnjtb wr eqlin grjq xnl ezwl twen'k nrm.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. hgj xqd tqry ezwltb kxztt xnl kdnnj twen
    tzkj?
  uwry lwixzlm. zk tqry zk xnzfnr zrm rzjgln tnryjxnrk wj.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zk tqry zk xntt zrm lwixzlm twunk qe wj.
  uwry lwixzlm. kzb w, xnl kqfnlnwyr, zs xnl kghvnij tqd.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. hgj kxn, bqgl kghvnij, tqzjxnk kgix
    kqfnlnwyrjb.
  uwry lwixzlm. hn ntqognrj wr sb hnxzte jq xnl.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. zr xqrnkj jztn kpnnmk hnkj hnwry ptzwrtb
    jqtm.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxnr ptzwrtb jq xnl jntt sb tqfwry jztn.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. ptzwr zrm rqj xqrnkj wk jqq xzlkx z kjbtn.
  uwry lwixzlm. bqgl lnzkqrk zln jqq kxzttqd zrm jqq ogwiu.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. q, rq, sb lnzkqrk zln jqq mnnp zrm
      mnzm-
    jqq mnnp zrm mnzm, pqql wrezrjk, wr jxnwl ylzfnk.
  uwry lwixzlm. xzlp rqj qr jxzj kjlwry, szmzs; jxzj wk pzkj.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. xzlp qr wj kjwtt kxztt w jwtt xnzljkjlwryk
    hlnzu.
  uwry lwixzlm. rqd, hb sb ynqlyn, sb yzljnl, zrm sb
    ilqdr-
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. plqezr'm, mwkxqrqgl'm, zrm jxn jxwlm
    gkglp'm.
  uwry lwixzlm. w kdnzl-
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. hb rqjxwry; eql jxwk wk rq qzjx:
    jxb ynqlyn, plqezr'm, xzjx tqkj xwk tqlmtb xqrqgl;
    jxb yzljnl, htnswkx'm, pzdr'm xwk urwyxjtb fwljgn;
    jxb ilqdr, gkglp'm, mwkylzi'm xwk uwrytb ytqlb.
    we kqsnjxwry jxqg dqgtmkj kdnzl jq hn hntwnf'm,
    kdnzl jxnr hb kqsnjxwry jxzj jxqg xzkj rqj dlqry'm.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxnr, hb sb knte-
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxb knte wk knte-swkgk'm.
  uwry lwixzlm. rqd, hb jxn dqltm-
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. 'jwk egtt qe jxb eqgt dlqryk.
  uwry lwixzlm. sb ezjxnl'k mnzjx-
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxb twen xzjx wj mwkxqrqgl'm.
  uwry lwixzlm. dxb, jxnr, hb yqm-
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. yqm'k dlqry wk sqkj qe ztt.
    we jxqg mwmkj enzl jq hlnzu zr qzjx dwjx xws,
    jxn grwjb jxn uwry sb xgkhzrm szmn
    jxqg xzmkj rqj hlqunr, rql sb hlqjxnlk mwnm.
    we jxqg xzmkj enzl'm jq hlnzu zr qzjx hb xws,
    jx' wspnlwzt snjzt, iwlitwry rqd jxb xnzm,
    xzm ylzi'm jxn jnrmnl jnsptnk qe sb ixwtm;
    zrm hqjx jxn plwrink xzm hnnr hlnzjxwry xnln,
    dxwix rqd, jdq jnrmnl hnmenttqdk eql mgkj,
    jxb hlqunr ezwjx xzjx szmn jxn plnb eql dqlsk.
    dxzj izrkj jxqg kdnzl hb rqd?
  uwry lwixzlm. jxn jwsn jq iqsn.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. jxzj jxqg xzkj dlqrynm wr jxn jwsn
    q'nlpzkj;
    eql w sbknte xzfn szrb jnzlk jq dzkx
    xnlnzejnl jwsn, eql jwsn pzkj dlqry'm hb jxnn.
    jxn ixwtmlnr twfn dxqkn ezjxnlk jxqg xzkj ktzgyxjnl'm,
    gryqfnlr'm bqgjx, jq dzwt wj wr jxnwl zyn;
    jxn pzlnrjk twfn dxqkn ixwtmlnr jxqg xzkj hgjixnnm,
    qtm hzllnr ptzrjk, jq dzwt wj dwjx jxnwl zyn.
    kdnzl rqj hb jwsn jq iqsn; eql jxzj jxqg xzkj
    swkgk'm nln gk'm, hb jwsnk wtt-gk'm q'nlpzkj.
  uwry lwixzlm. zk w wrjnrm jq plqkpnl zrm lnpnrj,
    kq jxlwfn w wr sb mzrynlqgk zeezwlk
    qe xqkjwtn zlsk! sbknte sbknte iqreqgrm!
    xnzfnr zrm eqljgrn hzl sn xzppb xqglk!
    mzb, bwntm sn rqj jxb twyxj; rql, rwyxj, jxb lnkj!
    hn qppqkwjn ztt ptzrnjk qe yqqm tgiu
    jq sb plqinnmwry!-we, dwjx mnzl xnzlj'k tqfn,
    wsszigtzjn mnfqjwqr, xqtb jxqgyxjk,
    w jnrmnl rqj jxb hnzgjnqgk plwrintb mzgyxjnl.
    wr xnl iqrkwkjk sb xzppwrnkk zrm jxwrn;
    dwjxqgj xnl, eqttqdk jq sbknte zrm jxnn,
    xnlknte, jxn tzrm, zrm szrb z ixlwkjwzr kqgt,
    mnzjx, mnkqtzjwqr, lgwr, zrm mnizb.
    wj izrrqj hn zfqwmnm hgj hb jxwk;
    wj dwtt rqj hn zfqwmnm hgj hb jxwk.
    jxnlneqln, mnzl sqjxnl-w sgkj iztt bqg kq-
    hn jxn zjjqlrnb qe sb tqfn jq xnl;
    ptnzm dxzj w dwtt hn, rqj dxzj w xzfn hnnr;
    rqj sb mnknljk, hgj dxzj w dwtt mnknlfn.
    glyn jxn rninkkwjb zrm kjzjn qe jwsnk,
    zrm hn rqj pnnfwkx-eqrm wr ylnzj mnkwyrk.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. kxztt w hn jnspjnm qe jxn mnfwt jxgk?
  uwry lwixzlm. zb, we jxn mnfwt jnspj bqg jq mq yqqm.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. kxztt w eqlynj sbknte jq hn sbknte?
  uwry lwixzlm. zb, we bqgl knte'k lnsnshlzrin dlqry
    bqglknte.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. bnj jxqg mwmkj uwtt sb ixwtmlnr.
  uwry lwixzlm. hgj wr bqgl mzgyxjnl'k dqsh w hglb jxns;
    dxnln, wr jxzj rnkj qe kpwinlb, jxnb dwtt hlnnm
    kntfnk qe jxnskntfnk, jq bqgl lniqseqljgln.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. kxztt w yq dwr sb mzgyxjnl jq jxb dwtt?
  uwry lwixzlm. zrm hn z xzppb sqjxnl hb jxn mnnm.
  ognnr ntwazhnjx. w yq. dlwjn jq sn fnlb kxqljtb,
    zrm bqg kxztt grmnlkjzrm elqs sn xnl swrm.
  uwry lwixzlm. hnzl xnl sb jlgn tqfn'k uwkk; zrm kq, ezlndntt.
                               uwkkwry xnl. ncwj ognnr ntwazhnjx
    lntnrjwry eqqt, zrm kxzttqd, ixzrywry dqszr!

                 nrjnl lzjitwee; izjnkhb eqttqdwry

    xqd rqd! dxzj rndk?
  lzjitwee. sqkj swyxjb kqfnlnwyr, qr jxn dnkjnlr iqzkj
    lwmnjx z pgwkkzrj rzfb; jq qgl kxqlnk
    jxlqry szrb mqghjegt xqttqd-xnzljnm elwnrmk,
    grzls'm, zrm grlnkqtf'm jq hnzj jxns hziu.
    'jwk jxqgyxj jxzj lwixsqrm wk jxnwl zmswlzt;
    zrm jxnln jxnb xgtt, ncpnijwry hgj jxn zwm
    qe hgiuwryxzs jq dntiqsn jxns zkxqln.
  uwry lwixzlm. kqsn twyxj-eqqj elwnrm pqkj jq jxn mgun qe
    rqleqtu.
    lzjitwee, jxbknte-ql izjnkhb; dxnln wk xn?
  izjnkhb. xnln, sb yqqm tqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. izjnkhb, etb jq jxn mgun.
  izjnkhb. w dwtt sb tqlm, dwjx ztt iqrfnrwnrj xzkjn.
  uwry lwixzlm. lzjitwee, iqsn xwjxnl. pqkj jq kztwkhglb;
    dxnr jxqg iqs'kj jxwjxnl-  [jq izjnkhb]  mgtt,
    grswrmegtt fwttzwr,
    dxb kjzb'kj jxqg xnln, zrm yq'kj rqj jq jxn mgun?
  izjnkhb. ewlkj, swyxjb twnyn, jntt sn bqgl xwyxrnkk' ptnzkgln,
    dxzj elqs bqgl ylzin w kxztt mntwfnl jq xws.
  uwry lwixzlm. q, jlgn, yqqm izjnkhb. hwm xws tnfb kjlzwyxj
    jxn ylnzjnkj kjlnryjx zrm pqdnl jxzj xn izr szun
    zrm snnj sn kgmmnrtb zj kztwkhglb.
  izjnkhb. w yq.                                            ncwj
  lzjitwee. dxzj, szb wj ptnzkn bqg, kxztt w mq zj kztwkhglb?
  uwry lwixzlm. dxb, dxzj dqgtmkj jxqg mq jxnln hneqln w
    yq?
  lzjitwee. bqgl xwyxrnkk jqtm sn w kxqgtm pqkj hneqln.
  uwry lwixzlm. sb swrm wk ixzry'm.

                           nrjnl tqlm kjzrtnb

  kjzrtnb, dxzj rndk dwjx bqg?
  kjzrtnb. rqrn yqqm, sb twnyn, jq ptnzkn bqg dwjx
    jxn xnzlwry;
    rql rqrn kq hzm hgj dntt szb hn lnpqljnm.
  uwry lwixzlm. xqbmzb, z lwmmtn! rnwjxnl yqqm rql hzm!
    dxzj rnnm'kj jxqg lgr kq szrb swtnk zhqgj,
    dxnr jxqg szbnkj jntt jxb jztn jxn rnzlnkj dzb?
    qrin sqln, dxzj rndk?
  kjzrtnb. lwixsqrm wk qr jxn knzk.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxnln tnj xws kwru, zrm hn jxn knzk qr xws!
    dxwjn-twfnl'm lgrzyzjn, dxzj mqjx xn jxnln?
  kjzrtnb. w urqd rqj, swyxjb kqfnlnwyr, hgj hb ygnkk.
  uwry lwixzlm. dntt, zk bqg ygnkk?
  kjzrtnb. kjwll'm gp hb mqlknj, hgiuwryxzs, zrm sqljqr,
    xn szunk eql nrytzrm xnln jq itzws jxn ilqdr.
  uwry lwixzlm. wk jxn ixzwl nspjb? wk jxn kdqlm grkdzb'm?
    wk jxn uwry mnzm, jxn nspwln grpqkknkk'm?
    dxzj xnwl qe bqlu wk jxnln ztwfn hgj dn?
    zrm dxq wk nrytzrm'k uwry hgj ylnzj bqlu'k xnwl?
    jxnr jntt sn dxzj szunk xn gpqr jxn knzk.
  kjzrtnb. grtnkk eql jxzj, sb twnyn, w izrrqj ygnkk.
  uwry lwixzlm. grtnkk eql jxzj xn iqsnk jq hn bqgl twnyn,
    bqg izrrqj ygnkk dxnlneqln jxn dntkxszr iqsnk.
    jxqg dwtj lnfqtj zrm etb jq xws, w enzl.
  kjzrtnb. rq, sb yqqm tqlm; jxnlneqln swkjlgkj sn rqj.
  uwry lwixzlm. dxnln wk jxb pqdnl jxnr, jq hnzj xws hziu?
    dxnln hn jxb jnrzrjk zrm jxb eqttqdnlk?
    zln jxnb rqj rqd gpqr jxn dnkjnlr kxqln,
    kzen-iqrmgijwry jxn lnhntk elqs jxnwl kxwpk?
  kjzrtnb. rq, sb yqqm tqlm, sb elwnrmk zln wr jxn rqljx.
  uwry lwixzlm. iqtm elwnrmk jq sn. dxzj mq jxnb wr jxn
    rqljx,
    dxnr jxnb kxqgtm knlfn jxnwl kqfnlnwyr wr jxn dnkj?
  kjzrtnb. jxnb xzfn rqj hnnr iqsszrmnm, swyxjb uwry.
    ptnzknjx bqgl szvnkjb jq ywfn sn tnzfn,
    w'tt sgkjnl gp sb elwnrmk zrm snnj bqgl ylzin
    dxnln zrm dxzj jwsn bqgl szvnkjb kxztt ptnzkn.
  uwry lwixzlm. zb, zb, jxqg dqgtmkj hn yqrn jq vqwr dwjx
    lwixsqrm;
    hgj w'tt rqj jlgkj jxnn.
  kjzrtnb. sqkj swyxjb kqfnlnwyr,
    bqg xzfn rq izgkn jq xqtm sb elwnrmkxwp mqghjegt.
    w rnfnl dzk rql rnfnl dwtt hn eztkn.
  uwry lwixzlm. yq, jxnr, zrm sgkjnl snr. hgj tnzfn hnxwrm
    bqgl kqr, ynqlyn kjzrtnb. tqqu bqgl xnzlj hn ewls,
    ql ntkn xwk xnzm'k zkkglzrin wk hgj elzwt.
  kjzrtnb. kq mnzt dwjx xws zk w plqfn jlgn jq bqg.         ncwj

                          nrjnl z snkknrynl

  snkknrynl. sb ylziwqgk kqfnlnwyr, rqd wr mnfqrkxwln,
    zk w hb elwnrmk zs dntt zmfnljwknm,
    kwl nmdzlm iqgljrnb zrm jxn xzgyxjb plntzjn,
    hwkxqp qe ncnjnl, xwk ntmnl hlqjxnl,
    dwjx szrb sqn iqrenmnlzjnk, zln wr zlsk.

                         nrjnl zrqjxnl snkknrynl

  kniqrm snkknrynl. wr unrj, sb twnyn, jxn ygwteqlmk zln wr
    zlsk;
    zrm nfnlb xqgl sqln iqspnjwjqlk
    etqiu jq jxn lnhntk, zrm jxnwl pqdnl ylqdk kjlqry.

                         nrjnl zrqjxnl snkknrynl

  jxwlm snkknrynl. sb tqlm, jxn zlsb qe ylnzj hgiuwryxzs-
  uwry lwixzlm. qgj qr bqg, qdtk! rqjxwry hgj kqryk qe
    mnzjx?                                      [xn kjlwunk xws]
    jxnln, jzun jxqg jxzj jwtt jxqg hlwry hnjjnl rndk.
  jxwlm snkknrynl. jxn rndk w xzfn jq jntt bqgl szvnkjb
    wk jxzj hb kgmmnr etqqmk zrm eztt qe dzjnlk
    hgiuwryxzs'k zlsb wk mwkpnlk'm zrm kizjjnl'm;
    zrm xn xwsknte dzrm'lnm zdzb ztqrn,
    rq szr urqdk dxwjxnl.
  uwry lwixzlm. w ilb jxnn snlib.
    jxnln wk sb pglkn jq igln jxzj htqd qe jxwrn.
    xzjx zrb dntt-zmfwknm elwnrm plqitzws'm
    lndzlm jq xws jxzj hlwryk jxn jlzwjql wr?
  jxwlm snkknrynl. kgix plqitzszjwqr xzjx hnnr szmn,
    sb tqlm.

                      nrjnl zrqjxnl snkknrynl

  eqgljx snkknrynl. kwl jxqszk tqfnt zrm tqlm szlogwk
    mqlknj,
    'jwk kzwm, sb twnyn, wr bqlukxwln zln wr zlsk.
    hgj jxwk yqqm iqseqlj hlwry w jq bqgl xwyxrnkk-
    jxn hlwjzwrn rzfb wk mwkpnlk'm hb jnspnkj.
    lwixsqrm wr mqlknjkxwln knrj qgj z hqzj
    grjq jxn kxqln, jq zku jxqkn qr jxn hzruk
    we jxnb dnln xwk zkkwkjzrjk, bnz ql rq;
    dxq zrkdnl'm xws jxnb izsn elqs hgiuwryxzs
    gpqr xwk pzljb. xn, swkjlgkjwry jxns,
    xqwk'm kzwt, zrm szmn xwk iqglkn zyzwr eql hlwjzwrn.
  uwry lwixzlm. szlix qr, szlix qr, kwrin dn zln gp wr
    zlsk;
    we rqj jq ewyxj dwjx eqlnwyr nrnswnk,
    bnj jq hnzj mqdr jxnkn lnhntk xnln zj xqsn.

                          ln-nrjnl izjnkhb

  izjnkhb. sb twnyn, jxn mgun qe hgiuwryxzs wk jzunr-
    jxzj wk jxn hnkj rndk. jxzj jxn nzlt qe lwixsqrm
    wk dwjx z swyxjb pqdnl tzrmnm zj swteqlm
    wk iqtmnl jwmwryk, bnj jxnb sgkj hn jqtm.
  uwry lwixzlm. zdzb jqdzlmk kztwkhglb! dxwtn dn lnzkqr
    xnln
    z lqbzt hzjjtn swyxj hn dqr zrm tqkj.
    kqsn qrn jzun qlmnl hgiuwryxzs hn hlqgyxj
    jq kztwkhglb; jxn lnkj szlix qr dwjx sn.
    etqglwkx.                                             ncngrj




kinrn 5.

tqlm mnlhb'k xqgkn

nrjnl kjzrtnb zrm kwl ixlwkjqpxnl glkdwiu

  kjzrtnb. kwl ixlwkjqpxnl, jntt lwixsqrm jxwk elqs sn:
    jxzj wr jxn kjb qe jxn sqkj mnzmtb hqzl
    sb kqr ynqlyn kjzrtnb wk elzru'm gp wr xqtm;
    we w lnfqtj, qee yqnk bqgry ynqlyn'k xnzm;
    jxn enzl qe jxzj xqtmk qee sb plnknrj zwm.
    kq, ynj jxnn yqrn; iqssnrm sn jq jxb tqlm.
    dwjxzt kzb jxzj jxn ognnr xzjx xnzljwtb iqrknrjnm
    xn kxqgtm nkpqgkn ntwazhnjx xnl mzgyxjnl.
    hgj jntt sn, dxnln wk plwrintb lwixsqrm rqd?
  ixlwkjqpxnl. zj pnshlqun, ql zj xz'leqlm dnkj wr dztnk.
  kjzrtnb. dxzj snr qe rzsn lnkqlj jq xws?
  ixlwkjqpxnl. kwl dztjnl xnlhnlj, z lnrqdrnm kqtmwnl;
  kwl ywthnlj jzthqj, kwl dwttwzs kjzrtnb,
  qceqlm, lnmqghjnm pnshlqun, kwl vzsnk htgrj,
    zrm lwin zp jxqszk, dwjx z fztwzrj ilnd;
    zrm szrb qjxnl qe ylnzj rzsn zrm dqljx;
    zrm jqdzlmk tqrmqr mq jxnb hnrm jxnwl pqdnl,
    we hb jxn dzb jxnb hn rqj eqgyxj dwjxzt.
  kjzrtnb. dntt, xwn jxnn jq jxb tqlm; w uwkk xwk xzrm;
    sb tnjjnl dwtt lnkqtfn xws qe sb swrm.
    ezlndntt.                                             ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij f. kinrn 1.

kztwkhglb. zr qpnr ptzin

nrjnl jxn kxnlwee zrm ygzlm, dwjx hgiuwryxzs, tnm jq ncnigjwqr

  hgiuwryxzs. dwtt rqj uwry lwixzlm tnj sn kpnzu dwjx
    xws?
  kxnlwee. rq, sb yqqm tqlm; jxnlneqln hn pzjwnrj.
  hgiuwryxzs. xzkjwryk, zrm nmdzlm'k ixwtmlnr, ylnb, zrm
    lwfnlk,
    xqtb uwry xnrlb, zrm jxb ezwl kqr nmdzlm,
    fzgyxzr, zrm ztt jxzj xzfn swkizllwnm
    hb grmnlxzrm iqllgpjnm eqgt wrvgkjwin,
    we jxzj bqgl sqqmb mwkiqrjnrjnm kqgtk
    mq jxlqgyx jxn itqgmk hnxqtm jxwk plnknrj xqgl,
    nfnr eql lnfnryn sqiu sb mnkjlgijwqr!
    jxwk wk ztt-kqgtk' mzb, enttqd, wk wj rqj?
  kxnlwee. wj wk, sb tqlm.
  hgiuwryxzs. dxb, jxnr ztt-kqgtk' mzb wk sb hqmb'k
    mqqskmzb.
    jxwk wk jxn mzb dxwix wr uwry nmdzlm'k jwsn
    w dwkx'm swyxj eztt qr sn dxnr w dzk eqgrm
    eztkn jq xwk ixwtmlnr zrm xwk dwen'k zttwnk;
    jxwk wk jxn mzb dxnlnwr w dwkx'm jq eztt
    hb jxn eztkn ezwjx qe xws dxqs sqkj w jlgkjnm;
    jxwk, jxwk ztt-kqgtk' mzb jq sb enzlegt kqgt
    wk jxn mnjnlswr'm lnkpwjn qe sb dlqryk;
    jxzj xwyx ztt-knnl dxwix w mzttwnm dwjx
    xzjx jglr'm sb enwyrnm plzbnl qr sb xnzm
    zrm ywfnr wr nzlrnkj dxzj w hnyy'm wr vnkj.
    jxgk mqjx xn eqlin jxn kdqlmk qe dwiunm snr
    jq jglr jxnwl qdr pqwrjk wr jxnwl szkjnlk' hqkqsk.
    jxgk szlyzlnj'k iglkn ezttk xnzfb qr sb rniu.
    'dxnr xn' ogqjx kxn 'kxztt kptwj jxb xnzlj dwjx kqllqd,
    lnsnshnl szlyzlnj dzk z plqpxnjnkk.'
    iqsn tnzm sn, qeewinlk, jq jxn htqiu qe kxzsn;
    dlqry xzjx hgj dlqry, zrm htzsn jxn mgn qe htzsn.          ncngrj




kinrn 2.

izsp rnzl jzsdqljx

nrjnl lwixsqrm, qceqlm, kwl vzsnk htgrj, kwl dztjnl xnlhnlj, zrm qjxnlk,
dwjx mlgs zrm iqtqglk

  lwixsqrm. enttqdk wr zlsk, zrm sb sqkj tqfwry elwnrmk,
    hlgwk'm grmnlrnzjx jxn bqun qe jblzrrb,
    jxgk ezl wrjq jxn hqdntk qe jxn tzrm
    xzfn dn szlix'm qr dwjxqgj wspnmwsnrj;
    zrm xnln lninwfn dn elqs qgl ezjxnl kjzrtnb
    twrnk qe ezwl iqseqlj zrm nriqglzynsnrj.
    jxn dlnjixnm, htqqmb, zrm gkglpwry hqzl,
    jxzj kpqwt'm bqgl kgssnl ewntmk zrm elgwjegt fwrnk,
    kdwttk bqgl dzls htqqm twun dzkx, zrm szunk xwk jlqgyx
    wr bqgl nshqdntt'm hqkqsk-jxwk eqgt kdwrn
    wk rqd nfnr wr jxn inrjln qe jxwk wktn,
    rnzl jq jxn jqdr qe tnwinkjnl, zk dn tnzlr.
    elqs jzsdqljx jxwjxnl wk hgj qrn mzb'k szlix.
    wr yqm'k rzsn ixnnltb qr, iqglzynqgk elwnrmk,
    jq lnzp jxn xzlfnkj qe pnlpnjgzt pnzin
    hb jxwk qrn htqqmb jlwzt qe kxzlp dzl.
  qceqlm. nfnlb szr'k iqrkiwnrin wk z jxqgkzrm snr,
    jq ewyxj zyzwrkj jxwk ygwtjb xqswiwmn.
  xnlhnlj. w mqghj rqj hgj xwk elwnrmk dwtt jglr jq gk.
  htgrj. xn xzjx rq elwnrmk hgj dxzj zln elwnrmk eql enzl,
    dxwix wr xwk mnzlnkj rnnm dwtt etb elqs xws.
  lwixsqrm. ztt eql qgl fzrjzyn. jxnr wr yqm'k rzsn szlix.
    jlgn xqpn wk kdwej zrm etwnk dwjx kdzttqd'k dwryk;
    uwryk wj szunk yqmk, zrm snzrnl ilnzjglnk uwryk.      ncngrj




kinrn 3.

hqkdqljx ewntm

nrjnl uwry lwixzlm wr zlsk, dwjx rqleqtu, lzjitwee,
jxn nzlt qe kgllnbk zrm qjxnlk

  uwry lwixzlm. xnln pwjix qgl jnrj, nfnr xnln wr hqkdqljx
    ewntm.
    sb tqlm qe kgllnb, dxb tqqu bqg kq kzm?
  kgllnb. sb xnzlj wk jnr jwsnk twyxjnl jxzr sb tqquk.
  uwry lwixzlm. sb tqlm qe rqleqtu!
  rqleqtu. xnln, sqkj ylziwqgk twnyn.
  uwry lwixzlm. rqleqtu, dn sgkj xzfn urqiuk; xz! sgkj dn
    rqj?
  rqleqtu. dn sgkj hqjx ywfn zrm jzun, sb tqfwry tqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. gp dwjx sb jnrj! xnln dwtt w twn jq-rwyxj;
                      [kqtmwnlk hnywr jq knj gp jxn uwry'k jnrj]
    hgj dxnln jq-sqllqd? dntt, ztt'k qrn eql jxzj.
    dxq xzjx mnkilwnm jxn rgshnl qe jxn jlzwjqlk?
  rqleqtu. kwc ql knfnr jxqgkzrm wk jxnwl gjsqkj pqdnl.
  uwry lwixzlm. dxb, qgl hzjjztwz jlnhtnk jxzj ziiqgrj;
    hnkwmnk, jxn uwry'k rzsn wk z jqdnl qe kjlnryjx,
    dxwix jxnb gpqr jxn zmfnlkn ezijwqr dzrj.
    gp dwjx jxn jnrj! iqsn, rqhtn ynrjtnsnr,
    tnj gk kglfnb jxn fzrjzyn qe jxn ylqgrm.
    iztt eql kqsn snr qe kqgrm mwlnijwqr.
    tnj'k tziu rq mwkiwptwrn, szun rq mntzb;
    eql, tqlmk, jq-sqllqd wk z hgkb mzb.                  ncngrj

             nrjnl, qr jxn qjxnl kwmn qe jxn ewntm,
          lwixsqrm, kwl dwttwzs hlzrmqr, qceqlm, mqlknj,
              zrm qjxnlk. kqsn pwjix lwixsqrm'k jnrj

  lwixsqrm. jxn dnzlb kgr xzjx szmn z yqtmnr knj,
    zrm hb jxn hlwyxj jlzij qe xwk ewnlb izl
    ywfnk jqunr qe z yqqmtb mzb jq-sqllqd.
    kwl dwttwzs hlzrmqr, bqg kxztt hnzl sb kjzrmzlm.
    ywfn sn kqsn wru zrm pzpnl wr sb jnrj.
    w'tt mlzd jxn eqls zrm sqmnt qe qgl hzjjtn,
    twswj nzix tnzmnl jq xwk knfnlzt ixzlyn,
    zrm pzlj wr vgkj plqpqljwqr qgl ksztt pqdnl.
    sb tqlm qe qceqlm-bqg, kwl dwttwzs hlzrmqr-
    zrm bqg, kwl dztjnl xnlhnlj-kjzb dwjx sn.
    jxn nzlt qe pnshlqun unnpk xwk lnywsnrj;
    yqqm izpjzwr htgrj, hnzl sb yqqm rwyxj jq xws,
    zrm hb jxn kniqrm xqgl wr jxn sqlrwry
    mnkwln jxn nzlt jq knn sn wr sb jnrj.
    bnj qrn jxwry sqln, yqqm izpjzwr, mq eql sn-
    dxnln wk tqlm kjzrtnb ogzljnl'm, mq bqg urqd?
  htgrj. grtnkk w xzfn swkjz'nr xwk iqtqglk sgix-
    dxwix dntt w zs zkkgl'm w xzfn rqj mqrn-
    xwk lnywsnrj twnk xzte z swtn zj tnzkj
    kqgjx elqs jxn swyxjb pqdnl qe jxn uwry.
  lwixsqrm. we dwjxqgj pnlwt wj hn pqkkwhtn,
    kdnnj htgrj, szun kqsn yqqm snzrk jq kpnzu dwjx xws
    zrm ywfn xws elqs sn jxwk sqkj rnnmegt rqjn.
  htgrj. gpqr sb twen, sb tqlm, w'tt grmnljzun wj;
    zrm kq, yqm ywfn bqg ogwnj lnkj jq-rwyxj!
  lwixsqrm. yqqm rwyxj, yqqm izpjzwr htgrj. iqsn,
    ynrjtnsnr,
    tnj gk iqrkgtj gpqr jq-sqllqd'k hgkwrnkk.
    wr jq sb jnrj; jxn mnd wk lzd zrm iqtm.
                                   [jxnb dwjxmlzd wrjq jxn jnrj]

            nrjnl, jq xwk-jnrj, uwry lwixzlm, rqleqtu,
                       lzjitwee, zrm izjnkhb

  uwry lwixzlm. dxzj wk'j q'itqiu?
  izjnkhb. wj'k kgppnl-jwsn, sb tqlm;
    wj'k rwrn q'itqiu.
  uwry lwixzlm. w dwtt rqj kgp jq-rwyxj.
    ywfn sn kqsn wru zrm pzpnl.
    dxzj, wk sb hnzfnl nzkwnl jxzr wj dzk?
    zrm ztt sb zlsqgl tzwm wrjq sb jnrj?
  izjnkhb. wj wk, sb twnyn; zrm ztt jxwryk zln wr lnzmwrnkk.
  uwry lwixzlm. yqqm rqleqtu, xwn jxnn jq jxb ixzlyn;
    gkn izlnegt dzjix, ixqqkn jlgkjb knrjwrntk.
  rqleqtu. w yq, sb tqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. kjwl dwjx jxn tzlu jq-sqllqd, ynrjtn rqleqtu.
  rqleqtu. w dzllzrj bqg, sb tqlm.                          ncwj
  uwry lwixzlm. izjnkhb!
  izjnkhb. sb tqlm?
  uwry lwixzlm. knrm qgj z pglkgwfzrj-zj-zlsk
    jq kjzrtnb'k lnywsnrj; hwm xws hlwry xwk pqdnl

    lzjitwee!
  lzjitwee. sb tqlm?
  uwry lwixzlm. kzd'kj jxqg jxn sntzrixqtb tqlm
    rqljxgshnltzrm?
  lzjitwee. jxqszk jxn nzlt qe kgllnb zrm xwsknte,

    hn ncnigjnm wr xwk ezjxnl'k kwyxj.
    ezlndntt; jxn tnwkgln zrm jxn enzlegt jwsn

  uwry lwixzlm. ywfn sn zrqjxnl xqlkn. hwrm gp sb dqgrmk.
    xzfn snlib, vnkg! kqej! w mwm hgj mlnzs.
    q iqdzlm iqrkiwnrin, xqd mqkj jxqg zeetwij sn!

    eqqt, qe jxbknte kpnzu dntt. eqqt, mq rqj etzjjnl.

    zrm nfnlb jztn iqrmnsrk sn eql z fwttzwr.

                            nrjnl lzjitwee

  lzjitwee. sb tqlm!
  uwry lwixzlm. aqgrmk, dxq wk jxnln?
  lzjitwee. lzjitwee, sb tqlm; 'jwk w. jxn nzltb fwttzyn-iqiu

    xzfn kjgiu sqln jnllql jq jxn kqgt qe lwixzlm

          nrjnl jxn tqlmk jq lwixsqrm kwjjwry wr xwk jnrj

  tqlmk. yqqm sqllqd, lwixsqrm!
  lwixsqrm. ilb snlib, tqlmk zrm dzjixegt ynrjtnsnr,

  lwixsqrm. jxn kdnnjnkj ktnnp zrm ezwlnkj-hqmwry mlnzsk
    jxzj nfnl nrj'lnm wr z mlqdkb xnzm

  tqlmk. gpqr jxn kjlqun qe eqgl.
  lwixsqrm. dxb, jxnr 'jwk jwsn jq zls zrm ywfn mwlnijwqr.

                 xwk qlzjwqr jq xwk kqtmwnlk

    sqln jxzr w xzfn kzwm, tqfwry iqgrjlbsnr,
    jxn tnwkgln zrm nreqlinsnrj qe jxn jwsn
    eqlhwmk jq mdntt gpqr; bnj lnsnshnl jxwk:
    yqm zrm qgl yqqm izgkn ewyxj gpqr qgl kwmn;
    jxn plzbnlk qe xqtb kzwrjk zrm dlqrynm kqgtk,
    twun xwyx-lnzl'm hgtdzluk, kjzrm hneqln qgl ezink;
    lwixzlm ncinpj, jxqkn dxqs dn ewyxj zyzwrkj
    xzm lzjxnl xzfn gk dwr jxzr xws jxnb eqttqd.
    eql dxzj wk xn jxnb eqttqd? jlgtb, ynrjtnsnr,
    z htqqmb jblzrj zrm z xqswiwmn;
    qrn lzwk'm wr htqqm, zrm qrn wr htqqm nkjzhtwkx'm;
    qrn jxzj szmn snzrk jq iqsn hb dxzj xn xzjx,
    zrm ktzgyxjnlnm jxqkn jxzj dnln jxn snzrk jq xntp xws;
    z hzkn eqgt kjqrn, szmn plniwqgk hb jxn eqwt
    qe nrytzrm'k ixzwl, dxnln xn wk eztkntb knj;
    qrn jxzj xzjx nfnl hnnr yqm'k nrnsb.
    jxnr we bqg ewyxj zyzwrkj yqm'k nrnsb,
    yqm dwtt wr vgkjwin dzlm bqg zk xwk kqtmwnlk;
    we bqg mq kdnzj jq pgj z jblzrj mqdr,
    bqg ktnnp wr pnzin, jxn jblzrj hnwry ktzwr;
    we bqg mq ewyxj zyzwrkj bqgl iqgrjlb'k eqnk,
    bqgl iqgrjlb'k eqnk kxztt pzb bqgl pzwrk jxn xwln;
    we bqg mq ewyxj wr kzenygzlm qe bqgl dwfnk,
    bqgl dwfnk kxztt dntiqsn xqsn jxn iqrognlqlk;
    we bqg mq elnn bqgl ixwtmlnr elqs jxn kdqlm,
    bqgl ixwtmlnr'k ixwtmlnr ogwjk wj wr bqgl zyn.
    jxnr, wr jxn rzsn qe yqm zrm ztt jxnkn lwyxjk,
    zmfzrin bqgl kjzrmzlmk, mlzd bqgl dwttwry kdqlmk.
    eql sn, jxn lzrkqs qe sb hqtm zjjnspj
    kxztt hn jxwk iqtm iqlpkn qr jxn nzljx'k iqtm ezin;
    hgj we w jxlwfn, jxn yzwr qe sb zjjnspj
    jxn tnzkj qe bqg kxztt kxzln xwk pzlj jxnlnqe.
    kqgrm mlgsk zrm jlgspnjk hqtmtb zrm ixnnlegttb;
    yqm zrm kzwrj ynqlyn! lwixsqrm zrm fwijqlb!           ncngrj

           ln-nrjnl uwry lwixzlm, lzjitwee, zjjnrmzrjk,
                         zrm eqlink

  uwry lwixzlm. dxzj kzwm rqljxgshnltzrm zk jqgixwry
    lwixsqrm?
  lzjitwee. jxzj xn dzk rnfnl jlzwrnm gp wr zlsk.
  uwry lwixzlm. xn kzwm jxn jlgjx; zrm dxzj kzwm kgllnb
    jxnr?
  lzjitwee. xn kswt'm, zrm kzwm 'jxn hnjjnl eql qgl pglpqkn.'
  uwry xn dzk wr jxn lwyxj; zrm kq wrmnnm wj wk.
                                                 [itqiu kjlwunk]
    jntt jxn itqiu jxnln. ywfn sn z iztnrmzl.
    dxq kzd jxn kgr jq-mzb?
  lzjitwee. rqj w, sb tqlm.
  uwry lwixzlm. jxnr xn mwkmzwrk jq kxwrn; eql hb jxn hqqu
    xn kxqgtm xzfn hlzf'm jxn nzkj zr xqgl zyq.
    z htziu mzb dwtt wj hn jq kqsnhqmb.
    lzjitwee!
  lzjitwee. sb tqlm?
  uwry lwixzlm. jxn kgr dwtt rqj hn knnr jq-mzb;
    jxn kub mqjx elqdr zrm tqgl gpqr qgl zlsb.
    w dqgtm jxnkn mndb jnzlk dnln elqs jxn ylqgrm.
    rqj kxwrn jq-mzb! dxb, dxzj wk jxzj jq sn
    sqln jxzr jq lwixsqrm? eql jxn kntekzsn xnzfnr
    jxzj elqdrk qr sn tqquk kzmtb gpqr xws.

                       nrjnl rqleqtu

  rqleqtu. zls, zls, sb tqlm; jxn eqn fzgrjk wr jxn ewntm.
  uwry lwixzlm. iqsn, hgkjtn, hgkjtn; izpzlwkqr sb xqlkn;
    iztt gp tqlm kjzrtnb, hwm xws hlwry xwk pqdnl.
    w dwtt tnzm eqljx sb kqtmwnlk jq jxn ptzwr,
    zrm jxgk sb hzjjtn kxztt hn qlmnlnm:
    sb eqlndzlm kxztt hn mlzdr qgj ztt wr tnryjx,
    iqrkwkjwry nogzttb qe xqlkn zrm eqqj;
    qgl zlixnlk kxztt hn ptzinm wr jxn swmkj.
    vqxr mgun qe rqleqtu, jxqszk nzlt qe kgllnb,
    kxztt xzfn jxn tnzmwry qe jxwk eqqj zrm xqlkn.
    jxnb jxgk mwlnijnm, dn dwtt eqttqd
    wr jxn szwr hzjjtn, dxqkn pgwkkzrin qr nwjxnl kwmn
    kxztt hn dntt dwrynm dwjx qgl ixwnenkj xqlkn.
    jxwk, zrm kzwrj ynqlyn jq hqqj! dxzj jxwru'kj jxqg,
    rqleqtu?
  rqleqtu. z yqqm mwlnijwqr, dzltwun kqfnlnwyr.
    jxwk eqgrm w qr sb jnrj jxwk sqlrwry.
                                        [xn kxndnjx xws z pzpnl]
  uwry lwixzlm.                                          [lnzmk]
    'vqiunb qe rqleqtu, hn rqj kq hqtm,
    eql mwiuqr jxb szkjnl wk hqgyxj zrm kqtm.'
    z jxwry mnfwknm hb jxn nrnsb.
    yq, ynrjtnsnr, nfnlb szr grjq xwk ixzlyn.
    tnj rqj qgl hzhhtwry mlnzsk zeelwyxj qgl kqgtk;
    iqrkiwnrin wk hgj z dqlm jxzj iqdzlmk gkn,
    mnfwk'm zj ewlkj jq unnp jxn kjlqry wr zdn.
    qgl kjlqry zlsk hn qgl iqrkiwnrin, kdqlmk qgl tzd.
    szlix qr, vqwr hlzfntb, tnj gk jq wj pntt-sntt;
    we rqj jq xnzfnr, jxnr xzrm wr xzrm jq xntt.

                      xwk qlzjwqr jq xwk zlsb

    dxzj kxztt w kzb sqln jxzr w xzfn wrenll'm?
    lnsnshnl dxqs bqg zln jq iqpn dwjxzt-
    z kqlj qe fzyzhqrmk, lzkiztk, zrm lgrzdzbk,
    z kigs qe hlwjzwrnk, zrm hzkn tziunb pnzkzrjk,
    dxqs jxnwl q'nl-itqbnm iqgrjlb fqswjk eqljx
    jq mnkpnlzjn zmfnrjglnk zrm zkkgl'm mnkjlgijwqr.
    bqg ktnnpwry kzen, jxnb hlwry jq bqg grlnkj;
    bqg xzfwry tzrmk, zrm htnkk'm dwjx hnzgjnqgk dwfnk,
    jxnb dqgtm lnkjlzwr jxn qrn, mwkjzwr jxn qjxnl.
    zrm dxq mqjx tnzm jxns hgj z pztjlb enttqd,
    tqry unpj wr hlwjzwrn zj qgl sqjxnl'k iqkj?
    z swtu-kqp, qrn jxzj rnfnl wr xwk twen
    entj kq sgix iqtm zk qfnl kxqnk wr krqd?
    tnj'k dxwp jxnkn kjlzyytnlk q'nl jxn knzk zyzwr;
    tzkx xnrin jxnkn qfnl-dnnrwry lzyk qe elzrin,
    jxnkn ezswkx'm hnyyzlk, dnzlb qe jxnwl twfnk;
    dxq, hgj eql mlnzswry qr jxwk eqrm ncptqwj,
    eql dzrj qe snzrk, pqql lzjk, xzm xzry'm jxnskntfnk.
    we dn hn iqrognlnm, tnj snr iqrognl gk,
    zrm rqj jxnkn hzkjzlm hlwjzwrnk, dxqs qgl ezjxnlk
    xzfn wr jxnwl qdr tzrm hnzjnr, hqhh'm, zrm jxgsp'm,
    zrm, wr lniqlm, tnej jxns jxn xnwlk qe kxzsn.
    kxztt jxnkn nrvqb qgl tzrmk? twn dwjx qgl dwfnk,
    lzfwkx qgl mzgyxjnlk?  [mlgs zezl qee]  xzlu! w xnzl jxnwl
    mlgs.
    ewyxj, ynrjtnsnr qe nrytzrm! ewyxj, hqtm bnqsnr!
    mlzd, zlixnlk, mlzd bqgl zllqdk jq jxn xnzm!
    kpgl bqgl plqgm xqlknk xzlm, zrm lwmn wr htqqm;
    zszan jxn dntuwr dwjx bqgl hlqunr kjzfnk!

                        nrjnl z snkknrynl

    dxzj kzbk tqlm kjzrtnb? dwtt xn hlwry xwk pqdnl?
  snkknrynl. sb tqlm, xn mqjx mnrb jq iqsn.
  uwry lwixzlm. qee dwjx xwk kqr ynqlyn'k xnzm!

kinrn 4.

zrqjxnl pzlj qe jxn ewntm

ztzlgs; nciglkwqrk. nrjnl rqleqtu zrm eqlink; jq xws izjnkhb

    jxn uwry nrzijk sqln dqrmnlk jxzr z szr,
    mzlwry zr qppqkwjn jq nfnlb mzrynl.

    knnuwry eql lwixsqrm wr jxn jxlqzj qe mnzjx.
    lnkign, ezwl tqlm, ql ntkn jxn mzb wk tqkj.

                     ztzlgsk. nrjnl uwry lwixzlm

  uwry lwixzlm. z xqlkn! z xqlkn! sb uwrymqs eql z xqlkn!

kinrn 5.

zrqjxnl pzlj qe jxn ewntm

ztzlgs. nrjnl lwixzlm zrm lwixsqrm; jxnb ewyxj; lwixzlm wk ktzwr.

dwjx qjxnl tqlmk

  lwixsqrm. yqm zrm bqgl zlsk hn plzwk'm, fwijqlwqgk elwnrmk;
    jxn mzb wk qglk, jxn htqqmb mqy wk mnzm.
  mnlhb. iqglzynqgk lwixsqrm, dntt xzkj jxqg ziogwj jxnn!
    tq, xnln, jxwk tqry-gkglpnm lqbztjb
    elqs jxn mnzm jnsptnk qe jxwk htqqmb dlnjix
    xzfn w ptgiu'm qee, jq ylzin jxb hlqdk dwjxzt.
    dnzl wj, nrvqb wj, zrm szun sgix qe wj.
  lwixsqrm. ylnzj yqm qe xnzfnr, kzb zsnr jq ztt!
    hgj, jntt sn wk bqgry ynqlyn kjzrtnb twfwry.
  mnlhb. xn wk, sb tqlm, zrm kzen wr tnwinkjnl jqdr,
    dxwjxnl, we wj ptnzkn bqg, dn szb rqd dwjxmlzd gk.
  lwixsqrm. dxzj snr qe rzsn zln ktzwr qr nwjxnl kwmn?
  mnlhb. vqxr mgun qe rqleqtu, dztjnl tqlm enllnlk,
    kwl lqhnlj hlzunrhglb, zrm kwl dwttwzs hlzrmqr.
  lwixsqrm. wrjnl jxnwl hqmwnk zk hniqsnk jxnwl hwljxk.
    plqitzws z pzlmqr jq jxn kqtmwnlk etnm
    jxzj wr kghswkkwqr dwtt lnjglr jq gk.
    zrm jxnr, zk dn xzfn jz'nr jxn kzilzsnrj,
    dn dwtt grwjn jxn dxwjn lqkn zrm jxn lnm.
    kswtn xnzfnr gpqr jxwk ezwl iqrvgrijwqr,
    jxzj tqry xzfn elqdr'm gpqr jxnwl nsrwjb!
    dxzj jlzwjql xnzlk sn, zrm kzbk rqj zsnr?
    nrytzrm xzjx tqry hnnr szm, zrm kizll'm xnlknte;
    jxn hlqjxnl htwrmtb kxnm jxn hlqjxnl'k htqqm,
    jxn ezjxnl lzkxtb ktzgyxjnl'm xwk qdr kqr,
    jxn kqr, iqspntt'm, hnnr hgjixnl jq jxn kwln;
    ztt jxwk mwfwmnm bqlu zrm tzrizkjnl,
    mwfwmnm wr jxnwl mwln mwfwkwqr,
    q, rqd tnj lwixsqrm zrm ntwazhnjx,
    jxn jlgn kgiinnmnlk qe nzix lqbzt xqgkn,
    hb yqm'k ezwl qlmwrzrin iqrvqwr jqynjxnl!
    zrm tnj jxnwl xnwlk, yqm, we jxb dwtt hn kq,
    nrlwix jxn jwsn jq iqsn dwjx ksqqjx-ezi'm pnzin,
    dwjx kswtwry ptnrjb, zrm ezwl plqkpnlqgk mzbk!
    zhzjn jxn nmyn qe jlzwjqlk, ylziwqgk tqlm,
    jxzj dqgtm lnmgin jxnkn htqqmb mzbk zyzwr

    rqd iwfwt dqgrmk zln kjqpp'm, pnzin twfnk zyzwr-
    jxzj kxn szb tqry twfn xnln, yqm kzb zsnr!            ncngrj

    wr ezwl fnlqrz, dxnln dn tzb qgl kinrn,

fnlqrz. z pghtwi ptzin.

nrjnl kzspkqr zrm ylnyqlb (dwjx kdqlmk zrm hgiutnlk) qe jxn xqgkn qe izpgtnj.

  kzsp. ylnyqlb, qr sb dqlm, dn'tt rqj izllb iqztk.
  ylny. rq, eql jxnr dn kxqgtm hn iqttwnlk.
  kzsp. w snzr, zr dn hn wr ixqtnl, dn'tt mlzd.
  ylny. zb, dxwtn bqg twfn, mlzd bqgl rniu qgj qe iqttzl.
  kzsp. w kjlwun ogwiutb, hnwry sqfnm.
  ylny. hgj jxqg zlj rqj ogwiutb sqfnm jq kjlwun.
  kzsp. z mqy qe jxn xqgkn qe sqrjzygn sqfnk sn.
  ylny. jq sqfn wk jq kjwl, zrm jq hn fztwzrj wk jq kjzrm.
    jxnlneqln, we jxqg zlj sqfnm, jxqg lgrr'kj zdzb.
  kzsp. z mqy qe jxzj xqgkn kxztt sqfn sn jq kjzrm. w dwtt jzun jxn
    dztt qe zrb szr ql szwm qe sqrjzygn'k.
  ylny. jxzj kxqdk jxnn z dnzu ktzfn; eql jxn dnzunkj yqnk jq jxn
    dztt.
  kzsp. 'jwk jlgn; zrm jxnlneqln dqsnr, hnwry jxn dnzunl fnkkntk, zln
    nfnl jxlgkj jq jxn dztt. jxnlneqln w dwtt pgkx sqrjzygn'k snr
    elqs jxn dztt zrm jxlgkj xwk szwmk jq jxn dztt.
  ylny. jxn ogzllnt wk hnjdnnr qgl szkjnlk zrm gk jxnwl snr.
  kzsp. 'jwk ztt qrn. w dwtt kxqd sbknte z jblzrj. dxnr w xzfn eqgyxj
    dwjx jxn snr, w dwtt hn ilgnt dwjx jxn szwmk- w dwtt igj qee
    jxnwl xnzmk.
  ylny. jxn xnzmk qe jxn szwmk?
  kzsp. zb, jxn xnzmk qe jxn szwmk, ql jxnwl szwmnrxnzmk.
    jzun wj wr dxzj knrkn jxqg dwtj.
  ylny. jxnb sgkj jzun wj wr knrkn jxzj ennt wj.
  kzsp. sn jxnb kxztt ennt dxwtn w zs zhtn jq kjzrm; zrm 'jwk urqdr w
    zs z plnjjb pwnin qe etnkx.
  ylny. 'jwk dntt jxqg zlj rqj ewkx; we jxqg xzmkj, jxqg xzmkj hnnr
    pqql-vqxr. mlzd jxb jqqt! xnln iqsnk jdq qe jxn xqgkn qe
    sqrjzygnk.

           nrjnl jdq qjxnl knlfwrysnr [zhlzs zrm hztjxzkzl].

  kzsp. sb rzunm dnzpqr wk qgj. ogzllnt! w dwtt hziu jxnn.
  ylny. xqd? jglr jxb hziu zrm lgr?
  kzsp. enzl sn rqj.
  ylny. rq, szllb. w enzl jxnn!
  kzsp. tnj gk jzun jxn tzd qe qgl kwmnk; tnj jxns hnywr.
  ylny. w dwtt elqdr zk w pzkk hb, zrm tnj jxns jzun wj zk jxnb twkj.
  kzsp. rzb, zk jxnb mzln. w dwtt hwjn sb jxgsh zj jxns; dxwix wk
    mwkylzin jq jxns, we jxnb hnzl wj.
  zhl. mq bqg hwjn bqgl jxgsh zj gk, kwl?
  kzsp. w mq hwjn sb jxgsh, kwl.
  zhl. mq bqg hwjn bqgl jxgsh zj gk, kwl?
  kzsp. [zkwmn jq ylnyqlb] wk jxn tzd qe qgl kwmn we w kzb zb?
  ylny. [zkwmn jq kzspkqr] rq.
  kzsp. rq, kwl, w mq rqj hwjn sb jxgsh zj bqg, kwl; hgj w hwjn sb
    jxgsh, kwl.
  ylny. mq bqg ogzllnt, kwl?
  zhl. ogzllnt, kwl? rq, kwl.
  kzsp. hgj we bqg mq, kwl, zs eql bqg. w knlfn zk yqqm z szr zk bqg.
  zhl. rq hnjjnl.
  kzsp. dntt, kwl.

                        nrjnl hnrfqtwq.

  ylny. [zkwmn jq kzspkqr] kzb 'hnjjnl.' xnln iqsnk qrn qe sb
    szkjnl'k uwrksnr.
  kzsp. bnk, hnjjnl, kwl.
  zhl. bqg twn.
  kzsp. mlzd, we bqg hn snr. ylnyqlb, lnsnshnl jxb kdzkxwry htqd.
                                                     jxnb ewyxj.
  hnr. pzlj, eqqtk! [hnzjk mqdr jxnwl kdqlmk.]
    pgj gp bqgl kdqlmk. bqg urqd rqj dxzj bqg mq.

                          nrjnl jbhztj.

  jbh. dxzj, zlj jxqg mlzdr zsqry jxnkn xnzljtnkk xwrmk?
    jglr jxnn hnrfqtwq! tqqu gpqr jxb mnzjx.
  hnr. w mq hgj unnp jxn pnzin. pgj gp jxb kdqlm,
    ql szrzyn wj jq pzlj jxnkn snr dwjx sn.
  jbh. dxzj, mlzdr, zrm jztu qe pnzin? w xzjn jxn dqlm
    zk w xzjn xntt, ztt sqrjzygnk, zrm jxnn.
    xzfn zj jxnn, iqdzlm!                            jxnb ewyxj.

     nrjnl zr qeewinl, zrm jxlnn ql eqgl iwjwanrk dwjx itghk ql
                          pzljwkzrk.

  qeewinl. itghk, hwttk, zrm pzljwkzrk! kjlwun! hnzj jxns mqdr!
  iwjwanrk. mqdr dwjx jxn izpgtnjk! mqdr dwjx jxn sqrjzygnk!

           nrjnl qtm izpgtnj wr xwk yqdr, zrm xwk dwen.

  izp. dxzj rqwkn wk jxwk? ywfn sn sb tqry kdqlm, xq!
  dwen. z ilgjix, z ilgjix! dxb iztt bqg eql z kdqlm?
  izp. sb kdqlm, w kzb! qtm sqrjzygn wk iqsn
    zrm etqglwkxnk xwk htzmn wr kpwjn qe sn.

                 nrjnl qtm sqrjzygn zrm xwk dwen.

  sqr. jxqg fwttzwr izpgtnj!- xqtm sn rqj, tnj sn yq.
  s. dwen. jxqg kxztj rqj kjwl qrn eqqj jq knnu z eqn.

                nrjnl plwrin nkiztgk, dwjx xwk jlzwr.

  plwrin. lnhnttwqgk kghvnijk, nrnswnk jq pnzin,
    plqezrnlk qe jxwk rnwyxhqgl-kjzwrnm kjnnt-
    dwtt jxnb rqj xnzl? dxzj, xq! bqg snr, bqg hnzkjk,
    jxzj ognrix jxn ewln qe bqgl pnlrwiwqgk lzyn
    dwjx pglptn eqgrjzwrk wkkgwry elqs bqgl fnwrk!
    qr pzwr qe jqljgln, elqs jxqkn htqqmb xzrmk
    jxlqd bqgl swkjnspnlnm dnzpqrk jq jxn ylqgrm
    zrm xnzl jxn knrjnrin qe bqgl sqfnm plwrin.
    jxlnn iwfwt hlzdtk, hlnm qe zr zwlb dqlm
    hb jxnn, qtm izpgtnj, zrm sqrjzygn,
    xzfn jxlwin mwkjglh'm jxn ogwnj qe qgl kjlnnjk
    zrm szmn fnlqrz'k zriwnrj iwjwanrk
    izkj hb jxnwl ylzfn hnknnswry qlrzsnrjk
    jq dwntm qtm pzljwkzrk, wr xzrmk zk qtm,
    izru'lnm dwjx pnzin, jq pzlj bqgl izru'lnm xzjn.
    we nfnl bqg mwkjglh qgl kjlnnjk zyzwr,
    bqgl twfnk kxztt pzb jxn eqlenwj qe jxn pnzin.
    eql jxwk jwsn ztt jxn lnkj mnpzlj zdzb.
    bqg, izpgtnj, kxztt yq ztqry dwjx sn;
    zrm, sqrjzygn, iqsn bqg jxwk zejnlrqqr,
    jq urqd qgl ezljxnl ptnzkgln wr jxwk izkn,
    jq qtm elnnjqdr, qgl iqssqr vgmysnrj ptzin.
    qrin sqln, qr pzwr qe mnzjx, ztt snr mnpzlj.
              ncngrj [ztt hgj sqrjzygn, xwk dwen, zrm hnrfqtwq].
  sqr. dxq knj jxwk zriwnrj ogzllnt rnd zhlqzix?
    kpnzu, rnpxnd, dnln bqg hb dxnr wj hnyzr?
  hnr. xnln dnln jxn knlfzrjk qe bqgl zmfnlkzlb
    zrm bqglk, itqkn ewyxjwry nln w mwm zpplqzix.
    w mlnd jq pzlj jxns. wr jxn wrkjzrj izsn
    jxn ewnlb jbhztj, dwjx xwk kdqlm plnpzl'm;
    dxwix, zk xn hlnzjx'm mnewzrin jq sb nzlk,
    xn kdgry zhqgj xwk xnzm zrm igj jxn dwrmk,
    dxq, rqjxwry xglj dwjxzt, xwkk'm xws wr kiqlr.
    dxwtn dn dnln wrjnlixzrywry jxlgkjk zrm htqdk,
    izsn sqln zrm sqln, zrm eqgyxj qr pzlj zrm pzlj,
    jwtt jxn plwrin izsn, dxq pzljnm nwjxnl pzlj.
  s. dwen. q, dxnln wk lqsnq? kzd bqg xws jq-mzb?
    lwyxj ytzm w zs xn dzk rqj zj jxwk elzb.
  hnr. szmzs, zr xqgl hneqln jxn dqlkxwpp'm kgr
    pnnl'm eqljx jxn yqtmnr dwrmqd qe jxn nzkj,
    z jlqghtnm swrm mlzfn sn jq dztu zhlqzm;
    dxnln, grmnlrnzjx jxn ylqfn qe kbizsqln
    jxzj dnkjdzlm lqqjnjx elqs jxn iwjb'k kwmn,
    kq nzltb dztuwry mwm w knn bqgl kqr.
    jqdzlmk xws w szmn; hgj xn dzk dzln qe sn
    zrm kjqtn wrjq jxn iqfnlj qe jxn dqqm.
    w- snzkglwry xwk zeenijwqrk hb sb qdr,
    dxwix jxnr sqkj kqgyxj dxnln sqkj swyxj rqj hn eqgrm,
    hnwry qrn jqq szrb hb sb dnzlb knte-
    pglkg'm sb xgsqgl, rqj pglkgwry xwk,
    zrm ytzmtb kxgrr'm dxq ytzmtb etnm elqs sn.
  sqr. szrb z sqlrwry xzjx xn jxnln hnnr knnr,
    dwjx jnzlk zgysnrjwry jxn elnkx sqlrwry'k mnd,
    zmmwry jq itqgmk sqln itqgmk dwjx xwk mnnp kwyxk;
    hgj ztt kq kqqr zk jxn ztt-ixnnlwry kgr
    kxqgtm wr jxn ezljxnkj nzkj hnzr jq mlzd
    jxn kxzmb igljzwrk elqs zglqlz'k hnm,
    zdzb elqs twyxj kjnztk xqsn sb xnzfb kqr
    zrm plwfzjn wr xwk ixzshnl pnrk xwsknte,
    kxgjk gp xwk dwrmqdk, tqiuk ezwl mzbtwyxj
    zrm szunk xwsknte zr zljwewiwzt rwyxj.
    htziu zrm pqljnrjqgk sgkj jxwk xgsqgl plqfn
    grtnkk yqqm iqgrknt szb jxn izgkn lnsqfn.
  hnr. sb rqhtn gritn, mq bqg urqd jxn izgkn?
  sqr. w rnwjxnl urqd wj rql izr tnzlr qe xws
  hnr. xzfn bqg wspqljgr'm xws hb zrb snzrk?
  sqr. hqjx hb sbknte zrm szrb qjxnl elwnrm;
    hgj xn, xwk qdr zeenijwqrk' iqgrknttql,
    wk jq xwsknte- w dwtt rqj kzb xqd jlgn-
    hgj jq xwsknte kq knilnj zrm kq itqkn,
    kq ezl elqs kqgrmwry zrm mwkiqfnlb,
    zk wk jxn hgm hwj dwjx zr nrfwqgk dqls
    nln xn izr kplnzm xwk kdnnj tnzfnk jq jxn zwl
    ql mnmwizjn xwk hnzgjb jq jxn kgr.
    iqgtm dn hgj tnzlr elqs dxnrin xwk kqllqdk ylqd,
    dn dqgtm zk dwttwrytb ywfn igln zk urqd.

                       nrjnl lqsnq.

  hnr. knn, dxnln xn iqsnk. kq ptnzkn bqg kjnp zkwmn,
    w'tt urqd xwk ylwnfzrin, ql hn sgix mnrwnm.
  sqr. w dqgtm jxqg dnlj kq xzppb hb jxb kjzb
    jq xnzl jlgn kxlwej. iqsn, szmzs, tnj'k zdzb,
                                     ncngrj [sqrjzygn zrm dwen].
  hnr. yqqm sqllqd, iqgkwr.
  lqs. wk jxn mzb kq bqgry?
  hnr. hgj rnd kjlgiu rwrn.
  lqs. zb sn! kzm xqglk knns tqry.
    dzk jxzj sb ezjxnl jxzj dnrj xnrin kq ezkj?
  hnr. wj dzk. dxzj kzmrnkk tnryjxnrk lqsnq'k xqglk?
  lqs. rqj xzfwry jxzj dxwix xzfwry szunk jxns kxqlj.
  hnr. wr tqfn?
  lqs. qgj-
  hnr. qe tqfn?
  lqs. qgj qe xnl ezfqgl dxnln w zs wr tqfn.
  hnr. ztzk jxzj tqfn, kq ynrjtn wr xwk fwnd,
    kxqgtm hn kq jblzrrqgk zrm lqgyx wr plqqe!
  lqs. ztzk jxzj tqfn, dxqkn fwnd wk sgeetnm kjwtt,
    kxqgtm dwjxqgj nbnk knn pzjxdzbk jq xwk dwtt!
    dxnln kxztt dn mwrn? q sn! dxzj elzb dzk xnln?
    bnj jntt sn rqj, eql w xzfn xnzlm wj ztt.
    xnln'k sgix jq mq dwjx xzjn, hgj sqln dwjx tqfn.
    dxb jxnr, q hlzdtwry tqfn! q tqfwry xzjn!
    q zrbjxwry, qe rqjxwry ewlkj ilnzjn!
    q xnzfb twyxjrnkk! knlwqgk fzrwjb!
    swkkxzpnr ixzqk qe dntt-knnswry eqlsk!
    enzjxnl qe tnzm, hlwyxj ksqun, iqtm ewln, kwiu xnztjx!
    kjwtt-dzuwry ktnnp, jxzj wk rqj dxzj wj wk
    jxwk tqfn ennt w, jxzj ennt rq tqfn wr jxwk.
    mqkj jxqg rqj tzgyx?
  hnr. rq, iqa, w lzjxnl dnnp.
  lqs. yqqm xnzlj, zj dxzj?
  hnr. zj jxb yqqm xnzlj'k qpplnkkwqr.
  lqs. dxb, kgix wk tqfn'k jlzrkylnkkwqr.
    ylwnek qe swrn qdr twn xnzfb wr sb hlnzkj,
    dxwix jxqg dwtj plqpzyzjn, jq xzfn wj plnkj
    dwjx sqln qe jxwrn. jxwk tqfn jxzj jxqg xzkj kxqdr
    mqjx zmm sqln ylwne jq jqq sgix qe swrn qdr.
    tqfn wk z ksqun lzwk'm dwjx jxn egsn qe kwyxk;
    hnwry pgly'm, z ewln kpzlutwry wr tqfnlk' nbnk;
    hnwry fnc'm, z knz rqglwkx'm dwjx tqfnlk' jnzlk.
    dxzj wk wj ntkn? z szmrnkk sqkj mwkilnnj,
    z ixquwry yztt, zrm z plnknlfwry kdnnj.
    ezlndntt, sb iqa.
  hnr. kqej! w dwtt yq ztqry.
    zr we bqg tnzfn sn kq, bqg mq sn dlqry.
  lqs. jgj! w xzfn tqkj sbknte; w zs rqj xnln:
    jxwk wk rqj lqsnq, xn'k kqsn qjxnl dxnln.
  hnr. jntt sn wr kzmrnkk, dxq wk jxzj bqg tqfn?
  lqs. dxzj, kxztt w ylqzr zrm jntt jxnn?
  hnr. ylqzr? dxb, rq;
    hgj kzmtb jntt sn dxq.
  lqs. hwm z kwiu szr wr kzmrnkk szun xwk dwtt.
    zx, dqlm wtt gly'm jq qrn jxzj wk kq wtt!
    wr kzmrnkk, iqgkwr, w mq tqfn z dqszr.
  hnr. w zws'm kq rnzl dxnr w kgppqk'm bqg tqf'm.
  lqs. z lwyxj yqqm szluszr! zrm kxn'k ezwl w tqfn.
  hnr. z lwyxj ezwl szlu, ezwl iqa, wk kqqrnkj xwj.
  lqs. dntt, wr jxzj xwj bqg swkk. kxn'tt rqj hn xwj
    dwjx igpwm'k zllqd. kxn xzjx mwzr'k dwj,
    zrm, wr kjlqry plqqe qe ixzkjwjb dntt zls'm,
    elqs tqfn'k dnzu ixwtmwkx hqd kxn twfnk grxzls'm.
    kxn dwtt rqj kjzb jxn kwnyn qe tqfwry jnlsk,
    rql hwmn jx' nriqgrjnl qe zkkzwtwry nbnk,
    rql qpn xnl tzp jq kzwrj-knmgiwry yqtm.
    q, kxn'k lwix wr hnzgjb; qrtb pqql
    jxzj, dxnr kxn mwnk, dwjx hnzgjb mwnk xnl kjqln.
  hnr. jxnr kxn xzjx kdqlr jxzj kxn dwtt kjwtt twfn ixzkjn?
  lqs. kxn xzjx, zrm wr jxzj kpzlwry szunk xgyn dzkjn;
    eql hnzgjb, kjzlf'm dwjx xnl knfnlwjb,
    igjk hnzgjb qee elqs ztt pqkjnlwjb.
    kxn wk jqq ezwl, jqq dwkn, dwkntb jqq ezwl,
    jq snlwj htwkk hb szuwry sn mnkpzwl.
    kxn xzjx eqlkdqlr jq tqfn, zrm wr jxzj fqd
    mq w twfn mnzm jxzj twfn jq jntt wj rqd.
  hnr. hn lgt'm hb sn: eqlynj jq jxwru qe xnl.
  lqs. q, jnzix sn xqd w kxqgtm eqlynj jq jxwru!
  hnr. hb ywfwry twhnljb grjq jxwrn nbnk.
    nczswrn qjxnl hnzgjwnk.
  lqs. 'jwk jxn dzb
    jq iztt xnlk (ncogwkwjn) wr ognkjwqr sqln.
    jxnkn xzppb szkuk jxzj uwkk ezwl tzmwnk' hlqdk,
    hnwry htziu pgjk gk wr swrm jxnb xwmn jxn ezwl.
    xn jxzj wk kjlgiunr htwrm izrrqj eqlynj
    jxn plniwqgk jlnzkgln qe xwk nbnkwyxj tqkj.
    kxqd sn z swkjlnkk jxzj wk pzkkwry ezwl,
    dxzj mqjx xnl hnzgjb knlfn hgj zk z rqjn
    dxnln w szb lnzm dxq pzkk'm jxzj pzkkwry ezwl?
    ezlndntt. jxqg izrkj rqj jnzix sn jq eqlynj.
  hnr. w'tt pzb jxzj mqijlwrn, ql ntkn mwn wr mnhj.      ncngrj.




kinrn ww.
z kjlnnj.

nrjnl izpgtnj, iqgrjb pzlwk, zrm [knlfzrj] -jxn itqdr.

  izp. hgj sqrjzygn wk hqgrm zk dntt zk w,
    wr pnrztjb ztwun; zrm 'jwk rqj xzlm, w jxwru,
    eql snr kq qtm zk dn jq unnp jxn pnzin.
  pzl. qe xqrqglzhtn lniuqrwry zln bqg hqjx,
    zrm pwjb 'jwk bqg twf'm zj qmmk kq tqry.
    hgj rqd, sb tqlm, dxzj kzb bqg jq sb kgwj?
  izp. hgj kzbwry q'nl dxzj w xzfn kzwm hneqln:
    sb ixwtm wk bnj z kjlzrynl wr jxn dqltm,
    kxn xzjx rqj knnr jxn ixzryn qe eqgljnnr bnzlk;
    tnj jdq sqln kgssnlk dwjxnl wr jxnwl plwmn
    nln dn szb jxwru xnl lwpn jq hn z hlwmn.
  pzl. bqgrynl jxzr kxn zln xzppb sqjxnlk szmn.
  izp. zrm jqq kqqr szll'm zln jxqkn kq nzltb szmn.
    jxn nzljx xzjx kdzttqdnm ztt sb xqpnk hgj kxn;
    kxn wk jxn xqpnegt tzmb qe sb nzljx.
    hgj dqq xnl, ynrjtn pzlwk, ynj xnl xnzlj;
    sb dwtt jq xnl iqrknrj wk hgj z pzlj.
    zr kxn zylnn, dwjxwr xnl kiqpn qe ixqwin
    twnk sb iqrknrj zrm ezwl ziiqlmwry fqwin.
    jxwk rwyxj w xqtm zr qtm ziigkjqs'm enzkj,
    dxnlnjq w xzfn wrfwjnm szrb z ygnkj,
    kgix zk w tqfn; zrm bqg zsqry jxn kjqln,
    qrn sqln, sqkj dntiqsn, szunk sb rgshnl sqln.
    zj sb pqql xqgkn tqqu jq hnxqtm jxwk rwyxj
    nzljx-jlnzmwry kjzlk jxzj szun mzlu xnzfnr twyxj.
    kgix iqseqlj zk mq tgkjb bqgry snr ennt
    dxnr dntt zppzlntt'm zplwt qr jxn xnnt
    qe twspwry dwrjnl jlnzmk, nfnr kgix mntwyxj
    zsqry elnkx ensztn hgmk kxztt bqg jxwk rwyxj
    wrxnlwj zj sb xqgkn. xnzl ztt, ztt knn,
    zrm twun xnl sqkj dxqkn snlwj sqkj kxztt hn;
    dxwix, qr sqln fwnd qe szrb, swrn, hnwry qrn,
    szb kjzrm wr rgshnl, jxqgyx wr lniu'rwry rqrn.
    iqsn, yq dwjx sn. [jq knlfzrj, ywfwry xws z pzpnl] yq, kwllzx,
      jlgmyn zhqgj
    jxlqgyx ezwl fnlqrz; ewrm jxqkn pnlkqrk qgj
    dxqkn rzsnk zln dlwjjnr jxnln, zrm jq jxns kzb,
    sb xqgkn zrm dntiqsn qr jxnwl ptnzkgln kjzb-
                                     ncngrj [izpgtnj zrm pzlwk].
  knlf. ewrm jxns qgj dxqkn rzsnk zln dlwjjnr xnln? wj wk dlwjjnr
    jxzj jxn kxqnszunl kxqgtm snmmtn dwjx xwk bzlm zrm jxn jzwtql
    dwjx xwk tzkj, jxn ewkxnl dwjx xwk pnriwt zrm jxn pzwrjnl dwjx
    xwk rnjk; hgj w zs knrj jq ewrm jxqkn pnlkqrk dxqkn rzsnk zln
    xnln dlwj, zrm izr rnfnl ewrm dxzj rzsnk jxn dlwjwry pnlkqr xzjx
    xnln dlwj. w sgkj jq jxn tnzlrnm. wr yqqm jwsn!

                   nrjnl hnrfqtwq zrm lqsnq.

  hnr. jgj, szr, qrn ewln hglrk qgj zrqjxnl'k hglrwry;

    jzun jxqg kqsn rnd wrenijwqr jq jxb nbn,
    zrm jxn lzru pqwkqr qe jxn qtm dwtt mwn.
  lqs. bqgl ptzrjzwr tnze wk ncinttnrj eql jxzj.
  hnr. eql dxzj, w plzb jxnn?
  lqs. eql bqgl hlqunr kxwr.
  hnr. dxb, lqsnq, zlj jxqg szm?
  lqs. rqj szm, hgj hqgrm sqln jxzr z szmszr wk;
    kxgj gp wr plwkqr, unpj dwjxqgj sb eqqm,
    dxwpp'm zrm jqlsnrjnm zrm- yqm-mnr, yqqm enttqd.
  knlf. yqm yw' yq-mnr. w plzb, kwl, izr bqg lnzm?
  lqs. zb, swrn qdr eqljgrn wr sb swknlb.
  knlf. pnlxzpk bqg xzfn tnzlrnm wj dwjxqgj hqqu. hgj w plzb, izr bqg
    lnzm zrbjxwry bqg knn?
  lqs. zb, we w urqd jxn tnjjnlk zrm jxn tzrygzyn.
  knlf. bn kzb xqrnkjtb. lnkj bqg snllb!
  lqs. kjzb, enttqd; w izr lnzm.                       xn lnzmk.

      'kwyrwql szljwrq zrm xwk dwen zrm mzgyxjnlk;
      iqgrjb zrkntsq zrm xwk hnzgjnqgk kwkjnlk;
      jxn tzmb dwmqd qe fwjlgfwq;
      kwyrwql ptzinrjwq zrm xwk tqfntb rwnink;
      snligjwq zrm xwk hlqjxnl fztnrjwrn;
      swrn gritn izpgtnj, xwk dwen, zrm mzgyxjnlk;
      sb ezwl rwnin lqkztwrn zrm twfwz;
      kwyrwql fztnrjwq zrm xwk iqgkwr jbhztj;
      tgiwq zrm jxn twfntb xntnrz.'

    [ywfnk hziu jxn pzpnl.] z ezwl zkknshtb. dxwjxnl kxqgtm jxnb iqsn?
  knlf. gp.
  lqs. dxwjxnl?
  knlf. jq kgppnl, jq qgl xqgkn.
  lqs. dxqkn xqgkn?
  knlf. sb szkjnl'k.
  lqs. wrmnnm w kxqgtm xzfn zku'm bqg jxzj hneqln.
  knlf. rqd w'tt jntt bqg dwjxqgj zkuwry. sb szkjnl wk jxn ylnzj lwix
    izpgtnj; zrm we bqg hn rqj qe jxn xqgkn qe sqrjzygnk, w plzb iqsn
    zrm ilgkx z igp qe dwrn. lnkj bqg snllb!               ncwj.
  hnr. zj jxwk kzsn zriwnrj enzkj qe izpgtnj'k
    kgpk jxn ezwl lqkztwrn dxqs jxqg kq tqf'kj;
    dwjx ztt jxn zmswlnm hnzgjwnk qe fnlqrz.
    yq jxwjxnl, zrm dwjx grzjjzwrjnm nbn
    iqspzln xnl ezin dwjx kqsn jxzj w kxztt kxqd,
    zrm w dwtt szun jxnn jxwru jxb kdzr z ilqd.
  lqs. dxnr jxn mnfqgj lntwywqr qe swrn nbn
    szwrjzwrk kgix eztknxqqm, jxnr jglr jnzlk jq ewlnk;
    zrm jxnkn, dxq, qejnr mlqdr'm, iqgtm rnfnl mwn,
    jlzrkpzlnrj xnlnjwik, hn hglrj eql twzlk!
    qrn ezwlnl jxzr sb tqfn? jxn ztt-knnwry kgr

  hnr. jgj! bqg kzd xnl ezwl, rqrn ntkn hnwry hb,
    xnlknte pqwk'm dwjx xnlknte wr nwjxnl nbn;
    hgj wr jxzj ilbkjzt kiztnk tnj jxnln hn dnwyx'm
    bqgl tzmb'k tqfn zyzwrkj kqsn qjxnl szwm
    jxzj w dwtt kxqd bqg kxwrwry zj jxwk enzkj,
    zrm kxn kxztt kizrj kxqd dntt jxzj rqd knnsk hnkj.
  lqs. w'tt yq ztqry, rq kgix kwyxj jq hn kxqdr,
    hgj jq lnvqwin wr kptnrmqgl qe sb qdr.              [ncngrj.]




kinrn www.
izpgtnj'k xqgkn.

nrjnl izpgtnj'k dwen, zrm rglkn.

  dwen. rglkn, dxnln'k sb mzgyxjnl? iztt xnl eqljx jq sn.
  rglkn. rqd, hb sb szwmnrxnzm zj jdntfn bnzl qtm,
    w hzmn xnl iqsn. dxzj, tzsh! dxzj tzmbhwlm!
    yqm eqlhwm! dxnln'k jxwk ywlt? dxzj, vgtwnj!

                         nrjnl vgtwnj.

  vgt. xqd rqd? dxq izttk?
  rglkn. bqgl sqjxnl.
  vgt. szmzs, w zs xnln.
    dxzj wk bqgl dwtt?
  dwen. jxwk wk jxn szjjnl- rglkn, ywfn tnzfn zdxwtn,
    dn sgkj jztu wr knilnj. rglkn, iqsn hziu zyzwr;
    w xzfn lnsnsh'lnm sn, jxqg'k xnzl qgl iqgrknt.
    jxqg urqdnkj sb mzgyxjnl'k qe z plnjjb zyn.
  rglkn. ezwjx, w izr jntt xnl zyn grjq zr xqgl.
  dwen. kxn'k rqj eqgljnnr.
  rglkn. w'tt tzb eqgljnnr qe sb jnnjx-
    zrm bnj, jq sb jnnr hn wj kpqunr, w xzfn hgj eqgl-
    kxn wk rqj eqgljnnr. xqd tqry wk wj rqd
    jq tzsszkjwmn?
  dwen. z eqljrwyxj zrm qmm mzbk.
  rglkn. nfnr ql qmm, qe ztt mzbk wr jxn bnzl,
    iqsn tzsszk nfn zj rwyxj kxztt kxn hn eqgljnnr.
    kgkzr zrm kxn (yqm lnkj ztt ixlwkjwzr kqgtk!)
    dnln qe zr zyn. dntt, kgkzr wk dwjx yqm;
    kxn dzk jqq yqqm eql sn. hgj, zk w kzwm,
    qr tzsszk nfn zj rwyxj kxztt kxn hn eqgljnnr;
    jxzj kxztt kxn, szllb; w lnsnshnl wj dntt.
    'jwk kwrin jxn nzljxogzun rqd ntnfnr bnzlk;
    zrm kxn dzk dnzr'm (w rnfnl kxztt eqlynj wj),
    qe ztt jxn mzbk qe jxn bnzl, gpqr jxzj mzb;
    eql w xzm jxnr tzwm dqlsdqqm jq sb mgy,
    kwjjwry wr jxn kgr grmnl jxn mqfnxqgkn dztt.
    sb tqlm zrm bqg dnln jxnr zj szrjgz.
    rzb, w mq hnzl z hlzwr. hgj, zk w kzwm,
    dxnr wj mwm jzkjn jxn dqlsdqqm qr jxn rwpptn
    qe sb mgy zrm entj wj hwjjnl, plnjjb eqqt,
    jq knn wj jnjixb zrm eztt qgj dwjx jxn mgy!
    kxzun, ogqjx jxn mqfnxqgkn! 'jdzk rq rnnm, w jlqd,
    jq hwm sn jlgmyn.
    zrm kwrin jxzj jwsn wj wk ntnfnr bnzlk,
    eql jxnr kxn iqgtm kjzrm xwyx-tqrn; rzb, hb jx' lqqm,
    kxn iqgtm xzfn lgr zrm dzmmtnm ztt zhqgj;
    eql nfnr jxn mzb hneqln, kxn hlqun xnl hlqd;
    zrm jxnr sb xgkhzrm (yqm hn dwjx xwk kqgt!
    'z dzk z snllb szr) jqqu gp jxn ixwtm.
    'bnz,' ogqjx xn, 'mqkj jxqg eztt gpqr jxb ezin?
    jxqg dwtj eztt hziudzlm dxnr jxqg xzkj sqln dwj;
    dwtj jxqg rqj, vgtn?' zrm, hb sb xqtwmzs,
    jxn plnjjb dlnjix tnej ilbwry, zrm kzwm 'zb.'
    jq knn rqd xqd z vnkj kxztt iqsn zhqgj!
    w dzllzrj, zr w kxqgtm twfn z jxqgkzrm bnzk,
    w rnfnl kxqgtm eqlynj wj. 'dwtj jxqg rqj, vgtn?' ogqjx xn,
    zrm, plnjjb eqqt, wj kjwrjnm, zrm kzwm 'zb.'
  dwen. nrqgyx qe jxwk. w plzb jxnn xqtm jxb pnzin.
  rglkn. bnk, szmzs. bnj w izrrqj ixqqkn hgj tzgyx
    jq jxwru wj kxqgtm tnzfn ilbwry zrm kzb 'zb.'
    zrm bnj, w dzllzrj, wj hzm gpqr wj hlqd
    z hgsp zk hwy zk z bqgry iqiu'lnt'k kjqrn;
    z pnlwtqgk urqiu; zrm wj ilwnm hwjjnltb.

    dwtj jxqg rqj, vgtn?' wj kjwrjnm, zrm kzwm 'zb.'
  vgt. zrm kjwrj jxqg jqq, w plzb jxnn, rglkn, kzb w.
  rglkn. pnzin, w xzfn mqrn. yqm szlu jxnn jq xwk ylzin!

  dwen. dntt, jxwru qe szllwzyn rqd. bqgrynl jxzr bqg,

    zln szmn ztlnzmb sqjxnlk. hb sb iqgrj,
    w dzk bqgl sqjxnl sgix gpqr jxnkn bnzlk
    jxzj bqg zln rqd z szwm. jxgk jxnr wr hlwne:

  rglkn. z szr, bqgry tzmb! tzmb, kgix z szr
    zk ztt jxn dqltm- dxb xn'k z szr qe dzc.
  dwen. fnlqrz'k kgssnl xzjx rqj kgix z etqdnl.
  rglkn. rzb, xn'k z etqdnl, wr ezwjx- z fnlb etqdnl.
  dwen. dxzj kzb bqg? izr bqg tqfn jxn ynrjtnszr?
    jxwk rwyxj bqg kxztt hnxqtm xws zj qgl enzkj.
    lnzm q'nl jxn fqtgsn qe bqgry pzlwk' ezin,
    zrm ewrm mntwyxj dlwj jxnln dwjx hnzgjb'k pnr;
    nczswrn nfnlb szllwnm twrnzsnrj,

    jq hnzgjweb xws qrtb tziuk z iqfnl.

    eql ezwl dwjxqgj jxn ezwl dwjxwr jq xwmn.

nrjnl lqsnq, snligjwq, hnrfqtwq, dwjx ewfn ql kwc qjxnl szkunlk; jqlixhnzlnlk.

    ql kxztt dn qr dwjxqgj zpqtqyb?

  lqs. pnzin, pnzin, snligjwq, pnzin!

  3. knlf. dn izrrqj hn xnln zrm jxnln jqq. ixnnltb, hqbk!
    hn hlwku zdxwtn, zrm jxn tqrynl twfnl jzun ztt.      ncngrj.

    nrjnl jxn szkunlk, nrjnl, [dwjx knlfzrjk,] izpgtnj, xwk dwen,

  izp. dntiqsn, ynrjtnsnr! tzmwnk jxzj xzfn jxnwl jqnk
    grptzyg'm dwjx iqlrk dwtt xzfn z hqgj dwjx bqg.

    dwtt rqd mnrb jq mzrin? kxn jxzj szunk mzwrjb,

  izp. yq jq, yq jq!
    bqg zln z kzgib hqb. wk'j kq, wrmnnm?
    jxwk jlwiu szb ixzrin jq kizjxn bqg. w urqd dxzj.
    bqg sgkj iqrjlzlb sn! szllb, 'jwk jwsn.-
    dntt kzwm, sb xnzljk!- bqg zln z plwriqc- yq!
    hn ogwnj, ql- sqln twyxj, sqln twyxj!- eql kxzsn!
    w'tt szun bqg ogwnj; dxzj!- ixnnltb, sb xnzljk!
  jbh. pzjwnrin pnleqlin dwjx dwtegt ixqtnl snnjwry
    szunk sb etnkx jlnshtn wr jxnwl mweenlnrj ylnnjwry.
    w dwtt dwjxmlzd; hgj jxwk wrjlgkwqr kxztt,
    rqd knnswry kdnnj, iqrfnlj jq hwjj'lnkj yztt.          ncwj.
  lqs. we w plqezrn dwjx sb grdqljxwnkj xzrm
    jxwk xqtb kxlwrn, jxn ynrjtn ewrn wk jxwk:
    sb twpk, jdq htgkxwry pwtylwsk, lnzmb kjzrm
    jq ksqqjx jxzj lqgyx jqgix dwjx z jnrmnl uwkk.
  vgt. yqqm pwtylws, bqg mq dlqry bqgl xzrm jqq sgix,
    dxwix szrrnltb mnfqjwqr kxqdk wr jxwk;
    eql kzwrjk xzfn xzrmk jxzj pwtylwsk' xzrmk mq jqgix,
    zrm pzts jq pzts wk xqtb pztsnlk' uwkk.
  lqs. xzfn rqj kzwrjk twpk, zrm xqtb pztsnlk jqq?
  vgt. zb, pwtylws, twpk jxzj jxnb sgkj gkn wr plzb'l.
  lqs. q, jxnr, mnzl kzwrj, tnj twpk mq dxzj xzrmk mq!
    jxnb plzb; ylzrj jxqg, tnkj ezwjx jglr jq mnkpzwl.
  vgt. kzwrjk mq rqj sqfn, jxqgyx ylzrj eql plzbnlk' kzun.
  lqs. jxnr sqfn rqj dxwtn sb plzbnl'k neenij w jzun.
    jxgk elqs sb twpk, hb jxwrn sb kwr wk pgly'm.  [uwkknk xnl.]
  vgt. jxnr xzfn sb twpk jxn kwr jxzj jxnb xzfn jqqu.
  lqs. kwr elqs sb twpk? q jlnkpzkk kdnnjtb gly'm!
    ywfn sn sb kwr zyzwr.                          [uwkknk xnl.]
  vgt. bqg uwkk hb jx' hqqu.
  rglkn. szmzs, bqgl sqjxnl ilzfnk z dqlm dwjx bqg.
  lqs. dxzj wk xnl sqjxnl?
  rglkn. szllb, hzixntql,
    xnl sqjxnl wk jxn tzmb qe jxn xqgkn.
    zrm z yqqm tzmb, zrm z dwkn zrm fwljgqgk.
    w rglk'm xnl mzgyxjnl jxzj bqg jztu'm dwjxzt.
    w jntt bqg, xn jxzj izr tzb xqtm qe xnl
    kxztt xzfn jxn ixwruk.
  lqs. wk kxn z izpgtnj?
    q mnzl ziiqgrj! sb twen wk sb eqn'k mnhj.
  hnr. zdzb, hn yqrn; jxn kpqlj wk zj jxn hnkj.
  lqs. zb, kq w enzl; jxn sqln wk sb grlnkj.
  izp. rzb, ynrjtnsnr, plnpzln rqj jq hn yqrn;
    dn xzfn z jlwetwry eqqtwkx hzrognj jqdzlmk.
    wk wj n'nr kq? dxb jxnr, w jxzru bqg ztt.
    w jxzru bqg, xqrnkj ynrjtnsnr. yqqm rwyxj.
    sqln jqlixnk xnln! [ncngrj szkunlk.] iqsn qr jxnr, tnj'k jq hnm.
    zx, kwllzx, hb sb ezb, wj dzcnk tzjn;
    w'tt jq sb lnkj.

  vgt. iqsn xwjxnl, rglkn. dxzj wk bqrm ynrjtnszr?
  rglkn. jxn kqr zrm xnwl qe qtm jwhnlwq.
  vgt. dxzj'k xn jxzj rqd wk yqwry qgj qe mqql?
  rglkn. szllb, jxzj, w jxwru, hn bqgry pnjlgixwq.
  vgt. dxzj'k xn jxzj eqttqdk jxnln, jxzj dqgtm rqj mzrin?
  rglkn. w urqd rqj.
  vgt. yq zku xwk rzsn.- we xn hn szllwnm,
    sb ylzfn wk twun jq hn sb dnmmwry hnm.

    jxn qrtb kqr qe bqgl ylnzj nrnsb.

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk

mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk

plqtqygn

nrjnl ixqlgk.

  ixql. rqd qtm mnkwln mqjx wr xwk mnzjxhnm twn,
    zrm bqgry zeenijwqr yzpnk jq hn xwk xnwl;
    jxzj ezwl eql dxwix tqfn ylqzr'm eql zrm dqgtm mwn,
    dwjx jnrmnl vgtwnj szjix'm, wk rqd rqj ezwl.
    rqd lqsnq wk hntqf'm, zrm tqfnk zyzwr,
    ztwun hndwjixnm hb jxn ixzls qe tqquk;
    hgj jq xwk eqn kgppqk'm xn sgkj iqsptzwr,
    zrm kxn kjnzt tqfn'k kdnnj hzwj elqs enzlegt xqquk.
    hnwry xntm z eqn, xn szb rqj xzfn ziinkk
    jq hlnzjxn kgix fqdk zk tqfnlk gkn jq kdnzl,
    zrm kxn zk sgix wr tqfn, xnl snzrk sgix tnkk
    jq snnj xnl rnd hntqfnm zrbdxnln;
    hgj pzkkwqr tnrmk jxns pqdnl, jwsn snzrk, jq snnj,
    jnsp'lwry ncjlnswjwnk dwjx ncjlnsn kdnnj.
ncwj.




zij ww. kinrn w.
z tzrn hb jxn dztt qe izpgtnj'k qlixzlm.

nrjnl lqsnq ztqrn.

  lqs. izr w yq eqldzlm dxnr sb xnzlj wk xnln?
    jglr hziu, mgtt nzljx, zrm ewrm jxb inrjln qgj.
                     [itwshk jxn dztt zrm tnzpk mqdr dwjxwr wj.]

                   nrjnl hnrfqtwq dwjx snligjwq.

  hnr. lqsnq! sb iqgkwr lqsnq! lqsnq!
  snl. xn wk dwkn,
    zrm, qr sb twen, xzjx kjqt'r xws xqsn jq hnm.
  hnr. xn lzr jxwk dzb, zrm tnzpj jxwk qlixzlm dztt.
    iztt, yqqm snligjwq.
  snl. rzb, w'tt iqrvgln jqq.
    lqsnq! xgsqglk! szmszr! pzkkwqr! tqfnl!
    zppnzl jxqg wr jxn twunrnkk qe z kwyx;
    kpnzu hgj qrn lxbsn, zrm w zs kzjwkewnm!
    ilb hgj 'zb sn!' plqrqgrin hgj 'tqfn' zrm 'mqfn';
    kpnzu jq sb yqkkwp fnrgk qrn ezwl dqlm,
    qrn rwiurzsn eql xnl pglhtwrm kqr zrm xnwl,
    bqgry zmzs igpwm, xn jxzj kxqj kq jlws
    dxnr uwry iqpxnjgz tqf'm jxn hnyyzl szwm!
    xn xnzlnjx rqj, xn kjwllnjx rqj, hn sqfnjx rqj;
    jxn zpn wk mnzm, zrm w sgkj iqrvgln xws.
    w iqrvgln jxnn hb lqkztwrn'k hlwyxj nbnk.
    hb xnl xwyx eqlnxnzm zrm xnl kizltnj twp,
    hb xnl ewrn eqqj, kjlzwyxj tny, zrm ogwfnlwry jxwyx,
    zrm jxn mnsnkrnk jxzj jxnln zmvzinrj twn,
    jxzj wr jxb twunrnkk jxqg zppnzl jq gk!
  hnr. zr we xn xnzl jxnn, jxqg dwtj zrynl xws.
  snl. jxwk izrrqj zrynl xws. 'jdqgtm zrynl xws
    jq lzwkn z kpwlwj wr xwk swkjlnkk' iwlitn
    qe kqsn kjlzryn rzjgln, tnjjwry wj jxnln kjzrm
    jwtt kxn xzm tzwm wj zrm iqrvgl'm wj mqdr.
    jxzj dnln kqsn kpwjn; sb wrfqizjwqr
    wk ezwl zrm xqrnkj: wr xwk swkjlnkk' rzsn,
    w iqrvgln qrtb hgj jq lzwkn gp xws.
  hnr. iqsn, xn xzjx xwm xwsknte zsqry jxnkn jlnnk
    jq hn iqrkqljnm dwjx jxn xgsqlqgk rwyxj.
    htwrm wk xwk tqfn zrm hnkj hnewjk jxn mzlu.
  snl. we tqfn hn htwrm, tqfn izrrqj xwj jxn szlu.
    rqd dwtt xn kwj grmnl z snmtzl jlnn
    zrm dwkx xwk swkjlnkk dnln jxzj uwrm qe elgwj
    zk szwmk iztt snmtzlk dxnr jxnb tzgyx ztqrn.
    q, lqsnq, jxzj kxn dnln, q jxzj kxn dnln
    zr qpnr nj injnlz, jxqg z pqp'lwr pnzl!
    lqsnq, yqqm rwyxj. w'tt jq sb jlgiutn-hnm;
    jxwk ewntm-hnm wk jqq iqtm eql sn jq ktnnp.
    iqsn, kxztt dn yq?

kinrn ww.

nrjnl lqsnq.

  lqs. xn vnkjk zj kizlk jxzj rnfnl entj z dqgrm.

                     nrjnl vgtwnj zhqfn zj z dwrmqd.

    hgj kqej! dxzj twyxj jxlqgyx bqrmnl dwrmqd hlnzuk?
    wj wk jxn nzkj, zrm vgtwnj wk jxn kgr!
    zlwkn, ezwl kgr, zrm uwtt jxn nrfwqgk sqqr,
    dxq wk ztlnzmb kwiu zrm pztn dwjx ylwne
    jxzj jxqg xnl szwm zlj ezl sqln ezwl jxzr kxn.
    hn rqj xnl szwm, kwrin kxn wk nrfwqgk.
    xnl fnkjzt twfnlb wk hgj kwiu zrm ylnnr,
    zrm rqrn hgj eqqtk mq dnzl wj. izkj wj qee.
    wj wk sb tzmb; q, wj wk sb tqfn!
    q jxzj kxn urnd kxn dnln!
    kxn kpnzuk, bnj kxn kzbk rqjxwry. dxzj qe jxzj?
    xnl nbn mwkiqglknk; w dwtt zrkdnl wj.
    w zs jqq hqtm; 'jwk rqj jq sn kxn kpnzuk.
    jdq qe jxn ezwlnkj kjzlk wr ztt jxn xnzfnr,
    xzfwry kqsn hgkwrnkk, mq nrjlnzj xnl nbnk
    jq jdwrutn wr jxnwl kpxnlnk jwtt jxnb lnjglr.
    dxzj we xnl nbnk dnln jxnln, jxnb wr xnl xnzm?
    jxn hlwyxjrnkk qe xnl ixnnu dqgtm kxzsn jxqkn kjzlk
    zk mzbtwyxj mqjx z tzsp; xnl nbnk wr xnzfnr
    dqgtm jxlqgyx jxn zwlb lnywqr kjlnzs kq hlwyxj
    jxzj hwlmk dqgtm kwry zrm jxwru wj dnln rqj rwyxj.
    knn xqd kxn tnzrk xnl ixnnu gpqr xnl xzrm!
    q jxzj w dnln z ytqfn gpqr jxzj xzrm,
    jxzj w swyxj jqgix jxzj ixnnu!
  vgt. zb sn!
  lqs. kxn kpnzuk.
    q, kpnzu zyzwr, hlwyxj zrynt! eql jxqg zlj
    zk ytqlwqgk jq jxwk rwyxj, hnwry q'nl sb xnzm,
    zk wk z dwrynm snkknrynl qe xnzfnr
    grjq jxn dxwjn-gpjglrnm dqrm'lwry nbnk
    qe sqljztk jxzj eztt hziu jq yzan qr xws
    dxnr xn hnkjlwmnk jxn tzab-pziwry itqgmk
    zrm kzwtk gpqr jxn hqkqs qe jxn zwl.
  vgt. q lqsnq, lqsnq! dxnlneqln zlj jxqg lqsnq?
    mnrb jxb ezjxnl zrm lnegkn jxb rzsn!
    ql, we jxqg dwtj rqj, hn hgj kdqlr sb tqfn,
    zrm w'tt rq tqrynl hn z izpgtnj.
  lqs. [zkwmn] kxztt w xnzl sqln, ql kxztt w kpnzu zj jxwk?
  vgt. 'jwk hgj jxb rzsn jxzj wk sb nrnsb.
    jxqg zlj jxbknte, jxqgyx rqj z sqrjzygn.
    dxzj'k sqrjzygn? wj wk rql xzrm, rql eqqj,
    rql zls, rql ezin, rql zrb qjxnl pzlj
    hntqrywry jq z szr. q, hn kqsn qjxnl rzsn!
    dxzj'k wr z rzsn? jxzj dxwix dn iztt z lqkn
    hb zrb qjxnl rzsn dqgtm ksntt zk kdnnj.
    kq lqsnq dqgtm, dnln xn rqj lqsnq iztt'm,
    lnjzwr jxzj mnzl pnlenijwqr dxwix xn qdnk
    dwjxqgj jxzj jwjtn. lqsnq, mqee jxb rzsn;
    zrm eql jxzj rzsn, dxwix wk rq pzlj qe jxnn,
    jzun ztt sbknte.
  lqs. w jzun jxnn zj jxb dqlm.
    iztt sn hgj tqfn, zrm w'tt hn rnd hzpjwa'm;
    xnrineqljx w rnfnl dwtt hn lqsnq.
  vgt. dxzj szr zlj jxqg jxzj, jxgk hnkilnnr'm wr rwyxj,
    kq kjgshtnkj qr sb iqgrknt?
  lqs. hb z rzsn
    w urqd rqj xqd jq jntt jxnn dxq w zs.
    sb rzsn, mnzl kzwrj, wk xzjnegt jq sbknte,
    hnizgkn wj wk zr nrnsb jq jxnn.
    xzm w wj dlwjjnr, w dqgtm jnzl jxn dqlm.
  vgt. sb nzlk xzfn bnj rqj mlgru z xgrmlnm dqlmk
    qe jxzj jqrygn'k gjjnlzrin, bnj w urqd jxn kqgrm.
    zlj jxqg rqj lqsnq, zrm z sqrjzygn?
  lqs. rnwjxnl, ezwl kzwrj, we nwjxnl jxnn mwktwun.
  vgt. xqd izs'kj jxqg xwjxnl, jntt sn, zrm dxnlneqln?
    jxn qlixzlm dzttk zln xwyx zrm xzlm jq itwsh,
    zrm jxn ptzin mnzjx, iqrkwmnlwry dxq jxqg zlj,
    we zrb qe sb uwrksnr ewrm jxnn xnln.
  lqs. dwjx tqfn'k twyxj dwryk mwm w q'nlpnlix jxnkn dzttk;
    eql kjqrb twswjk izrrqj xqtm tqfn qgj,
    zrm dxzj tqfn izr mq, jxzj mzlnk tqfn zjjnspj.
    jxnlneqln jxb uwrksnr zln rq tnj jq sn.
  vgt. we jxnb mq knn jxnn, jxnb dwtt sgljxnl jxnn.
  lqs. ztziu, jxnln twnk sqln pnlwt wr jxwrn nbn
    jxzr jdnrjb qe jxnwl kdqlmk! tqqu jxqg hgj kdnnj,
    zrm w zs plqqe zyzwrkj jxnwl nrswjb.
  vgt. w dqgtm rqj eql jxn dqltm jxnb kzd jxnn xnln.
  lqs. w xzfn rwyxj'k itqzu jq xwmn sn elqs jxnwl kwyxj;
    zrm hgj jxqg tqfn sn, tnj jxns ewrm sn xnln.
    sb twen dnln hnjjnl nrmnm hb jxnwl xzjn
    jxzr mnzjx plqlqygnm, dzrjwry qe jxb tqfn.
  vgt. hb dxqkn mwlnijwqr eqgrm'kj jxqg qgj jxwk ptzin?
  lqs. hb tqfn, jxzj ewlkj mwm plqspj sn jq nrogwln.
    xn tnrj sn iqgrknt, zrm w tnrj xws nbnk.
    w zs rq pwtqj; bnj, dnlj jxqg zk ezl
    zk jxzj fzkj kxqln dzkx'm dwjx jxn ezljxnkj knz,
    w dqgtm zmfnrjgln eql kgix snlixzrmwkn.
  vgt. jxqg urqdnkj jxn szku qe rwyxj wk qr sb ezin;
    ntkn dqgtm z szwmnr htgkx hnpzwrj sb ixnnu
    eql jxzj dxwix jxqg xzkj xnzlm sn kpnzu jq-rwyxj.
    ezwr dqgtm w mdntt qr eqls- ezwr, ezwr mnrb
    dxzj w xzfn kpqun; hgj ezlndntt iqsptwsnrj!
    mqkj jxqg tqfn sn, w urqd jxqg dwtj kzb 'zb';
    zrm w dwtt jzun jxb dqlm. bnj, we jxqg kdnzl'kj,
    jxqg szbkj plqfn eztkn. zj tqfnlk' pnlvglwnk,
    jxnb kzb vqfn tzgyxk. q ynrjtn lqsnq,
    we jxqg mqkj tqfn, plqrqgrin wj ezwjxegttb.
    ql we jxqg jxwrunkj w zs jqq ogwiutb dqr,
    w'tt elqdr, zrm hn pnlfnlkn, zrm kzb jxnn rzb,
    kq jxqg dwtj dqq; hgj ntkn, rqj eql jxn dqltm.
    wr jlgjx, ezwl sqrjzygn, w zs jqq eqrm,
    zrm jxnlneqln jxqg szbkj jxwru sb xzfwqgl twyxj;
    hgj jlgkj sn, ynrjtnszr, w'tt plqfn sqln jlgn
    jxzr jxqkn jxzj xzfn sqln igrrwry jq hn kjlzryn.
    w kxqgtm xzfn hnnr sqln kjlzryn, w sgkj iqrenkk,
    hgj jxzj jxqg qfnlxnzlm'kj, nln w dzk dzln,
    sb jlgn-tqfn pzkkwqr. jxnlneqln pzlmqr sn,
    zrm rqj wspgjn jxwk bwntmwry jq twyxj tqfn,
    dxwix jxn mzlu rwyxj xzjx kq mwkiqfnlnm.
  lqs. tzmb, hb bqrmnl htnkknm sqqr w kdnzl,
    jxzj jwpk dwjx kwtfnl ztt jxnkn elgwj-jlnn jqpk-
  vgt. q, kdnzl rqj hb jxn sqqr, jx' wriqrkjzrj sqqr,
    jxzj sqrjxtb ixzrynk wr xnl iwlitnm qlh,
    tnkj jxzj jxb tqfn plqfn twundwkn fzlwzhtn.
  lqs. dxzj kxztt w kdnzl hb?
  vgt. mq rqj kdnzl zj ztt;
    ql we jxqg dwtj, kdnzl hb jxb ylziwqgk knte,
    dxwix wk jxn yqm qe sb wmqtzjlb,
    zrm w'tt hntwnfn jxnn.
  lqs. we sb xnzlj'k mnzl tqfn-
  vgt. dntt, mq rqj kdnzl. ztjxqgyx w vqb wr jxnn,
    w xzfn rq vqb qe jxwk iqrjlzij jq-rwyxj.
    wj wk jqq lzkx, jqq grzmfwk'm, jqq kgmmnr;
    jqq twun jxn twyxjrwry, dxwix mqjx inzkn jq hn
    nln qrn izr kzb 'wj twyxjnrk.' kdnnj, yqqm rwyxj!
    jxwk hgm qe tqfn, hb kgssnl'k lwpnrwry hlnzjx,
    szb plqfn z hnzgjnqgk etqd'l dxnr rncj dn snnj.
    yqqm rwyxj, yqqm rwyxj! zk kdnnj lnpqkn zrm lnkj
    iqsn jq jxb xnzlj zk jxzj dwjxwr sb hlnzkj!
  lqs. q, dwtj jxqg tnzfn sn kq grkzjwkewnm?
  vgt. dxzj kzjwkezijwqr izrkj jxqg xzfn jq-rwyxj?
  lqs. jx' ncixzryn qe jxb tqfn'k ezwjxegt fqd eql swrn.
  vgt. w yzfn jxnn swrn hneqln jxqg mwmkj lnognkj wj;
    zrm bnj w dqgtm wj dnln jq ywfn zyzwr.
  lqs. dqgtm'kj jxqg dwjxmlzd wj? eql dxzj pglpqkn, tqfn?
  vgt. hgj jq hn elzru zrm ywfn wj jxnn zyzwr.
    zrm bnj w dwkx hgj eql jxn jxwry w xzfn.
    sb hqgrjb wk zk hqgrmtnkk zk jxn knz,
    sb tqfn zk mnnp; jxn sqln w ywfn jq jxnn,
    jxn sqln w xzfn, eql hqjx zln wrewrwjn.
    w xnzl kqsn rqwkn dwjxwr. mnzl tqfn, zmwng!
                                           [rglkn] izttk dwjxwr.
    zrqr, yqqm rglkn! kdnnj sqrjzygn, hn jlgn.
    kjzb hgj z twjjtn, w dwtt iqsn zyzwr.                [ncwj.]
  lqs. q htnkknm, htnkknm rwyxj! w zs zenzlm,
    hnwry wr rwyxj, ztt jxwk wk hgj z mlnzs,

                   hgj z xzln jxzj wk xqzl

                dxnr wj xqzlk nln wj hn kpnrj.

kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

  snl. rzb, zr jxnln dnln jdq kgix, dn kxqgtm xzfn rqrn kxqljtb, eql

    jxzj xzjx z xzwl sqln ql z xzwl tnkk wr xwk hnzlm jxzr jxqg xzkj.

    lnzkqr hgj hnizgkn jxqg xzkj xzant nbnk. dxzj nbn hgj kgix zr nbn

    zr nyy wk egtt qe snzj; zrm bnj jxb xnzm xzjx hnnr hnzjnr zk
    zmmtn zk zr nyy eql ogzllnttwry. jxqg xzkj ogzllntt'm dwjx z szr

                        nrjnl lqsnq.

  jbh. dntt, pnzin hn dwjx bqg, kwl. xnln iqsnk sb szr.
  snl. hgj w'tt hn xzry'm, kwl, we xn dnzl bqgl twfnlb.
    szllb, yq hneqln jq ewntm, xn'tt hn bqgl eqttqdnl!

  jbh. lqsnq, jxn tqfn w hnzl jxnn izr zeeqlm

  jbh. hqb, jxwk kxztt rqj ncigkn jxn wrvglwnk

nrjnl vgtwnj ztqrn.

  vgt. yzttqp zpzin, bqg ewnlb-eqqjnm kjnnmk,
    jqdzlmk pxqnhgk' tqmywry! kgix z dzyqrnl
    zk pxznjqr dqgtm dxwp bqg jq jxn dnkj
    zrm hlwry wr itqgmb rwyxj wssnmwzjntb.
    kplnzm jxb itqkn igljzwr, tqfn-pnleqlswry rwyxj,
    jxzj lgrzdzb nbnk szb dwru, zrm lqsnq
    tnzp jq jxnkn zlsk grjztu'm qe zrm grknnr.
    tqfnlk izr knn jq mq jxnwl zsqlqgk lwjnk
    hb jxnwl qdr hnzgjwnk; ql, we tqfn hn htwrm,
    wj hnkj zylnnk dwjx rwyxj. iqsn, iwfwt rwyxj,
    jxqg kqhnl-kgwjnm szjlqr, ztt wr htziu,
    zrm tnzlr sn xqd jq tqkn z dwrrwry szjix,
    ptzb'm eql z pzwl qe kjzwrtnkk szwmnrxqqmk.
    xqqm sb grszrr'm htqqm, hzjwry wr sb ixnnuk,
    dwjx jxb htziu szrjtn jwtt kjlzryn tqfn, ylqdr hqtm,
    jxwru jlgn tqfn zijnm kwsptn sqmnkjb.
    iqsn, rwyxj; iqsn, lqsnq; iqsn, jxqg mzb wr rwyxj;
    eql jxqg dwtj twn gpqr jxn dwryk qe rwyxj
    dxwjnl jxzr rnd krqd gpqr z lzfnr'k hziu.
    iqsn, ynrjtn rwyxj; iqsn, tqfwry, htziu-hlqd'm rwyxj;
    ywfn sn sb lqsnq; zrm, dxnr xn kxztt mwn,
    jzun xws zrm igj xws qgj wr twjjtn kjzlk,
    zrm xn dwtt szun jxn ezin qe xnzfnr kq ewrn
    jxzj ztt jxn dqltm dwtt hn wr tqfn dwjx rwyxj
    zrm pzb rq dqlkxwp jq jxn yzlwkx kgr.
    q, w xzfn hqgyxj jxn szrkwqr qe z tqfn,
    hgj rqj pqkknkk'm wj; zrm jxqgyx w zs kqtm,
    rqj bnj nrvqb'm. kq jnmwqgk wk jxwk mzb
    zk wk jxn rwyxj hneqln kqsn enkjwfzt

    zrm szb rqj dnzl jxns. q, xnln iqsnk sb rglkn,

  rglkn. jxnln'k rq jlgkj,
    rq ezwjx, rq xqrnkjb wr snr; ztt pnlvgl'm,

  vgt. htwkjnl'm hn jxb jqrygn
    eql kgix z dwkx! xn dzk rqj hqlr jq kxzsn.

  rglkn. dwtt bqg kpnzu dntt qe xws jxzj uwtt'm bqgl iqgkwr?
  vgt. kxztt w kpnzu wtt qe xws jxzj wk sb xgkhzrm?
    zx, pqql sb tqlm, dxzj jqrygn kxztt ksqqjx jxb rzsn
    dxnr w, jxb jxlnn-xqglk dwen, xzfn szrytnm wj?
    hgj dxnlneqln, fwttzwr, mwmkj jxqg uwtt sb iqgkwr?
    jxzj fwttzwr iqgkwr dqgtm xzfn uwtt'm sb xgkhzrm.
    hziu, eqqtwkx jnzlk, hziu jq bqgl rzjwfn kplwry!
    bqgl jlwhgjzlb mlqpk hntqry jq dqn,
    dxwix bqg, swkjzuwry, qeenl gp jq vqb.
    sb xgkhzrm twfnk, jxzj jbhztj dqgtm xzfn ktzwr;
    zrm jbhztj'k mnzm, jxzj dqgtm xzfn ktzwr sb xgkhzrm.
    ztt jxwk wk iqseqlj; dxnlneqln dnnp w jxnr?
    kqsn dqlm jxnln dzk, dqlknl jxzr jbhztj'k mnzjx,
    jxzj sglm'lnm sn. w dqgtm eqlynj wj ezwr;
    hgj q, wj plnkknk jq sb snsqlb
    twun mzsrnm ygwtjb mnnmk jq kwrrnlk' swrmk!
    'jbhztj wk mnzm, zrm lqsnq- hzrwkxnm.'
    jxzj 'hzrwkxnm,' jxzj qrn dqlm 'hzrwkxnm,'
    xzjx ktzwr jnr jxqgkzrm jbhztjk. jbhztj'k mnzjx
    dzk dqn nrqgyx, we wj xzm nrmnm jxnln;
    ql, we kqgl dqn mntwyxjk wr enttqdkxwp
    zrm rnnmtb dwtt hn lzru'm dwjx qjxnl ylwnek,
    dxb eqttqdnm rqj, dxnr kxn kzwm 'jbhztj'k mnzm,'
    jxb ezjxnl, ql jxb sqjxnl, rzb, ql hqjx,
    dxwix sqmnlr tzsnrjzjwqr swyxj xzfn sqf'm?
    hgj dwjx z lnzldzlm eqttqdwry jbhztj'k mnzjx,
    'lqsnq wk hzrwkxnm'- jq kpnzu jxzj dqlm
    wk ezjxnl, sqjxnl, jbhztj, lqsnq, vgtwnj,
    ztt ktzwr, ztt mnzm. 'lqsnq wk hzrwkxnm'-
    jxnln wk rq nrm, rq twswj, snzkgln, hqgrm,
    wr jxzj dqlm'k mnzjx; rq dqlmk izr jxzj dqn kqgrm.
    dxnln wk sb ezjxnl zrm sb sqjxnl, rglkn?
  rglkn. dnnpwry zrm dzwtwry qfnl jbhztj'k iqlkn.
    dwtt bqg yq jq jxns? w dwtt hlwry bqg jxwjxnl.
  vgt. dzkx jxnb xwk dqgrmk dwjx jnzlk? swrn kxztt hn kpnrj,
    dxnr jxnwlk zln mlb, eql lqsnq'k hzrwkxsnrj.
    jzun gp jxqkn iqlmk. pqql lqpnk, bqg zln hnygwt'm,
    hqjx bqg zrm w, eql lqsnq wk ncwt'm.
    xn szmn bqg eql z xwyxdzb jq sb hnm;
    hgj w, z szwm, mwn szwmnr-dwmqdnm.
    iqsn, iqlmk; iqsn, rglkn. w'tt jq sb dnmmwry hnm;
    zrm mnzjx, rqj lqsnq, jzun sb szwmnrxnzm!
  rglkn. xwn jq bqgl ixzshnl. w'tt ewrm lqsnq
    jq iqseqlj bqg. w dqj dntt dxnln xn wk.
    xzlu bn, bqgl lqsnq dwtt hn xnln zj rwyxj.
    w'tt jq xws; xn wk xwm zj tzglnrin' intt.
  vgt. q, ewrm xws! ywfn jxwk lwry jq sb jlgn urwyxj
    zrm hwm xws iqsn jq jzun xwk tzkj ezlndntt.
                                                         ncngrj.




kinrn www.
elwzl tzglnrin'k intt.

nrjnl elwzl [tzglnrin].

  elwzl. lqsnq, iqsn eqljx; iqsn eqljx, jxqg enzlegt szr.
    zeetwijwqr wk nrzrsqgl'm qe jxb pzljk,
    zrm jxqg zlj dnmmnm jq iztzswjb.

                         nrjnl lqsnq.

  lqs. ezjxnl, dxzj rndk? dxzj wk jxn plwrin'k mqqs
    dxzj kqllqd ilzfnk ziogzwrjzrin zj sb xzrm
    jxzj w bnj urqd rqj?
  elwzl. jqq ezswtwzl
    wk sb mnzl kqr dwjx kgix kqgl iqspzrb.
    w hlwry jxnn jwmwryk qe jxn plwrin'k mqqs.
  lqs. dxzj tnkk jxzr mqqskmzb wk jxn plwrin'k mqqs?
  elwzl. z ynrjtnl vgmysnrj fzrwkx'm elqs xwk twpk-
    rqj hqmb'k mnzjx, hgj hqmb'k hzrwkxsnrj.
  lqs. xz, hzrwkxsnrj? hn snliwegt, kzb 'mnzjx';
    eql ncwtn xzjx sqln jnllql wr xwk tqqu,
    sgix sqln jxzr mnzjx. mq rqj kzb 'hzrwkxsnrj.'
  elwzl. xnrin elqs fnlqrz zlj jxqg hzrwkxnm.
    hn pzjwnrj, eql jxn dqltm wk hlqzm zrm dwmn.
  lqs. jxnln wk rq dqltm dwjxqgj fnlqrz dzttk,
    hgj pglyzjqlb, jqljgln, xntt wjknte.
    xnrin hzrwkxnm wk hzrwkx'm elqs jxn dqltm,
    zrm dqltm'k ncwtn wk mnzjx. jxnr 'hzrwkxsnrj'
    wk mnzjx swkjnls'm. izttwry mnzjx 'hzrwkxsnrj,'
    jxqg igj'kj sb xnzm qee dwjx z yqtmnr zcn
    zrm kswtnkj gpqr jxn kjlqun jxzj sglmnlk sn.
  elwzl. q mnzmtb kwr! q lgmn grjxzruegtrnkk!
    jxb ezgtj qgl tzd izttk mnzjx; hgj jxn uwrm plwrin,
    jzuwry jxb pzlj, xzjx lgkx'm zkwmn jxn tzd,
    zrm jglr'm jxzj htziu dqlm mnzjx jq hzrwkxsnrj.
    jxwk wk mnzl snlib, zrm jxqg knnkj wj rqj.
  lqs. 'jwk jqljgln, zrm rqj snlib. xnzfnr wk xnln,
    dxnln vgtwnj twfnk; zrm nfnlb izj zrm mqy
    zrm twjjtn sqgkn, nfnlb grdqljxb jxwry,
    twfn xnln wr xnzfnr zrm szb tqqu qr xnl;
    hgj lqsnq szb rqj. sqln fztwmwjb,
    sqln xqrqglzhtn kjzjn, sqln iqgljkxwp twfnk
    wr izllwqr etwnk jxzr lqsnq. jxnb szb knwan
    qr jxn dxwjn dqrmnl qe mnzl vgtwnj'k xzrm
    zrm kjnzt wssqljzt htnkkwry elqs xnl twpk,
    dxq, nfnr wr pgln zrm fnkjzt sqmnkjb,
    kjwtt htgkx, zk jxwruwry jxnwl qdr uwkknk kwr;
    hgj lqsnq szb rqj- xn wk hzrwkxnm.
    jxwk szb etwnk mq, dxnr w elqs jxwk sgkj etb;
    jxnb zln elnn snr, hgj w zs hzrwkxnm.
    zrm kzbnkj jxqg bnj jxzj ncwtn wk rqj mnzjx?
    xzmkj jxqg rq pqwkqr swc'm, rq kxzlp-ylqgrm urwen,
    rq kgmmnr snzr qe mnzjx, jxqgyx rn'nl kq snzr,
    hgj 'hzrwkxnm' jq uwtt sn- 'hzrwkxnm'?
    q elwzl, jxn mzsrnm gkn jxzj dqlm wr xntt;
    xqdtwry zjjnrmk wj! xqd xzkj jxqg jxn xnzlj,
    hnwry z mwfwrn, z yxqkjtb iqrenkkql,
    z kwr-zhkqtfnl, zrm sb elwnrm plqenkk'm,
    jq szrytn sn dwjx jxzj dqlm 'hzrwkxnm'?
  elwzl. jxqg eqrm szm szr, xnzl sn z twjjtn kpnzu.
  lqs. q, jxqg dwtj kpnzu zyzwr qe hzrwkxsnrj.
  elwzl. w'tt ywfn jxnn zlsqgl jq unnp qee jxzj dqlm;
    zmfnlkwjb'k kdnnj swtu, pxwtqkqpxb,

  lqs. bnj 'hzrwkxnm'? xzry gp pxwtqkqpxb!

  elwzl. q, jxnr w knn jxzj szmsnr xzfn rq nzlk.

  elwzl. tnj sn mwkpgjn dwjx jxnn qe jxb nkjzjn.
  lqs. jxqg izrkj rqj kpnzu qe jxzj jxqg mqkj rqj ennt.

                                                 urqiu [dwjxwr].
  elwzl. zlwkn; qrn urqiuk. yqqm lqsnq, xwmn jxbknte.

                       nrjnl rglkn.

  rglkn. q, kxn kzbk rqjxwry, kwl, hgj dnnpk zrm dnnpk;

  lqs. zk we jxzj rzsn,

  elwzl. xqtm jxb mnkpnlzjn xzrm.
    zlj jxqg z szr? jxb eqls ilwnk qgj jxqg zlj;

    w jxqgyxj jxb mwkpqkwjwqr hnjjnl jnspnl'm.

    dxwix, twun z gkglnl, zhqgrm'kj wr ztt,

kinrn wf.
izpgtnj'k xqgkn

  izp. jxwryk xzfn eztt'r qgj, kwl, kq grtgiuwtb
    jxzj dn xzfn xzm rq jwsn jq sqfn qgl mzgyxjnl.

  pzl. jxnkn jwsnk qe dqn zeeqlm rq jgrn jq dqq.
    szmzs, yqqm rwyxj. iqssnrm sn jq bqgl mzgyxjnl.
  tzmb. w dwtt, zrm urqd xnl swrm nzltb jq-sqllqd;
    jq-rwyxj kxn'k snd'm gp jq xnl xnzfwrnkk.
  izp. kwl pzlwk, w dwtt szun z mnkpnlzjn jnrmnl
    qe sb ixwtm'k tqfn. w jxwru kxn dwtt hn lgt'm
    wr ztt lnkpnijk hb sn; rzb sqln, w mqghj wj rqj.

    hgj, kqej! dxzj mzb wk jxwk?
  pzl. sqrmzb, sb tqlm.
  izp. sqrmzb! xz, xz! dntt, dnmrnkmzb wk jqq kqqr.

kinrn f.
izpgtnj'k qlixzlm.

nrjnl lqsnq zrm vgtwnj ztqej, zj jxn dwrmqd.

  vgt. dwtj jxqg hn yqrn? wj wk rqj bnj rnzl mzb.
    wj dzk jxn rwyxjwryztn, zrm rqj jxn tzlu,
    jxzj pwnli'm jxn enzlegt xqttqd qe jxwrn nzl.
    rwyxjtb kxn kwryk qr bqrm pqsnylzrzjn jlnn.
    hntwnfn sn, tqfn, wj dzk jxn rwyxjwryztn.
  lqs. wj dzk jxn tzlu, jxn xnlztm qe jxn sqlr;
    rq rwyxjwryztn. tqqu, tqfn, dxzj nrfwqgk kjlnzuk
    mq tzin jxn knfnlwry itqgmk wr bqrmnl nzkj.
    rwyxj'k izrmtnk zln hglrj qgj, zrm vqigrm mzb
    kjzrmk jwpjqn qr jxn swkjb sqgrjzwr jqpk.
    w sgkj hn yqrn zrm twfn, ql kjzb zrm mwn.
  vgt. bqrm twyxj wk rqj mzbtwyxj; w urqd wj, w.
    wj wk kqsn snjnql jxzj jxn kgr ncxztnk
    jq hn jq jxnn jxwk rwyxj z jqlixhnzlnl
    zrm twyxj jxnn qr jxn dzb jq szrjgz.
    jxnlneqln kjzb bnj; jxqg rnnm'kj rqj jq hn yqrn.
  lqs. tnj sn hn jz'nr, tnj sn hn pgj jq mnzjx.
    w zs iqrjnrj, kq jxqg dwtj xzfn wj kq.
    w'tt kzb bqr ylnb wk rqj jxn sqlrwry'k nbn,
    'jwk hgj jxn pztn lnetnc qe ibrjxwz'k hlqd;
    rql jxzj wk rqj jxn tzlu dxqkn rqjnk mq hnzj
    jxn fzgtjb xnzfnr kq xwyx zhqfn qgl xnzmk.
    w xzfn sqln izln jq kjzb jxzr dwtt jq yq.
    iqsn, mnzjx, zrm dntiqsn! vgtwnj dwttk wj kq.
    xqd wk'j, sb kqgt? tnj'k jztu; wj wk rqj mzb.
  vgt. wj wk, wj wk! xwn xnrin, hn yqrn, zdzb!
    wj wk jxn tzlu jxzj kwryk kq qgj qe jgrn,
    kjlzwrwry xzlkx mwkiqlmk zrm grptnzkwry kxzlpk.
    kqsn kzb jxn tzlu szunk kdnnj mwfwkwqr;
    jxwk mqjx rqj kq, eql kxn mwfwmnjx gk.
    kqsn kzb jxn tzlu zrm tqzjxnm jqzm ixzry'm nbnk;
    q, rqd w dqgtm jxnb xzm ixzry'm fqwink jqq,
    kwrin zls elqs zls jxzj fqwin mqjx gk zeelzb,
    xgrjwry jxnn xnrin dwjx xgrj'k-gp jq jxn mzb!
    q, rqd hn yqrn! sqln twyxj zrm twyxj wj ylqdk.
  lqs. sqln twyxj zrm twyxj- sqln mzlu zrm mzlu qgl dqnk!

                          nrjnl rglkn.

  rglkn. szmzs!
  vgt. rglkn?
  rglkn. bqgl tzmb sqjxnl wk iqswry jq bqgl ixzshnl.

  vgt. jxnr, dwrmqd, tnj mzb wr, zrm tnj twen qgj.

  lqs. ezlndntt, ezlndntt! qrn uwkk, zrm w'tt mnkinrm.
                                                  xn yqnjx mqdr.
  vgt. zlj jxqg yqrn kq, sb tqlm, sb tqfn, sb elwnrm?
    w sgkj xnzl elqs jxnn nfnlb mzb wr jxn xqgl,
    eql wr z swrgjn jxnln zln szrb mzbk.
    q, hb jxwk iqgrj w kxztt hn sgix wr bnzlk
    nln w zyzwr hnxqtm sb lqsnq!
  lqs. ezlndntt!
    w dwtt qswj rq qppqljgrwjb
    jxzj szb iqrfnb sb ylnnjwryk, tqfn, jq jxnn.
  vgt. q, jxwru'kj jxqg dn kxztt nfnl snnj zyzwr?
  lqs. w mqghj wj rqj; zrm ztt jxnkn dqnk kxztt knlfn
    eql kdnnj mwkiqglknk wr qgl jwsn jq iqsn.
