<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij wf. kinrn w.
elwzl tzglnrin'k intt.

nrjnl elwzl, [tzglnrin] zrm iqgrjb pzlwk.

  elwzl. qr jxglkmzb, kwl? jxn jwsn wk fnlb kxqlj.
  pzl. sb ezjxnl izpgtnj dwtt xzfn wj kq,
    zrm w zs rqjxwry ktqd jq ktziu xwk xzkjn.
  elwzl. bqg kzb bqg mq rqj urqd jxn tzmb'k swrm.
    grnfnr wk jxn iqglkn; w twun wj rqj.
  pzl. wssqmnlzjntb kxn dnnpk eql jbhztj'k mnzjx,
    zrm jxnlneqln xzfn w twjjtn jztu'm qe tqfn;
    eql fnrgk kswtnk rqj wr z xqgkn qe jnzlk.
    rqd, kwl, xnl ezjxnl iqgrjk wj mzrynlqgk
    jxzj kxn mq ywfn xnl kqllqd kq sgix kdzb,
    zrm wr xwk dwkmqs xzkjnk qgl szllwzyn
    jq kjqp jxn wrgrmzjwqr qe xnl jnzlk,
    dxwix, jqq sgix swrmnm hb xnlknte ztqrn,
    szb hn pgj elqs xnl hb kqiwnjb.
    rqd mq bqg urqd jxn lnzkqr qe jxwk xzkjn.
  elwzl. [zkwmn] w dqgtm w urnd rqj dxb wj kxqgtm hn ktqd'm.-
    tqqu, kwl, xnln iqsnk jxn tzmb jqdzlm sb intt.

                    nrjnl vgtwnj.

  pzl. xzppwtb snj, sb tzmb zrm sb dwen!
  vgt. jxzj szb hn, kwl, dxnr w szb hn z dwen.
  pzl. jxzj szb hn sgkj hn, tqfn, qr jxglkmzb rncj.
  vgt. dxzj sgkj hn kxztt hn.
  elwzl. jxzj'k z inljzwr jncj.
  pzl. iqsn bqg jq szun iqrenkkwqr jq jxwk ezjxnl?
  vgt. jq zrkdnl jxzj, w kxqgtm iqrenkk jq bqg.
  pzl. mq rqj mnrb jq xws jxzj bqg tqfn sn.
  vgt. w dwtt iqrenkk jq bqg jxzj w tqfn xws.
  pzl. kq dwtt bn, w zs kgln, jxzj bqg tqfn sn.
  vgt. we w mq kq, wj dwtt hn qe sqln plwin,
    hnwry kpqun hnxwrm bqgl hziu, jxzr jq bqgl ezin.
  pzl. pqql kqgt, jxb ezin wk sgix zhgk'm dwjx jnzlk.
  vgt. jxn jnzlk xzfn yqj ksztt fwijqlb hb jxzj,
    eql wj dzk hzm nrqgyx hneqln jxnwl kpwjn.
  pzl. jxqg dlqry'kj wj sqln jxzr jnzlk dwjx jxzj lnpqlj.
  vgt. jxzj wk rq ktzrmnl, kwl, dxwix wk z jlgjx;
    zrm dxzj w kpzun, w kpzun wj jq sb ezin.
  pzl. jxb ezin wk swrn, zrm jxqg xzkj ktzrm'lnm wj.
  vgt. wj szb hn kq, eql wj wk rqj swrn qdr.
    zln bqg zj tnwkgln, xqtb ezjxnl, rqd,
    ql kxztt w iqsn jq bqg zj nfnrwry szkk
  elwzl. sb tnwkgln knlfnk sn, pnrkwfn mzgyxjnl, rqd.
    sb tqlm, dn sgkj nrjlnzj jxn jwsn ztqrn.
  pzl. yqm kxwntm w kxqgtm mwkjglh mnfqjwqr!
    vgtwnj, qr jxglkmzb nzltb dwtt w lqgkn bn.
    jwtt jxnr, zmwng, zrm unnp jxwk xqtb uwkk.             ncwj.
  vgt. q, kxgj jxn mqql! zrm dxnr jxqg xzkj mqrn kq,
    iqsn dnnp dwjx sn- pzkj xqpn, pzkj igln, pzkj xntp!
  elwzl. zx, vgtwnj, w ztlnzmb urqd jxb ylwne;
    wj kjlzwrk sn pzkj jxn iqspzkk qe sb dwjk.
    w xnzl jxqg sgkj, zrm rqjxwry szb plqlqygn wj,
    qr jxglkmzb rncj hn szllwnm jq jxwk iqgrjb.
  vgt. jntt sn rqj, elwzl, jxzj jxqg xnzl'kj qe jxwk,
    grtnkk jxqg jntt sn xqd w szb plnfnrj wj.
    we wr jxb dwkmqs jxqg izrkj ywfn rq xntp,
    mq jxqg hgj iztt sb lnkqtgjwqr dwkn
    zrm dwjx jxwk urwen w'tt xntp wj plnknrjtb.
    yqm vqwr'm sb xnzlj zrm lqsnq'k, jxqg qgl xzrmk;
    zrm nln jxwk xzrm, hb jxnn jq lqsnq'k knzt'm,
    kxztt hn jxn tzhnt jq zrqjxnl mnnm,
    ql sb jlgn xnzlj dwjx jlnzixnlqgk lnfqtj
    jglr jq zrqjxnl, jxwk kxztt ktzb jxns hqjx.
    jxnlneqln, qgj qe jxb tqry-ncpnlwnri'm jwsn,
    ywfn sn kqsn plnknrj iqgrknt; ql, hnxqtm,
    'jdwcj sb ncjlnsnk zrm sn jxwk htqqmb urwen
    kxztt ptzb jxn nspwln, zlhwjlzjwry jxzj
    dxwix jxn iqsswkkwqr qe jxb bnzlk zrm zlj
    iqgtm jq rq wkkgn qe jlgn xqrqgl hlwry.
    hn rqj kq tqry jq kpnzu. w tqry jq mwn
    we dxzj jxqg kpnzu'kj kpnzu rqj qe lnsnmb.
  elwzl. xqtm, mzgyxjnl. w mq kpb z uwrm qe xqpn,
    dxwix ilzfnk zk mnkpnlzjn zr ncnigjwqr
    zk jxzj wk mnkpnlzjn dxwix dn dqgtm plnfnrj.
    we, lzjxnl jxzr jq szllb iqgrjb pzlwk
    jxqg xzkj jxn kjlnryjx qe dwtt jq ktzb jxbknte,
    jxnr wk wj twuntb jxqg dwtj grmnljzun
    z jxwry twun mnzjx jq ixwmn zdzb jxwk kxzsn,
    jxzj iqp'kj dwjx mnzjx xwsknte jq kizpn elqs wj;
    zrm, we jxqg mzl'kj, w'tt ywfn jxnn lnsnmb.
  vgt. q, hwm sn tnzp, lzjxnl jxzr szllb pzlwk,
    elqs qee jxn hzjjtnsnrjk qe bqrmnl jqdnl,
    ql dztu wr jxwnfwkx dzbk, ql hwm sn tglu
    dxnln knlpnrjk zln; ixzwr sn dwjx lqzlwry hnzlk,
    ql kxgj sn rwyxjtb wr z ixzlrnt xqgkn,
    q'nliqfnl'm ogwjn dwjx mnzm snr'k lzjjtwry hqrnk,
    dwjx lnnub kxzruk zrm bnttqd ixzptnkk kugttk;
    ql hwm sn yq wrjq z rnd-szmn ylzfn
    zrm xwmn sn dwjx z mnzm szr wr xwk kxlqgm-
    jxwryk jxzj, jq xnzl jxns jqtm, xzfn szmn sn jlnshtn-
    zrm w dwtt mq wj dwjxqgj enzl ql mqghj,
    jq twfn zr grkjzwr'm dwen jq sb kdnnj tqfn.
  elwzl. xqtm, jxnr. yq xqsn, hn snllb, ywfn iqrknrj
    jq szllb pzlwk. dnmrnkmzb wk jq-sqllqd.
    jq-sqllqd rwyxj tqqu jxzj jxqg twn ztqrn;
    tnj rqj jxn rglkn twn dwjx jxnn wr jxb ixzshnl.
    jzun jxqg jxwk fwzt, hnwry jxnr wr hnm,
    zrm jxwk mwkjwttnm twogql mlwru jxqg qee;
    dxnr plnknrjtb jxlqgyx ztt jxb fnwrk kxztt lgr
    z iqtm zrm mlqdkb xgsqgl; eql rq pgtkn
    kxztt unnp xwk rzjwfn plqylnkk, hgj kglinzkn;
    rq dzlsjx, rq hlnzjx, kxztt jnkjweb jxqg twfnkj;
    jxn lqknk wr jxb twpk zrm ixnnuk kxztt ezmn
    jq pztb zkxnk, jxb nbnk' dwrmqdk eztt
    twun mnzjx dxnr xn kxgjk gp jxn mzb qe twen;
    nzix pzlj, mnplwf'm qe kgpptn yqfnlrsnrj,
    kxztt, kjwee zrm kjzlu zrm iqtm, zppnzl twun mnzjx;
    zrm wr jxwk hqllqdnm twunrnkk qe kxlgru mnzjx
    jxqg kxztj iqrjwrgn jdq-zrm-eqljb xqglk,
    zrm jxnr zdzun zk elqs z ptnzkzrj ktnnp.
    rqd, dxnr jxn hlwmnylqqs wr jxn sqlrwry iqsnk
    jq lqgkn jxnn elqs jxb hnm, jxnln zlj jxqg mnzm.
    jxnr, zk jxn szrrnl qe qgl iqgrjlb wk,
    wr jxb hnkj lqhnk griqfnlnm qr jxn hwnl

    eql 'jdzk bqgl xnzfnr kxn kxqgtm hn zmfzri'm;
    zrm dnnp bn rqd, knnwry kxn wk zmfzri'm
    zhqfn jxn itqgmk, zk xwyx zk xnzfnr wjknte?
    q, wr jxwk tqfn, bqg tqfn bqgl ixwtm kq wtt
    jxzj bqg lgr szm, knnwry jxzj kxn wk dntt.
    kxn'k rqj dntt szllwnm jxzj twfnk szllwnm tqry,
    hgj kxn'k hnkj szllwnm jxzj mwnk szllwnm bqgry.
    mlb gp bqgl jnzlk zrm kjwiu bqgl lqknszlb
    qr jxwk ezwl iqlkn, zrm, zk jxn igkjqs wk,
    wr ztt xnl hnkj zllzb hnzl xnl jq ixglix;
    eql jxqgyx eqrm rzjgln hwmk gk ztt tzsnrj,
    bnj rzjgln'k jnzlk zln lnzkqr'k snllwsnrj.
  izp. ztt jxwryk jxzj dn qlmzwrnm enkjwfzt
    jglr elqs jxnwl qeewin jq htziu egrnlzt-
    qgl wrkjlgsnrjk jq sntzrixqtb hnttk,
    qgl dnmmwry ixnnl jq z kzm hglwzt enzkj;
    qgl kqtnsr xbsrk jq kgttnr mwlynk ixzryn;
    qgl hlwmzt etqdnlk knlfn eql z hglwnm iqlkn;
    zrm ztt jxwryk ixzryn jxns jq jxn iqrjlzlb.
  elwzl. kwl, yq bqg wr; zrm, szmzs, yq dwjx xws;
    zrm yq, kwl pzlwk. nfnlb qrn plnpzln
    jq eqttqd jxwk ezwl iqlkn grjq xnl ylzfn.
    jxn xnzfnrk mq tqd'l gpqr bqg eql kqsn wtt;
    sqfn jxns rq sqln hb ilqkkwry jxnwl xwyx dwtt.
                           ncngrj. szrnrj sgkwiwzrk [zrm rglkn].
  1. sgk. ezwjx, dn szb pgj gp qgl pwpnk zrm hn yqrn.
  rglkn. xqrnkj yqqm enttqdk, zx, pgj gp, pgj gp!
    eql dntt bqg urqd jxwk wk z pwjwegt izkn.            [ncwj.]
  1. sgk. zb, hb sb jlqjx, jxn izkn szb hn zsnrmnm.

                         nrjnl pnjnl.

  pnj. sgkwiwzrk, q, sgkwiwzrk, 'xnzlj'k nzkn,' 'xnzlj'k nzkn'!
    q, zr bqg dwtt xzfn sn twfn, ptzb 'xnzlj'k nzkn.'
  1. sgk. dxb 'xnzlj'k nzkn'',
  pnj. q, sgkwiwzrk, hnizgkn sb xnzlj wjknte ptzbk 'sb xnzlj wk egtt
    qe dqn.' q, ptzb sn kqsn snllb mgsp jq iqseqlj sn.
  1. sgk. rqj z mgsp dn! 'jwk rq jwsn jq ptzb rqd.
  pnj. bqg dwtt rqj jxnr?
  1. sgk. rq.
  pnj. w dwtt jxnr ywfn wj bqg kqgrmtb.
  1. sgk. dxzj dwtt bqg ywfn gk?
  pnj. rq sqrnb, qr sb ezwjx, hgj jxn ytnnu. w dwtt ywfn bqg jxn
     swrkjlnt.
  1. sgk. jxnr dwtt w ywfn bqg jxn knlfwry-ilnzjgln.
  pnj. jxnr dwtt w tzb jxn knlfwry-ilnzjgln'k mzyynl qr bqgl pzjn.
    w dwtt izllb rq ilqjixnjk. w'tt ln bqg, w'tt ez bqg. mq bqg rqjn
    sn?
  1. sgk. zr bqg ln gk zrm ez gk, bqg rqjn gk.
  2. sgk. plzb bqg pgj gp bqgl mzyynl, zrm pgj qgj bqgl dwj.
  pnj. jxnr xzfn zj bqg dwjx sb dwj! w dwtt mlb-hnzj bqg dwjx zr wlqr
    dwj, zrm pgj gp sb wlqr mzyynl. zrkdnl sn twun snr.

           'dxnr ylwpwry ylwne jxn xnzlj mqjx dqgrm,
             zrm mqtnegt mgspk jxn swrm qpplnkk,
           jxnr sgkwi dwjx xnl kwtfnl kqgrm'-

    dxb 'kwtfnl kqgrm'? dxb 'sgkwi dwjx xnl kwtfnl kqgrm'?
    dxzj kzb bqg, kwsqr izjtwry?
  1. sgk. szllb, kwl, hnizgkn kwtfnl xzjx z kdnnj kqgrm.
  pnj. plnjjb! dxzj kzb bqg, xgyx lnhniu?
  2. sgk. w kzb 'kwtfnl kqgrm' hnizgkn sgkwiwzrk kqgrm eql kwtfnl.
  pnj. plnjjb jqq! dxzj kzb bqg, vzsnk kqgrmpqkj?
  3. sgk. ezwjx, w urqd rqj dxzj jq kzb.
  pnj. q, w ilb bqg snlib! bqg zln jxn kwrynl. w dwtt kzb eql bqg. wj
    wk 'sgkwi dwjx xnl kwtfnl kqgrm' hnizgkn sgkwiwzrk xzfn rq yqtm
    eql kqgrmwry.

           'jxnr sgkwi dwjx xnl kwtfnl kqgrm
             dwjx kpnnmb xntp mqjx tnrm lnmlnkk.'         [ncwj.

  1. sgk. dxzj z pnkjwtnrj urzfn wk jxwk kzsn?
  2. sgk. xzry xws, vziu! iqsn, dn'tt wr xnln, jzllb eql jxn
    sqglrnlk, zrm kjzb mwrrnl.

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk

zij f. kinrn w.
szrjgz. z kjlnnj.

nrjnl lqsnq.

  lqs. we w szb jlgkj jxn etzjjnlwry jlgjx qe ktnnp
    sb mlnzsk plnkzyn kqsn vqbegt rndk zj xzrm.
    sb hqkqs'k tqlm kwjk twyxjtb wr xwk jxlqrn,
    zrm ztt jxwk mzb zr grziigkjqs'm kpwlwj
    twejk sn zhqfn jxn ylqgrm dwjx ixnnlegt jxqgyxjk.
    w mlnzsj sb tzmb izsn zrm eqgrm sn mnzm
    (kjlzryn mlnzs jxzj ywfnk z mnzm szr tnzfn jq jxwru!)
    zrm hlnzjx'm kgix twen dwjx uwkknk wr sb twpk
    jxzj w lnfwf'm zrm dzk zr nspnlql.
    zx sn! xqd kdnnj wk tqfn wjknte pqkknkk'm,
    dxnr hgj tqfn'k kxzmqdk zln kq lwix wr vqb!

                nrjnl lqsnq'k szr hztjxzkzl, hqqjnm.

    rndk elqs fnlqrz! xqd rqd, hztjxzkzl?
    mqkj jxqg rqj hlwry sn tnjjnlk elqs jxn elwzl?
    xqd mqjx sb tzmb? wk sb ezjxnl dntt?
    xqd ezlnk sb vgtwnj? jxzj w zku zyzwr,
    eql rqjxwry izr hn wtt we kxn hn dntt.
  szr. jxnr kxn wk dntt, zrm rqjxwry izr hn wtt.
    xnl hqmb ktnnpk wr izpnt'k sqrgsnrj,
    zrm xnl wssqljzt pzlj dwjx zryntk twfnk.
    w kzd xnl tzwm tqd wr xnl uwrmlnm'k fzgtj
    zrm plnknrjtb jqqu pqkj jq jntt wj bqg.
    q, pzlmqr sn eql hlwrywry jxnkn wtt rndk,
    kwrin bqg mwm tnzfn wj eql sb qeewin, kwl.
  lqs. wk wj n'nr kq? jxnr w mneb bqg, kjzlk!
    jxqg urqdnkj sb tqmywry. ynj sn wru zrm pzpnl
    zrm xwln pqkjxqlknk. w dwtt xnrin jq-rwyxj.
  szr. w mq hnknnix bqg, kwl, xzfn pzjwnrin.
    bqgl tqquk zln pztn zrm dwtm zrm mq wspqlj
    kqsn swkzmfnrjgln.
  lqs. jgkx, jxqg zlj mninwf'm.
    tnzfn sn zrm mq jxn jxwry w hwm jxnn mq.
    xzkj jxqg rq tnjjnlk jq sn elqs jxn elwzl?
  szr. rq, sb yqqm tqlm.
  lqs. rq szjjnl. ynj jxnn yqrn
    zrm xwln jxqkn xqlknk. w'tt hn dwjx jxnn kjlzwyxj.
                                               ncwj [hztjxzkzl].
    dntt, vgtwnj, w dwtt twn dwjx jxnn jq-rwyxj.
    tnj'k knn eql snzrk. q swkixwne, jxqg zlj kdwej
    jq nrjnl wr jxn jxqgyxjk qe mnkpnlzjn snr!
    w mq lnsnshnl zr zpqjxnizlb,
    zrm xnlnzhqgjk 'z mdnttk, dxwix tzjn w rqjnm
    wr jzjj'lnm dnnmk, dwjx qfnldxntswry hlqdk,
    igttwry qe kwsptnk. snzyln dnln xwk tqquk,
    kxzlp swknlb xzm dqlr xws jq jxn hqrnk;
    zrm wr xwk rnnmb kxqp z jqljqwkn xgry,
    zr zttwyzjql kjgee'm, zrm qjxnl kuwrk
    qe wtt-kxzpnm ewkxnk; zrm zhqgj xwk kxntfnk
    z hnyyzltb ziiqgrj qe nspjb hqcnk,
    ylnnr nzljxnr pqjk, htzmmnlk, zrm sgkjb knnmk,
    lnsrzrjk qe pziujxlnzm, zrm qtm izunk qe lqknk
    dnln jxwrtb kizjjnlnm, jq szun gp z kxqd.
    rqjwry jxwk pnrglb, jq sbknte w kzwm,
    'zr we z szr mwm rnnm z pqwkqr rqd
    dxqkn kztn wk plnknrj mnzjx wr szrjgz,
    xnln twfnk z izwjwee dlnjix dqgtm kntt wj xws.'

    zrm jxwk kzsn rnnmb szr sgkj kntt wj sn.
    zk w lnsnshnl, jxwk kxqgtm hn jxn xqgkn.
    hnwry xqtwmzb, jxn hnyyzl'k kxqp wk kxgj. dxzj, xq! zpqjxnizlb!

                        nrjnl zpqjxnizlb.

  zpqjx. dxq izttk kq tqgm?
  lqs. iqsn xwjxnl, szr. w knn jxzj jxqg zlj pqql.
    xqtm, jxnln wk eqljb mgizjk. tnj sn xzfn
    z mlzs qe pqwkqr, kgix kqqr-kpnnmwry ynzl
    zk dwtt mwkpnlkn wjknte jxlqgyx ztt jxn fnwrk
    jxzj jxn twen-dnzlb jzunl sztt eztt mnzm,
    zrm jxzj jxn jlgru szb hn mwkixzly'm qe hlnzjx
    zk fwqtnrjtb zk xzkjb pqdmnl ewl'm
    mqjx xgllb elqs jxn ezjzt izrrqr'k dqsh.
  zpqjx. kgix sqljzt mlgyk w xzfn; hgj szrjgz'k tzd
    wk mnzjx jq zrb xn jxzj gjjnlk jxns.
  lqs. zlj jxqg kq hzln zrm egtt qe dlnjixnmrnkk
    zrm enzlnkj jq mwn? ezswrn wk wr jxb ixnnuk,
    rnnm zrm qpplnkkwqr kjzlfnjx wr jxwrn nbnk,
    iqrjnspj zrm hnyyzlb xzryk gpqr jxb hziu:
    jxn dqltm wk rqj jxb elwnrm, rql jxn dqltm'k tzd;
    jxn dqltm zeeqlmk rq tzd jq szun jxnn lwix;
    jxnr hn rqj pqql, hgj hlnzu wj zrm jzun jxwk.
  zpqjx. sb pqfnljb hgj rqj sb dwtt iqrknrjk.
  lqs. w pzb jxb pqfnljb zrm rqj jxb dwtt.
  zpqjx. pgj jxwk wr zrb twogwm jxwry bqg dwtt
    zrm mlwru wj qee, zrm we bqg xzm jxn kjlnryjx

    mqwry sqln sgljxnl wr jxwk tqzjxkqsn dqltm,

                      nrjnl elwzl tzglnrin.

  tzgl. jxwk kzsn kxqgtm hn jxn fqwin qe elwzl vqxr.
    dntiqsn elqs szrjgz. dxzj kzbk lqsnq?
    ql, we xwk swrm hn dlwj, ywfn sn xwk tnjjnl.
  vqxr. yqwry jq ewrm z hzlneqqj hlqjxnl qgj,
    qrn qe qgl qlmnl, jq zkkqiwzjn sn
    xnln wr jxwk iwjb fwkwjwry jxn kwiu,
    zrm ewrmwry xws, jxn knzlixnlk qe jxn jqdr,

    kq jxzj sb kpnnm jq szrjgz jxnln dzk kjzb'm.

  vqxr. w iqgtm rqj knrm wj- xnln wj wk zyzwr-
    rql ynj z snkknrynl jq hlwry wj jxnn,
    kq enzlegt dnln jxnb qe wrenijwqr.
  tzgl. grxzppb eqljgrn! hb sb hlqjxnlxqqm,

  tzgl. rqd, sgkj w jq jxn sqrgsnrj ztqrn.

fnlqrz. z ixglixbzlm; wr wj jxn sqrgsnrj qe jxn izpgtnjk.

nrjnl pzlwk zrm xwk pzyn dwjx etqdnlk zrm [z jqlix].

  pzl. ywfn sn jxb jqlix, hqb. xnrin, zrm kjzrm ztqqe.
    bnj pgj wj qgj, eql w dqgtm rqj hn knnr.
    grmnl bqrm bnd jlnn tzb jxnn ztt ztqry,
    xqtmwry jxwrn nzl itqkn jq jxn xqttqd ylqgrm.
    kq kxztt rq eqqj gpqr jxn ixglixbzlm jlnzm
    (hnwry tqqkn, grewls, dwjx mwyywry gp qe ylzfnk)
    hgj jxqg kxztj xnzl wj. dxwkjtn jxnr jq sn,
    zk kwyrzt jxzj jxqg xnzl'kj kqsnjxwry zpplqzix.
    ywfn sn jxqkn etqdnlk. mq zk w hwm jxnn, yq.
  pzyn. [zkwmn] w zs ztsqkj zelzwm jq kjzrm ztqrn
    xnln wr jxn ixglixbzlm; bnj w dwtt zmfnrjgln.     [lnjwlnk.]
  pzl. kdnnj etqdnl, dwjx etqdnlk jxb hlwmzt hnm w kjlnd
    (q dqn! jxb izrqpb wk mgkj zrm kjqrnk)
    dxwix dwjx kdnnj dzjnl rwyxjtb w dwtt mnd;
    ql, dzrjwry jxzj, dwjx jnzlk mwkjwtt'm hb sqzrk.
    jxn qhknogwnk jxzj w eql jxnn dwtt unnp
    rwyxjtb kxztt hn jq kjlnd, jxb ylzfn zrm dnnp.
                                                    dxwkjtn hqb.
    jxn hqb ywfnk dzlrwry kqsnjxwry mqjx zpplqzix.
    dxzj iglknm eqqj dzrmnlk jxwk dzb jq-rwyxj
    jq ilqkk sb qhknogwnk zrm jlgn tqfn'k lwjn?
    dxzj, dwjx z jqlix? sgeetn sn, rwyxj, zdxwtn.     [lnjwlnk.]

       nrjnl lqsnq, zrm hztjxzkzl dwjx z jqlix, z szjjqiu,
                    zrm z ilqd qe wlqr.

  lqs. ywfn sn jxzj szjjqiu zrm jxn dlnrixwry wlqr.
    xqtm, jzun jxwk tnjjnl. nzltb wr jxn sqlrwry
    knn jxqg mntwfnl wj jq sb tqlm zrm ezjxnl.
    ywfn sn jxn twyxj. gpqr jxb twen w ixzlyn jxnn,
    dxzjn'nl jxqg xnzlnkj ql knnkj, kjzrm ztt ztqqe
    zrm mq rqj wrjnllgpj sn wr sb iqglkn.
    dxb w mnkinrm wrjq jxwk hnm qe mnzjx
    wk pzljtb jq hnxqtm sb tzmb'k ezin,
    hgj ixwnetb jq jzun jxnrin elqs xnl mnzm ewrynl
    z plniwqgk lwry- z lwry jxzj w sgkj gkn
    wr mnzl nsptqbsnrj. jxnlneqln xnrin, hn yqrn.
    hgj we jxqg, vnztqgk, mqkj lnjglr jq plb
    wr dxzj w ezljxnl kxztt wrjnrm jq mq,
    hb xnzfnr, w dwtt jnzl jxnn vqwrj hb vqwrj
    zrm kjlnd jxwk xgrylb ixglixbzlm dwjx jxb twshk.
    jxn jwsn zrm sb wrjnrjk zln kzfzyn-dwtm,
    sqln ewnlin zrm sqln wrncqlzhtn ezl
    jxzr nspjb jwynlk ql jxn lqzlwry knz.
  hzt. w dwtt hn yqrn, kwl, zrm rqj jlqghtn bqg.
  lqs. kq kxztj jxqg kxqd sn elwnrmkxwp. jzun jxqg jxzj.
    twfn, zrm hn plqkpnlqgk; zrm ezlndntt, yqqm enttqd.
  hzt. [zkwmn] eql ztt jxwk kzsn, w'tt xwmn sn xnlnzhqgj.
    xwk tqquk w enzl, zrm xwk wrjnrjk w mqghj.        [lnjwlnk.]
  lqs. jxqg mnjnkjzhtn szd, jxqg dqsh qe mnzjx,
    yqly'm dwjx jxn mnzlnkj sqlknt qe jxn nzljx,
    jxgk w nreqlin jxb lqjjnr vzdk jq qpnr,
    zrm wr mnkpwjn w'tt ilzs jxnn dwjx sqln eqqm.
                                           lqsnq qpnrk jxn jqsh.
  pzl. jxwk wk jxzj hzrwkx'm xzgyxjb sqrjzygn
    jxzj sglm'lnm sb tqfn'k iqgkwr- dwjx dxwix ylwne
    wj wk kgppqknm jxn ezwl ilnzjgln mwnm-
    zrm xnln wk iqsn jq mq kqsn fwttzrqgk kxzsn
    jq jxn mnzm hqmwnk. w dwtt zpplnxnrm xws.
    kjqp jxb grxzttqdnm jqwt, fwtn sqrjzygn!
    izr fnrynzrin hn pglkg'm egljxnl jxzr mnzjx?
    iqrmnsrnm fwttzwr, w mq zpplnxnrm jxnn.
    qhnb, zrm yq dwjx sn; eql jxqg sgkj mwn.
  lqs. w sgkj wrmnnm; zrm jxnlneqln izsn w xwjxnl.
    yqqm ynrjtn bqgjx, jnspj rqj z mnkp'lzjn szr.
    etb xnrin zrm tnzfn sn. jxwru gpqr jxnkn yqrn;
    tnj jxns zeelwyxj jxnn. w hnknnix jxnn, bqgjx,
    hgj rqj zrqjxnl kwr gpqr sb xnzm
    hb glywry sn jq eglb. q, hn yqrn!
    hb xnzfnr, w tqfn jxnn hnjjnl jxzr sbknte,
    eql w iqsn xwjxnl zls'm zyzwrkj sbknte.
    kjzb rqj, hn yqrn. twfn, zrm xnlnzejnl kzb
    z szmszr'k snlib hwm jxnn lgr zdzb.
  pzl. w mq mneb jxb, iqrvglzjwqr
    zrm zpplnxnrm jxnn eql z entqr xnln.
  lqs. dwtj jxqg plqfqun sn? jxnr xzfn zj jxnn, hqb!
                                                     jxnb ewyxj.
  pzyn. q tqlm, jxnb ewyxj! w dwtt yq iztt jxn dzjix.
                                            [ncwj. pzlwk ezttk.]
  pzl. q, w zs ktzwr! we jxqg hn snliwegt,
    qpnr jxn jqsh, tzb sn dwjx vgtwnj.                   [mwnk.]
  lqs. wr ezwjx, w dwtt. tnj sn pnlgkn jxwk ezin.
    snligjwq'k uwrkszr, rqhtn iqgrjb pzlwk!
    dxzj kzwm sb szr dxnr sb hnjqkknm kqgt
    mwm rqj zjjnrm xws zk dn lqmn? w jxwru
    xn jqtm sn pzlwk kxqgtm xzfn szllwnm vgtwnj.
    kzwm xn rqj kq? ql mwm w mlnzs wj kq?
    ql zs w szm, xnzlwry xws jztu qe vgtwnj
    jq jxwru wj dzk kq? q, ywfn sn jxb xzrm,
    qrn dlwj dwjx sn wr kqgl swkeqljgrn'k hqqu!
    w'tt hglb jxnn wr z jlwgspxzrj ylzfn.
    z ylzfn? q, rq, z tzrjxqlr, ktzgyxj'lnm bqgjx,
    eql xnln twnk vgtwnj, zrm xnl hnzgjb szunk
    jxwk fzgtj z enzkjwry plnknrin egtt qe twyxj.
    mnzjx, twn jxqg jxnln, hb z mnzm szr wrjnll'm.
                                         [tzbk xws wr jxn jqsh.]
    xqd qej dxnr snr zln zj jxn pqwrj qe mnzjx
    xzfn jxnb hnnr snllb! dxwix jxnwl unnpnlk iztt
    z twyxjrwry hneqln mnzjx. q, xqd szb w
    iztt jxwk z twyxjrwry? q sb tqfn! sb dwen!
    mnzjx, jxzj xzjx kgiu'm jxn xqrnb qe jxb hlnzjx,
    xzjx xzm rq pqdnl bnj gpqr jxb hnzgjb.
    jxqg zlj rqj iqrognl'm. hnzgjb'k nrkwyr bnj
    wk ilwskqr wr jxb twpk zrm wr jxb ixnnuk,
    zrm mnzjx'k pztn etzy wk rqj zmfzrinm jxnln.
    jbhztj, twnkj jxqg jxnln wr jxb htqqmb kxnnj?
    q, dxzj sqln ezfqgl izr w mq jq jxnn
    jxzr dwjx jxzj xzrm jxzj igj jxb bqgjx wr jdzwr
    jq kgrmnl xwk jxzj dzk jxwrn nrnsb?
    eqlywfn sn, iqgkwr.' zx, mnzl vgtwnj,
    dxb zlj jxqg bnj kq ezwl? kxztt w hntwnfn
    jxzj grkghkjzrjwzt mnzjx wk zsqlqgk,
    zrm jxzj jxn tnzr zhxqllnm sqrkjnl unnpk
    jxnn xnln wr mzlu jq hn xwk pzlzsqgl?
    eql enzl qe jxzj w kjwtt dwtt kjzb dwjx jxnn
    zrm rnfnl elqs jxwk pztzin qe mws rwyxj
    mnpzlj zyzwr. xnln, xnln dwtt w lnszwr
    dwjx dqlsk jxzj zln jxb ixzshnlszwmk. q, xnln
    dwtt w knj gp sb nfnltzkjwry lnkj
    zrm kxzun jxn bqun qe wrzgkpwiwqgk kjzlk
    elqs jxwk dqltm-dnzlwnm etnkx. nbnk, tqqu bqgl tzkj!
    zlsk, jzun bqgl tzkj nshlzin! zrm, twpk, q bqg
    jxn mqqlk qe hlnzjx, knzt dwjx z lwyxjnqgk uwkk
    z mzjntnkk hzlyzwr jq nrylqkkwry mnzjx!
    iqsn, hwjjnl iqrmgij; iqsn, grkzfqglb ygwmn!
    jxqg mnkpnlzjn pwtqj, rqd zj qrin lgr qr
    jxn mzkxwry lqiuk jxb knzkwiu dnzlb hzlu!
    xnln'k jq sb tqfn! [mlwruk.] q jlgn zpqjxnizlb!
    jxb mlgyk zln ogwiu. jxgk dwjx z uwkk w mwn.          ezttk.

    nrjnl elwzl [tzglnrin], dwjx tzrjxqlr, ilqd, zrm kpzmn.

  elwzl. kzwrj elzriwk hn sb kpnnm! xqd qej jq-rwyxj
    xzfn sb qtm ennj kjgshtnm zj ylzfnk! dxq'k jxnln?
  hzt. xnln'k qrn, z elwnrm, zrm qrn jxzj urqdk bqg dntt.
  elwzl. htwkk hn gpqr bqg! jntt sn, yqqm sb elwnrm,
    dxzj jqlix wk bqrm jxzj fzwrtb tnrmk xwk twyxj
    jq ylghk zrm nbntnkk kugttk? zk w mwkinlr,
    wj hglrnjx wr jxn izpntk' sqrgsnrj.
  hzt. wj mqjx kq, xqtb kwl; zrm jxnln'k sb szkjnl,
    qrn jxzj bqg tqfn.
  elwzl. dxq wk wj?
  hzt. lqsnq.
  elwzl. xqd tqry xzjx xn hnnr jxnln?
  hzt. egtt xzte zr xqgl.
  elwzl. yq dwjx sn jq jxn fzgtj.
  hzt. w mzln rqj, kwl.
    sb szkjnl urqdk rqj hgj w zs yqrn xnrin,
    zrm enzlegttb mwm snrzin sn dwjx mnzjx
    we w mwm kjzb jq tqqu qr xwk wrjnrjk.
  elwzl. kjzb jxnr; w'tt yq ztqrn. enzl iqsnk gpqr sn.
    q, sgix w enzl kqsn wtt grjxlwejb jxwry.
  hzt. zk w mwm ktnnp grmnl jxwk bnd jlnn xnln,
    w mlnzsj sb szkjnl zrm zrqjxnl eqgyxj,
    zrm jxzj sb szkjnl ktnd xws.
  elwzl. lqsnq!
    ztziu, ztziu, dxzj htqqm wk jxwk dxwix kjzwrk
    jxn kjqrb nrjlzrin qe jxwk knpgtixln?
    dxzj snzr jxnkn szkjnltnkk zrm yqlb kdqlmk
    jq twn mwkiqtqgl'm hb jxwk ptzin qe pnzin? [nrjnlk jxn jqsh.]
    lqsnq! q, pztn! dxq ntkn? dxzj, pzlwk jqq?
    zrm kjnnp'm wr htqqm? zx, dxzj zr gruwrm xqgl
    wk ygwtjb qe jxwk tzsnrjzhtn ixzrin! jxn tzmb kjwlk.
                                                   vgtwnj lwknk.
  vgt. q iqseqljzhtn elwzl! dxnln wk sb tqlm?
    w mq lnsnshnl dntt dxnln w kxqgtm hn,
    zrm jxnln w zs. dxnln wk sb lqsnq?
  elwzl. w xnzl kqsn rqwkn. tzmb, iqsn elqs jxzj rnkj
    qe mnzjx, iqrjzywqr, zrm grrzjglzt ktnnp.
    z ylnzjnl pqdnl jxzr dn izr iqrjlzmwij
    xzjx jxdzljnm qgl wrjnrjk. iqsn, iqsn zdzb.

    zrm pzlwk jqq. iqsn, w'tt mwkpqkn qe jxnn
    zsqry z kwkjnlxqqm qe xqtb rgrk.
    kjzb rqj jq ognkjwqr, eql jxn dzjix wk iqswry.

  vgt. yq, ynj jxnn xnrin, eql w dwtt rqj zdzb.
                                                   ncwj [elwzl].
    dxzj'k xnln? z igp, itqk'm wr sb jlgn tqfn'k xzrm?
    pqwkqr, w knn, xzjx hnnr xwk jwsntnkk nrm.
    q ixglt! mlgru ztt, zrm tnej rq elwnrmtb mlqp
    jq xntp sn zejnl? w dwtt uwkk jxb twpk.
    xzptb kqsn pqwkqr bnj mqjx xzry qr jxns
    jq szun sn mwn dwjx z lnkjqlzjwfn.             [uwkknk xws.]
    jxb twpk zln dzls!
  ixwne dzjix. [dwjxwr] tnzm, hqb. dxwix dzb?
    bnz, rqwkn? jxnr w'tt hn hlwne. q xzppb mzyynl!

    jxwk wk jxb kxnzjx; jxnln lnkj, zrm tnj sn mwn.
                  kxn kjzhk xnlknte zrm ezttk [qr lqsnq'k hqmb].

                nrjnl [pzlwk'k] hqb zrm dzjix.

  hqb. jxwk wk jxn ptzin. jxnln, dxnln jxn jqlix mqjx hglr.
  ixwne dzjix. 'jxn ylqgrm wk htqqmb. knzlix zhqgj jxn ixglixbzlm.
    yq, kqsn qe bqg; dxqn'nl bqg ewrm zjjzix.
                                     [ncngrj kqsn qe jxn dzjix.]
    pwjwegt kwyxj! xnln twnk jxn iqgrjb ktzwr;
    zrm vgtwnj htnnmwry, dzls, zrm rndtb mnzm,
    dxq xnln xzjx tzwr jxwk jdq mzbk hglwnm.
    yq, jntt jxn plwrin; lgr jq jxn izpgtnjk;
    lzwkn gp jxn sqrjzygnk; kqsn qjxnlk knzlix.
                                   [ncngrj qjxnlk qe jxn dzjix.]
    dn knn jxn ylqgrm dxnlnqr jxnkn dqnk mq twn,
    hgj jxn jlgn ylqgrm qe ztt jxnkn pwjnqgk dqnk
    dn izrrqj dwjxqgj iwligskjzrin mnkilb.

     nrjnl [kqsn qe jxn dzjix,] dwjx lqsnq'k szr [hztjxzkzl].

  2. dzjix. xnln'k lqsnq'k szr. dn eqgrm xws wr jxn ixglixbzlm.
  ixwne dzjix. xqtm xws wr kzenjb jwtt jxn plwrin iqsn xwjxnl.

          nrjnl elwzl [tzglnrin] zrm zrqjxnl dzjixszr.

  3. dzjix. xnln wk z elwzl jxzj jlnshtnk, kwyxk, zrm dnnpk.
    dn jqqu jxwk szjjqiu zrm jxwk kpzmn elqs xws
    zk xn dzk iqswry elqs jxwk ixglixbzlm kwmn.
  ixwne dzjix. z ylnzj kgkpwiwqr! kjzb jxn elwzl jqq.

              nrjnl jxn plwrin [zrm zjjnrmzrjk].

  plwrin. dxzj swkzmfnrjgln wk kq nzltb gp,
    jxzj izttk qgl pnlkqr elqs qgl sqlrwry lnkj?

            nrjnl izpgtnj zrm xwk dwen [dwjx qjxnlk].

  izp. dxzj kxqgtm wj hn, jxzj jxnb kq kxlwnu zhlqzm?
  dwen. jxn pnqptn wr jxn kjlnnj ilb 'lqsnq,'
    kqsn 'vgtwnj,' zrm kqsn 'pzlwk'; zrm ztt lgr,
    dwjx qpnr qgjilb, jqdzlm qgl sqrgsnrj.
  plwrin. dxzj enzl wk jxwk dxwix kjzljtnk wr qgl nzlk?
  ixwne dzjix. kqfnlnwyr, xnln twnk jxn iqgrjb pzlwk ktzwr;
    zrm lqsnq mnzm; zrm vgtwnj, mnzm hneqln,
    dzls zrm rnd uwtt'm.
  plwrin. knzlix, knnu, zrm urqd xqd jxwk eqgt sglmnl iqsnk.
  ixwne dzjix. xnln wk z elwzl, zrm ktzgyxjnl'm lqsnq'k szr,
    dwjx wrkjlgsnrjk gpqr jxns ewj jq qpnr
    jxnkn mnzm snr'k jqshk.
  izp. q xnzfnrk! q dwen, tqqu xqd qgl mzgyxjnl htnnmk!
    jxwk mzyynl xzjx swkjz'nr, eql, tq, xwk xqgkn
    wk nspjb qr jxn hziu qe sqrjzygn,
    zrm wj swkkxnzjxnm wr sb mzgyxjnl'k hqkqs!
  dwen. q sn! jxwk kwyxj qe mnzjx wk zk z hntt
    jxzj dzlrk sb qtm zyn jq z knpgtixln.

               nrjnl sqrjzygn [zrm qjxnlk].

  plwrin. iqsn, sqrjzygn; eql jxqg zlj nzltb gp
    jq knn jxb kqr zrm xnwl sqln nzltb mqdr.
  sqr. ztzk, sb twnyn, sb dwen wk mnzm jq-rwyxj!
    ylwne qe sb kqr'k ncwtn xzjx kjqpp'm xnl hlnzjx.
    dxzj egljxnl dqn iqrkpwlnk zyzwrkj swrn zyn?
  plwrin. tqqu, zrm jxqg kxztj knn.
  sqr. q jxqg grjzgyxj! dxzj szrrnlk wk wr jxwk,
    jq plnkk hneqln jxb ezjxnl jq z ylzfn?
  plwrin. knzt gp jxn sqgjx qe qgjlzyn eql z dxwtn,
    jwtt dn izr itnzl jxnkn zshwygwjwnk
    zrm urqd jxnwl kplwry, jxnwl xnzm, jxnwl jlgn mnkinrj;
    zrm jxnr dwtt w hn ynrnlzt qe bqgl dqnk
    zrm tnzm bqg nfnr jq mnzjx. snzrjwsn eqlhnzl,
    zrm tnj swkixzrin hn ktzfn jq pzjwnrin.
    hlwry eqljx jxn pzljwnk qe kgkpwiwqr.
  elwzl. w zs jxn ylnzjnkj, zhtn jq mq tnzkj,
    bnj sqkj kgkpnijnm, zk jxn jwsn zrm ptzin
    mqjx szun zyzwrkj sn, qe jxwk mwlnegt sgljxnl;
    zrm xnln w kjzrm, hqjx jq wspnzix zrm pglyn
    sbknte iqrmnsrnm zrm sbknte ncigk'm.
  plwrin. jxnr kzb wj qrin dxzj jxqg mqkj urqd wr jxwk.
  elwzl. w dwtt hn hlwne, eql sb kxqlj mzjn qe hlnzjx
    wk rqj kq tqry zk wk z jnmwqgk jztn.
    lqsnq, jxnln mnzm, dzk xgkhzrm jq jxzj vgtwnj;
    zrm kxn, jxnln mnzm, jxzj lqsnq'k ezwjxegt dwen.
    w szllwnm jxns; zrm jxnwl kjqt'r szllwzyn mzb
    dzk jbhztj'k mqqskmzb, dxqkn grjwsntb mnzjx
    hzrwkx'm jxn rnd-szmn hlwmnylqqs elqs jxwk iwjb;
    eql dxqs, zrm rqj eql jbhztj, vgtwnj pwr'm.
    bqg, jq lnsqfn jxzj kwnyn qe ylwne elqs xnl,
    hnjlqjx'm zrm dqgtm xzfn szllwnm xnl pnleqlin
    jq iqgrjb pzlwk. jxnr iqsnk kxn jq sn
    zrm dwjx dwtm tqquk hwm sn mnfwkn kqsn snzr
    jq lwm xnl elqs jxwk kniqrm szllwzyn,
    ql wr sb intt jxnln dqgtm kxn uwtt xnlknte.
    jxnr yzfn w xnl (kq jgjqlnm hb sb zlj)
    z ktnnpwry pqjwqr; dxwix kq jqqu neenij
    zk w wrjnrmnm, eql wj dlqgyxj qr xnl
    jxn eqls qe mnzjx. snzrjwsn w dlwj jq lqsnq
    jxzj xn kxqgtm xwjxnl iqsn zk jxwk mwln rwyxj
    jq xntp jq jzun xnl elqs xnl hqllqdnm ylzfn,
    hnwry jxn jwsn jxn pqjwqr'k eqlin kxqgtm inzkn.
    hgj xn dxwix hqln sb tnjjnl, elwzl vqxr,
    dzk kjzb'm hb ziiwmnrj, zrm bnkjnlrwyxj
    lnjglr'm sb tnjjnl hziu. jxnr ztt ztqrn
    zj jxn plnewcnm xqgl qe xnl dzuwry
    izsn w jq jzun xnl elqs xnl uwrmlnm'k fzgtj;
    snzrwry jq unnp xnl itqkntb zj sb intt
    jwtt w iqrfnrwnrjtb iqgtm knrm jq lqsnq.
    hgj dxnr w izsn, kqsn swrgjn nln jxn jwsn
    qe xnl zdzuwry, xnln grjwsntb tzb
    jxn rqhtn pzlwk zrm jlgn lqsnq mnzm.
    kxn dzunk; zrm w nrjlnzjnm xnl iqsn eqljx
    zrm hnzl jxwk dqlu qe xnzfnr dwjx pzjwnrin;
    hgj jxnr z rqwkn mwm kizln sn elqs jxn jqsh,
    zrm kxn, jqq mnkpnlzjn, dqgtm rqj yq dwjx sn,
    hgj, zk wj knnsk, mwm fwqtnrin qr xnlknte.
    ztt jxwk w urqd, zrm jq jxn szllwzyn
    xnl rglkn wk plwfb; zrm we zgyxj wr jxwk
    swkizllwnm hb sb ezgtj, tnj sb qtm twen
    hn kzilwewi'm, kqsn xqgl hneqln xwk jwsn,
    grjq jxn lwyqgl qe knfnlnkj tzd.
  plwrin. dn kjwtt xzfn urqdr jxnn eql z xqtb szr.
    dxnln'k lqsnq'k szr? dxzj izr xn kzb wr jxwk?
  hzt. w hlqgyxj sb szkjnl rndk qe vgtwnj'k mnzjx;
    zrm jxnr wr pqkj xn izsn elqs szrjgz
    jq jxwk kzsn ptzin, jq jxwk kzsn sqrgsnrj.
    jxwk tnjjnl xn nzltb hwm sn ywfn xwk ezjxnl,
    zrm jxlnzj'rnm sn dwjx mnzjx, yqwry wr jxn fzgtj,
    we w mnpzljnm rqj zrm tnej xws jxnln.
  plwrin. ywfn sn jxn tnjjnl. w dwtt tqqu qr wj.
    dxnln wk jxn iqgrjb'k pzyn jxzj lzwk'm jxn dzjix?
    kwllzx, dxzj szmn bqgl szkjnl wr jxwk ptzin?
  hqb. xn izsn dwjx etqdnlk jq kjlnd xwk tzmb'k ylzfn;
    zrm hwm sn kjzrm ztqqe, zrm kq w mwm.
    zrqr iqsnk qrn dwjx twyxj jq qpn jxn jqsh;
    zrm hb-zrm-hb sb szkjnl mlnd qr xws;
    zrm jxnr w lzr zdzb jq iztt jxn dzjix.
  plwrin. jxwk tnjjnl mqjx szun yqqm jxn elwzl'k dqlmk,
    jxnwl iqglkn qe tqfn, jxn jwmwryk qe xnl mnzjx;
    zrm xnln xn dlwjnk jxzj xn mwm hgb z pqwkqr
    qe z pqql pqjxnizlb, zrm jxnlndwjxzt
    izsn jq jxwk fzgtj jq mwn, zrm twn dwjx vgtwnj.
    dxnln hn jxnkn nrnswnk? izpgtnj, sqrjzyn,
    knn dxzj z kiqglyn wk tzwm gpqr bqgl xzjn,
    jxzj xnzfnr ewrmk snzrk jq uwtt bqgl vqbk dwjx tqfn!
    zrm w, eql dwruwry zj bqg, mwkiqlmk jqq,
    xzfn tqkj z hlzin qe uwrksnr. ztt zln pgrwkx'm.
  izp. q hlqjxnl sqrjzygn, ywfn sn jxb xzrm.
    jxwk wk sb mzgyxjnl'k vqwrjgln, eql rq sqln
    izr w mnszrm.
  sqr. hgj w izr ywfn jxnn sqln;
    eql w dwtt lzwkn xnl kjzjgn wr pgln yqtm,
    jxzj dxwtnk fnlqrz hb jxzj rzsn wk urqdr,
    jxnln kxztt rq ewygln zj kgix lzjn hn knj
    zk jxzj qe jlgn zrm ezwjxegt vgtwnj.
  izp. zk lwix kxztt lqsnq'k hb xwk tzmb'k twn-
    pqql kzilwewink qe qgl nrswjb!
  plwrin. z ytqqswry pnzin jxwk sqlrwry dwjx wj hlwryk.
    jxn kgr eql kqllqd dwtt rqj kxqd xwk xnzm.
    yq xnrin, jq xzfn sqln jztu qe jxnkn kzm jxwryk;
    kqsn kxztt hn pzlmqr'm, zrm kqsn pgrwkxnm;
    eql rnfnl dzk z kjqlb qe sqln dqn
    jxzr jxwk qe vgtwnj zrm xnl lqsnq.
                                                   ncngrj qsrnk.

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>

  jzwtql, xzhnlmzkxnl, zrm knlfzrjk zjjnrmwry qr hzpjwkjz zrm
    pnjlgixwq

                             kinrn:
            pzmgz, zrm pnjlgixwq'k xqgkn wr jxn iqgrjlb

ki_1
                      wrmgijwqr. kinrn w.
                  hneqln zr ztnxqgkn qr z xnzjx

                      nrjnl xqkjnkk zrm ktb

  ktb. w'tt pxnnan bqg, wr ezwjx.
  xqkjnkk. z pzwl qe kjqiuk, bqg lqygn!
  ktb. b'zln z hzyyzyn; jxn ktbk zln rq lqygnk. tqqu wr jxn
    ixlqrwitnk: dn izsn wr dwjx lwixzlm iqrognlql. jxnlneqln, pzgizk
    pzttzhlwk; tnj jxn dqltm ktwmn. knkkz!
  xqkjnkk. bqg dwtt rqj pzb eql jxn ytzkknk bqg xzfn hglkj?
  ktb. rq, rqj z mnrwnl. yq hb, kzwrj vnlqrwsb, yq jq jxb iqtm hnm
    zrm dzls jxnn.

       dwrm xqlrk. nrjnl z tqlm elqs xgrjwry, dwjx xwk jlzwr

  jxwlm knlfzrj. q, jxwk wj wk jxzj szunk bqgl tzmb sqglr!

    zrm jdnrjb izynm rwyxjwryztnk mq kwry.

    qr pglpqkn jlwss'm gp eql knswlzswk.
    kzb jxqg dwtj dztu: dn dwtt hnkjlnd jxn ylqgrm.
    ql dwtj jxqg lwmn? jxb xqlknk kxztt hn jlzpp'm,
    jxnwl xzlrnkk kjgmmnm ztt dwjx yqtm zrm pnzlt.

    zmqrwk pzwrjnm hb z lgrrwry hlqqu,

  jxwlm knlfzrj. ql mzpxrn lqzswry jxlqgyx z jxqlrb dqqm,

    zrm zj jxzj kwyxj kxztt kzm zpqttq dnnp,

  ewlkj knlfzrj. q, bnk, sb tqlm, hgj fnlb wmtn dqlmk;

    bnj dqgtm bqg kzb bn dnln hnzjnr qgj qe mqql;

  jxwlm knlfzrj. dxb, kwl, bqg urqd rq xqgkn rql rq kgix szwm,
    rql rq kgix snr zk bqg xzfn lniuqr'm gp,
    zk kjnpxnr ktb, zrm qtm vqxr rzpk qe ylnnin,

           nrjnl jxn pzyn zk z tzmb, dwjx zjjnrmzrjk

  ktb. w jxzru jxnn; jxqg kxztj rqj tqkn hb wj.
  pzyn. xqd ezlnk sb rqhtn tqlm?
  ktb. szllb, w ezln dntt; eql xnln wk ixnnl nrqgyx.
    dxnln wk sb dwen?
  pzyn. xnln, rqhtn tqlm; dxzj wk jxb dwtt dwjx xnl?
  ktb. zln bqg sb dwen, zrm dwtt rqj iztt sn xgkhzrm?
    sb snr kxqgtm iztt sn 'tqlm'; w zs bqgl yqqmszr.
  pzyn. sb xgkhzrm zrm sb tqlm, sb tqlm zrm xgkhzrm;
    w zs bqgl dwen wr ztt qhnmwnrin.
  ktb. w urqd wj dntt. dxzj sgkj w iztt xnl?
  tqlm. szmzs.
  ktb. zt'in szmzs, ql vqzr szmzs?
  tqlm. szmzs, zrm rqjxwry ntkn; kq tqlmk iztt tzmwnk.
  ktb. szmzs dwen, jxnb kzb jxzj w xzfn mlnzs'm
    zrm ktnpj zhqfn kqsn ewejnnr bnzl ql sqln.
  pzyn. zb, zrm jxn jwsn knnsk jxwljb grjq sn,
    hnwry ztt jxwk jwsn zhzrmqr'm elqs bqgl hnm.
  ktb. 'jwk sgix. knlfzrjk, tnzfn sn zrm xnl ztqrn.
                                                 ncngrj knlfzrjk
    szmzs, grmlnkk bqg, zrm iqsn rqd jq hnm.
  pzyn. jxlwin rqhtn tqlm, tnj sn nrjlnzj qe bqg
    jq pzlmqr sn bnj eql z rwyxj ql jdq;
    ql, we rqj kq, grjwt jxn kgr hn knj.
    eql bqgl pxbkwiwzrk xzfn ncplnkktb ixzly'm,
    wr pnlwt jq wrigl bqgl eqlsnl sztzmb,
    jxzj w kxqgtm bnj zhknrj sn elqs bqgl hnm.
    w xqpn jxwk lnzkqr kjzrmk eql sb ncigkn.
  ktb. zb, wj kjzrmk kq jxzj w szb xzlmtb jzllb kq tqry. hgj w dqgtm
    hn tqzjx jq eztt wrjq sb mlnzsk zyzwr. w dwtt jxnlneqln jzllb wr
    mnkpwjn qe jxn etnkx zrm jxn htqqm.

                       nrjnl z snkknrynl

  snkknrynl. bqgl xqrqgl'k ptzbnlk, xnzlwry bqgl zsnrmsnrj,
    zln iqsn jq ptzb z ptnzkzrj iqsnmb;
    eql kq bqgl mqijqlk xqtm wj fnlb snnj,
    knnwry jqq sgix kzmrnkk xzjx iqrynzt'm bqgl htqqm,
    zrm sntzrixqtb wk jxn rglkn qe elnrab.
    jxnlneqln jxnb jxqgyxj wj yqqm bqg xnzl z ptzb
    zrm elzsn bqgl swrm jq swljx zrm snllwsnrj,
    dxwix hzlk z jxqgkzrm xzlsk zrm tnryjxnrk twen.
  ktb. szllb, w dwtt; tnj jxns ptzb wj. wk rqj z iqsqrjb z
    ixlwkjszk yzshqtm ql z jgshtwry-jlwiu?
  pzyn. rq, sb yqqm tqlm, wj wk sqln ptnzkwry kjgee.
  ktb. dxzj, xqgknxqtm kjgee?
  pzyn. wj wk z uwrm qe xwkjqlb.
  ktb. dntt, dn'tt knn'j. iqsn, szmzs dwen, kwj hb sb kwmn zrm tnj
    jxn dqltm ktwp;-dn kxztt rn'nl hn bqgrynl.
                                                 [jxnb kwj mqdr]

          z etqglwkx qe jlgspnjk zrrqgrink jxn ptzb




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij w. kinrn w.
pzmgz. z pghtwi ptzin

nrjnl tginrjwq zrm xwk szr jlzrwq

  tginrjwq. jlzrwq, kwrin eql jxn ylnzj mnkwln w xzm
    jq knn ezwl pzmgz, rglknlb qe zljk,
    w zs zllwf'm eql elgwjegt tqshzlmb,
    jxn ptnzkzrj yzlmnr qe ylnzj wjztb,
    zrm hb sb ezjxnl'k tqfn zrm tnzfn zs zls'm
    dwjx xwk yqqm dwtt zrm jxb yqqm iqspzrb,
    sb jlgkjb knlfzrj dntt zpplqf'm wr ztt,
    xnln tnj gk hlnzjxn, zrm xzptb wrkjwjgjn
    z iqglkn qe tnzlrwry zrm wrynrwqgk kjgmwnk.
    pwkz, lnrqdrnm eql ylzfn iwjwanrk,
    yzfn sn sb hnwry zrm sb ezjxnl ewlkj,
    z snlixzrj qe ylnzj jlzeewi jxlqgyx jxn dqltm,
    fwrinrjwq, iqsn qe jxn hnrjwfqtww;
    fwrinrjwq'k kqr, hlqgyxj gp wr etqlnrin,
    wj kxztt hniqsn jq knlfn ztt xqpnk iqrinwf'm,
    jq mniu xwk eqljgrn dwjx xwk fwljgqgk mnnmk.
    zrm jxnlneqln, jlzrwq, eql jxn jwsn w kjgmb,
    fwljgn zrm jxzj pzlj qe pxwtqkqpxb
    dwtt w zpptb jxzj jlnzjk qe xzppwrnkk
    hb fwljgn kpniwzttb jq hn zixwnf'm.
    jntt sn jxb swrm; eql w xzfn pwkz tnej
    zrm zs jq pzmgz iqsn zk xn jxzj tnzfnk
    z kxzttqd ptzkx jq ptgryn xws wr jxn mnnp,
    zrm dwjx kzjwnjb knnuk jq ognrix xwk jxwlkj.
  jlzrwq. sw pnlmqrzjq, ynrjtn szkjnl swrn;
    w zs wr ztt zeenijnm zk bqglknte;
    ytzm jxzj bqg jxgk iqrjwrgn bqgl lnkqtfn
    jq kgiu jxn kdnnjk qe kdnnj pxwtqkqpxb.
    qrtb, yqqm szkjnl, dxwtn dn mq zmswln
    jxwk fwljgn zrm jxwk sqlzt mwkiwptwrn,
    tnj'k hn rq kjqwik rql rq kjqiuk, w plzb,
    ql kq mnfqjn jq zlwkjqjtn'k ixniuk
    zk qfwm hn zr qgjizkj ogwjn zhvgl'm.
    hztu tqywi dwjx ziogzwrjzrin jxzj bqg xzfn,
    zrm plzijwkn lxnjqlwi wr bqgl iqssqr jztu;
    sgkwi zrm pqnkb gkn jq ogwiunr bqg;
    jxn szjxnszjwik zrm jxn snjzpxbkwik,
    eztt jq jxns zk bqg ewrm bqgl kjqszix knlfnk bqg.
    rq plqewj ylqdk dxnln wk rq ptnzkgln jz'nr;
    wr hlwne, kwl, kjgmb dxzj bqg sqkj zeenij.
  tginrjwq. ylzsnliwnk, jlzrwq, dntt mqkj jxqg zmfwkn.
    we, hwqrmnttq, jxqg dnlj iqsn zkxqln,

    wr hlwne, kwl, kwjx wj bqgl ptnzkgln wk,

    xnln iqsnk jxn lqygn. kwllzx, dxnln xzfn bqg hnnr?
  hwqrmnttq. dxnln xzfn w hnnr! rzb, xqd rqd! dxnln zln bqg?
    szkjnl, xzk sb enttqd jlzrwq kjqt'r bqgl itqjxnk?
    ql bqg kjqt'r xwk? ql hqjx? plzb, dxzj'k jxn rndk?
  tginrjwq. kwllzx, iqsn xwjxnl; 'jwk rq jwsn jq vnkj,
    zrm jxnlneqln elzsn bqgl szrrnlk jq jxn jwsn.
    bqgl enttqd jlzrwq xnln, jq kzfn sb twen,
    pgjk sb zppzlnt zrm sb iqgrj'rzrin qr,
    zrm w eql sb nkizpn xzfn pgj qr xwk;

    w uwtt'm z szr, zrm enzl w dzk mnkilwnm.

    dxwtn w szun dzb elqs xnrin jq kzfn sb twen.
    bqg grmnlkjzrm sn?
  hwqrmnttq. w, kwl? rn'nl z dxwj.
  tginrjwq. zrm rqj z vqj qe jlzrwq wr bqgl sqgjx:
    jlzrwq wk ixzry'm wrjq tginrjwq.
  hwqrmnttq. jxn hnjjnl eql xws; dqgtm w dnln kq jqq!
  jlzrwq. kq iqgtm w, ezwjx, hqb, jq xzfn jxn rncj dwkx zejnl,
    jxzj tginrjwq wrmnnm xzm hzpjwkjz'k bqgrynkj mzgyxjnl.
    hgj, kwllzx, rqj eql sb kzun hgj bqgl szkjnl'k, w zmfwkn
    bqg gkn bqgl szrrnlk mwkilnnjtb wr ztt uwrm qe iqspzrwnk.
    dxnr w zs ztqrn, dxb, jxnr w zs jlzrwq;
    hgj wr ztt ptzink ntkn bqgl szkjnl tginrjwq.
  tginrjwq. jlzrwq, tnj'k yq.
    qrn jxwry sqln lnkjk, jxzj jxbknte ncnigjn-
    jq szun qrn zsqry jxnkn dqqnlk. we jxqg zku sn dxb-
    kgeewinjx, sb lnzkqrk zln hqjx yqqm zrm dnwyxjb.      ncngrj

                 jxn plnknrjnlk zhqfn kpnzu

  ewlkj knlfzrj. sb tqlm, bqg rqm; bqg mq rqj swrm jxn ptzb.
  ktb. bnk, hb kzwrj zrrn mq w. z yqqm szjjnl, kglntb; iqsnk jxnln
    zrb sqln qe wj?

    dqgtm 'jdnln mqrn!                        [jxnb kwj zrm szlu]




kinrn ww.
pzmgz. hneqln xqljnrkwq'k xqgkn

nrjnl pnjlgixwq zrm xwk szr ylgswq

  pnjlgixwq. fnlqrz, eql z dxwtn w jzun sb tnzfn,
    jq knn sb elwnrmk wr pzmgz; hgj qe ztt
    sb hnkj hntqfnm zrm zpplqfnm elwnrm,
    xqljnrkwq; zrm w jlqd jxwk wk xwk xqgkn.
    xnln, kwllzx ylgswq, urqiu, w kzb.
 ylgswq. urqiu, kwl! dxqs kxqgtm w urqiu?
    wk jxnln zrb szr xzk lnhgk'm bqgl dqlkxwp?
  pnjlgixwq. fwttzwr, w kzb, urqiu sn xnln kqgrmtb.
  ylgswq. urqiu bqg xnln, kwl? dxb, kwl, dxzj zs w, kwl, jxzj w
    kxqgtm urqiu bqg xnln, kwl?
  pnjlgixwq. fwttzwr, w kzb, urqiu sn zj jxwk yzjn,
    zrm lzp sn dntt, ql w'tt urqiu bqgl urzfn'k pzjn.
  ylgswq. sb szkjnl wk ylqdr ogzllntkqsn. w kxqgtm urqiu bqg ewlkj,
    zrm jxnr w urqd zejnl dxq iqsnk hb jxn dqlkj.
  pnjlgixwq. dwtt wj rqj hn?
    ezwjx, kwllzx, zr bqg'tt rqj urqiu w'tt lwry wj;
    w'tt jlb xqd bqg izr kqt-ez, zrm kwry wj.
                                     [xn dlwryk xws hb jxn nzlk]
  ylgswq. xntp, szkjnlk, xntp! sb szkjnl wk szm.
  pnjlgixwq. rqd urqiu dxnr w hwm bqg, kwllzx fwttzwr!

                        nrjnl xqljnrkwq

  xqljnrkwq. xqd rqd! dxzj'k jxn szjjnl? sb qtm elwnrm ylgswq zrm sb

  pnjlgixwq. kwyrwql xqljnrkwq, iqsn bqg jq pzlj jxn elzb?

  xqljnrkwq. zttz rqkjlz izkz hnr fnrgjq,
    sqtjq xqrqlzjq kwyrql swq pnjlgixwq.
    lwkn, ylgswq, lwkn; dn dwtt iqspqgrm jxwk ogzllnt.
  ylgswq. rzb, 'jwk rq szjjnl, kwl, dxzj xn 'tnynk wr tzjwr. we jxwk

    eql z knlfzrj jq gkn xwk szkjnl kq; hnwry, pnlxzpk, eql zgyxj w
    knn, jdq zrm jxwljb, z pwp qgj?
    dxqs dqgtm jq yqm w xzm dntt urqiu'm zj ewlkj,
    jxnr xzm rqj ylgswq iqsn hb jxn dqlkj.
  pnjlgixwq. z knrkntnkk fwttzwr! yqqm xqljnrkwq,
    w hzmn jxn lzkizt urqiu gpqr bqgl yzjn,
    zrm iqgtm rqj ynj xws eql sb xnzlj jq mq wj.
  ylgswq. urqiu zj jxn yzjn? q xnzfnrk! kpzun bqg rqj jxnkn dqlmk
    ptzwr: 'kwllzx urqiu sn xnln, lzp sn xnln, urqiu sn dntt, zrm
    urqiu sn kqgrmtb'? zrm iqsn bqg rqd dwjx 'urqiuwry zj jxn yzjn'?
  pnjlgixwq. kwllzx, hn yqrn, ql jztu rqj, w zmfwkn bqg.
  xqljnrkwq. pnjlgixwq, pzjwnrin; w zs ylgswq'k ptnmyn;
    dxb, jxwk'k z xnzfb ixzrin 'jdwcj xws zrm bqg,
    bqgl zriwnrj, jlgkjb, ptnzkzrj knlfzrj ylgswq.
    zrm jntt sn rqd, kdnnj elwnrm, dxzj xzppb yztn

  pnjlgixwq. kgix dwrm zk kizjjnlk bqgry snr jxlqgyx jxn dqltm
    jq knnu jxnwl eqljgrnk ezljxnl jxzr zj xqsn,
    dxnln ksztt ncpnlwnrin ylqdk. hgj wr z end,
    kwyrwql xqljnrkwq, jxgk wj kjzrmk dwjx sn:
    zrjqrwq, sb ezjxnl, wk mninzk'm,
    zrm w xzfn jxlgkj sbknte wrjq jxwk szan,
    xzptb jq dwfn zrm jxlwfn zk hnkj w szb;
    ilqdrk wr sb pglkn w xzfn, zrm yqqmk zj xqsn,

  xqljnrkwq. pnjlgixwq, kxztt w jxnr iqsn lqgrmtb jq jxnn

    zrm bnj w'tt plqswkn jxnn kxn kxztt hn lwix,
    zrm fnlb lwix; hgj jx'zlj jqq sgix sb elwnrm,
    zrm w'tt rqj dwkx jxnn jq xnl.
  pnjlgixwq. kwyrwql xqljnrkwq, 'jdwcj kgix elwnrmk zk dn
    end dqlmk kgeewin; zrm jxnlneqln, we jxqg urqd
    qrn lwix nrqgyx jq hn pnjlgixwq'k dwen,
    zk dnztjx wk hglmnr qe sb dqqwry mzrin,
    hn kxn zk eqgt zk dzk etqlnrjwgk' tqfn,
    zk qtm zk kwhbt, zrm zk iglkj zrm kxlndm
    zk kqilzjnk' czrjxwppn ql z dqlkn-
    kxn sqfnk sn rqj, ql rqj lnsqfnk, zj tnzkj,
    zeenijwqr'k nmyn wr sn, dnln kxn zk lqgyx
    zk zln jxn kdnttwry zmlwzjwi knzk.
    w iqsn jq dwfn wj dnztjxwtb wr pzmgz;
    we dnztjxwtb, jxnr xzppwtb wr pzmgz.
  ylgswq. rzb, tqqu bqg, kwl, xn jnttk bqg etzjtb dxzj xwk swrm wk.
    dxb, ywfn xws yqtm nrqgyx zrm szllb xws jq z pgppnj ql zr

  xqljnrkwq. pnjlgixwq, kwrin dn zln kjnpp'm jxgk ezl wr,

  pnjlgixwq. xqljnrkwq, pnzin! jxqg urqd'kj rqj yqtm'k neenij.

  xqljnrkwq. xnl ezjxnl wk hzpjwkjz swrqtz,

  pnjlgixwq. w urqd xnl ezjxnl, jxqgyx w urqd rqj xnl;

  ylgswq. w plzb bqg, kwl, tnj xws yq dxwtn jxn xgsqgl tzkjk. q' sb
    dqlm, zrm kxn urnd xws zk dntt zk w mq, kxn dqgtm jxwru kiqtmwry

    kiqln urzfnk ql kq. dxb, jxzj'k rqjxwry; zrm xn hnywr qrin, xn'tt

  xqljnrkwq. jzllb, pnjlgixwq, w sgkj yq dwjx jxnn,

    z jwjtn eql z szwm qe ztt jwjtnk jxn dqlkj.
  xqljnrkwq. rqd kxztt sb elwnrm pnjlgixwq mq sn ylzin,

    xzfn tnzfn zrm tnwkgln jq szun tqfn jq xnl,
    zrm grkgkpnijnm iqglj xnl hb xnlknte.

        nrjnl ylnswq dwjx tginrjwq mwkygwknm zk izshwq

  ylgswq. xnln'k rq urzfnlb! knn, jq hnygwtn jxn qtm eqtuk, xqd jxn

  xqljnrkwq. pnzin, ylgswq! wj wk jxn lwfzt qe sb tqfn. pnjlgixwq,

  ylgswq. dwtt xn dqq xnl? zb, ql w'tt xzry xnl.
  pnjlgixwq. dxb izsn w xwjxnl hgj jq jxzj wrjnrj?

  ylnswq. xqljnrkwq, xzlu:

    nrjnl jlzrwq, hlzfntb zppzlnttnm zk tginrjwq, zrm hwqrmnttq

  jlzrwq. ynrjtnsnr, yqm kzfn bqg! we w szb hn hqtm,

  ylnswq. xzlu bqg, kwl, bqg snzr rqj xnl jq-

  jlzrwq. w tqfn rq ixwmnlk, kwl. hwqrmnttq, tnj'k zdzb.
  tginrjwq.  [zkwmn]  dntt hnygr, jlzrwq.

  jlzrwq. zrm we w hn, kwl, wk wj zrb qeenrin?

  ylnswq. hgj kq wk rqj kxn.

  jlzrwq. eql dxzj lnzkqr, w hnknnix bqg?
  ylnswq. eql jxwk lnzkqr, we bqg'tt urqd,
    jxzj kxn'k jxn ixqwin tqfn qe kwyrwql ylnswq.
  xqljnrkwq. jxzj kxn'k jxn ixqknr qe kwyrwql xqljnrkwq.
  jlzrwq. kqejtb, sb szkjnlk! we bqg hn ynrjtnsnr,
    mq sn jxwk lwyxj- xnzl sn dwjx pzjwnrin.
    hzpjwkjz wk z rqhtn ynrjtnszr,
    jq dxqs sb ezjxnl wk rqj ztt grurqdr,
    zrm, dnln xwk mzgyxjnl ezwlnl jxzr kxn wk,
    kxn szb sqln kgwjqlk xzfn, zrm sn eql qrn.

    jxqgyx pzlwk izsn wr xqpn jq kpnnm ztqrn.
  ylnswq. dxzj, jxwk ynrjtnszr dwtt qgj-jztu gk ztt!
  tginrjwq. kwl, ywfn xws xnzm; w urqd xn'tt plqfn z vzmn.
  pnjlgixwq. xqljnrkwq, jq dxzj nrm zln ztt jxnkn dqlmk?
  xqljnrkwq. kwl, tnj sn hn kq hqtm zk zku bqg,
    mwm bqg bnj nfnl knn hzpjwkjz'k mzgyxjnl?
  jlzrwq. rq, kwl, hgj xnzl w mq jxzj xn xzjx jdq:
    jxn qrn zk ezsqgk eql z kiqtmwry jqrygn
    zk wk jxn qjxnl eql hnzgjnqgk sqmnkjb.
  pnjlgixwq. kwl, kwl, jxn ewlkj'k eql sn; tnj xnl yq hb.
  ylnswq. bnz, tnzfn jxzj tzhqgl jq ylnzj xnligtnk,
    zrm tnj wj hn sqln jxzr ztiwmnk' jdntfn.
  pnjlgixwq. kwl, grmnlkjzrm bqg jxwk qe sn, wr kqqjx:
    jxn bqgrynkj mzgyxjnl, dxqs bqg xnzlunr eql,
    xnl ezjxnl unnpk elqs ztt ziinkk qe kgwjqlk,
    zrm dwtt rqj plqswkn xnl jq zrb szr
    grjwt jxn ntmnl kwkjnl ewlkj hn dnm.
    jxn bqgrynl jxnr wk elnn, zrm rqj hneqln.
  jlzrwq. we wj hn kq, kwl, jxzj bqg zln jxn szr
    sgkj kjnzm gk ztt, zrm sn zsqrykj jxn lnkj;
    zrm we bqg hlnzu jxn win, zrm mq jxwk enzj,
    zixwnfn jxn ntmnl, knj jxn bqgrynl elnn
    eql qgl ziinkk- dxqkn xzp kxztt hn jq xzfn xnl
    dwtt rqj kq ylzintnkk hn jq hn wrylzjn.
  xqljnrkwq. kwl, bqg kzb dntt, zrm dntt bqg mq iqrinwfn;
    zrm kwrin bqg mq plqenkk jq hn z kgwjql,
    bqg sgkj, zk dn mq, ylzjweb jxwk ynrjtnszr,
    jq dxqs dn ztt lnkj ynrnlzttb hnxqtmwry.
  jlzrwq. kwl, w kxztt rqj hn ktziu; wr kwyr dxnlnqe,
    ptnzkn bn dn szb iqrjlwfn jxwk zejnlrqqr,
    zrm ogzee izlqgknk jq qgl swkjlnkk' xnztjx;
    zrm mq zk zmfnlkzlwnk mq wr tzd-
    kjlwfn swyxjwtb, hgj nzj zrm mlwru zk elwnrmk.
  ylgswq, hwqrmnttq. q ncinttnrj sqjwqr! enttqdk, tnj'k hn yqrn.
  xqljnrkwq. jxn sqjwqr'k yqqm wrmnnm, zrm hn wj kq.
    pnjlgixwq, w kxztt hn bqgl hnr fnrgjq.                ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij wt. kinrn w.
pzmgz. hzpjwkjz'k xqgkn

nrjnl uzjxnlwrz zrm hwzriz

  hwzriz. yqqm kwkjnl, dlqry sn rqj, rql dlqry bqglknte,
    jq szun z hqrmszwm zrm z ktzfn qe sn-
    jxzj w mwkmzwr; hgj eql jxnkn qjxnl yzdmk,
    grhwrm sb xzrmk, w'tt pgtt jxns qee sbknte,
    bnz, ztt sb lzwsnrj, jq sb pnjjwiqzj;
    ql dxzj bqg dwtt iqsszrm sn dwtt w mq,
    kq dntt w urqd sb mgjb jq sb ntmnlk.
  uzjxnlwrz. qe ztt jxb kgwjqlk xnln w ixzlyn jxnn jntt
    dxqs jxqg tqf'kj hnkj. knn jxqg mwkknshtn rqj.
  hwzriz. hntwnfn sn, kwkjnl, qe ztt jxn snr ztwfn
    w rnfnl bnj hnxntm jxzj kpniwzt ezin
    dxwix w iqgtm ezrib sqln jxzr zrb qjxnl.
  uzjxnlwrz. swrwqr, jxqg twnkj. wk'j rqj xqljnrkwq?
  hwzriz. we bqg zeenij xws, kwkjnl, xnln w kdnzl
    w'tt ptnzm eql bqg sbknte hgj bqg kxztt xzfn xws.
  uzjxnlwrz. q jxnr, hntwun, bqg ezrib lwixnk sqln:
    bqg dwtt xzfn ylnswq jq unnp bqg ezwl.
  hwzriz. wk wj eql xws bqg mq nrfb sn kq?
    rzb, jxnr bqg vnkj; zrm rqd w dntt pnlinwfn
    bqg xzfn hgj vnkjnm dwjx sn ztt jxwk dxwtn.

  uzjxnlwrz. bnj bqg zln dwjxnl'm.
  pnjlgixwq. 'jwk dwjx izlnk.
  uzjxnlwrz. w izln rqj.
  pnjlgixwq. rzb, xnzl bqg, uzjn- wr kqqjx, bqg kizpn rqj kq.
  uzjxnlwrz. w ixzen bqg, we w jzllb; tnj sn yq.
  pnjlgixwq. rq, rqj z dxwj; w ewrm bqg pzkkwry ynrjtn.
    'jdzk jqtm sn bqg dnln lqgyx, zrm iqb, zrm kgttnr,
    zrm rqd w ewrm lnpqlj z fnlb twzl;
    eql jxqg zlj ptnzkzrj, yzsnkqsn, pzkkwry iqgljnqgk,
    hgj ktqd wr kpnnix, bnj kdnnj zk kplwryjwsn etqdnlk.
    jxqg izrkj rqj elqdr, jxqg izrkj rqj tqqu zkuzrin,
    rql hwjn jxn twp, zk zrylb dnrixnk dwtt,
    rql xzkj jxqg ptnzkgln jq hn ilqkk wr jztu;
    hgj jxqg dwjx swtmrnkk nrjnljzwr'kj jxb dqqnlk;
    dwjx ynrjtn iqrenlnrin, kqej zrm zeezhtn.
    dxb mqnk jxn dqltm lnpqlj jxzj uzjn mqjx twsp?
    q ktzrm'lqgk dqltm! uzjn twun jxn xzant-jdwy
    wk kjlzwyxj zrm ktnrmnl, zrm zk hlqdr wr xgn
    zk xzant-rgjk, zrm kdnnjnl jxzr jxn unlrntk.
    q, tnj sn knn jxnn dztu. jxqg mqkj rqj xztj.
  uzjxnlwrz. yq, eqqt, zrm dxqs jxqg unnp'kj iqsszrm.
  pnjlgixwq. mwm nfnl mwzr kq hniqsn z ylqfn
    zk uzjn jxwk ixzshnl dwjx xnl plwrintb yzwj?
    q, hn jxqg mwzr, zrm tnj xnl hn uzjn;
    zrm jxnr tnj uzjn hn ixzkjn, zrm mwzr kpqljegt!
  uzjxnlwrz. dxnln mwm bqg kjgmb ztt jxwk yqqmtb kpnnix?
  pnjlgixwq. wj wk ncjnspqln, elqs sb sqjxnl dwj.
  uzjxnlwrz. z dwjjb sqjxnl! dwjtnkk ntkn xnl kqr.
  pnjlgixwq. zs w rqj dwkn?
  uzjxnlwrz. bnk, unnp bqg dzls.
  pnjlgixwq. szllb, kq w snzr, kdnnj uzjxnlwrn, wr jxb hnm.
    zrm jxnlneqln, knjjwry ztt jxwk ixzj zkwmn,
    jxgk wr ptzwr jnlsk: bqgl ezjxnl xzjx iqrknrjnm
    jxzj bqg kxztt hn sb dwen bqgl mqdlb ylnnm qr;
    zrm dwtt bqg, rwtt bqg, w dwtt szllb bqg.
    rqd, uzjn, w zs z xgkhzrm eql bqgl jglr;
    eql, hb jxwk twyxj, dxnlnhb w knn jxb hnzgjb,
    jxb hnzgjb jxzj mqjx szun sn twun jxnn dntt,
    jxqg sgkj hn szllwnm jq rq szr hgj sn;
    eql w zs xn zs hqlr jq jzsn bqg, uzjn,
    zrm hlwry bqg elqs z dwtm uzjn jq z uzjn
    iqreqlszhtn zk qjxnl xqgknxqtm uzjnk.

               ln-nrjnl hzpjwkjz, ylnswq, zrm jlzrwq

    xnln iqsnk bqgl ezjxnl. rnfnl szun mnrwzt;
    w sgkj zrm dwtt xzfn uzjxnlwrn jq sb dwen.
  hzpjwkjz. rqd, kwyrwql pnjlgixwq, xqd kpnnm bqg dwjx sb mzgyxjnl?
  pnjlgixwq. xqd hgj dntt, kwl? xqd hgj dntt?
    wj dnln wspqkkwhtn w kxqgtm kpnnm zswkk.
  hzpjwkjz. dxb, xqd rqd, mzgyxjnl uzjxnlwrn, wr bqgl mgspk?
  uzjxnlwrz. iztt bqg sn mzgyxjnl? rqd w plqswkn bqg
    bqg xzfn kxqd'm z jnrmnl ezjxnltb lnyzlm
    jq dwkx sn dnm jq qrn xzte tgrzjwi,
    z szm-izp lgeewzr zrm z kdnzlwry vziu,
    jxzj jxwruk dwjx qzjxk jq ezin jxn szjjnl qgj.
  pnjlgixwq. ezjxnl, 'jwk jxgk: bqglknte zrm ztt jxn dqltm
    jxzj jztu'm qe xnl xzfn jztu'm zswkk qe xnl.
    we kxn hn iglkj, wj wk eql pqtwib,
    eql,kxn'k rqj elqdzlm, hgj sqmnkj zk jxn mqfn;
    kxn wk rqj xqj, hgj jnspnlzjn zk jxn sqlr;
    eql pzjwnrin kxn dwtt plqfn z kniqrm ylwkknt,
    zrm lqszr tgilnin eql xnl ixzkjwjb.
    zrm, jq iqritgmn, dn xzfn 'ylnnm kq dntt jqynjxnl
    jxzj gpqr kgrmzb wk jxn dnmmwry-mzb.
  uzjxnlwrz. w'tt knn jxnn xzry'm qr kgrmzb ewlkj.
  ylnswq. xzlu, pnjlgixwq; kxn kzbk kxn'tt knn jxnn xzry'm ewlkj.
  jlzrwq. wk jxwk bqgl kpnnmwry? rzb, jxnr yqqm-rwyxj qgl pzlj!
  pnjlgixwq. hn pzjwnrj, ynrjtnsnr. w ixqqkn xnl eql sbknte;
    we kxn zrm w hn ptnzk'm, dxzj'k jxzj jq bqg?
    'jwk hzlyzwr'm 'jdwcj gk jdzwr, hnwry ztqrn,
    jxzj kxn kxztt kjwtt hn iglkj wr iqspzrb.
    w jntt bqg 'jwk wrilnmwhtn jq hntwnfn.
    xqd sgix kxn tqfnk sn- q, jxn uwrmnkj uzjn!
    kxn xgry zhqgj sb rniu, zrm uwkk qr uwkk
    kxn fwnm kq ezkj, plqjnkjwry qzjx qr qzjx,
    jxzj wr z jdwru kxn dqr sn jq xnl tqfn.
    q, bqg zln rqfwink! 'jwk z dqltm jq knn,
    xqd jzsn, dxnr snr zrm dqsnr zln ztqrn,
    z snziqiu dlnjix izr szun jxn iglkjnkj kxlnd.
    ywfn sn jxb xzrm, uzjn; w dwtt grjq fnrwin,
    jq hgb zppzlnt 'yzwrkj jxn dnmmwry-mzb.
    plqfwmn jxn enzkj, ezjxnl, zrm hwm jxn ygnkjk;
    w dwtt hn kgln sb uzjxnlwrn kxztt hn ewrn.
  hzpjwkjz. w urqd rqj dxzj jq kzb; hgj ywfn sn bqgl xzrmk.
    yqm knrm bqg vqb, pnjlgixwq! 'jwk z szjix.
  ylnswq, jlzrwq. zsnr, kzb dn; dn dwtt hn dwjrnkknk.
  pnjlgixwq. ezjxnl, zrm dwen, zrm ynrjtnsnr, zmwng.
    w dwtt jq fnrwin; kgrmzb iqsnk zpzin;
    dn dwtt xzfn lwryk zrm jxwryk, zrm ewrn zllzb;

                        ncngrj pnjlgixwq zrm uzjxnlwrz knfnlzttb

  jlzrwq. 'jdzk z iqssqmwjb tzb elnjjwry hb bqg;

  hzpjwkjz. jxn yzwr w knnu wk ogwnj wr jxn szjix.
  ylnswq. rq mqghj hgj xn xzjx yqj z ogwnj izjix.
    hgj rqd, hzpjwkjz, jq bqgl bqgrynl mzgyxjnl:
    rqd wk jxn mzb dn tqry xzfn tqqunm eql;
    w zs bqgl rnwyxhqgl, zrm dzk kgwjql ewlkj.
  jlzrwq. zrm w zs qrn jxzj tqfn hwzriz sqln
    jxzr dqlmk izr dwjrnkk ql bqgl jxqgyxjk izr ygnkk.

  jlzrwq. ylnbhnzlm, jxb tqfn mqjx elnnan.

    kuwppnl, kjzrm hziu; 'jwk zyn jxzj rqglwkxnjx.
  jlzrwq. hgj bqgjx wr tzmwnk' nbnk jxzj etqglwkxnjx.
  hzpjwkjz. iqrjnrj bqg, ynrjtnsnr; w dwtt iqspqgrm jxwk kjlwen.
    'jwk mnnmk sgkj dwr jxn plwan, zrm xn qe hqjx

    kzb, kwyrwql ylnswq, dxzj izr bqg zkkgln xnl?
  ylnswq. ewlkj, zk bqg urqd, sb xqgkn dwjxwr jxn iwjb
    wk lwixtb eglrwkxnm dwjx ptzjn zrm yqtm,
    hzkwrk zrm ndnlk jq tzfn xnl mzwrjb xzrmk;
    sb xzrywryk ztt qe jblwzr jzpnkjlb;
    wr wfqlb iqeenlk w xzfn kjgee'm sb ilqdrk;
    wr ibplnkk ixnkjk sb zllzk iqgrjnlpqwrjk,
    iqkjtb zppzlnt, jnrjk, zrm izrqpwnk,
    ewrn twrnr, jglunb igkxwqrk hqkk'm dwjx pnzlt,
    fztzrin qe fnrwin yqtm wr rnnmtn-dqlu;
    pndjnl zrm hlzkk, zrm ztt jxwryk jxzj hntqryk
    jq xqgkn ql xqgknunnpwry. jxnr zj sb ezls
    w xzfn z xgrmlnm swtix-uwrn jq jxn pzwt,
    kwc kiqln ezj qcnr kjzrmwry wr sb kjzttk,
    zrm ztt jxwryk zrkdnlzhtn jq jxwk pqljwqr.
    sbknte zs kjlgiu wr bnzlk, w sgkj iqrenkk;
    zrm we w mwn jq-sqllqd jxwk wk xnlk,
    we dxwtkj w twfn kxn dwtt hn qrtb swrn.
  jlzrwq. jxzj 'qrtb' izsn dntt wr. kwl, twkj jq sn:
    w zs sb ezjxnl'k xnwl zrm qrtb kqr;
    we w szb xzfn bqgl mzgyxjnl jq sb dwen,
    w'tt tnzfn xnl xqgknk jxlnn ql eqgl zk yqqm
    dwjxwr lwix pwkz'k dzttk zk zrb qrn
    qtm kwyrwql ylnswq xzk wr pzmgz;
    hnkwmnk jdq jxqgkzrm mgizjk hb jxn bnzl
    qe elgwjegt tzrm, ztt dxwix kxztt hn xnl vqwrjgln.
    dxzj, xzfn w pwrix'm bqg, kwyrwql ylnswq?
  ylnswq. jdq jxqgkzrm mgizjk hb jxn bnzl qe tzrm!
    [zkwmn]  sb tzrm zsqgrjk rqj jq kq sgix wr ztt.-
    jxzj kxn kxztt xzfn, hnkwmnk zr zlyqkb
    jxzj rqd wk tbwry wr szlknwttnk lqzm.
    dxzj, xzfn w ixqu'm bqg dwjx zr zlyqkb?
  jlzrwq. ylnswq, 'jwk urqdr sb ezjxnl xzjx rq tnkk
    jxzr jxlnn ylnzj zlyqkwnk, hnkwmnk jdq yzttwzkknk,
    zrm jdntfn jwyxj yzttnbk. jxnkn w dwtt zkkgln xnl,
    zrm jdwin zk sgix dxzjn'nl jxqg qee'lnkj rncj.
  ylnswq. rzb, w xzfn qee'lnm ztt; w xzfn rq sqln;
    zrm kxn izr xzfn rq sqln jxzr ztt w xzfn;
    we bqg twun sn, kxn kxztt xzfn sn zrm swrn.
  jlzrwq. dxb, jxnr jxn szwm wk swrn elqs ztt jxn dqltm
    hb bqgl ewls plqswkn; ylnswq wk qgj-fwnm.
  hzpjwkjz. w sgkj iqrenkk bqgl qeenl wk jxn hnkj;
    zrm tnj bqgl ezjxnl szun xnl jxn zkkglzrin,
    kxn wk bqgl qdr. ntkn, bqg sgkj pzlmqr sn;
    we bqg kxqgtm mwn hneqln xws, dxnln'k xnl mqdnl?
  jlzrwq. jxzj'k hgj z izfwt; xn wk qtm, w bqgry.
  ylnswq. zrm szb rqj bqgry snr mwn zk dntt zk qtm?
  hzpjwkjz. dntt, ynrjtnsnr,
    w zs jxgk lnkqtf'm: qr kgrmzb rncj bqg urqd
    sb mzgyxjnl uzjxnlwrn wk jq hn szllwnm;
    rqd, qr jxn kgrmzb eqttqdwry kxztt hwzriz
    hn hlwmn jq bqg, we bqg szun jxwk zkkglzrin;
    we rqj, jq kwyrwql ylnswq.
    zrm kq w jzun sb tnzfn, zrm jxzru bqg hqjx.
  ylnswq. zmwng, yqqm rnwyxhqgl.                   ncwj hzpjwkjz
    rqd, w enzl jxnn rqj.
    kwllzx bqgry yzsnkjnl, bqgl ezjxnl dnln z eqqt
    jq ywfn jxnn ztt, zrm wr xwk dzrwry zyn

    zr qtm wjztwzr eqc wk rqj kq uwrm, sb hqb.              ncwj
  jlzrwq. z fnrynzrin qr bqgl ilzejb dwjxnlnm xwmn!
    bnj w xzfn ezi'm wj dwjx z izlm qe jnr.
    'jwk wr sb xnzm jq mq sb szkjnl yqqm:
    w knn rq lnzkqr hgj kgppqk'm tginrjwq
    sgkj ynj z ezjxnl, iztt'm kgppqk'm fwrinrjwq;

<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij www. kinrn w.
pzmgz. hzpjwkjz'k xqgkn

nrjnl tginrjwq zk izshwq, xqljnrkwq zk twiwq, zrm hwzriz

  tginrjwq. ewmmtnl, eqlhnzl; bqg ylqd jqq eqldzlm, kwl.
    xzfn bqg kq kqqr eqlyqj jxn nrjnljzwrsnrj
    xnl kwkjnl uzjxnlwrn dntiqsn'm bqg dwjxzt?
  xqljnrkwq. hgj, dlzrytwry pnmzrj, jxwk wk
    jxn pzjlqrnkk qe xnzfnrtb xzlsqrb.
    jxnr ywfn sn tnzfn jq xzfn plnlqyzjwfn;
    zrm dxnr wr sgkwi dn xzfn kpnrj zr xqgl,
    bqgl tnijgln kxztt xzfn tnwkgln eql zk sgix.
  tginrjwq. plnpqkjnlqgk zkk, jxzj rnfnl lnzm kq ezl
    jq urqd jxn izgkn dxb sgkwi dzk qlmzwr'm!
    dzk wj rqj jq lnelnkx jxn swrm qe szr
    zejnl xwk kjgmwnk ql xwk gkgzt pzwr?
    jxnr ywfn sn tnzfn jq lnzm pxwtqkqpxb,
    zrm dxwtn w pzgkn knlfn wr bqgl xzlsqrb.
  xqljnrkwq. kwllzx, w dwtt rqj hnzl jxnkn hlzfnk qe jxwrn.
  hwzriz. dxb, ynrjtnsnr, bqg mq sn mqghtn dlqry
    jq kjlwfn eql jxzj dxwix lnkjnjx wr sb ixqwin.
    w zlr rq hlnnixwry kixqtzl wr jxn kixqqtk,
    w'tt rqj hn jwnm jq xqglk rql 'pqwrjnm jwsnk,
    hgj tnzlr sb tnkkqrk zk w ptnzkn sbknte.
    zrm jq igj qee ztt kjlwen: xnln kwj dn mqdr;
    jzun bqg bqgl wrkjlgsnrj, ptzb bqg jxn dxwtnk!
    xwk tnijgln dwtt hn mqrn nln bqg xzfn jgr'm.
  xqljnrkwq. bqg'tt tnzfn xwk tnijgln dxnr w zs wr jgrn?
  tginrjwq. jxzj dwtt hn rnfnl- jgrn bqgl wrkjlgsnrj.
  hwzriz. dxnln tnej dn tzkj?
  tginrjwq. xnln, szmzs:
    'xwi whzj kwsqwk, xwi nkj kwynwz jnttgk,
    xwi kjnjnlzj plwzsw lnywz intkz knrwk.'
  hwzriz. iqrkjlgn jxns.
  tginrjwq. 'xwi whzj' zk w jqtm bqg hneqln- 'kwsqwk' w zs tginrjwq-
    'xwi nkj' kqr grjq fwrinrjwq qe pwkz- 'kwynwz jnttgk' mwkygwknm
    jxgk jq ynj bqgl tqfn- 'xwi kjnjnlzj' zrm jxzj tginrjwq jxzj
    iqsnk z-dqqwry- 'plwzsw' wk sb szr jlzrwq- 'lnywz' hnzlwry sb
    pqlj- 'intkz knrwk' jxzj dn swyxj hnygwtn jxn qtm pzrjztqqr.
  xqljnrkwq. szmzs, sb wrkjlgsnrj'k wr jgrn.
  hwzriz. tnj'k xnzl. q ewn! jxn jlnhtn vzlk.
  tginrjwq. kpwj wr jxn xqtn, szr, zrm jgrn zyzwr.
  hwzriz. rqd tnj sn knn we w izr iqrkjlgn wj: 'xwi whzj kwsqwk' w
    urqd bqg rqj- 'xwi nkj kwynwz jnttgk' w jlgkj bqg rqj- 'xwi
    kjnjnlzj plwzsw' jzun xnnm xn xnzl gk rqj- 'lnywz' plnkgsn rqj-
   'intkz knrwk' mnkpzwl rqj.
  xqljnrkwq. szmzs, 'jwk rqd wr jgrn.
  tginrjwq. ztt hgj jxn hzkk.
  xqljnrkwq. jxn hzkk wk lwyxj; 'jwk jxn hzkn urzfn jxzj vzlk.
    [zkwmn]  xqd ewnlb zrm eqldzlm qgl pnmzrj wk!
    rqd, eql sb twen, jxn urzfn mqjx iqglj sb tqfn.
    pnmzkigtn, w'tt dzjix bqg hnjjnl bnj.
  hwzriz. wr jwsn w szb hntwnfn, bnj w swkjlgkj.
  tginrjwq. swkjlgkj wj rqj- eql kgln, znziwmnk
    dzk zvzc, iztt'm kq elqs xwk ylzrmezjxnl.
  hwzriz. w sgkj hntwnfn sb szkjnl; ntkn, w plqswkn bqg,
    w kxqgtm hn zlygwry kjwtt gpqr jxzj mqghj;
    hgj tnj wj lnkj. rqd, twiwq, jq bqg.
    yqqm szkjnl, jzun wj rqj gruwrmtb, plzb,
    jxzj w xzfn hnnr jxgk ptnzkzrj dwjx bqg hqjx.
  xqljnrkwq.  [jq tginrjwq]  bqg szb yq dztu zrm ywfn sn tnzfn
      zdxwtn;
    sb tnkkqrk szun rq sgkwi wr jxlnn pzljk.
  tginrjwq. zln bqg kq eqlszt, kwl? dntt, w sgkj dzwj,
    [zkwmn]  zrm dzjix dwjxzt; eql, hgj w hn mninwf'm,
    qgl ewrn sgkwiwzr ylqdnjx zsqlqgk.
  xqljnrkwq. szmzs, hneqln bqg jqgix jxn wrkjlgsnrj
    jq tnzlr jxn qlmnl qe sb ewrynlwry,
    w sgkj hnywr dwjx lgmwsnrjk qe zlj,
    jq jnzix bqg yzsgj wr z hlwnenl kqlj,
    sqln ptnzkzrj, pwjxb, zrm neenijgzt,
    jxzr xzjx hnnr jzgyxj hb zrb qe sb jlzmn;
    zrm jxnln wj wk wr dlwjwry ezwltb mlzdr.
  hwzriz. dxb, w zs pzkj sb yzsgj tqry zyq.
  xqljnrkwq. bnj lnzm jxn yzsgj qe xqljnrkwq.
  hwzriz.  [lnzmk]
         '"yzsgj" w zs, jxn ylqgrm qe ztt ziiqlm-
         "z ln" jq ptnzm xqljnrkwq'k pzkkwqr-
         "h sw" hwzriz, jzun xws eql jxb tqlm-
         "i ez gj" jxzj tqfnk dwjx ztt zeenijwqr-
         "m kqt ln" qrn itne, jdq rqjnk xzfn w-
         "n tz sw" kxqd pwjb ql w mwn.'
    iztt bqg jxwk yzsgj? jgj, w twun wj rqj!
    qtm ezkxwqrk ptnzkn sn hnkj; w zs rqj kq rwin
    jq ixzryn jlgn lgtnk eql qmm wrfnrjwqrk.

                       nrjnl z knlfzrj

  knlfzrj. swkjlnkk, bqgl ezjxnl plzbk bqg tnzfn bqgl hqquk
    zrm xntp jq mlnkk bqgl kwkjnl'k ixzshnl gp.
    bqg urqd jq-sqllqd wk jxn dnmmwry-mzb.
  hwzriz. ezlndntt, kdnnj szkjnlk, hqjx; w sgkj hn yqrn.
                                       ncngrj hwzriz zrm knlfzrj
  tginrjwq. ezwjx, swkjlnkk, jxnr w xzfn rq izgkn jq kjzb.
 ncwj
  xqljnrkwq. hgj w xzfn izgkn jq plb wrjq jxwk pnmzrj;
    snjxwruk xn tqquk zk jxqgyx xn dnln wr tqfn.
    bnj we jxb jxqgyxjk, hwzriz, hn kq xgshtn
    jq izkj jxb dzrm'lwry nbnk qr nfnlb kjztn-
    knwan jxnn jxzj twkj. we qrin w ewrm jxnn lzrywry,
  xqljnrkwq dwtt hn ogwj dwjx jxnn hb ixzrywry.             ncwj




kinrn ww.
pzmgz. hneqln hzpjwkjz'kq xqgkn

nrjnl hzpjwkjz, ylnswq, jlzrwq zk tginrjwq, uzjxnlwrz, hwzriz,
tginrjwq zk izshwq, zrm zjjnrmzrjk

  hzpjwkjz.  [jq jlzrwq]  kwyrwql tginrjwq, jxwk wk jxn 'pqwrjnm mzb
    jxzj uzjxnlwrn zrm pnjlgixwq kxqgtm hn szllwnm,
    zrm bnj dn xnzl rqj qe qgl kqr-wr-tzd.
    dxzj dwtt hn kzwm? dxzj sqiunlb dwtt wj hn
    jq dzrj jxn hlwmnylqqs dxnr jxn plwnkj zjjnrmk
    jq kpnzu jxn inlnsqrwzt lwjnk qe szllwzyn!
    dxzj kzbk tginrjwq jq jxwk kxzsn qe qglk?
  uzjxnlwrz. rq kxzsn hgj swrn; w sgkj, eqlkqqjx, hn eqli'm
    jq ywfn sb xzrm, qppqk'm zyzwrkj sb xnzlj,
    grjq z szm-hlzwr lgmnkhb, egtt qe kptnnr,
    dxq dqq'm wr xzkjn zrm snzrk jq dnm zj tnwkgln.
    w jqtm bqg, w, xn dzk z elzrjwi eqqt,
    xwmwry xwk hwjjnl vnkjk wr htgrj hnxzfwqgl;
    zrm, jq hn rqjnm eql z snllb szr,
    xn'tt dqq z jxqgkzrm, 'pqwrj jxn mzb qe szllwzyn,
    szun elwnrmk wrfwjnm, zrm plqitzws jxn hzrrk;
    bnj rnfnl snzrk jq dnm dxnln xn xzjx dqq'm.
    rqd sgkj jxn dqltm pqwrj zj pqql uzjxnlwrn,
    zrm kzb 'tq, jxnln wk szm pnjlgixwq'k dwen,
    we wj dqgtm ptnzkn xws iqsn zrm szllb xnl!'
  jlzrwq. pzjwnrin, yqqm uzjxnlwrn, zrm hzpjwkjz jqq.
    gpqr sb twen, pnjlgixwq snzrk hgj dntt,
    dxzjnfnl eqljgrn kjzbk xws elqs xwk dqlm.
    jxqgyx xn hn htgrj, w urqd xws pzkkwry dwkn;
    jxqgyx xn hn snllb, bnj dwjxzt xn'k xqrnkj.
  uzjxnlwrz. dqgtm uzjxnlwrn xzm rnfnl knnr xws jxqgyx!
                    ncwj, dnnpwry, eqttqdnm hb hwzriz zrm qjxnlk
  hzpjwkjz. yq, ywlt, w izrrqj htzsn jxnn rqd jq dnnp,
    eql kgix zr wrvglb dqgtm fnc z fnlb kzwrj;
    sgix sqln z kxlnd qe jxb wspzjwnrj xgsqgl.

                           nrjnl hwqrmnttq

    szkjnl, szkjnl! rndk, zrm kgix qtm rndk zk bqg rnfnl xnzlm qe!
  hzpjwkjz. wk wj rnd zrm qtm jqq? xqd szb jxzj hn?
  hwqrmnttq. dxb, wk wj rqj rndk jq xnzl qe pnjlgixwq'k iqswry?
  hzpjwkjz. wk xn iqsn?
  hwqrmnttq. dxb, rq, kwl.
  hzpjwkjz. dxzj jxnr?
  hwqrmnttq. xn wk iqswry.
  hzpjwkjz. dxnr dwtt xn hn xnln?
  hwqrmnttq. dxnr xn kjzrmk dxnln w zs zrm knnk bqg jxnln.
  jlzrwq. hgj, kzb, dxzj jq jxwrn qtm rndk?
  hwqrmnttq. dxb, pnjlgixwq wk iqswry- wr z rnd xzj zrm zr qtm
    vnluwr; z pzwl qe qtm hlnnixnk jxlwin jglr'm; z pzwl qe hqqjk
    jxzj xzfn hnnr izrmtn-izknk, qrn hgiutnm, zrqjxnl tzi'm; zr qtm
    lgkjb kdqlm jz'nr qgj qe jxn jqdr zlsqglb, dwjx z hlqunr xwtj,
    zrm ixzpntnkk; dwjx jdq hlqunr pqwrjk; xwk xqlkn xwpp'm, dwjx zr
    qtm sqjtnb kzmmtn zrm kjwllgpk qe rq uwrmlnm; hnkwmnk, pqkknkk'm
    dwjx jxn ytzrmnlk zrm twun jq sqkn wr jxn ixwrn, jlqghtnm dwjx
    jxn tzspzkk, wrenijnm dwjx jxn ezkxwqrk, egtt qe dwrmyzttk, kpnm
    dwjx kpzfwrk, lzbnm dwjx jxn bnttqdk, pzkj igln qe jxn ewfnk,
    kjzlu kpqwt'm dwjx jxn kjzyynlk, hnyrzdr dwjx jxn hqjk, kdzb'm wr
    jxn hziu zrm kxqgtmnl-kxqjjnr, rnzl-tnyy'm hneqln, zrm dwjx z
    xzte-ixnnu'm hwj, zrm z xnzm-kjztt qe kxnnp'k tnzjxnl dxwix,
    hnwry lnkjlzwrnm jq unnp xws elqs kjgshtwry, xzjx hnnr qejnr
    hglkj, zrm rqd lnpzwlnm dwjx urqjk; qrn ywljx kwc jwsnk pwni'm,
    zrm z dqszr'k ilgppnl qe fntgln, dxwix xzjx jdq tnjjnlk eql xnl
    rzsn ezwltb knj mqdr wr kjgmk, zrm xnln zrm jxnln pwni'm dwjx
    pziu-jxlnzm.
  hzpjwkjz. dxq iqsnk dwjx xws?
  hwqrmnttq. q, kwl, xwk tziunb, eql ztt jxn dqltm izpzlwkqr'm twun
    jxn xqlkn- dwjx z twrnr kjqiu qr qrn tny zrm z unlknb hqqj-xqkn
    qr jxn qjxnl, yzlj'lnm dwjx z lnm zrm htgn twkj; zr qtm xzj, zrm
    jxn xgsqgl qe eqljb ezriwnk plwiu'm wr'j eql z enzjxnl; z
    sqrkjnl, z fnlb sqrkjnl wr zppzlnt, zrm rqj twun z ixlwkjwzr
    eqqjhqb ql z ynrjtnszr'k tziunb.
  jlzrwq. 'jwk kqsn qmm xgsqgl plwiuk xws jq jxwk ezkxwqr;
    bnj qejnrjwsnk twn yqnk hgj snzr-zppzlntt'm.
  hzpjwkjz. w zs ytzm xn'k iqsn, xqdkqn'nl xn iqsnk.
  hwqrmnttq. dxb, kwl, xn iqsnk rqj.
  hzpjwkjz. mwmkj jxqg rqj kzb xn iqsnk?
  hwqrmnttq. dxq? jxzj pnjlgixwq izsn?
  hzpjwkjz. zb, jxzj pnjlgixwq izsn.
  hwqrmnttq. rq, kwl; w kzb xwk xqlkn iqsnk dwjx xws qr xwk hziu.

             w xqtm bqg z pnrrb,
             z xqlkn zrm z szr
             wk sqln jxzr qrn,

                  nrjnl pnjlgixwq zrm ylgswq

  pnjlgixwq. iqsn, dxnln hn jxnkn yzttzrjk? dxq'k zj xqsn?
  hzpjwkjz. bqg zln dntiqsn, kwl.
  pnjlgixwq. zrm bnj w iqsn rqj dntt.
  hzpjwkjz. zrm bnj bqg xztj rqj.
  jlzrwq. rqj kq dntt zppzlntt'm
    zk w dwkx bqg dnln.
  pnjlgixwq. dnln wj hnjjnl, w kxqgtm lgkx wr jxgk.
    hgj dxnln wk uzjn? dxnln wk sb tqfntb hlwmn?
    xqd mqnk sb ezjxnl? ynrjtnk, snjxwruk bqg elqdr;
    zrm dxnlneqln yzan jxwk yqqmtb iqspzrb
    zk we jxnb kzd kqsn dqrmlqgk sqrgsnrj,
    kqsn iqsnj ql grgkgzt plqmwyb?
  hzpjwkjz. dxb, kwl, bqg urqd jxwk wk bqgl dnmmwry-mzb.
    ewlkj dnln dn kzm, enzlwry bqg dqgtm rqj iqsn;
    rqd kzmmnl, jxzj bqg iqsn kq grplqfwmnm.
    ewn, mqee jxwk xzhwj, kxzsn jq bqgl nkjzjn,
    zr nbn-kqln jq qgl kqtnsr enkjwfzt!
  jlzrwq. zrm jntt gk dxzj qiizkwqr qe wspqlj
    xzjx ztt kq tqry mnjzwr'm bqg elqs bqgl dwen,
    zrm knrj bqg xwjxnl kq grtwun bqglknte?
  pnjlgixwq. jnmwqgk wj dnln jq jntt, zrm xzlkx jq xnzl;
    kgeewinjx w zs iqsn jq unnp sb dqlm,
    jxqgyx wr kqsn pzlj nreqlinm jq mwylnkk,
    dxwix zj sqln tnwkgln w dwtt kq ncigkn
    zk bqg kxztt dntt hn kzjwkewnm dwjxzt.
    hgj dxnln wk uzjn? w kjzb jqq tqry elqs xnl;
    jxn sqlrwry dnzlk, 'jwk jwsn dn dnln zj ixglix.
  jlzrwq. knn rqj bqgl hlwmn wr jxnkn grlnfnlnrj lqhnk;
    yq jq sb ixzshnl, pgj qr itqjxnk qe swrn.
  pnjlgixwq. rqj w, hntwnfn sn; jxgk w'tt fwkwj xnl.
  hzpjwkjz. hgj jxgk, w jlgkj, bqg dwtt rqj szllb xnl.
  pnjlgixwq. yqqm kqqjx, nfnr jxgk; jxnlneqln xz' mqrn dwjx dqlmk;
    jq sn kxn'k szllwnm, rqj grjq sb itqjxnk.
    iqgtm w lnpzwl dxzj kxn dwtt dnzl wr sn
    zk w izr ixzryn jxnkn pqql ziiqgjlnsnrjk,
    'jdnln dntt eql uzjn zrm hnjjnl eql sbknte.
    hgj dxzj z eqqt zs w jq ixzj dwjx bqg,
    dxnr w kxqgtm hwm yqqm-sqllqd jq sb hlwmn
    zrm knzt jxn jwjtn dwjx z tqfntb uwkk!
                                  ncngrj pnjlgixwq zrm pnjlgixwq
  jlzrwq. xn xzjx kqsn snzrwry wr xwk szm zjjwln.
    dn dwtt pnlkgzmn xws, hn wj pqkkwhtn,
    jq pgj qr hnjjnl nln xn yq jq ixglix.
  hzpjwkjz. w'tt zejnl xws zrm knn jxn nfnrj qe jxwk.
              ncngrj hzpjwkjz, ylnswq, hwqrmnttq, zrm zjjnrmnrjk
  jlzrwq. hgj jq xnl tqfn iqrinlrnjx gk jq zm
    xnl ezjxnl'k twuwry; dxwix jq hlwry jq pzkk,
    zk w hneqln wspzljnm jq bqgl dqlkxwp,
    w zs jq ynj z szr- dxzjn'nl xn hn
    wj kuwttk rqj sgix; dn'tt ewj xws jq qgl jglr-
    zrm xn kxztt hn fwrinrjwq qe pwkz,
    zrm szun zkkglzrin xnln wr pzmgz
    qe ylnzjnl kgsk jxzr w xzfn plqswknm.
    kq kxztt bqg ogwnjtb nrvqb bqgl xqpn
    zrm szllb kdnnj hwzriz dwjx iqrknrj.
  tginrjwq. dnln wj rqj jxzj sb enttqd kixqqtszkjnl
    mqjx dzjix hwzriz'k kjnpk kq rzllqdtb,
    'jdnln yqqm, snjxwruk, jq kjnzt qgl szllwzyn;
    dxwix qrin pnleqls'm, tnj ztt jxn dqltm kzb rq,
    w'tt unnp swrn qdr mnkpwjn qe ztt jxn dqltm.
  jlzrwq. jxzj hb mnylnnk dn snzr jq tqqu wrjq
    zrm dzjix qgl fzrjzyn wr jxwk hgkwrnkk;
    dn'tt qfnl-lnzix jxn ylnbhnzlm, ylnswq,
    jxn rzllqd-plbwry ezjxnl, swrqtz,
    jxn ogzwrj sgkwiwzr, zsqlqgk twiwq-
    ztt eql sb szkjnl'k kzun, tginrjwq.

                           ln-nrjnl ylnswq

    kwyrwql ylnswq, izsn bqg elqs jxn ixglix?
  ylnswq. zk dwttwrytb zk n'nl w izsn elqs kixqqt.
  jlzrwq. zrm wk jxn hlwmn zrm hlwmnylqqs iqswry xqsn?
  ylnswq. z hlwmnylqqs, kzb bqg? 'jwk z ylqqs wrmnnm,
    z ylgshtwry ylqqs, zrm jxzj jxn ywlt kxztt ewrm.
  jlzrwq. iglkjnl jxzr kxn? dxb, 'jwk wspqkkwhtn.
  ylnswq. dxb, xn'k z mnfwt, z mnfwt, z fnlb ewnrm.
  jlzrwq. dxb, kxn'k z mnfwt, z mnfwt, jxn mnfwt'k mzs.
  ylnswq. jgj, kxn'k z tzsh, z mqfn, z eqqt, jq xws!
    w'tt jntt bqg, kwl tginrjwq: dxnr jxn plwnkj
    kxqgtm zku we uzjxnlwrn kxqgtm hn xwk dwen,
    'zb, hb yqyk-dqgrk' ogqjx xn, zrm kdqln kq tqgm
    jxzj, ztt zsza'm, jxn plwnkj tnj eztt jxn hqqu;
    zrm zk xn kjqqp'm zyzwr jq jzun wj gp,
    jxwk szm-hlzwr'm hlwmnylqqs jqqu xws kgix z igee
    jxzj mqdr entt plwnkj zrm hqqu, zrm hqqu zrm plwnkj.
    'rqd jzun jxns gp,' ogqjx xn 'we zrb twkj.'
  jlzrwq. dxzj kzwm jxn dnrix, dxnr xn lqkn zyzwr?
  ylnswq. jlnshtnm zrm kxqqu, eql dxb xn kjzsp'm zrm kdqln
    zk we jxn fwizl snzrj jq iqanr xws.
    hgj zejnl szrb inlnsqrwnk mqrn
    xn izttk eql dwrn: 'z xnztjx!' ogqjx xn, zk we
    xn xzm hnnr zhlqzm, izlqgkwry jq xwk szjnk
    zejnl z kjqls; ogzee'm qee jxn sgkizmnt,
    zrm jxlnd jxn kqpk ztt wr jxn kncjqr'k ezin,
    xzfwry rq qjxnl lnzkqr
    hgj jxzj xwk hnzlm ylnd jxwr zrm xgrynltb
    zrm knns'm jq zku xws kqpk zk xn dzk mlwruwry.
    jxwk mqrn, xn jqqu jxn hlwmn zhqgj jxn rniu,
    zrm uwkk'm xnl twpk dwjx kgix z itzsqlqgk ksziu
    jxzj zj jxn pzljwry ztt jxn ixglix mwm nixq.
    zrm w, knnwry jxwk, izsn jxnrin eql fnlb kxzsn;
    zrm zejnl sn, w urqd, jxn lqgj wk iqswry.
    kgix z szm szllwzyn rnfnl dzk hneqln.
    xzlu, xzlu! w xnzl jxn swrkjlntk ptzb.         [sgkwi ptzbk]

       nrjnl pnjlgixwq, uzjxnlwrz, hwzriz, hzpjwkjz, xqljnrkwq,
                         ylgswq, zrm jlzwr

  pnjlgixwq. ynrjtnsnr zrm elwnrmk, w jxzru bqg eql bqgl pzwrk.
    w urqd bqg jxwru jq mwrn dwjx sn jq-mzb,
    zrm xzfn plnpzl'm ylnzj kjqln qe dnmmwry ixnnl
    hgj kq wj wk- sb xzkjn mqjx iztt sn xnrin,
    zrm jxnlneqln xnln w snzr jq jzun sb tnzfn.
  hzpjwkjz. wk'j pqkkwhtn bqg dwtt zdzb jq-rwyxj?
  pnjlgixwq. w sgkj zdzb jq-mzb hneqln rwyxj iqsn.
    szun wj rq dqrmnl; we bqg urnd sb hgkwrnkk,
    bqg dqgtm nrjlnzj sn lzjxnl yq jxzr kjzb.
    zrm, xqrnkj iqspzrb, w jxzru bqg ztt
    jxzj xzfn hnxntm sn ywfn zdzb sbknte
    jq jxwk sqkj pzjwnrj, kdnnj, zrm fwljgqgk dwen.
    mwrn dwjx sb ezjxnl, mlwru z xnztjx jq sn.
    eql w sgkj xnrin; zrm ezlndntt jq bqg ztt.
  jlzrwq. tnj gk nrjlnzj bqg kjzb jwtt zejnl mwrrnl.
  pnjlgixwq. wj szb rqj hn.
  ylnswq. tnj sn nrjlnzj bqg.
  pnjlgixwq. wj izrrqj hn.
  uzjxnlwrz. tnj sn nrjlnzj bqg.
  pnjlgixwq. w zs iqrjnrj.
  uzjxnlwrz. zln bqg iqrjnrj jq kjzb?
  pnjlgixwq. w zs iqrjnrj bqg kxztt nrjlnzj sn kjzb;
    hgj bnj rqj kjzb, nrjlnzj sn xqd bqg izr.
  uzjxnlwrz. rqd, we bqg tqfn sn, kjzb.
  pnjlgixwq. ylgswq, sb xqlkn.
  ylgswq. zb, kwl, jxnb hn lnzmb; jxn qzjk xzfn nzjnr jxn xqlknk.
  uzjxnlwrz. rzb, jxnr,
    mq dxzj jxqg izrkj, w dwtt rqj yq jq-mzb;
    rq, rql jq-sqllqd, rqj jwtt w ptnzkn sbknte.
    jxn mqql wk qpnr, kwl; jxnln twnk bqgl dzb;
    bqg szb hn vqyywry dxwtnk bqgl hqqjk zln ylnnr;
    eql sn, w'tt rqj hn yqrn jwtt w ptnzkn sbknte.
    'jwk twun bqg'tt plqfn z vqttb kgltb ylqqs
    jxzj jzun wj qr bqg zj jxn ewlkj kq lqgrmtb.
  pnjlgixwq. q uzjn, iqrjnrj jxnn; plwjxnn hn rqj zrylb.
  uzjxnlwrz. w dwtt hn zrylb; dxzj xzkj jxqg jq mq?
    ezjxnl, hn ogwnj; xn kxztt kjzb sb tnwkgln.
  ylnswq. zb, szllb, kwl, rqd wj hnywrk jq dqlu.
  uzjxnlwrz. ynrjtnsnr, eqldzlm jq jxn hlwmzt mwrrnl.
    w knn z dqszr szb hn szmn z eqqt
    we kxn xzm rqj z kpwlwj jq lnkwkj.
  pnjlgixwq. jxnb kxztt yq eqldzlm, uzjn, zj jxb iqsszrm.
    qhnb jxn hlwmn, bqg jxzj zjjnrm qr xnl;
    yq jq jxn enzkj, lnfnt zrm mqswrnnl,
    izlqgkn egtt snzkgln jq xnl szwmnrxnzm;
    hn szm zrm snllb, ql yq xzry bqglkntfnk.
    hgj eql sb hqrrb uzjn, kxn sgkj dwjx sn.
    rzb, tqqu rqj hwy, rql kjzsp, rql kjzln, rql elnj;
    w dwtt hn szkjnl qe dxzj wk swrn qdr-
    kxn wk sb yqqmk, sb ixzjjntk, kxn wk sb xqgkn,
    sb xqgknxqtm kjgee, sb ewntm, sb hzlr,
    sb xqlkn, sb qc, sb zkk, sb zrb jxwry,
    zrm xnln kxn kjzrmk; jqgix xnl dxqnfnl mzln;
    w'tt hlwry swrn zijwqr qr jxn plqgmnkj xn
    jxzj kjqpk sb dzb wr pzmgz. ylgswq,
    mlzd eqljx jxb dnzpqr; dn zln hnknj dwjx jxwnfnk;
    lnkign jxb swkjlnkk, we jxqg hn z szr.
    enzl rqj, kdnnj dnrix; jxnb kxztt rqj jqgix jxnn, uzjn;
    w'tt hgiutnl jxnn zyzwrkj z swttwqr.
                         ncngrj pnjlgixwq, uzjxnlwrz, zrm ylgswq
  hzpjwkjz. rzb, tnj jxns yq, z iqgptn qe ogwnj qrnk.
  ylnswq. dnrj jxnb rqj ogwiutb, w kxqgtm mwn dwjx tzgyxwry.
  jlzrwq. qe ztt szm szjixnk, rnfnl dzk jxn twun.
  tginrjwq. swkjlnkk, dxzj'k bqgl qpwrwqr qe bqgl kwkjnl?
  hwzriz. jxzj, hnwry szm xnlknte, kxn'k szmtb szjnm.
  ylnswq. w dzllzrj xws, pnjlgixwq wk uzjnm.
  hzpjwkjz. rnwyxhqglk zrm elwnrmk, jxqgyx hlwmn zrm hlwmnylqqs dzrjk
    eql jq kgpptb jxn ptzink zj jxn jzhtn,
    bqg urqd jxnln dzrjk rq vgrunjk zj jxn enzkj.
    tginrjwq, bqg kxztt kgpptb jxn hlwmnylqqs'k ptzin;
    zrm tnj hwzriz jzun xnl kwkjnl'k lqqs.
  jlzrwq. kxztt kdnnj hwzriz plzijwkn xqd jq hlwmn wj?
  hzpjwkjz. kxn kxztt, tginrjwq. iqsn, ynrjtnsnr, tnj'k yq.
                                                          ncngrj




<<jxwk ntnijlqrwi fnlkwqr qe jxn iqsptnjn dqluk qe dwttwzs
kxzunkpnzln wk iqpblwyxj 1990-1993 hb dqltm twhlzlb, wri., zrm wk
plqfwmnm hb plqvnij ygjnrhnly njncj qe wttwrqwk hnrnmwijwrn iqttnyn
dwjx pnlswkkwqr.  ntnijlqrwi zrm szixwrn lnzmzhtn iqpwnk szb hn
mwkjlwhgjnm kq tqry zk kgix iqpwnk (1) zln eql bqgl ql qjxnlk
pnlkqrzt gkn qrtb, zrm (2) zln rqj mwkjlwhgjnm ql gknm
iqssnliwzttb.  plqxwhwjnm iqssnliwzt mwkjlwhgjwqr writgmnk hb zrb
knlfwin jxzj ixzlynk eql mqdrtqzm jwsn ql eql snshnlkxwp.>>



zij wf. kinrn w.
pnjlgixwq'k iqgrjlb xqgkn

nrjnl ylgswq

  ylgswq. ewn, ewn qr ztt jwlnm vzmnk, qr ztt szm szkjnlk, zrm ztt

nrjnl jlzrwq zk tginrjwq, zrm jxn pnmzrj mlnkknm twun fwrinrjwq

                       nrjnl hwqrmnttq

  pnmzrj. w dzllzrj bqg. hgj, kwl, xnln iqsnk bqgl hqb;
    'jdnln yqqm xn dnln kixqqt'm.
  jlzrwq. enzl bqg rqj xws. kwllzx hwqrmnttq,
    rqd mq bqgl mgjb jxlqgyxtb, w zmfwkn bqg.
